Abbadomon.name: Abbadomon
Abbadomon.description: Abbadomon is an Unidentified Digimon. It is a mysterious Digimon that digivolved enormously by absorbing the negative data that the Network is overflowing with beyond its limit. Its raison d'être is to transcend good and evil, and return everything to nothingness. It bites into Digimon and the Digital World itself with the large mouth at its center and the mouths on its numerous tentacles, and after doing so, only the blank data of empty space is left behind. The birth of Abbadomon is undoubtedly a crisis for all Digital Worlds, so it is conjectured that some Digital Worlds from other dimensions have been annihilated by it. You will be erased the instant you suffer any of Abbadomon attacks.

attacks.name: Gaze Eraser
attacks.description: Emits cursed beams from all of the eyes on its tentacles.

attacks.name: Gala-lightness
attacks.description: Seizes the enemy with its tentacles and swallows them whole through its central mouth.

attacks.name: White Liner
attacks.description: Fires a white beam its central mouth.

Abbadomon Core.name: Abbadomon Core
debut: Digimon Adventure:, "The Last Miracle, The Last Power" [66]
Abbadomon Core.description: Abbadomon Core is an Unidentified Digimon. It is the main body that exists within Abbadomon, it is the true form of Abbadomon. It seeks and prefers nothingness, and rejects everything except nothingness. After it turns everything into nothingness, it disappears itself, fulfilling its purpose.

attacks.name: Eclipse None
attacks.description: Makes the energy that it shoots from both of its hands stick to the enemy, corroding them, and gnawing away at their whole body.

attacks.name: Binjerādo
attacks.description: Transforms its right arm into a spear and pierces with it.

attacks.name: Death Charge
attacks.description: Transforms its left arm into a gun barrel and fires energy shots.

attacks.name: Gaze Eraser
attacks.description: Cursed beams emitted from all of the eyes on its mantle, which is even more cursed than when it is performed by Abbadomon.

Achillesmon.name: Achillesmon
Achillesmon.description: Achillesmon is a Beast Man Digimon. It is a Mega Digimon that digivolved by becoming adept in every kind of sport from all times and places, and mastering them. It possesses spirit, skill, and strength, and is a true seeker who never misses training without bragging about its tenacious power. Its extreme physical ability has no weaknesses, and so it achieves victory without showing any weak spots not only in sports, but also in battle. The shields on its feet act as boosters, and are widely used for things such as its "Anemodarmenos" and "Asteroeidis".

attacks.name: Anemodarmenos (ανεμοδαρμένος lit. "Windswept")
attacks.description: Confuses the enemy with afterimages caused by its high-speed movement.

attacks.name: Asteroeidis (αστεροειδής lit. "Asteroid")
attacks.description: A kicking technique that it dishes out using its swift speed.

attacks.name: Lónkhē Adistakto (λόγχη αδίστακτος lit. "Ruthless Spear")
attacks.description: Throws its divine spear and pierces the enemy's Digicore reliably.

Aegiochusmon.name: Aegiochusmon

otherNames.name: アイギオトゥースモン Aegiochusmon
アイギオテュースモン レッド Aegiochusmon Red

Aegiochusmon.description: Aegiochusmonis a Deity Digimon. It synthesized the abilities of various species, with a human body as the base. The synthesis of species is said to be the result of having sought the extreme called omnipotence, and adapts it to its surroundings, dramatically altering its appearance. This form is composed of data taken from the Dragon-tribe, so the data of the Dragon-tribe sleeping within its body manifests on the surface of its body, centered upon the crystal in its chest, and establishes itself as armor. This armor is a Powered Suit that affects not only Aegiochusmon's defensive power but also its physical strength, drastically increasing its offensive power.

attacks.name: Bolt Break Knockdown
attacks.description: Commences a rush attack with fists shrouded in the thunder produced from its horn.

attacks.name: Lightning Pile
attacks.description: Shapes thunder into a pile, then impales the opponent from just overhead to drive them into the ground. It is said that if the pile pierces the opponent once, the piles cast afterward will always hit, regardless from where they're cast.

attacks.name: Charging Strike
attacks.description: Pierces the opponent's head with its horn using a high speed charge that capitalizes on its prided leg strength.

Aegiochusmon Blue.name: Aegiochusmon Blue
Aegiochusmon Blue.description: Aegiochusmon Blue is a Deity Digimon. It synthesized the abilities of various species, with a human body as the base. The synthesis of species is said to be the result of having sought the extreme called omnipotence, and adapts it to its surroundings, dramatically altering its appearance. This form is composed of data taken from the Cyborg-tribe, so the data of the Cyborg-tribe sleeping within its body focuses itself on its upper body, particularly the left side, centered upon the crystal in its chest. It is equipped with a release for the characteristic power of the Cyborg-tribe, and a lock-on function which doesn't miss its designated target. Its gigantic left arm, the "Mechanization Powered Arm", has the ability to attach and detach, and is able to independently pursue and attack a locked opponent.

attacks.name: Penetra-laser
attacks.description: Fires a beam from the fingertips of the Mechanization Powered Arm.

attacks.name: Wing Cutter
attacks.description: Flies and slashes the opponent with the wings equipped to its back.

attacks.name: Powered Ignition
attacks.description: Charges energy in the palm of the Mechanization Powered Arm while it's still attached, then releases it in a charge at the enemy.

Aegiochusmon Dark.name: Aegiochusmon Dark
Aegiochusmon Dark.description: Aegiochusmon Dark is a Deity Digimon. It synthesized the abilities of various species, with a human body as the base. The synthesis of species is said to be the result of having sought the extreme called omnipotence, and adapts it to its surroundings, dramatically altering its appearance. This form is composed of data taken from the Evil-tribe, so the data of the Evil-tribe sleeping within its body has infected its whole body.

attacks.name: Triangler
attacks.description: Chops opponents up with three scythes.

attacks.name: Plasmadness
attacks.description: Charges dark electricity in both its hands.

attacks.name: Death dinner
attacks.description: It instinctively eats while riding on a target.

Aegiochusmon Green.name: Aegiochusmon Green
Aegiochusmon Green.description: Aegiochusmon Green is a Deity Digimon. It synthesized the abilities of various species, with a human body as the base. The synthesis of species is said to be the result of having sought the extreme called omnipotence, and adapts it to its surroundings, dramatically altering its appearance. This form is composed of data taken from the Plant-tribe, so the data of the Plant-tribe sleeping within its body establishes itself as an upper body and arms, centered upon the crystal in its chest. Because it is based on the Plant-tribe, its weight is especially light compared to the other forms. It is able to fire sturdy thorns from the Busters equipped to both of its arms, and perform tricky movements that hook its thorns in various places similar to Rope Action, or perform others that are used for offense and defense. Its keen movements which capitalize on its equipment and agility can definitely be said to be this form's greatest distinction.

attacks.name: Bramble Bite
attacks.description: Summons thorns transformed into an evil spirit which snaps at the opponent.

attacks.name: Plant Zone Cradle
attacks.description: Shoots numerous thorns from its entire body, tearing the surrounding opponents to pieces over a wide range.

attacks.name: Charging Strike
attacks.description: Pierces the opponent's head with its horn using a high speed charge that capitalizes on its leg strength.

Aegiochusmon Holy.name: Aegiochusmon Holy
Aegiochusmon Holy.description: Aegiochusmon Holy is a Deity Digimon. It synthesized the abilities of various species, with a human body as the base. The synthesis of species is said to be the result of having sought the extreme called omnipotence, and adapts it to its surroundings, dramatically altering its appearance. This form is composed of data taken from the Angel-tribe, so the data of the Angel-tribe sleeping within its body covers its whole body, and its heart is as serene as a still lake.

attacks.name: Lightning Shower
attacks.description: Launches countless daggers that rain down from the sky, to avert enemies.

attacks.name: Thunder Slash
attacks.description: Flows lightning into its daggers and slashes the enemy like mochi.

attacks.name: Circlet Defense
attacks.description: Creates a defensive wall that bounces an opponent's attack back with a lightning strike.

Aegiomon.name: Aegiomon
Aegiomon.description: Aegiomon is a Deity Digimon. It has an appearance fusing the lower body of a goat with the upper body of a human. As a member of the same musical troupe as Sirenmon, it is usually playing the pipes called "Syrinx" hung at its waist and enjoying the music. Although it has a peace-loving personality and doesn't really like to fight, the power it conceals within is unquantified, and when Aegiomon fights to protect something, it exhibits unique talent for combat.

attacks.name: Attract Echo
attacks.description: Plays a song on the Syrinx that attracts the attention of those who hear it, eventually stealing away their sense of self and blinding them to everything but Aegiomon. With this, it can produce an opportunity for other Digimon to flee from or pursue the listener.

attacks.name: Iron Trust
attacks.description: Hurls a sharp, backwards kick with its prided goat legs.

attacks.name: Stun Beat Blow
attacks.description: Beats the opponent while releasing the electricity circulating within its body from a portion of its arms, numbing the opponent's sensitivity and dulling their movements.

Aegisdramon.name: Aegisdramon
Aegisdramon.description: Aegisdramon is a Cyborg Digimon. It is a Digimon born from the fusion of a Plesiomon with Seadramon-species data. It is said that its shining armor, made of a golden Chrome Digizoid alloy, will purify all evil. It is a member of the Crack Team, and is mainly in charge of analyzing information on the enemy and reconnaissance. It is also known as the brains of the Crack Team due to the fact that the analyzed information is quickly sent to the Crack Team deployed to its surroundings, giving them the advantage in combat situations. In addition, it conceals sufficient firepower to enable battalion-class annihilation warfare, even when acting alone.

attacks.name: Power Water
attacks.description: Fires gigantic shots of water from both its arms.

attacks.name: Blaze Power
attacks.description: Shoots down an enemy it has locked onto with missiles launched from its deck.

attacks.name: Tera Hydro Breath
attacks.description: Crushes the opponent with a water current spewed out from its mouth.

attacks.name: Shine Breaker
attacks.description: Simultaneously fires concentrated bombardments of shining energy and bombardments of scorching energy at the target from all the cannons on its body, completely annihilating the target with the gigantic explosion of super-destructive energy produced from the fusion of the two types of energy at the point of convergence of all the bombardments. The explosion releases a glistening, golden flash which gives off the feeling of terrifying power and divinity at the same time.

attacks.name: Energy Cannon
attacks.description: Fires blasts of energy from both its arms.

Aequcedramon.name: Aequcedramon
Aequcedramon.description: Name used by Bandai onDigimon Partners.Romanization provided by@sho3411.

AeroVeedramon.name: AeroVeedramon
AeroVeedramon.description: AeroVeedramon is a Holy Dragon Digimon. Veedramon digivolved further, and as AeroVeedramon, it became able to move through the sky. Among the rare species of Veedramon, it is said that only veteran warriors that have come through frequent battles are able to digivolve, so its existence is already becoming a legend. Not only did its Digivolution grant it wings, but it also digivolved several parts of its body for better grappling, acquiring stronger offensive and defensive power. If you include its attacks from the sky, there are probably no longer any opponents who can rival AeroVeedramon.

attacks.name: V-Wing Blade
attacks.description: Forms a V-shaped energy substance that seems to connect the horn on its snout to the edges of its wings, then soars towards the opponent. Although it cuts the opponent to pieces with the blades of its wings, its weakness is that the technique cannot be used if it is not in flight.

attacks.name: Dragon Impulse
attacks.description: Launches a shock wave which has the appearance of a dragon.

attacks.name: V-Breath Arrow
attacks.description: Shoots out a V-shaped heat beam that burns an enemy into a crisp in a second.

attacks.name: Magnum Crasher (Magnum Crush)
attacks.description: Punches the foe with a fist of glowing energy.

attacks.name: Wind Guardian (風の守護壁, Kaze no Shugo Kabe, lit. "Guardian Wall of Wind")
attacks.description: Uses wings to call a flurry of winds that create a wind barrier.

attacks.name: Twister Saber
attacks.description: Charges up blades on arms with energy and then releases it in cutting waves.

Agumon.name: Agumon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Chika Sakamoto(Adventure/02/tri./Kizuna/Cyber Sleuth/Hacker's Memory/Next Order/Appli Monsters/ReArise/Adventure:/Survive/New Century)
(En:)Michael Lindsay(Adventure, "And so it begins..." and "The Birth of Greymon"[11]),Tom Fahn(Adventure/02[11]tri./Kizuna/ReArise),Michael Sorich(Big Agumon),Ben Diskin(Adventure:[12])

otherNames.name: 亞古獸/亚古兽 Yà gǔ shòu, Agumon

Agumon.description: Agumonis a Reptile Digimon. It has grown up and become able to walk on two legs, and has an appearance like a tiny dinosaur. Because it is still on the way to adulthood, its power is low, but as its personality is quite ferocious, it doesn't understand fear. It has grown hard, sharp claws on both its hands and feet, and demonstrates its power in battle. It is also a being that foretells Digivolution to a great and powerful Digimon.

attacks.name:
Pepper Breath (Baby Flame): Spits flame breath from its mouth to attack the opponent.
Kūchū Baby Flame (空中ベビーフレイム, lit. "Aerial Baby Flame")
Super Pepper Breath
attacks.description: A more powerful version of Pepper Breath.

attacks.name: Kūchū Baby Flame (空中ベビーフレイム, lit. "Aerial Baby Flame")
Super Pepper Breath
attacks.description: A more powerful version of Pepper Breath.

attacks.name: Sharp Claws (するどいツメ, Surudoi Tsume, lit. "Sharp Claw")
attacks.description: Attacks with claws.

attacks.name: Spirit Fire (Spitfire)
attacks.description: Shoots a small blast of fire from its mouth.

attacks.name: Cross Fire (Cross Fight)
attacks.description: Gathers power and then either bites foe or slashes them with claws.

attacks.name: Triple Bird Flame (Triple Baby Flame)
attacks.description: Performs "Pepper Breath" alongside two other Agumon, fusing the three flames into a gigantic fireball.

attacks.name: Claw Uppercut (Uppercut)
attacks.description: Uppercuts the enemy with its claws.

attacks.name: Claw Attack (Mach Jab)
attacks.description:
Rapidly jabs or slashes the opponent with the claws of both hands.
Mach Jab Combo

attacks.name: Dynamite Kick
attacks.description: A flurry of kicks in midair.

attacks.name: Fire Breath
attacks.description: Spews a very hot breath of flames at the enemy.

attacks.name: Baby Burner
attacks.description: Accumulates "Pepper Breath" in its mouth and then spits it out all at once as a much more powerful blast.

attacks.name: Agumon Dive
attacks.description: Jumps at the enemy and slams its claws down on them.

attacks.name: Wildfire Uppercut
attacks.description: A flaming uppercut with its claws.

attacks.name: Wild Whip
attacks.description: Hits the enemy with an upward swing of both hands.

attacks.name: Splash Kick
attacks.description: Kicks the enemy whilst flipping forward.

attacks.name: Final Claw
attacks.description: Jumps and slashes a falling enemy with the claws of both hands.

Agumon (2006 anime).name: Agumon (2006 anime)
Agumon (2006 anime).description: Agumon (2006 anime) is a Dinosaur Digimon. A unique Agumon which has bound red leather belts around its arms, its maturation is presumed to differ from its traditional Digivolutions. As it's still growing, its power is weak, but it has grown hard, sharp claws on its hands and feet, and it exhibits its power in combat.

attacks.name: Pepper Breath (Baby Flame)
attacks.description: Spews flaming breath from its mouth to strike the opponent.

attacks.name: Spitfire Blast (Baby Burner)
attacks.description: Accumulates "Pepper Breath" in its mouth and then spits it out all at once as a much more powerful blast.

attacks.name: Sharp Claw (するどいツメ, Surudoi Tsume)
attacks.description: Attacks with its claws.

attacks.name: Baby Volcano
attacks.description: Breathe out a huge fireball and cause a huge explosion.

attacks.name: Sharper Claw (もっとするどいツメ, Motto Surudoi Tsume)
attacks.description: Scratch using sharp claws.

attacks.name: Baby Claw
attacks.description: Strike using both hands.

Agumon (Black) (2006 anime).name: Agumon (Black) (2006 anime)
Agumon (Black) (2006 anime).description: Agumon (Black) (2006 anime) is a Dinosaur Digimon.

attacks.name: Spit fire
attacks.description: Breathes fire.

attacks.name: Tackle (たいあたり, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Blow")
attacks.description: Tackles with all its might.

attacks.name: Pepper Breath (Baby Flame)
attacks.description: Breathes fire.

attacks.name: Baby Breath
attacks.description: Emits a small blast from mouth.

Agumon (Bond of Bravery).name: Agumon (Bond of Bravery)
debut: Digimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Dash X)andDigimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Mirai)

otherNames.name: アグモン -勇気の絆- Agumon -Yuki's Kizuna-

Agumon (Bond of Bravery).description: Agumon (Bond of Bravery)is an Unknown Digimon. A profound bond betweenAgumonand its Partner, it is a legendary, final digivolution, which realized after countless possibilities. The indomitable "Courage" of its Partner turned into hot flames that spurt out from its entire body, and appears as proof of their deep trust. By spending a long amount of time together, it has a deeper understanding of humans, and its digivolved form has also produced a shape close to that of a humanoid.

attacks.name: Striking Salamander Slash (Str-lash Salamander)
attacks.description: High-intensity red lasers emitted from the tips of the claws that burn the enemy.

attacks.name: Red Reamer
attacks.description: Uses the spear on its tail as a weapon and skewer the enemy with it.

attacks.name: Brave Gaia (Gaia Brave)
attacks.description: Changes the flames of courage it bears into an ultra-high temperature energy shot and then releases it.

Agumon (Burst Mode).name: Agumon (Burst Mode)
Agumon (Burst Mode).description: Agumon (Burst Mode) is anAgumon (2006 anime)who has undergoneBurst Digivolution. It has a fiery dragon-like tail and wings, and the bracers on its arms elongate into reins.

Agumon Expert.name: Agumon Expert
Agumon Expert.description: Agumon Expert is a Dinosaur Digimon. It is a genius Agumon that has a doctorate in Digital Monster studies from Digital World Academy. The badge on its chest is proof of its doctorate. Though it is said that its degree was created by Agumon Expert itself, it certainly is knowledgeable about Digimon types and territories. Due to its peculiar accent in which it attaches "Gya" to the end of its remarks, it is thought to possibly have come from a distant locale. Terriermon Assistant is a hardworking Terriermon that supports Agumon Expert. Agumon Expert wrote most of the reports in Digimon Profile, and is one of the researches that work on the Digimon Reference Book.

attacks.name: Mortarboard (ハカセボウ, Hakase Bou, lit. "Professor's Hat")
attacks.description: Tries to enchant itself with cleverness through its hat.

attacks.name: Professor's Rod (ハカセボー, Hakase Bō)
attacks.description: Tries to persuade the opponent with its rod.

attacks.name: Baby Flame
attacks.description: Spits flame breath from its mouth to attack the opponent.

attacks.name: Surudoi Tsume (するどいツメ, Surudoi Tsume lit. "Sharp Claw")
attacks.description: Attacks with claws.

Agumon X.name: Agumon X
Agumon X.description: Agumon X is a Dinosaur Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. As a Dinosaur-type, its qualities for digivolving into an especially outstanding Greymon-species have improved, unique blue lines appear in its body color, and it is not a Reptile-type anymore but is classified as a Dinosaur-type. Its claws honed, increasing its lethal potential further.

attacks.name: Pepper Breath (Baby Flame)
attacks.description: Spits flame breath from its mouth to attack the opponent.

attacks.name: Baby Burner
attacks.description: As a result of its ferocity being drawn out more strongly, it has become possible for it to fire its "Baby Burner", in which it amasses single shots of "Baby Flame" in its mouth and then spews it out all at once.

attacks.name: Spitfire
attacks.description: Shoots a small blast of fire from its mouth.

Agunimon.name: Agunimon
Agunimon.description: Agunimon is a Wizard Digimon. It possesses power over Flame which bears the might of AncientGreymon. Because its "DigiCore" is wrapped in the Spiritual Fire which is called a holy blaze, it is able to freely manipulate flames. It is an incarnation of the "Firewall" that defends the Net, and is a guardian deity. Because of its easily fired-up personality, it has a soldier-like aspect that practices mental training with yoga exercises, and its way of speaking is somewhat archaic, like a kenpo artist. In battle, it fights by freely using Oriental martial arts, and accumulates flames at one point of its body with a trick that focuses its spirit, to raise its offensive ability. It wields the flame-clad Burning Wrist battle gloves.

attacks.name: Pyro Punch (Burning Salamander)
attacks.description: Unleashes a blazing dragon from the Burning Wrists.

attacks.name: Pyro Tornado (Salamander Break)
attacks.description: Unleashes a whirlwind kick of flames.

attacks.name: Pyro Darts (Fire Darts)
attacks.description: Throws small bits of fire at his target from his gauntlet.

attacks.name: Pyro Tornado (Crimson Knuckle)
attacks.description: Performs a punch.

attacks.name: Fire Dash
attacks.description: A high-speed dash, leaving flames in its wake.

attacks.name: Fire Slide
attacks.description: A fiery sliding kick.

attacks.name: Elbow Drop
attacks.description: Drops from the air to hit an opponent with its elbow.

attacks.name: Burning Slider
attacks.description: Performs a punch and follows with a sliding strike.

attacks.name: Voltic Strike
attacks.description: Performs a flaming kick.

attacks.name:
Blaze Shoot: Performs a kick in the air.
Blaze Gust
attacks.description: Performs a kick in the air.

attacks.name: Blaze Gust
attacks.description: Performs a kick in the air.

attacks.name: Salaman Rider Kick
attacks.description: Performs a flaming jump kick.

attacks.name:
Gatling Burst: Performs a series of rapid-fire punches.
Million Gatling Burst
attacks.description: Continues a series of rapid-fire punches.

attacks.name: Million Gatling Burst
attacks.description: Continues a series of rapid-fire punches.

Aircraft Carrier Whamon.name: Aircraft Carrier Whamon
debut: Digimon Xros Wars (manga), "Xros Wars!! The Prologue to the End!!" [16]
Aircraft Carrier Whamon.description: Aircraft Carrier Whamon is a Whamon capable of flight. It has a space for passengers strapped to its head.

Airdramon.name: Airdramon
Airdramon.description: Airdramon is a Mythical Animal Digimon who bears huge wings. It is a very valuable monster said to be close to God. It's good at aerial attacks, and its roar can call storms, while the flap of its wings can cause tornadoes. Although its personality is quite ferocious, it possesses a high intelligence. However, it's impossible for an average Tamer to use it.

attacks.name: Spinning Needle
attacks.description: Produces a cutting vacuum from the thrashing of its humongous wings.

attacks.name: Wing Cutter
attacks.description: Uses multiple blades of wind to attack the enemy.

attacks.name: Tail Whip
attacks.description: Attacks with its tail.

attacks.name: Fatal Tornado (God Tornado)
attacks.description: Flaps wings to create a tornado.

attacks.name: Tornado
attacks.description: Creates a large tornado by flapping its wings.

attacks.name: Big Jaw
attacks.description: Takes a big bite using its big jaw.

attacks.name: Megalo Spark
attacks.description: Fires an electric ball of energy from its mouth.

Akatorimon.name: Akatorimon
Akatorimon.description: Akatorimon is a Giant Bird Digimon. It is a Kokatorimon-species Digimon that developed its legs to make up for being unable to fly. Because it consumes more energy than meets the eye moving its large body, it apparently detests violent battles. It has an impressive crest and a sharp beak.

attacks.name: Chicken Red Eyes (Scar-Red Eye)
attacks.description: Glares with its red eyes to petrify and shatter the opponent.

attacks.name: Blast Shot
attacks.description: Sends ballistic waves and attacks.

Aldamon.name: Aldamon
Aldamon.description: Aldamon is a Wizard Digimon. It possesses power over Flame that has transcended legend by inheriting all the might of AncientGreymon and acquiring unknown abilities. Although it makes many enemies with its rough behavior, its name is derived from the fused form of a god of Indian mythology, Ardhanarishvara, and since it possesses both the wildness of a beast and the intelligence of a human, it is a Demon God that fights by converting anger or fear into righteous strength. In battle, it unleashes super-wide ranged attacks that melt everything then burn it up without a trace. This aspect has enough destructive power, in that moment, to bear a close resemblance to the menace of modern nuclear weapons. Also, it is capable of fighting using the "Rudriya Darpaṇa" (रुद्रियदर्पण lit. "Terrifying Mirror") superweapons on both of its arms in hand-to-hand combat, and it specializes in close combat.

attacks.name: Solar Wind Destroyer (Brahmashira)
attacks.description: Enhances the holy flames of its "DigiCore" to their utmost limit, then personally manufactures the high temperature and high density core of the sun, before detonating it.

attacks.name: Atomic Inferno (Brahmastra)
attacks.description: High-speed rapid-fires the extremely high-temperature shots it unleashes from the Rudriya Darpaṇa.

Allomon.name: Allomon
Allomon.description: Allomonis a Dinosaur Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Courage". As it is especially ferocious among Dinosaur Digimon, there is a rivalry between it and fellow Dinosaur Digimon,Tyrannomon. Allomon's special features are having powerful leg strength, and being able to run at blistering speed by tilting its head down and taking a horizontal stance.

attacks.name: Dino Burst
attacks.description: Spews out an extremely high-temperature wind.

Allomon X.name: Allomon X
Allomon X.description: Allomon X is a Dinosaur Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its leg strength has developed further, and it acquired agility on par with that of small Digimon despite being a large Digimon. Although its running speed has also increased, this large Allomon flies, and it is said that there are many Digimon who have seen it swoop down and seize the enemy. As a result of adapting to its agile body, it acquired a new Special Move called "Dino Flash".

attacks.name: Dino Burst
attacks.description: Spews out an extremely high-temperature wind.

attacks.name: Dino Flash
attacks.description: An extremely high-temperature wind released from its mouth instantaneously like a flash.

Alphamon.name: Alphamon
Alphamon.description: Alphamonis a Warrior Digimon and a carrier of theX-Antibody. While it is one of the "Royal Knights", it is said that, to the Holy Knights, it is a being similar to adeterrent force, and as it doesn't appear in normal times, it is also called the "Aloof Hermit" who flutters a blue mantle, and is the Royal Knight assigned to the place called the "Empty Seat". Because it possesses the"Alpha inForce"ability, an ultimate force which, in battle, instantaneously replays the elapsed battle, although Alphamon's attacks are over in just an instant, you can't grasp how many attacks it actually unleashed, and in theory, you can only see the final blow that brought down its opponent. It can deploy amagic circleofDigiCodefrom its hands to perform offense and defense.It wields the "Divine Sword Grade Alpha"(聖剣グレイダルファー,Seiken Gureidarufā, lit. "Holy Sword Gradalpha"), which is based onGrademon's "Souken Gradalpha"(双剣グレイダルファー,Souken Gureidarufā, Twin Swords Gradalpha).

attacks.name: Divine Sword Grade Alpha (聖剣グレイダルファー, Seiken Gradalpha)
attacks.description: Draws out a convergence of light that was pierced into the center of a magic circle, and stabs it through the opponent.

attacks.name: Digitalize of Soul: Spreads the wings on its back and flies up high, then deploys a magic circle even larger than the sky, with which it summons a legendary monster from another dimension. In Digital Monster X-Evolution, Digimon Adventure tri., Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth, Digimon Story
attacks.description: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory, Digimon Links, and Digimon ReArise, it summons a small magic circle before itself, with which it summons energy shots. In Digimon New Century, after it uses the energy shots to defeat an enemy, it summons a legendary monster from another dimension to take its place who then joins Alphamon as an ally in battle.

attacks.name: Kyūkyokusenjin Ouryūken (究極戦刃王竜剣, Kyūkyokusenjin Ouryūken lit. "Ultimate-Battle-Blade-Ouryu-Sword")
attacks.description: Swings the Ouryuken.

attacks.name: Blade of the Dragon King (王竜剣, Ouryūken, lit. "Ouryu-Sword")
attacks.description: Swings the Ouryuken.

title: Aloof Hermit
(孤高の隠士
Kokou no Inshi?)
Empty Seat
(空白の席
Kūhaku no Seki?)

Alphamon Ouryuken.name: Alphamon Ouryuken
Alphamon Ouryuken.description: Alphamon Ouryuken is a Holy Knight Digimon and a carrier of the X-Antibody. It is a form in which Ouryumon achieved a miraculous digivolution and became the Ouryuken (王竜剣, Ouryuken lit. "Ouryu Sword") sword through the operation of the magic circle of DigiCode that Alphamon unleashed. Ouryumon is the Mega of the experimental "Prototype Digimon" that pursued further fighting strength, and by becoming a sword, all of that fighting strength was devoted exclusively to its attacks. To swing the Ouryuken is to wield all of the power contained within a Mega Digimon, so to speak, so it isn't a sword that can be swung by an average Digimon, and there aren't any average Digimon that can take the blow.

attacks.name: Kyukyoku Senjin Ouryuken (究極戦刃王竜剣, Kyūkyokusenjin Ouryūken, lit. "Ultimate-Battle-Blade-Ouryu-Sword")
attacks.description: Swings the Ouryuken.

attacks.name: Digitalize of Soul
attacks.description: Spreads the wings on its back and flies up high, then deploys a magic circle even larger than the sky, with which it summons a legendary monster from another dimension. In Digital Monster X-Evolution, it summons a small magic circle before itself, with which it summons energy shots.

attacks.name: Divine Sword Grade Alpha (聖剣グレイダルファー, Seiken Gradalpha) Draws out a convergence of light that was pierced into the center of a magic circle, and stabs it through the opponent.

Amon.name: Amon
Amon.description: Amon appears as a mass of red energy in the shape of a dragon.
title: Amon of the Crimson Flame
(紅炎のアモン
Kouen no Amon?)

Amphimon.name: Amphimon
Amphimon.description: Amphimon is an Android Digimon. It is a Cyborg that travels throughout the vast Net Ocean, connecting aquatic Digimon with one another. Amphimon is able to dive into the depths of the sea thanks to the pressurized body suit that covers its entire body. It is even able to enter the Abyss Sanctuary in the deepest part of the sea. Like Angel or Deity Digimon, Amphimon is permitted to judge evil and carry out judgment in the Net Ocean. When a battle breaks out, Amphimon's typically upbeat demeanor can shift as quickly as the tumultuous sea, and it strikes down evildoers with a single blow.

attacks.name: Frozen Crystal (Crystal Freezer)
attacks.description: Fires off frigid energy from its fist to freeze its target.

attacks.name: Aqua Blade (Aqua Zanba)
attacks.description: Swings its hand horizontally to send off a cutter made of highly-pressurized water.

attacks.name: Thunder Break (Raiburn Break)
attacks.description: Delivers an electric kick, literally.

attacks.name: Umbrella Defender (Umbre Defender)
attacks.description: Sets up an electromagnetic shield created by jellyfish units to protect itself and its allies.

AncientBeetlemon.name: AncientBeetlemon
AncientBeetlemon.description: AncientBeetlemon is an Ancient Insectoid Digimon. Possessing the attribute of "Thunder", it is one of the Ten Legendary Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. A Mega who existed only in the distant past, its appearance is fused from many insects such as the Rhinoceros beetle and Stag beetle. Its shell has a hardness rivaling that of Chrome Digizoid, so the falx on both of its arms can cut through anything, and it can easily lift up objects hundreds of times its own weight. Its abilities were later passed on to the "Insect Digimon".

attacks.name: Calamity Thunder
attacks.description: Attacks with a calamitous thunder which brings about super-disasters.

attacks.name: Tera Blaster
attacks.description: Attacks with a super-electrical discharge with a thousand times the power of "Mega Electro Shocker".

title: Legendary Warrior of Thunder
(伝説の雷の闘士
Densetsu no Ikazuchi no Tōshi?)

AncientGarurumon.name: AncientGarurumon
AncientGarurumon.description: AncientGarurumon is an Ancient Beast Digimon. Possessing the attribute of "Light", it is one of the Ten Legendary Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. A Mega who existed only in the distant past, it is called the "Supreme Shining Beast". Its abilities were later passed on to the "Beast Digimon". It is said that in the previous crusade, it survived to the end alongside AncientGreymon and sealed away Lucemon.

attacks.name: Sharp Claymore (Sharpness Claymore)
attacks.description: Brandishes its two greatswords with a dazzling radiance and cuts the opponent to pieces.

attacks.name: Absolute Zero
attacks.description: Completely halts the movement of electrons with super-cold air at absolute zero and a super-ray of light.

title: Legendary Warrior of Light
(伝説の光の闘士
Densetsu no Hikari no Tōshi?)
Supreme Shining Beast
(光り輝く至高の獣
Hikarikagayaku Shikō no Kemono?)

AncientGreymon.name: AncientGreymon
AncientGreymon.description: AncientGreymon is an Ancient Dragon Digimon. Possessing the attribute of "Flame", it is one of the Ten Legendary Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. A Mega who existed only in the distant past, it is told that its strength surpasses that of current Megas, and it is certainly a "Mega" being. Its abilities were later passed on to the "Dragon Digimon", such as the Greymon-species. It is said that in the previous crusade, it survived to the end alongside AncientGarurumon, and sealed away Lucemon.

attacks.name: Gaia Tornado
attacks.description: Gathers the spirit of the land and creates a tornado to swallow up the opponent and blow them away.

attacks.name: Omega Burst
attacks.description: Induces a super-detonation over the surrounding kilometers alongside an intense flash.

title: Legendary Warrior of Fire
(伝説の火の闘士
Densetsu no Hi no Tōshi?)
Ancient Dragon of Flame
(火焔の古代竜
Kaen no Kodai Ryū?)

AncientKazemon.name: AncientKazemon
AncientKazemon.description: AncientKazemon is an Ancient Bird Man Digimon. Possessing the attribute of "Wind", it is one of the Ten Legendary Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. A Mega who existed only in the distant past, it has golden wings and a beautiful rainbow-colored figure. With its golden wings, it soars around the vast skies, and it is said that, by erecting rainbow bridges, it can move freely even through the earth and sea. Its beauty and abilities were later passed on to the "Bird Man" and "Fairy Digimon".

attacks.name: Storm Gazer
attacks.description: Continuously generates a colossal storm.

attacks.name: Rainbow Symphony
attacks.description: Uses its rapier to play a symphony of super-fused lasers that shine with the colors of the rainbow.

title: Legendary Warrior of Wind
(伝説の風の闘士
Densetsu no Kaze no Tōshi?)

AncientMegatheriummon.name: AncientMegatheriummon
AncientMegatheriummon.description: AncientMegatheriummon is an Ancient Beast Digimon. Possessing the attribute of "Ice", it is one of the Ten Legendary Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. A Mega who existed only in the distant past, it is said that the power and bravery it possesses can adapt even to the intense cold of the freezing tundra. Its abilities were later passed on to the "Mammal" and "Ice-Snow Digimon".

attacks.name: Freezing Blizzard
attacks.description: Generates a super-blizzard at absolute zero which suspends the atomic movement of every object.

attacks.name: Great Snowplow
attacks.description: Performs a super-charge which easily destroys even the eternally-frozen gigantic icebergs.

title: Legendary Warrior of Ice
(伝説の氷の闘士
Densetsu no Kōri no Tōshi?)

AncientMermaidmon.name: AncientMermaidmon
AncientMermaidmon.description: AncientMermaidmon is an Ancient Aquatic Beast Man Digimon. Possessing the attribute of "Water", it is one of the Ten Legendary Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. A Mega who existed only in the distant past, it is the guardian goddess of the birthplace of Digimon, the "Net Ocean", ruling the whole of it and able to handle all water, such as the ocean currents and tidal waves, as if they were its own limbs. It is said that countless continents and islands have been erased when AncientMermaidmon felt angry. Its abilities were later passed on to the "Aquatic Digimon".

attacks.name: Great Maelstrom
attacks.description: Generates a gigantic maelstrom which swallows everything in the water.

attacks.name: Crystal Billow
attacks.description: Crystallizes water into super-hard substances, then fires them off like a machine gun.

title: Legendary Warrior of Water
(伝説の水の闘士
Densetsu no Mizu no Tōshi?)
Demon Beast of the Seabed
(海底の悪魔獣
Kaitei no Akuma-jū?)

AncientSphinxmon.name: AncientSphinxmon
AncientSphinxmon.description: AncientSphinxmon is an Ancient Mythical Beast Digimon. Possessing the attribute of "Darkness", it is one of the Ten Legendary Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. A Mega who existed only in the distant past, it is set at the opposite extreme to AncientGarurumon as a being born from darkness. It rules over the destruction and annihilation of all existing or living things, and is feared as the "Deadly Dark Beast". Its abilities were later passed on to the "Mythical Animal" and "Demon Beast Digimon".

attacks.name: Dark Blast
attacks.description: Fires a laser beam alongside a roar.

attacks.name: Necro Eclipse
attacks.description: Attacks with the ultimate annihilation technique which completely envelops the opponent in the darkness of death.

title: Legendary Warrior of Darkness
(伝説の闇の闘士
Densetsu no Yami no Tōshi?)
Deadly Dark Beast
(死を招く闇の獣
Shi o Maneku Yami no Kemono?)

AncientTroiamon.name: AncientTroiamon
AncientTroiamon.description: AncientTroiamon is an Ancient Vegetation Digimon. Possessing the attribute of "Wood", it is one of the Ten Legendary Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. A Mega who existed only in the distant past, it boasts of the greatest size among the Ancient Digimon. Various mechanisms are set within its body and it displays tricky attacks and movements. Its abilities were later passed on to the "Plant Digimon".

attacks.name: Epeius Gimmick
attacks.description: Simultaneously operates every gimmick throughout its body.

attacks.name: Surprise Cannon
attacks.description: Shoots super-massive shells from the huge cannons in its mouth and chest.

title: Legendary Warrior of Wood
(伝説の木の闘士
Densetsu no Ki no Tōshi?)

AncientVolcanomon.name: AncientVolcanomon
AncientVolcanomon.description: AncientVolcanomon is an Ancient Ore Digimon. Possessing the attribute of "Earth", it is one of the Ten Legendary Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. A Mega who existed only in the distant past, it has the most power among the Ancient Digimon. There is always high temperature magma welling up inside its body, which becomes the source of its mighty power. Its abilities were later passed on to the "Ore" and "Mineral" types of Rock-species Digimon.

attacks.name: Lava-lanche (Atomic Bomber)
attacks.description: Detonates the volcano on its back, which propels it into a super-strong lariat.

attacks.name: Lava-lanche (Supernova)
attacks.description: Generates antimatter within its body, which causes a super-detonation comparable to a tiny Big Bang.

attacks.name: Big Bang Boom (Big Bang Fire)
attacks.description: Fires a stream of magma from its back.

title: Legendary Warrior of Earth
(伝説の土の闘士
Densetsu no Tsuchi no Tōshi?)

AncientWisemon.name: AncientWisemon
AncientWisemon.description: AncientWisemon is an Ancient Mutant Digimon. Possessing the attribute of "Steel", it is one of the Ten Legendary Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. A Mega who existed only in the distant past, it is the wisest person in the Digital World. Due to the Akashic Records which record all of the excellent intellects of ancient times, it is said that there is nothing which AncientWisemon doesn't know. It is a sage that possesses the knowledge of the distant past, but can also forecast the distant future. Also, it is said that AncientWisemon's mirror body is connected to the spirit world. Its abilities were later passed on to the "Mutant Digimon".

attacks.name: Laplace's Demon (ラプラスの魔, Laplace no Ma)
attacks.description: Calculates the coordinates to the spirit world with ultimate wisdom, and imprisons the opponent there for an eternity.

attacks.name: Elder Sign
attacks.description: Summons the ultimate evil god from the spirit world.

title: Legendary Warrior of Steel
(伝説の鋼の闘士
Densetsu no Hagane no Tōshi?)

Andromon.name: Andromon
Andromon.description: Andromon is an Android Digimon. It possesses a fighting strength which can fell a Digimon below Ultimate in a single blow. It was developed as a prototype for Cyborg Digimon, and the mechanically-based Andromon was manufactured at the same time as the organically-based cyborg Boltmon. Its technology was also appropriated for MetalGreymon and Megadramon. As a prototype Digimon, it possesses neither will nor emotion, so it is faithful to its programmed behavior. It was upgraded with a program based on the data acquired from the Andromon of File Island, and the strength of that program varies.

attacks.name: Lightning Blade (Spiral Sword)
attacks.description: Fires a blade of energy from its arm module.

attacks.name: Gatling Attack (Gatling Missile)
attacks.description: Fires two smart homing missiles from its chest, chasing enemies, which also contain machine guns.

attacks.name: Gatling Missile Rensha Mode (ガトリングミサイル連射モード, Gatling Missile Rensha Mode lit. "Gatling Missile Rapid-fire Mode")
attacks.description: A rapid-fire version of "Gatling Missile".

Angemon.name: Angemon
Angemon.description: Angemon is an Angel Digimon. It has six shining wings, and its body is clad in cloth so pure white as to be divine. It is a being of perfected virtue, and although it is called a Digimon that brings happiness, when confronting evil, it does not stop attacking, with extreme composure, until the opponent is completely annihilated. On the countless times when the Digital World is visited by a crisis, it is told that it descends to lead Digimon of the same genus, and Devimon, who was won over to the Dark Side, was originally of the same species.

attacks.name: Hand of Fate (Heaven's Knuckle)
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent with its fist shining gold. It may also fire a beam of energy from its fist.

attacks.name: Angel Rod (Holy Rod)
attacks.description: Attacks with its "Angel Rod".

attacks.name: Omni Typhoon (God Typhoon)
attacks.description: Creates a divine tornado.

attacks.name: Angel Slam
attacks.description: Uses its Holy Rod to pick up an enemy and slam them into the ground.

attacks.name: Staff Sweep
attacks.description: Trips the opponent with its Holy Rod.

attacks.name: Air Slam (Halo Attack)
attacks.description: Spins through the air swinging its Holy Rod.

attacks.name: Glide
attacks.description: Flaps its wings in the air to slow its descent.

attacks.name: Holy Shot
attacks.description: Shoots a burst of holy energy.

Angewomon.name: Angewomon

otherNames.name: 天女獸/天女兽 Tiānnǚ shòu, Angewomon

Angewomon.description: Angewomon is an Angel Digimon. It has the appearance of a beautiful woman. Although it was previously classified as an Angel-type, it was confirmed as an Archangel-type because of the greatness of its abilities. As their trait, Champion angels have six wings, and Ultimate angels have eight wings. Although its personality is extremely gentle, it cannot forgive those who are crooked or evil, and it won't stay its hand from attacking until the opponent converts. Because of its soul and power, it is said to be a being like a goddess of the Digital World.

attacks.name: Celestial Arrow (Holy Arrow)
attacks.description: Shoots a holy arrow made of thunder whose powerful lightning-strike is also known as "Heaven's Punishment".

attacks.name: Heaven's Charm
attacks.description: Crushes the opponent with a deadly cross of holy light which is packed with beauty and affection, and demonstrates its strongest efficacy against the evil powers of Digimon. In Digimon World Data Squad, it whispers like an angel and lures the enemy to sleep.

attacks.name: Heaven's Charm (Saint Air)
attacks.description: Wraps its allies in holy light, recovering them from abnormal conditions and restoring some of their stamina. In Digimon World Data Squad, it creates a holy tornado.

attacks.name: Holy Slap
attacks.description: Attacks with a holy slap filled with love.

attacks.name: Lift Your Spirits (Holy Kick)
attacks.description: Kicks the enemy whilst doing a cartwheel.

attacks.name: Divine Kick (Holy Attack)
attacks.description: Jumps into the air and then dives diagonally downwards foot-first.

attacks.name: Angel Dash (Holy Dash)
attacks.description: A sliding kick along the ground.

attacks.name: Flying Kick
attacks.description: A midair kick

attacks.name: Super Jump
attacks.description: Uses holy power to shoot upwards into the air.

attacks.name: Angel Wings (Angel Wing)
attacks.description: Flaps its wings to gain altitude then dive-bombs the enemy and attacks with a cartwheel.

attacks.name: Heel of Justice (Holy Charge Kick)
attacks.description: Charges up, flips, and then flies forward foot-first.

attacks.name: Heaven's Charm (Holy Charm)
attacks.description: Destroys the enemy by radiating six rings of pink light in a cross-like pattern.

attacks.name: Sledge Dash
attacks.description: Rams into foe at full speed.

Angewomon X.name: Angewomon X
debut: Digimon Chronicle X, "Courage from Another World" [18]
Angewomon X.description: Angewomon X is an Archangel Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its sacred power is amplified, and Angewomon can release pure spirit by touching fire, earth, wind, and water. As a result, fire has the effect of driving away evil, the earth quickly sprouts and blooms, water is purified, and wind makes any Digimon it touches gentle.

attacks.name: Celestial Arrow (Holy Arrow)
attacks.description: Shoots a holy arrow made of thunder whose powerful lightning-strike is also known as "Heaven's Punishment".

attacks.name: Heaven's Charm
attacks.description: Crushes the opponent with a deadly cross of holy light which is packed with beauty and affection, and demonstrates its strongest efficacy against the evil powers of Digimon.

attacks.name: Grand Celestial Arrow (Grand Holy Arrow)
attacks.description: Transfers power from surrounding elements and releases it as an arrow of lightning.

Angoramon.name: Angoramon
Angoramon.description: Angoramon is a Beast Digimon. It is a Digimon characterized by its long ears and the fur that covers its whole body. It hates fighting and has a calm personality, and avoids battle by detecting enemies approaching from a distance with its long ears. Also, its long ears spin, allowing it to fly slowly. It has a great appetite to maintain its large physique, and loses its super-hearing that detects the enemy only when its stomach rumbles. It is a Rookie Digimon whose whole body is covered in yellow fur. It is very large and tall.

attacks.name: Double Lariat
attacks.description: Mows down enemies in its surroundings by spinning both of its large arms.

attacks.name: Tiny Tornado (Petit Tornado)
attacks.description: A small tornado generated by the propeller rotation of both its ears.

attacks.name: Hop Dunk (ピョンダンプ, Pyon Dump, lit. "Hop Dump")
attacks.description: Jumps high into the sky and then crushes the enemy with its large build.

Ankylomon.name: Ankylomon
Ankylomon.description: Ankylomon is a Dinosaur Digimon. Not only is its whole body covered in hardened skin, but it also has hard protuberances coming out all over. Therefore, its charge attack has extraordinary destructive power. As a fundamental result of being a herbivorous Digimon, it is not ferocious, but it is decidedly not timid, and possesses a brave personality.

attacks.name: Megaton Press
attacks.description: Leaps high into the sky despite its appearance, then crushes the opponent under its large build.

attacks.name: Tail Hammer
attacks.description: Violently beats the opponent with the iron sphere on the tip of its tail, completely shattering the opponent's wire frame.

Antylamon (Good).name: Antylamon (Good)
Antylamon (Good).description: Antylamon (Good)is a Holy Beast Digimon. It is the "Rabbit"Deva, and serves theDigimon SovereignAzulongmon. As a follower of Azulongmon, it is the owner of a gentle spirit. It likes small things, and because it attends to them with profound tenderness, if anything appears that tries to tread on them then its personality is completely reversed, and it attacks with the "Bunny Blades" (宝斧Bǎo Fǔ,lit. "Treasure Axes"), transforming its hands into razor-sharp axes. Once a cut is made, it won't stop spreading until the enemy's form is no more.

attacks.name: Bunny Blades (Asipatravana)
attacks.description: Spins on its own axis like a tornado, cutting anything surrounding it with the Bunny Blades.

attacks.name: Bunny Blades (宝斧 Bǎo Fǔ, lit. "Treasure Axe")
attacks.description: Summons and attacks with the Bunny Blades.

attacks.name: Arm Bomber (Mantra Chant)
attacks.description: Hardens its body tissue to the level of Chrome Digizoid by liberating all of the energy within its body, then unleashes a mighty blow.

attacks.name: Meditation Cure
attacks.description: Recovers from any kind of damage in an instant.

attacks.name: Asipatravana (데이터 흡수 Deiteo Heupsu, lit. "Data Absorption")

Antylamon (Evil).name: Antylamon (Evil)
Antylamon (Evil).description: Antylamon (Evil)is an Animal Digimon. It is the "Rabbit"Deva. It is able to freely manipulate the "qi" flowing within its body, allowing it to interact with softness as well as hardness, so that at times, it moves flexibly as if it were flowing, and at other times, it unleashes heavy blows like iron.

attacks.name: Meditation Cure
attacks.description: Recovers from any kind of damage in an instant.

attacks.name: Arm Bomber (Mantra Chant)
attacks.description: Hardens its body tissue to the level of Chrome Digizoid by liberating all of the energy within its body, then unleashes a mighty blow.

attacks.name: Asipatravana
attacks.description: Spins on its axis like a tornado, cutting anything surrounding it with the Treasure Axes.

attacks.name: Treasure Axe (宝斧 Bǎo Fǔ)
attacks.description: Summons and attacks with the Treasure Axes.

Anubismon.name: Anubismon
Anubismon.description: Anubismon is a Wizard Digimon. It guards and supervises the Dark Area, constantly surveying that place to which Digimon that were deleted when their life span finished, or when they were defeated in battle, are ultimately transmitted (and are transmitted there despite Fallen Angel Digimon and their like inhabiting it). If the data of these Digimon is evil, it imprisons them within eternal darkness, but if their data is good, it has the ability to reset them back to a Digi-Egg. It has power as mighty as to decide the rebirth of a Digimon, and furthermore, it has the role of the Digital World's judge.

attacks.name: Pyramid Power
attacks.description: Draws a square pyramid with beams of light as depicted in Egypt's secret formulas, then imprisons the opponent within it.

attacks.name: Amemit (Ammit)
attacks.description: Summons a demonic beast from the Dark Area which devours the DigiCores of evil Digimon.

Apemon.name: Apemon
Apemon.description: Apemon is an Animal Digimon. Apemon is covered in golden-colored body fur. Although there have been many sightings of it reported in the Central Asian area of the Network, evidence proving its existence has not been found as of yet. It is extremely rare, and is said to be treated as a phantom Digimon by a group of people due to its exceptional skill in repelling malicious computer viruses and similar entities. There have also been rumors of it circling the Network at high speed while riding atop something resembling a cloud or puff of smoke.

attacks.name: Mega Bone Stick (如意ボーン, Nyoi Bone, lit. "Rúyì Bone")
Angry Spike (怒髪天, Dohatsuten, lit. "Furious")
attacks.description: Hardens its metallic body fur and shoot them out.

attacks.name: Magical Monkey Punch (魔猿猛爆拳, Maen Moubakuken, lit. "Demonic Monkey Intense-bombarding Fist")
Bone Strike
attacks.description: Attacks with a hard bone club.

Apocalymon.name: Apocalymon
Apocalymon.description: Apocalymonis an Unidentified Digimon. It is a Digimon who appeared when negative thoughts were drawn together by darkness. So little is known about Apocalymon that it may not even be a Digimon. Some claim it appeared to purge the chaos of cyberspace, and reduce it back to nothing; others claim its arrival was spoken of in ancient texts.

attacks.name: Darkness Zone (暗黒, Ankoku, lit. "Darkness")
attacks.description: Calls forth an infinite darkness. Anyone or anything caught in its wake is said to be consumed by the void and eventually reduced to nothing.

attacks.name: Reverse Digivolve (Death Evolution)
attacks.description: Captures the opponent in its claws and forces them to degenerate.

attacks.name: Total Annihilation (Gran Death Big Bang)
attacks.description: Detonates its own body with enough force to wipe out an entire dimension.

attacks.name: Shokushu Kougeki (触手攻撃, Shokushu Kougeki lit. "Tentacle Attack")
attacks.description: Does a physical attack with its tentacle claws.

attacks.name: Death Claw
attacks.description: Attacks using its claws.

attacks.name:
Copied Attacks
River of Power (Ultimate Stream): Transforms a claw into MetalSeadramon's head, which fires its River of Power. This technique symbolizes Apocalymon's "Friendship".
Crimson Lightning (Bloody Stream): Transforms a claw into Myotismon's upper body, which attacks with its Crimson Lightning. This technique symbolizes Apocalymon's "Love".
Giga Cannon (∞ Cannon): Transforms a claw into Machinedramon's upper body, which attacks with its Giga Cannon. This technique symbolizes Apocalymon's "Justice".
Death Claw: Transforms a claw into Devimon's arms, which attack with its The Touch of Evil.
Virus Grenades (Plug Bomb)
attacks.description: Fires Datamon's Virus Grenades from every opening.

attacks.name: River of Power (Ultimate Stream)
attacks.description: Transforms a claw into MetalSeadramon's head, which fires its River of Power. This technique symbolizes Apocalymon's "Friendship".

attacks.name: Crimson Lightning (Bloody Stream)
attacks.description: Transforms a claw into Myotismon's upper body, which attacks with its Crimson Lightning. This technique symbolizes Apocalymon's "Love".

attacks.name: Giga Cannon (∞ Cannon)
attacks.description: Transforms a claw into Machinedramon's upper body, which attacks with its Giga Cannon. This technique symbolizes Apocalymon's "Justice".

attacks.name: Death Claw
attacks.description: Transforms a claw into Devimon's arms, which attack with its The Touch of Evil.

attacks.name: Virus Grenades (Plug Bomb)
attacks.description: Fires Datamon's Virus Grenades from every opening.

Apokarimon (Creepy Mode).name: Apokarimon (Creepy Mode)
Apokarimon (Creepy Mode).description: Apokarimon (Creepy Mode) is an Unidentified Digimon. It is the humanoid portion of Apocalymon, emerged from the polyhedron.

attacks.name: Big Bang
attacks.description: Detonates its own body with enough force to wipe out an entire dimension.

attacks.name: Darkness Zone
attacks.description: Deletes its opponents.

Apollomon.name: Apollomon
Apollomon.description: Apollomonis a Deity Digimon. It is one of the "Olympos XII", and conceals a solar-class flame energy. This energy has the terrifying power tosmeltall substances, and its almost heartless fervor and pride are barely restrained.

attacks.name: Sun Ball Blast (Solblaster)
attacks.description: Fires a scorching solar orb generated from the sphere of flames on its back.

attacks.name: Sunfire Punch (Phoebus Blow)
attacks.description: Attacks with a one-hit knockout fist filled with its hidden power.

attacks.name: Sun Punch Arrow (Arrow of Apollo)
attacks.description: Continuously fires red hot arrows from the shining jewels on its hands.

attacks.name: Iron Spikes
attacks.description: Drops the iron spikes of divine judgment to bind its targets.

title: Sun God
(太陽神
Taiyō Shin?)

Apollomon Darkness Mode.name: Apollomon Darkness Mode
Apollomon Darkness Mode.description: Apollomon Darkness Mode is identical in form toApollomon Whispered, save that it now wields a gigantic, dual-edged axe formed fromAxemon's body. It is also has Axemon's spike blades coming out of its shoulder pads and Axemon's visor on its forehead.

Apollomon Whispered.name: Apollomon Whispered
Apollomon Whispered.description: Apollomon Whispered is the form invoked by the evil Whispered that Bagramon inserted into Apollomon.

attacks.name: Whispering Arrow (Arrow of Whispered)
attacks.description: Continuously fires dark arrows from the shining jewels on its hands.

attacks.name: Rising Sun of All Sorrows (嘆きの太陽, Nageki no Taiyou, lit. "Sun of Lamentation")
attacks.description: Gathers solar energy into an ever-expanding black sun that incinerates all that it touches.

Aquilamon.name: Aquilamon
Aquilamon.description: Aquilamon is a Giant Bird Digimon. It has two gigantic horns growing from its head. It is called the "Great Eagle of the Desert", and as it flies through the sky at Mach speed, it possesses the eye strength to locate the opponent from a very great distance. The horns on its head, when it glides from a great height and charges the opponent, exhibit an immense might. Although there are many Bird-species Digimon with brutal personalities, Aquilamon respects decorum, and unconditionally abides by the orders given by the master it has pledged allegiance to.

attacks.name: Grand Horn (Glide Horn)
attacks.description: Charges the opponent from the sky.

attacks.name: Blast Rings (Blast Laser)
attacks.description: Fires off ring-shaped beams with a roar similar to thunder.

attacks.name: Blast Shot
attacks.description: Sends ballistic waves and attacks.

attacks.name: Wind Breath
attacks.description: Blows a breath of wind.

attacks.name: Web Laser
attacks.description: Emits a strange sound wave to confuse the enemy.

title: Great Eagle of the Desert
(砂漠の巨鷲
Sabaku no Ōwashi?)

Arbormon.name: Arbormon
Arbormon.description: Arbormon is a Cyborg Digimon. It possesses power over Wood which bears the might of AncientTroiamon. The blueprints of a medieval, wooden karakuri puppet converted into its data, so its gimmicks are surprisingly archaic. You can't tell what it's thinking due to its lack of facial expression and being taciturn, and it is usually treated literally like a puppet by its comrades, but once a battle begins, it makes sport of the enemy with its keen and tricky movements. It is able to shoot strong ivy from the tubes on its back and manipulate the opponent like a marionette. Although its skin is made to be fireproof, its internal parts and joints are vulnerable to fire.

attacks.name: Roundhouse Punt (Machine Gun Dance)
attacks.description: Punches and kicks opponents from long distances with arms and legs connected by long cables.

attacks.name: Blockade Seed
attacks.description: Fires a seed-like bomb from its mouth that can bind the opponent's entire body with ivy.

Arcadiamon (In-Training).name: Arcadiamon (In-Training)
Arcadiamon (In-Training).description: Arcadiamon (In-Training)is a Digimon. It is a Digimon artificially created from the data of various Digimon. One result of an experiment to make the ultimate Digimon, it boasts amazing physical abilities despite being In-Training level. Arcadiamon demonstrates predatory behaviour. By directly absorbing the data of others, Arcadiamon achieves growth at an astounding rate.

attacks.name: Data Drain (データドレイン, Dēta Dorein)
attacks.description: Stabs opponents with its sharp feet to absorb their data.

Arcadiamon (Rookie).name: Arcadiamon (Rookie)
Arcadiamon (Rookie).description: Arcadiamon (Rookie)is a Mysterious Beast Digimon. It is a cursed Digimon artificially created based on the data of various Digimon. Its nature is to digivolve by absorbing its opponent's data, but it's not clear if it possesses any sense of self. Because these details are unknown, it is currently being investigated.

attacks.name: Soul Absorption
attacks.description: Disassembles and absorbs the opponent's data.

attacks.name: Erase Sickle
attacks.description: Erases the opponent's configuration data.

Arcadiamon (Champion).name: Arcadiamon (Champion)
Arcadiamon (Champion).description: Arcadiamon (Champion)is a Bewitching Beast Digimon. A cursed Digimon artificially created from the data of various Digimon. It evolved by absorbing its opponents' data, but it lacks any sense of self. Details about it are unknown, so it is currently under investigation.

attacks.name: Prison Fist
attacks.description: Destroys an opponent's data at the program level

attacks.name: Snatch Whip
attacks.description: Strips an opponent's configuration data, converting it into their own.

Arcadiamon (Ultimate).name: Arcadiamon (Ultimate)
Arcadiamon (Ultimate).description: Arcadiamon (Ultimate)is a Bewitching Beast Digimon. A cursed Digimon artificially created from the data of various Digimon. It evolves by absorbing its opponents' data, but it lacks any sense of self. Details about it are unknown, so it is currently under investigation.

attacks.name: Dot Matrix
attacks.description: Converts foe into 0's and 1's which are then absorbed.

attacks.name: Freeze Tentacle
attacks.description: Freezes its opponents' data with its tentacle-shaped appendages, halting any biological activity.

Arcadiamon (Mega).name: Arcadiamon (Mega)
Arcadiamon (Mega).description: Arcadiamon (Mega)is a Bewitching Beast Digimon. It is a cursed Digimon artificially created based on the data of various Digimon. Its nature is to evolve by absorbing its opponent's data, but it is unclear if it possesses any sense of self. Because these details are unknown, it is currently being investigated, but it's thought that Arcadiamon's existence is the greatest threat to theDigital World, and must never be.

attacks.name: Dot Matrix
attacks.description: An invisible attack that uses a lot of energy, but takes a chunk of the opponent's data restoring itself while doing damage.

attacks.name: Exile Spear
attacks.description: Its arm is transformed into a spear which is used to impale an opponent.

Arcadiamon (Ultra).name: Arcadiamon (Ultra)
Arcadiamon (Ultra).description: Arcadiamon (Ultra)is a Bewitching Beast Digimon. The form taken whenArcadiamon (Mega)evolved even further when it absorbed energy generated from battles. Capable of rocking the ecosystem of the Digital World, its sheer power makes it known as exceeding Mega.

attacks.name: God Matrix
attacks.description: An unblockable attack that instantly dismantles anything and everything into ones and zeroes with invisible waves.

attacks.name: Dystopia Lances
attacks.description: Absorbs data from Digimon and attack energy with just a touch of its countless feelers.

Archelomon.name: Archelomon
Archelomon.description: Archelomon is a Reptile Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Reliability". It has the appearance of a large sea turtle, and both of its flippers have become sharp like knives. It doesn't move around particularly quickly even underwater, and has a carefree personality, but because it has sharp fore-flippers and a sturdy shell, it's rarely assaulted by the enemy.

attacks.name: Ocean Streamer (Ocean Strom)
attacks.description: Conjures up a ferocious storm by crying out to the clouds.

attacks.name: Fin Cutters (Fin Cutter)
attacks.description: Attacks with his blade-like flippers.

Arcturusmon.name: Arcturusmon
Arcturusmon.description: Arcturusmon is a Dragon Man Digimon. A mysterious Digimon that supposedly digivolves via evil, dark energy concentrated to extreme levels. During research into Digimon that can secret the so called GRB Contagion, simulations of injecting enormous amounts of the contagion into such Digimon resulted in this "theoretically" possible Digivolution. The simulation was repeated hundreds of times. As each test confirmed that the Digivolution would result in this DIgimon, researches theorize that, under suitable conditions, Arcturusmon could actually manifest in the Digital World. While its mannerisms and behavior are unknown, the amount of dark energy measured in the simulations far surpasses that of all identified Digimon, which indicates that the emergence of Arcturusmon could hypothetically results in a Digital Hazard that would reshape the face of the Digital World.

attacks.name: Black Death
attacks.description: Stabs the target with an arm drill and injects the corrosive GRB contagion.

attacks.name: Dark Confession (Black Confession)
attacks.description: Coats both of its drills with large amounts of GRB contagion, rapidly spins them to condense the secretions to inordinate concentrations, and then launches it forth as a ranged attack.

Argomon (Fresh).name: Argomon (Fresh)
Argomon (Fresh).description: Argomon (Fresh) is a Mutant Digimon. It is a Fresh Digimon born from a bug in an algorithm/computational program. It has a habit of finding and converging at places where high-capacity data leaks out. They gather one by one, growing into a horde and blanketing it.

attacks.name: Acid Bubbles (さんのアワ, San no Awa)

Argomon (In-Training).name: Argomon (In-Training)
Argomon (In-Training).description: Argomon (In-Training) is a Mutant Digimon. It is the form that a newborn Argomon grows into. It is attached to places where large volumes of data flow and consumes that data through the mouth on its underside. It is a creepy one-eyed Digimon with a green body and tentacles that stretch out like arms. Since it's In-Training, it's still very weak, but it's up to some sort of evil and bringing a bad influence to the Real World...!

attacks.name: Acid Bubbles (酸のアワ, San no Awa) When an enemy draws near, it spits out its "Acid Bubbles" from its giant eye-like pattern.

Argomon (Rookie).name: Argomon (Rookie)
Argomon (Rookie).description: Argomon (Rookie)is a Mutant Digimon. It is the Rookie-digivolved form ofArgomon. It watches over young Argomon that are consuming data, and intercepts enemies when they draw near.

attacks.name: Brute Knuckles (Brute Knuckle)
attacks.description: Curls up the tentacles on its arms into balls and punches with them.

attacks.name: Imprisonment
attacks.description: Restrains the enemy with its loose tentacles.

Argomon (Champion).name: Argomon (Champion)
Argomon (Champion).description: Argomon (Champion) is a Mutant Digimon. It is the Champion-digivolved form of Argomon whose processing ability has increased abnormally. Its power has also strengthened, and it lifts up huge enemies with its arms, which have turned into industrial manipulators.

attacks.name: Entrap (Imprisonment)
attacks.description: Restrains the enemy with the tentacles that extend from its mouth.

attacks.name: Voltline (Bolt Line)
attacks.description: Causes an electric shock to run through the enemy.

Argomon (Ultimate).name: Argomon (Ultimate)
Argomon (Ultimate).description: Argomon (Ultimate)is a Mutant Digimon. It is a powerful dark Digimon that was generated from a bug in an algorithm. Due to its ability for high speed processing, it uses its countless ivy tendrils as tentacles, taking complete control of a vast field.The eyes on its head are always closed, and its arms can be transformed to become wings and tentacles for close combat.

attacks.name: Elimination Line
attacks.description: Fires an erasing beam from the eyes on its limbs

attacks.name: Entrap (Imprisonment)
attacks.description: Uses its tentacles to constrict the opponent's powers and completely restrict their movement.

attacks.name: Worm Phase
attacks.description: Transforms into a parasite after taking control of a vast field.

attacks.name: Hupunos Claw (Hypnos Claw)
attacks.description: Slashes with its cursed tentacles.

Argomon (Mega).name: Argomon (Mega)
Argomon (Mega).description: Argomon (Mega)is a Mutant Digimon. It is a gigantic Mega Digimon that digivolved from the UltimateArgomon, and also amplified its close-combat abilities.Its eyes, which were closed, are now open and its power is unleashed.

attacks.name: Distortion Line
attacks.description: Beams destructive enough to completely distort even dimensions, fired from the eyes on its limbs.

attacks.name: Brute Force
attacks.description: Mows down the enemy with its massive body. It is exceptionally destructive.

attacks.name: Terabyte Disaster
attacks.description: Countless beams fired from its mouth.

attacks.name: Mystic Cannon (Judecca Cannon)
attacks.description: Blows up the enemy with powerful cursed volleys.

ArkhaiAngemon.name: ArkhaiAngemon
ArkhaiAngemon.description: Official romanization given duringDigimon Con 2023and used in the franchise.

Armadillomon.name: Armadillomon
Armadillomon.description: Armadillomon is a Mammal Digimon. Its body is covered in a hard shell. It has a carefree, charming personality, but occasionally gets hurt if it gets carried away. Just like Veemon and the others, Armadillomon is a descendant of an ancient species, so it is able to perform special Armor Digivolutions.

attacks.name: Diamond Shell (Rolling Stone)
attacks.description: Curls up its body and rushes the opponent.

attacks.name: Beat Blaster (Scratch Beat)
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent with the elongated claws on its forelegs.

attacks.name: Beast Attack
attacks.description: Attacks with a swift blow of a powerful beast.

Armageddemon.name: Armageddemon
Armageddemon.description: Armageddemon is an Unidentified Digimon. It is an Ultra Digimon that was born when Kuramon fused in large quantities, causing a mutation. Diaboromon had the ability to make many copies of itself, but they were characterized by having lesser abilities than the original possessed. However, by producing Kuramon in large quantities and then fusing them, it did not disperse its abilities, but instead was able to attain power greater than Diaboromon by condensing them into one being. Also, as a Diaboromon-species Digimon, it is a special Digimon that is affiliated with neither light nor darkness.

attacks.name: Full Scale Attack (Black Rain)
attacks.description: Fires energy shells from its back into the sky, which fall like rain as scattered beams.

attacks.name: Destiny Destroyer (Ultimate Flare)
attacks.description: Emits a destructive energy wave from its gaping maw.

title: World Breaker
(ワールドブレイカー
Wārudo Bureikā?)

Armamon.name: Armamon
debut: Digimon Story: Super Xros Wars Blue and Red
Armamon.description: Armamon is a Digimon. It is a member of the Legend-Arms.

attacks.name: Sword Masquerade
attacks.description: Slashes all enemies with its sword, sometimes confusing them.

attacks.name: Rainbow Hand
attacks.description: Unleashes light from its hand that can put its opponent to sleep.

attacks.name: Malkut Crystal
attacks.description: Damages an opponent with crystals, draining their energy to heal itself.

Armed MadLeomon.name: Armed MadLeomon

otherNames.name: マッドレオモン アームド MadLeomon Armed Mode

Armed MadLeomon.description: Armed MadLeomon is an Undead Digimon. It is the "Weapon-frenzy Mode" (凶器乱舞形態, Kyoukiranbu Keitai) of MadLeomon, who gave itself a chainsaw as well as even more modifications. Due to its repeated modifications and unbalanced chainsaw, intense pain is always running through its body, enraging MadLeomon. Because it is unable to stay still, due to its pain, it sees anything reflected in its eyes as an enemy, and attacks.

attacks.name: The Lion Sleeps Tonight
attacks.description: Chops things up without caring whether they are alive or inanimate, while looking as if it is trying to completely shake off its arm and detach the chainsaw. The Lion "Sleeps" when its hunger is satisfied, that is, when it has preyed upon an opponent. In order for the Lion to sleep, it must also defeat that opponent.

attacks.name: Lion Heart
attacks.description: Runs wild and pierces the ground with its chainsaw, creating fissures which swallow the opponent. The appearance of the torn and broken ground, caused when Armed MadLeomon's destructive impulses come to the surface, is the very embodiment of its mind.

Arresterdramon.name: Arresterdramon
Arresterdramon.description: Arresterdramonis a Dragon Digimon. It is a form ofGumdramonthat digivolved by removing its "Kinkoji"(緊箍児,"Kinkoji"lit. "Tight-bound Child"). It uses a special rubber Battle Armor as its clothing, which manifests Gumdramon's characteristic litheness at its maximum and further strengthens its defensive side. Its wings have gotten larger, enabling high speed flight. By changing its tail into a Tail Anchor, it has become able to arrest the opponent in addition to tearing them apart.

attacks.name: Mach Flicker
attacks.description: Unleashes high speed punches while bending both of its arms.

attacks.name: Flog Shot
attacks.description: Wields its Tail Anchor to chop up the opponent.

attacks.name: Spin Caliper
attacks.description: Bisects the opponent with its super-sized Tail Anchor while performing a single revolution.

attacks.name: Spiral Shredder
attacks.description: Rotates at high speed to cut the opponent to pieces.

attacks.name: Prism (Prism Gallet)
attacks.description: Adds to "Spiral Shredder" by becoming countless revolutions of dragon-shaped lights to cleave the opponent apart.

attacks.name: Eraser Flog Shot
attacks.description: Wields its eraser-equipped Tail Anchor to erase the opponent.

Arresterdramon Superior Mode.name: Arresterdramon Superior Mode
debut: "A Golden Bug! The Mystery of MetallifeKuwagamon" [76]
Arresterdramon Superior Mode.description: Arresterdramon Superior Modeis a Dragon Digimon. It isArresterdramon's "Enhancement Mode"(の強化モード,No Kyōka Mōdo), which gained further power due to the "Kinkoji"(緊箍児,"Kinkoji"lit. "Tight-bound Child")that appeared when it wished to become stronger. In addition to its large wings, which have increased its flying ability, and the gigantic Tail Anchor, which has been honed to its sharpest, it is a form characterized by its right arm, thought to be that ofBagramon, which bestowed mighty destructive power upon Arresterdramon. Usually, the Kinkoji has the role of inhibiting its power, but it appears to have the opposite role of granting it power, and is said to be proof that Arresterdramon Superior Mode is recognized as a Digimon that uses its power for righteousness. With this drastically increased power, it fights against fiendish Digimon.

attacks.name: Blaze Spiker
attacks.description: A blazing shōtei-uch. If it swings through with all its might, it will completely break through any defense, no matter how sturdy.

attacks.name: Mach Flicker
attacks.description: Unleashes high speed punches while bending both of its arms.

attacks.name: Flog Shot
attacks.description: Wields its Tail Anchor to chop up the opponent.

attacks.name: Spin Caliber
attacks.description: Bisects the opponent with its super-sized Tail Anchor while performing a single revolution.

attacks.name: Spiral Shredder
attacks.description: Rotates at high speed to cut the opponent to pieces.

attacks.name: Prism Garrett (Prism Gallett)
attacks.description: Adds to "Spiral Shredder" by becoming countless revolutions of dragon-shaped lights to cleave the opponent apart.

Arresterdramon Superior Mode (Brave Snat.name: Arresterdramon Superior Mode (Brave Snatcher)
debut: "Burn up Tagiru! A Glorious Digimon Hunt!" [79]
Arresterdramon Superior Mode (Brave Snat.description: Arresterdramon Superior Mode (Brave Snatcher) is a Dragon Digimon. It is Arresterdramon's "Enhancement Mode" (の強化モード, No Kyōka Mōdo), which gained further power due to the "Kinkoji" (緊箍児, "Kinkoji" lit. "Tight-bound Child") that appeared when it wished to become stronger. In addition to its large wings, which have increased its flying ability, and the gigantic Tail Anchor, which has been honed to its sharpest, it is a form characterized by its right arm, thought to be that of Bagramon, which bestowed mighty destructive power upon Arresterdramon. Usually, the Kinkoji has the role of inhibiting its power, but it appears to have the opposite role of granting it power, and is said to be proof that Arresterdramon Superior Mode is recognized as a Digimon that uses its power for righteousness. With this drastically increased power, it fights against fiendish Digimon.

attacks.name: Blaze Spiker
attacks.description: A blazing shōtei-uch. If it swings through with all its might, it will completely break through any defense, no matter how sturdy.

attacks.name: Mach Flicker
attacks.description: Unleashes high speed punches while bending both of its arms.

attacks.name: Flog Shot
attacks.description: Wields its Tail Anchor to chop up the opponent.

attacks.name: Spin Caliber
attacks.description: Bisects the opponent with its super-sized Tail Anchor while performing a single revolution.

attacks.name: Spiral Shredder
attacks.description: Rotates at high speed to cut the opponent to pieces.

attacks.name: Prism Garrett (Prism Gallett)
attacks.description: Adds to "Spiral Shredder" by becoming countless revolutions of dragon-shaped lights to cleave the opponent apart.

Armormon.name: Armormon
Armormon.description: Armormon is an Android Digimon. It is a special maneuvers Digimon that enhances its combat ability with armored clothing. With its humanoid upper body and quadrupedal lower body, it is rumored to be a member of Centarumon's special forces, but no one has confirmed this. It is a Digimon armed with various heavy weapons.
