attacks.name: Justice Strike (Justice Massacre)
attacks.description: Strikes with the Gatling guns on both its arms and the machine guns on its stomach in the name of justice.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.description: Disappears from sight and attacks from behind.

Arukenimon.name: Arukenimon
Arukenimon.description: Arukenimon is a Dark Animal Digimon. It is a Digimon which has the appearance of the "Queen of Spiders" of Greek mythology. As the queen who presides over all Dokugumon, it is an extremely cunning Digimon with great intelligence. It is skilled at transforming into a human-like appearance and getting the opponent to let down their guard so that it can approach and completely devour them. Also, because of its extremely short temper and ferocious personality, many Digimon are afraid of it.

attacks.name: Spider Thread
attacks.description: Chops up the opponent with razor-sharp wires.

attacks.name: Predation Spider
attacks.description: Attacks the opponent with the countless carnivorous Dokugumon hidden in its abdomen.

attacks.name: Acid Mist
attacks.description: Sprays green acid from its mouth.

attacks.name: Spirit Needle
attacks.description: Plucks strands of its human form's hair and uses them to convert Control Spires into artificial Digimon. Using more strands of hair will create stronger Digimon; one for a Champion, ten for an Ultimate, and one hundred for a Mega.

Aruraumon.name: Aruraumon
Aruraumon.description: Aruraumon is a Plant Digimon. It is a subspecies of Palmon that accomplished a similar Digivolution. The flower on its head has a violet color. It seems that, at noon, it opens up its arms and the flower on its head to perform photosynthesis. It usually buries its root-like feet under the ground, and although it is absorbing nutrients, it is also able to walk. As for the flower on its head, when it is joyful or happy, it will waft about a sweet fragrance, but when it is angered or senses danger, it releases a foul stench that will drive off even large Digimon. The aroma emitted from the flower on its head is definitely inherited from Palmon, so as usual, it is intensely foul.

attacks.name: Nemesis Ivy
attacks.description: Twines the opponent in the claws extended from its hands, then disorients them.

attacks.name: Gloomy Dust (Gloom Dust)
attacks.description: Spreads a fog of poisonous dust.

attacks.name: Hungry Hand
attacks.description: Drains energy from foe.

attacks.name: Poison Ivy
attacks.description: Entangles the opponent in ivy laced with a powerful toxin, completely paralyzing them.

Astamon.name: Astamon
Astamon.description: Astamon is a Demon Man Digimon. Though it is an Ultimate Digimon, it possesses power surpassing that of a Mega, and is a Prince of the Dark Area which governs a legion of Demon Digimon. It shows cruelty to its enemies and kindness to its friends, and because of that charisma, it is expected to gain a considerable number of followers among Demon Digimon. Its prided machine gun, "Oro Salmón" (Esp: Gold Salmon), is the work of Vulcanusmon, who crafted Beelzemon's favorite guns, the "Berenjena" (Esp: Eggplant), and the bullets fired from it possess their own will, so they will definitely chase the opponent to the "end of hell".

attacks.name: Hellfire
attacks.description: Fires every last bullet from the Oro Salmón.

attacks.name: Maverick
attacks.description: Attacks with a kick which unleashes all of its pent-up dark Qi.

title: Prince of the Dark Area
(ダークエリアの貴公子
Dāku Eria no Kikōshi?)

Asuramon.name: Asuramon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Kiyoyuki Yanada(Frontier),Tessho Genda, Toshihiko Seki, Takumi Yamazaki(Ghost Game)
Asuramon.description: Asuramon is a Wizard Digimon. It is a legendary Digimon which possesses four arms and three faces. It suddenly appeared within a computer as it was analyzing ancient Hindu cultural documents. Of Asuramon's three faces, one is a face of wrath, one is a face of mercy, and the last is a face of blessings. Contrary to its outer appearance, it honors justice, so it is said that if it sees injustice it will thoroughly attack it without yielding, and it can certainly be said that its personality is like an avatar of a god of light.

attacks.name: Fire Fist of Shiva (阿修羅神拳, Asura Shinken, lit. "Asura God-fist")
attacks.description: Unleashes a Punch Rush from its four arms which possesses the offensive power to completely annihilate the opponent itself. Naturally, when that is used while Asuramon has its face of wrath, it is its last and strongest technique.

attacks.name: Multiple Faces (喜怒哀楽, Kidoairaku, lit. "Joy, Anger, Sorrow, and Humor")
Fire Fist of Shiva (阿修羅炎熱拳, Asura Ennetsuken, lit. "Asura Sweltering Fist")
attacks.description: Fires off the flames that were wrapped around the fists of its four arms.

attacks.name: Asura Bakunenken (阿修羅爆燃拳, Asura Bakunenken lit. "Asura Exploding Fist")
attacks.description: Simultaneously fires off the flames that were wrapped around the fists of its four outstretched arms.

Atamadekachimon.name: Atamadekachimon
Atamadekachimon.description: Atamadekachimon is a Dinosaur Digimon. Its head and body are unbalanced. It is always having difficulty walking due to its heavy head, and completely destroys things when bashing its head about, even if it means no harm. It hates fighting, and is very motherly, constantly worrying about Minidekachimon, its pre-digivolution who it raises and protects within its mouth. It talks so loud that even Minidekachimon has to cover its ears, and gets even louder with the "-dekaa" it attaches to the end of its sentences. When Minidekachimon runs into danger, it fights for its life.

attacks.name: Head Crush (頭つぶし, Atama Tsubushi)
attacks.description: Swings its head down at the opponent from above with all its might.

attacks.name: Drum Blast (鼓・爆砕, Tsudzumi Bakusai)
attacks.description: Restrains the opponent's movements by raising its loud voice to maximum volume.

At.name: At
At.description: At is a fiery, insubstantial Digimon similar in form toHinukamuy, having been derived from Jesmon's observations of it. The character on its forehead reads "A".

AtlurBallistamon.name: AtlurBallistamon
AtlurBallistamon.description: AtlurBallistamon is a Machine Digimon. It is a digivolution of Ballistamon that has assimilated electromagnetic armor into its thickened metallic body, and become able to reduce damage with magnetism and attack with electrical discharges. Combined with AtlurBallistamon's kindhearted personality, it stands in the way of its enemies as a protective wall for defending its comrades on the battlefield.

attacks.name: Plasma Splitter (Plasma Crack)
attacks.description: Fires a stream or sphere of electricity from its main horn, with power rivaling that of "Heaven's Thunder".

attacks.name: Rocket Bunker
attacks.description: Unleashes a punch with its extensible arm.

Aurumon.name: Aurumon
Aurumon.description: Aurumon is a Bird Digimon. It armor digivolved through the power of the Digi-Egg of Love. It excels in its scouting ability and primarily specializes in being active at night. Its night vision scope-eyes have the ability to detect opponents up to 1 km away in the dark, so it can approach and ambush them from behind. Because Aurumon's fundamental characteristic is "Scouting" rather than "Combat", its offensive power is not great, but it excels in ninja-like strikes that utilize the darkness.

attacks.name: MN Clutch (Midnight Clutch)
attacks.description: Approaches the opponent from behind under the cover of darkness, then swoops down on them with its talons.

AvengeKidmon.name: AvengeKidmon
AvengeKidmon.description: AvengeKidmon is a Dragon Man Digimon. The desire for revenge of a Digimon defeated by MagnaKidmon ran wild, and as a result of the Minus Mind Data applying an overload to its DigiCore, the form of the defeated Digimon underwent a mutation-like transformation. In order to vent its raging fury at its form becoming so similar to that of the opponent it should defeat, it has forgotten even the goal of defeating MagnaKidmon that was its dream, and continuously sabotages it.

attacks.name: Misery Bullet Rain
attacks.description: Hits the target with many energy shots from its fingers, causing it to hover in the air from the force, then fires live ammunition from its whole body and drives it into the opponent.

attacks.name: Destruction Trigger
attacks.description: Stomps on the opponent, without balking at injuring itself, then fires an explosion-inducing bullet at point blank range from the gun muzzles on its legs.

AxeKnightmon.name: AxeKnightmon
AxeKnightmon.description: AxeKnightmonis a Dark Knight Digimon. It is the fused figure ofSkullKnightmonandAxemon, who have exchanged cups of brotherhood. AxeKnightmon, who brings the older brother's ingenuity together with the younger brother's mobility, has become a first-class warrior. The skills of AxeKnightmon, who can use the "Twin Spear" it wields to thrust, slash, sweep, or throw as the situation calls for, are very advanced, and it is said there are few people powerful enough to fight AxeKnightmon fairly to its face and defeat it. While AxeKnightmon possesses that much competency, it will use any means to achieve its goals and won't hesitate to get its hands dirty, and sometimes it will even be willing to betray its own comrades. AxeKnightmon, who is furnished to an implacable depth with merit, is an opponent that you don't want to turn into an enemy, if you can help it.

attacks.name: Twin Spear
attacks.description: Stabs with its Twin Spear.

attacks.name: Treason Vortex
attacks.description: Spins its Twin Spear to form a vortex of darkness.

attacks.name: Multi-Dimensional Axe (超次元アックス, Choujigen Axe, lit. "Super-dimensional Axe")

AxeKnightmon (Blastmon).name: AxeKnightmon (Blastmon)
AxeKnightmon (Blastmon).description: AxeKnightmon (Blastmon) consists ofAxeKnightmon (Gulfmon)withBlastmon's spikes added its body.

AxeKnightmon (Gulfmon).name: AxeKnightmon (Gulfmon)
AxeKnightmon (Gulfmon).description: AxeKnightmon (Gulfmon) consists ofAxeKnightmongrowing demonic horns and sprouting a multitude of spikes from its body.

AxeKnightmon (Laylamon).name: AxeKnightmon (Laylamon)
AxeKnightmon (Laylamon).description: AxeKnightmon (Laylamon) consists ofAxeKnightmon (Blastmon)enveloped in a body of darkness formed fromLilithmon.

AxeKnightmon X.name: AxeKnightmon X
AxeKnightmon X.description: AxeKnightmon X is a Dark Knight Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. An increase in the power AxeKnightmon possessed as a single Digimon caused it to reach the Mega level, resulting in this form. Its evil intentions have been amplified, and it now aims not only for the world but even for a place among the Seven Great Demon Lords.

attacks.name: Cruel Tornado
attacks.description: Crushes the opponent's limbs with a tornado created by its "Vortex-Spear".

attacks.name: Deadly Break Lost
attacks.description: Fuses its "Shoulder Blade" and spear together to form the "Cyclone Deathscythe", which it uses to split the opponent apart with a cross-slash.

Axemon.name: Axemon
Axemon.description: Axemon is a Demon Beast Digimon. It is a younger brother who exchanged cups of brotherhood with SkullKnightmon. As a brawny fighter replete with nimble movements and limitless physical strength, it faithfully obeys its sworn brother SkullKnightmon, and battles with faith in its sworn brother in order to obtain victory. It shows off lightning-speed movements fast enough that they earned it the alias of "Running Lightning", and its top speed is so fast that you can see afterimages. However, fine maneuvers are its weak point, so its linear movements can be easily read by its opponent, and it easily collides with obstacles. However, if you see its sturdy body smashing through those and continue running with a defiant, thunderous roar, you would probably agree that the name "Running Lightning" is appropriate.

attacks.name: Air Slicer
attacks.description: Runs between the opponents at the speed of light, who aren't even able to realize it before they're cut down.

attacks.name: Aqua Rage
attacks.description: Spews a powerful solution that dissolves everything.

attacks.name: Aqua Regia
attacks.description: Liquefies itself using Aqua Rage and swallows up all of its surroundings.

title: Running Lightning
(走る稲妻
Hashiru Inazuma?)

Ajatarmon.name: Ajatarmon
Ajatarmon.description: Ajatarmon is a Vegetation Digimon. It is a Digimon that lives in groups similar to tribes. It builds small civilizations deep in the jungle. Generally speaking, they are taciturn and do not speak very much, and when hunting in groups, they contact each other through hand gestures and bring down their prey with outstanding cooperation. Although it is short-tempered and has a violent disposition, it has a pure heart with pride as a hunter.

attacks.name: Assault Hatchet
attacks.description: Strikes the enemy with an all-purpose hatchet that cuts down even large trees in an instant.

attacks.name: Entangling Ivy (Tied-up Ivy)
attacks.description: Restrains the enemy with the tentacles growing from the back of its head.

attacks.name: Shotgun Moss
attacks.description: Shoots the poisonous grass needles that grow from its head like hair to restrict the enemies movements.

Azulongmon.name: Azulongmon
Azulongmon.description: Azulongmon is a Holy Dragon Digimon. It is the "Digimon Sovereign" that guards the East, and commands the Deva Mihiramon, Antylamon, and Majiramon. Also, it is counted as one of the Four Great Dragons, and is the most deified existence among them. It releases intense lightning strikes, and although it is a divine being, it will not easily cooperate with humans and the weak, and it is not likely to lend help to its allies unless there is something serious.

attacks.name: Sourai (蒼雷, Sourai lit. "Blue Thunder")
attacks.description: Looses intense thunderbolts from the sky, with divine fury.

attacks.name: Fushikaden (風絲華電, Fūshikaden, lit. "Wind of Threads and Flower of Electricity")
Raijin-no-Mai (雷神之舞, Raijin-no-Mai lit. "Dance of Raijin")
Aurora Force
attacks.description: Curls its body into a circle, generating an intense burst of lightning.

attacks.name: Lightning Whip
attacks.description: Looses an intense thunderbolt.

title: Guardian of the East
(東方の守護者
Higashikata no Shugosha?)

Baalmon.name: Baalmon
Baalmon.description: Baalmon is a Demon Man Digimon. As an enlightened Digimon that excels in all knowledge, it is called the "Sublime Lord". According to one theory, it is surely another form of a certain Demon Lord Digimon. It is said that in exchange for the reader's soul, it will grant one page of information from the "Red Book of Appin", which records all of its knowledge. Although Baalmon will answer any kind of question, it always inflicts an ordeal for the answer. If that ordeal is not surmounted, then it will not give the requested answer, and will snatch away your soul. Its mantle is covered in amulets from all times and places, and it is said that on those amulets are written solutions for every problem, so that with that wealth of information it is able to completely defend against any attack. It holds the "Dǎshénbiān" (打神鞭 lit. "Spiritual Whip") in its hands.

attacks.name: Kamiuchi (カミウチ, Kamiuchi lit. "God Beating")
attacks.description: Releases a mighty, lightning-fast smite from the Dǎshénbiān, which is especially effective against Holy-species Digimon.

attacks.name: Guiltish
attacks.description: Transforms its amulets into various things to attack, such as bullets.

title: Sublime Lord
(気高き王
Kedakaki Ō?)

Baalmon X.name: Baalmon X
Baalmon X.description: Baalmon X is a Wizard Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The X-Antibody releases some of the power sealed inside Baalmon by its amulets. The Red Book of Appin reveals its will. Should one seeking knowledge give a wrong answer to the question, they will receive judgment from its owner.

attacks.name: Kamiuchi (カミウチ, Kamiuchi lit. "God Beating")
attacks.description: Releases a mighty, lightning-fast smite from the "Dǎshénbiān" (打神鞭 lit. "Spiritual Whip"), which is especially effective against Holy-species Digimon.

attacks.name: Guiltish
attacks.description: Transforms its amulets into various things to attack, such as bullets.

attacks.name: Tribunal Blast (Tūri Blast)
attacks.description: Unleashes a shot from the shotgun on its right arm.

attacks.name: Zai-Kamiuchi
attacks.description: Its whip, Dǎshénbiān, merges with its left arm to strike any enemies attempting to flee.

attacks.name: Absorption Mark
attacks.description: Aims the Red Book of Appin at its enemy, causing its enemy to be absorbed into one of the book's pages.

Babamon.name: Babamon
Babamon.description: Babamon is an Ancient Digimon. It is a Digimon that has the appearance of an old woman. According to rumor, it is whispered that a Rosemon was placed under a spell and turned into this form.

attacks.name: Empress Haze
attacks.description: Fires a stream of flame from its mouth.

Baboongamon.name: Baboongamon
Baboongamon.description: Baboongamonis a Beast Digimon. It is a Digimon with a strong sense of territory. It builds its home in places with a difference in altitude such as cliffs or rocky mountains. Its characteristic rocks, which cover a portion of its skin, regenerate and become harder each time they break. In addition, the individual with the hardest rocks within a troop is the leader in charge of their territory.

attacks.name: Mount Rock
attacks.description: Hurls the rocks on its arms.

attacks.name: Glide Rocks
attacks.description: Strikes the enemy with its rock-covered tail at tremendous speed.

Babydmon.name: Babydmon
Babydmon.description: Babydmon is a Baby Dragon Digimon. Babydmon's body bears a striking resemblance to a dragon. While this Digimon was only discovered recently, it has been made clear through data analysis that it contains a program code specific to ancient Digimon, and that it is related to the long-lost, ancient species of Digimon. Babydmon is ferocious despite its small size, and anyone who makes careless movements in front of it will get blown at with the high temperature gas formed within its body.

attacks.name: Hot Steam (Hot Gas)
attacks.description: Fires a blow of hot gas produced in its body. The gas is not just hot but also spicy.

Bacchusmon.name: Bacchusmon
Bacchusmon.description: Bacchusmonis a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", it styles itself theDigital World's foremost drinker. It is very caring with a cheerful personality, and gathers Rookie or Champion Digimon to hold parties day and night. Because it is able to distill any kind of alcohol within its body, it is said that at parties, it answers the requests of the Digimon it has befriended and treats them to alcohol. It prefers the taste of fruit wine, and its favorite fruit wine is something fermented from the sweets borne by the "Karpos Hulē" forest carried onCeresmon's back, so whenever it can snatch a moment, it eagerly requests Ceresmon to "Let me brew fruit wine." For that reason, it is on very good terms with Ceresmon, and they often act together. Also, the data of Bacchusmon's distilled poison has become an object of study for theCrack Team, and the rumor questioning whether Bacchusmon's poison data is related to the preparation of bacteriological weapons and is part of a plot to assassinate an important person is whispered as if it were true.

attacks.name: Cook of the Abyss (Cook of the Hell)
attacks.description: Wraps up the opponent in both of its hands, transforms their configuration data into drinking snacks, and then eats them.

attacks.name: Party of the Heavens (Party of the Heaven)
attacks.description: Refines spirits and mixes them with poisons that cause sleep or paralysis, then pours them on its target to incapacitate them.

attacks.name: Reversal of the Dead (Reverse of the Dead)
attacks.description: When Bacchusmon has had too much to drink, the pattern on its body will turn pale, and it will the expel the data in its large stomach in a destructive beam of light. If the attack hits an opponent, Bacchusmon takes in the data to become more powerful, so facing off against large groups of enemies can make it unfathomably strong.

title: Great Chaotic God
(大乱神
Tairan-shin?)

Bacchusmon (Deisui Mode).name: Bacchusmon (Deisui Mode)
Bacchusmon (Deisui Mode).description: Bacchusmon (Deisui Mode) is a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", it styles itself the Digital World's foremost drinker. It is very caring with a cheerful personality, and gathers Rookie or Champion Digimon to hold parties day and night. Because it is able to distill any kind of alcohol within its body, it is said that at parties it answers the requests of the Digimon it has befriended and treats them to alcohol. It prefers the taste of fruit wine, and its favorite fruit wine is something fermented from the sweets borne by the "Karpos Hulē" forest carried on Ceresmon's back, so whenever it can snatch a moment, it eagerly requests Ceresmon to "Let me brew fruit wine." For that reason, it is on very good terms with Ceresmon, and they often act together. Also, the data of Bacchusmon's distilled poison has become an object of study for the Crack Team, and the rumor questioning whether Bacchusmon's poison data is related to the preparation of bacteriological weapons and is part of a plot to assassinate an important person is whispered as if it were true.

attacks.name: Cook of the Abyss (Cook of the Hell)
attacks.description: Wraps up the opponent in both of its hands, transforms their configuration data into drinking snacks, and then eats them.

attacks.name: Party of the Heavens (Party of the Heaven)
attacks.description: Refines spirits and mixes them with poisons that cause sleep or paralysis, then pours them on its target to incapacitate them.

attacks.name: Reversal of the Dead (Reverse of the Dead)
attacks.description: When Bacchusmon has had too much to drink, the pattern on its body will turn pale, and it will the expel the data in its large stomach in a destructive beam of light. If the attack hits an opponent, Bacchusmon takes in the data to become more powerful, so facing off against large groups of enemies can make it unfathomably strong.

Bagramon.name: Bagramon
Bagramon.description: Bagramon is a Demon Lord Digimon. Although it was originally a high-ranking Angel Digimon that ruled over death, it despaired against the unreasonable justice of the world and rebelled against God. It then received the scourge of God and eternally lost one of its eyes and half of its body, and has since replaced that half with an artificial body cut from King Drasil. Its long, artificial right arm can catch hold of ghostly forms, and the large ruby that it replaced its lost eye with allows it to observe anywhere within the Digital World. Due to these, Bagramon is known across the Digital World as the "Sage of Death". Although Bagramon's sins will be forgiven if it repented before God, it will not go back to submission under God. This is because it still seeks to replace the "Unreasonable Justice of the World" that God constructed, and its goal in life is to banish God from the world with its "New Justice".

attacks.name: Astral Snatcher
attacks.description: Rips a living Digimon's soul from its body with its right arm, and sends it to heaven or hell as it pleases, or even places it within another Digimon's body.

attacks.name: Invisible Snake-eyes
attacks.description: Observes any location within the Digital world using its ruby-eye, allowing it to instantly obtain any information it wants to know.

attacks.name: Savage Cyclone (超次元ストーム, Choujigen Storm, lit. "Super-dimensional Storm")
attacks.description: Generates a dimensional storm anywhere within the Digital World through which it stretches its right arm to attack the opponent.

title: Sage of Death
(死を司る賢者
Shi wo Tsukasadoru Kenja?)

Baihumon.name: Baihumon
Baihumon.description: Baihumon is a Holy Beast Digimon. It is the "Digimon Sovereign" that guards the West, and commands the Deva Makuramon, Sinduramon, and Caturamon. Also, although it is the youngest of the Sovereigns, its power is the greatest among the four. Baihumon is a neutral being just like Azulongmon, and it isn't someone who will generally become an ally.

attacks.name: Kongou (金剛, Kongou lit. "Gold Strength")
attacks.description: Emits a wave from its mouth which converts the opponent completely into metal, making them unable to move while their body rusts, and unable to die until they have completely rusted away.

Bakemon.name: Bakemon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Kōki Miyata,Katashi Ishizuka,Keaton Yamada,Keiichi Sonobe,Takahiro Sakurai(Adventure Pastor),Akio Otsuka(New Century)
Bakemon.description: Bakemon is a Ghost Digimon. Bakemon is completely covered by a cloth over its head. As it is a wicked being born from darkness, it is said that computers possessed by Bakemon instantly have their systems destroyed. Everything within the cloth is wrapped in mystery, and it is rumored that a portion of the shadow of its true form has become a black hole. It dislikes direct attacks because its fighting strength isn't great. It is a wicked Digimon born from the Dark Area. As a Ghost Digimon, its Level is low, but because its body is composed of a fiendish virus program, it's said that computers it possesses are pulverized in a flash. Because its fighting strength isn't great, it doesn't attack directly, but is instead an expert in indirect attacks employing curses or magical power. Bakemon seems to get along with Ponchomon.

attacks.name: Dark Claw (Hell's Hand)
attacks.description: Pulls the captured enemy all the way to hell.

attacks.name: Evil Charm (Death Charm)
attacks.description: Casts a powerful death spell on the opponent which is said to bring annihilation within five turns unless they are the possessor of a tenacious spirit. This technique is not possessed by Bakemon of File Island.

attacks.name: Ghost Chop
attacks.description: Attacks using small chops.

attacks.name: Poison Breath
attacks.description: Blows out poisonous smoke.

attacks.name: Touch of Evil (Death Claw)
attacks.description: Slashes enemies with power of darkness.

Bakomon.name: Bakomon
debut: "The Amusement Park of Dreams, Digimon Land!" [75]
Bakomon.description: Bakomon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a Digimon who hides its entire body within cardboard boxes. Its personality is timid to the point that it prefers to confine itself indoors, but being covered in cardboard bestows it a sense of security that allows it to walk about outdoors uninhibited. Anyone who tries to peek at the insides of the cardboard boxes will end up getting packed into and trapped within one of the boxes. It is not fond of battling as the cardboard covering it is very soft.

attacks.name: Gum Roll
attacks.description: Flings the packing tape it holds in its hand, encircling and wrapping the opponent to stop them in their tracks.

attacks.name: Transdelivery
attacks.description: Packs the enemy into a cardboard box and hurls them away.

BalliBeastmon.name: BalliBeastmon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Laughing All The Way To The Code Crown" [23]
BalliBeastmon.description: BalliBeastmon is the DigiFuse of Ballistamon and Beastmon. Laughing All The Way To The Code Crown

attacks.name: Belly Balli Dance
attacks.description: Entices foes with a sensual belly dance.

attacks.name: Seismic Speaker (Cat Speaker)
attacks.description: Emits a low tone from the speaker in its belly, shattering the opponent.

attacks.name: Sonic Dancing
attacks.description: Belly-dances to reveal its speaker and emit a sonic wave.

attacks.name: Ultimate Speaker
attacks.description: Amplifies sound into a destructive sonic wave.

Ballistamon.name: Ballistamon
Ballistamon.description: Ballistamonis a Machine Digimon. It is a heavyweight Digimon that possesses bulky metallic armor and overwhelming power. It appears warlike at first glance, but because of its gentle personality, preferring harmony to conflict, it will never attack first. However, if it gets into a fight, it becomes a powerful and matchless fighter that swings its stout arms and wipes out the opponent. With its heavy armor and great power, its potential for both offense and defense is great, and if it connects with a hit then it doesn't quit, although its specialty is a one-hit knockout attack which capitalizes on its great power. However, its too-heavy body can be its ruin and there is a problem with its keenness, so it is not very good at fighting with fast-moving opponents. The horn on its head is its pride, and though the horn becomes the essence of its close-combat attacks, it hates for the horn to be carelessly touched. Also, Ballistamon is able to lend its heavy armor and power to another Digimon by changing into its "Enhanced-armor Mode"(強化装甲形態,Kyoukasoukou Keitai).

attacks.name: Ram Slammer (Horn Breaker)
attacks.description: Heroically uses its horn to fling the opponent.

attacks.name: Seismic Speaker (Heavy Speaker)
attacks.description: Emits a low tone from the speaker in its belly, shattering the opponent. This technique conceals the power to smash rocks and shake mountains, and that power level rises when it gets hungry.

attacks.name: Arm Bunker
attacks.description: Charges energy into its arm.

attacks.name: Doomsday Woofer (Ultimate Speaker)
attacks.description: Amplifies sound into a destructive sonic wave.

Ballistamon Mush Cottage.name: Ballistamon Mush Cottage
Ballistamon Mush Cottage.description: Ballistamon Mush Cottage is the DigiFuse of Ballistamon and Mushroomon. It comes equipped with a "Teppan Soul" griddle, "Mask Freezer" freezer, "Blast Oven" oven, "Armed Conro" stove, and "Face Jukebox" jukebox, the latter which Ballistamon uses to talk. It also has the "Mush Full Coat" which it can lend for anyone to wear.

attacks.name: Mush Full Course
attacks.description: Cooks and serves a wide variety of mushroom-themed dishes.

Ballistamon Sextet Launcher.name: Ballistamon Sextet Launcher
Ballistamon Sextet Launcher.description: Ballistamon Sextet Launcher is the DigiFuse of Ballistamon and Dorulumon.

attacks.name: Sextet Storm (嵐の六重奏, Arashi no Rokujūsō)
attacks.description: Unleashes its ordinance of six cannons.

Baluchimon.name: Baluchimon
Baluchimon.description: Baluchimonis a Holy Beast Digimon. It is a Digimon whose existence was confirmed in ruins discovered beneathFolder Continent. It turns outs that the ruins were once used as a fortress for Angel Digimon, and it is presumed that the Baluchimon were the ones that protected the fortress. Although it has a calm and quiet personality, it also has a ferocious side that mercilessly attacks the enemy. It is highly intelligent.

attacks.name: Psychic Chain
attacks.description: Once it immediately discerns the hostility of an intruder, it constricts their body with psychokinetic chains and drives them away.

attacks.name: Cloud Vision
attacks.description: For those who get lost in the ruins unknowingly, it is said that it displays illusions with the clouds that it spews out and leads them out of the ruins while they are in a dream-like state.

BanchoGolemon.name: BanchoGolemon
BanchoGolemon.description: BanchoGolemon is a Mineral Digimon. One of Bancho, this Digimon differs from regular emotionless Golemon in that it acts out of its own will. Its figure stands tall and imposing, unconcerned with its surroundings; its harsh treatment extends to everyone, and it will not show even the slightest sign of leniency. It puts even itself under harsh training by stationing itself in the fiercely inhospitable depths of Infinity Mountain. It is a mysterious Digimon that, although will hardly ever lend a hand to strangers in need of help, will show up even out of nowhere in order to save a comrade with whom it has exchanged blows. With its overwhelming power, it can turn the tables on a disadvantageous situation in one sweep and claim victory.

attacks.name: Heaven's Hammer (天波返し, Tenbagaeshi, lit. "Heaven Parapet")
attacks.description: Grips the enemy in its right hand and hammer-throws them into the distance.

attacks.name: Raging Dust (漢癪ダスト, Kanshaku Dust, lit. "Manliness-Wrath Dust")
attacks.description: Reflects the beam fired from the Kanshakudama (漢癪魂, Kanshakudama lit. "Manliness-Wrath Soul") in its abdomen off of falling stones, resulting in an attack with a large area of effect.

attacks.name: World Claw Drill (世堀クロードリル, Yobori Claw Drill, lit. "World-Excavating Claw Drill")
attacks.description: Impales the enemy with the gigantic excavator on its left hand, which is capable of pulverising even Chrome Digizoid alloy.

BanchoLeomon.name: BanchoLeomon

otherNames.name: バンチョーレオモン BantyoLiomon
バンチョーレオモン BantyoLeomon

BanchoLeomon.description: BanchoLeomonis a Beast Man Digimon. It lives faithfully only to the "Justice" in which it trusts. It is said that only Digimon who continue to emerge victorious in battles with fierce champions, without their spirit being "broken", are able to acquire the title of "Bancho", and in the recorded history of theDigital World, only five Digimon which possess this title have been confirmed. As it is a boss that only serves its own "Justice", if something becomes an obstacle to that "Justice", it will see them as "Evil", even if they are a being like theRoyal Knightsor theCelestial Digimon, and they will become an enemy that it has to eliminate. The "Gaku-Ran" (GAKU-RAN) worn over its shoulders is endowed with a defensive function that negates 89.9% of the opponent's physical strikes. It wields its pridedtantō, "Otokodama"(男魂,"Otokodama"lit. "Man's Soul").

attacks.name: Lion Slash (獅子羅王漸, Shishiraouzan, lit. "Lion King Slash")
attacks.description: Unleashes an attack from the Otokodama.

attacks.name: Flash Bancho Punch (Flash Bantyo Punch)
attacks.description: Releases a fist packed with fighting spirit honed to its utmost limit.

attacks.name: Chivalry (男気, Otokogi, lit. "Chivalry")
attacks.description: Strikes the ground to create a shockwave attack.

attacks.name: Burning Bantyo Punch (Burn Bantyo Punch)
attacks.description: A powerful punch with a burning soul.

BanchoLeomon Burst Mode.name: BanchoLeomon Burst Mode
BanchoLeomon Burst Mode.description: BanchoLeomon Burst Mode is BanchoLeomon's Burst Mode.

attacks.name: Burning Bancho Punch
attacks.description: Foils foes with its fiery fists.

BanchoLillymon.name: BanchoLillymon
debut: Digimon Collectors, "BAN-TYO: Lili the Black Lily" [??]

otherNames.name: 黒百合のﾘﾘ Lili the Black Lily

BanchoLillymon.description: BanchoLillymon is a Fairy Digimon. It is a crimson tokkō-fuku wearing Digimon. The gorgeous petals it had in the days it was a Lillymon have been dyed a dark color, and the pretty impression it made is long gone. In a Digital World of the survival of the fittest, it believes in fighting for the underdog, having saved a lot of those who were attacked by evil Digimon. It was awarded the title of "Bancho" when it donned its tokkō-fuku, a testament to its beliefs.

attacks.name: Absolute Territory
attacks.description: Uses its yo-yos to tear the enemy to pieces as well as the space around them.

attacks.name: Twin Petal
attacks.description: Unleashes instant kicks with its gorgeous feet.

attacks.name: Nightmare Assemble
attacks.description: Uses its yo-yos to pierce the enemy and absorb them.

title: Black Lily
(黒百合
Kuro Yuri?)

BanchoMamemon.name: BanchoMamemon
BanchoMamemon.description: BanchoMamemon is a Mutant Digimon. One of the Digimon that have acquired the title of Bancho, it fights strongly in spite of its small stature, and has a personality that sports a chivalrous spirit and deeply overflowing emotions. As it tries to rebel against the rules of the Digital World, it lives an independent life. It similarly extends a hand to those Digimon who feel ill at ease with and isolated from the world, and from living together, they have formed a group called the "Mamemon Gang (豆門連合, Mame-mon Rengō, lit. "Mame-mon Union")". However, continuing to betray the rules of the world is not an easy task for them, and although BanchoMamemon has had to fight those Digimon who aim to usurp it as leader under the pretense of a rebirth of the group several times over, the collective power of the "Mamemon Gang" has made those usurpers withdraw. It is thought that it acquired the title of Bancho from being able to avoid enemies without losing its own family as well in all kinds of predicaments. As with BanchoLeomon, it wears a GAKU-RAN" that negates the impact of physical attacks, and this defensive effect is often used to protect its companions.

attacks.name: Gōruden Rasshu (護王流伝羅守, Gōruden Rasshu lit. "Golden Rush")
Senbon Dokkān (千本爆砕, Senbon Bakusai)
Bukkomi Otokodama (特攻漢弾, Tokkou Kandan, lit. "Striking Man's Soul")

title: Aloof Rebel
(孤高の反逆者
Kokō no Hangyaku-sha?)

BanchoStingmon.name: BanchoStingmon
BanchoStingmon.description:
BanchoStingmon is an Insect Digimon. BanchoStingmon is full of pride and survives by constantly intimidating everyone around it.
It gives top priority to its own pride out of everything else, and its high-ranking pride is said to be first-rate among all of the Digimon. It has a behavioral trait where, if someone damages its pride even a little bit, it will not ever forgive them, regardless of whether they are friend or foe. It is said that it won the title of "Bancho" through its pride alone, rejecting all offers of a compromise. Its symbolic Gakuran was minutely sewn with the shells of various insects, so it has become very firmly-made.

attacks.name: Bloody Finish
attacks.description: Skewers enemies with the drills on both of its arms.

attacks.name: Bakuraiten (爆雷天, Bakuraiten lit. "Depth Charge Sky")
attacks.description: Releases Kiraichū (Mine Insects) that self-destruct when they hit enemies.

attacks.name: Redbutt
attacks.description: Headbutts an enemy hard enough to shatter their face.

BaoHuckmon.name: BaoHuckmon
BaoHuckmon.description: BaoHuckmon is a Dinosaur Digimon. It is a form of Hackmon that has gone through strict training, intensifying its sense of combat incomparably and achieving growth mentally, technically, and physically. It is a combat expert that aims for the top, continuing its training, accumulating combat experience cultivated through battle with formidable opponents, and digivolving as it battles. Its aspirations to the Royal Knights have risen as it grew, and not because it was told what it should do by someone and set its heart on it, but instead because it believes in making decisions by observing and reasoning for itself.

attacks.name: Fif Cross
attacks.description: Slashes with its claws.

attacks.name: Teen Blade
attacks.description: Rotates the blade on its tail about its axis and stabs with it.

attacks.name: Blazing Flame (Burn Flame)
attacks.description: Blazing Flame is capable of using for counterattacking.

attacks.name: Dragless Spiker (Dragrey Spiker)
attacks.description: Bisects the enemy using the razor-sharp blades that protrude from its hind limbs.

Barbamon.name: Barbamon
Barbamon.description: Barbamon is a Demon Lord Digimon. With the appearance of a long-bearded old man, it is one of the "Seven Great Demon Lords", representing Saturn and the sin of Greed. It resides within the heart of the Dark Area, the den of demons, and manipulates Fallen Angel Digimon to run the whole gamut of evil. It is obsessed with all of the treasure which exists within the Network, so out of avarice, and regardless of the means, it has a cruel personality with a greed that would kill Digimon just for a piece of treasure. It is the foremost and most cunning schemer of the Seven Great Demon Lords, and can easily manipulate the Mega-level Ghoulmon in addition to Fallen Angel Digimon.

attacks.name: Death Lure
attacks.description: Uses its demonic staff "Death Lure" to tempt Digimon into an inescapable living hell, converting them to wickedness.

attacks.name: Pandemonium Lost
attacks.description: Unleashes all of the Dark Area's evil energies at once as an extremely high-temperature explosion that burns up everything without a trace. Even MaloMyotismon's "Screaming Darkness" releases only a fraction of these energies.

attacks.name: Dark Inferno (地獄の火炎, Jigoku no Kaen, lit. "Hell Fire")
attacks.description: Burns the enemy with a dark flame.

attacks.name: Greedy Wand
attacks.description: Attacks with its favorite wand.

title: Schemer of Gold
(黄金の古狐
Kogane no Furugitsune?)

Barbamon X.name: Barbamon X
Barbamon X.description: Barbamon X is a Demon Lord Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It fused its demonic staff "Death Lure" with its right arm to link directly to its magic, and now controls its techniques more skilfully. The radiance of the Crown of Greed manifesting from its right hand is proof of its strength, and is its cherished collection.

attacks.name: Pandemonium Lost
attacks.description: Unleashes all of the Dark Area's evil energies at once as an extremely high-temperature explosion that burns up everything without a trace. Even MaloMyotismon's "Screaming Darkness" releases only a fraction of these energies.

attacks.name: Death Lure
attacks.description: Uses its demonic staff "Death Lure" to tempt Digimon into an inescapable living hell, converting them to wickedness.

attacks.name: Seventh Jewelrize
attacks.description: Transforms the enemy's Digicore that it scoops out using its left arm into a jewel with the Crown of Greed. Because the jewels shine more the stronger a Digimon is, it assesses whether they are worth fighting.

Baromon.name: Baromon
Baromon.description: Baromon is a Wizard Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Courage". It is also a guardian deity that protects the ruins (database) of a temple in a forgotten jungle. It is said that Baromon is a survivor of old generation Digimon, and has several abilities of a lost technology not found in current Digimon. The third eye on its brow is one of them, and it is said that this eye is able to forecast the future, and it is told that it was able to survive even at the time of the ancient Digital World's collapse.

attacks.name: Dancing Meteor (Meteor Dance)
attacks.description: Manipulates the spirits of the cosmos, causing a group of meteorites to rain down on the enemy. The downside is that it takes time to synchronize with the spirits of the cosmos, but once invoked, it is said that 10 terabytes of data surrounding the target is annihilated.

Batterymon.name: Batterymon
Batterymon.description: Batterymon is essentially abattery, as its intent is to indicate when the battery is about to run out of energy.

Battle Armament Trailmon.name: Battle Armament Trailmon
Battle Armament Trailmon.description: The Battle Armament Trailmon is a Trailmon heavily modified for battle.

attacks.name: Kyuu Break Spark (急ブレーキスパーク, Kyuu Break Spark lit. "Emergency Break Spark")

Bearmon.name: Bearmon
Bearmon.description: Bearmon is a Mammal Digimon. It wears its trademark baseball cap backwards. Although it is a little timid at first, it immediately becomes bosom buddies with other Digimon. However, once it begins to battle, with the uncommon physical strength and will-power it possesses—to continue battling no matter what kind of attack it suffers—it becomes a very reliable being. The ability for close combat hidden within its body is very strong, to the point that it bound its fists in leather belts so that its special punches wouldn't hurt itself.

attacks.name: Bear Fist (小熊正拳突き, Koguma Seikendzuki, lit. "Bear-cub Punch")
attacks.description: Drives a punch into the opponent's chest with all its strength.

attacks.name: Bear Roll
attacks.description: Curls up its body and charges towards the enemy.

attacks.name: Beast Attack
attacks.description: Attacks with a swift blow of a powerful beast.

Beastmon.name: Beastmon
Beastmon.description: Beastmon is a Beast Digimon. It loves to be showy and has a sly personality, and its specialty is using its charmingly sparkling eyes and the jewels worn all over its body to bewitch the opponent, allowing it to manipulate them as it desires. Generally, if one becomes the victim of Beastmon's glamour, they are completely eviscerated. Although it excels in nimbleness with its flexible movements, it is also powerful despite its appearance, and the claws on its hands are sharp enough to cut even a rock to pieces. It is said to be at loggerheads with Nefertimon, who is an avatar of light.

attacks.name: Witch Warp (Helter Skelter)
attacks.description: Beguiles the opponent with the bewitching charms of its belly dance. In Digimon World 3, this attack causes Digimon to de-digivolve back into their Rookie stage.

attacks.name: Mind Fogger (Vampire Dance)
attacks.description: Gets close to the opponent while dancing, then sucks out all the blood in their body, down to the last drop.

attacks.name: Vampire Jewel (きゅうけつアメジスト, Kyūketsu Amejisuto, lit. "Vampire Amethyst")

BelleStarmon.name: BelleStarmon
BelleStarmon.description: BelleStarmonis a Demon Man Digimon. It splendidly manipulates twin pistols, and is also called the "BeelzemonLady" due to its appearance. Its cherished twin pistols, the "Rizoma de Loto" (Esp: Lotus Root), are like little sisters to the "Berenjena" (Esp: Eggplant) possessed by Beelzemon. It opens up to everybody without hesitation, and in particular, it is close friends with many gun-wielding Digimon, and has been given the nickname "Beelko" byMagnaKidmonand the like. However, it is at loggerheads with the solitary Beelzemon, so although it recognizes its competence, it keeps a slight distance. It is dressed in a jet-black leather suit, and it wears a muffler that is able to transform according to use such as for offense and defense or wings.

attacks.name: Fly Bullet
attacks.description: Fires a "Fly Bullet" from the Rizoma de Loto that homes in on the enemy's vitals.

attacks.name: Double Claw
attacks.description: Stabs and tears through enemies with the knives stocked on the Rizoma de Loto.

attacks.name: Hurricane Screw Shot
attacks.description: Wildly fires the guns hidden in the heels of its boots with a keen Senpukyaku.

title: Beelzebumon Lady
(ベルゼブモンレディ
Beruzebumon Redi?)

BelleStarmon X.name: BelleStarmon X
BelleStarmon X.description: BelleStarmon X is a Demon Man Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It is a beautiful gunman characterized by its large, black wings that wields the small gun "Pepino" (Esp: Cucumber) in addition to its "Rizoma de Loto" (Esp: Lotus Root), which has been modified into a shotgun. By improving its physical abilities, it gained shooting techniques where its bullets never miss no matter what pose it shoots them from. The gunfire it unleashes through its elegant, dance-like tai sabaki is so beautiful and exquisite that it is even rumored to be a kind of art. Its "Fly Bullet: Segundo" (Esp: Fly Bucket: Second), which sports wings just like BelleStarmon itself, freely bolts across the battlefield and attacks with its unpredictable trajectory.

attacks.name: Fly Bullet
attacks.description: Fires a "Fly Bullet" from the Rizoma de Loto that homes in on the enemy's vitals.

attacks.name: Double Claw
attacks.description: Stabs and tears through enemies with the knives stocked on the Rizoma de Loto.

attacks.name: Hurricane Screw Shot
attacks.description: Wildly fires the guns hidden in the heels of its boots with a keen Senpukyaku.

attacks.name: Fly Bullet: Segundo (Esp: Fly Bucket: Second)
attacks.description: While the enemy's attention is diverted by the Fly Bullet, Beel Starmon robs the enemy of their sight with the jet-black feathers it shoots from its wings.

attacks.name: Distancia Cero (Esp: Zero Distance)
attacks.description: Finishes the enemy off with a zero-distance shooting attack that the enemy cannot see.

Beelzemon.name: Beelzemon

otherNames.name: ベルゼブモン＋ベヒーモス Beelzebumon + Behemoth
ベルゼブモンＬ Beelzebumon L

Beelzemon.description: Beelzemonis an Evil King Digimon. It is one of the "Seven Great Demon Lords", representingVenusand the sin ofGluttony. While it possesses the power to preside over the many Devil Digimon, it dares to observe a solitary existence. It is said that it could stand at the peak of the dark army, "Nightmare Soldiers", if it cared to, although it is also said that there exists a Demon Lord Digimon which surpasses even Beelzemon. It rides on the gigantic motorcycle-type machine, "Behemoth", holding its cherished shotguns, the "Berenjena"(Esp: Eggplant). Although its personality is cruel and merciless, it is also exceedingly prideful, so it would never attack the weak.

attacks.name: Darkness Claw
attacks.description: Raises a claw overhead and then cuts the opponent to pieces.

attacks.name: Double Impact
attacks.description: Rapid-fires the Berenjena.

attacks.name: Quick Shot
attacks.description: Rapid-fires using the Berenjena.

attacks.name: Heartbreak Shot
attacks.description: Fires a shot aimed at the opponent's heart.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.description: Swipes with its claws.

attacks.name: Behemoth
attacks.description: Summons Behemoth and drives into the enemy.

attacks.name: Berejena
attacks.description: Fires its Berenjena shotguns.

title: Duelist of Finality
(最後の決闘者
Saigo no Deyuerisuto?)

Beelzemon (2010 anime).name: Beelzemon (2010 anime)

otherNames.name: ベルゼブモン（デジモンクロスウォーズ版） Beelzebumon (Digimon Xros Wars)

Beelzemon (2010 anime).description: Beelzemon (2010 anime) is a Demon Lord Digimon. It is an aloof demon warrior possessing terrifying destructive power. Although it is seen as having a calm personality as a result of its indifference to strangers due to its taciturnity, in actuality, it loves conflict more than anyone else. It is considered one of the strongest Digimon, and anyone who sees Beelzemon's figure and still challenges it to a fight is nothing but a fool. Also, Beelzemon will never run away from a battle it was challenged to. There are more than a few opponents that were defeated by its "Oblivion Cannon" (Death the Cannon), but it must exercise further caution in its use. It wields the gigantic "Berenjena SDX" (Esp: Eggplant SDX) gun on its right arm, and the "Berenjena" (Esp: Eggplant) in its left.

attacks.name: Oblivion Cannon (Death the Cannon)
attacks.description: Fast draws a tremendously powerful shot from the Berenjena SDX, which is said to have almost godly speed.

attacks.name: Darkness Claw
attacks.description: Paralyzes the opponent instead of granting their desires, whispering about their final rewards and making a complete fool out of them. Unable to move, that fool will be the target of its fast draw until they lay down life's burden.

attacks.name: Double Impact SDX
attacks.description: Rapid-fires its twin Berenjena.

Beelzemon (Starmons).name: Beelzemon (Starmons)
Beelzemon (Starmons).description: Beelzemon (Starmons) is a DigiFuse between Beelzemon (2010 anime) and the Starmons. Rumble in the Jungle Zone!

attacks.name: Meteor Missiles (Meteor Cannon)
attacks.description: Fires Pickmon from its upgraded Berenjena SDX, allowing it to demolish entire armies in an instant.

\"Beelzemon + Deputymon\".name: "Beelzemon + Deputymon"
debut: "Shoutmon - Bogus King Or The Real Thing?" [26]
\"Beelzemon + Deputymon\".description: "Beelzemon + Deputymon" is an unnamed DigiFuse between Beelzemon (2010 anime) and Deputymon. Shoutmon - Bogus King Or The Real Thing?

attacks.name: Twin Cannons (Death the Cannon Spiral)
attacks.description: Fires a shot from each cannon, which spiral around each other as they fly toward the target.

Beelzemon Blast Mode.name: Beelzemon Blast Mode

otherNames.name: ベルゼブモン ブラストモード Beelzebumon Blast Mode

Beelzemon Blast Mode.description: Beelzemon Blast Mode is an Evil King Digimon. It is an ultimate Demon Lord that raised its power and spirit to their utmost limits. Instead of evolving in wickedness, it maintained a calmer mental state, and its three, once-baleful red eyes have become green. It commonly demonstrates incomparable power and speed, and four jet-black wings are growing from its back. You can almost say that before the Beelzemon that took on this figure, the opponent no longer exists. Its right arm is integrated with its Blaster, and fires powerful energy waves to disintegrate everything into atoms.

attacks.name: Corona Blaster (Death Slinger)
attacks.description: Fires a destructive wave from the Blaster.

attacks.name: Corona Destroyer (Chaos Flare)
attacks.description: Draws a magic circle before itself, then fires destructive waves toward the center.

attacks.name: Double Impact
attacks.description: Rapid-fires the Berenjena.

attacks.name: Darkness Claw
attacks.description: Raises a claw overhead and then cuts the opponent to pieces.

attacks.name: Corona Destroyer (High Impact)
attacks.description: Continuously fires at the enemies with a big gun.

attacks.name: Behemoth x Deathslinger (Behemoth×Death Slinger)
attacks.description: Rapid-fires the Berenjena while doing donuts with the Behemoth, then finishes with a destructive wave from the Blaster.

Beelzemon X.name: Beelzemon X
Beelzemon X.description: Beelzemon X is a Demon Lord Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. As a result of Beelzemon's data being overwritten by the X-Antibody, it was granted the ability to summon "El Evangelio" (Esp: The Gospel), crimson flames of the underworld capable of changing their form at will. El Evangelio are sapient flames that are used to impose judgement upon and offer salvation to the souls of the sinners that fall into the Dark Area. Being a Demon Lord type, Beelzemon would have been completely eradicated by the flames under normal circumstances, including its Digicore. However, having assimilated the X-Antibody into its body, Beelzemon has become able to suppress the will of El Evangelio and control them as if they were its own power, without being burnt by them.

attacks.name: Double Impact
attacks.description: Rapid-fires its twin shotguns.

attacks.name: Darkness Claw
attacks.description: Raises its sharp claws overhead and then cuts the opponent to pieces.

attacks.name: Gluttony Flare: Shoots El Evangelio from its Berenjena (Esp
attacks.description: Eggplant) as magic bullets, incinerating data without leaving a trace, as if the flames themselves swallowed the enemy whole.

attacks.name: Seventh Full Cluster
attacks.description: Condenses the power of "Gluttony Flare" into the Crown of Gluttony and fires it as a single shot.

Beetlemon.name: Beetlemon
Beetlemon.description: Beetlemon is an Android Digimon. It possesses power over Thunder which bears the might of AncientBeetlemon. Its keen movements, unbecoming of its large build, are a technique to form a high voltage current running throughout its body. It generates a special magnetic field that produces an anti-gravity state in its vicinity, and is capable of high-speed movement. Its overflowing thunder power comes out as sparks from various parts of its body, and although Beetlemon looks mechanical, its personality is, in contrast, expressive and human. Its language is trollish, but it additionally conveys excess warmth. In battle, its underwater mobility is weak due to the nature of its wrestler-like style.

attacks.name:
Thunder Fist (Thor Hammer): Clasping its hands together, then dynamically swings them down.
Jumping Thor Hammer
attacks.description: Clasping its hands together while charging electricity in the air, then dynamically swings them down.

attacks.name: Jumping Thor Hammer
attacks.description: Clasping its hands together while charging electricity in the air, then dynamically swings them down.

attacks.name: Thunder Fist (Mjöllnir Thunder)
attacks.description: Makes lightning fall from the sky like rain.

attacks.name: Lightning Blitz (Lightning Bomber)
attacks.description: Emits a powerful stream of lightning from its horn or rams foe with electricity stored in horn.

attacks.name: Megaton Punch
attacks.description: Performs a powerful punch.

attacks.name: Gigaton Upper
attacks.description: Performs a powerful uppercut.

attacks.name: Megaton Drop
attacks.description: Performs a dropkick.

attacks.name: Gigaton Press
attacks.description: Performs a powerful downward kick in the air.

attacks.name: Kūchūfuyū (空中浮遊, Kūchūfuyū lit. "Aerial Floating")
attacks.description: Slows its descent from the air.

attacks.name: Punishment Shock
attacks.description: Grabs and shocks its enemy before headbutting them away.

Belphemon Rage Mode.name: Belphemon Rage Mode
Belphemon Rage Mode.description: Belphemon Rage Mode is an Evil King Digimon. It is one of the "Seven Great Demon Lords", representing Mars and the sin of Sloth. It is said that Belphemon Sleep Mode awakens from its eternal slumber once in a thousand years. When it awakens, it regains its natural shape and changes into an incarnation of rage, and anything that enters its field of vision becomes a target for destruction. It is said that just by suffering Belphemon Rage Mode's roar, Ultimate Digimon and below will have their data disintegrated and will instantly die, and not even Mega Digimon can escape unharmed.

attacks.name: Lampranthus
attacks.description: Casts black flames from the chains coiled around its body.

attacks.name: Gift of Darkness
attacks.description: Unleashes a slash attack from its claws, which are clad in the flames of hell.

attacks.name: Dark Horn
attacks.description: Stabs the enemy with its two big horns.

attacks.name: Lightning Horn
attacks.description: Thrusts using an electrified horn.

attacks.name: Eternal Nightmare
attacks.description: The same attack as Belphemon Sleep Mode but used with great vengeance and furious anger.

title: Roar of Awakening
(目覚めの咆哮
Mezame no Hōkō?)

Belphemon Sleep Mode.name: Belphemon Sleep Mode
Belphemon Sleep Mode.description: Belphemon Sleep Mode is an Evil King Digimon. It is said to be sealed in the deepest part of the Dark Area. As the strength it possesses is too immense, its data is said to have been put in a Sleep state by the Digital World's system, although the truth of the matter is unconfirmed. Because it has fallen into a deep sleep, it cannot unleash its own attacks, but it is able to inflict damage to Digimon just with its snores, and for that reason, it will not be easy to attack Belphemon Sleep Mode in its sleep.

attacks.name: Eternal Nightmare
attacks.description: Invokes a nightmare with its peaceful snoring. If you are suffering from a lack of sleep, this technique is encouraged as it promises an eternal slumber.

attacks.name: Lampranthus
attacks.description: Casts black flames from the chains coiled around its body.

Belphemon X.name: Belphemon X
Belphemon X.description: Belphemon X is a Demon Lord Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its destructive impulses have intensified and its instincts have sharpened; it will utterly and completely crush those it seeks to destroy. It will first aim for and brutally pulverise the Digimon acting as the beacon of hope for the opposing army, crushing the hopeful hearts of the entire enemy faction. It then continues pounding on the opposing army, which has lost its will to fight, until it is satisfied and has laid waste to the army.

attacks.name: Lampranthus
attacks.description: Black flames cast from the chains coiled around its body.

attacks.name: Gift of Darkness
attacks.description: A slash attack which is unleashed from its claws, clad in the flames of hell.

attacks.name: Seventh Penetration (Seventh Penetrate)
attacks.description: Causes its Crown of Sloth to overflow with power, and fires a crimson energy wave from its claws at maximum output.

BeoWolfmon.name: BeoWolfmon
BeoWolfmon.description: BeoWolfmon is a Warrior Digimon. It possesses power over Light that has transcended legend by inheriting all the might of AncientGarurumon and acquiring unknown abilities. It is a strong-armed warrior that possesses both the wildness of a beast and the intelligence of a human, and can easily swing down its double-bladed greatsword "Beo Saber" (Trinität, Deu: Trinity) with one hand. In battle, it coolly sizes up the situation and fights without getting heated up, but it believes in the way of the warrior, of fighting for its comrades and challenging strong opponents. It has the "Roland 2" missile pod on its left hand for use in long-range combat, and specializes in both long-range and short-range combat.

attacks.name: Cleansing Light (Licht Angriff, Deu: Light Attack)
attacks.description: Assaults the opponent with several homing missiles fired from the Roland 2, then brings them down with its main armament in a powerful combination of heavy fire.

attacks.name: Frozen Hunter (Zweihänder, Deu: Two-hander)
attacks.description: Swings the Beo Saber at subluminal speed from overhead, instantly cutting the opponent to pieces. In Digimon Frontier and Digimon New Century the energy generated by the sword forms into the shape of a giant wolf, which then slashes the enemy with its claws.

attacks.name: Beo Saber (Trinität, Deu: Trinity)
attacks.description: Attacks the opponent with the Beo Saber.

Betamon.name: Betamon
Betamon.description: Betamonis an Amphibian Digimon. It walks on four legs. Its personality is gentle, but although it is a docile Digimon, once Betamon is angered, it emits its "Electric Shock" (Dengeki Biririn) from its body.

attacks.name: Electric Shock (電撃ビリリン, Dengeki Biririn)
attacks.description: Generates more than 1 MV of electric current to strike the opponent.

attacks.name: Water Shot
attacks.description: Attacks with a bursting stream of water.

Betamon X.name: Betamon X
Betamon X.description: Betamon X is an Aquatic Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. As a Digimon used for enjoyment by some enthusiasts due to its emerald green body color and gentle personality, it continues to be overhunted, and although it is endangered, it is gradually becoming experienced at fighting as a lifeform that digivolves into a fine Aquatic Digimon. Both the claws on its feet and its crest grew, and it now performs attacks against approaching enemies. Its "Dengeki Biririn" also powered up.

attacks.name: Electric Shock (電撃ビリリン, Dengeki Biririn)
attacks.description: Once it is angered it generates more than 1 MV of electric current to strike the opponent.

attacks.name: Electric Shock 185V (電撃ビリリン185V, Dengeki Biririn 185V)
attacks.description: Once its anger reaches its peak it generates more than 1.85 MV of electric current to strike the opponent.

BetelGammamon.name: BetelGammamon
BetelGammamon.description: BetelGammamon is a Dragon Man Digimon. It is a form in which Gammamon grew up, and its body turned red due to the flames of its blazing spirit. Its agility has increased, and its power and speed in close combat have risen even more. The power of its attacks doubles as the excitement of its emotions grows.

attacks.name: Sol Blow (Lat: "Sun Blow")
attacks.description: It punches the enemy with the flames it amasses in its hands.

attacks.name: Sol Shot (Lat: "Sun Shot")
attacks.description: Hurls the flames in its hands, albeit it less powerful than Sol Blow.

Betsumon.name: Betsumon
Betsumon.description: Betsumon is a Puppet Digimon. It is an eccentric Digimon that impersonates all sorts of Digimon in order to confuse the enemy. While it is a Puppet Digimon, similar to Etemon and Monzaemon, it is a rare type capable of disguising itself as various types of Digimon by changing the Digimon Suit (?) it wears. It can also impersonate humans.

attacks.name: Cold Gag
attacks.description: Tells a joke so bad that it causes its opponent to freeze solid.

attacks.name: Tsukkomi Punch (つっこみパンチ, Tsukkomi Punch lit. "Straight Man Punch")

Copied Attacks
Grey Sword: While disguised as Omnimon, slashes with the invincible "Grey Sword".
Rock Damashi: While disguised as Shoutmon, forms a ball of energy in the shape of an eighth note and throws it at the opponent.
Hellfire: While disguised as Astamon, fires every last bullet from the Oro Salmón.
Twin Spear: While disguised as AxeKnightmon, fires a purple colored energy blast from its right hand.
Smoke Bombs: While disguised as Monitamon, throws smokebombs at the enemy to make a quick getaway.
Pendragon's Glory
attacks.description: While disguised as Examon, conducts a high-powered laser firing.

attacks.name: Grey Sword
attacks.description: While disguised as Omnimon, slashes with the invincible "Grey Sword".

attacks.name: Rock Damashi
attacks.description: While disguised as Shoutmon, forms a ball of energy in the shape of an eighth note and throws it at the opponent.

attacks.name: Hellfire
attacks.description: While disguised as Astamon, fires every last bullet from the Oro Salmón.

attacks.name: Twin Spear
attacks.description: While disguised as AxeKnightmon, fires a purple colored energy blast from its right hand.

attacks.name: Smoke Bombs
attacks.description: While disguised as Monitamon, throws smokebombs at the enemy to make a quick getaway.

attacks.name: Pendragon's Glory
attacks.description: While disguised as Examon, conducts a high-powered laser firing.

Bibimon.name: Bibimon
Bibimon.description: Bibimon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved from Dokimon. It lacks composure, and is always moving around mischievously. However, because it is not used to dealing with four limbs yet, it very often loses its balance in the middle of running and tumbles over. When it comes to battle, it uses its "Minimal Flash" to fight bravely against the enemy, despite being an In-Training.

attacks.name: Minimal Flash
attacks.description: A static electricity-laced tackle.

BigMamemon.name: BigMamemon
BigMamemon.description: BigMamemon is a Mutant Digimon. It exists as the boss of Mamemon. As a matter of fact, it's suggested that it is an aggregation of Mamemon. Since normal Mamemon are the same size as Rookie Digimon, they possess a degree of power that couldn't even be imagined from their appearance, but as its name suggests, BigMamemon is dozens or even hundreds of times the size of a Mamemon. However, the reason why a "Mamemon" is this size is still unclear. Its personality is extremely gentle, and it hates conflict and battle, so it is always playing with its Mamemon followers.

attacks.name: Big Smirk Bomb (Big Smiley Bomber)
attacks.description: Uses its Mamemon followers themselves as weapons. It's rumored that after using this technique, its size gets smaller.

attacks.name: Buster Dive
attacks.description: Dives down from the sky and uses its large body to crush an opponent.

attacks.name: Big Smiley Bomb
attacks.description: Throws Mamemon like a bomb.

BioRotosmon.name: BioRotosmon
debut: Digimon Data Squad, "Showdown Between Geniuses: Thomas vs. Nanami!" [31]

attacks.name: Serpent Ruin
attacks.description: Releases a black aura from the black snake on its staff.

attacks.name: Seven's Fantasia
attacks.description: Releases a seven-colored aura from the staff of rainbow-colored flowers that tempts the opponent into a euphoric fantasy world and causes them to completely lose their fighting spirit.

BioQuetzalmon.name: BioQuetzalmon
BioQuetzalmon.description: BioQuetzalmon is a Mythical Animal Digimon.

attacks.name: Freezing Wave (Freeze Wave)
attacks.description: Wraps around its foe and releases a wave of paralyzing energy.

attacks.name: Blue Prominence
attacks.description: Breathes a burst of blue-hot flames.

attacks.name: Sonic Slash Rain
attacks.description: Fires off the main row of spikes on its back.

attacks.name: Shell Needle Rain
attacks.description: Fires off the numerous spikes on its back.

attacks.name: Guillotine Wheel
attacks.description: Spins, turning into a living saw and slicing with its row of spikes.

BioThunderbirdmon.name: BioThunderbirdmon
BioThunderbirdmon.description: BioThunderbirdmon is a Giant Bird Digimon.

attacks.name: Thunderstorm
attacks.description: Releases a wave of thunder and electricity from its wings.

Birdramon.name: Birdramon
Birdramon.description: Birdramon is a Giant Bird Digimon. It has an appearance shrouded in blazing flames. Just like Meramon, it is a Digimon that was generated from the Internet's defensive "Firewall". It flaps its gigantic wings, and flies about the sky. Although its personality is in no way combative, it unleashes counterattacks against attacking enemies to a furious degree.

attacks.name: Meteor Wing
attacks.description: Flaps its wings and hurls its feathers like meteors.

attacks.name: Fire Flap
attacks.description: Engulfs itself in flames and tackles the enemy.

attacks.name: Mach Grinder (Mach Glide)
attacks.description: Glides and tackles the enemy.

attacks.name: Storm (強襲, Kyoushū, lit. "Assault")
attacks.description: Attacks fiercely from the sky.

attacks.name: Bir-Flame
attacks.description: Flame thrower.

attacks.name: Fireball
attacks.description: Shoots a ball of fire from its mouth.

attacks.name: Phoenix Rising (Phoenix Taze)
attacks.description: Shoots up into the air whilst its body is flaming.

attacks.name: Talon Tear
attacks.description: Attacks from the air with its talons.

BishopChessmon (Black).name: BishopChessmon (Black)
BishopChessmon (Black).description: BishopChessmon (Black) is a Puppet Digimon. It freely uses miracle techniques. As its attack range is very wide, it can strike at long distance enemies. Its catchphrase is, "Oh Lord, give me strength!"

attacks.name: Bishop Laser
attacks.description: Fires a long ray of light from its staff.

attacks.name: Bishop Cross
attacks.description: Annihilates the opponent with a cruciform magic square.

attacks.name: Magical Stick
attacks.description: Freely wields its staff in close combat to bewitch the opponent.

BishopChessmon (White).name: BishopChessmon (White)
BishopChessmon (White).description: BishopChessmon (White) is a Puppet Digimon. It freely uses miracle techniques. As its attack range is very wide, it can strike at long distance enemies. Its catchphrase is, "Oh Lord, give me strength!"

attacks.name: Bishop Laser
attacks.description: Fires a long ray of light from its staff.

attacks.name: Bishop Cross
attacks.description: Annihilates the opponent with a cruciform magic square.

attacks.name: Magical Stick
attacks.description: Freely wields its staff in close combat to bewitch the opponent.

Biyomon.name: Biyomon
voiceActors: (En:)Tifanie Christun(Adventure[10]/02[10]),Mela Lee(All-Star Rumble),Terrence Stone(Data Squad),Cherami Leigh(Adventure tri.)
Biyomon.description: Biyomon is a Bird Digimon. Its wings have developed to become like arms and it is able to dexterously operate them and use them to grip objects, but for that reason, it is poor at flying through the air. It usually lives on the ground, but when danger draws near, it escapes by flying away. However, since its flying ability is on the same level as Patamon, it sees Patamon as its rival. Its dream is to someday become Birdramon, who can fly freely about the sky, and it seems it doesn't want to become Kokatorimon, who cannot fly at all. As its personality is to be brimming over with curiosity, it loves to peck at the head portion of Tanemon.

attacks.name: Spiral Twister (Magical Fire)
attacks.description: Attacks with ethereal flames.

attacks.name: Violin Attack (ピヨリンアタック, Piyorin Attack, lit. "Chirping Attack")
attacks.description: Attacks with a tackle.

attacks.name: Hard Beak (硬いくちばし, Katai Kuchibashi, lit. "Hard Beak")
attacks.description: Pecks with its hard beak.

attacks.name: Turbo Pecker (ダッシュついばみ, Dash Tsuibami, lit. "Dash Peck")
attacks.description: Dashes at the enemy and pecks it.

attacks.name: {Peck Attack (ついばみアタック, Tsuibami Attack, lit. "Peck Attack")
attacks.description: Drills foe with its beak.

attacks.name: Double Fire Shoots two simultaneous spirals of ethereal flame.
Beak Attack (Kuchibashi Attack)
attacks.description: Pokes with a hard beak.

attacks.name: Charming Tweety
attacks.description: Charms the enemy with a cute chirp.

attacks.name: Phantom Fire (ピヨッチョボール, Piyoccho Ball, lit. "Chirping Ball")
attacks.description: Fires a phantom blue fireball.

attacks.name: Phantom Hurricane (ピヨッチョハリケーン, Piyoccho Hurricane, lit. "Chirping Hurricane")
attacks.description: Creates a large phantom tornado.

attacks.name: Ostri-kick (Ostrich Kick)
attacks.description: Flips into the air, kicking the opponent.

attacks.name: Talon Twist (Spiral Wing)
attacks.description: Surrounds itself with a vortex of wind that knocks away the enemy.

attacks.name: Bird Kick
attacks.description:
Flips into the air, kicking the opponent.
Aerial Bird Kick
Spinning Bird Kick

attacks.name: Biyomon Attack
attacks.description:
Covers itself in fire and dive-bombs the enemy with its beak.
Aerial Biyomon Attack
Biyomon Attack Special

BlackAgumon.name: BlackAgumon
BlackAgumon.description: BlackAgumonis a Reptile Digimon. It has grown up and become able to walk on two legs, and has an appearance like a tiny dinosaur. Because it is still on the way to adulthood, its power is low, but as its personality is quite ferocious, it doesn't understand fear. It has grown hard, sharp claws on its hands and feet, and demonstrates its power in battle. It is also a being that foretells digivolution to a great and powerful Digimon.

attacks.name: Pepper Breath (Baby Flame)
attacks.description:
Spits flame breath from its mouth to attack the opponent.
Kūchū Baby Flame (空中ベビーフレイム, lit. "Aerial Baby Flame")

attacks.name: Kūchū Baby Flame (空中ベビーフレイム, lit. "Aerial Baby Flame")
Spitfire
attacks.description: Shoots a ball of fire from its mouth.

attacks.name: Claw Uppercut (Uppercut)
attacks.description: An uppercut with its claws covered in green flames.

attacks.name:
Claw Attack (Mach Jab): Dashes forward, stabbing with its claws covered in green flames.
Mach Jab Combo
attacks.description: Uses Claw Attacks faster than the eye can see.

attacks.name: Mach Jab Combo
attacks.description: Uses Claw Attacks faster than the eye can see.

attacks.name: Flying Kick
attacks.description: Launches straight forward, kicking in midair.

attacks.name: Dangerous Kamukamu (デンジャラスカムカム, Dangerous Kamukamu lit. "Dangerous Chomp")
attacks.description: A powerful biting attack.

attacks.name: Dynamite Kick
attacks.description: A flurry of kicks in midair.

BlackAgumon X.name: BlackAgumon X
BlackAgumon X.description: BlackAgumon X is a Reptile Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Similarly to regular Agumon, it became a more ferocious Digimon due to the effects of the X-Antibody. Agumon's violent hunting of prey, in which it relies solely on its high offensive power and acts purely on instinct, can only be called a rampage and is a fearsome sight to behold.

attacks.name: Pepper Breath (Baby Flame)
attacks.description: Spits flame breath from its mouth to attack the opponent.

attacks.name: BB Burner
attacks.description: Spews out all of the fire stored in its mouth in one shot.

BlackGabumon.name: BlackGabumon
BlackGabumon.description: BlackGabumon is a Reptile Digimon. It seems its fur was made from collecting Garurumon virus type data. While a bit of a hooligan, strip it of its pelt and it becomes bashful and cowardly. Its true face is a secret.

attacks.name: Petit Fire
attacks.description: Breathes out a small ball of flame.

attacks.name: Little Horn
attacks.description: Attacks using a horn with the power of flames.

attacks.name: Horn Attack (ツノ攻撃, 'Tsuno Kougeki, lit. "Horn Attack")
attacks.description: Attacks using horns.

attacks.name: Gabumon Shot
attacks.description: Emit a small blast from the mouth.

attacks.name: Petite Fire (Blue Fire)
attacks.description: Breathes a stream of blue fire.

attacks.name: Ice Dash (Black Ice)
attacks.description: Dashes forward, leaving in its wake a trail of icicles that freeze whoever touches them.

attacks.name: Skull Driller
attacks.description: Drops straight down horn-first, stunning the enemy.

BlackGaogamon.name: BlackGaogamon
BlackGaogamon.description: BlackGaogamon is a Beast Digimon. Gaomon's physique has gotten larger, and its steadily growing claws are protected by gloves. "Black Digitron" was mixed in during its growth process, resulting in it taking on this black form. It is more resilient and takes less damage as compared to normal Gaogamon, at the expense of its speed.

attacks.name: Dash Double Claw
attacks.description: Approaches the opponent at a speed it can't see, then fires off an X-shaped wave by slashing its claws.

BlackGargomon.name: BlackGargomon
BlackGargomon.description: BlackGargomon is an Animal Digimon. It is a species of Gargomon, its specialty is ambushing the enemy in the dark. It excels more than a normal Gargomon in terms of tactics and combat strength due to the effects of the "Black Digitron" mixed into its body, and primarily specializes in taijutsu.

attacks.name: Gargo Pellets (Gatling Arm)
attacks.description: Randomly fires the vulcans on both of its arms.

attacks.name: Bunny Pummel (Dum-dum Upper)
attacks.description: An intense exploding uppercut.

BlackGarurumon.name: BlackGarurumon
BlackGarurumon.description: BlackGarurumonis a Beast Digimon. The blades on its shoulders are powerful enough to dice everything they touch to pieces. It loves collecting bones and burying them in the ground, but it seems that the tricksterDrimogemonsneaks off with them.

attacks.name: Freeze Fang
attacks.description: Bites with sharp icy cold fangs.

attacks.name: Ice Cannon
attacks.description: Fires a ball of ice.

attacks.name: Garuru Thrust
attacks.description: Kicks while doing a backflip.

attacks.name: Fox Fire
attacks.description: Breathes out an intense blue flame.

attacks.name: Ice Wall
attacks.description: An impregnable defensive wall created with its freezing surges.

attacks.name: Howling Wolf (Wolf Cry)
attacks.description: Howls a powerful shockwave.

BlackGatomon.name: BlackGatomon
BlackGatomon.description: BlackGatomonis a Demon Beast Digimon. An impressive virus type ofGatomonwith a pitch black fur coat, this pure evil child wanders the eerie darkness. The mutation of Gatomon that makes BlackGatomon is quite rare, and its population is pretty low. Both malicious and prideful, this messed-up Digimon loves bullying the weak. It's basically a dark type Digimon that Digivolved into a dark angel version of Gatomon.

attacks.name: Lightning Paw (ネコパンチ, Neko Punch, lit. "Cat Punch")
attacks.description: Uses its large claws to slice up the enemy.

attacks.name: Lightning Kick (ネコキック, Neko Kick, lit. "Cat Kick")
attacks.description: Quickly kicks an enemy.

attacks.name: Cat's Eyes (Cat's Eye)
attacks.description: A glimmer from its eyes charms the enemy.

attacks.name: Cat Tail
attacks.description: Uses its cute tail to slap the enemy.

attacks.name: Dangerous Love (Danger Love)
attacks.description: A dangerous charm to take control.

BlackGatomon Uver..name: BlackGatomon Uver.
BlackGatomon Uver..description: BlackGatomon Uver. is a Demon Beast Digimon. It is a BlackGatomon whose appearance has been changed by absorbing the data of a courier service that has flowed into the Digital World in recent years. Its nasty personality is completely gone, and the requested packages are devotedly and reliably delivered on any day. It is often seen riding on the back of its close friend, Pistmon, while performing deliveries. The delivery bag on its back can keep goods warm or cold in the optimum state, and since it can only be opened or closed by BlackGatomon Uver., it is safe even for confidential data. As for Digimon that get in the way of its deliveries, it eliminates them with its Signature Moves.

attacks.name: Lightning Paw (ネコパンチ, Neko Punch, lit. "Cat Punch")
attacks.description: Uses its long claws and attacks the opponent.

attacks.name: Bag Tag (バコーニャ, Bakōnya, lit. "Boxmeow")
