attacks.description: Hits the opponent with the corner of its delivery bag that it swings down. Even though it deals great damage to the enemy with its "Bakōnya", the contents of the delivery bag are undamaged, so it is very durable.

BlackGrowlmon.name: BlackGrowlmon
BlackGrowlmon.description: BlackGrowlmon is a Dark Dragon Digimon. It is called the "Jet-black Demon Dragon". Although it is fundamentally the same species as Growlmon, it has more of a Virus-species's nature, and is said to be the natural form of Growlmon. Unlike a Growlmon raised by a Tamer, it can roughly be described as having gone feral. BlackGrowlmon's roar is identical to Growlmon's, having the power to shake the solid earth, and before battle, it raises its voice to an offensive roar to intimidate the opponent.

attacks.name: Plasma Blade
attacks.description: Develops plasma along the blades on both of its elbows, then strikes the opponent.

attacks.name: Exhaust Flame
attacks.description: Spews out a powerful blaze with a roar.

attacks.name: Dragon Slash
attacks.description: Slashes upward with the claws on both hands.

attacks.name: Growl Claw (Grow Claw)
attacks.description: Attacks using huge claws.

attacks.name: Dark Blade
attacks.description: Attacks with an electrified arm.

attacks.name: Howling
attacks.description: Makes the enemy cower with a fierce howl.

attacks.name: Black Exhaust Flame
attacks.description: Breathes out a flaming inferno along with a roar.

title: Jet-black Demon Dragon
(漆黒の魔竜
Shikkoku no Maryū?)

BlackGuilmon.name: BlackGuilmon
BlackGuilmon.description: BlackGuilmon is a Digimon. It is a confident fighter, sure that explosive grenade attacks and smoky virus-infected breath will bring it victory.

attacks.name: Rock Crusher
attacks.description: Destroys rocks with its tough foreclaws.

attacks.name: Virus Breath
attacks.description: Spews out a virus-infected blast from its mouth.

attacks.name: Pyro Grenade (Fire Grenade)
attacks.description: Spits out a powerful, explosive flame shot.

BlackKingNumemon.name: BlackKingNumemon
BlackKingNumemon.description: BlackKingNumemon is Mollusk Digimon. It is a jet-black Numemon that has established its position as King of the dark trash data World and became an Ultimate. It carries a crown it picked up on its back like a shell, and also grew a moustache. As it is dignified, it tries to refrain from poop attacks which violate its dignity, but uses them on impulse.

attacks.name: Dark Pupil: Fires black beams from its round eyes. In Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth, Digimon Story
attacks.description: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory, Digimon Links, and Digimon ReArise it tosses all the of the poop stored in its shell.

attacks.name: Poison Mucus
attacks.description: Splashes a liquid that its mouth contains copious amounts of, makes the enemies' body smelly and sticky, and poisons it, causing insufferable pain.

BlackMachGaogamon.name: BlackMachGaogamon
BlackMachGaogamon.description: BlackMachGaogamon is essentially a black and gray-colored variation ofMachGaogamonthrough the infusion ofBlack Digitron.

BlackMegaGargomon.name: BlackMegaGargomon

otherNames.name: Ｂセントガルゴモン B-SaintGargomon

BlackMegaGargomon.description: BlackMegaGargomon is a Machine Digimon. A type of MegaGargomon specialising in attacking enemy territory, it is equipped with massive amounts of armaments. Although it lacks speed, it is able to utilise the heat-based weapons located all over its body to counterattack in all directions without moving an inch.

attacks.name: Giant Missile
attacks.description: Fires a gigantic megaton-class missile from the gun turrets on its shoulders.

attacks.name: Burst Shot
attacks.description: Volley fires its firearms.

attacks.name: GA Missile
attacks.description: Destroys with huge missiles.

BlackMetalGarurumon.name: BlackMetalGarurumon
BlackMetalGarurumon.description: BlackMetalGarurumonis an Android Digimon. It is a virusMetalGarurumonequipped with a cold-air system on its body. Once it targets its prey with the laser sight on its nose, it will maintain a lock regardless of friend or foe, and will unleash a terrifying missile attack.

attacks.name: Freezing Breath (Cocytus Breath)
attacks.description: Freezes an opponent with a breath of freezing cold air.

attacks.name: Garuru Tomahawk
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with a powerful missile.

attacks.name: Blizzard Wolf Claw
attacks.description: Launches every missile on its body at an opponent.

attacks.name: Metal Fang
attacks.description: A stronger version of Freeze Fang.

attacks.name: Metal Howling
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with a powerful howl.

attacks.name: Metal Grinder (Fire Wolf Claw)
attacks.description: Blasts sparks from its mouth.

attacks.name: Fire Wolf Claw (Burst Wolf Claw)
attacks.description: Shoots a guided missile.

attacks.name: Ice Wolf Claw
attacks.description: Shoots a guided missile from its shoulder that freezes its target.

attacks.name: Metal Masher (Metal Wolf Claw)
attacks.description: Charges forward through the air, trailing ice from its wings.

attacks.name: Giga Destruction
attacks.description: Charges up and fires a heavy, extremely powerful missile from its chest plate.

attacks.name: Ice Wolf Claw (Grace Cross Freezer)
attacks.description: Launches freezing missiles from all of the weapons hidden throughout its body.

BlackRapidmon.name: BlackRapidmon
BlackRapidmon.description: BlackRapidmon is a Warrior Digimon. It is a black form of Rapidmon made for night combat after "Black Digitron" was mixed into its body. Despite falling, its speed allows it to move without making a sound. Its ability to capture enemies with its ear-shaped radar remains unchanged, and it specializes in fighting in the dark, and it can be said to be almost impossible to win against BlackRapidmon in night combat.

attacks.name: Golden Triangle
attacks.description: Fires a beam from its whole body that disassembles the enemy's data.

attacks.name: Rapid Fire
attacks.description: Rapid-fires homing missiles from its revolver and both of its arms.

BlackSeraphimon.name: BlackSeraphimon
BlackSeraphimon.description: BlackSeraphimon is a black version of Seraphimon.

attacks.name: Seven Heavens
attacks.description: Fires seven super-heated spheres of light at the opponent.

BlackShoutmon X7.name: BlackShoutmon X7
BlackShoutmon X7.description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars: Super Digica Taisen. No official romanization available.

BlackWarGreymon.name: BlackWarGreymon

otherNames.name: ウォーグレイモン WarGreymon

BlackWarGreymon.description: BlackWarGreymonis a Dragon Man Digimon. Feared as the "Jet-black Dragon Warrior", it is a Virus-speciesWarGreymon. Although its creed and principles are the polar opposite of those of theVirus BusterWarGreymon, it exists for the sake of its own peculiar justice. It detests cowardice and foul play, and it doesn't consider itself a fellow of vulgar Digimon, even if they are of the same Virus-species. The full details of how it converted to a Virus are a mystery, and the "Brave Shield" equipped to its back is not engraved with theCrest of Courage.

attacks.name: Terra Destroyer (暗黑のガイアフォース, Ankoku no Gaia Force, lit. "Dark Gaia Force")
attacks.description: Similar to Terra Force, except that it takes all of the "negative emotions" within this world and concentrates them into one spot, then fires it.

attacks.name: Black Tornado (Great Tornado)
attacks.description: Creates a huge tornado.

attacks.name: Dragon Crusher (Dramon Killer) Slashes upwards with a Dramon Destroyer, sending a wall of fire at the opponent.
Dramon Buster
attacks.description: Drops straight down from above, stabbing with a Dramon Destoryer.

attacks.name: War Blaster
attacks.description: Gathers energy in its hands and fires a series of explosive green fireballs

attacks.name: Ultra Tornado (Black Storm Tornado)
attacks.description: Generates huge burning tornadoes around itself.

attacks.name: Dramon Tackle
attacks.description: Runs forward, charging into the opponent

attacks.name: Doramon Fire (Dramon Fire)
attacks.description: Shoots a small fireball.

attacks.name: Terra Destroyer (Gaia Force)
attacks.description:
Emits a high density heat energy shot.
Kūchū Gaia Force (空中ガイアフォース, Kūchū Gaia Force lit. "Aerial Gaia Force")

attacks.name: Kūchū Gaia Force (空中ガイアフォース, Kūchū Gaia Force lit. "Aerial Gaia Force")
Black Tornado
attacks.description: Spins at tremendous speed like a tornado and launches itself at the enemy.

title: Jet-black Dragon Warrior
Black Knight

BlackWarGreymon X.name: BlackWarGreymon X
BlackWarGreymon X.description: BlackWarGreymon X is a Dragon Man Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its negative power has been condensed to its maximum, and its cunning for seizing victory by any means necessary has been accelerated. It has imparted the strongest toughness of the "Brave Shield" to the "Dramon Killers", leading to it possessing perfected equipment of unified offense and defense. Due to its fighting style, in which it instantly plunges into the heart of the enemy with the vernier it has equipped to its back, which boast explosive acceleration at the expense of it being able to fly for extended periods, it has certainly become the strongest form of land combat Digimon, a "Land War Hero".

attacks.name: Dark Terra Force (暗黑のガイアフォース, Ankoku no Gaia Force, lit. "Dark Gaia Force")
attacks.description: Similar to WarGreymon's "Terra Force", except that it takes all of the "negative emotions" within this world and concentrates them into one spot, and then fires it.

attacks.name: Hades Force
attacks.description: Continuously fires its Special Move "Ankoku no Gaia Force" at ultra-high speed. Evasion of its "Hades Force" seems impossible.

attacks.name: After Burst (Afterburst)
attacks.description: Accelerates its attacks with its vernier applied to the "Dramon Killers". It is also a one-hit knockout technique.

title: Land War Hero

BlackWarGrowlmon.name: BlackWarGrowlmon

otherNames.name: Bメガログラウモン B-MegaloGrowmon

BlackWarGrowlmon.description: BlackWarGrowlmon is an Android Digimon. It digivolved from BlackGrowlmon, and like that Digimon, its Virus-species nature is expressed by its darker appearance, and it is called the "Black Destroyer Dragon". Its upper body has been metallized with the strongest metal, "Chrome Digizoid", and it is able to take flight with the two vernier attached to its shoulders. Also, since the cable-like object extending from the back section is extensible, it can be used to impale the opponent. It has the "Pendulum Blades" equipped to its arms.

attacks.name: Double Blades (Double Edge)
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with the Pendulum Blades.

attacks.name: Atomic Blaster
attacks.description: Fires an attack from both of the gunports on its chest that destroys the opponent on the atomic level.

title: Black Destroyer Dragon

BladeKuwagamon.name: BladeKuwagamon

otherNames.name: 刃古加獸 Jan Gu-gaa Sau

BladeKuwagamon.description: BladeKuwagamon is a Machine Digimon. It is an Insect-type Machine Digimon whose entire body has been weaponized. For a Champion, it is a rare species whose whole body has been turned into Chrome Digizoid. It has a habit of reacting indiscriminately to anything that moves, and it is said that when a swarm of BladeKuwagamon attacks someone, they will pierce even Mega Digimon all over their bodies and cause them to die.

attacks.name: Spark Blade
attacks.description: Turns into a blade of light and pierces with it.

attacks.name: Air Knife
attacks.description: Generates a vacuum wave.

Blastmon.name: Blastmon
Blastmon.description: Blastmon  is a Mineral Digimon. It is a super-heavyweight Digimon with a mineral body. It is clad in a hard crystal armor that regenerates when broken, and boasts a number of various, powerful techniques, so its slowly moving form is the epitome of an impregnable moving fortress. Because of its glittering body and power, it calls itself the "most beautiful, sublime creature."

attacks.name: Diamond Machine Gun
attacks.description: Fires off the crystals throughout its body like a machine gun, alongside an intense punch, can sweep through hundreds of opponents in one shot.

attacks.name: Diamond Hedgehog
attacks.description: Capitalizes on its hard body and great weight by curling up its body and rolling around. There is nothing that can keep its original shape after being squashed by that.

attacks.name: Crystal Breath
attacks.description: Absorbs sunlight into its body, then spits it out as an extremely high-temperature, high-pressure laser. Although it can only be used in daytime, the destructive power it displays more than makes up for its faults.

attacks.name: Diamond Tail
attacks.description: Uses its tail as a mace to strike the opponent.

attacks.name: Prism Fire Flash (極上ダイヤモンドテイル, Gokujou Diamond Tail, lit. "First-Rate Diamond Tail")
attacks.description: Slams its tail into the ground, causing a shockwave, followed by a rain of crystal bullets.

attacks.name: Atomic Super-Sized Punch (Final Zubagōn Punch)
attacks.description: Sunders the earth by smashing its fists into the ground.

attacks.name: Junjou Emerald Chop (純情エメラルドチョップ, Junjou Emerald Chop lit. "Naive Emerald Chop")
attacks.description: Performs a chop.

attacks.name: Janken: Gu (ジャンケン・グ, Janken: Gu lit. "Janken: Rock")
attacks.description: Punches with a mighty fist.

attacks.name: Janken: Choki (ジャンケン・チョキ, Janken: Choki lit. "Janken: Scissors")
attacks.description: Chops hard enough to leave a shockwave.

attacks.name: Janken: Pa (ジャンケン・ぱ, Janken: Pa lit. "Janken: Paper")
attacks.description: Punches with a mighty fist.

attacks.name: Kenran Crystal Volcano (絢爛クリスタルボルケーノ, Kenran Crystal Volcano lit. "Dazzling Crystal Volcano")
attacks.description: Explosively launches self at enemy.

BlitzGreymon.name: BlitzGreymon

otherNames.name: 電光暴龍獸 din gwong bou lung sau

BlitzGreymon.description: BlitzGreymon is a Cyborg Digimon. A Mega form of Greymon-species Digimon, it's a subspecies of WarGreymon equipped with electric weapons. Striking with the Plasma Stakes on both of its arms, it can destroy even the sturdiest of structures by sending a surge of electricity through them.

attacks.name: Plasma Stake
attacks.description: Attacks the opponent with the Plasma Stakes on both arms and breaks it down from the inner parts.

attacks.name: Thunder Vernier
attacks.description: Strikes down opponent with lightning from the weapon on its back.

attacks.name: Elec Guard
attacks.description: Releases plasma particles into its surroundings and uses them to erect a barrier around it.

BloomLordmon.name: BloomLordmon
BloomLordmon.description: BloomLordmon is a Pixie Digimon. It is a Digimon that is a plant clad in armor, it is a kind-hearted knight that fights to protect nature. It builds up energy by absorbing sunlight through the flower on its shoulder. The power it exhibits once that energy has been raised to its limit is said to even rival that of the Royal Knights. It has the ability to turn any foul weather into fine weather, and creates battlefields that always work to its advantage when out in the open.

attacks.name: Seed Belt (Multiple Seed)
attacks.description: Shoots countless seeds from the petals on its left shoulder like a machine gun.

attacks.name: Sprout Rush
attacks.description: Pierces the enemy with the flower spear it holds in its right hand.

attacks.name: Gran del Sol (Esp: Great of the Sun)
attacks.description: Fires a thick beam with a huge sword of light that appears from within its flower spear only when it has bloomed.

Blossomon.name: Blossomon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Kae Araki(Adventure),Tomohisa Hashizume(Xros Wars),Takeshi Kusao(Xros Wars, Pink)
Blossomon.description: Blossomon is a Vegetation Digimon. It has the appearance of a giant flower, with countless vines as its roots growing from its body. Despite its strange appearance it is very docile, and due to its personality it rarely appears before others. For a plant it has an unusually long life span, and although the petals around its body (or face, really) fall out whenever the seasons change, it has the special ability to grow back new petals. It hates arid regions, and always inhabits areas near the water.

attacks.name: Spiral Flower
attacks.description: Hurls the tiny flowers growing from its vine tips like they were shuriken. These flower petals can cut through anything, no matter how hard it is.

attacks.name: Leaf Darts
attacks.description: Flings its thorns at the opponents.

BlueMeramon.name: BlueMeramon
BlueMeramon.description: BlueMeramon is a Flame Digimon. It burns with even hotter flames than the Champion-level Meramon.

attacks.name: Ice Phantom
attacks.description: Inflicts burns on the opponent with super-chilled air by punching them with a freezing fist made of ice.

attacks.name: Cold Flame
attacks.description: Fires small ice flames multiple times.

attacks.name: Vision Blinder (Vision Bind)
attacks.description: Blinds enemies with bright blue flames.

attacks.name: Frost Knuckle
attacks.description: Punches the enemy with a fist made of ice.

attacks.name: Ice Bomb
attacks.description: Drops a huge ball of ice and causes a large explosion.

attacks.name: MP Magic (Mental Point Alchemy)
attacks.description: Absorbs enemies MP.

Boarmon.name: Boarmon
Boarmon.description: Boarmon is a Mammal Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Courage". "Reckless"; it is a Digimon that exists solely to embody this word, and its legs, tail and mane are shrouded in blazing flames. No one can stop a Boarmon stampede, and according to one theory, it is said that the program that governs Boarmon's thinking has no concept of "turning". Because the "Totsugeki Hitai-ate", made of Chrome Digizoid, is attached to its brow, all obstacles that lie ahead of it are completely smashed.

attacks.name: Nose Blaster
attacks.description: Releases a flaming snort through its nose.

attacks.name: Slamming Attack (弾丸アタック, Dangan Attack, lit. "Bullet Attack")

Bokomon.name: Bokomon
Bokomon.description: Bokomon is a Mutant Digimon. It is an old man-like Digimon wrapped in a haramaki. As a knowledgeable Digimon scholar, it possesses the Monoshiri Book (もの知りブック, Monoshiri Book lit. "Book of Knowledge"), which has things about the Digital World written in detail, but it barely ever shows it. As it's poor at fighting, it's usually boisterously lively, however, when push comes to shove, it's a surprisingly reliable being who instantly takes on a serious look.

attacks.name: Nigeashimou Dash (逃げ足猛ダッシュ, Nigeashimou Dash lit. "Wild Escape Dash")
attacks.description: Runs away at breakneck speeds on those occasions where it feels it won't be able to win the battle.

attacks.name: Monoshiri Book (もの知りブック, Monoshiri Book lit. "Book of Knowledge")

Boltboutamon.name: Boltboutamon
debut: Digimon World: Next Order - International Edition
Boltboutamon.description: Boltboutamon is a Demon Man Digimon. It is the vilest, most wicked Digimon through which the "Malevolent Fist" (Grudgeful Hand), born from the malice data that the Dark Area overflows with, served as the source of evil that caused Myotismon to be forcibly absorbed into Piedmon. It lacks Piedmon and Myotismon's sense of self, and acts according to the intentions clenched by the "Malevolent Fist". Those intentions are the eradication of light, so as to corrode the world with darkness.

attacks.name: Pernicious Waltz (Palazzi Valzer, (Ita: "Palaces' Waltz"): Multiplies the "Spiedini" (Ita
attacks.description: "Skewers") swords it carries on its waist using magic, and sends them flying. It takes pleasure in its methods of slowly torturing the enemy and causing them to be in agony, and finally ends their life by sending them flying from all directions simultaneously, calling it its grand finale.

attacks.name: Quartzione: The bullets fired by its two "Ala di Pollo" (Ita
attacks.description: "Chicken Wing") guns lodge themselves inside the enemy's body, attacking and annihilating them from within.

title: Demon Duke
(魔公爵
Ma Kōshaku?)

attacks.name: Palazzi Rentler (Palazzi Ländler, (Ita: "Palaces' Ländler"): Throws the "Spiedini" (Ita
attacks.description: "Skewers") at the enemy.

attacks.name: Frozen Mist
attacks.description: Fires dark mist at the enemy.

Boltmon.name: Boltmon
Boltmon.description: Boltmon is an Android Digimon. It is a prototype Digimon constructed at the same time as Andromon. Unlike the mechanically-based Andromon, the organically-based Boltmon possessed emotions, as well as power that surpassed Andromon's, but because it was difficult to control and ran wild, it was consigned to oblivion in the darkness. Due to their egos, the scientists who created this unfortunate Digimon denied its own existence, so it began wandering within the darkness of its sorrow.

attacks.name: Tomahawk Crunch (Tomahawk Steiner)
attacks.description: Easily wields the gigantic battle axe carried on its back, which is strong enough to smash its opponents into powder.

attacks.name: Berserk (暴走, Bousou, lit. "Berserk")
attacks.description: Throws a tomahawk at the opponent.

Bombermon.name: Bombermon
Bombermon.description: Bombermon is a Mutant Digimon. It is an explosion-loving Digimon and self-proclaimed "explosion artist." With its only concern being how to detonate its bomb in the most beautiful way possible, Bombermon has no regard whatsoever for any victims that may get hurt in the blasts it causes. By snapping the fingers on its left hand, Bombermon can create a self-detonating bomb called the "BB," which is short for "Brilliant Bomb." Under Bombermon's orders, the BB approaches targets, attaches itself to them, and finally detonates. The intensity of the BB's explosion changes depending on Bombermon's mood. When Bombermon is in high spirits, the bomb is more powerful. Bombermon uses different bombs depending on the battle scenario.

attacks.name: Combo Blast
attacks.description: Attaches multiple BBs together to set off a chain explosion. Though is not an especially powerful move, it is almost instantaneous in speed.

attacks.name: Limited Explosion
attacks.description: Detonates a single BB. This frighteningly powerful attack requires a set amount of time to detonate.

BomberNanimon.name: BomberNanimon
BomberNanimon.description: BomberNanimon is an Invader Digimon. Although it looks like a subspecies of Nanimon, who invaded from the Digital World of another dimension, the truth is unknown. As its name suggests, its whole body has turned into a bomb, and it seems that its body became a bomb as it continued to battle in the Digital World. Another feature is that the hair on its calvaria has become a fuse. It is a Digimon that belongs to the same category as Nanimon. It's very dangerous.

attacks.name: Free Throw Bomb
attacks.description: Throws infallible bombs.

attacks.name: K.O. Punch (爆・オヤジパンチ, Baku Oyaji Panchi, lit. "Explosive OYAJI Punch")
attacks.description: Unleashes a powerful explosive punch.

attacks.name: Powerful Punch
attacks.description: Punches with a punch full of powerful energy.

Bombmon.name: Bombmon

otherNames.name: ボムモン（2010アニメ版） Bombmon (2010 Anime Version)

Bombmon.description: Bombmon is a Slime Digimon. It is a short-tempered Digimon that easily blows its top at trivial things. As it loses its temper, its topknot steadily shortens, and when the topknot has completely retracted into its head, its anger explodes. Although it has several Special Moves, all of them have the power of a firecracker. However, because of its vivid beauty, it is often enjoyed as a party entertainment. It is a nuisance for Bombmon that it is provoked even though it is at a party.

attacks.name: Bomberhead
attacks.description: Heaps shock-waves upon the opponent.

attacks.name: Fireworks Revolution
attacks.description: Scatters particles of various colors.

Bommon.name: Bommon
Bommon.description: Bommon is a Slime Digimon. It has a bomb-shaped body. The fuse on its tail ignites the moment it hatches from its egg and steadily grows shorter, but because it digivolves to the next generation before the fuse disappears, nobody knows what will happen if the fuse goes out. It possesses a short-tempered personality, and it's said that when it gets in a bad mood, the progress of the fuse gets faster.

attacks.name: Bachibachibacchin (バチバチバッチン, Bachibachibacchin lit. "Crack-Crack-Crackle")
attacks.description: Suddenly produces intense crackles from the sparks of its fuse, surprising any opponent who sees it.

Boogiemon.name: Boogiemon
Boogiemon.description: Boogiemon is a Demon Man Digimon. Its body contains many evil spells but it is a prisoner, only capable of using a said number of spells. It emerges from darkness to ambush targets, attacking them from behind with its three-pronged spear.

Bosamon.name: Bosamon
Bosamon.description: Bosamon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved from Pyonmon. Its bangs have grown out, hiding its eyes, so it can now move around without worrying about others looking at it. Its shy personality has changed into one that is calm. It now has two long ears and its sense of hearing has developed. It is able to perceive sound in three dimensions, and listening to conversations between fellow Digimon from a distance has become its hobby. It has a lot of information about things that it has not experienced first-hand thanks to that. It hates fighting, and quickly detects the enemy approaching, and leaves the area. Even if the escape is blocked, it will hide itself while startling the opponent with its combo attack "Eardrum (ミッコミ, Mikkomi, lit. "Ear-strike")".

attacks.name: Eardrum (ミッコミ, Mikkomi, lit. "Ear-strike")
attacks.description: Slaps the opponent with its ears.

Botamon.name: Botamon

otherNames.name: 黑球獸/黑球兽 Hēi qiú shòu

Botamon.description: Botamon is a Slime Digimon. It was just born recently, and on the surface of its slime-shaped body, it has grown thick, black fuzz. It is unable to battle as it has just been born.

attacks.name: Bubble Blow (酸の泡, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubble-like objects from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

Boutmon.name: Boutmon
Boutmon.description: Boutmon is a Beast Humanoid Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved from the data of combat sports such as karate. It is a courteous sportsman who has learned the rules of every type of martial arts, and values ​​fighting in the game format its opponent wants. Although there is a wide variety of techniques used by Boutmon, non-existent techniques like those in fighting games as well as sports show up from time to time.

attacks.name: Lightning Heel (雷撃踵, Raigekishou)
attacks.description: Lands an axe kick into the opponent's skull with lightning.

attacks.name: Buden Blast (武電破弾, Budenhadan, lit. "Violent Lightning Destructive Shot")
attacks.description: Fires oversized energy shots from its held-out palms.

attacks.name: Storm of Blows (迅雷廻天戟, Jinrai Kaitengeki, lit. "Thunderclap Tide-turning Fight")
attacks.description: Dishes out a series of kicking and punching techniques without giving the opponent a chance to strike back.

Bowmon.name: Bowmon
Bowmon.description: Official romanization given duringDigimon Con 2023and used in the franchise.

Brachiomon.name: Brachiomon
Brachiomon.description: Brachiomon is a Dinosaur Digimon. It is a Brachiosaurus-like Plesiosaur Digimon that existed long ago. It is considerably heavy among dinosaur Digimon, so you'll be in for a world of hurt if you get trampled by its large body. However, because it is herbivorous and docile, it never attacks indiscriminately.

attacks.name: Brachio Bubble
attacks.description: Spits out countless bubbles to attack the enemy.

Breakdramon.name: Breakdramon
Breakdramon.description: Breakdramon is a Machine Dragon Digimon. It is a gigantic Digimon said to exist in order to destroy everything on the ground. When it digivolved, it successfully obtained the design data for various construction equipment through hacking, and it possesses power and ability surpassing other Machine Digimon. However, in exchange for excellent mechanical performance, its organic parts were reduced almost to zero, and its motives and emotions were lost. For that reason, it does not falter from the damage its body suffers, and it is feared as the ultimate dragon of destruction that will continue destroying until it rusts away. After Breakdramon passes, not even "What?" is left behind.

attacks.name: Destroyed Rush
attacks.description: Repeatedly strikes the earth at extremely high speed with its left and right shovel arms, allowing it to split the solid ground.

attacks.name: Tazer Strike (Infinity Boring)
attacks.description: Fires all the drills operating throughout its body, allowing it to smash mountains.

attacks.name: Gravity Crush (Gravity Press)
attacks.description: Raises its entire mass and then flattens its target, allowing it to crush anything. In Digimon Fusion, this attack uses a gravitational field for this function.

title: Ultimate Destroyer Dragon
(究極の破壊竜
Kyūkyoku no Hakairyū?)

BryweLudramon.name: BryweLudramon
BryweLudramon.description: BryweLudramon is an Armor Digimon. A Mega level Legend-Arms shield Digimon, its entire body is composed of shields and has taken the form of a dragon. By attaining the data of "legendary shields" from legends and video games, it digivolved to become a shield boasting absolute hardness, one that cannot be scratched by any attack. While appearance-wise, it seems to be made from Red Digizoid, the true extent of its hardness cannot be analysed. Bryweludramon has two standalone AI units, Gause and Fay, which allow it to see in all directions. Gause and Fay also possess barriers made from flames, and are able to extend the scope of their barriers to cover even Bryweludramon. Because Gause and Fay are capable of acting independently of Bryweludramon, no matter how far-separated they are, it is said that they are even capable of covering the entire world with their barriers. Although Bryweludramon may be the strongest shield, it seems that its barriers have been broken and bested before by its nemesis Durandamon. However, transformation is the most valuable asset of a Legend-Arms; should one wield Bryweludramon while it is transformed into a shield, no enemy would be willing to keep up their assault.

attacks.name: Guren Storm
attacks.description: Unleashes a blaze from its flaming wings.

attacks.name: Blast Smash
attacks.description: Detaches its wings, shrouding itself in a barrier of flame as it charges towards the enemy.

Blimpmon.name: Blimpmon
Blimpmon.description: Blimpmon is a Machine Digimon. A Vehicle Digimon just like Mekanorimon, it flies in the skies without a care in the world. Although its delicate balloon portion is protected by a metallic coating, it seems to still be under construction as its left flank is left exposed.

attacks.name: Zeppelin Explosion
attacks.description: Fires cannonballs from the two large cannons seated on its top.

attacks.name: Helium Bomb
attacks.description: Shoots bullets of helium gas and detonates them.

Bucchiemon.name: Bucchiemon
Bucchiemon.description: Bucchiemonis a Pixie Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Kindness". Owning a whimsical personality, it loves to have its head stroked and to share secrets with others, and can be found singing songs when in a good mood. However, it hates having its tail touched, and it will fall into a foul mood and refuse to listen to you if you keep trying. Its power isn't strong, but it has the strange ability to becalm its opponents. Furthermore,Bucchiemon of a green colorare known to exist, but their numbers are very low, so their presence is considered to be quite valuable.

attacks.name: Heavy Beam (Heartner Beam)
attacks.description: Releases a soft light that causes a loss of fighting spirit and soothes the hearts of its enemies.

title: Midsummer Night's Kindness
(夏の夜の優しさ
Natsu no Yoru no Yasashisa?)

Bucchiemon (Green).name: Bucchiemon (Green)
Bucchiemon (Green).description: Bucchiemon (Green) is a Fairy Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Kindness". Owning a whimsical personality, it loves to have its head stroked and to share secrets with others, and can be found singing songs when in a good mood. However, it hates having its tail touched, and it will fall into a foul mood and refuse to listen to you if you keep trying. Its power isn't strong, but it has the strange ability to becalm its opponents. Furthermore, the number of individuals of this green species is very low, and their presence is considered valuable.

attacks.name: Heartner Beam
attacks.description: Releases a soft light that causes a loss of fighting spirit and soothes the hearts of its enemies.

title: Midsummer Night's Kindness
(夏の夜の優しさ
Natsu no Yoru no Yasashisa?)

Budmon.name: Budmon
Budmon.description: Budmon is a Plant Digimon. Blended from the data of various poisonous plants, it has the form of a flower bud. Usually, it drifts through the air carried by its leaf, and doesn't attack as long as nothing happens.

attacks.name: Poisonous Thorns (ドクトゲトゲ, Dokutogetoge, lit. "Poison Thorns")
attacks.description: Attacks with thorns that are painful if touched. If it gets angry, it can also fire them off.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

Bukamon.name: Bukamon
Bukamon.description: Bukamon is a Lesser Digimon. Although it has an appearance which is thought to be the infancy of an aquatic dinosaur, it is a funny Digimon with movements as clever as the seahorse. However, the friendly personality it had as Pichimon has totally vanished, and it quickly flees if others approach. Its outer skin cannot yet bear the water pressure and low temperature of the deep sea, so the length of time it can dive to the deep sea is not long.

attacks.name: Air Bubbles (空気の泡, Kūki no Awa)
Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Fires pink bubbles from its mouth.

attacks.name: Froth Bubbles (シャボンの泡, Shabon no Awa, lit. "Soap Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits froth that looks like bubbles.

attacks.name: Acid Bubbles (酸の泡, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubble-like objects from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

Bulbmon.name: Bulbmon
Bulbmon.description: Bulbmon is a Machine Digimon. It boasts of one of the greatest sizes among vehicle Digimon. It is also able to load and carry as many as forty Digimon within its body, and transports them to strategic points. If attacked by an opponent while carrying, it possesses the power to repel them as much as possible.

attacks.name: Mud Pump
attacks.description: Dispatches soldiers one after another from within.

attacks.name: Octagon Attack
attacks.description: Tackles the enemy with its very hard body.

attacks.name: Barb Extreme (Valve Extreme)
attacks.description: Fires a powerful beam of condensed energy.

attacks.name: Force Rain
attacks.description: Fires a beam from a built-in cannon.

Bulkmon.name: Bulkmon
Bulkmon.description: Bulkmon is a Dragon Humanoid Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved via the data of a body composition monitor​ that measures muscle mass. It has a bellicose personality, and the power brought about by its unnaturally well-developed upper body muscles is top-class even among Champion Digimon. Its reaction speed is extremely high despite its large size, and it overwhelms its enemies with its tremendous power and speed. It is a hard worker, always continuing its training when it is not eating or sleeping. To deal with opponents that refuse to come closer it unleashes "Thunder Dread".

attacks.name: Electrical Fist
attacks.description: Sends the enemy flying with a blow from its electricity-laced fist.

attacks.name: Thunder Dread
attacks.description: Discharges the electrical energy stored in its horn.

Bullmon.name: Bullmon
Bullmon.description: Bullmon is a Mammal Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Hope". Its appearance is that of a fighting bull, and it possesses tremendous charging and destructive power. However, due to the fact that it is only capable of charging forward, and that it always charges forth at full speed, it is incapable of reversing or turning. Not only that, it has a fairly short temper, and a weakness in that it gets agitated the moment it sees anything red.

Bulucomon.name: Bulucomon
Bulucomon.description: Bulucomonis a Mini Dragon Digimon. Bulucomon resides in areas isolated from the outside world by ice. Its physical strength has been tempered by cold, harsh environments, allowing it to lift objects larger than itself with ease. However, because its body is made mainly out of ice, its body will shrink and its power will weaken when exposed to high temperatures. Due to being brought up in areas with small populations, they will tend to form very strong bonds even with Digimon of different species that they encounter. It is especially close toPenguinmonandGabumon. Bulucomon will melt and shrink with its power decreased likePaledramondoes when encountering enemies of the like ofMeramon.

attacks.name: Baby Hail
attacks.description: Exhales chilled air from its mouth, shooting out countless shards of ice.

attacks.name: Ice Smash (Ice Mash)
attacks.description: Attacks continuously with its outer shell of ice.

Buraimon.name: Buraimon
Buraimon.description: Buraimon is a Bird Man Digimon. It is the Champion form of Chicchimon, and its training pilgrimage continues as it carries out the wanderings of a vagrant.

attacks.name: Tsubame Nimai Gaeshi (ツバメにまいがえし, Tsubame Nimai Gaeshi lit. "Swallow Duet Reverse")

Burgermon.name: Burgermon
Burgermon.description: Burgermonis a Food Digimon. It is a Digimon that took in the data of various hamburgers. It enjoys serving hamburgers that it puts all of its skill into making to hungry Digimon most of all. It aims to start a first-rate hamburger restaurant that will bring in a lot of customers withEbiBurgamon. It is merciless to those who disturb others while they are eating, and drives them away with its "Delicious Patty".It is in a competitive relationship withPotamonover who is better when it comes to fast food.

attacks.name: Delicious Patty
attacks.description: Places the opponent inside a large, delicious patty and kneads them.

attacks.name: Green Pickles
attacks.description: Throws a pickle-shaped disk at the enemy like a frisbee.

Burgermon (Champion).name: Burgermon (Champion)
Burgermon (Champion).description: Burgermon (Champion) is a Food Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolves from Rookie-level Burgermon that are made up of carefully selected ingredient data and have a pure heart. It is a kind Digimon whose purpose in life is to cook, and serves other Digimon without asking for anything in return.

attacks.name: Spicy Onion
attacks.description: Causes the enemy to lose their fighting spirit with onion slices full of pepper.

attacks.name: Delicious Patty
attacks.description: Placing the enemy in a huge patty.

BurningGreymon.name: BurningGreymon
BurningGreymon.description: BurningGreymon is a Dark Dragon Digimon and an Ultimate-class Hybrid Digimon. It possesses power over Flame which bears the might of AncientGreymon. This firefighter has skin that can withstand high temperatures and the ability to move even through lava, and snuffs out flames with instant, explosive blazes. It is said that it was born from active volcano research data, and it is thought that it contains an immeasurable, unknown energy. The name of the fire dragon, Vritra, who is considered the nemesis of the thunder god Indra of Indian mythology, is embodied in its ferocious nature. The more heroic its tactics and the more powerful the opponent is, the more it burns with combativeness. It also has a reckless side that doesn't understand retreating, even in a disadvantageous fight. It wields the "Rudriya Darpaṇa" (रुद्रियदर्पण lit. "Terrifying Mirror") superweapons on both of its arms, and possesses the Fire Wings and Heat Claws.

attacks.name:
Pyro Barrage (Corona Blaster): Fires lasers that rival a solar heat ray from the Rudriya Darpaṇa.
Atomic Corona Blaster
attacks.description: Fires a prolonged barrage of lasers from the Rudriya Darpaṇa.

attacks.name: Atomic Corona Blaster
attacks.description: Fires a prolonged barrage of lasers from the Rudriya Darpaṇa.

attacks.name: Wildfire Tsunami (Flame Storm)
attacks.description: Sets its whole body aflame, then releases a high-temperature tornado by flapping the Fire Wings.

attacks.name: Fire Below
attacks.description: While airborne, fires the Rudriya Darpaṇa downwards at an angle.

attacks.name: Tail Whip
attacks.description: Quickly flicks its tail at the enemy.

attacks.name: Burning Grey Basher (Inferno)
attacks.description: Charges forward at high speed, covered in flames.

attacks.name: Wildfire Tsunami (Inferno Wildfire)
attacks.description: Unleashes a massive tornado of flame around itself.

attacks.name: Crimson Fanger
attacks.description: Performs a charging tackle.

attacks.name: Salamander Glide
attacks.description: Glides through the air, hitting anything in its path.

attacks.name: Drag Fanger
attacks.description: Performs a charging tackle while covered in flames.

Burpmon.name: Burpmon
Burpmon.description: Burpmon resembles a pig-like blob ball creature. It has stubby ears and feet, a pig’s tail, and two beady eyes.

BushiAgumon.name: BushiAgumon
BushiAgumon.description: BushiAgumon is a Dinosaur Digimon. A wandering super-swordsman—my name is BushiAgumon. The family crest adorning its chest is proof of its status as a super-swordsman, at least according to BushiAgumon itself, though there's no denying that its swordsmanship is first-rate. However, the meaning behind its 'super-swordsman' title is a mystery. It appears to excel at attacking at varied paces.

attacks.name: Chou Teisoku Ichimonji-giri (超低速一文字斬り, Chou Teisoku Ichimonji-giri lit. "Super Low Speed Straight Cut")
Chou Kousoku Ichimonji-giri (超高速一文字斬り, Chou Kousoku Ichimonji-giri lit. "Super High Speed Straight Cut")

title: Super-Swordsman

Butenmon.name: Butenmon
Butenmon.description: Butenmon is a God Man Digimon. It has mastered swordsmanship, and become an invincible samurai that could take on a thousand warriors. However, it is beginning to think that there are limits to saving the Digital World with swordsmanship...

attacks.name: Nichirin no Mai (にちりんのまい, Nichirin no Mai lit. "Dance of the Sun")
Gyoukou Issen (ぎょうこういっせん, Gyoukou Issen lit. "Dawn Light Flash")

Butterflymon.name: Butterflymon
Butterflymon.description: Butterflymon is an Insectoid Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Knowledge". Like Flybeemon and Honeybeemon, it is a mythical Digimon that was born due to the power of the Digi-Egg during a large Kunemon outbreak. It prefers living in meadowy areas with a warm climate. It hates conflict and has a friendly personality.

attacks.name: Sweet Honey Straw
attacks.description: Sucks the energy from the enemy like a bee.

attacks.name: Sweet Pheromone
attacks.description: Confuses the enemy by using a special powder.

attacks.name: Honey Wave
attacks.description: Emits a mysterious sound wave from its wings.

attacks.name: Sweet Kick
attacks.description: Attacks with a powerful flying kick.

title: Mesmerizing Knowledge
(魅惑の知識
Miwaku no Chishiki?)

Callismon.name: Callismon
Callismon.description: Callismon is a Synthetic Beast Digimon.

attacks.name: Deep Forest
attacks.description: Rams its claws on the ground, causing a small earthquake.

attacks.name: Rodeo Bullet
attacks.description: Fires bullets from the weapon on its right arm.

Calmaramon.name: Calmaramon
Calmaramon.description: Calmaramon is an Aquatic Digimon. It possesses power over Water which bears the might of AncientMermaidmon. It has a half-human, half-beast appearance, and its tentacles are used for offense and defense, doing things like attacking the enemy by rapidly spinning them, or guarding its body by converging them to form a wall. When it comes to the point where it is unable to win a match by attacking and defending with its tentacles, its body retracts into its mantle and it performs a powered up attack with its giant squid figure. The flexibility of its mantle is superior to its tentacles, so external physical attacks are ineffective. Although it is good at operating underwater or in the air, on land, it manipulates its ten tentacles skillfully and moves like a huge hermit crab. Its personality is sly and short-tempered like a witch.

attacks.name: Titanic Tempest (Titanic Charge)
attacks.description: Rotates like a drill and strikes her enemy after withdrawing into its body.

attacks.name: Acid Ink (Nero Corso, Ita: Black Course)
attacks.description: Sprays black acid from its mouth.

Calumon.name: Calumon

otherNames.name: デジ・エンテレケイヤ Digi-Entelechy

Calumon.description: Calumon is an Animal Digimon. It is a small Digimon shrouded in mystery that is unable to digivolve or attack, unlike other Digimon. As it is friendly and loves to play, it will appear from somewhere whenever there is fun to be had. It has a habit of adding "Calu" to the end of its sentences. Rumor has it that it possesses the ability to help other Digimon to digivolve. This is the "digi-entelecheia" (the power of digivolution) given Digimon form.

attacks.name: Shining Digivolution (Shining Evolution)
attacks.description: Releases the light of Digivolution to allow Digimon to digivolve to the Mega level.

attacks.name: Kurumon Prayer (クルモンの祈り, Culumon no Inori, lit. "Culumon Prayer")
attacks.description: Restore status and raise all resistance with prayer.

Candlemon.name: Candlemon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Tomoaki Ikeda(Frontier),Hiroshi Saeki(Frontier),Satoshi Tsuruoka(Frontier),Kazunari Kojima(Frontier),Yusuke Oguri(Frontier/New Century),Tomomichi Nishimura(Frontier, Village Leader)
Candlemon.description: Candlemon is a Fire Digimon. There is a flame on its head that resembles DemiMeramon, and if that flame goes out, it dies. Because of this, some say that the main body is the flame and that the wax is just a decoy.

attacks.name: Lava Loogie (Bonfire)
attacks.description: Fires a small flame from his DigiCore fire energy that explode if hits.

attacks.name: Paraffin Paralyzer (Melt Wax)
attacks.description: Fires multiple globs of hot wax to paralyze opponent.

attacks.name: Candle Ring
attacks.description: Emits an incredible beam of light.

attacks.name: Tackle (Tai Atari)
attacks.description: Uses its body made of hot wax to tackle the enemy.

attacks.name: Dark Fire (Yami Fire)
attacks.description: Attacks with a small ball of fire from the abyss.

CannonBeemon.name: CannonBeemon
CannonBeemon.description: CannonBeemonis an Android Digimon and a carrier of theX Antibody. It is a massive Digimon that defends the mysterious "aerial, covert honey base,Royal Base". The aerial base is exposed to danger from a full 360°, but with its "Sky Rocket ∞" technique, it can completely cover a vast range. The gigantic arms container on top of it boasts an innumerable amount of loaded ordnance.

attacks.name: Nitro Stinger
attacks.description: Fires a shot from its high-caliber laser cannon which can even shoot clean through strongly armored opponents.

attacks.name: Sky Rocket ∞
attacks.description: Fires a simultaneous bombarding barrage from the container on top of it, and continues on like raging waves until its watch is ended.

CannonBeemon (Aircraft Carrier).name: CannonBeemon (Aircraft Carrier)
CannonBeemon (Aircraft Carrier).description: Name used inDigimon Next. Base name romanized by theDigimon Reference Book.

Cannondramon.name: Cannondramon
Cannondramon.description: Cannondramon is a Cyborg Digimon. Cannondramon is equipped with long-distance cannons. Covered in tough armor, it greets approaching enemies with a swing of its tail.

attacks.name: DynamoCannon (Dyna Cannon)
attacks.description: Fires its cannons while stationed at an area where enemy attacks cannot reach.

attacks.name: Grenade Storm
attacks.description: Random-fires grenades from the gun on its front.

Canoweissmon.name: Canoweissmon
Canoweissmon.description: Canoweissmon is a Sky Dragon Digimon. It is a Digimon with large wings whose body surface has turned a high-purity white as a result of the flames of its blazing spirit further intensifying. It prefers fair play in both power and speed, and shows a joyful expression as the battle heats up. However, it will not permit injustice or unjust actions, and takes them on in a righteous manner by overcoming them. It is said that if it draws out power that transcends it limits during battle, its whole body glitters with white light, and becomes so bright that it can even be detected by Digital Worlds from other dimensions.

attacks.name: Galiafisher (Gallia Fissure)
attacks.description: Tears the enemy to pieces with its tough claws. It boasts the power to easily cut through Chrome Digizoid, if it has a low purity.

attacks.name: Dragonia
attacks.description: Closes its wings and charges like a bullet of light. Using its tough claws, Dragonia can even deal with long distances.

attacks.name: Meteorax (Meteor Lux)
attacks.description: The radiance from its spread wings rains down as a meteor shower.

attacks.name: Gran Nova
attacks.description: It gathers all the energy in its body and fires the brightest fireball from its mouth, enveloping the enemy in a scorching-hot star, even if they are a Mega.

CaptainHookmon.name: CaptainHookmon
CaptainHookmon.description: CaptainHookmon is a Sea Man Digimon. It is a heroic ship's captain Digimon that is relied upon to exert its leadership from a pirate ship that cruises the Digital World. It excels in the art of survival, but the duty to support its subordinates weighs heavily on it, and it knows firsthand just how difficult that is. Therefore, it not only crosses the ocean with gentlemanly conduct before weak opponents, and so forth, but is also skillful at making its way through the world. It isn't brutal enough to challenge one to an unreasonable battle, but if challenged to a battle, it will meet the enemy with all its power. The "Rage Giga Anchor" is equipped to its hand, and the "Leg Revolver" is fitted to its right leg.

attacks.name: Rage Giga Anchor
attacks.description: Expresses its intimidating air to its opponents just by holding up the Rage Giga Anchor.

attacks.name: Pirate's Punisher
attacks.description: Attacks with violent fighting styles that make free use of the Pirate's Punisher's steady-attack and gunfire functions.

attacks.name: Leg Revolver
attacks.description: Attacks with the Leg Revolver, which is suited for surprise attacks, but takes it upon itself to fire off a warning first.

Cardmon.name: Cardmon
Cardmon.description: Name used inDigimon World 3. No official romanization available.

CatchMamemon.name: CatchMamemon
CatchMamemon.description: CatchMamemon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a Digimon resulting from the digivolution of Mamemon after it was fused with the data from a file management software. It has a serious personality and an uncompromising side, and seems to think that managing Digi-Eggs is its duty. It is also capable of walking without needing to float, by using its arm parts as legs.

attacks.name: Magic Arm
attacks.description: Catches Digimon that would harm Digi-Eggs and changes them into stuffed animals with some strange power.

attacks.name: Miracle Bomb
attacks.description: Turns caught Digimon into bombs when its slots show three 7s. It attacks with said bomb, whose power depends on the strength of the captured Digimon.

Caturamon.name: Caturamon
Caturamon.description: Caturamon is an Exalted Beast Digimon. It is the "Dog" Deva, and serves the Digimon Sovereign Baihumon. As a follower of Baihumon, it looks after its fellow followers Makuramon and Sinduramon as if they were its younger brothers (as for those two, it appears they do not feel the same degree of obligation). Its sense of justice is strong, and it is unsatisfied when it can't make something clear in black-and-white. When all of its comrades are quarreling, it will sometimes serve as a moderator or presiding judge, transforming itself into the "Bǎo Chuí" (宝鎚 lit. "Treasure Hammer"), which is a gigantic hammer, and passing judgment over guilt and innocence.

attacks.name: Howl of Power (Śwabhojana)
attacks.description: Generates a massive earthquake accompanied by a shock wave by striking the ground with the Bǎo Chuí.

attacks.name: Howl of the Heavens
attacks.description: Releases a supersonic howl that can shatter barriers.

Centarumon.name: Centarumon
Centarumon.description: Centarumon is an Animal Digimon. It is a half-man, half-beast Digimon with a humanoid upper body and a bestial lower body. Its body is protected by a hard substance secreted onto the surface from its insides, and its right arm has fused to become one with its weapon. The ducts extending from its back spout high-pressure vapor, allowing it to move at near-sonic speed, though only for an instant. It has outstanding defense, attack, and speed. It is extremely prideful, and absolutely despises being ordered around or restrained.

attacks.name: Solar Ray (Hunting Cannon)
attacks.description: Uses the Hunting Cannon, which has become one with its right arm. It is near impossible to evade this attack. However, because this attack expends a large amount of energy, Centarumon avoids battle whenever possible.

attacks.name: Energy Ray
attacks.description: Fires a solar ball of light.

Cerberumon.name: Cerberumon
Cerberumon.description: Cerberumonis a Dark Animal Digimon. It is called the "Watchdog of Hell". The claws on its feet are hard enough to easily tear throughChrome Digizoidalloys, if they have a low purity. Also, its body is protected by a hard living shell, which has the ability to instantly repair any damage it incurs. The armor on its shoulders each possess sentience, and are able to instantly sense an attack coming from any direction, then report it to Cerberumon's central body.

attacks.name: Portals of Darkness (Inferno Gate)
attacks.description: Opens a "Hell Gate" engraved in the earth, then casts the opponent through it to the jet-black Dark Area.

attacks.name: Emerald Blaze (Hellfire)
attacks.description: Spews a red-hot jet of flames.

title: Watchdog of Hell
(地獄の番犬
Jigoku no Banken?)

Cerberumon Werewolf Mode.name: Cerberumon Werewolf Mode

otherNames.name: ケルベロモンジンロウモード Cerberumon Jinrou Mode

Cerberumon Werewolf Mode.description: Cerberumon Werewolf Mode is a Wizard Digimon. It is a mutant form of Cerberusmon, the Digimon known as the Watchdog of Hell (地獄の番犬, Jigoku no Banken) that lives in the Dark Area. It transformed into its current form to prevent the spread of data formed from human malice, which permeates the Internet in the form of both images and text, because it fears this data will have an adverse effect on the Digital World. As a result of its transformation, its body has been covered in an organic shell, and it can now walk on two legs. It also overwrote the data on its arms to allow it to crush any tainted data it finds using its powerful jaws.

attacks.name: Inferno Divide
attacks.description: Blast foes with firebombs at point blank range while it holds them in place, which it does by biting them with the massive heads on the ends of its arms.

attacks.name: Cerberus Erase
attacks.description: Cuts down enemies using a combination of dynamic movements and the claws on its feet.

attacks.name: Mad Dog Fire (Hellfire)
attacks.description: Unleashes a blast of scorching, hellish flames to reduce any foe to ashes. The destructive power of this attack is on a whole other level compared to that of the unmutated Cerberusmon.

Cerberumon X.name: Cerberumon X
Cerberumon X.description: Cerberumon X is a Demon Beast Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It has been confirmed that it acquired grappling abilities in order to bring down its targets more reliably. It uses its "Styx Killer" claws, which have sharpened even more, in its quadrupedal and bipedal forms for a variety of things depending on the battle situation, and uses them skillfully not just for attacking, but also for things like slashing, piercing, sweeping and parrying as grappling weapons. Roaming near the entrance to hell, Cerberumon takes on assignments with ease. However, it is a cunning and ferocious hound who turns even its clients into prey for its claws without mercy when its rewards are not good enough.

attacks.name: Mad Dog Fire (Hell Fire)
attacks.description: A red-hot jet of flames.

attacks.name: Inferno Gate
attacks.description: Opens a "Hell Gate" engraved in the earth, then casts the opponent through it to the jet-black Dark Area.

Ceresmon Medium.name: Ceresmon Medium
Ceresmon Medium.description: Ceresmon Medium is a Deity Digimon. Sitting on the head of the gigantic Ceresmon is "Ceresmon Medium", which serves as its true form, and is an avatar used to convey its will. It has practically nil fighting strength and so rarely, if ever, comes out in public on its own, but it is said that it will occasionally show itself unattended by the monstrous bird to those who earn its trust. Its personality is filled with gentleness and a kind heart, and it is said that it holds out the kindness of its "Karpos Hulē" (Καρπός Ὕλη lit. "Fruit Forest") to hungry Digimon, and shelters injured Digimon in its woods until they recuperate. However, it will reverse its attitude and bring terror as if a demonic forest to those who forget the blessings granted by the forests and land, and unnecessarily injure the trees or pollute the soil.

attacks.name: Karpos Hulē (Καρπός Ὕλη lit. "Fruit Forest") (Phales)
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with vines, poisoning them and draining them of their health.

title: God of Fertility
(豊穣神
Hōjō-shin?)

Ceresmon.name: Ceresmon

otherNames.name: ケレスモン（究極体） Ceresmon (Ultimate)

Ceresmon.description: Ceresmonis a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", Ceresmon is a monstrous, gigantic bird Digimon that carries on its back the "Karpos Hulē" (Καρπός Ὕληlit. "Fruit Forest"), a forest bearing theDigital World's greatest sweets and famous fruits. With a body composed of rocks and rich, fertile soil, Ceresmon's soaring form is definitely the epitome of an island floating in the sky. Sitting on the head of Ceresmon is "Ceresmon Medium", which serves as its true form. The unripe fruit from the "Karpos Hulē" has high concentrations of poison. However, the poison changes into high-quality fertilizer after several days, and then is reborn as a fertile land.

attacks.name: Island Freefall
attacks.description: Slams its huge body against the opponent, inflicting damage from the intense shock wave and vibrations around the area where it falls.

attacks.name: Burning Blood Shell
attacks.description: Fires a magma bodily fluid from its mouth as an enormous flame shot.

attacks.name: Fruit Flechette
attacks.description: Scatters the unripe fruit from the "Karpos Hulē" over a wide range, transforming its surroundings into a land of death with that poison upon impact.

attacks.name: Famis (Famēs, Lat: "Hunger")
attacks.description: Uses a terrifying technique that couldn't be imagined from its gentle appearance to freely manipulate plants and absorb all of the opponent's energy.

title: God of Fertility
(豊穣神
Hōjō-shin?)

attacks.name: Chaos Cannon
attacks.description: Fires several energy blasts from its back cannons.

attacks.name: Pulse Blast (Shaking Pulse)
attacks.description: Dolphmon's technique in which it fires ultrasonic waves from its back cannons.

ChaosBlackWarGreymon.name: ChaosBlackWarGreymon
ChaosBlackWarGreymon.description: ChaosBlackWarGreymon is a variant of WarGreymon in grays and silvers.

attacks.name: Giga Blaster (Giga Destroyer)
attacks.description: Fires a fish-shaped missile from in between its hands.

attacks.name: Terra Force (Gaia Force)
attacks.description: Gathers all of the energy within the atmosphere and concentrates it into one spot, then fires it as a super-dense, high-temperature fireball energy shot.

Chaosdramon.name: Chaosdramon
Chaosdramon.description: Chaosdramonis a Machine Digimon. It is said thatMachinedramon, who was built by combining the parts of many Cyborg-species Digimon, demonstrated abilities beyond imagination, and that the experiment succeeded. Adding enhancements to further improve that Machinedramon made it Chaosdramon, who possesses a deep crimson Metal Body. Its body, which is made of "Red Digizoid" that was repurified from the virtual super-metalChrome Digizoidand increased just its hardness, deflects every attack and destroys everything. Also, the version of the program that was set in itsDigiCoreautomatically performs improvements to make it even more destructive. Chaosdramon is also the Digimon that the leader of theCrack Teamprimarily employs as its agent.

attacks.name: Hyper Attack(Hyper ∞ Cannon)
attacks.description: Fires a superdreadnought-class energy wave from its two artillery cannons.

attacks.name: Destroyed Hook (Destroyed Harken)
attacks.description: Shoots an organic missile from its right hand, that injects a virus on the victim, making them melt.

attacks.name: Chaos Crusher
attacks.description: Smashes enemies into pieces with its powerful nails.

Chaosdramon X.name: Chaosdramon X
Chaosdramon X.description: Chaosdramon X is a Machine Digimon and carrier of the X Antibody. Although it exhibits several times the power and firepower compared to fellow Mega Machinedramon, it is difficult to tame due to it being destructive and autonomous, so it chooses its own user. By sacrificing its speed with the weight of its "Red Digizoid", it acquired its "Super Genocide Attack". Its suicidal and terrifying point-blank shooting is also possible thanks to its "Red Digizoid" body.

attacks.name: Hyper Infinity Cannon (ハイパームゲンキャノン, Hyper Mugen Cannon).
attacks.description: Superdreadnought-class energy wave fired from its two artillery cannons.

attacks.name: Chaos Crusher
attacks.description: Smashes enemies into pieces with its powerful nails.

attacks.name: Super Eradication Attack (Super Genocide Attack)
attacks.description: Seizes the enemy with the "Chaos Crusher" on its right arm, breaks open their armor, and launches organic missiles stored in a portion of that arm at their insides.

ChaosGallantmon.name: ChaosGallantmon
ChaosGallantmon.description: ChaosGallantmonis a Dark Warrior Digimon. It is another form ofGallantmonwhich has awoken to its instincts as a Virus-species. Its heart and thoughts are completely tainted by theDark Side,and it is nothing more than the "Digital Hazard" that brings calamity to theDigital World. According to one theory,Megidramonand ChaosGallantmon are the same being, and it is said that whether thatwave of terroris projected as a dark knight or as a dark dragon depends on the observer.It is clad in black, demonic armor refined from high purityChrome Digizoidjust like Gallantmon, and its right hand can become the demonic lance "Balmung" while its left hand can become the demonic shield "Gorgon". It is definitely a being set in opposition to Gallantmon.

attacks.name: Demons Disaster (Demon's Disaster)
attacks.description: Strikes with a powerful barrage of attacks from the Balmung.

attacks.name: Chaos Crusher: (Judecca Prison)
attacks.description: Fires a dark wave from the Gorgon which corrodes everything.

attacks.name: Spiral Wailer
attacks.description: Attacks with its lance Balmung as lightning spirals about the blade.

attacks.name: Gallant Charge (Duke Charge)
attacks.description: Charges its enemy with its glowing Balmung.

attacks.name: Falling Lance
attacks.description: Drops down from the sky, stabbing with Balmung.

attacks.name: Shield Attack
attacks.description: (Shield Destructor) Charges up and blasts the enemy with energy from Gorgon.

attacks.name: Walking Dead
attacks.description: Casts a huge sphere of energy around itself using Gorgon.

attacks.name: Chaos Shot
attacks.description: Unleashes evil energy accumulated in the spear.

attacks.name: Cruel Balmung
attacks.description: Uses the Balmung to inflict a strong blow.

ChaosGallantmon C.name: ChaosGallantmon C
ChaosGallantmon C.description: ChaosGallantmon C is a Digimon. It resembles an icy version of ChaosGallantmon.

attacks.name: Dark Hazard
attacks.description: Unleashes darkness upon three zones, inflicting Paralyze.

attacks.name: Call Leo
attacks.description: Summons a lion to cut two zones twice.

ChaosGrimmon.name: ChaosGrimmon
ChaosGrimmon.description: ChaosGrimmon is a Digimon. It is a form hosting the Chrono Core within Grimmon. Its outer appearance is humanoid, and is hosting holy power within the right half of its body and dark power within the left half.

attacks.name: Chrono DSR (Chrono Destruction)
attacks.description: Degrades and destroys any data in the Digital World.

attacks.name: Call Leyner (Call Rainer)
attacks.description: Summons a poisonous rain.

attacks.name: Multi Gatling
attacks.description: Fires a continuous spray of fiery bullets.

attacks.name: Call Machines
attacks.description: Summons clouds of nanomachines to attack enemies.

ChaosMetalSeadramon.name: ChaosMetalSeadramon
ChaosMetalSeadramon.description: ChaosMetalSeadramon is a variant of MetalSeadramon that is mostly black and white.

attacks.name: Energy Blast (Ultimate Stream)
attacks.description: Unleashes a devastating energy beam from its nose-cannon.

attacks.name: Brown Stinger (Deadly Sting)
attacks.description: Flymon's technique. Can poison the enemy.

Chaosmon.name: Chaosmon

otherNames.name: 混沌のジョグレス進化 Jogress Evolution of Chaos

Chaosmon.description: Chaosmonis a Unique Digimon. Normally, when aDNA Digivolutionoccurs, theDigiCoresof the two fellow Digimon are completely fused and are reborn as a new Digimon, but Chaosmon retains each of the DigiCores of the Digimon before the DNA Digivolution, and maintains its form in a very incomplete state. Chaosmon is the codename for Digimon who "should not exist," and, according to the "Central Dogma" of theDigital World, are absolutely impossible singularities (bugs). Due to its extremely unstable existence, its lifespan is very brief, and it is conjectured that its lifespan was shortened as a result of running the program that eliminates the bugs released by the Digital World's managing system. This Chaosmon is believed to be one that was DNA digivolved fromBanchoLeomonandDarkdramon, and the faces of each Digimon are visible on its arms. The "Ban-Tyo Blade" is equipped to its "Bancho Arm", and the "Gigastick Cannon" is equipped to its "Darkdra Arm".

attacks.name: Dragon Slash. (覇王両断剣, Haou Ryoudanken, lit. "Tyrant Bisection Sword")
attacks.description: Unleashes an invincible decisive stroke from the Ban-Tyo Blade.

attacks.name: Dark Prominence
attacks.description: Fires off its own digital cells from the Gigastick Cannon.

attacks.name: End of Paradox
attacks.description: Uses both hands to emit a ball of light.

attacks.name: Ban-Tyo Blade
attacks.description: Attacks using the Ban-Tyo Blade.

Chaosmon Valdur Arm.name: Chaosmon Valdur Arm
Chaosmon Valdur Arm.description: Chaosmon Valdur Arm is a Unique Digimon. Normally, when a DNA Digivolution occurs, the DigiCores of the two fellow Digimon are completely fused and are reborn as a new Digimon, but Chaosmon retains each of the DigiCores of the Digimon before the DNA Digivolution, and maintains its form in a very incomplete state. Chaosmon is the codename for Digimon who "should not exist", and, according to the "Central Dogma" of the Digital World, are absolutely impossible singularities (bugs). Due to its extremely unstable existence, its lifespan is very brief, and it is conjectured that its lifespan was shortened as a result of running the program that eliminates the bugs released by the Digital World's managing system. This Chaosmon is believed to be one that was DNA digivolved from BanchoLeomon and Varodurumon, and the faces of each Digimon are visible on its arms. The "BAN-TYO Blade" is equipped to its "Bancho Arm".

attacks.name: Bantyo Blade (覇王両断剣, Haou Ryoudanken, lit. "Tyrant Bisection Sword")
attacks.description: Unleashes an invincible decisive stroke from the BAN-TYO Blade.

attacks.name: Aurora Blaster
attacks.description: Fires a purifying shot of light from its Valdur Arm.

attacks.name: Trump Sword
attacks.description: Teleports its four swords, causing them to skewer the opponent in the following instant.

attacks.name: Trump Sword II
attacks.description: Unsheathes the swords on its back and throws them at the opponent.

attacks.name: Mask's Square
attacks.description: Unsheathes a black ball of energy from its hand and shoots them at the opponent.

Chapmon.name: Chapmon
Chapmon.description: Chapmon is a Lesser Digimon. It only lives in clear, beautiful waters, so it can only be seen in limited areas within the Digital World. It spends most of the day on the water's surface, and when it sleeps, it sleeps with only its face poking out of the surface. It has the sensitivity to detect the approach of opponents just from tiny movements of the water's surface, and will escape to a safe spot before it is found.

attacks.name: Foam Shower
attacks.description: Spits bubbles from its mouth to confuse the opponent, then flees.

Cherrymon.name: Cherrymon
Cherrymon.description: Cherrymon is a Vegetation Digimon. Woodmon digivolved further, and as Cherrymon, it is a Digimon that has acquired extremely elevated intelligence and power. Called the "Lord of the Deep Forest", it is a terrifying Digimon who tempts Digimon who have gone astray in the dark deep forest to go further and deeper into the woods, so that they will never break out of that forest. The fog it generates from its body displays illusions, tempting the opponent into the forest depths, where it uses its branches like tentacles and ivy to capture the opponent for its own nutrition. If you notice a Woodmon that has lived a long life, it is probably wise to fell it before it digivolves to Cherrymon.

attacks.name: Cherry Blast (Cherry Bomb)
attacks.description: Tempts the opponent with the fragrant smell of the forbidden fruit which grows from the branches on its head, but certain death awaits if this fruit is eaten.

attacks.name: Vine Attack (つた攻撃, Tsuta Kougeki)
attacks.description: Uses the vines growing from its body to attack an opponent.

title: Lord of the Deep Forest

Cherrymon (Mega).name: Cherrymon (Mega)
Cherrymon (Mega).description: Cherrymon (Mega) is aCherrymonwith a white mushtache wearing Christmas decorations. These decorations include red and yellow baubles, yellow Christmas lights, a bell with a red bow in the front, and decorations shaped likeMamemon,Pickmon,Starmon (2010 anime), andGiromon.

Cherubimon (Good).name: Cherubimon (Good)
Cherubimon (Good).description: Cherubimon (Good)is an Angel Digimon. As one of the "Celestial Digimon", it is the guardian ofGodand its wisdom.It has the appearance of a beast, and uses mighty lightning techniques, whose strike is thought to be divine punishment. Angel Digimon, which are positioned at the ultimate "Virtue", have the aspect of their being easily stained by its antithesis of "Vice" as a consequence of their extremity.

attacks.name: Lightning Spear
attacks.description: Fires a spear of lightning.

attacks.name: Heaven's Judgement (Heaven's Judgment)
attacks.description: Summons a gigantic thundercloud that looses innumerable thunderbolts on the opponent.

Cherubimon (Good) X.name: Cherubimon (Good) X
debut: Digimon Chronicle X, "Two Lights, and the Plot of Further Dark Evil" [20]

otherNames.name: ケルビモンX(善) Cherubimon X (Virtue)

Cherubimon (Good) X.description: Cherubimon (Good) Xis a Cherub Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. It accumulates endless light energy in its abdomen, and when Cherubimon hugs a pure Digimon, its true potential seems to be unleashed. However, if the Digimon has a wicked heart, their evil spirit is replaced by light and they revert back into aDigi-Eggfrom which they will emerge as a good Digimon. Evil Digimon that Cherubimon has given up on will be extinguished with "Biririn Hug You".

attacks.name: Lightning Spear
attacks.description: Fires a spear of lightning.

attacks.name: Heaven's Judgment
attacks.description: Summons a gigantic thundercloud, then looses innumerable thunderbolts on the opponent.

attacks.name: Shocking Hug (ビリリンハギュー, Biririn Hug You, lit. "Shocking Hug You")
attacks.description: Sends a shock to Evil Digimon that Cherubimon has given up on while hugging them. Their evil spirit is replaced by light and they revert back into a Digi-Egg from which they will emerge as a good Digimon.

Cherubimon (Evil).name: Cherubimon (Evil)
Cherubimon (Evil).description: Cherubimon (Evil)is an Angel Digimon. It has the appearance of a beast, and uses mighty lightning techniques, whose strike is thought to be divine punishment. Angel Digimon, which are positioned at the ultimate "Virtue", have the aspect of their being easily stained by its antithesis of "Vice" as a consequence of their extremity.It was once a member of theCelestial Digimon, but a virus caused it to turn evil,which led it to cast a spell transforming theSpirits of DarknessfromLoweemonandJagerLoweemonintoDuskmonandVelgemon.If Cherubimon (Evil) falls further, it's said it would become aDemon Lord.

attacks.name: Lightning Spear
attacks.description: Fires a spear of lightning.

attacks.name: Storm of Judgment (Heaven's Judgment)
attacks.description: Summons a giant thundercloud that looses innumerable thunderbolts on the opponent.

attacks.name: Terminal Judgment (Final Judgment)
attacks.description: An enhanced version of Storm of Judgment which increases the range and density of the thunderbolts.

attacks.name: Thousand Spears (Thousand Spear)
attacks.description: An enhanced version of Lightning Spear which fires multiple spears of lightning.

attacks.name: Lightning Blast
attacks.description: An enhanced version of Lightning Spear which greatly enlarges the spear fired.

attacks.name:
Cherubi Finger: Flicks the enemy with its finger.
Dash Cherubi Finger
attacks.description: Dashes forward and flicks the enemy with its finger.

attacks.name: Dash Cherubi Finger
attacks.description: Dashes forward and flicks the enemy with its finger.

attacks.name: Cherubi Mouth
attacks.description: Inhales the opponent into its body, either swallowing them in darkness or spitting them out.

attacks.name: Cherubi Press
attacks.description: Slams its palm down on an opponent.

attacks.name: Cherubi Hand
attacks.description: Creates a black sphere in its hands that sucks in enemies.

Cherubimon (Evil) X.name: Cherubimon (Evil) X

otherNames.name: ケルビモンＸ(悪) Cherubimon X (Vice)

Cherubimon (Evil) X.description: Cherubimon (Evil) Xis a Cherub Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. Endless dark energy has accumulated in its abdomen, and it has learned the art of manipulating darkness. Having been banished from its position as one of theCelestial Digimon, it is filled with envy from losing the ultimate "Virtue" and hatred towards the world for causing its fall to this state.

attacks.name: Lightning Spear
attacks.description: Fires a spear of lightning.

attacks.name: Heaven's Judgment
attacks.description: Summons a gigantic thundercloud, then looses innumerable thunderbolts on the opponent.

attacks.name: Darkness Prison
attacks.description: Expands its globe of darkness, eternally trapping the consciousness of anyone who comes into contact with it in darkness.

Chibickmon.name: Chibickmon
Chibickmon.description: Chibickmon is a Slime Digimon. It is a sociable, hardworking Digimon. Since they like to help their manager, before you even know what kind of work you're doing, a large number of them will appear to help you out. However, because it doesn't really understand the basic details of the work, even though it's trying to help someone, it just ends up getting in the way. Frankly speaking, because it will begin to sob if it is ignored or treated unkindly, it's a bit depressing. That's why, even if you think it really is trying to be a bother, it's important to praise it, even with a lie. To work hard and quickly join the Starmons is Chibickmon's dream.

attacks.name: Chinchikurinrin (チンチクリンリン, Chinchikurinrin lit. "Shorties")

ChibiKiwimon.name: ChibiKiwimon
ChibiKiwimon.description: ChibiKiwimon look like small, wingless birds on two legs whose mask dwarfs its face. Its design, like the associatedKiwimon, is derived from thekiwi(Apteryx australis).

Chibomon.name: Chibomon
Chibomon.description: Chibomon is a Slime Digimon, and as such, it is small and young. It is a small, blue-colored, Dragon Digimon child, and although it is small and powerless, it has the potential to digivolve to every Dragon Digimon. For that reason, it is a Digimon that is considered exceedingly valuable by tamers and researchers of Dragon Digimon. It is cherished due to its personality of friendliness and overflowing curiosity, characteristic of Fresh Digimon. Just like other Fresh Digimon, it spits acidic bubbles to attack, but as usual, their power is nonexistent.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (酸の泡, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acidic bubbles with nonexistent power to attack.

Chicchimon.name: Chicchimon
Chicchimon.description: Chicchimon is a Digimon. It looks like a chick, and it is still physically weak and not suitable for an actual fight.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

Chikurimon.name: Chikurimon
Chikurimon.description: Chikurimon is a Mine Digimon. It that lurks underwater or under the shade of rocks, and doesn't move around very much while it waits quietly in one place. Although it has a habit of attacking those that come near, it is never belligerent and won't attack those that stay away from it. Because it proliferates abnormally when the temperature exceeds 30 °C, Chikurimon can often be seen thickly crowded into lakes or around rocks with the coming of summer, and Digimon that come to drink water are often attacked.

attacks.name: Final Chikurimon
attacks.description: Sacrifices itself just as the name suggests, exploding itself together with the opponent.

Chirinmon.name: Chirinmon
Chirinmon.description: Chirinmon is a Holy Beast Digimon. It is said to be an ancient Digimon that was born at the creation of the Digital World, and it has been handed down through legend as boasting strength on par with a Mega, even though it is an Ultimate. Although it is a Digimon that possesses mighty strength, it deeply detests conflict, and it is said that it will never shed blood. Although it has a deeply compassionate personality that loves everything living in the Digital World, when it is up against a being that commits senseless killings, it is said that it will inflict merciless punishment.

attacks.name: Wind Cutter Sword (疾風天翔剣, Shippūten-shou Ken, lit. "Gale-and-Heaven Soaring Sword")
attacks.description: Abruptly swoops from the skies and runs through the opponent with the horn on its head.

attacks.name: Knowledge of Swift (迅速の心得, Jinsoku no Kokoroe)
attacks.description: Uses its fast movements to unleash clones and confound the opponent.

attacks.name: Holy Wave (改心の波動, Kaishin no Hadou, lit. "Wave of Reformation")
attacks.description: Flaps its wings to fire off its aura, which guides even its opponents on the path to holiness.

Cho Hakkaimon.name: Cho Hakkaimon
