Cho Hakkaimon.description: Cho Hakkaimon is a Puppet Digimon. It is a feminine Digimon clothed in a pig costume. It was originally an Angel-species Digimon, but it committed a crime that incurred the wrath of Ophanimon and was banished from heaven, and that's when it took on its current appearance. As it is normally optimistic, it doesn't mind that it was changed into this appearance, and it has a very cheerful personality, but if it gets hungry it will be voracious enough to start getting all worked up, and it will take on a ferocious personality. If it becomes starved, it will go completely out of control. Cho Hakkaimon's "Roketto Dīng​pá" (炉傑塔釘鈀 lit. "Rocket Rake") weapon is equipped with boosters, and combined with its superhuman strength, its power is tremendous. Because it wants to change its ferocious personality, it seeks to reform itself by going on a journey.

attacks.name: Home Run Blast (強振砲舞乱, Kyoushin Hōmuran, lit. "Hard-swung Homerun")
attacks.description: Swings the Roketto Dīng​pá with its acceleration at full-throttle, blowing the opponent into the distance.

attacks.name: Strike, Strike, Strike, Mince (打々々魅飲血, Dadada Minchi)
attacks.description: Showers the opponent in a high-speed barrage using the Roketto Dīng​pá, crushing them appallingly flat.

attacks.name: Pig Roast (豚ノ丸焼, Buta-no-Maruyak, lit. "Roast of the Pig")
attacks.description: Embraces the opponent with its body, which has burst into flames from the fury of its hunger, roasting them well-done.

attacks.name: Dreadful Night (Dread Night)
attacks.description: Unleashes nightmares on one zone, draining life.

attacks.name: Holy Flare
attacks.description: Annihilates one zone with a pillar of light.

attacks.name: Vanishing Touch (Dark Vanish)
attacks.description: Devastates three zones with dark energy.

attacks.name: Avenger (Cool Avenger)
attacks.description: Increases own speed.

attacks.name: Sacred Game (Pray of God)
attacks.description: Prays to heal one zone with sacred light.

attacks.name: Power Sucker (Power Sink)
attacks.description: Uses dark power to decrease attack in one zone.

attacks.name: Gusty Blade (Wind Blade)
attacks.description: Slices one zone with a wind blade.

attacks.name: Ghoulish Bind (Ghoul Bind)
attacks.description: Binds one zone with dark power, inflicting Paralyze.

attacks.name: Corona
attacks.description: Immolates all zones in fire.

attacks.name: Finger Bomb
attacks.description: Launches a bomb into one zone.

attacks.name: Venom Ball (Poison Hole)
attacks.description: Sends poison into one zone, inflicting Poison.

Chronomon Holy Mode.name: Chronomon Holy Mode
Chronomon Holy Mode.description: Chronomon Holy Mode is an Ultra Level Digimon. It is a legendary Digimon born from the YMIR Project. It can only go into Holy Mode when it digivolves with the power of holy light.

attacks.name: Holy Flare
attacks.description: Blasts with holy power.

Chrysalimon.name: Chrysalimon
Chrysalimon.description: Chrysalimon is an Unidentified Digimon. The Rookie Keramon will go into a chrysalis-like state in order to digivolve into a stronger Digimon, and once it does so, it conserves its energy. For that reason, it is completely unable to move, but it is protected by its tough shell, and can attack the opponent with the tentacles extending from its back. In some cases, it can digivolve to Ultimate without becoming a Champion, but it is able to digivolve to a stronger Ultimate by digivolving to Chrysalimon.

attacks.name: Data Crusher
attacks.description: Destroys the opponent's configuration data with the tentacles extending from its back.

attacks.name: Misconnecting
attacks.description: Flies up in the air and squashes the enemy with its huge body.

Chuumon.name: Chuumon
Chuumon.description: Chuumon is an Animal Digimon. It is a rat-like Digimon that is always feeding Sukamon with unscrupulous thoughts. It has forged a strong friendship with Sukamon (that said, it might be only Chuumon that thinks this?), after a past incident where Chuumon was caught in a Carnivore system trap placed on the Network, and was saved by Sukamon who just happened to be passing by. While it is generally cowardly, its cunning is unparalleled and it will dash away to safety at the first sign of danger. Chuumon does not fight and is always coaxing Sukamon into performing bad deeds.

attacks.name: Cheese Bomb (チーズ爆弾, Cheese Bomb)
attacks.description: Throws a cheese-shaped bomb. Mistakenly eating it will result in the unthinkable.

attacks.name: Tell a Lie
attacks.description: Whispers words to make the enemy lose the will to fight.

attacks.name: Friendly Junk Attack (友情のウンチ投げ, Yūjou no Unchi Nage, lit. "Friendly Poop Throw")
attacks.description: Throws a pile of junk.

attacks.name: Crunchy Munchy (ガシガシ, Gashigashi, lit. "Boisterousness")
attacks.description: Munches on the enemy with its huge front teeth.

ClavisAngemon.name: ClavisAngemon
ClavisAngemon.description: ClavisAngemon is a Virtue Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody It is an Angel Digimon which protects the "Zenith Gate" between the Digital World and the outside world. The "Zenith Gate" is sealed by means of 360 doors, and "The Key" held by ClavisAngemon is used as the master key to every door. "The Key" is a special key that only ClavisAngemon can handle, so one can say that ClavisAngemon itself is a part of the key. It is said that, through the power placed in the key, it is able to use enough offensive power to collapse the Digital World, but only on enemies that try to break through the doors.

attacks.name: The Key
attacks.description: Seals the target's existence in a crystal. Can also be used to seal an attack.

attacks.name: Unlock
attacks.description: Unseals a sealed target. Can be used to redirect opponent's attacks.

ClearAgumon.name: ClearAgumon
ClearAgumon.description: ClearAgumon is a Puppet Digimon. It is a subspecies of ToyAgumon whose whole body is made up of unique, clear plastic blocks. It is a very rare Digimon, and is said to have been created by a child just like ToyAgumon, but is difficult to find, and it has been estimated that the likelihood of doing so is one thousandth that of ToyAgumon. Its personality is just like ToyAgumon's, and despite being cowardly, it possesses a heart of justice that cannot turn a blind eye to evil.

attacks.name: Pepper Breath (Baby Flame)
attacks.description: Spits flame breath from its mouth to attack the opponent.

attacks.name: Dream Missile
attacks.description: Launches a toy missile from its mouth. In Digimon World Data Squad, it fires a missile from its hand.

attacks.name: Precious Flame (Precious Flare)
attacks.description: Spits out a toy flame. In Digimon World Data Squad, it breathes out numerous flames made from blocks.

attacks.name: Wonder Light (Wonder Illumina)
attacks.description: Throws a glowing block to startle the enemy.

attacks.name: Small HP Cure (Petit Heal)
attacks.description: Heals itself or an ally.

attacks.name: Marion Punch (Mullion Punch)
attacks.description: A spinning flaming punch.

Climbmon.name: Climbmon
Climbmon.description: Climbmonis an Insectoid Digimon. It digivolved viaboulderingcourse data. The pickaxes on its arms are used not only for piercing things such as cliffs, but also for tapping and driving thekunai-shapedpitonsit carries in the underside of its wings into sturdy rocks. Skilfully using its pickaxes and pitons, it clings onto any dangerous spot, and moves quickly and brilliantly like a ninja. It specializes in ambush tactics.

attacks.name: Mimetic Isolation (擬遁アイソレーション, Giton Isolation, lit. "False Escape Isolation")
attacks.description: Blends itself into its surroundings then creeps up stealthily on the enemy.

attacks.name: Piton Strike (クラックハーケン, Crack Haken, lit. "Crack Piton")
attacks.description: A long-range attack in which it throws its pitons.

attacks.name: Dynamic Scyther
attacks.description: Spreads out its pickaxe arms and tears the enemy to pieces while spinning.

Clockmon.name: Clockmon
Clockmon.description: Clockmon is a Machine Digimon. It is the protector of time that governs the computer's timer. It manages the "Time" and "Space" of all computers and networks, and if it is between 1900 and 1999, it is able to freely advance and rewind time. Because it possesses an extremely dangerous, terrifying ability, it always maintains a neutral standpoint, and doesn't participate in the conflict between Vaccines and Viruses. For that reason, it is said that if it ever tilts toward either side of the balance, the Digital World will collapse.

attacks.name: Chrono Breaker
attacks.description: Destroys the "time" flowing through the opponent's body. It is impossible for a Digimon whose "time" was frozen with this attack to recover.

Coelamon.name: Coelamon
Coelamon.description: Coelamon is an Ancient Fish Digimon. It possesses gigantic talons and a hard outer skin. When the Computer Network was being repaired after being disrupted by a malicious hacker, this Digimon was discovered in the Net Ocean, and as its body structure is extremely primitive, it has fins that have developed like hands and feet. Based on this fact, it is conjectured that primeval Digimon that originated in the Net Ocean experienced many digivolutions and took on terrestrial forms, and increased their numbers into various strains.

attacks.name: Fossil Bite (Variable Darts)
attacks.description: Falls upon the opponent with its gigantic talons.

attacks.name: Ancient Bite (かみつき, Kamitsuki, lit. "Bite")
Water Wave
attacks.description: Attacks with a big tsunami.

Commandramon.name: Commandramon
Commandramon.description: Commandramon is an infantry Digimon belonging to the mechanized "D-Brigade". The "D-Brigade" is a mechanized brigade composed of Dragon type Cyborg Digimon, and the missions assigned to this special force are never made public. The surface of Commandramon's skin has been modified with a special texture that detects its surrounding colors in real-time, and is capable of displaying a variety of camouflage patterns. As a result, it is said that most of Commandramon's 'targets' do not even notice Commandramon's presence before being silenced.

attacks.name: M16 Assassin
attacks.description: Fires from its assault rifle.

attacks.name: DCD Bomb
attacks.description: Throws a small bomb at its foes.

Conomon.name: Conomon
Conomon.description: Conomon is a Slime Digimon. Conomon and Zerimon are extremely rare Digimon which are born in pairs from a single Digi-Egg. The reason why only Zerimon and Conomon are born as twins is unclear at the present stage. Moreover, they are not restricted to always being born as twins, and either a Zerimon or Conomon may be born from a single Digi-Egg. Compared to the extremely energetic, one-horned Zerimon, the three-horned Conomon has a relatively docile personality. Like other Fresh Digimon, it spits acid bubbles to intimidate opponents.

attacks.name: Acid Bubbles (酸の泡, San no Awa)
attacks.description: Spits acid bubbles to intimidate opponents.

Coredramon (Blue).name: Coredramon (Blue)
Coredramon (Blue).description: Coredramon (Blue) is a Dragon Digimon. It is the digivolved form of the Dracomon who assimilates plenty of "Blue Diamante", a rare gem mined from mountainous regions with very high altitudes. For them to live on steep mountains, they have grown wings and can fly at a high speed. Digimon having "-dramon" in their names must contain dragon-gene data (dragon DNA) in their DigiCores. The higher the ratio of dragon DNA, the more the body shape is like a dragon type. Having a dragon DNA ratio of 100%, Coredramon is a pure-blooded Dragon Digimon.

attacks.name: Blue Flare Breath
attacks.description: Fires a stream of blue flaming breath from its mouth. It can decompose the texture data on the body surface, therefore the Digimon receiving this attack becomes bare, allowing attacks towards the digicore.

attacks.name: Strike Bomber
attacks.description: Uses its tail to slam its opponent.

attacks.name: G Shurunen II
attacks.description: Similar to Dracomon's G Shurunen attack, when its "gekirin" is touched, its horns glow and it fires diffusing laser beams indiscriminately from its mouth.

Coredramon (Green).name: Coredramon (Green)
Coredramon (Green).description: Coredramon (Green) is a Dragon Digimon. It is the digivolved form of the Dracomon who assimilates plenty of "Green Malachite", a rare gem mined from forest areas thickly wooded with trees over a hundred years old. This type of Coredramon is not good at flying, but the strength of their legs is highly-developed. You cannot imagine how fast they can run, with such a body. Digimon having "-dramon" in their names must contain dragon-gene data (dragon DNA) in their DigiCores. The higher the ratio of dragon DNA, the more the body shapes like a dragon type. Having a dragon DNA ratio of 100%, Coredramon is a pure-blooded Dragon Digimon.

attacks.name: Green Flare Breath
attacks.description: Fires a stream of green flaming breath from its mouth. Its penetration is so high, that it can pass through the texture data of the body surface and directly give digicore damages.

attacks.name: Strike Bomber
attacks.description: Uses its tough tail to slam its opponent deeply.

attacks.name: G Shurunen II
attacks.description: Similar to Dracomon's G Shurunen attack, when its "gekirin" is touched, its horns glow and it fires diffusing laser beams indiscriminately from its mouth.

Coronamon.name: Coronamon
Coronamon.description: Coronamon is a Beast Digimon. It was born from the fusion of sun-watching data. It has an innocent personality due to its sense of justice being powerfully sincere.

attacks.name: Corona-knuckle
attacks.description: Releases continuous punches with its fists heated by the power of flame.

attacks.name: Corona Flame
attacks.description: Concentrates the power of flame in its brow while exhausting all of its body's stamina, then fires it at the opponent as a flaming shot.

attacks.name: Petit Prominence
attacks.description: Clads its body in flames, and either defends itself or rams the opponent.

attacks.name: Holy Shoot
attacks.description: Causes an explosion with a small ball of light.

Copymon.name: Copymon
Copymon.description: Copymon is a small black and white Digimon. It is small, to represent compressed data, and very generic, to make it representative of any Digimon.

Cotsucomon.name: Cotsucomon
Cotsucomon.description: Cotsucomon is an Armor Digimon. It was born wearing a leather cap. Compared to ordinary Freshes, it looks strong due to the fact it has armor, but its defensive ability is not very great because of the comparatively soft material. Its personality is hypervigilant, and it immediately buries itself in its cap.

attacks.name: Knock (コッツン, Kottsun, lit. "Tapping")
attacks.description: Pokes the opponent with the brim of its cap.

Crabmon.name: Crabmon
Crabmon.description: Crabmonis a Crustacean Digimon. It stuck the metal data dissolved in theNet Oceanto its body, rapidly enhancing its combat ability. It attacks with the gigantic blade on its left foreleg and the grip of its strong right foreleg and defends with the spine-covered shell that covers itself, inflicting damage to attacking opponents, so it's a confident person with substantial self-confidence in battle. Its weak point is the soft spot on its belly, but because it's also aware of that, it never shows that chink in its armor. It likes to entrap its opponents, and has a rascally personality.Crabmon have been witnessed trimming the coral extending fromSangomon's head.

attacks.name: Scissor Magic (Scissors Execution)
attacks.description: Aims its left foreleg at the opponent's neck.

attacks.name: Water Shot
attacks.description: Attacks with a bursting stream of water.

Crabmon X.name: Crabmon X
Crabmon X.description: Crabmon X is a Crustacean Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Having survived in the intensely competitive Net Ocean, Crabmon stuck the metal data dissolved in the Ocean to its nimble body, and gained the ability to instantly restore parts of it that are damaged without leaving any chinks. Because it repeatedly repairs the damage to its shell, its appearance may differ slightly depending on the individual. By capitalizing on its heavy body, it acquired its Signature Move "Heavy Crunch".

attacks.name: Scissors Execution
attacks.description: Aims its left foreleg at the opponent's neck.

attacks.name: Heavy Crunch
attacks.description: Weighs down the opponent and clamps them with its pincers.

Craniamon.name: Craniamon
Craniamon.description: Craniamon is a Holy Knight Digimon. It is the one that best understands decorum among the Royal Knights. It is a perfectionist, and competes with the other Royal Knights for the top two mission completion rates for King Drasil's orders. When fighting with an opponent, its policy is always to defeat it with one-on-one combat, and if the opponent is a formidable enemy, its delight is supreme. Craniamon's armor had its code modified by King Drasil, and was changed into Black Digizoid. It has become possible for it to generate its "Duo Solar Spear" (Claíomh Solais) and "Omni Shield" (Avalon) from its armor by accessing its data.

attacks.name: Shock Ringer (End Waltz)
attacks.description: Fires a sonic wave at supersonic speeds by rotating the Duo Solar Spear at high speeds, causing the opponent to "Dance" until their data is pulverized by the shock wave.

attacks.name: Power of Breath (God Bless)
attacks.description: Uses the Omni Shield to defend in every direction with an impregnable wall, allowing it to negate any attack for just three seconds.

Craniamon X.name: Craniamon X
Craniamon X.description: Craniamon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The Black Digizoid covering its whole body has become even sturdier, such that regular attacks inflict damage back upon the attacker rather than injuring Craniamon itself. Also, it has stowed the strongest magic shield "Avalon" on its back to show off its confidence in not needing to use it.

attacks.name: Heodenings Waltz (Hjaðningar Waltz)
attacks.description: Spins its "Kyukyoku Senjuken Dáinsleif", transformed from its magic spear "Claíomh Solais", at the speed of light, reducing targets within a 3 km radius to ash.

attacks.name: Grand Gríðr
attacks.description: Removes the blades on both of its arms and throws them as tomahawks.

attacks.name: Kyukyoku Senjuken Dáinsleif (究極戦十剣ダインスレイヴ, Kyūkyoku Senjūken Dainsureivu, lit. "Ultimate-Battle-Crossblade Dáinsleif")

Crescemon.name: Crescemon
Crescemon.description: Crescemon is a Demon Man Digimon. Crescemon has a flexible body, allowing it to perform nimble movements as it attacks its enemies. It excels in battling elegantly, and its power is said to double when it is exposed to moonlight. It is also capable of combining its two Nova Luna weapons to transform it into a bowgun.

attacks.name: Lunatic Dance
attacks.description: Entrances the enemy with its dance-like steps, after which it finds an opening and slashes with the weapons, Nova Luna, that it wields in both hands.

attacks.name: Ice Archery
attacks.description: Fires an arrow of ice.

attacks.name: Dark Archery
attacks.description: Fires an arrow made from dark energy.

CresGarurumon.name: CresGarurumon
CresGarurumon.description: CresGarurumon is a Beast Knight Digimon. A final form of Garurumon. Unlike ZeedGarurumon, another final form, it's a sub-species of MetalGarurumon taking on a humanoid form. Donning armor made of golden Chrondigizoit that deflects attacks, it excels in swordplay, using the Yellow Beast Crescent Blade (黄獣偃月刀, Kijū Engetsutou)

attacks.name: Beast Cyclone (獣狼大回転, Jūrou Daikaiten, lit. "Great Beast-Wolf Rotation")
attacks.description: Spins its entire body and attacks the opponent while turning into a blade.

attacks.name: Fury: Ice Moon Fang (激・氷月牙, Geki: Hyougetsuga)
attacks.description: Molds the Yellow Beast Crescent Blade (黄獣偃月刀, Kijū Engetsutou) into countless forms using ice, and then hurls it at the opponent.

attacks.name: Yellow Beast Crescent Blade (黄獣偃月刀, Kijū Engetsutou)

Crowmon.name: Crowmon
Crowmon.description: Crowmonis a Bewitching Bird Digimon. Possessing three legs, it is a bizarre Digimon. Although its jet-black body presents an evil image to those who see it, it is told that it is the Digimon who guides the chosen toEl Dorado(Golden Land) in theeastern Digital World. The eastern Digital World is a region where there are still many mysteries, and it is said that "El Dorado" is protected by multiple sacred barriers. Although it is said that, with Crowmon's guidance, the barriers will be released, traditionally, only those who surmount the "Threefold Trials" submitted by Crowmon will finally arrive at "El Dorado", and it is told that those who were not able to endure the trials are dispatched to theDark Area.

attacks.name: Savage Emperor (甕布都神, Mikafutsu-no-kami, lit. "God of the Jug and Cloth Capital")
attacks.description: Concentrates the energy produced from the Dokkosho on both of its wings in its foreleg, then fires it, causing its opponent to have its digital cells disassembled to a state of "0"s and "1"s.

attacks.name: Haguro (羽黒, Haguro lit. "Feather-black")
attacks.description: Transforms the surrounding 3 km into a dark night by means of the black light emitted by its jet-black feathers.

Crowmon (2006 anime).name: Crowmon (2006 anime)
Crowmon (2006 anime).description: Crowmon (2006 anime) is a Bewitching Bird Digimon. Possessing three legs, it is a bizarre Digimon and a subspecies of Crowmon. Although its jet-black body presents an evil image to those who see it, it is told that it is the Digimon who guides the chosen to El Dorado (Golden Land) in the eastern Digital World. The eastern Digital World is a region where there are still many mysteries, and it is said that "El Dorado" is protected by multiple sacred barriers. Although it is said that, with Crowmon's guidance, the barriers will be released, traditionally, only those who surmount the "Threefold Trials" submitted by Crowmon will finally arrive at "El Dorado", and it is told that those who were not able to endure the trials are dispatched to the Dark Area.

attacks.name: Savage Emperor (甕布都神, Mikafutsu-no-kami, lit. "God of the Jug and Cloth Capital")
attacks.description: Concentrates the energy produced from the Dokkosho on both of its wings in its foreleg, then fires it, causing its opponent to have its digital cells disassembled to a state of "0"s and "1"s.

attacks.name: Black Feather (羽黒, Haguro, lit. "Feather-black")
attacks.description: Transforms the surrounding 3 km into a dark night by means of the black light emitted by its jet-black feathers.

attacks.name: Fire Jewels (紅蓮玉, Gurendama, lit. "Crimson Orb")
attacks.description: Shoots fireballs from the "Dokkosho" on both wings.

attacks.name: Flaming Claw (紅蓮爪, Gurensou, lit. "Crimson Claw")
attacks.description: Attacks with fiery claws.

attacks.name: Dokkosho (独鈷杵, Dokkosho)
attacks.description: Fires a golden beam from the "Dokkosho" on both wings.

attacks.name: Sun Bird (烏輪, Urin, lit. "Crow Wheel")
attacks.description: Creates a small sun and attacks with super heat.

Crusadermon.name: Crusadermon
Crusadermon.description: Crusadermonis a Warrior Digimon. One of the "Royal Knights", it is the monarch who presides over allKnightmon. Even more than to morality, Crusadermon is faithful to what it personally regards as "Justice", and those ends justify their means. If it will bring about lasting peace, Crusadermon will find merit in it, even in regards to "Ruling through Strength". In its entirety, it is uniquely ruthless in the execution of its duties, and it shows no compassion for the weak.

attacks.name: Spiral Masquerade
attacks.description: Chops up the opponent with the four body-sash blades which extend from its armor.

attacks.name: Fist of Athena (Urgent Fear)
attacks.description: Instantly comes into point-blank range, then starts shooting the opponent in the chest with sonic booms from the Pile Bunker on its right arm.

attacks.name: Laser Lattice
attacks.description: Creates an energy net that projects out from the palm.

attacks.name: Scarlet Tempest
attacks.description: Uses the Pile Bunker to create a whirlwind about the foe.

title: Indifferent Warrior
(孤高の闘士
Kokou no Toushi?)
Knight of Honor
(騎士叙任の儀
Kishi Jonin no Gi?)

Crusadermon X.name: Crusadermon X
Crusadermon X.description: Crusadermon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Wielding the Rose's Pile Bunker, a rose-shaped shield used for both offense and defense, as well as the Rose's Fencer, a rapier, it sports a noble form and has attained even more power befitting of the Lord of Knights. By analysing the battlefield using the red crystal embedded in its visor, it is now able to consistently lead its allies into advantageous situations in battle. The way it controls the tide of battle is akin to how a musician performs their song; this aura of absolute power it gives off strikes fear into all in its surroundings. Not only that, its ribbon blades have been strengthened along with its armour, and it is able to concentrate the power of its Knightmon subordinates into the tips of its blades.

attacks.name: Spiral Masquerade
attacks.description: Chops up the opponent with the four body-sash blades which extend from its armor.

attacks.name: Fist of Athena (Urgent Fear)
attacks.description: Instantly comes into point-blank range, then starts shooting the opponent in the chest with sonic booms from the Pile Bunker on its right arm.

attacks.name: Lord of Fraternity
attacks.description: Expands its ribbon blades, which have amassed the power of Knightmon, and slices the entire opposing army apart with dance-like movements.

attacks.name: Noblesse of Rouge
attacks.description: Seals the enemy's movements with a hurricane of rose petals generated from the core of its Rose's Pile Bunker and precisely impaling their Digicore with its Rose's Fencer.

attacks.name: Ultimate Thrusting Sword Gran Rozerio (究極戦突剣グランローゼリオ, Kyūkyoku Sentotsuken Gran Rozerio, lit. "Ultimate-Battle-Thrusting-Sword Gran Rozerio")
attacks.description: By combining its shield and swords, it can form the ultimate Pile Bunker creating a shockwave that blows away any and all who stand on the battlefield.

title: Lord of Knights

CrysPaledramon.name: CrysPaledramon
CrysPaledramon.description: CrysPaledramonis a Dragon Man Digimon. It is a Digimon that only a select fewPaledramonare said to be able to digivolve into. The shell of ice it has grown has changed into armor that covers its entire body, drastically raising its defensive and offensive power. Thanks to the icicles mounted on its wings, it now remains unchanged when facing any hot Digimon. Also, it can even control air currents due to the cold air it blasts from its thrusters, allowing it to fly at higher speeds even during snowstorms.

attacks.name: Bīngrèn Fúyóupào (冰刃浮游炮 lit. "Ice Sword Floating Cannon")
Jílèdòngtǔ (极乐冻土 lit. "Paradise Frozen Soil")
Frozen Claw
attacks.description: Tears the enemy to pieces with the ice claws equipped to both of its arms, and then freezes their wounds.

attacks.name: Callous Dimension
attacks.description: Generates a snowsquall which causes everything around it to be frozen in ice, including the enemy.

Cthyllamon\u200e\u200e.name: Cthyllamon‎‎
Cthyllamon\u200e\u200e.description: Cthyllamon is a Pixie Digimon. Cthyllamon resides in the depths of the Net Ocean. In the pitch black waters, only the skull on its chest is visible, appearing to float eerily through the darkness. This has earned Cthyllamon the alternative title, Phantom of the sea (海の死霊, Umi no shiryō, lit. "Shiryō of the ocean"). This Digimon has a crafty disposition, and does not join fights of its own volition, instead brainwashing weaker aquatic Digimon and using them to fight on its behalf. Cthyllamon is seen very rarely and resembles MarineAngemon in many ways, but it is unknown whether there is any connection between the two.

attacks.name: Ocean Hell
attacks.description: Uses an aura of endless terror as unknowable as the dark depths of the ocean to sap its enemies of their will to fight. Digimon that suffer this attack are sometimes reduced to Cthyllamon's puppets.

attacks.name: Buccal Rush
attacks.description: Opens its mouth wide and attacks using its three whip-like tongues.

attacks.name: Aqua Grinder
attacks.description: Creates fierce whirlpools that bore into enemies' bodies like a drill, displaying a destructive power that one would never imagine such a tiny creature capable of.

title: Phantom of the sea
(海の死霊
Umi no shiryō?
lit. "Shiryō of the ocean")

Curimon.name: Curimon
Curimon.description: Curimon is a Slime Digimon. It is a Fresh Digimon characterized by the single horn on its brow and its frill. It is so active that, before it is even born, its Digi-Egg bounces, and after hatching, it moves around vigorously. The horn on its brow and the frill on its head are still immature and soft, and although they cannot be used in battle yet, they help it to keep its balance while moving around and to defend itself even when hit.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa)
attacks.description: Heroically threatens approaching enemies by producing bubbles.

Cutemon.name: Cutemon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Houko Kuwashima(Xros Wars/Adventure:/New Century),Keisuke Baba,Fumiko Inoue(Xros Wars)
Cutemon.description: Cutemon is a Fairy Digimon. It is a mischievous and peppy but timid Digimon that lives in cold areas. Although they may look like large rabbit-ears, it has not ears, but a kind of sense organ with which it can sense the approach of other Digimon in no time. Thanks to this, it is extremely rare to catch sight of Cutemon, because it will immediately hide itself. If you do happen to catch sight of one, it is either a rare fortune, or Cutemon is mischievously luring you into a trap. Its trademark muffler is beyond imagination with its insulating properties, as it is very warm. If you are able to obtain one, you can call yourself lucky. It has the ability to heal wounds, and if it's in the vicinity of an injured Digimon, it will come closer, taking care not to be noticed, and heal that Digimon. Its scratches and cuts are already healed before it realizes what's going on, due to Cutemon's cute and mischievous nature.

attacks.name: Healing Glow (キズナオール, Kizunaol, lit. "Wound Healing")
attacks.description: Heals wounds.

attacks.name: Sugunaol (スグナオール, Sugunaōru, lit. "Immediate Healing")
Healing Glow (ヨクナオール, Yokunaol, lit. "Skillful Healing")
attacks.description: Greatly heals wounds.

attacks.name: Ultrasonic Song (Ultrasonic Wave)
attacks.description: Sings at a high frequency to greatly damage all around it.

CuteShoutmon.name: CuteShoutmon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Laughing All The Way To The Code Crown" [23]
CuteShoutmon.description: CuteShoutmon is a pink, bunny-like creature withCutemon's general body shape. As the DigiFuse between it and Shoutmon, it also gains elements from Shoutmon, including its sharpened ears, face, and white hands.

Cyberdramon.name: Cyberdramon

otherNames.name: サイバードラモンＬ Cyberdramon L

Cyberdramon.description: Cyberdramonis a Cyborg Digimon. It is a Dragon Man-species Digimon whose body is clad in a unique rubber armor, with which it can endure any attack. When Virus Digimon break out on theComputer Network, it suddenly appears out of nowhere and annihilates them all. However, it is a lone warrior that is not affiliated with the group of justice, the "Virus Busters", and its true colors are shrouded in mystery. As for its unique rubber armor, not only does it have excellent defensive ability, but it also has a feature it unleashes that amplifies its offensive ability.

attacks.name: Desolation Claw (Erase Claw)
attacks.description: Produces a super-oscillatory wave from both of its arms that destroys configuration data, completely erasing each of the opponents in the surrounding space without leaving behind a single scrap of data.

attacks.name: Cyber Nail
attacks.description: An attack using sharp claws.

Cyberdramon (2010 anime).name: Cyberdramon (2010 anime)

otherNames.name: サイバードラモン（デジモンクロスウォーズ版） Cyberdramon (Digimon Xros Wars version)
サイバードラモン(XW) Cyberdramon (XW)

Cyberdramon (2010 anime).description: Cyberdramon (2010 anime)is an Alien Humanoid Digimon. It is an otherworldly Digimon rumored to have turned up from another world. Since both its language and thinking patterns are completely different, it is regarded as fundamentally impossible to communicate with Cyberdramon. It is dangerous, with extreme combativeness befitting its otherworldly appearance. Because its goal in battle is to acquire a lot more energy, it is a Hunter that tries to prey on any Digimon that meet its eyes. Also, because it is able to sneak up on its enemies by taking on the colors of its surroundings, Cyberdramon is very difficult to capture. It makes sport of the opponent with its tricky, hard-to-predict movements, and specializes in surprise attacks which inflict a single strike of one of its unusual techniques.It wields the "Twin Lancer".

attacks.name: Fang Crusher (Glutton Fang)
attacks.description: Suddenly extends its ribs from its chest and skewers the opponent.

attacks.name: Spinning Stingers (Cyber Blader)
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces by riding on its spinning tail while holding the Twin Lancer in its hands.

attacks.name: Tail of Terror (Death Divider)
attacks.description: Spins around the Twin Lancer's shaft and attacks with its tail.

Cyberdramon X.name: Cyberdramon X
Cyberdramon X.description: Cyberdramon X is a Cyborg Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its unique rubber armor has turned into a hard material which covers it from head to toe. That hardness has given it a polished, beautiful look. It moves stealthily, making every step count, and exterminates Virus Digimon. Its "Erase Claw" has been sharpened and enhanced further.

attacks.name: Desolation Claw (Erase Claw)
attacks.description: Produces a super-oscillatory wave from both of its arms that destroys configuration data, completely erasing each of the opponents in the surrounding space without leaving behind a single scrap of data.

attacks.name: Extreme Tailer
attacks.description: Compresses the Vaccine energy it charges its wings with and releases it from its tail.

CyberDracomon.name: CyberDracomon
CyberDracomon.description: CyberDracomon is a DigiFuse between Dracomon and Cyberdramon (2010 anime). Final Fusion - The Fight For Earth!

attacks.name: Death Divider
attacks.description: Spins in a tornado, cutting all in its path.

Cyclonemon.name: Cyclonemon
Cyclonemon.description: Cyclonemonis a Dragon Digimon. It is a one-eyed Digimon with an abnormally developed right arm. It was originally a stalwart dragon warrior, but its right eye was crushed by the warriorLeomon, and it became anoniof revenge. In order to defeat Leomon, it has strengthened and enlarged its right arm, and it is on the lookout for a chance to take it down. For the sake of revenge, it has lost its pride as a warrior, leaving it as nothing more than a warrior obsessed with bloodshed.

attacks.name: Hyper Heat
attacks.description: Uses an extreme temperature which can melt anything.

Daemon.name: Daemon
debut: Digimon Adventure V-Tamer 01, "The History of the Folder Continent War" [3]

otherNames.name: 마왕몬 비스트 모드 Mawangmon Beast Mode

Daemon.description: Daemonis an Evil King Digimon. It is one of the "Seven Great Demon Lords", representingJupiterand the sin ofWrath. It leads the many Devil and Fallen Angel Digimon, and likeDevimon, it was originally an Angel Digimon, and a particularly high-ranking one. It is said that before it fell to theDark Areaand became a Demon Lord Digimon, it was in fact aSeraphimon.However, because it raged in fury or rebellion against a being of goodness in theDigital World(perhaps the very human that created the Digital World), it was deleted to theDark Area. It has vowed to one day conquer theDigital Worldin revenge against the being of goodness. Also, it is plotting to secretly reviveLucemon Chaos Modewho led the rebellion and was the strongest among the Megas.

attacks.name: Flame Inferno
attacks.description: Attacks with extremely high-temperature hellfire that burns up the opponent without a trace.

attacks.name: Chaos Flare
attacks.description: Attacks with a huge tower of flame.

attacks.name: Hammer Knuckle
attacks.description: Puts both hands together and swings with all its might.

attacks.name: Double Dust
attacks.description: Attacks with fists filled with magic.

attacks.name: Slash Nail
attacks.description: Tears the enemy with the giant claws on its left hand.

title: Hellfire of Chaos
(混沌の業火
Konton no Gōka?)

Daemon (Mantled).name: Daemon (Mantled)
Daemon (Mantled).description: Daemon (Mantled) is an Evil Digimon. It is one of the "Seven Great Demon Lords", representing Jupiter and the sin of Wrath. It leads the many Devil and Fallen Angel Digimon, and like Devimon, it was originally an Angel Digimon, and a particularly high-ranking one. It is said that before it fell to the Dark Area and became a Demon Lord Digimon, it was in fact a Seraphimon. However, because it raged in fury or rebellion against a being of goodness in the Digital World (perhaps the very human that created the Digital World), it was deleted to the Dark Area. It has vowed to one day conquer the Digital World in revenge against the being of goodness. Also, while it led the rebellion, and was the strongest among the Megas, it plotted to secretly revive the "Ultra Digimon".

attacks.name: Evil Inferno (Flame Inferno)
attacks.description: Attacks with extremely high-temperature hellfire that burns up the opponent without a trace.

attacks.name: Chaos Flare
attacks.description: Attacks with a huge tower of flame.

attacks.name: Hammer Knuckle
attacks.description: Concentrates immense power in its right hand and then strikes down from above.

title: Hellfire of Chaos
(混沌の業火
Konton no Gōka?)

Daemon (Ultra).name: Daemon (Ultra)
Daemon (Ultra).description: Daemon (Ultra) is a Demon Lord Digimon. It is the ultimate demon who controls the feelings of wrath and grief.

attacks.name: Algol's Flame
attacks.description: Spews a gigantic orb of flame from its mouth.

attacks.name: Dark Spreader
attacks.description: Uses the "Dark Virus" to damage the enemy.

Daemon X.name: Daemon X
Daemon X.description: Daemon Xis a Demon Lord Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. As a result of the "Crown of Wrath" manifesting over its head due to it taking in the X-Antibody, Daemon's power started to increase as its anger grew. It is said that when that anger exceeds its limit, power surpassing even that of Ultra Digimon bursts forth.

attacks.name: Flame Inferno
attacks.description: Extremely high-temperature flames of hell. Those who incur this technique burn up without a trace.

attacks.name: Seventh Graviton
attacks.description: Fires supergravity lasers from both of its shoulders and part of its abdomen, erasing the entire surrounding area and reducing it to ash.

attacks.name: Inferno Burst
attacks.description: A finishing secret technique where it transforms into a blazing demon god enveloped in its Flame Inferno. It would be difficult for even the Royal Knights to stop Daemon once it has turned into a blazing demon god with the Crown of Wrath bursting into red-hot flames.

Daipenmon.name: Daipenmon
Daipenmon.description: Daipenmon is an Android Digimon. It possesses power over Ice that has transcended legend by inheriting all the might of AncientMegatheriummon and acquiring unknown abilities. Although its wings have degenerated, by flapping the gigantic "Kakikaki-kun" (カキカキクン, "Kakikaki-kun" lit. "Lil' Freezy") hunk of ice held in its right hand and the "Kochikochi-kun" (コチコチクン, "Kochikochi-kun" lit. "Lil' Stiffy") held in its left, it seems it can momentarily fly in the air. It's free from care because it is able to manufacture the Kakikaki-kun and the Kochikochi-kun on its own even if they melt away. Furthermore, there seems to be no difference in the offensive abilities of the dipped syrup colors. It very rarely acts alongside Gomamon X, and Gomamon X personally seems to think of Daipenmon as its follower.

attacks.name: Song of Thunder (Blue Hawaii Death)
attacks.description: Dips the Kakikaki-kun in blue syrup, then strikes the opponent.

attacks.name: Purple Plague (イチゴデス, Ichigo Desu, lit. "Strawberry Death")
attacks.description: Dips the Kochikochi-kun in red syrup, then strikes the opponent.

attacks.name: Goma Milk Death
attacks.description: A seldom seen technique that appears to be a technique Gomamon X specializes in. It is actually a powerful Special Move that Daipenmon unleashes.

Damemon.name: Damemon
Damemon.description: Damemon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a Digimon that was accidentally born when the waste data drifting through the Digital World randomly combined. Since "No good, no good!" (ダメダメ！, Damedame!) is its favorite phrase, it has a bad habit of criticizing people without reading the atmosphere, regardless of the person or situation. Although it is the sort of person that is definitely the #1 "No good, no good!", somehow it has gotten by with the help of its partner, Tyutyumon. Together with Tyutyumon, Damemon can finally be said to be a full Digimon. Tyutyumon stays on the "Tyutyu Tray" on the back of Damemon's head, and takes it along to various places to go play. When the two of them are together, every day is Priceless.

attacks.name: Buzzing Fist (ブンブン拳, Bunbun Ken, lit. "Buzzing Punch")
attacks.description: Rotates its tonfa and barely hits the target, making it more useful for making the opponent flinch than inflicting damage.

attacks.name: Gun Vulcan
attacks.description: Fires, from hidden guns in its feet and tonfa, small, black, mysterious objects that spread a foul smell, doing more to make the opponent repulsive than to inflict damage, and causing them to lose their fighting spirit. It is always careful, because it is angered at Digimon living in the area if it isn't completely cleaned after it shoots.

attacks.name: Boo~st Attack
attacks.description: Spreads a lot of smelly gasses as it strikes, so that even it doesn't know where it will fly off to, inflicting a lot of emotional damage to the opponent due to the hit and the smelly gasses.

attacks.name: Warrior Transformation (デジ忍法・武人変化, Digi Ninpou: Bujin Henge, lit. "Digi Ninja Art: Warrior Transformation")
attacks.description: Transforms into Tuwarmon.

Damemon (C'mon Digimon).name: Damemon (C'mon Digimon)
debut: C'mon Digimon: The capering monster BUN

DanDevimon.name: DanDevimon
DanDevimon.description: DanDevimon is a Fallen Angel Digimon. It is a form of Devimon that took in negative data to its limit and became a Mega. Its mental state is between normal and abnormal, and once it is angered, its intelligence vanishes, and it attacks in a ferocious manner. Digimon that are attacked by a berserk DanDevimon disappear without a trace.

attacks.name: Destroy Claw
attacks.description: Pierces the opponent's entire body.

attacks.name: Ultimate Flare
attacks.description: Emits a destructive energy wave from its mouth.

attacks.name: Mias-spew
attacks.description: Crushes the opponent with the two arms that manifest as a result of its overflowing negative data.

Darcmon.name: Darcmon
Darcmon.description: Darcmon is an Angel Digimon. It is a low-ranking Angel Digimon which has the appearance of a woman. It is in the advance forces of Angel Digimon, and its figure, which always cuts through the vanguard to battle, is said to almost be a "Goddess of the Battlefield". It wields the slender blade "La Pucelle" (Fra: The Maiden).

attacks.name: La Pucelle (Fra
attacks.description: The Maiden)

attacks.name: Dancing Sword (Baptême d'Amour, Fra: Baptism of Love)
attacks.description: Slashes with a magnificent sword technique using the La Pucelle.

title: Goddess of the Battlefield
(戦場の女神
Senjō no Megami?)

Dark Trailmon.name: Dark Trailmon
Dark Trailmon.description: The Dark Trailmon is a Trailmon.

attacks.name: Kyuu Break Spark (急ブレーキスパーク, Kyuu Break Spark lit. "Emergency Break Spark")

Darkdramon.name: Darkdramon
Darkdramon.description: Darkdramon is a Cyborg Digimon. It is believed to be the weapon of last resort for the mechanized "D-Brigade", and its right hand is equipped with the "Gigastick Lance", which rivals Gallantmon's holy lance "Gram". Although this is information that stubbornly remains part of the rumor mill, it is said that a Tankdramon, shot down during an operation to eliminate a "target" designated "Codename: BAN-TYO", was retrieved and digivolved to Darkdramon at the D-Brigade research facility it was left at. It seems that, on the verge of its digivolution, a large quantity of "Dark Matter" was applied, and, after its digivolution, it ran wild and broke out, so currently, even the D-Brigade cannot secure Darkdramon's whereabouts. It is said that, even now, it is hunting "Codename: BAN-TYO"...

attacks.name: Dark Roar
attacks.description: Fires Dark Matter as energy shots in a bold move that is said nothing in this world can survive.

attacks.name: Lasers of Light (Gigastick Lance)
attacks.description: Strikes a blow using the Gigastick Lance.

attacks.name: Demon Stab
attacks.description: Strikes a powerful blow using the Gigastick Lance.

attacks.name: Terrible Gaze
attacks.description: Shoots a strange beam from its eyes to numb the enemy.

Darkest AxeKnightmon.name: Darkest AxeKnightmon

otherNames.name: ダークナイトモン DarkKnightmon

Darkest AxeKnightmon.description: Darkest AxeKnightmon is the DigiFuse of AxeKnightmon and Bagramon. D5 And The Brotherhood Of Evil

attacks.name: Hand of Doom (God of Death Snatcher)
attacks.description: Rips out the opponent's soul.

DarkLizardmon.name: DarkLizardmon
DarkLizardmon.description: DarkLizardmon is an Evil Dragon Digimon. This is the evil twin dragon Digimon of Flarerizamon. Covered in darkness, it's aggressive, and has strong jaws and fangs. It is said that the helmet on its head is to protect its exposed flesh.

attacks.name: Dark Flare (Dread Fire)
attacks.description: Unleashes a wave of black flames from its body.

attacks.name: Darkness Ray (Dark Inferno)
attacks.description: Changes all moves used by this Digimon to cause Darkness type damage.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.description: Burns by breathing fire.

DarkMaildramon.name: DarkMaildramon
DarkMaildramon.description: DarkMaildramonis a Cyborg Digimon.  It is the form ofMaildramon, who acts asKnightmon's servant and acquired the power of the "Digi-Egg of Miracles", that found righteousness in evil after abandoning justice. ItsChrome Digizoidarmor has been dyed a dark color, and it is searching for a heart of darkness in its master, Knightmon. If there is a Knightmon with a strong evil heart, it will be obedient to them, but if it senses even a shred of conscience, it will crush them under its bulk, even if they are its master.

attacks.name: Dark Wing
attacks.description: Flaps its tattered wings, causing dark bullets to rain down.

DarkSuperStarmon.name: DarkSuperStarmon
DarkSuperStarmon.description: DarkSuperStarmon is a Mutant Digimon. Produced from the observational data of a black hole, it is a Digimon dyed in darkness. It has left behind its dreams and its wishes, and it appears to be so heavily burdened by its past that it uses its sunglasses to shut out all light.

attacks.name: Dark Explosion
attacks.description: Attacks with the exploded fragments of a supernova.

attacks.name: Schwarz Nebel (Deu: Black Fog)
attacks.description: Uses a black fog that covers everything in darkness.

attacks.name: Dark Hole
attacks.description: Creates a hole that swallows the surrounding bodies.

DarkTyrannomon.name: DarkTyrannomon
DarkTyrannomon.description: DarkTyrannomon is a Dinosaur Digimon. Although it was originally a Tyrannomon-species Digimon, it was infected by a vicious computer virus, causing a bug in its flesh's configuration data and transforming it into a frenzied Digimon. Its body turned black, its arms grew stronger than Tyrannomon's, and its offensive power grew. It identifies anything reflected in its eyes as an enemy and starts attacking, becoming completely frenzied.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.description: Transforms all of its surroundings into a sea of flames with a super-powerful flamethrower.

attacks.name: Dark Nail
attacks.description: Slashes with its claws.

DarkTyrannomon X.name: DarkTyrannomon X
DarkTyrannomon X.description: DarkTyrannomon X is a Dinosaur Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The X-Antibody has bestowed upon it the composure to control its own abilities, as well as the determination and strength to survive its battles. It is now able to harden a portion of its flesh and even produce green flames by manipulating the virus within its body.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.description: A super-powerful jet of flames, it transforms all of its surroundings into a sea of flames.

attacks.name: Flame Snatch
attacks.description: Grips the opponent in its claws and causes green flames to erupt from them, burning the opponent.

Datamon.name: Datamon
Datamon.description: Datamon is Machine Digimon. It is an ultra-small therapeutic Machine Digimon. It was once a Vaccine Digimon used to restore crashed computers, but it was attacked by a strong Virus Digimon, which destroyed its logic circuits and, of course, made it run wild. It re-constructs the data selfishly, even with normally-running computers. Despite its small stature, Datamon can easily delete bigger and stronger Digimon.

attacks.name: Digital Bomb (Plug Bomb)
attacks.description: Fires several computer viruses from its fingers, which can delete enemies.

Datirimon.name: Datirimon
Datirimon.description: Datirimon is a Slime Digimon. It is born from the fruit of large trees. It is said to appear to humans who have regained their lost hope.

attacks.name: San no Awa (酸の泡, San no Awa lit. "Acid Bubbles")

Deathmon.name: Deathmon
debut: C'mon Digimon: The capering monster BUN
Deathmon.description: Deathmon is a bipedal creature with spotted limbs and sharp claws. Its defining feature is its face with its pronounced teeth, which its various forms share.

Death Airdramon.name: Death Airdramon
debut: C'mon Digimon: The capering monster BUN

Death Devimon.name: Death Devimon
debut: C'mon Digimon: The capering monster BUN

Death Meramon.name: Death Meramon
debut: C'mon Digimon: The capering monster BUN

Death MetalGreymon.name: Death MetalGreymon
debut: C'mon Digimon: The capering monster BUN

Death Tyranomon.name: Death Tyranomon
debut: C'mon Digimon: The capering monster BUN

Deckerdramon.name: Deckerdramon
Deckerdramon.description: Deckerdramonis a Cyborg Digimon. It can be said to be a natural enemy of all Flying Digimon. With the terrifying "Deckerdra-Launcher" equipped on its back, it also conceals the ability to shoot down any kind of Flying Digimon with a variety of anti-aircraft missiles. Because it is difficult to find things below you from high up in the sky, it seems to be troublesome to Flying Digimon. In particular, because you can't figure out where to attack in a terrain filled with obstacles, its aircraft kill-rate swells. On terrain where there are few obstacles, Deckerdramon spreads a barrage of its smoke-producing "Smokey Fang", and prepares to attack. It doesn't just specialize in anti-aircraft attacks, and for ground-to-ground combat it uses its "Cyclone Crusher".

attacks.name: Crocodile Cannons (Deckerdra-Launcher)
attacks.description: Shoots down any kind of Flying Digimon with a variety of anti-aircraft missiles.

attacks.name: Smokey Fang
attacks.description: Spreads a barrage of smoke-producing fangs.

attacks.name: Cyclone Crusher (Heavy Tailhook)
attacks.description: Pulverizes the opponent with a mighty blow of its tail.

Deckerdramon Float Mode.name: Deckerdramon Float Mode
Deckerdramon Float Mode.description: Deckerdramon Float Mode is a version of Deckerdramon where its ordinance on its back moves to its sides and allows it to flatten its back for a stable platform. Its legs retract into a more barge-like form.

DeckerGreymon.name: DeckerGreymon
DeckerGreymon.description: DeckerGreymon is an Enhancement Digimon. It is the "Assault-strike Mode" (強襲突撃形態, Kyoushūtotsugeki Keitai), which added Deckerdramon's offensive and assault abilities to MetalGreymon's power, and is a form which has attained a balance between its offensive, defensive, and locomotive abilities. DeckerGreymon's comprehensive combat strength is equivalent to that of a battalion composed of 324 combat-model Digimon, so even if a hypothetical group of enemies tried to lie in wait for it, with its great firepower and tenacious defensive power, and its ability to cover ground without trouble from any kind of rough terrain, it will trample the enemy line in a violent assault. It's worth mentioning that it can "use multiple Special Moves against multiple opponents", and thanks to this ability, DeckerGreymon can fight against an army corps even on its own. Also, the energy that is enhanced within its body to its utmost limit grants DeckerGreymon a final bold move. Even if you are able to take DeckerGreymon down, it isn't finished. The immense energy that is released all at once from DeckerGreymon's body becomes a tremendous shock wave that scorches the earth for 10 km in every direction.

attacks.name: Plasma Decker-launcher (Plasma Deckerdra-launcher)
attacks.description: Shoots a ball of plasma from its arm cannon.

attacks.name: Final Spark
attacks.description: If taken down, takes the energy released within its body to its utmost limit and releases it all at once, creating a tremendous shock wave that scorches the earth for 10 km in every direction.

attacks.name: Rain of Fire (Cyber Blader)
attacks.description: Shoots a ball of plasma from its arm cannon and then fires beams into it from its back cannons to rain blasts onto the earth.

Deltamon.name: Deltamon
Deltamon.description: Deltamon is a Composition Digimon. It was fused from three Digimon, and although each of them had existed as separate Digimon, due to a computer running wild after it was struck by a storm's electromagnetic waves, they were forced to fuse by a computer bug. It is said that since this Digimon, which possesses three heads and two tails, specializes in tripartite attacks that capitalize on its body's traits, it is even able to fight against three Digimon as if they were one. However, because each of them was a fiendish Digimon, they are only of one mind on destruction, and are usually on bad terms with no spirit of cooperation.

attacks.name: Triplex Force (Triple Force)
attacks.description: Fuses and fires energy discharged from its three mouths.

attacks.name: Serpent Bite (Skull Fang)
attacks.description: Lunges with the Digimon on its left arm.

DemiDevimon.name: DemiDevimon
DemiDevimon.description: DemiDevimon is an Evil Digimon. It is a tiny familiar Digimon which has an appearance like a bat. It exists to serve as a familiar for higher-class Demon Digimon like Devimon and Myotismon, but it is also said to be the one responsible for tempting Devimon, who was an angel-species Digimon, and luring it to the Dark Side. Its personality is the epitome of a Dark Side Digimon, so although its offensive ability and the like are not strong, it is cunning and makes mischief all over, but it seldom voluntarily takes part in anything like direct combat. When it absolutely must fight, it uses its Special Move "Demi Dart". It prefers the dark, and is often with a higher-level Digimon at all times, so it seems that it is seldom observed on its own.

attacks.name: Demi Dart (Pico Dart)
attacks.description: Throws a gigantic syringe larger than its own body at the opponent, draining their blood.

attacks.name: Demi Darts (Pico Darts)
attacks.description: Throws gigantic syringes larger than its own body at the opponent, draining their blood.

attacks.name: Evil Whisper (悪魔のささやき, Akuma no Sasayaki, lit. "Devil's Whisper")
attacks.description: Chants and casts a curse.

attacks.name: Butt Smasher (Bat Flutter)
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with numerous bats.

attacks.name: DemiDevi Claw (PicoDevi Claw)
attacks.description: Attacks with the claws on its feet.

DemiMeramon.name: DemiMeramon
DemiMeramon.description: DemiMeramon is a Flame Digimon. A Digimon that digivolved from Mokumon, its entire body is ablaze due to how its Digicore burns fiercely for a body of its size. It has a wild temperament for its small size, causing its Digicore to burn intensely, but it cannot fight properly despite its aggressive personality as its offensive power is still low. Not only that, it is extremely weak to Water and Ice-Snow type Digimon, so it will flee the moment it encounters them. Incidentally, any relation between it and Meramon has not yet been made clear. It attacks opponents with small bullets of fire shot out of its mouth, but they aren't very powerful.

attacks.name: Fireball
attacks.description: Shoots fire from its hands, burning its opponents.

attacks.name: Flame Shot (火炎弾, Kaendan)
attacks.description: Fires a small ball of flame from its mouth.

DemiVeemon.name: DemiVeemon
DemiVeemon.description: DemiVeemon is a Baby Dragon Digimon. It digivolved from Chibomon. Unusually for an In-Training Digimon, it possesses a body, hands, and feet, and so is able to grip objects with both of its small hands, and move while hopping about with both feet. As it is very voracious, it especially likes sweet foods. Also, as it is very fond of sleeping, if you take your eyes off of it, it will instantly fall asleep.

attacks.name: Pop Attack (Hop Attack)
attacks.description: Rams into the opponent while hopping about.

Depthmon.name: Depthmon
Depthmon.description: Depthmon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It is the Armor Digivolved form of Veemon through the Digi-Egg of Reliability. It specializes in underwater activities due to the power of the Digi-Egg, and it is capable of moving quick like a fish. Also, its armor has a high capacity to withstand water and pressure, so it is able to dive into parts of the deep sea even further than fellow Sea Animal, Divermon. With its diving ability, it will even contend for first place with Whamon.

Deputymon.name: Deputymon
Deputymon.description: Deputymon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a mutated Digimon whose body has become a gun barrel. Although the details of how it was born are completely unclear, it has a deep sense of justice and acts as a "Virus Buster". Also, it has another side that loves gambling, and since it really loves Russian roulette, it is likely to overlook even a Virus Digimon if it can get through Russian roulette, and is unable to hate them for a little while. Also, although it differs in school and doctrine from Ninjamon, who is also one of the "Virus Busters", they are comrades in arms since olden times, and are also good rivals. MagnaKidmon misinterprets the local Deputymon it comes across as members of its own species and becomes friends with them.

attacks.name: Justice Blaster (Justice Bullet)
attacks.description: Personally becomes a gun barrel and fires a bullet of justice.

attacks.name: Quick Shot
attacks.description: Shoots out with a quick draw.

Drill Cannon.name: Drill Cannon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Final Fusion - The Fight For Earth!" [54]
Drill Cannon.description: The Drill Cannon is a cannon withDorulumon's headless torso split in half and merged with its hind legs to form a pair of barrels while the remaining body as a base to help deal with recoil. Each half has a muzzle extended from the metallic structure in Dorulumon's back with a yellow vent under it and a yellow handle on the inner side and a front leg from Dorulumon on the outer side. The Drill Cannon has a holographic aiming system.

Deramon.name: Deramon
Deramon.description: Deramon is a Bird Digimon. Even though it appears to be a Bird Digimon at first glance, it is a strange Digimon with verdant, lush vegetation growing from its back. Like Kiwimon, it possesses some of the characteristics of plants and is not able to fly. As its pride is quite high, it believes itself to be nobility, but it considers the fact that it cannot fly to be mortifying. However, even though this Digimon has only digivolved to an Ultimate, its combat ability is possessed of high merit. It boasts of the crown it wears on its head, and its beak that shines gold.

attacks.name: Royal Nuts
attacks.description: Fires curious objects similar to eggs or nuts from the thicket on its back.

attacks.name: Gorgeous Beak
attacks.description: Uses its sharp beak to peck at an opponent.

Destromon.name: Destromon
Destromon.description: Destromon is an Unknown Digimon. It has assimilated the data of the most powerful battleship in the world. Being large enough to deploy other Digimon for battle, Destromon throws its overwhelming destructive power into the fray upon reaching the strike point itself. Destromon's high-firepower armaments ensure that all who attack it are utterly annihilated.

attacks.name: Triple Cannon Shot (3連装砲, Sanrensōhō, lit. "Three-Turret Platform")
attacks.description: Fires shells from its arms.

attacks.name: Juggernaut Blast
attacks.description: Launches attacks from its chest; and the Long-Range Buster Cannon on its back.

Devidramon.name: Devidramon
Devidramon.description: Devidramon is a Dark Dragon Digimon. It is known and feared as the "Many-eyed Demon". As a demon beast that was summoned from the Dark Area by the messenger of darkness, Devimon, there are no other Digimon as evil as it is. Although it is a Dramon-species Digimon, its limbs are unusually developed, so it cuts the opponent to pieces with its elongated arms, and flies about the darkness with its sturdy legs and wings. Its personality is the epitome of wickedness, and it is unmoved by a spirit of compassion. If it glares at them with its four eyes burning in deep crimson, the opponent becomes unable to move, and it will chop up their unresisting body. Also, the tip of its tail is able to open up and take on the shape of a claw, which can skewer the opponent. This Digimon was probably produced by the evil feelings of Hackers who were abusing the Computer Network for their own selfish desires.

attacks.name: Crimson Claw (Crimson Nail)
attacks.description: Chops up the opponent with its gigantic claws and beats them all bloody.

attacks.name: Red Eyes (Red Eye)
attacks.description: Paralyzes enemies with its crimson evil eyes, making them vulnerable to attack.

attacks.name: Demonic Gale
attacks.description: Flies high and fast through the sky, slicing the air and creating a shockwave that disrupts everything beneath.

attacks.name: Touch of Evil (Death Claw)
attacks.description: Slashes enemies with power of darkness.

title: Many-eyed Demon
(複眼の悪魔
Fukugan no Akuma?)

Devimon.name: Devimon
Devimon.description: Devimon is an Evil Digimon. Its body is clad in jet-black cloth. Although it was originally a shining Angemon-species Digimon, it was lured to the Dark Side by DemiDevimon and fell to the Dark Area, becoming a fallen angel. As proof of that, the Mark of Evil surfaced dramatically on its chest. It has a cunning and fiendish personality, but it also possesses an outstanding intellect. It is said that those who have stared into its two eyes, which shine a deep crimson, are mind-controlled and completely dominated by Devimon's mind. Although it has the same outward appearance and Special Move as the Devimon that inhabit File Island, it seems its lethal potential and power are remarkably increased.

attacks.name: The Touch of Evil (Death Claw)
attacks.description: Extends both of its extensible, elongated arms even further, and enforces its will on the opponent's body.

attacks.name: Death Hand
attacks.description: Unleashes a blast of unholy energy from hands.

attacks.name: Deadly Nail
attacks.description: Scratches using the nails on both hands.

Devitamamon.name: Devitamamon
Devitamamon.description: Devitamamon is a Mutant Digimon. It is said to have dark-digivolved from Digitamamon. Although defining "Evil" in the Digital World is very difficult, this Devitamamon is a being like "Pandora's box", filled with all the evils of this world. It turns everything it sees and touches into an object of its hatred, and it recites and masters magic through a lost, ancient high-level programming language. As for its magic effects, they are used for nothing but "Destruction".

attacks.name: Black Death Cloud
attacks.description: Destroys data with a gas of darkness.

title: Pandora's Box

DexDorugamon.name: DexDorugamon
DexDorugamon.description: DexDorugamon is a Ghost Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It was experimented on in search of further digivolutions, and was said to, at the time of the experiment, resemble Dorumon's Champion form, Dorugamon. Since it keeps preying on the DigiCores of other Digimon, it is active despite its deceased condition, and is attempting to digivolve.

attacks.name: Cannonball
attacks.description: Fires a large iron sphere from its mouth while charging.

attacks.name: Metal Cast
attacks.description: Impales the opponent with its steel arms and rips out their DigiCore. In Digimon Masters it attacks with its sharp front claws and violently bites the enemy.

DexDorugoramon.name: DexDorugoramon

otherNames.name: デクルドルゴラモン Dekuru-DORUgoramon

DexDorugoramon.description: DexDorugoramon is a Ghost Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is a figure of the Prototype Digimon "Doru Series" that was experimented on in search of further digivolutions, which achieved its Mega form through "Death-X Evolution". It is called the "Digicore Predator" because its own activity is dependent on the Digicores of other Digimon, and is nothing but a threat to them. Since it keeps preying on the Digicores of other Digimon, it is active despite its deceased condition, and its entire body is covered in restraints due to it storing the information from a massive Digicore within its body, so it is barely able to remain active as a lone Digimon.
title: DigiCore Predator
(電脳核捕食者
Den'nō Kaku Hoshoku-sha?)

DexDoruGreymon.name: DexDoruGreymon
DexDoruGreymon.description: DexDoruGreymon is a Ghost Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is a Digimon of the Prototype Digimon "DORU Series" that was experimented on in search of further digivolutions, and was said to, at the time of the experiment, resemble its final form. Since it keeps preying on the Digicores of other Digimon, it is active despite its deceased condition, and is seeking a massive Digicore in order to digivolve. As it instinctively hunts for Digicores, the eye portions of its head and snout are covered in armor, and the sharp tips of the blades on its tail and wings are used to skewer many Digimon and then prey on their Digicores.

Diaboromon.name: Diaboromon
Diaboromon.description: Diaboromonis an Unidentified Digimon. It repeatedly absorbs all the data on theNetworkin order to digivolve and grow larger, and is depleting theDigital Worldto the brink of destruction. A Diaboromon that has absorbed a lot of data becomes convinced that it is an all-knowing and all-powerful being, and it takes pleasure in destruction and slaughter. However, when this Digimon congregates in great numbers, its raison d'être is made clear, and as that ultimate goal is to hijack a military computer and try to destroy theReal Worldas well with a nuclear strike, this is a terrifying Digimon.

attacks.name: Web Wrecker (Catastrophe Cannon)
attacks.description: Fires a powerful shot of destructive energy from its chest-cannon.

attacks.name: Lost Paradise (Paradise Lost)
attacks.description: Uses all the power in its body to hit the enemy.

attacks.name: Cable Crusher
attacks.description: Stretches its arms and launches its huge clawed hands to slash or grab the enemy.

attacks.name: Tsume Kougeki (爪攻撃, Tsume Kougeki lit. "Claw Attack")
Tentacle Bug
attacks.description: Stabs the enemy with its claw.

attacks.name: Line Surge
attacks.description: Spreads both of its arms outwards and spins in place.

attacks.name: Page Fault
attacks.description: Somersaults, striking enemies with the blades on its back.

attacks.name: Virus Download
attacks.description: Charges power in its hands, then extends its arms to stab with its claws.

attacks.name: System Failure (System Fail)
attacks.description: Encases itself with a gigantic green sphere, blasting nearby opponents which causes them to de-digivolve.

Diaboromon X.name: Diaboromon X
Diaboromon X.description: Diaboromon X is an Unidentified Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It is the most heinous of Digimon, shaped even more by a harsh ecosystem. The thought routines within its Digicore have run wild due to it taking in the X-Antibody, and it repeatedly destroys cyberspace in order to prove its own belief that it is an all-knowing, omnipotent God. It uses any means necessary to achieve its goals, and has learned the art of setting cruel and cunning traps and moving about so that it can always gain the upper hand. It shows up in front of the enemy with an appearance like that of a balancing toy, using its tail as a pivot point, and gives off a feeling of instinctive revulsion through its strange movements and the attacks it unleashes from normally impossible poses like a mollusk.

attacks.name: Catastrophe Cannon
attacks.description: Fires a powerful shot of destructive energy from its chest-cannon.

attacks.name: Spooky Zapper
attacks.description: Rotates its body like a spinning top, and tears the enemy to pieces with its enormous claws and hidden arms.

attacks.name: Fatal Gaze
attacks.description: Absorbs the data of enemies that gaze at the twelve eyes all over its body.

attacks.name: Rewind Abyss 13
attacks.description: Rewind Abyss 13 is invoked when it opens its hidden thirteenth eye, and is the vilest, most wicked spell that causes Digimon to forcibly degenerate at the end of the countdown.

Dianamon.name: Dianamon
Dianamon.description: Dianamon is a Deity Digimon. It is one of the Olympos XII, presides over water and ice, and is able to fight even when the surroundings are below absolute zero. Just as the moon has two sides, light and dark, its personality is of a two-sided nature, and its beauty conceals a terrifying power. It wears the "Goodnight Sisters" on both of its legs.

attacks.name: Crescent Harken (Deu: Crescent Hook)
attacks.description: Bewitches an illusion with the mysterious power of the moon, so that the opponent sees itself as its own enemy and immediately carves itself to pieces.

attacks.name: Arrow of Artemis
attacks.description: Pulls a faintly sparkling arrow of ice from the quill-like protuberances on its back, then fires it.

attacks.name: Goodnight Moon
attacks.description: Lures the opponent into sleep with the lunar light emitted from the Goodnight Sisters.

title: Moonlight God
(月光神
Gekkō Shin?)

Diarbbitmon.name: Diarbbitmon
Diarbbitmon.description: Diarbbitmon is a Beast Knight Digimon. It is an astute Digimon that guards over many of the Beast Digimon inhabiting areas of lush nature. Diarbbitmon's gentle nature leads it to enjoy its time quietly communing with other Digimon. Diarbbitmon defends the lands from any threat, swiftly dispatching enemies that appear with its beloved pair of blades, Moralltach and Beagalltach. Any who dare damage the land must be prepared for the typically well-mannered Diarbbitmon to cut them to shreds until nothing is left. It will also pursue its opponent's allies to destroy them.

attacks.name: Truskmore Advance (Trusgain)
attacks.description: Uses its superlative swordsmanship to cut its foes down.

attacks.name: Twin Spear Pursuit (Buidhedearg)
attacks.description: Summons twin magical spears to pursue its foes.

attacks.name: Buck Rush (Backstlash)
attacks.description: Surrounds its enemy with afterimages that slice their target from all directions, leaving their enemy with no path of retreat.

Diatrymon.name: Diatrymon
Diatrymon.description: Diatrymon is an Ancient Bird Digimon. It possesses powerful leg strength, and is called a living fossil. Its wings do not have enough surface area for it to fly, but in their place, it is endowed with legs that have powerful physical strength, and it is capable of sprinting at speeds exceeding 200 km/h. Also, it has an extremely ferocious personality, and a habit of regarding anything that moves as an enemy and swooping down on it. Also, the feathers that cover its whole body contain metal, so it seems it's difficult to inflict damage to Diatrymon barring the greatest of attacks.

attacks.name: Mega Dash Impact
attacks.description: Performs a tempestuous ramming attack.

attacks.name: Destruction Roar
attacks.description: Unleashes a gigantic roar which does extensive damage.

attacks.name: Blast Shot
attacks.description: Sends ballistic waves and attacks.

Digitamamon.name: Digitamamon
Digitamamon.description: Digitamamon is a Perfect Digimon. It is an ultimate Digimon which has the appearance of a "Digi-Egg", the beginning and end of all Digimon. It is said that this Digitamamon, being at the apex of digivolution, will not digivolve from normal Digimon, and will never digivolve unless it fuses with data from another dimension. It is covered in an exoskeleton shaped like an egg, and all attacks are rendered meaningless before it.

attacks.name: Hyper Flashing (Enigma)
attacks.description: Attacks with mysterious power.

attacks.name: Nightmare Syndrome
attacks.description: Sends out its true form as a black ghost.

Digmon.name: Digmon
Digmon.description: Digmon is an Insectoid Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Knowledge". The "Digi-Egg of Knowledge" has the attribute of "Earth", and those that don this Digi-Egg wield the power to manipulate the earth. As can be seen from its unique form, it never loses to any Digimon in underground battles.

attacks.name: Gold Rush
attacks.description: Fires its drills at the opponent.

attacks.name: Rock Cracking (Big Crack)
attacks.description: Rams its drills in the ground and generates a fissure.

title: Drill of Knowledge
(鋼の叡智
Hagane no Eichi?
lit. "Steel Knowledge")

Dijiangmon.name: Dijiangmon
Dijiangmon.description: Japanese name and romanization given inDigimon New Centurypromotional material.

Dinobeemon.name: Dinobeemon
Dinobeemon.description: Dinobeemon is a Mutant Digimon. It DNA digivolved from Stingmon and ExVeemon. A chimera of a dragon and an insect, it possesses the name "Terrible Bee". It is hard to classify its species as either a Dragon type or an Insect type, but its Insect nature is more pronounced. It flies through the sky with its four wings, and accurately perceives the opponent with the compound eyes on its head, so it can reliably choke the life out of its opponent. Also, it possesses a considerably ferocious personality.

attacks.name: Hell Masquerade
attacks.description: Performs the "Dance of Hell" in which its nimble movements leave behind afterimages while it chops up the opponent.

title: Terrible Bee

Dinohyumon.name: Dinohyumon
Dinohyumon.description: Dinohyumon is a Dragon Man Digimon. Dinohyumon has the appearance of a humanoid lizard. It lives in an area that has not yet become a modernised civilisation, where all of the tribesmen are valiant combat dragons who possess the makings of a warrior. It has great muscle strength, allowing its to swing its greatsword, Akinakes, with ease.

attacks.name: Lizard Dance
attacks.description: Does dance-like movements and cuts the opponent with the blades on its arms and Akinakes.

attacks.name: Dino Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with the power of a dragon.

Dinorexmon.name: Dinorexmon
Dinorexmon.description: Dinorexmon is a Dinosaur Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. With strength far in excess of other Dinosaur Digimon, it is a carnivorous Digimon named the "King of Terror" due to the unparalleled ferocious nature it displays in battle. With its talons, which are almost half as long as its body, it seizes the opponent, snaps and brandishes its gigantic jaws at them, then kills them. Its exceedingly brutal manner, which appears in the finest battles of a world where the weak are food for the strong, is probably the reason it is called "King". Also, partly due to it fighting with other Dinorexmon, it is said that the population is very small.

attacks.name: Splatter Hunting
attacks.description: Seizes and kills the opponent with its talons.

attacks.name: Ogre Flame
attacks.description: Fires extremely high-temperature grenades from its mouth, which have a semi-fluid form similar to magma and burn down their surroundings even if they don't hit the opponent.

title: King of Terror

Dinotigermon.name: Dinotigermon
Dinotigermon.description: Dinotigermon is an Ancient Beast Digimon and a carrier of the X-Antibody. Injured Digimon have become its prey. It took in the metal elements of the earth, super-hardened its whole body, and digivolved from one of the few SaberLeomon which have repeated and survived endless battles, where the weak are food for the strong. Its movements are not swift compared to SaberLeomon, but it possesses almost twice as much tough flesh and physical strength, and with its big, sharp, sword-like fangs, it forcibly brings down even Digimon larger than itself and which possess thick skin or armor. Other Digimon fear Dinotigermon, who possesses daring and wild predatory instinct, and do not approach.

attacks.name: Ground Fang
attacks.description: Pins down the enemy, then stabs and tears through them with its fangs.

attacks.name: Highland Fang
attacks.description: Swings down its fangs from an elevation, instantly cutting them to pieces.

Divemon.name: Divemon
Divemon.description: Divemon is an Aquatic Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved via data which studied the swimming styles of top swimmers. Although it has a merman-like appearance, it is capable of bipedal activities on land. Its swimming speed is top-class even among Aquatic Digimon, and its four eyes never lose sight of its underwater prey. Contrary to its ferocious appearance, it has a fair play spirit that pursues beautiful swimming.

attacks.name: Fillet Blade
attacks.description: Slashes the enemy with the sharp fins all over its body.

attacks.name: Ripple Edge
attacks.description: Hurls pressurized water like a blade.

attacks.name: Liquid Veil
attacks.description: When Divemon is active on land it envelops itself in water armor which enhances its physical ability. As a result, even in places without water, it is able to exhibit the same strength as when it is underwater.

Divermon.name: Divermon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Takahiro Sakurai,Junko Takeuchi,Masami Kikuchi,Etsuko Kozakura(Adventure),Yoshikazu Nagano(Tamers),Masato Obara(Xros Wars, Commander)
Divermon.description: Divermon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It is clothed in a wetsuit, has a cheerful personality, and is always swimming around the "Net Ocean". Its specialty is moving in the water, and in battle it uses the high-speed, underwater mobility Motor on its back, and uses a fighting style that capitalizes on its speed. It wields its cherished harpoon, "Trent" (Torrent).

attacks.name: Striking Fish (Strike Fishing)
attacks.description: Stabs the enemy with the Trent.

attacks.name: Abyss Dive (Hell Dive)
attacks.description: Jumps high into the sky to dive at an opponent.

Dobermon.name: Dobermon
Dobermon.description: Dobermonis a Demon Beast Digimon. It is a Hunter Digimon that was originally a Virus Digimon, but was converted to a Vaccine by a mutation.
