Similar toSnimon, despite being called a Vaccine, it is a ferocious Digimon that exists solely for hunting Virus Digimon, and it can't be controlled by an ordinaryTamer.

attacks.name: Grau Lärm (Deu: Gray Noise)
attacks.description: Seals the opponent's abilities with a howl.

attacks.name: Schwarz Strahl (Deu: Black Beam)
attacks.description: Pierces the opponent's body with a black beam and destroys its DigiCore.

Dobermon X.name: Dobermon X
Dobermon X.description: Dobermon X is a Demon Beast Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It has become more ferocious, an uncontrollable mad dog. Originally, Dobermon was considered ferocious but highly intelligent, said to be the best Beast Digimon for detaining prey, but a master's absolute skill is necessary to bring out its full capabilities, and thus close bonds aren't permitted in such a relationship.

attacks.name: Grau Lärm (Deu: Gray Noise)
attacks.description: Seals the opponent's abilities with a howl.

attacks.name: Schwarz Strahl (Deu: Black Beam)
attacks.description: Pierces the opponent's body with a black beam and destroys its DigiCore.

Dodomon.name: Dodomon
Dodomon.description: Dodomon is a Slime Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. Its whole body is covered in a tough fur named "Mithril Hair". It manifests an aggressive personality immediately after being born, and despite its fangs not yet being grown, it opens its mouth wide and completely intimidates the opponent with the manner in which it snaps at them. Because of this, there exist many Digimon which are completely deceived, but it is still a rare Digimon.

attacks.name: Chīsana Tetsu Tsubu (小さな鉄粒, Chīsana Tetsu Tsubu lit. "Little Iron Beads")
attacks.description: Spits small iron beads from its mouth at an approaching opponent.

Doggymon.name: Doggymon
Doggymon.description: Doggymon is a Puppet Digimon. It was produced from an American cartoon TV database. Because its body is very soft and strong, and can expand and contract like rubber, it completely absorbs every attack. Although its appearance gives off the impression that it is very dangerous, it is a harmless Digimon with no malice or aggression.

attacks.name: Distem Howling
attacks.description: Lets out a great howl, inflicting damage to the opponent's sense of hearing and making them lose their fighting spirit.

attacks.name: Ultra Snap (ウルトラかみつく, Ultra Kamitsuki, lit. "Ultra Snapping")
attacks.description: Snaps at the opponent with its sharp fangs.

Dokimon.name: Dokimon
Dokimon.description: Dokimon is a Slime Digimon. It is a Digimon that was born from human vital data. You can't tell from just its appearance, but when picked up, its whole body vibrates at a constant rhythm. The rhythm of these vibrations seems to reflect that of the heartbeat of the person who is holding it.

attacks.name: Static Shock (静電気, Seidenki, lit. "Static Electricity")
attacks.description: When it is in danger, it threatens the enemy with static electricity emitted from the tip of its horn.

Dokugumon.name: Dokugumon
voiceActors: (En:)Mari Devon(Adventure/02)[3],Mary Elizabeth McGlynn(Adventure 02, "Digimon World Tour")[3],Melodee Spevack(Tamers)[4]
Dokugumon.description: Dokugumon is an Insectoid Digimon. It is a cursed Digimon in the shape of a spider, whose entire body has been parasitised by a computer virus. While it was originally a spider-type, it had a docile personality typical of insect-type Digimon; however, at some point, it was drawn into a powerful electromagnetic storm and infected by a computer virus that had been circulating around the Network. Since then, it has become but a lump of poison, or, in other words, a computer virus, that corrodes anything it touches. Not only that, special mention has to be given to its great movement speed, made possible thanks to its eight legs. No matter how desperately one tries to get away, Dokugumon will never be far behind, and it will not stop its chase until the opponent ceases to continue running out of exhaustion. They are presided over by their queen, Arukenimon.

attacks.name: Poison Cobweb (Stinger Poration)
attacks.description: Fires a poisonous blast from its mouth.

attacks.name: Poison Thread (Arachno Batoto)
attacks.description: Shoots a web from its spinnerets.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.description: Attacks with a sharp poisonous needle.

attacks.name: Spider Machine Gun
attacks.description: Shoots KoDokugumon at the enemy.

Dokunemon.name: Dokunemon
Dokunemon.description: Dokunemon is a Larva Digimon. Dokunemon's appearance is very similar to Kunemon. Like Kunemon, it is being studied in order to solve the mystery of Insect Digimon, but unlike Kunemon, it has a timid personality, and because it usually lives hidden in forests, it is difficult to find, and so research has not progressed. In addition, it carries a very potent toxin, and it is dangerous to even touch it.

attacks.name: Electric Thread
attacks.description: Fires an electric thread from its mouth.

attacks.name: Worm Venom
attacks.description: Jumps and scatters a neurotoxin from its beak that paralyzes the enemy. In Digimon Digital Card Battle it stings the foe with its poisonous tail.

attacks.name: Bug Shower (Insect Horde)
attacks.description: Summons a swarm of digital bees to sting the foe.

attacks.name: Capturing Net (Capture Net)
attacks.description: Attacks by radiating light.

attacks.name: Poison Ride
attacks.description: Charges and then stabs the enemy with the horn on its tail.

attacks.name: Invisibility (擬態, Gitai, lit. "Mimicry")
attacks.description: Turns invisible.

attacks.name: Super Shocker (Petit Thunder)
attacks.description: Electrocutes with a small ball of electricity.

Dolphmon.name: Dolphmon
Dolphmon.description: Dolphmon is a Sea Animal Digimon. A unique signal that originated within software for researching communication between different kinds of groups changed into Dolphmon, a Digimon with a unique existence. Due to its habitat being limited to the sea, it became able to move about the sea at high speeds. As expected from its appearance, it possesses advanced intelligence, but its form of thought is too complex for a normal person to understand. Although it is a species that doesn't like useless battles, it won't go easy against an opponent that comes and challenges it.

attacks.name: Pulse Blast (Shaking Pulse)
attacks.description: Emits the ultrasonic waves from its mouth that it uses to communicate, just at maximum power.

attacks.name: Water Wave
attacks.description: Attacks with a big tsunami.

Dominimon.name: Dominimon
Dominimon.description: Dominimon is a Mega-level Digimon. It wields the "Final Excalibur" sword.

attacks.name: Final Excalibur
attacks.description: Draws its "Final Excalibur" sword from its left wrist.

Dondokomon.name: Dondokomon
Dondokomon.description: Dondokomon is a Musical Instrument Digimon. Suddenly appearing out of nowhere when a disturbance occurs, it is a festival-loving Digimon that pounds out a hot rhythm and stirs up the place. Its wave, which shakes the body to the core with that characteristic rhythm, stimulates the listener's nerves and gets them completely excited. Although it's not wrong for it to get people excited at games, if by some chance Dondokomon shows up at a brawl, it will definitely grow into a battle royal which swallows up even the excited onlookers, causing a catastrophe. Although in person it seems that it will just be cheering, it is actually about to resound its "Dondoko March", and anyone who interrupts its performances will be punished with its certain-kill "Dondoko Rush".

attacks.name: Dondoko March (ドンドコ音頭, Dondoko Ondo)
attacks.description: Resounds a rhythm which raises the tension between friend and foe alike, and there isn't anything that will settle the commotion.

attacks.name: Dondoko Rush (乱れ打ちラッシュ, Midareuchi Rush, lit. "Random-drumming Rush")
attacks.description: Randomly fires shock waves.

attacks.name: Extreme Taiko (極め太鼓, Kiwame Daiko, lit. "Mastered Drum")

DonShoutmon.name: DonShoutmon
DonShoutmon.description: DonShoutmon is an Enhancement Digimon. It is the "Manly-soul Mode" (漢魂形態, Kankon Keitai) which possesses a furious soul brought forth by the burning fighting spirit of Shoutmon and Dondokomon. As its rhythmically swung-down Stick strikes its opponents, the shriek of the percussion across the battlefield resounds. Generally speaking, as a Digimon burning hot, its irrepressible fighting spirit will make DonShoutmon rush even into conflicts it's not a part of, worsening the situation by leaps and bounds. If there's a petty quarrel in the west, it goes and starts a fist-fighting rumble, and if there's a trivial dispute in the east, it goes and starts a feud of wounds. Wherever DonShoutmon is, the conflicts will not be settled. The second that it abruptly dives into someone else's fight, discussion is useless and the opponent, with its Stick, it beats. Next, a different opponent, with its Stick, it beats. The first one, it beats. The next again, it beats. Then a third, it beats. Despite pretending to beat, it beats. No matter how, it beats. With this beating and beating and beating, a rhythm will gradually be produced. Sometimes harshly and sometimes dolefully, DonShoutmon will battle while spinning a tune. Those are DonShoutmon's Special Moves. Although each of these techniques are the same, their names (song titles) seem to differ according to their rhythm.

attacks.name: Kankon Midare Daiko (漢魂乱れ太鼓, Kankon Midare Daiko lit. "Manly-soul Random Drum")
attacks.description: Battles while spinning a tune with a unique rhythm.

attacks.name: Rowdy Drummer
attacks.description: Battles while spinning a tune with a unique rhythm.

Dorimon.name: Dorimon
Dorimon.description: Dorimon is a Lesser Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It can run very quickly if it is going straight. It is often running wild because it hates to be domesticated, and it is dangerous because it will recklessly charge and perform a ramming attack if approached. Its ears have grown sharp and hard, and because they also act as horns, there is some small damage from its ramming attacks. However, it can't turn when going at speed.

attacks.name: Metal Drop
attacks.description: Spits an iron bead from mouth while charging at the opponent.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

Dorbickmon.name: Dorbickmon
Dorbickmon.description: Dorbickmonis a Dragon Man Digimon. It is the general of the Fire-fury Army of the "Big Death-Stars". It leads a multitude of dragon Digimon in perfect order, and destroys its enemies with its overwhelming battle strength, in any kind of combat situation. It excels in both power and speed, and with its wealth of combat experience, its powers of intuition are outstanding, so that it can easily handle battles where it must adapt to the moment. Due to a personality that prefers the flames of destruction surging across the battlefield, it stirs up battles when it comes across a peaceful area. And although it's a Digimon, it obtains pleasure from gazing on the sight of the world being incinerated.

attacks.name: Dragon's Fury Blade (Tyrant Collbrande)
attacks.description: Attacks with a flaming sword formed from the anger it works up in battle, whose power depends on the strength of its fury.

attacks.name: Burning the Dragon
attacks.description: Stabs a dragon's vein within the land, modifying the terrain and inflicting damage on groups of enemies.

attacks.name: Dragon Infernal Fire (Dragon Breath-tonic Fire)
attacks.description: Exhales a burst of extremely high-temperature breath that instantly reduces anything it touches to ashes.

Dorbickmon Darkness Mode (Flarerizamon).name: Dorbickmon Darkness Mode (Flarerizamon)
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Back to the Digital World! Hot Time in Dragonland!" [31]
Dorbickmon Darkness Mode (Flarerizamon).description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars. No official romanization available.

Dorbickmon Darkness Mode One.name: Dorbickmon Darkness Mode One
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Back to the Digital World! Hot Time in Dragonland!" [31]
Dorbickmon Darkness Mode One.description: Dorbickmon Darkness Mode One is the DigiFuse of Dorbickmon and Huanglongmon, assuming a nuckelavee-like form. Back to the Digital World! Hot Time in Dragonland!

attacks.name: Dragon Infernal Fire (Dragon Breath-tonic Fire)
attacks.description: Exhales a burst of extremely high-temperature breath that instantly reduces anything it touches to ashes.

Dorbickmon Darkness Mode Two.name: Dorbickmon Darkness Mode Two
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Take a Stand, Christopher! Fusion Fighters' Rescue Mission!" [32]
Dorbickmon Darkness Mode Two.description: Dorbickmon Darkness Mode Two is the DigiFuse of Dorbickmon Darkness Mode One, Flarerizamon, Brachiomon, and Gigadramon. Take a Stand, Christopher! Fusion Fighters' Rescue Mission!

attacks.name: Dragon's Fury Blade (Tyrant Collbrande)
attacks.description: Attacks with a flaming sword formed from the anger it works up in battle, whose power depends on the strength of its fury.

attacks.name: Dragon Infernal Fire (Dragon Breath-tonic Fire)
attacks.description: Exhales a burst of extremely high-temperature breath that instantly reduces anything it touches to ashes.

Dorugamon.name: Dorugamon
Dorugamon.description: Dorugamon is an Animal Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is a ferocious Digimon that possesses the disposition of a beast and a dragon, and is such a heavyweight that most Digimon run away just at the sight of its shadow. Although it exhibits that ferocity of a wild beast when it comes to battles, it also has the intelligence of a dragon, and is usually very docile. Because it has an old-style Interface on its brow, it is presumed to be a Digivolution of a "Prototype Digimon".

attacks.name: Cannonball
attacks.description: Fires a large iron sphere from its mouth while charging.

attacks.name: Fighting Spirit (Power Metal)
attacks.description: Stands still and accumulates power, then fires a large, more powerful iron sphere from its mouth.

Dorugoramon.name: Dorugoramon
Dorugoramon.description: Dorugoramon is a Beast Dragon Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is an imaginary Digimon born from the "Daydream of a DigiCore". It is a form that had even the DigiCore's own creativity released through the Interface on its brow, and digivolved. Possibly because it naturally possessed the potent life-force data of the legendary beast, the "Dragon", within its DigiCore, the form created by its DigiCore is a mighty avatar of "Destruction", and was an incarnation of the "Final Enemy".

attacks.name: Supreme Courage (Brave Metal)
attacks.description: Puts its body and soul into a terrifying assault.

attacks.name: Doru Djinn (DORU Din)
attacks.description: Releases a destructive shock wave.

title: Final Enemy
(究極の敵
Kyūkyoku no Teki?)

DoruGreymon.name: DoruGreymon
DoruGreymon.description: DoruGreymon is an Animal Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is a massive Digimon whose form was released through the Interface on its brow by the potent life-force data of the legendary beast, the "Dragon", which slept within the deepest parts of its DigiCore, and that holds the alias of "Final Enemy". With its overwhelming stature, it can demolish any dauntlessly courageous Digimon, and even the attacks of the "Nightmare Soldiers" are deflected with one sweep of its wing. As it is highly intelligent, it won't reveal its existence carelessly, so it is difficult to even detect it.

attacks.name: Metal Meteor
attacks.description: Fires a supermassive iron sphere more than ten times its own size, crushing the opponent in one hit.

attacks.name: Bloody Tower
attacks.description: Skewers the opponent before flinging them up into the sky.

title: Final Enemy

Dorulumon.name: Dorulumon
Dorulumon.description: Dorulumonis a Beast Digimon. It is a faithful Digimon with a chivalrous spirit. As it usually sticks to the rock-covered mountains, it often acts alone without flocking with others. The drill on its head is a hardened portion of its hair. It runs over the ground at high speeds and uses "Hit and Away" tactics as its favorite strategy, confounding the opponent by inflicting a single blow, and since Dorulumon can cope against both ground-based and aerial enemies, it can certainly be said to be anall-rounderwarrior. Also, Dorulumon is able to fire its "Drill Cannon" in collaboration with another Digimon by changing into its "Bombardment Mode"(砲撃形態,Hougeki Keitai).

attacks.name: Drill Bit Blitz (Drill Buster)
attacks.description:
Rotates the drill on its head and then shoots it with unerring accuracy.
Triple Drill Bit Blitz

attacks.name: Drill Tornado (Dorulu Tornado)
attacks.description: Enlarges the drill on its tail and then raises a tornado, threatening both ground-based and aerial opponents.

attacks.name: Spiro-Drill (Drill Blader)
attacks.description: Rides the drill on its tail and spins itself, striking the opponent with its body until it is pulverized.

attacks.name: Claw Scratch
attacks.description: Scratches the enemy with a forepaw.

attacks.name: Jumping Claw Scratch
attacks.description: Leaps at the enemy and slashes them with its forepaw.

attacks.name: Charge
attacks.description: Leaps at the enemy and knocks them upwards with its horn.

attacks.name: High Kick
attacks.description: Kicks the enemy with its back legs

attacks.name: Repeated Drill Thrust
attacks.description: Repeatedly stabs the enemy with the drill on its tail.

attacks.name: Backflip Kick
attacks.description: Kicks the enemy whilst doing a backflip.

Dorulumon (Starmons).name: Dorulumon (Starmons)
Dorulumon (Starmons).description: Dorulumon (Starmons) is a DigiFuse between Dorulumon and the Starmons. Welcome to the Jungle Zone!

attacks.name: Drill Tornado
attacks.description: Spins its tail fast enough for limited flight capabilities.

Dorumon.name: Dorumon
Dorumon.description: Dorumon is an Animal Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Because it has an old-style interface on its brow, it is presumed to be an experimental "Prototype Digimon" from before Digimon were discovered. The personality of natural Combat Species Digimon manifests particularly strongly within it, so its combat instinct is high, and it often barks and snaps at everything, but it seems that it was tamed by someone it once bit. The data that is said to have been hidden within the deepest parts of its DigiCore during an experiment is the potent life-force data of the legendary beast, the "Dragon", and it is said it has the potential to grow into a mighty Digimon.

attacks.name: Dash Metal
attacks.description: Fires an iron sphere from its mouth while charging.

attacks.name: Metal Cannon
attacks.description: Stands still and accumulates power, then fires a more powerful iron sphere from its mouth.

attacks.name: Hyper Dash Metal
attacks.description: A strong tackle with even higher speed.

attacks.name: Metal Shoot
attacks.description: Emits a small blast from the mouth.

attacks.name: Beast Attack
attacks.description: Attacks with a swift blow of a powerful beast.

DotAgumon.name: DotAgumon
DotAgumon.description: DotAgumon is a Digimon. It is a subspecies of Agumon which emerged from a keychain game. Its potential is unknown.

attacks.name: Fire Ball
attacks.description: Sets off a blast with balls of fire.

DotFalcomon.name: DotFalcomon
DotFalcomon.description: DotFalcomon is a subspecies of Falcomon which emerged from a keychain game. Its potential is unknown.

attacks.name: Boom Bubble (Air Shot)
attacks.description: Attacks by sending a small ball of air.

Dot-Gaomon.name: Dot-Gaomon
Dot-Gaomon.description: Dot-Gaomon is a voxel version ofGaomon.

Dot-Kamemon.name: Dot-Kamemon
Dot-Kamemon.description: Dot-Kamemon is a voxel version ofKamemon.

Dot-Kudamon.name: Dot-Kudamon
Dot-Kudamon.description: Dot-Kudamon is a voxel version ofKudamon (2006 anime).

Dot-Lalamon.name: Dot-Lalamon
Dot-Lalamon.description: Dot-Lalamon is avoxelversion ofLalamon, done in a similar spirit toDotAgumonand its like but in three dimensions.

DotMirageGaogamon.name: DotMirageGaogamon
DotMirageGaogamon.description: DotMirageGaogamon is a Mega Digimon. It is a special MirageGaogamon that emerged from a keychain game. It is small but has power equal to other Mega Digimon. Its full potential is unknown.

attacks.name: Gale Claw
attacks.description: Slashes with quick claws.

DotShineGreymon.name: DotShineGreymon
DotShineGreymon.description: DotShineGreymon is a sub-species of ShineGreymon which emerged from a keychain game. Though small, it is actually more powerful than a normal ShineGreymon.

attacks.name: Glorious Burst
attacks.description: Burns with fireballs released from its wings.

Doumon.name: Doumon

otherNames.name: 道滿獸/道满兽 Dào mǎn shòu

Doumon.description: Doumon is a Wizard Digimon. Versed in Onmyōdō, it is an onmyōji Digimon that freely uses every technique in battle. Its faculty with magic is particularly high, and its specialty is attacks with amulets and spells. Like Taomon, it is a being that lives and lurks within the darkness, but unlike Taomon, it specializes in death-curses and assassinations. Also, it is able to turn its amulets into shikigami and command them.

attacks.name: Exorcism Scrolls (呪禁札, Jugonsatsu)
attacks.description: Wreathes its talismans around the opponent's body, then detonates them.

attacks.name:
Hidden Gate Divination (鬼門遁甲, Kimon Tonkou, lit. "Demonic Gate, Hidden Jia"): Chants an incantation while painting a barrier in the form of the Sanskrit character "𑖮𑗝𑖽" (Hūṃ) in the air with its gigantic brush, confining the opponent in an eternal labyrinth from which it can never escape.
Fog of Confusion (鬼門遁甲・幻惑陣, Kimon Tonkou: Genwakujin, lit. "Demonic Gate, Hidden Jia: Bewitching Formation")
attacks.description: Chants an incantation that hides its allies from enemy eyes.

attacks.name: Fog of Confusion (鬼門遁甲・幻惑陣, Kimon Tonkou: Genwakujin, lit. "Demonic Gate, Hidden Jia: Bewitching Formation")
attacks.description: Chants an incantation that hides its allies from enemy eyes.

Dracmon.name: Dracmon
Dracmon.description: Dracmon is an Undead Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is the Dark Area's most mischievous Digimon. For the sake of a prank, it will meet the challenge unflinchingly even if it is accompanied by some risk. It once nearly got itself killed trying to graffiti the faces of all four of the Sovereigns...(it's unknown whether it succeeded). It was once a bloodsucking Digimon, but these days, it forgets to suck blood, and it seems it's trying to play some kind of trick on the Royal Knights.

attacks.name: Eye of Nightmare
attacks.description: Casts a spell from the evil eyes on the palms of its hands which causes those who look into it to have their hearts completely dominated by Dracmon.

attacks.name: Undead Fang
attacks.description: Attacks by biting with its fangs.

attacks.name: Demi Dart (Pico Darts)
attacks.description: Attacks with syringes of darkness.

Dracomon.name: Dracomon
Dracomon.description: Dracomonis a Dragon Digimon. It is an ancient, pure-blooded Dragon Digimon that is said to be the "Progenitor" of allDramon-typeDigimon. It possesses physical ability to a degree that could not be imagined from its small build, and both its power and its quick wits are top class among Rookie Digimon. Although its personality is ferocious, Dracomon can show its gentle side only to the others it has recognized. It has wings, but it is unable to fly because they are not sufficiently developed. Also, it has a nature whose primary trait is wanting to collect "shiny things", with an especially strange attachment to gems and metals, and it eats and assimilates its favorite things. Amongst the scales that cover Dracomon's whole body, there is one scale that is called the "Gekirin"(逆鱗,"Gekirin").If it is touched there, Dracomon loses its mind to an excess of anger, and indiscriminately fires its "Great Strike".

attacks.name: Baby Breath
attacks.description: Breathes out a high temperature sigh at the opponent.

attacks.name: Tail Smasher (Tail Smash)
attacks.description: Spins its whole body to deliver a blow with its tail.

attacks.name: Great Strike (ジ・シュルネン, G Shurunen)
attacks.description: Makes the horns on its head glow intensely, then fires a beam shot from the back of its mouth.

Dracomon X.name: Dracomon X
Dracomon X.description: Dracomon X is a Dragon Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its wings have developed further, allowing it to fly for short periods of time. However, the true purpose of its wings has changed to be for its attacking methods rather than flight. By having its wings be relocated to its arms, it is able to raise a wind in the direction it is facing.

attacks.name: Baby Breath
attacks.description: Breathes out a high temperature sigh at the opponent.

attacks.name: Tail Smash
attacks.description: Spins its whole body to deliver a blow with its tail.

attacks.name: Great Strike (ジ・シュルネン, G Shurunen)
attacks.description: Makes the horns on its head glow intensely, then fires a beam shot from the back of its mouth.

attacks.name: Baby Blaze
attacks.description: Attacks enemies over a vast range by letting the flames that it spews out from its mouth be carried by the wind.

attacks.name: Smash Horn
attacks.description: Charges at the enemy with those ultra-high temperature horns. The power of its "Smash Horn" appears to greatly surpass that of the Rookie level.

Dragomon.name: Dragomon
Dragomon.description: Dragomon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It is an evil god Digimon called the "Depraved Monk of the Deep" (Sinful Priest of the Ocean Floor). It is thought to have evolved from a computer virus that would infect the computers aboard ships and the like, then knock their direction and course out of order. It bundles up its innumerable, multiplying tentacles, and takes on a humanoid appearance, but its true shape is a strange evolution of a Mollusk Digimon so it's as much an abomination as any protean thing. It is said that, with just a few exceptions, those who see this true form will have their lives erased from this world. For its defeated opponents, it wears a prayer beads around its neck, chants sutras, and adopts a pose similar to mourning.

attacks.name: Forbidden Trident
attacks.description: Throws its trident with tremendous physical strength.

attacks.name: Tentacle Flapping (無数の触手, Musū no Shokushu, lit. "Innumerable Tentacles")
Thousand Whips (Thousand Whip)
attacks.description: Unleashes numerous tentacles at an opponent.

title: Sinful Priest of the Ocean Floor
Depraved Monk of the Deep
Depraved Priest of the Deep

Drimogemon.name: Drimogemon
Drimogemon.description: Drimogemon is an Animal Digimon. It moves underground at high speeds with the gigantic drill attached to its snout. It is an extremely rare Digimon to come across because it is always digging deep underground. Although it has a meek, shy personality, it is fairly mischievous, and sometimes it takes the favorite bones that Garurumon and BlackGarurumon have buried underground and hides them in different locations. If it were to have been discovered later than NiseDrimogemon, it could have ended up being called "Nise" (偽, "Nise" lit. "Imitation").

attacks.name: Drill Spin
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with its gigantic drill.

attacks.name: Bone Crusher (Crusher Bone)
attacks.description: Throws the bone it stole from Garurumon.

Duramon.name: Duramon
Duramon.description: Duramon is a Weapon Digimon. As it continues to sprint forward, this Ultimate level Digimon is a step closer to crossing into the world on the other side. Although it knows not what future awaits it, it continues training and tempering its swords to cut through any obstacles that stand in its way. When it transforms itself into a weapon, it uses the characteristic greatsword on its back to unleash countless varieties of attacks.

attacks.name: Blinded (Brinded)
attacks.description: Fires a beam attack from its chest, which deals massive damage and carves a '20' mark into the enemy if it lands a direct hit.

attacks.name: Glass Rush (Grass-Slash)
attacks.description: Slices the enemy with the blades on both arms.

Durandamon.name: Durandamon
Durandamon.description: Durandamon is a Holy Sword Digimon. A Digimon possessing the ultimate holy blade, it digivolved by honing its sword to its best ability and attaining data on "legendary swords" found in mythology and video games. Boasting strength that puts it among the strongest Legend-Arms capable of transforming into swords, it is said that wielding Durandamon in sword form will surely bring about victory. Its slashing attacks are fierce enough to cut through any sort of defense, although there have been records that only the strongest of the Legend-Arms Digimon capable of transforming into shields are able to withstand Durandamon's attacks. While both its attacks are powerful enough to take enemies down in one hit, Durandamon's greatest appeal is still its ability to transform into a weapon and unleash slashing attacks.

attacks.name: Zwei Glänze (Deu: Two Gleaming) (Zwanglänze, Deu: Twenty-Gleaming)
attacks.description: Focuses its fighting spirit into the blades on both arms and slices the enemy with them.

attacks.name: Thron Messer (Deu: Throne Knife)
attacks.description: Spins its body to slice multiple enemies in one fell swoop.

Duskmon.name: Duskmon
Duskmon.description: Duskmon is a Demon Man Digimon. It possesses power over Darkness which bears the might of AncientSphinxmon. The regret of various extinct species of Digimon and the "Forbidden Data" on the Net transformed into intense dark energy, and coalesced into Duskmon. The dark energy exists in order to oppose the light of holy beings, and the one who possesses power over Light is the flip side of the same coin. It has a thoroughly evil personality, so it is both callous and cruel. It is the possessor of demon lord-like dignity that is overflowing with perfectionism and confidence. It is invincible in battle when wielding its swords, and does not hesitate with its inhuman attacks. It wields its two demonic "Blut Evolution" (Deu: "Blood Evolution") swords. By the way, due to the ability of the three heads and seven eyes on its armor to act on their own as if they were separate creatures, true evil is sealed in them.

attacks.name: Deadly Gaze (Geist Abend, Deu: Ghost Evening)
attacks.description: Emits shining energy from the eyes all over its body and the mouths on its arms, placing the opponent under hypnosis.

attacks.name: Lunar Plasma (Eroberung, Deu: Conquest)
attacks.description: Slashes a full moon-like arc with the Blut Evolution, absorbing the opponent's power and making it its own.

attacks.name: Gedächtnisstörung (Deu: Memory Disturbance)
attacks.description: Shifts through the memories of its target.

attacks.name: Brute Strike (Blut Strike, Deu: Blood Strike)
attacks.description: Charges its foe with the "Blut Evolution" swords.

attacks.name: Death Gaze
attacks.description: Fires beams from all the eyes on its armor.

attacks.name: Ghost Move
attacks.description: Teleports toward its foes.

attacks.name: Geist Blade Storm (Eroberung Storm, Deu: Conquest Storm)
attacks.description: Slashes the area around it with the power of its "Lunar Plasma" technique.

title: Prince of Darkness
(闇の貴公子
Yami no Kikōshi?)

Dynasmon.name: Dynasmon
Dynasmon.description: Dynasmon is a Warrior Digimon. One of the "Royal Knights", it possesses the powers of the wyvern. It is a unique being among the Royal Knights, in that it serves the lord who embodied its own sense of justice with deep, unquestioning loyalty. For example, for the sake of its own justice, it won't hate its lord even if they are called "Evil". For that reason, it has a strong spirit of chivalry and bushido, with a character that honors devotion, fidelity, and courtesy. With its tenacious, dragon-like power, and dragon armor made from high-purity Chrome Digizoid, it boasts unparalleled strength.

attacks.name: DNA Disintegrator (Dragon's Roar)
attacks.description: Fires energy shots from the palms of its hands, with all the attributes of the Ten Legendary Warriors. In Digimon Frontier, it can also charge energy in its palms and then physically strike a foe repeatedly.

attacks.name: Breath of Wyvern
attacks.description: Transforms its body's energy into an aura of a gigantic wyvern. In Digimon Frontier, it is so powerful that Dynasmon cannot fully control it.

attacks.name: Dragon Collider
attacks.description: The strongest technique from among the Royal Knights.

title: Passionate Warrior
(情熱の闘士
Jounetsu no Toushi?)
Sky High Wyvern
(飛竜衝天
Hiryō Shōten?)

Dynasmon X.name: Dynasmon X
Dynasmon X.description: Dynasmon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and carrier of the X Antibody. Although the powers of the Wyvern have been drawn out exceptionally, transforming it into a baleful figure, its Dragon Armor is mostly composed of the lightest-weight rare metal "Blue Digizoid". Nevertheless, it is because of the excess, tenacious power of the Wyvern that makes the large, heavyweight Dynasmon reach high altitudes in an instant with a sweep of its wings. As long as it is for the sake of its lord, it will unleash its "Dragon's Gust".

attacks.name: Wyvern's Breath (Breath of Wyvern)
attacks.description: Transforms its body's energy into an aura of a gigantic wyvern.

attacks.name: Dragon's Gust
attacks.description: Thrusts the gigantic horns on its head, soars, and then charges at the enemy with its body, leading it to being the most skilful among the Royal Knights in aerial combat.

attacks.name: Dragon's Roar
attacks.description: Fires energy shots from the palms of its hands, with all the attributes of the Ten Legendary Warriors.

title: Holy Knight Wyvern

Eaglemon.name: Eaglemon
Eaglemon.description: Eaglemon is a Giant Bird Digimon. Its body is clad in gold armor made of Chrondigizoit, so it deflects every attack. Also, Eaglemon is said to be a form of the Ultimate Digimon "Parrotmon" that digivolved. It is said that it is Eaglemon's duty to annihilate the invaders that enter the Digital World.

attacks.name: Kaiser Phoenix
attacks.description: Performs a ramming attack with its full metal body.

attacks.name: Mystic Break
attacks.description: Fires a white ray which reduces the opponent to ash.

Ebemon.name: Ebemon
Ebemon.description: Ebemon is a Cyborg Digimon. It was artificially created from a Vademon that was captured and had its configuration data analyzed and improved. In an American facility, called "Area 51", it seems they were using and building extraterrestrial technology, but the truth is shrouded in mystery. It is said that the USA is covertly conducting research and development on Digimon in order to take possession of the Digital World.

attacks.name: Crusher Bone (Brain Rupture)
attacks.description: Fires a cracking program into the opponent's brain with the gun it holds in its left hand, then absorbs all the data stored in their brain.

attacks.name: Neuro Destroyer (Planet Destroyer)
attacks.description: Releases all of its accumulated power and fires off a shot from the gun in its right hand that is said to be able to instantly destroy a single planet.

Ebemon X.name: Ebemon X
Ebemon X.description: Ebemon X is a Cyborg Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Ebemon's ability to continuously make further improvements to itself was demonstrated at a certain country's "Area 51". The gun in its right hand is so high performing that it can even be regarded as its second brain; it instantly makes calculations for any location or target and fires its "Planet Destroyer Justice", which is always shot with 100% accuracy even if it is a little forced. A shot that is considered to be a misfire is also a way of showing and justifying that the outcome was within its calculations.

attacks.name: Brain Rupture
attacks.description: Fires a cracking program into the opponent's brain with the gun it holds in its left hand, then absorbs all the data stored in their brain.

attacks.name: Planet Destroyer
attacks.description: Releases all of its accumulated power and fires off a shot from the gun in its right hand that is said to be able to instantly destroy a single planet.

EbiBurgamon.name: EbiBurgamon
EbiBurgamon.description: EbiBurgamon is a Food Digimon. It is a Digimon that took in food data, and maybe because it consists of the selected ingredient data, it is a Digimon with a pure heart. EbiBurgamon is a variant species of Burgermon, and has taken in the ingredient data of fresh shrimp. It aims to start a first-rate hamburger restaurant that will bring in a lot of customers with Burgermon.

attacks.name: Fresh Shrimp
attacks.description: Produces a smell savory enough to stop the opponent in their tracks.

attacks.name: Hot Cutlet
attacks.description: Produces a smell savory enough to stop the opponent in their tracks.

Ebidramon.name: Ebidramon
Ebidramon.description: Ebidramon is a Crustacean Digimon. It is a nonconformist of the Dramon-type which has a tough, shrimp-like shell and gigantic pincers. If one is misled by its outward appearance and makes light of Ebidramon, they will become prey of the offensive ability characteristic of the Dramon-type.

attacks.name: Twin Scissors (Twin Neptune)
attacks.description: Swoops down on the opponent with its two pincers.

attacks.name: Water Wave
attacks.description: Attacks with a big tsunami.

Ebonwumon.name: Ebonwumon
Ebonwumon.description: Ebonwumon is an Animal Digimon. It is the "Digimon Sovereign" that guards the North, and commands the Deva Vikaralamon, Kumbhiramon, and Vajramon. It uses phantasmagoric water techniques, and, as the oldest of the Four Sovereigns, it possesses a gentle personality.

attacks.name: Mugen (霧幻, Mugen lit. "Misty Illusion")
attacks.description: Displays an illusion which generates a dark mist around the opponent, destroying their spirit.

Ekakimon.name: Ekakimon
debut: "A Great UFO-Dragon Gathering! Ekakimon of Dreams" [72]
Ekakimon.description: Ekakimon is a Mutant Digimon. It is the Digimon with the greatest passion for art amongst everyone in the Digital World. Its body is made up of vibrant colored pencils, and it is always drawing pictures that it likes no matter the time and place. The pencils can also be used for its attack Colorful Change, which changes depending on the colors used.

attacks.name: Colorful Change
attacks.description: Its attacks turn fire-elemental when red is used, water-elemental when blue is used, grass-elemental when green is used, and so on and so forth.

attacks.name: Mini Mini Ekakimon
attacks.description: Draws tiny Ekakimon and causes them to materialize into Mini Mini Ekakimon, which it will order around like henchmen to fight the opponent.

attacks.name: Ekakikaki (エカキカキ, Ekakikaki lit. "Artist's Sketch")
attacks.description: Licks a drawing and brings it to life.

ElDradimon.name: ElDradimon
ElDradimon.description: ElDradimon is a Mutant Digimon. It once wandered into the research data for ancient ruins on a neglected computer, and over a long period of time, it unified with that data. If it retracts its head, arms, and legs, it looks like nothing more than the ruins of an ancient fortress. Due to the enormous quantity of research data it holds, it has become a slow-witted Digimon with a large build, but it is probably difficult to bring down even if it is attacked by scores of Digimon. It is definitely an impregnable Digimon.

attacks.name: Golden Road
attacks.description: Charges the opponent with its large body and breaks through, even if it suffers an attack in the process.

attacks.name: Meteor Earthquake
attacks.description: Strikes with its gigantic foot, shaking the earth itself.

attacks.name: Giant Nipper
attacks.description: Bites through the opponent with the power of its mighty jaws.

Elecmon.name: Elecmon
Elecmon.description: Elecmonis a Mammal Digimon. It retainedTsunomon's mammal-like elements and digivolved. It's very curious and lively, and inherited its prank-loving personality from Tsunomon. Also, Elecmon possesses nine tails, and during battle, it fans out its tails like the plumage of a peacock to intimidate its opponent.

attacks.name: Super Thunder Strike (Sparkling Thunder)
attacks.description: Shoots electric bolts from its tails.

attacks.name: Body Attack (たいあたり, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Blow")
Nine Tails
attacks.description: Smacks foe with its electrically-charged tails.

attacks.name: Lightning Knife (Thunder Knife)
attacks.description: Stealthily releases three knives of electricity.

Elecmon (Violet).name: Elecmon (Violet)
Elecmon (Violet).description: Elecmon (Violet) is a Mammal Digimon. It is an Elecmon that evolved into a Virus-species. Due to its indiscriminately mean and unpleasant personality, it dexterously uses its tails to strike the enemy.

attacks.name: Jamming Thunder
attacks.description: Shoots electric bolts from its tails.

attacks.name: Dark Tail (Tail's Tusk)
attacks.description: Smacks foe with its electrically-charged tails.

attacks.name: Assassin Bolt (Assassin's Bolt)
attacks.description: Stealthily releases three darts of electricity.

Elephantmon.name: Elephantmon
Elephantmon.description: Elephantmon is an Android Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Miracles". It is a Super Digimon that overwhelms other Digimon with its large build and extreme power, and that is able to travel at high speed, contrary to its appearance, due to the gigantic turbines on both of its ears. It can't fly through the sky using its turbines, but with their hovering function, it is capable of traveling even on water because it moves by slightly raising its body from the ground. Although its personality is very gentle, Elephantmon is a terrifying being as far as evil Digimon are concerned since it is a Digimon with a deep sense of justice.

attacks.name: Turbine Wave (Nitro Turbine Wave)
attacks.description: Vertically raises the turbines on both of its ears, spinning them at maximum output, and then generates a shock wave on the same level as a huge typhoon.

EmperorGreymon.name: EmperorGreymon
EmperorGreymon.description: EmperorGreymon is a Dragon Warrior Digimon. It is a Transcendent-species Digimon that possesses power over Flame which is said to have surpassed even the might of the Ten Legendary Warriors. It is said to bear the power of the nine dragon's veins that flow through Gaia, and it has been prophesied that if it can restrain the might of the nine dragons, it will demonstrate unfathomable ability and even be able to rule Gaia. It is said that, in order to control their power, it possesses the "Ryuugonken" (龍魂剣, Ryūgonken, lit. "Dragon Soul Sword") in which the dragon's souls are sealed.

attacks.name: Dragonfire Crossbow (炎龍撃, Enryūgeki, lit. "Flame Dragon Attack")
attacks.description: Fires arrows from the Ryūgonken, whose flames are so intense that they become a white light.

attacks.name:
Pyro Dragons (九頭龍陣, Kuzuryūjin, lit. "Nine-headed Dragon Array"): Releases the eight dragon's veins dwelling within Gaia, then becomes the final dragon itself and pulverizes the opponent with the Ryūgonken.
Hikuzuryūjin (飛九頭龍陣, Hikuzuryūjin lit. "Flying Nine-headed Dragon Array")
attacks.description: Slashes downward with the Ryūgonken in the air.

attacks.name: Hikuzuryūjin (飛九頭龍陣, Hikuzuryūjin lit. "Flying Nine-headed Dragon Array")
attacks.description: Slashes downward with the Ryūgonken in the air.

attacks.name: Ryūgonken (龍魂剣, Ryūgonken lit. "Dragon Soul Sword")
attacks.description: Slashes with the Ryūgonken.

attacks.name:
Enjin (焔刃, Enjin lit. "Flame Edge"): Slashes with the Ryūgonken.
Kūenjin (空焔刃, Kūenjin lit. "Air Flame Edge"): Slashes with the Ryūgonken in the air.
Hayate Homura (疾風焔, Hayate Homura lit. "Gale Flame")
attacks.description: Performs a lunging slash with the Ryūgonken.

attacks.name: Kūenjin (空焔刃, Kūenjin lit. "Air Flame Edge")
attacks.description: Slashes with the Ryūgonken in the air.

attacks.name: Hayate Homura (疾風焔, Hayate Homura lit. "Gale Flame")
attacks.description: Performs a lunging slash with the Ryūgonken.

attacks.name:
Rengokukenbu (煉獄剣舞, Rengokukenbu lit. "Purgatory Sword Dance"): Performs a dashing lunge with the Ryūgonken.
Ni no Mai (二の舞, Ni no Mai lit. "Second Dance"): Performs a second slash after Rengokukenbu.
San no Mai (三の舞, San no Mai lit. "Third Dance")
attacks.description: Performs a third slash after Ni no Mai.

attacks.name: Ni no Mai (二の舞, Ni no Mai lit. "Second Dance")
attacks.description: Performs a second slash after Rengokukenbu.

attacks.name: San no Mai (三の舞, San no Mai lit. "Third Dance")
attacks.description: Performs a third slash after Ni no Mai.

title: Transcendental Warrior of Radiant Flame
(輝焔の超越戦士
Kien no Chōetsu Senshi?)

Entmon.name: Entmon
Entmon.description: Entmonis a Plant Digimon. It is a Digimon with a body woven and fused together from decayed trees. Its whole body is corroded in several places, and mold grows on parts where the bark is exposed. Its body is packed with a large number of insects, acting as the muscles that move its body around. It is very terrifying to see the insects spill out of the joints all over its body each time it takes off with its dead leaf wings.

attacks.name: Dryad Stinger
attacks.description: Skewers the enemy with its sharp stake-like tusk.

attacks.name: Blasted Disaster
attacks.description: Spews a dark miasma which completely withers the opponent's body. The true form of the miasma is countless tiny insects that turn a Digimon's data into nourishment.

Etemon.name: Etemon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Yasunori Masutani(Adventure/Cyber Sleuth/New Century/Adventure:),Yoshiyuki Kouno(Xros Wars, Chief)
Etemon.description: Etemonis a Puppet Digimon. It is an unidentified Digimon that suddenly appeared in the Digital World. It calls itself the "King of Digimon", and its fighting strength is beyond imagination. And, well, it's rumored that it pulls the strings of the mysterious Digimon "Monzaemon". It is dressed in its reinforced "Monkey Suit"(サルスーツ,Saru Sūtsu)which can endure every attack, and even today, it bustles about the whole world for the sake of its unending battles.It is a close rival ofVolcamon.

attacks.name: Concert Crush (Love Serenade)
attacks.description: Breaks the opponent's heart and makes their fighting spirit vanish.

attacks.name:
Dark Network (Dark Spirits): Attacks with a dark sphere that consumes everything it touches.
Dark Spirit
attacks.description:
Tosses a dark sphere that consumes everything it touches.
Kūchū Dark Spirit (空中ダークスピリット, Kūchū Dark Spirit lit. "Aerial Dark Spirit") Uses Dark Spirit while in midair.

attacks.name: Dark Spirit
attacks.description: Tosses a dark sphere that consumes everything it touches.

attacks.name: Kūchū Dark Spirit (空中ダークスピリット, Kūchū Dark Spirit lit. "Aerial Dark Spirit") Uses Dark Spirit while in midair.
Monkey Kick (Monkick)
attacks.description: Attacks with a strong hard kick.

attacks.name:
Grateful Knuckle: Punches the enemy.
Dash Grateful Knuckle
attacks.description: Punches the enemy while sliding.

attacks.name: Dash Grateful Knuckle
attacks.description: Punches the enemy while sliding.

attacks.name: Dark Musical
attacks.description: Sings a song that is totally off-key.

title: King of Digimon

Espimon.name: Espimon
Espimon.description: Espimon is an Android Digimon. It is a Digimon that immediately flies in to investigate whenever it catches wind of gossip and suspicion flowing into the Digital World. It will bravely infiltrate places in order to find out the truth, even if they are inhabited by dangerous Digimon. When it switches its eyes to Search Mode, it is able to clearly see objects several kilometres away. It is said that the Crack Team tests its cracking ability by controlling Espimon, though the veracity of this rumor is unknown.

attacks.name: Mot Bomb
attacks.description: Fires a self-propulsive automatically-detonating explosive that it can use as a decoy if the circumstances require it. In Digimon Dreamers, the explosive resembles Botamon. In the Digimon Card Game, they resemble mice.

attacks.name: Divanish
attacks.description: Presses the switch on its stomach to enable camouflage completely blending into its surroundings so it can avoid detection and do reconnaissance.

Etemon (Chaos).name: Etemon (Chaos)

otherNames.name: エテモン（パワーアップ） Etemon (Power Up)

Etemon (Chaos).description: Etemon (Chaos) is a form Etemon assumes after fusing with the Dark Network. The Earthquake of Metalgreymon

attacks.name: Dark Spirits
attacks.description: Throws a dark sphere at the opponent.

attacks.name: Dark Spirits Chaos
attacks.description: Throws a dark sphere at the opponent.

Eosmon (Champion).name: Eosmon (Champion)
debut: Digimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Dash X)andDigimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Mirai)

otherNames.name: エオスモン 第1形態 Eosmon 1st Form

Eosmon (Champion).description: Eosmon (Champion)is an Unknown Digimon. It is an artificial Digimon that was created based onMorphomon. The prevailing view that the final form of artificial Digimon goes up to Rookie was overturned due to the zeal of researchers and the changing of the times, and it accomplished a digivolution to Champion. Since Eosmon lacks emotion and moves according to the researcher's instructions, its good or wicked behavior is down to the researcher. Its transparent, panel-shaped wings are used in its "Mirror Guard".

attacks.name: Mirror Guard
attacks.description: Spreads its transparent, panel-shaped wings to protect itself or the target.

attacks.name: Mirror Dust
attacks.description: Detaches its transparent, panel-shaped wings and sends them flying at the enemy.

attacks.name: Bolt Rip
attacks.description: Mixes its scales with electric shocks gathered in its palms and fires them at the enemy.

Eosmon (Ultimate).name: Eosmon (Ultimate)
debut: Digimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Dash X)andDigimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Mirai)

otherNames.name: エオスモン 第2形態 Eosmon 2nd Form

Eosmon (Ultimate).description: Eosmon (Ultimate)is an Unknown Digimon. It is the formEosmon (Champion)digivolved into when a problem occurred as it was carrying out a mission. Its transparent panels have developed significantly, and it has acquired high-speed movement with its enormous wings and high offensive power with its gigantic hands. In addition, it can also create illusions that bewilder the enemy as a mirror of themselves. It transforms into its Beast Mode by rearranging its transparent panels, and attacks the enemy.Eosmon (Mega)is able to generate new Eosmon (Ultimate) from its swollen tail, increasing its subordinates.

attacks.name: Beat Press
attacks.description: Crushes the enemy with its gigantic hands.

attacks.name: Hexa-thunder
attacks.description: Unleashes an electric attack from its antennae.

attacks.name: Cutting Edge
attacks.description: Throws panel-shaped energy in its hands to slash the enemy.

Eosmon (Mega).name: Eosmon (Mega)
debut: Digimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Dash X)andDigimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Mirai)

otherNames.name: エオスモン 最終形態 Eosmon Final Form

Eosmon (Mega).description: Eosmon (Mega)is an Unknown Digimon. It is a Mega-levelEosmonthat was born after several of the Eosmon that were created formed a single collective entity as a result of a researcher losing control when things did not go as they expected. It will destroy any obstacle, and act violently just as instructed. It is able to generate newEosmon (Ultimate)from its swollen tail, increasing its subordinates.

attacks.name: Aurora Stream
attacks.description: A beam fired from its chest.

attacks.name: Cutting Edge
attacks.description: Teleports and slashes the enemy.

attacks.name: Cruelty Rain
attacks.description: Enlarges the panels protecting it, causing them to rain down over the enemy, crushing them.

Evil Grademon.name: Evil Grademon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Fall of the Final Code Crown" [29]
Evil Grademon.description: Evil Grademon is a Warrior Digimon. It is a form of Grademon that has been transformed by evil. Final Fusion - The Fight For Earth!

attacks.name: Cross Blade
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent apart crosswise with the godly speed of its sword.

Evilbeast Laylamon.name: Evilbeast Laylamon

otherNames.name: 魔獣リリスモン Monster Lilithmon

Evilbeast Laylamon.description: Evilbeast Laylamon consists ofLilithmonfused ontoBlastmon's head from the waist down and assuming a massive, bestial form.

Examon.name: Examon
Examon.description: Examon is a Holy Knight Digimon. One of the "Royal Knights", it possesses an extraordinary data size, so traditional digital tools were unable to completely render it, and its existence was discovered because it finally became possible to render it with the use of state-of-the-art digital tools. Though it belongs to the Royal Knights, it is simultaneously a being which stands at the top of all Dragon Digimon, and holds the alias of "Dragon Emperor". It possesses the gigantic, sentient wings "Caledfwlch" and the gigantic lance Ambrose ("Ambrosius"). The Caledfwlch is a unique set of wings composed entirely of Chrome Digizoid, and at its own will, it can at times change into wings for flight, or into a shield which defends Examon. The gigantic lance "Ambrose" is loaded with special shells stocked with viruses which possess various effects, so Examon's attacks are quite diverse.

attacks.name: Avalon's Gate
attacks.description: Stabs the opponent with the Ambrose (Ambrosius) and explodes all of its special shells, annihilating them from within.

attacks.name: Pendragon's Glory
attacks.description: Rockets up to the exosphere and conducts a high-powered laser firing.

attacks.name: Dragonic Impact
attacks.description: Dives from the exosphere and performs a ramming attack shrouded in heat from friction with the atmosphere, mopping up swaths of enemies with the accompanying shock wave.

attacks.name: Ambrose Strike
attacks.description: Impales the enemy with its tail and flings them before charging and stabbing them with Ambrose (Ambrosius).

attacks.name: Caledfwlch Dive
attacks.description: Dives into the enemy.

title: Dragon Emperor
(竜帝
Ryūtei?)

Examon X.name: Examon X
Examon X.description: Examon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its Holy Knight-type data has been drawn out, so it appears like a knight wearing a helmet and armor. It overflows with Dragon-type and Holy Knight-type power which swirls, creating Dragonic Plasma. Its high-energy "Ultimate Battle Dragonlance Ambrose" (究極戦竜槍アンブロジウス, Kyūkyoku Senryūsou Ambrosius, lit. "Ultimate-Battle-Dragonlance-Ambrosius") possesses sentience, and the amount of energy it releases varies depending on how strong the opponent is.

attacks.name: Avalon's Gate
attacks.description: Stabs the opponent with the Ambrose (Ambrosius) and explodes all of its special shells, annihilating them from within.

attacks.name: Pendragon's Glory
attacks.description: Rockets up to the exosphere and conducts a high-powered laser firing.

attacks.name: Dragonic Impact
attacks.description: Dives from the exosphere and performs a ramming attack shrouded in heat from friction with the atmosphere, mopping up swaths of enemies with the accompanying shock wave.

attacks.name: Thunder Sword Bureiragaha (雷剣ブレイラガハ, Raiken Bureiragaha)
attacks.description: Twelve Thunder Sword Bureiragaha appear from the lightning that falls from its Dragonic Plasma which it fires at the enemy.

attacks.name: Pendragon Sparkle
attacks.description: Impales the enemy with its fully unleashed "Ultimate Battle Dragonlance Ambrose" (究極戦竜槍アンブロジウス, Kyūkyoku Senryūsou Ambrosius, lit. "Ultimate-Battle-Dragonlance-Ambrosius"), and lets loose large thunderbolts from its Dragonic Plasma. No enemy can withstand it.

Exermon.name: Exermon
Exermon.description: Exermon is an Insectoid Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved from yoga lesson data. It mainly lives in high mountainous regions, and fights using its own style of taijutsu, which adopts unique movements similar to those of a mollusk. It has an excellent sense of balance in that it supports its own weight with the stinger on its rump, and its core never shakes regardless of what unnatural pose it takes. It absorbs sunlight through its antennae, and converts it into electrical energy within its body.

attacks.name: Insec Mind
attacks.description: Confuses intruders with its telepathic ability which manifests using its antennae as a medium.

attacks.name: Defibrilla-Shock
attacks.description: Touches the opponent with its palms, which act as positive and negative electrodes, delivering an electric shock.

ExoGrimmon.name: ExoGrimmon
ExoGrimmon.description: ExoGrimmon is a Digimon. It is the further digivolved form of ChaosGrimmon.

attacks.name: Chrono DSR (Chrono Destruction)
attacks.description: Causes the degeneration and annihilation of all Digimon.

attacks.name: Air God (Call Air God)
attacks.description: Summons an air god to drop lightning.

attacks.name: Death God (Call Death God)
attacks.description: Summons a death god to attack its enemies.

attacks.name: Prominence
attacks.description: Immolates its targets with with pyres of flames.

attacks.name: Moon Tears
attacks.description: Heals with tears of light from the moon.

ExTyrannomon.name: ExTyrannomon
ExTyrannomon.description: ExTyrannomon is a Puppet Digimon. It sneaks around within a Tyrannomon-shaped plush toy. The reason why it is a Tyrannomon plush toy is unclear, but it is likely that the mysterious Digimon that is stealing away inside just broke into the plush toy that was closest. However, this plush toy possesses power rivaling that of Monzaemon at its limits and the defensive power of an impregnable fortress, so ordinary Digimon and the like are completely unable to oppose it. However, like Monzaemon, if nothing is pulling its strings, then it is nothing but an ornament.

attacks.name: Pretty Attack
attacks.description: Uses its cute plush body to fight.

attacks.name: Black Matter
attacks.description: The Digimon within ExTyrannomon unleashes an evil orb.

ExVeemon.name: ExVeemon
ExVeemon.description: ExVeemon is a Mythical Dragon Digimon. It attained Veemon's natural power and digivolved. ExVeemon is a purebreed of Veedramon, and it is said that the variant species is Veedramon. The attacks it unleashes through its developed arm and leg strength are tremendous, and are powerful enough to destroy a mountain of rock without leaving a trace. It is feared because it possesses such destructive power, but in reality, it has a strong sense of justice, and will not use that power recklessly.

attacks.name: Vee-Laser (X-Laser)
attacks.description: Emits an energy wave from the "X" pattern on its chest.

attacks.name: Critical Crunch (Strong Crunch)
attacks.description: Attacks with a powerful biting technique.

attacks.name: Hearty Shatter
attacks.description: Shoots a large fireball from its mouth.

attacks.name: Combination
attacks.description: A combination attack consisting of a punch, two kicks, and an elbow drop.

attacks.name: Spinning Lariat
attacks.description: Spins around, hitting the enemy with both arms.

ExVeemon (Virus).name: ExVeemon (Virus)
ExVeemon (Virus).description: ExVeemon (Virus)is a Mythical Animal Digimon. It is a mythical dragon who controls the blue thunder which pierces evil.

Eyesmon.name: Eyesmon
debut: Digimon Adventure:, "The Jet-Black Shadow Invades Tokyo", [16]
Eyesmon.description: Eyesmonis a Demon Dragon Digimon. It is a Digimon capable of concealing itself in shadows. The more data it accumulates, the stronger it becomes, and its power surpasses even that of Ultimates depending on how much it has stored. It possesses many eyes, and does not miss any of the enemy's movements.

attacks.name: Janengan (邪念眼, Janengan lit. "Wicked Thought Eye")
attacks.description: A cursed beam fired from all of its eyes.

attacks.name: Deceptive Illusion (愚幻, Gugen)
attacks.description: Transforms the data it has accumulated into objects and uses them for offense and defense.

title: Jet-Black Shadow
(漆黒の影
Shikkoku no kage?)

Eyesmon Scatter Mode.name: Eyesmon Scatter Mode
debut: Digimon Adventure:, "And to the Digital World" [03]
Eyesmon Scatter Mode.description: Eyesmon Scatter Modeis a Demon Dragon Digimon. They are the scattered form ofEyesmon. They monitorsocial networking serviceswhere large quantities of data leak, and consume and store larger data. Their power is weak due to them being scattered about, but once they sense that they are in danger, they will converge into one asEyesmonand counterattack.

attacks.name: Janengan (邪念眼, Janengan lit. "Wicked Thought Eye")
attacks.description: A cursed beam fired from its eyes.

attacks.name: Shadow Bind (影縛り, Kageshibari)
attacks.description: Enters the enemy's shadow and controls its movements.

title: Jet-Black Shadow
(漆黒の影
Shikkoku no kage?)

Fake Agumon Expert.name: Fake Agumon Expert
Fake Agumon Expert.description: Fake Agumon Expert is a Dinosaur Digimon. It is a genius Agumon that has a doctorate in Digital Monster studies from Digital World Academy. It is said that its title is plagiarized from Agumon Expert. It is not as knowledgeable about Digimon types and territories as Agumon Expert, and instead, it rather unscrupulously spreads lies, so caution is necessary. However, as only its feelings of rivalry for Agumon Expert are genuine, it is diligent in not leaving Agumon Expert any research ideas, in order to inconvenience it. From top to toe, it is "Fake".

attacks.name: Fake Mortarboard (ニセハカセボウ, Nise Hakase Bou, lit. "Imitation Professor's Hat")
attacks.description: Tries to enchant itself with cleverness through its hat.

attacks.name: Fake Professor's Rod (ニセハカセボー, Nise Hakase Bō, lit. "Imitation Professor's Rod")
attacks.description: Tries to persuade the opponent with its rod.

Falcomon.name: Falcomon
Falcomon.description: Falcomonis an Avian Digimon. It lives on 3000m-tall mountains, but as its wings are not very developed, it's not so much able to fly, as it is to glide, so instead it's able to run about the craggy mountains at great speed, using its powerful leg strength. Because it has a rough temperament, you must be careful because if you approach carelessly, you will get fiercely attacked.

attacks.name: Scratch Smash
attacks.description: Scratches with its wing claws.

attacks.name: Falco Rush
attacks.description: Unleashes an attack through its powerful leg strength.

Falcomon (2006 anime).name: Falcomon (2006 anime)
Falcomon (2006 anime).description: Falcomon (2006 anime) is a Bird Digimon. It is a subspecies of Falcomon whose wings have developed to allow it to fly freely in the air, in contrast to normal Falcomon, who possess powerful leg strength. Despite its ability to fly, it seems to be obsessed with making its appearance from above by flying in on a kite, like a ninja.

attacks.name: Scratch Smash
attacks.description: Scratches with its wing claws.

attacks.name: Ninja Blade (手裏裏剣, Shuririnken)
attacks.description: Rapidly throws throwing stars.

attacks.name: Firecracker Smokescreen (打竹落し, Uchitake Otoshi, lit. "Uchitake Drop")
attacks.description: Drops exploding bamboo cylinders.

attacks.name: Wind Blade (風刃の術, Fuujin no Jutsu, lit. "Wind Blade Technique")
attacks.description: Flaps its wings to produce a wind that can cut like a blade.

attacks.name: Shadow Screen (幻惑の術, Genwaku no Jutsu, lit. "Illusion Technique")
attacks.description: Uses digital ninjutsu to confuse the enemy.

attacks.name: Falco Rush
attacks.description: Tramps on the opponent's head while in the air.

attacks.name: Beak Attack (Kuchibashi Attack)
attacks.description: Pokes with a hard beak.

FanBeemon.name: FanBeemon
FanBeemon.description: FanBeemon is an Insectoid Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It belongs to the mysterious "aerial, covert honey base, Royal Base". Although its daily life differs from that of other Insectoid Digimon, it is a strong, dedicated worker due to its personality being so cheerful. It always gets along with Plant Digimon like Palmon or Lillymon. Because the base is usually under construction, it has the duty of carrying home data left on fields of flowers or vegetation, little by little, to use as raw materials, causing it to be classified as a Virus-species. Also, because the base is defended by powerful Digimon, making it impossible to approach, the goal of that construction is a mystery at present. It's wisest to just run away when it uses its "Hachi Hachi Call".

attacks.name: Gear Sting (Gear Stinger)
attacks.description: Rapid-fires tiny, serrated stingers.

attacks.name: Hachi Hachi Call (88 Call)
attacks.description: Reddens its antennae and contacts its allies, summoning a huge crowd of its comrades.

Fangmon.name: Fangmon
Fangmon.description: Fangmon is a Demon Beast Digimon. It lives deep in the heart of the forest, and preys upon those who lose their way. It is said that it is definitely the data of the Big Bad Wolf that appears within many fairy-tales that became a Digimon, and once it sets its sights on a prey, they will never escape, as it sometimes goes so far as to disguise itself as someone dear to its prey in order to get closer. It has a heretical existence among Dog and Wolf-species Digimon, and if Garurumon is a being of light, then Fangmon is a being of darkness.

attacks.name: Snipe Steal
attacks.description: Uses its sharpened agility to steal things like weapons and items from the opponent.

Fanglongmon Ruin Mode.name: Fanglongmon Ruin Mode
Fanglongmon Ruin Mode.description: Fanglongmon Ruin Mode is a Kemonogami.

attacks.name: Raikou (雷公, Raikō, lit. "Sovereign Thunder")
attacks.description: Fires red lightning at the enemy.

attacks.name: Mukyoku (無極, lit. "Limitlessness")
attacks.description: Fires a dark energy beam at the enemy.

Filmon.name: Filmon
Filmon.description: Filmon is a Beast Digimon. With many large spikes sprouting out of its body, it has sharp red claws that can slice anything, and yellow quills that inject energy into whatever it pierces. It has a carefree personality, the kind that likes to collect soft material that help it to sleep easily in its nest or search for its favorite foods.

attacks.name: Lightning Stinger
attacks.description: Skewers the enemy and injects energy into them that destroys their data.

attacks.name: Crimson Slash
attacks.description: Whirls in a continuous slashing attack with both claws.

Firamon.name: Firamon
Firamon.description: Firamon is a Beast Digimon resembling a winged lion. It is Coronamon's Champion form and, through digivolution, has gained flight and speed. It protects the historical remains in the Digital World from those who would destroy it, and is a good leader. It is also known as the "Sky-flying Lion".

attacks.name: Flame Dive
attacks.description: Charges from the sky with its body enveloped in flames.

attacks.name: Fira Claw
attacks.description: Slices an opponent to pieces with its powerful, flaming front legs.

attacks.name: Fira Bomb
attacks.description: Focuses power into its forehead and unleashes a flaming bomb.

title: Sky-flying Lion
(空を翔る獅子
Sky-soaring Lion?)

Flamedramon.name: Flamedramon
Flamedramon.description: Flamedramon is a Dragon Man Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Courage". The "Digi-Egg of Courage" has the attribute of "Flame", and those that don this Digi-Egg have their combat ability rise like blazing flames, allowing them to perform attacks on enemy Digimon with intense power.

attacks.name: Fire Rocket (Knuckle Fire)
attacks.description: Shoots fireballs from its fist.

attacks.name: Fire Rocket
attacks.description: Surrounds itself in an aura of fire and then shoots itself towards its opponent like a rocket.

attacks.name: Flame Shield
attacks.description: Attacks while surrounded by an aura of fire.

attacks.name: Express Claw (Claw Express) A claw attack combo.
Flame Shot
attacks.description: Covered in flames, it cuts diagonally upwards using its helmet blade.

attacks.name: Flame Fist
attacks.description: A firey punch.

title: Fire of Courage
(燃え上がる勇気
Moeagaru Yuuki?
lit. "Blazing Courage")

Flamemon.name: Flamemon
Flamemon.description: Flamemon is a Demon Man Digimon. It was transformed into a half-beast, half-man form when Agunimon lost its power. It is missing the "Combat Instinct" that Digimon naturally possess, and moreover, it has lost power. However, it is a being that has inherited the Human Spirit of Flame of AncientGreymon, so although it has lost power, ordinary Champion-class Digimon aren't a match for it. If anything, it has kindness inappropriate for a Digimon and is similar to a Rookie Digimon, counterbalancing its mischievous part.

attacks.name: Monkey Ball (Baby Salamander)
attacks.description: Fires off an aura of flames.

attacks.name: Noble Heart
attacks.description: A flaming uppercut.

attacks.name: Flame Toss
attacks.description: Tosses a small fireball.

FlameWizardmon.name: FlameWizardmon
FlameWizardmon.description: FlameWizardmon is a Demon Man Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Courage". While Wizardmon is shy and does not show its true face, it is the exact opposite and confidently shows its true face. It wields two matchstick-like canes, which further enhance the effectiveness of its fire magic (a high-class programming language).

attacks.name: Fire Cloud
attacks.description: Changes its surroundings into a firestorm.

Flaremon.name: Flaremon
Flaremon.description: Flaremon is a Beast Man Digimon. It is Coronamon's Ultimate form and the digivolved form of Firamon. It seems to have gained near unbelievable speed and has learned advanced fighting skills. However, it seems this new power came at the cost of its ability to fly.

attacks.name: Guren Juuouha (紅蓮獣王波, Guren Juuouha lit. "Crimson Beast-King Wave")
attacks.description: Fires an energy shot from its hands that looks like a lion's head.

attacks.name: Kurenai Shishi no Mai (紅・獅子の舞, Kurenai Shishi no Mai lit. "Red Lion Dance")
attacks.description: Unleashes multiple flaming punches and kicks upon an opponent.

attacks.name: Purifying Howl (清々の咆哮, Seisei no Houkou)
attacks.description: Unleashes an energy blast while howling to destroy an opponent's data.

Flarerizamon.name: Flarerizamon
Flarerizamon.description: Flarerizamon is a Fire Digimon. It is a Digimon whose entire body is wrapped in flames. It is a hot-blooded Digimon that possesses both a heart that burns like fire and the power of a dragon. Although the flames throughout its body are generated by its high-temperature skin combusting, its skin has remarkable regenerative abilities, and so Flarerizamon is able to continue burning until it is extinguished. In addition, the claws on both its arms are scorched in the flames across its body and have become extremely hot, so the opponent that it has torn apart suffers double damage from being both lacerated and burned.

attacks.name: Tower of Fire (Fire Tower)
attacks.description: Blasts the flames of its entire body at the enemy in the form of an enormous pillar.

attacks.name: Blaze Buster (Flame Hit)
attacks.description: Continuously fires high-temperature flaming shots.

attacks.name: Fire Breath
attacks.description: Strikes with a fireball causing a pillar of fire.

Floramon.name: Floramon
Floramon.description: Floramon is a Vegetation Digimon. Although it has digivolved like a reptile, just like Palmon, it is categorized as an unusual Digimon of the Vegetation type. Its whole face has the appearance of a flower, and the petal-styled shell usually protects its head like a helmet. When intruders are not around or when it's in a good mood, the petals on its head and both of its arms open up wide. It sees Palmon as its rival, and has a very prideful personality.

attacks.name: Rain of Pollen (Allergy Shower)
attacks.description: Generates allergy-inducing pollen from the flowers on both of its arms, which causes anyone who suffers from it, even larger Digimon, to be unable to keep hold of their presence of mind, and completely lose their fighting spirit.

attacks.name: Sweet Scent
attacks.description: Releases a fragrance that gets the attention and seduces everyone.

attacks.name: Poison Ivy
attacks.description: Entangles the opponent in ivy laced with a powerful toxin, completely paralyzing them.

Flybeemon.name: Flybeemon
Flybeemon.description: Flybeemon is an Insectoid Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Knowledge". It is a mythical Digimon that is said to have evolved in a mutant-like manner due to the power of the Digi-Egg when Kunemon emerged in large numbers. It is extremely rare to encounter Honeybeemon or Butterflymon with this species. It has very intense territoriality, and as for those that intrude its territory, it will try to repel them even if they are a Mega.

attacks.name: Lightning Sting (Fly Spark)
attacks.description: Rapidly vibrates the wings on its back, sending out an electric shock. In Digimon Fusion, it instead fires lightning from its stinger, paralyzing foes.

attacks.name: Poison Stinger
attacks.description: Stabs the opponent with its poisonous stinger.

attacks.name: Needle Stinger
attacks.description: Launches its stinger.

Flymon.name: Flymon
Flymon.description: Flymon is an Insectoid Digimon. With its gigantic, baleful wings, it is able to fly about at extremely high speed, and it generates a great Howling Noise called buzzing while in flight, completely numbing the sense of hearing of those who hear it. Its body is protected by a hard shell, and it pinches the opponent between its large talons and brings death with the super-powerful stinger on its tail. Although the evolutionary processes of Insect Digimon are still unclear, it is thought that it digivolved from a Kunemon-species, guessing by the appearance of its face.

attacks.name: Brown Stingers (Deadly Sting)
attacks.description: Fires the stinger on its tail. It is said that Digimon who are stung are completely paralyzed, then have their body turn violet and die, and that firing the stinger isn't a problem for Flymon, because it will grow back indefinitely. In Digimon Fusion, Digimon turn blue instead.

attacks.name: Poison Powder
attacks.description: Spreads a cloud of poisonous powder from its wings.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.description: Attacks with a sharp poisonous needle.

Footmon.name: Footmon
Footmon.description: Footmon is a Cyborg Digimon. It is one of the most sportsmanly Digimon in the Digital World. It loves sports, and likes soccer most of all, so it is always practising dribbling and shooting with balls of light. Its dream is to create a soccer league to compete with fellow Digimon.

attacks.name: Lightning Shoot
attacks.description: Places a ball of light on the ground and shoots it at the enemy.

attacks.name: Lightning Overhead
attacks.description: Lifts the ball high up in the air and shoots it.

Frigimon.name: Frigimon
Frigimon.description: Frigimon is an Icy Digimon. It is a Digimon whose body is covered in ice and snow crystals. Behind its cold appearance lies a warm-hearted, gentle personality. Frigimon dislikes fighting, and its sweet behavior warms the hearts of those who watch it in action. While it is ill-suited to fight against battle-loving Digimon, it is especially outmatched against Meramon.

attacks.name: Subzero Ice Punch (絶対零度パンチ, Zettai Reido Punch, lit. "Absolute Zero Punch")
attacks.description: Freezes its opponents to absolute zero with its punch.

attacks.name: Snow Ball (雪合戦, Yukigassen, lit. "Snowball Fight")
attacks.description: Flings an unending stream of snowballs.

attacks.name: Icy Breath (Ice Breath)
attacks.description: Breathes out a frozen breath.

attacks.name: Ice Punch
attacks.description: Attacks with a fist of powerful cold.

Frimon.name: Frimon
Frimon.description: Frimon is a Lesser Digimon. It possesses a frill on its neck. It is able to change the hardness of the fur on its frill, and by covering its body with the frill when danger approaches, it can be used as an "Armor" to protect its body. As its curiosity is extremely vigorous, it has a habit of responding to anything that moves, but because it also responds to its own tail, it chases after it, and is often observed spinning in place.

attacks.name: Shippo Binta (シッポビンタ, Shippo Binta lit. "Tail Whip")
attacks.description: Increases the centrifugal force in its long tail. This is so powerful that a clean hit will occassionally knock out even a Rookie Digimon.

Frogmon.name: Frogmon
Frogmon.description: Frogmon is a Mutant Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Sincerity". When those Digivolve via the "Digi-Egg of Sincerity", they often Digivolve into a Mutant-type, and Frogmon has equipped several mysterious devices to its body. Although it is a Digimon that was just recently discovered, it has been confirmed to be a species of old generation Digimon as a result of analyzing its composition data. Its translucent mask is very soft, and almost reduces the energy of the enemy's attacks to zero. The wheels attached to its back allow it to fly through the sky, and it seems that it is also possible for it to fly considerable distances at a time. However, that is all that is currently known, and as for the details of its ecology and its features, further research is required.

attacks.name: Frog Bite (Leaf Wheel Cutter)
attacks.description: Spins the wheels on its back at 20,000 rpm and then fires them at the enemy.

FrosVelgrmon.name: FrosVelgrmon
FrosVelgrmon.description: FrosVelgrmonis a Giant Bird Digimon. It is a Digimon that rarely appears before others. It is considered to be a symbol of awe in certain regions, and according to legend, it appears before those who are stranded on snowy mountains and assesses their lives. It is said that those who are deemed worthy of saving are carried down the mountain by FrosVelgrmon, but those who are deemed unworthy will be given a peaceful death with its freezing breath.

attacks.name: Innocence Blizzard
attacks.description: A ranged attack in which it generates a blizzard with its tail and wings.

attacks.name: Freezing Ray
attacks.description: Instantly turns the enemy into dry ice with a cold beam fired from its mouth.

attacks.name: Ruin Reverb
attacks.description: Sings with a beautiful cry, charming the listener. It is a song of destruction that causes those who finish listening to it to completely shatter into pieces from within.

Frozomon.name: Frozomon
Frozomon.description: Frozomon is a Machine Digimon. It is a Digimon that inhabits areas with heavy snowfall and removes snow vigorously. Contrary to its reliable side that rescues those who get lost in snowstorms and the like, it is also a troublesome Digimon who uses all its strength to eliminate those that get in the way of its rescues, even if they are Babies. It is a specialist when it comes to cold regions who is capable of not only removing snow, but also melting ice with its red-hot sword.

attacks.name: Removal Blow
attacks.description: Unleashes a punch attack with its enormous right arm while charging.

attacks.name: Defrost Blade
attacks.description: Pierces the enemy using heat from the Heat Sword on its left arm.

attacks.name: Glaciate Missile
attacks.description: Shoots ice compacted from the snow that gets sucked in by its propeller, generating huge blocks of ice on impact. It can use this to stop avalanches.

Fufumon.name: Fufumon
Fufumon.description: Fufumon is a Slime Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It has an extremely light body, so it has floated through the air since it was born, but because it floats so slowly, it is easy for opponents to target it.
