When its life is threatened by an assault from a larger opponent, it will thrust at them with the horn on its head to intimidate them with all its might, but because the horn is very soft, the thrust will not injure the opponent.

attacks.name: Little Iron Spikes (小さな鉄のトゲ, Chīsana Tetsu no Toge)
attacks.description: Spits small iron spikes from its mouth at an approaching opponent.

Fugamon.name: Fugamon
Fugamon.description: Fugamon is an Evil Digimon. It is a Digimon whose form resembles that of the Oni from Eastern legends. It belongs to the same family as Ogremon, sporting the same violent, battle-loving personality. The attacks dealt using its well-developed muscles pack extraordinary power, and bring about absolute destruction.

attacks.name: Evil Hurricane: Fires a mini-hurricane from its club. In Digimon World
attacks.description: Next Order, it fires a ball of energy from its fist in the shape of its head, similar to Leomon's "Fist of the Beast King"

attacks.name: Heavy Swing
attacks.description: Whacks enemies with its club.

attacks.name: Bone Strike
attacks.description: Attacks with a hard bone club.

Fujinmon.name: Fujinmon
Fujinmon.description: Fujinmon is a Cyborg Digimon. It was bestowed with the name of the Fūjin of Oriental folklore. As a Light Fighter that battles with light movements, it specializes in close combat. It is equipped with the same cutter-type "Cyclonic Arm" (Critical Arm) as Justimon.

attacks.name: Maltcyclone (Marut Cyclone)
attacks.description: Knocks the enemy away with strong winds.

attacks.name: Critical Arms (Critical Arm)
attacks.description: Cuts the enemy to pieces with the Cyclonic Arms (Critical Arms).

Fujitsumon.name: Fujitsumon
Fujitsumon.description: Fujitsumon appear to be thebarnaclesattached toOctomon's pot with yellow glowing eyes.

Fumamon.name: Fumamon
Fumamon.description: Fumamon is an Android Digimon. It is an extremely skilled assassin Digimon that is superlative in the Fuma school of ninja techniques. It makes a living by undertaking missions to eliminate targets. Fumamon not only makes great use of its physical prowess in close-combat, but also utilizes shuriken and other projectile weapons to remain a threat at mid and long-range, too. As Fumamon will doggedly chase down any target that flees, its prey's only hope of survival is to defeat Fumamon itself. Fumamon is able to manipulate the trajectory of Tsubakuro (燕, Tsubakuro lit. "Swallow"), the shuriken attached to its gauntlets. It carries the ninja swords "Shirasagi" (白鷺, "Shirasagi" lit. "White Heron") and "Kurosagi" (黒鷺, "Kurosagi" lit. "Black Heron") on its back.

attacks.name: Tsubakuro (燕, Tsubakuro lit. "Swallow")
attacks.description: Uses Tsubakuro, the shuriken attached to its gauntlets, to damage its targets' limbs, preventing them from moving.

attacks.name: Sharihotsu (舎利弗, Sharihotsu lit. "Śāriputra")
attacks.description: Finishes off its immobile opponents using "Shirasagi" and "Kurosagi".

attacks.name: Yomi-Modoshi (黄泉戻, Yomi-Modoshi lit. "Yomi Return")
attacks.description: Uses the scrolls on its waist to summon Undead Digimon.

FusedAncientVolcanomon.name: FusedAncientVolcanomon
FusedAncientVolcanomon.description: FusedAncientVolcanomon is a form of AncientVolcanomon formed when it absorbs several Meramon. Dorulumon's True Colors

attacks.name: Maximum Big Bang
attacks.description: Fires a stream of solar-hot magma from its chest.

Fusamon.name: Fusamon
Fusamon.description: Official romanization given duringDigimon Con 2023and used in the franchise.

Gabumon.name: Gabumon
Gabumon.description: Gabumonis a Reptile Digimon. Although it is covered by a fur pelt, it is still clearly a Reptile Digimon. Due to its extremely timid and shy personality, it always gathers up the data whichGarurumonleaves behind, and shapes it into a fur pelt to wear. Because it is wearing the fur pelt of Garurumon, who is feared by other Digimon, it fills the role of safeguarding itself as a result of protecting its body. When it is wearing the fur pelt, its personality does a complete 180° shift.Gabumon is especially close toBulucomon.

attacks.name:
Blue Blaster (Petit Fire): Releases a stream of blue ice-like flames from its mouth.
Super Blue Blaster
attacks.description:
A more powerful version of "Blue Blaster".
Blue Blaster Slam

attacks.name: Super Blue Blaster
attacks.description: A more powerful version of "Blue Blaster".

attacks.name: Horn Attack (ツノ攻撃, Tsuno Kougeki)
attacks.description:
Attacks using its horns.
Horn Attack Combo
Horn Attack Slam

attacks.name: Little Horn
attacks.description:
Attacks using a horn with the power of flames.
Little Horn Combo
Little Horn Combo 2

attacks.name: Hidden Punch (Hidden Knock)
attacks.description: Rapidly punches at the enemy.

attacks.name: Beast Attack
attacks.description: Attacks with a swift blow of a powerful beast.

attacks.name: Gabumon Shot
attacks.description: Emits a small blast from the mouth.

attacks.name: Petit Fire Hook
attacks.description: Places a Petit Fire in its hand to punch the opponent with.

attacks.name: Mach Jab
attacks.description: Punches the enemy quickly.

attacks.name: Blue Cyclone
attacks.description: Spins around while spitting out blue fire from its mouth.

attacks.name: Skull Cracker
attacks.description: Drops straight down horn-first.

attacks.name: Machine Gun Jab Continually throws punches at the enemy.
Drill Horn
attacks.description:
Jumps into the air and attacks with its horn by spinning.
Drill Horn Special Jumps into the air and attacks with its horn by spinning over a long distance.

attacks.name: Drill Horn Special Jumps into the air and attacks with its horn by spinning over a long distance.
Claw Attack
attacks.description: Attacks with its claws.

attacks.name: Spread Petite Fire
attacks.description: Spins around whilst spitting out blue fire from its mouth.

attacks.name: Upper Claw
attacks.description: Knocks the enemy into the air with an upward swing of the claws on both hands.

attacks.name: Ariel Nail Crash
attacks.description: Unleashes a combo attack with its claws.

Gabumon X.name: Gabumon X
Gabumon X.description: Gabumon X is a Beast Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Although it was originally classified as a Reptile-type, it became a Beast-type itself after absorbing the fur pelt data of the Beast-types it loves so much. Its timid, bashful personality has not changed, but once it wears its fur pelt, it changes to favour rough fighting styles and launching quick attacks typical of a Beast-type.

attacks.name: Blue Blaster (Petit Fire)
attacks.description: Releases a stream of blue ice-like flames from its mouth.

attacks.name: Blue Blaster Hook (Petit Fire Hook)
attacks.description: A striking technique in which it envelops its right hand in its "Petit Fire" and uses it to pound the enemy. As a result, it does not wear its precious fur pelt over its right hand.

attacks.name: Little Horn
attacks.description: Attacks using a horn with the power of flames.

Gabumon (Bond of Friendship).name: Gabumon (Bond of Friendship)
debut: Digimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Dash X)andDigimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Mirai)

otherNames.name: ガブモン -友情の絆- Gabumon -Yujo's Kizuna-

Gabumon (Bond of Friendship).description: Gabumon (Bond of Friendship)is an Unknown Digimon. A profound bond betweenGabumonand its Partner, it is a legendary, final digivolution that realized after countless possibilities. The undying "Friendship" of its Partner turned into elegant armor which covers its body, and appears as proof of the trust coursing through one another. It is able to fly by generating photon light wings on its back, but it can also transform into its Motorcycle Mode, which is its Partner's favorite vehicle, and drive fast together.

attacks.name: Raddle Star
attacks.description: A tracking weapon equipped with AI, regardless of the range.

attacks.name: Full-Metal Machinegun (Full Metal Machine Gun)
attacks.description: Causes a downpour of iron to rain down from the Cowl Parts on its arms.

attacks.name: Cool Edge
attacks.description: Purges the Cowl Parts and unleashes an instant attack.

attacks.name: Moon Phase (Moon Tense) Fires laser beams in all directions. There are no delays.

Gaiamon.name: Gaiamon
Gaiamon.description: Gaiamon has not made an appearance in any media. Its possibility is only discussed inDigimon World 3.

Gaiomon.name: Gaiomon
Gaiomon.description: Gaiomon is a Dragon Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It increases its own strength as it wins battles, and is a subspecies of the Greymon-species. Discovered within a neglected Oriental computer, there are many parts of its strength which are unmeasured, but it has been confirmed that it possesses an unbelievable combat record from its countless battles. Its uniquely shaped "Kikurin" (菊燐, "Kikurin" lit. "Chrysanthemum and Phosphorus") swords, which it acquired due to its combat experience, leave behind eerie tracks of light, and it is said that anything that comes in contact with those tracks will be cut to pieces.

attacks.name: Cross Slicer (燐火斬, Rinkazan, lit. "Phosphorus Fire Slash")
attacks.description: Uses its Kikurin swords to leave behind eerie tracks of light which cut anything that comes in contact with them to pieces.

attacks.name: Gaia Reactor
attacks.description: Concentrates all the energy within the atmosphere, and then detonates it.

attacks.name: Rinkageki (燐火撃, Rinkageki lit. "Phosphorus Fire Attack")
attacks.description: Fuses the two Kikurin swords, which causes the eerie tracks of light to converge all at once, allowing it to attack distant enemies.

Gaiomon Fierce Blade Mode.name: Gaiomon Fierce Blade Mode
debut: Digimon ReArise, "To Wield a Blade for Justice" [2.15]

otherNames.name: ガイオウモン 厳刀の型 Gaioumon Itto Mode

Gaiomon Fierce Blade Mode.description: Gaiomon Fierce Blade Mode is a Dragon Man Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is a form of Gaiomon, who was defeated in battle, that acquired a new power after unimaginable training. The Ogre data sleeping within its DigiCore has awakened, and its fighting style has changed to Ittō-ryū. Having mastered Tenrin Sword Style (天燐厳刀流, Tenrin Ittō-ryū, lit. "Heavenly Phosphorus Invincible Sword Style"), a fencing technique told of in the Eastern Digital World, Gaiomon Fierce Blade Mode specializes in "silent" fencing techniques in which it instantly cuts down its opponents without even making a sound. Once prepared for battle, it is almost impossible to approach Gaiomon Fierce Blade Mode without leaving any openings.

attacks.name: Binding Whirlwind (旋風縛, Senpū Baku, lit. "Whirlwind Bind")
attacks.description: Restricts the opponent's movements with a tornado unleashed from the "Kikurin" (菊燐, "Kikurin" lit. "Chrysanthemum and Phosphorus").

attacks.name: Kikurin Thunder Slash (菊燐一閃・號雷斬, Kikurin Issen: Gouraizan, lit. "Chrysanthemum and Phosphorus Flash: Roaring Lightning Beheading")
attacks.description: Charges at lightning speed and then bisects the opponent with the "Kikurin", which surges with lightning

attacks.name: Splendid Blade of Tranquility (刀華静謐, Touka Seihitsu, lit. "Sword Flower Tranquility")
attacks.description: Cuts down the enemies in its surroundings with a single stroke of its sword. It is said to quietly bring the battle to an end without them even realizing that they have been cut by their adversary.

Galacticmon.name: Galacticmon
Galacticmon.description: Galacticmon is an Unknown Digimon. It is a Mega Digimon that is the largest size of any Digimon. Having assimilated the data of an artificial satellite, Galacticmon possesses a variety of weaponry sufficient to destroy vast areas of the Digital World from ultra-high orbit. It requires a great deal of resources to move, however, necessitating the support of elite hackers. As such, there are few records of Galacticmon engaging in battle. It can also analyze attacks it receives in order to utilize those attacks for itself.

attacks.name: Ragnarok Cannon
attacks.description: Fires a massive beam from the Ragnarok Cannon on its chest.
Fires a beam from its head; uses this attack if it fails to copy a technique.

attacks.name: Gimlet Gun
attacks.description: A piercing tail strike.

attacks.name: Space Laser (Spaser)
attacks.description: Fires an enormous laser beam from its head.

attacks.name: Shuttle Scissors
attacks.description: A technique wherein Galacticmon seizes and bisects its enemies.

attacks.name: Satellite Buster
attacks.description: Uses the gun barrels on its shoulders to lock on to and attack faraway enemies.

Gallantmon.name: Gallantmon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Masako Nozawa(Tamers/X-Evolution/Savers),Makoto Tsumura(Tamers/Xros Wars),Yusei Oda(Cyber Sleuth/Next Order)
(En:)Brian Beacock(Tamers[5]/Frontier[6]),Steven Jay Blum(Tamers[5]/Frontier[6]/All-Star Rumble),Ben Diskin(All-Star Rumble),Brad Sherwood(Data Squad)
Gallantmon.description: Gallantmonis an Exalted Knight Digimon. One of the "Royal Knights", it is a being containing contradictions, as it is called a guardian deity of theNetdespite being a Virus attribute, and if by any chance its balance is lost, it is possible for it to become a dangerous being. It pilots the Flying Dragon machine "Grani" as a dragon knight that races across the skies.It is clad in holy armor refined and constructed from 99.9% pureChrome Digizoid, and its right hand can become the holy lance "Gram", rivaled only byDarkdramon's "Gigastick Lance",while its left hand can become the holy shield "Aegis". It honors chivalry, and is a loyal vassal towards its lord.

attacks.name: Lightning Joust (Royal Saber)
attacks.description: Dispatches a strong blow from the Gram.

attacks.name: Shield of the Just (Final Elysion)
attacks.description: Fires a beam which purifies everything from the Aegis.

attacks.name: Spiral Saber (Screw Saver)
attacks.description: Spins upwards in a very short tornado within a fire tornado.

attacks.name: Gallant Charge (Duke Charge)
attacks.description: Charges forward with an electrified Gram.

attacks.name: Lightning Charge Fires a lightning bolt from Gram.

Gravity Lance (Gram Slash): Stabs downwards, lacerating the enemy with the tip of Gram.
Sky Gram Slash
attacks.description: An aerial version of Gravity Lance.

attacks.name: Sky Gram Slash
attacks.description: An aerial version of Gravity Lance.

attacks.name: Shield Attack
attacks.description: Charges up its Aegis and fires a beam or burst of energy from it

attacks.name: Gram Strike
attacks.description: A powerful strike using Gram.

attacks.name: Saber Shot
attacks.description: Fires holy energy collected in Gram.

attacks.name: Royal Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with Gram while running towards the enemy.

title: Crimson Knight
(紅蓮騎士
Guren Kishi?)
Sky-Conquering Armored Lancer
(覇空の鎧鎗騎
Hakū no Gaisouki?)

Gallantmon Chaos Mode.name: Gallantmon Chaos Mode
debut: 8" Warp Digivolving Figure: Gallantmon/Gallantmon Chaos Mode
Gallantmon Chaos Mode.description: Gallantmon Chaos Mode is essentiallyChaosGallantmon's version ofGallantmon Crimson Mode. It is colored blue to match ChaosGallantmon's blue-coloring as contrasted toGallantmon's and Gallantmon Crimson Mode's red.

Gallantmon Crimson Mode.name: Gallantmon Crimson Mode
Gallantmon Crimson Mode.description: Gallantmon Crimson Mode is a Warrior Digimon. It is a hidden form of Gallantmon whose body is clad in armor that shines crimson. Because it has fully released its power, its armor portions possess the heat to dye them red. For that reason, it is unable to maintain Crimson Mode for a long duration. Within its chest is its DigiCore, which sealed the "Digital Hazard", and when it discharges all the power in its body, a pinnate energy emission can be distinguished coming from its back. It wields a divine lance of light, "Gungnir", and a divine sword of light, "Blutgang", energy weapons that have no physical form.

attacks.name: Invincible Sword
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with the Blutgang.

attacks.name: Final Justice (Quo Vadis)
attacks.description: Disintegrates the opponent into electrons with the Gungnir, then consigns them to oblivion within another dimension whither thou canst not follow.

attacks.name: Royal Saber
attacks.description: Dispatches a strong blow from the Gram.

title: Radiant Crimson Knight of Heavenly Wings
(天翼の輝紅騎士
Tenyoku no Kikoukishi?)

Gallantmon X.name: Gallantmon X
Gallantmon X.description: Gallantmon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and a carrier of the X-Antibody. Carrying out its devotion as a knight, this Gallantmon threw itself into the sacred battle and due to the X-Antibody, it was at last blessed with the supreme sacred armor, sacred lance, and sacred shield. It has sacred hybrid equipment combining "Red Digizoid", "Blue Digizoid", and "Gold Digizoid", which are rare metals, as well as Chrome Digizoid boasting the highest known purity. Since its form was remodeled in order to demonstrate its holy power, the lance of light emitted from its sacred lance Gram was amplified. In addition, it is said that Gallantmon's red mantle from before acquiring the X-Antibody was given to the hero, Leomon X.

attacks.name: Lightning Joust (Royal Saber)
attacks.description: Dispatches a strong blast of lightning from the Gram.

attacks.name: Shield of the Just (Final Elysion)
attacks.description: Fires a beam which purifies everything from the Aegis.

attacks.name: Zeig Saber (Sieg Saber)
attacks.description: Elongates the lance of light emitted from the Gram.

Gammamon.name: Gammamon
Gammamon.description: Gammamon is a Ceratopsian Digimon. It is a very unusual, young, white Digimon that was recently discovered. Digivolution to Gammamon is said to be linked to "digital signals that came from extragalactic space". The two hard horns that grow from its brow are useful weapons for offense and defense. It is also capable of flying for a short period with the tiny wings on its back, making its body float. It rarely shows its emotions, but it seems that once you reach out to it, it will gradually become attached to you. It is a Rookie Digimon with three horns like a Triceratops. It wears a bandana.

attacks.name: Horn Attack
attacks.description: Charges with its two horns. It is a powerful attack technique.

attacks.name: Breakclaw (Breaclaw)
attacks.description: Unleashes with the claws on its left hand that have accumulated energy. It is also a powerful attack technique.

Ganemon.name: Ganemon
debut: "The Digimon Hunt is Booming! The Virtuoso Hunter of the Shopping District!" [62]
Ganemon.description: Ganemon is a Mutant Digimon. It is an old, gentlemanly Digimon in the shape of a 10-yen coin. It loves money, and for the sake of money will use its eloquent way with words to swindle any opponent, no matter who they may be, out of their wealth. Not only that, it uses the Zenimons it keeps in its trunk to collect money. Using its moustache as a radar, it is able to detect the locations of Zenimons that have obtained money, so that it can come over to retrieve them. It eats the money it has collected for its own gain, which causes its body to grow larger in size.

attacks.name: Gold Bowling
attacks.description: Throws its collected pool of money. While the attack's power rises the more money is used for it, the money that has been tossed will not return.

attacks.name: Gold Press
attacks.description: Uses its entire body to press down on the opponent, changes in power depending its body size, which reflects how much money it has collected.

Gankoomon.name: Gankoomon
Gankoomon.description: Gankoomonis a Holy Knight Digimon. It acceded to the "Royal Knights" because it is a Holy Knight Digimon. Although it is said to have taken up residence in the southwest edges of theDigital World, it rarely stays in the same place, so it journeys across the Digital World while going around and putting a stop to unusual phenomena and signs of chaos, which it learns fromSistermon Ciel's reports,taking along the next-generationHackmonas its companion; Gankoomon had encountered Hackmon and seen in it the makings of the thirteenthRoyal Knight, deciding to temper the Rookie Digimon with frequent, rigorous trials.Unlike the other Royal Knights who rarely show their faces, it actually steps down and acts, it is admired by many Digimon and there are many Digimon it counts as bosom friends.For example, a long time ago, it saved theSistermonsisters just as they were going to collapse from exhaustion from being out on the streets.In order to pass on its own title as a Royal Knight to Hackmon, it assigns it rigorous trials, and entrusts Hackmon's training to the Sistermon sisters who are accompanying it on the journey; in order to repay Gankoomon for saving them,Sistermon Blancputs all of its effort into being a chaperone for Hackmon.Due to its stubborn personality, its frequently stern visage and dealing with Hackmon in a severe manner is a cruel sort of kindness of wanting it to keep up with the other Royal Knights and become independent.

attacks.name: Tekken Seisai (鉄拳制裁, Tekken Seisai lit. "Striking With Fists")
attacks.description: Strikes with all its strength at anyone and everyone who talks back to it. In Digimon Masters Hinukamuy also strikes the enemy.

attacks.name: Quake!Blast!Fire!Father! (地神！神鳴！神馳！親父！, Jishin! Kaminari! Kaji! Oyaji!, lit. "Earthquake! Lightning! Fire! Father!")
attacks.description: Hinukamuy looses heaven's punishment at Gankoomon's harsh words.

attacks.name: Table Flip (ちゃぶ台返し, Chabudai Gaeshi, lit. "Flipping Table In Anger")
attacks.description: Flips the ground as if it was a chabudai made of Chrome Digizoid, with the flipped ground becoming as hard as Chrome Digizoid.

Gankoomon X.name: Gankoomon X
Gankoomon X.description: Gankoomon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. By assimilating Hinukamuy into itself, it has manifested on Gankoomon's back along with the characters Gankoomon (刓空者, Gankoomon lit. "Sky-trimmer"). Should it fully unleash its surging aura, then that aura will transform into something resembling wings, exhibiting Gankoomon's power at its maximum. The Tetsu Geta it wears has become an offensive and defensive weapon that it holds in its hand.

attacks.name: Tekken Seisai (鉄拳制裁, Tekken Seisai lit. "Striking With Fists")
attacks.description: Strikes with all its strength at anyone and everyone who talks back to it.

attacks.name: Quake! Blast! Fire! Father! (地神！神鳴！神馳！親父！, Jishin! Kaminari! Kaji! Oyaji!, lit. "Earthquake! Lightning! Fire! Father!")
attacks.description: Hinukamuy looses heaven's punishment at Gankoomon's harsh words.

attacks.name: Table Flip (ちゃぶ台返し, Chabudai Gaeshi, lit. "Flipping Table In Anger")
attacks.description: Flips the ground as if it was a chabudai made of Chrome Digizoid, with the flipped ground becoming as hard as Chrome Digizoid.

attacks.name: Tetsu Geta Harite
attacks.description: Deals heavy blows with the Tetsu Geta.

attacks.name: Ultimate Sengi Tengyouken (究極戦技天仰拳, Kyūkyoku Sengi Tengyouken, lit. "Ultimate Battle-technique Heaven-seeking Fist")
attacks.description: A flawless, pulverising uppercut that condenses all of its energy in its right hand, ignoring all defenses.

Ganvivormon.name: Ganvivormon
Ganvivormon.description: Ganvivormon is a yellow cat-like Digimon wearing glasses and a nurse’s cap with a blue cross. It rides in a pill-shaped vehicle that is inscribed with "163", which can be read as "Hi-Ro-Mi"(一六三,"Hi-Ro-Mi"), a play on the name ofGyotchan's wife.It wields a gun that shoots heart shaped energy waves.

Gaogamon.name: Gaogamon
Gaogamon.description: Gaogamon is a Beast Digimon. Gaomon's physique has gotten larger, and its steadily growing claws are protected by gloves. Although it is a quadruped, with its tenacious leg strength, it can also stand up to attack like a bear.

attacks.name: Dash Double Claw
attacks.description: Approaches the opponent at a speed it can't see, then fires off an X-shaped wave by slashing its claws.

attacks.name: Gaoga Hound
attacks.description: Bites the opponent with its strong teeth and never lets go until they collapse.

attacks.name: Spiral Blow
attacks.description: Releases a powerful vortex of wind from its mouth in one breath.

attacks.name: Double Claw
attacks.description: Attacks using the claws on both hands.

attacks.name: Dash Claw
attacks.description: A strong Double Claw.

attacks.name: Super Dash Double Claw
attacks.description: The Strongest Double Claw.

Gaomon.name: Gaomon
Gaomon.description: Gaomon is a Beast Digimon. It is thought to be a subspecies of the Gazimon-species that grew pointed claws. With its keen movements, it specializes in "Hit and Away" attacks. The gloves on its hands appear to protect its claws until they are fully grown.

attacks.name: Rolling Upper
attacks.description: Exploits its tenacious leg strength and rolls into the opponent's chest.

attacks.name: Double Backhand
attacks.description: Unleashes a strike while spinning.

attacks.name: Gao Rush
attacks.description: Moves nimbly to unleash a high-speed barrage of punches.

attacks.name: Wild Echo
attacks.description: Attacks with the blast of a war cry.

attacks.name: Wild Bark
attacks.description: Attacks with the blast of a war cry.

attacks.name: Wild Howling
attacks.description: Attacks with the blast of a war cry.

attacks.name: Beast Attack
attacks.description: Attacks with a swift blow of a powerful beast.

Gaossmon.name: Gaossmon
Gaossmon.description: Gaossmon is a Reptile Digimon. A tiny Digimon that is strong, at least in its competitive spirit, and in any case it barks well. It is also quick to flee, and extremely swift. Although it is almost impossible to track it after it runs into the bushes, you can easily find its location because it will soon begin to bark. Since it specializes in running on land, it is totally incapable of swimming, as it dreads water. In fact, it can't even cross a 10 cm deep brook, and sometimes, you can run across a Gaossmon that has nearly drowned and passed out in a puddle of water.

attacks.name: Kilo Flame
attacks.description: Attacks with a medium-temperature jet of flames.

attacks.name: Head Strike
attacks.description: Attacks with an intense headbutt.

Garbagemon.name: Garbagemon
Garbagemon.description: Garbagemon is a Mutant Digimon. It was once a trash can on a desktop computer, but gained life and Digivolved into a Digimon. Unlike Sukamon, which mutated from the discarded data scum, this Digimon is the trash can itself. Until now garbage Digimon were said to be the absolute weakest, but with the arrival of Garbagemon that conventional wisdom will probably be reversed. Also, its trash can can act like a black hole, so that anything that is sucked into the trash can disappears from the Digital World without a trace. It wields a bazooka constructed from empty trash cans fastened together.

attacks.name: Junk Chunker (Poop Bazooka)
attacks.description: Fires poop from its bazooka.

attacks.name: Dirty Saucer
attacks.description: Attacks by throwing the lid from a trash can.

Gargomon.name: Gargomon
Gargomon.description: Gargomon is an Animal Digimon. It digivolved from Terriermon, and is a Hunter Digimon skilled in hunting. Despite its outward appearance, it uses attacks of unparalleled accuracy to reliably bring down the opponent with its nimble movements. Its leg strength is strong enough for it to jump sky high, and it is also able to spread out its ears to glide. Although it usually has a cheerful personality, once it is angered, it gets out of hand. Its cherished "D-VI'S 503xx" jeans are its obsession.

attacks.name: Gargo Pellets (Gatling Arm)
attacks.description: Fires the vulcans on both of its arms.

attacks.name: Bunny Pummel (Dumdum Upper)
attacks.description: Gets into the opponent's space, then thrusts up a "Gargo Pellets" from below.

Gargoylemon.name: Gargoylemon
Gargoylemon.description: Gargoylemon is a Dark Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Light". Originally, it was a Demon-species Digimon, but it supressed its power with restraints and there are occasions when it is employed as a familiar for Angel Digimon. It is said that when it is freed from control due to those restraints, it exhibits tremendous power.

attacks.name: Freezing Wing (White Statue)
attacks.description: Creates white statues to launch at the enemy.

Garudamon.name: Garudamon
Garudamon.description: Garudamon is a Bird Digimon. It has gigantic talons and wings that let it dance freely through the sky. Garudamon honors justice and order, and is a guardian deity of the land and wind that loves nature. Its intelligence and combat ability are the highest among Bird Digimon, and it is admired due to it being said that only chosen Digimon can digivolve to it. It is thought that if the order of the Digital World is disturbed, it will suddenly appear out of nowhere, and quell the source of the unrest. Also, it is matchless friends with the hero Leomon, who possesses the same will.

attacks.name: Wing Blade (Shadow Wing)
attacks.description: Unleashes a vacuum blade at super-speed, chopping up the opponent. Because of the speed of the Wing Blade's residue, its true shape cannot be confirmed, and it can only be seen as a silhouette shaped like a black bird.

attacks.name: Eagle Claw
attacks.description: Attacks using the powerful claws on its feet.

attacks.name: Phoenix Claw (Crimson Claw)
attacks.description: Slashes at the foe with the claws on its hands.

attacks.name: Storm (強襲, Kyoushū, lit. "Assault")
attacks.description: Attacks fiercely from the sky.

attacks.name: Garuda Pressure
attacks.description: Falls from the sky to stomp on the enemy.

attacks.name: Eagle Twister
attacks.description: Uses its large wings to create a tornado.

attacks.name: Fire Hurricane
attacks.description: Creates a huge tornado of fire.

attacks.name: Fist Of The Phoenix (Phoenix Fist) Uppercuts the enemy.
Boulder Breaker
attacks.description: Slams the ground with its fists, causing an earthquake and rainbow-colored shockwave.

attacks.name: Talon Tear
attacks.description: Shoots forward with a midair kick.

attacks.name: Garudapunch (Garuda Punch)
attacks.description: A fiery straight punch.

Garudamon X.name: Garudamon X
Garudamon X.description: Garudamon X is a Bird Man Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. As a result of wanting to be more connected with nature and noble spiritual training, it gained an insight into justice and evil. Its abilities deal a crushing blow against evil by swooping from the sky to the earth at super-speed, without missing evil beings that are far away. With its superhuman strength, it easily wields its gigantic totem pole "Great Spirit", a symbol of its love for nature, and fights for other Digimon by turning into a fierce god in order to protect nature.

attacks.name: Great Spirit
attacks.description: Throws its totem as if it were a javelin at opponent.

attacks.name: Shadow Wing
attacks.description: Unleashes a vacuum blade at super-speed, chopping up the opponent. Because of the speed of the Wing Blade's residue, its true shape cannot be confirmed, and it can only be seen as a silhouette shaped like a black bird.

Garurumon.name: Garurumon
Garurumon.description: Garurumon is an Animal Digimon. It is covered in blue, white, and silver-colored fur as hard as "Mithril", which is called a legendary rare metal, and since the blades growing from the tips of its shoulders have sharp edges, anything that touches them is cut to pieces. As it possesses a furious combat instinct and sinews honed in freezing lands, as well as carnivore-like agility and the accuracy to reliably bring down its targets, it is a being feared by other Digimon. However, its intelligence is very high, and it faithfully obeys those who it recognizes as its master or leader.

attacks.name: Howling Blaster (Fox Fire)
attacks.description: Spews blue, high-temperature flames from its mouth. In some media, it spews ice instead.

attacks.name: Body Blow (たいあたり, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Blow")
attacks.description: Rams the enemy with its body.

attacks.name: Subzero Ice Fang (Freeze Fang)
attacks.description: Bites with sharp icy cold fangs.

attacks.name: Ice Wall
attacks.description: An impregnable defensive wall created with its freezing surges.

attacks.name: Ice Cannon
attacks.description: Fires a ball of ice.

attacks.name: Garuru Thrust
attacks.description: Kicks while doing a backflip.

attacks.name: Wolf Cry
attacks.description: Howls, creating a powerful shockwave.

attacks.name: Slamming Attack
attacks.description: Forces the enemy to the ground and begins to maul them.

attacks.name: Ice Statue
attacks.description: Shoots an ice statue out of its mouth.

Garurumon X.name: Garurumon X
Garurumon X.description: Garurumon Xis a Beast Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. Garurumon X's rare fur has hardened further from living in colder places, making it difficult to hurt. Its fighting instinct has become even more intense, driving it to fight to the bitter end, so Garurumon X has few Digimon that are willing to fight against it. As it boasts the best qualities of aCombat SpeciesDigimon, it is said that a qualifiedTameris required to handle it.

attacks.name: Fox Fire
attacks.description: Spews high-temperature blue flames from its mouth.

Gatomon.name: Gatomon
voiceActors: (En:)Edie Mirman(Adventure/02)[12],Mary Elizabeth McGlynn(Rumble Arena/All-Star Rumble),Kate Higgins(Adventure tri.)
Gatomon.description: Gatomon is an Animal Digimon. It has a very healthy curiosity, so it loves pranks. Although its body is small, it is a precious Holy-species Digimon, and its appearance does not match the true strength it possesses. It wears a Holy Ring on its tail, but if it is lost, its power is decreased and it can no longer exhibit its original power. In order to defend itself, it wears long claws copied from SaberLeomon's data. Even though Gatomon is not a descendant of an ancient species, it became able to Armor digivolve by awakening the special abilities that slept within its composition data.

attacks.name: Lightning Paw (ネコパンチ, Neko Punch, lit. "Cat Punch")
attacks.description:
Uses its long claws and attacks the opponent.
Lightning Paw Rush
Final Lightning Paw

attacks.name: Cat's Eye Hypnotism (Cat's Eye)
attacks.description: Manipulates the opponent with a piercing glare, causing the opponent to attack themselves.

attacks.name: Lightning Kick (ネコキック, Neko Kick, lit. "Cat Kick")
attacks.description: A super-fast flying kick.

attacks.name: Cat Tail
attacks.description: Uses its cute tail to slap the enemy.

attacks.name: Cat Laser
attacks.description:
Emits an incredible beam of light.
Cat Laser Combo

attacks.name: Cat Claw Fury (ネコスクラッチ, Neko Scratch, lit. "Cat Scratch")
attacks.description: Uses its claws to dig through hard surfaces.

attacks.name: Cat Trip (Tail Tip)
attacks.description: Pounces on the enemy with its foreclaws.

attacks.name: Megakick (Mega Kick)
attacks.description: A downward kick from the air.

attacks.name: Nekodamashi (猫だまし, Nekodamashi lit. "Cat Trick")
attacks.description: A midair flip that hits the opponent with its tail.

attacks.name: One-Two Neko Punch (ワンツー猫パンチ, One-Two Neko Punch lit. "One-Two Cat Rush")
attacks.description: Strikes twice with its claws

attacks.name: Neko Rush (猫ラッシュ, Neko Rush lit. "Cat Rush")
attacks.description: Back-flips to hit the opponent with its tail.

attacks.name: Neko Finish (猫フィニッシュ, Neko Finish lit. "Cat Finish")
attacks.description: Launches itself into a headbutt.

attacks.name: Zutsuki (頭突き, Zutsuki lit. "Headbutt")
attacks.description: Headbutts the enemy.

attacks.name: Heaven Knuckle (Heaven's Knuckle)
attacks.description: Punches with a holy iron fist.

attacks.name: Scratch
attacks.description: Scratches the enemy.

attacks.name: Cat Dropkick
attacks.description: Dropkicks the enemy.

attacks.name: Spinning Cat Kick
attacks.description: A spinning kick with of its both feet.

attacks.name: Cat Typing Kick
attacks.description: Repeatedly kicks the enemy while in the air.

attacks.name: Side Cat Tail
attacks.description: Twirls, whipping the enemy with its tail.

attacks.name: Power Cat Hammer
attacks.description:
Hits the enemy with both paws.
Power Cat Hammer Slam

Gatomon X.name: Gatomon X
Gatomon X.description: Gatomon X is a Holy Beast Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its body has become smaller, its curiosity and desire to cause mischief have been enhanced even more, and its original, innocent demeanor manifests strongly. Rather than transforming into a fighting figure, it is said that Gatomon's original, natural form was drawn out this way as a change to eliminate redundant features and exhibit more of the holy power hidden within Gatomon. The suzu-shaped "Holy Chime" attached to its ear rings intensely due to the extent of its holy power, and has the ability to drive off evil Digimon.

attacks.name: Lightning Paw (ネコパンチ, Neko Punch, lit. "Cat Punch")
attacks.description: Uses its long claws and attacks the opponent.

Gazimon.name: Gazimon
Gazimon.description: Gazimonis a Mammal Digimon. It is a Digimon with large, sharp claws. It is bipedal, which is rare amongst Mammal types; the claws on its forelegs likely evolved to allow its forelegs to be used as arms, therefore resulting in its bipedalism. It has an extremely aggressive temperament despite its small size, and it never warms up to humans. Although the claws on its forelegs are very effective at attacking, they are also surprisingly suited to digging holes, which it always does as it enjoys watching other Digimon fall into its pitfalls due to its mischievous personality.

attacks.name: Electric Stun Blast (Paralyze Breath)
attacks.description: Breathes poisonous gas.

attacks.name: Pitfall
attacks.description: Puts enemies into traps by digging into the ground.

attacks.name: Booby Pit
attacks.description: Makes Digimon larger than itself fall into its speciality pitfalls.

Gazimon X.name: Gazimon X
Gazimon X.description: Gazimon X is a Mammal Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It has started using fighting styles that capitalize on its bipedalism more, such as making itself look bigger and more intimidating to Digimon that are smaller than it, looming over them and attacking. Furthermore, it acquired its "Booby Pit", a cunning fighting style. Its mischievous personality is a bit over the top.

attacks.name: Electric Stun Blast (Paralyze Breath)
attacks.description: Breathes poisonous gas. It will spew it out after it sees how the situation develops.

attacks.name: Booby Pit
attacks.description: Makes Digimon larger than itself fall into its specialty pitfalls.

Gekomon.name: Gekomon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Masami Kikuchi,Hiroaki Hirata,Kōki Miyata,Junko Takeuchi(Adventure),Yasuhiro Takato(Tamers),Nobuaki Kanemitsu(Frontier, Fortuneteller)
Gekomon.description: Gekomon is an Amphibian Digimon. It is a Digimon that charms those around it with a pleasant voice that is hard to imagine by looking at its bizarre appearance. The chords produced from the three holes at the tip of its tongue and the ad-libbing of the horn coiled around its neck allow it to control the opponent's emotions as it pleases. It is rumored to be born when a famous piece is written in music composition software, so it has become sort of a status symbol among the musicians of the world.

attacks.name: Symphony Crusher (Crash Symphony)
attacks.description: Destroys the enemy from the inside out with super-high frequency vibrations

attacks.name: Tongue Attack (ベロ攻撃, Bero Kougeki)
Water Wave
attacks.description: Attacks with a big tsunami.

GeoGreymon.name: GeoGreymon
GeoGreymon.description: GeoGreymon is a Dinosaur Digimon. It is a unique Digimon that is conjectured to be a subspecies of Greymon. Its body and the carapace on its head have also developed like a full-length lethal weapon, and its appearance has become more aggressive.

attacks.name: Mega Flame
attacks.description: Spews super-high temperature flames from its mouth, reducing everything to ashes.

attacks.name: Mega Burst
attacks.description: Fires off a version of "Mega Flame" enhanced to its limit within its mouth.

attacks.name: Horn Impulse
attacks.description: Charges with its gigantic horns and pulverizes the opponent.

attacks.name: Mega Shot
attacks.description: Fires a blast from the mouth.

attacks.name: Mega Roar
attacks.description: Attacks with the blast of a war cry.

attacks.name: Mega Volcano
attacks.description: Breathes out a huge fireball and causes a huge explosion.

Geremon.name: Geremon
Geremon.description: Geremon is a Mollusk Digimon. It is a Digimon belonging to the same species as Numemon. Although its offensive power is low, it makes up for that with its ferocity, which is such that it will attack no matter who the opponent is. The opponent would then turn the tables on it, as expected, but its obstinacy leads it to immediately forget such instances and continue to endlessly start fights with tough opponents.

attacks.name: Hyper Stink (Hyper Smell)
attacks.description: Emits a disgusting smell with a burp.

attacks.name: Junk Attack (ウンチ投げ, Unchi Nage, lit. "Poop Throw")
attacks.description: Throws a single pile of junk.

attacks.name: Yucky Tongue (イヤ～な舌, Iya~ na Shita, lit. "Unpleasant Togue") Licks the enemy in a disgusting way.
Multi Dung Throw (連続ウンチ投げ, Renzoku Unchi Nage, lit. "Continuous Poop Throw")
attacks.description: Throws multiple balls of dung.

attacks.name: Nume Charge (ヌメたいあたり, Nume Tai Atari, lit. "Nume Body Blow")
attacks.description: Charges with a slippery body.

attacks.name: Party Time (ウンチ, Unchi, lit. "Poop")
attacks.description: Throws its own poop in order to defend itself against intruders.

Gesomon.name: Gesomon
Gesomon.description: Gesomon is a Mollusk Digimon. It has the shape of a squid and inhabits the depths of the Net Ocean. Although it is feared as the "White Demon of the Depths", it is highly intelligent and will not harm Digimon outside of its territory. However, if they seem to cross into its territory even for a moment, it will attack them like a fierce, raging god. For its attack style it specializes in "Hit and Away", in which it inflicts a single blow and then immediately withdraws.

attacks.name: Coral Crusher (Devil Bashing)
attacks.description: Unleashes a barrage of attacks that capitalizes on its many legs.

attacks.name: Coral Crusher (Deadly Shade) Attacks with a powerful squid ink that will completely numb the opponent's vision for a long time if they get hit by it.

title: White Demon of the Depths
(深海の白い悪魔
Shinkai no Shiroi Akuma?)

Gesomon X.name: Gesomon X
Gesomon X.description: Gesomon X a Mollusk Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Because the toxins within its body have elevated, they have also eaten away at its body, transforming it into a very dangerous being. Although it rushes about wildly within its territory as it pleases, it will extend its long tentacles, even outside of its territory, and bite nearby Digimon without wasting its breath, injecting its toxins and completely paralyzing them. It often results in being non-fatal simply because the body stops moving, but sometimes, they will instinctively prey upon things with the multi-layered teeth portions of their mouths, and it acquired its "Mad Viking".

attacks.name: Deadly Shade
attacks.description: A powerful squid ink that will completely numb the opponent's vision for a long time if they get hit by it.

attacks.name: Devil Bashing
attacks.description: A barrage of attacks that capitalizes on its many legs.

Ghilliedhumon.name: Ghilliedhumon
Ghilliedhumon.description: Ghilliedhumon is a Pixie Digimon. It is a forest-dwelling Digimon that is particularly skilled at hunting. Ghilliedhumon is an incredibly adept hunter, and its camouflage-covered body allows it to blend in with the forest and strike without giving its position away to its prey. Though Ghilliedhumon has a peaceful disposition, it is very territorial over its hunting grounds, and those who carelessly wander into its domain will be sniped without warning. Ghilliedhumon prefers slow movements to avoid leaving any signs or making any sound. As such, it struggles to move swiftly. Ghilliedhumon's eyes have special abilities.

attacks.name: True Sight (True Eyes)
attacks.description: Allows it to see even inside Digimon prey, accurately locating their DigiCores.

attacks.name: Core Snipe (Core Shoot): Using its trusty rifle, "Bellota" (Esp
attacks.description: Acorn), Ghilliedhumon shoots the enemy Digimon's Digicores, finishing off its targets.

Ghostmon.name: Ghostmon
Ghostmon.description: Ghostmonis a Ghost Digimon. It is often witnessed flying over graveyards. Although it does not like to show itself due to its timidness and shyness, it is a kind-hearted Digimon that helps those in need without them noticing by becoming transparent. When it comes to a battle it can't avoid, it moves about cunningly using its Little Plasma.It is able to move through all kinds of objects.

attacks.name: Little Plasma
attacks.description: Fires weak energy shots from its palms.

attacks.name: Jack Raid
attacks.description: Turns transparent moments before charging and crashing into the enemy, striking them from behind while they are confused.

Ghoulmon.name: Ghoulmon
Ghoulmon.description: Ghoulmonis a Demon Lord Digimon. LikeDaemon, it was originally a high-ranking Angel Digimon, but it fell to theDark Areaand is now one of the Demon Lord Digimon. Even though it is a Demon Lord Digimon, it is different from other Fallen Angel and Devil Digimon in that it does not run the whole gamut of wickedness, but instead does its utmost to carefully maintain a position of neutrality; despite this, it is easily manipulated by the cunningBarbamon.However, it is a terrifying Digimon, and it is told that at the time of the approaching final battle, that whitened appearance will change to jet-black darkness, and it will transform into a god of destruction.

attacks.name: Death Arrow
attacks.description: Fires arrows of death from the evil eyes on its hands.

attacks.name: Explosion Eye
attacks.description: Fires a laser beam from its central eye when it shines deep crimson.

attacks.name: Grey Claw
attacks.description: Attack with its claws.

attacks.name: Death Wave
attacks.description: Confuses the enemy with a strange radio wave.

title: Three-eyed God of Destruction
(３つ目の破壊神
Mittsu Me no Hakaishin?)

Ghoulmon (Black).name: Ghoulmon (Black)
Ghoulmon (Black).description: Ghoulmon (Black) is a Demon Lord Digimon. Like Daemon, it was originally a high-ranking Angel Digimon, but it fell to the Dark Area and is now one of the Demon Lord Digimon. Even though it is a Demon Lord Digimon, it is different from other Fallen Angel and Devil Digimon in that it does not run the whole gamut of wickedness, but instead does its utmost to carefully maintain a position of neutrality. However, it is a terrifying Digimon, and it is told that at the time of the approaching final battle, that whitened appearance will change to jet-black darkness, and it will transform into a god of destruction.

attacks.name: Death Arrow
attacks.description: Fires arrows of death from the evil eyes on its hands.

attacks.name: Explosion Eye
attacks.description: Fires a laser beam from its central eye when it shines deep crimson.

attacks.name: Black Claw
attacks.description: Attack with its claws.

attacks.name: Death Wave
attacks.description: Confuses the enemy with a strange radio wave.

GigaBreakdramon.name: GigaBreakdramon

otherNames.name: Ｇブレイクドラモン G-Breakdramon

GigaBreakdramon.description: GigaBreakdramon is a Machine Dragon Digimon.

attacks.name: Infinity Boring
attacks.description: Fires all the drills operating throughout its body, allowing it to smash mountains.

attacks.name: Destroyed Rush
attacks.description: Repeatedly strikes the earth at extremely high speed with its left and right shovel arms, allowing it to split the solid ground.

attacks.name: Gravity Press
attacks.description: Raises its entire mass and then flattens its target, allowing it to crush anything.

Gigadramon.name: Gigadramon
Gigadramon.description: Gigadramon is an Android Digimon. It is a dark dragon Digimon that was developed at the same time as Megadramon. As a combat dragon that was armed to the teeth by further remodeling, its existence is the epitome of a fiendish computer virus. Its arms are equipped with the "Giga Hands".

attacks.name: Genocide Gear
attacks.description: Fires countless organic missiles.

attacks.name: Evil Claw (Guilty Claw)
attacks.description: Wages attacks with the Giga Hands.

attacks.name: Genocide Attack
attacks.description: Fires countless organic missiles from both of its arms.

GigaSeadramon.name: GigaSeadramon
GigaSeadramon.description: GigaSeadramon is an Android Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. As a successful elaboration on MetalSeadramon, it demonstrates the fastest speed of movement and strongest ability for interception under the sea. In order to further expand its sphere of influence, the Crack Team constructed this massive Digimon in absolute secrecy and endowed it with the ability to control the sea and possession of a cruising range which covers the vast Net Ocean. Its overall length exceeds even that of Whamon, and since Digimon belonging to the Crack Team, such as Chaosdramon, can be loaded in its interior, it is no longer a lone Digimon, and it seems possible to say that it is an assault landing ship for which it isn't known when and where it will appear on the Net Ocean, or when it will launch an attack.

attacks.name: Giga Sea Destroyer
attacks.description: Fires an energy torpedo from its mouth-cannon.

attacks.name: Sky Wave
attacks.description: Strafes with countless anti-aircraft energy shells fired from the launchers on its back.

title: Gigantic Assault Landing Ship

Gigasmon.name: Gigasmon
Gigasmon.description: Gigasmon is a Mineral Digimon. It possesses power over Earth which bears the might of AncientVolcanomon. It is an earth giant that materialized by coalescing soil from the ground and the components of the atmosphere. During the moment of its materialization, it quenched at high temperatures, and its skin changed to that of super-hardness surpassing that of ceramics. Its personality and thoughts are arrogant according to Grumblemon. Due to it becoming gigantic, it has become more overconfident and its tactics are also extremely violent. Because it fundamentally takes its opponents lightly, it thinks that fighting them is boring and will often yawn during battle.

attacks.name: Quagmire Twister (Hurricane Bomber)
attacks.description: Spins around, arms outstretched, like a tornado.

attacks.name: Tectonic Slam (Earthquake)
attacks.description: Leaps above the ground and makes a ground-shaking landing.

GigaWaruMonzaemon.name: GigaWaruMonzaemon
GigaWaruMonzaemon.description: GigaWaruMonzaemon is the result when WaruMonzaemon absorbs several Monzaemon. It is a giant version of WaruMonzaemon with serrated claws jutting from its left arm and both feet. GigaWaruMonzaemon wields a pizza-cutter shaped like a teddy-bear face in its right hand.

attacks.name: Heartburn Blast (Heartbreak Attack)
attacks.description: Cuts out a glowing pink heart.

attacks.name: Mega Heartburn (Giga Heartbreak Attack)
attacks.description: Hurls a pink heart made of pulsating energy.

Gigimon.name: Gigimon
Gigimon.description: Gigimon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a four-legged Digimon that grew from Jyarimon. Its physical features resemble those of Tokomon, and there are powerful fangs growing within its mouth. However, unlike Tokomon, who digivolves into the Mammal-species, Gigimon, who digivolves into the Dragon-species, has a rough personality, and is ferocious despite its small size. There are more than a few even larger Digimon that were deceived by its appearance and suffered a counterattack. The temperature of its bites are hot like with Jyarimon.

attacks.name: Hot Bite
attacks.description: Snaps at the opponent, burning the things it bites.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

Ginkakumon.name: Ginkakumon
Ginkakumon.description: Ginkakumonis an Ogre Digimon. It is a giant, taciturn boy that, together with its big sisterKinkakumon, is feared as the "Gold and Silver Ogre Brothers". The "Beni Hisago"(紅葫蘆,"Beni Hisago"lit. "Crimson Calabash")that it carries on its back is Kinkakumon's drink, and it's said that the inside is connected to somewhere in a different dimension, and that Digimon who are hurled to this different dimension are converted to alcohol. It is always worrying for its big sister Kinkakumon out of love. It warmly watches over even Kinkakumon's misbehavior, and if there is an unscrupulous fellow approaching its big sister, it throws them with enough power to shake a mountain. If Kinkakumon is aboard the cockpit in its abdomen, then Ginkakumon's power becomes as mighty as should be expected from a big sister and a little brother. Being boarded is secretly a happy time for Ginkakumon.

attacks.name: Kiendan (鬼炎弾, Kiendan lit. "Ogre's Fire Shot")
attacks.description: Shoots a fireball from its mouth.

attacks.name: Gyakugeki Endan (逆撃炎弾, Gyakugeki Endan lit. "Counterattack Fire Shot")
attacks.description: Fires off the Kiendan while stepping back from an opponent that has challenged it in close combat.

attacks.name: Ginkaku Tokkan (銀角突貫, Ginkaku Tokkan lit. "Ginkaku Rush")
attacks.description: Capitalizes on its large build by lowering its back and charging to crush the opponent.

attacks.name: Kingin Raimeigeki (金銀雷鳴撃, Kingin Raimeigeki lit. "Gold and Silver Thunder Attack")
attacks.description: Exposes the opponent to high voltage when Kinkakumon is aboard in a further addition to the Ginkaku Tokkan.

title: Gold and Silver Ogre Brothers
(鬼の金銀ブラザーズ
Oni no Kingin Burazāzu?)

Ginkakumon Promote.name: Ginkakumon Promote
Ginkakumon Promote.description: Ginkakumon Promote is an Ogre Digimon. A form that is activated when Kinkakumon and Ginkakumon reach the peak of their anger. Kinkakumon uses its instincts to steer Ginkakumon, whose power has risen significantly.

attacks.name: Hiden Kibakuha (火電鬼爆波, Fire-Electric Oni Explosive Wave)
attacks.description: Uses Kinkakumon's electricity and Ginkakumon's hellfire to unleash a combined attack.

Ginryumon.name: Ginryumon
Ginryumon.description: Ginryumon is a Dragon Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. Ginryumon's entire body is clad in sturdy Japanse armor. Despite its appearance, it has a light body that allows it to glide gracefully through the air while parrying enemy attacks. It has the courage to parry enemy attacks using its own body, and eyesight to detect enemy attacks right before they hit. It is thought to be a Digivolved "Prototype Digimon".

attacks.name: Metal Armor Blade (徹甲刃, Tekkoujin, lit. "Armor Piercing Blade")
attacks.description: Shoots sharp spears out of its mouth.

attacks.name: Boujinha (棒陣破, Boujinha lit. "Battle Rod Break")
attacks.description: Charges the enemy while parrying their attack with its armor.

Giromon.name: Giromon
Giromon.description: Giromon is a Machine Digimon. It patrols within the Computer Network while floating lightly in the air, and is also known as the "Net Keeper". It is surely a frightening Digimon, as when it judges an intruding Digimon to be an opponent, it will repel them with all the attacks it is able to muster, and if it is driven into a predicament, it will completely annihilate the intruder by blowing itself up.

attacks.name: Big Bang Boom (Deadly Bomb)
attacks.description: Throws a super-powerful hand grenade.

attacks.name: Guillo-Chain Saw (分解チェーンソー, Bunkai Chainsaw, lit. "Disassembly Chainsaw")

title: Net Keeper

Gizamon.name: Gizamon
Gizamon.description: Gizamon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It grew fins on its hands and feet in order to paddle through water. It is more suited for life in the water than on land, and although it swims about quickly in the water with its fins and strong hind-legs, on the ground, it moves about with weak, frog-like hops. When on land, it has a very timid disposition, but when in the water, it displays its natural, ferocious personality.

attacks.name: Spiral Saw (Spiral Edge)
attacks.description: Rolls up into a ball and uses its blade-like fins to attack an opponent.

attacks.name: Water Cure
attacks.description: Fires a stream of water at the enemy.

attacks.name: Water Shot
attacks.description: Attacks with a bursting stream of water.

Gizumon.name: Gizumon
Gizumon.description: Gizumonis an Unknown Digimon. A Digimon without an ego, it was remodeled artificially and carries out its missions according to the orders it received.

attacks.name: PT Laser
attacks.description: Releases a small laser through its red eyes.

attacks.name: PT Helix
attacks.description: Spins and cuts off its enemies.

Gizumon-AT.name: Gizumon-AT
Gizumon-AT.description: Gizumon-AT is an Unknown Digimon. A Digimon without an ego, it was remodeled artificially and carries out its missions according to the orders it received. All its lethal skills exceed the power of the ones of Gizumon.

attacks.name: AT Laser
attacks.description: Releases a red laser from its eyeball. It can dissolve its enemy's composition data.

Gizumon-XT.name: Gizumon-XT
Gizumon-XT.description: Gizumon-XT is an Unknown Digimon. A Digimon without an ego, it was remodeled artificially and carries out its missions according to the orders it received. All its lethal skills exceed the power of the ones of Gizumon-AT.

attacks.name: XT Laser
attacks.description: Releases a red laser from its eyeball which can dissolve its enemy's composition data.

attacks.name: XT Laser++
attacks.description: Unleashes a destructive energy wave from the structure on top of its body.

Gladimon.name: Gladimon
Gladimon.description: Gladimon is a Warrior Digimon. It is a novice Digimon who is active on the front lines. It moves quickly due to having a small physique and being lightly equipped, and cuts its way into enemy lines as a scout. It also specializes in tactics where it creates formations in collaboration with its comrades, so its combat ability as a platoon is high as well. It is said that only those who win on the battlefield evolve into great warriors. It is a swordsman that dances around the Colosseum while putting on a skilled display of moves.

attacks.name: Wheel Rush
attacks.description: Performs a spinning slash with the rapiers in its hands.

attacks.name: Sword Dancer
attacks.description: Minces the enemy as if it were dancing with its long arms.

Goblimon.name: Goblimon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Masafumi Kimura(Tamers),Hajime Iijima(Frontier),Takahiro Sakurai,Kenji Akabane,Tomohisa Hashizume(Xros Wars)
Goblimon.description: Goblimon is an Evil Digimon. It has the appearance of a mischief-loving, troublesome goblin. As it has a devious personality lacking in courage, it never acts alone, and always attacks as a group concealed in buildings or the bowers of a forest. However, if they come to a disadvantage, they flee as fast as they can, scattering in all directions. Accordingly, its intelligence is only a little higher than other Rookie Digimon.

attacks.name: Goblin Strike (Goburi Strike): Throws a fireball at the opponent at Mach speed. In Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth, Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory, Digimon World
attacks.description: Next Order, Digimon Links, Digimon ReArise Goblimon fires the fireball from the tip of its club.

attacks.name: Life Shield (Living Shield)
attacks.description: Lowers enemy's attack's power.

attacks.name: Goburi Rush
attacks.description: Makes multiple attacks with a hammer.

attacks.name: Boulder Throw (岩飛ばし, Iwa Tobashi)
attacks.description: Summons a large boulder and throws it.

attacks.name: Goburi Bomb
attacks.description: Throws a huge fireball that explodes on impact.

Gogmamon.name: Gogmamon
Gogmamon.description: Gogmamonis a Rock Digimon. It is a Digimon with an enormous body. It is said to have a small population at present, and mostly lives in solitude deep inside caves. It hardly ever eats food that looks like food, and will occasionally leave the cave to build up energy by taking in light through the crystals covering its body. It reliably eliminates intruders inside the cave with its "Giant Grater".

attacks.name: Giant Grater
attacks.description: Grinds the enemy with the crystals on its arms.

attacks.name: Curse Refraction (Curse Reflection)
attacks.description: Fires the light energy it has accumulated from the tips of its crystals.

Gokuwmon.name: Gokuwmon
Gokuwmon.description: Gokuwmonis a Beast Man Digimon. It was born from within the boiling magma ofBoot Volcano, and pursued strength and extracted modeling data from numerous databases, becoming a Combat Digimon that awakened to the combat instinct it was born with. Although it is journeying across theDigital Worldto challenge formidable opponents and satiate the craving engraved inside of its heart, if it encounters an opponent that it judges to be strong it will insolently request a battle, regardless of the situation. However, due to the "Kinkoji"(緊箍児,"Kinkoji"lit. "Tight-bound Child")which was placed on Gokuwmon's head bySanzomonwhen it was born, its head will be constricted and it will pass out if it swears to excess, so it reluctantly observes decorum. Gokuwmon is proficient in a large number of martial and magical arts, and since the "Nyoikinkobou"(如意金箍棒,"Nyoikinkobou"lit. "Ideal Golden-bound Cudgel")in its hand is extensible, it can inflict strikes on enemies that are far away, and is also an all-purpose weapon that can fire a lightning cannon while connected, and fire lightning bullets as pistols when split in two.

attacks.name: Secret Technique: Waking Shadow (秘技・夢現影, Higi: Mugen'ei)
attacks.description: Deftly handles the Nyoikinkobou and makes sport of the enemy with its acrobatic movements, unleashing an attack of afterimages that makes it look like the opponent is under attack by a horde of Gokuwmon.

attacks.name: Lightning-Speed Attack (疾風迅雷撃, Shippū-jinrai Geki)
attacks.description: Pierces the Nyoikinkobou into the ground and extends it to a thundercloud in the sky, then accumulates the thunder energy within itself, and rams the opponent like a bolt of thunder.

attacks.name: Super-Electrified Lightning Cannon (超帯電雷光砲, Choutaiden Raikou Hou)
attacks.description: Amplifies and fires the energy within the Nyoikinkobou.

attacks.name: Kintoun (觔斗雲, Kintoun lit. "Somersault Cloud")
attacks.description: Gathers clouds and flies through the sky at high speeds.

GoldNumemon.name: GoldNumemon
GoldNumemon.description: GoldNumemon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a subspecies of Numemon whose whole body shines gold, it also specializes in aerial attacks as a result of acquiring wings. It took in gold data from a mine in the Digital World, and its defensive power is higher than that of Numemon. One would have expected it to have grown fond of cleanliness with it shining gold, but it continuously throws gold poop.

attacks.name: Golden Rush (Gold-Durian Rush)
attacks.description: Throws rapid-fire poop.

attacks.name: Gold Breath (Goldonara)
attacks.description: Emits a foul smell while burping.

attacks.name: Big Yucky Tongue (イヤでデッカい舌, Iya de Dekkai Shita)
attacks.description: Licks the enemy in a disgusting way.

attacks.name: Gold Junk (Gold Excrement)
attacks.description: Throws gigantic poop.

Goldramon.name: Goldramon
Goldramon.description: Goldramonis a Holy Dragon Digimon. One of the "Four Great Dragons", it is a God Dragon Digimon with six hardened wings and a body that shines gold. It wears aHoly Ringaround its left arm.Also, the tiny dragon Digimon sealed within thevambraceon Goldramon's right hand is called "Amonof the Crimson Flame"(紅炎のアモン,Kouen no Amon)(Amon of Red Flame), who governs over "Destruction", and the one sealed within the vambrace on its left hand is called "Umonof the Blue Lightning"(蒼雷のウモン,Sourai no Umon)(Umon of Blue Thunder), who governs over "Regeneration".It exorcises evil with its fists of sacred lightand its over-leveled holy spirit and hidden magical power are the strongest among the Four Great Dragons.

attacks.name: Fatal Flame (God Flame)
attacks.description: Explodes its holy spirit, instantly mowing down the opponents in every direction.

attacks.name: God Fist
attacks.description: A fiery punch.

Goldramon X.name: Goldramon X
Goldramon X.description: Goldramon X is a Holy Dragon Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The fact that it was hardly affected by the X-Antibody meant that it had already manifested its latent abilities. Although there no longer appears to be any significant changes to Goldramon, who has continued to digivolve throughout the history of the Digital World, its hidden grappling abilities have been drawn out. Portions of its head and chest have transformed into new armor; its hardened wings have made it easier to move about during hand-to-hand combat, and also form pairs to act as a shield. Despite draining its holy power, its "God Fist", a fisticuff released from its hand, causes ordinary Mega Digimon to be blown away without getting struck, and it came to be known as the "Sky-soaring, Strong-armed Fighting Dragon".

attacks.name: God Flame
attacks.description: Explodes its holy spirit, instantly mowing down the opponents in every direction.

title: Sky-soaring
Strong-armed Fighting Dragon

GoldVeedramon.name: GoldVeedramon
GoldVeedramon.description: GoldVeedramon is a Mythical Dragon Digimon. It armor-digivolved from Veemon with the "Digi-Egg of Destiny". Its existence is precious, and it possesses extraordinary offensive ability among Armors, and exhibits its Mega-class power if it gets in a pinch. Also, its golden body illuminates the darkness of the Net.

attacks.name: V-Nova Blast (V-Breath Arrow)
attacks.description: Attacks with golden-hot combat.

Golemon.name: Golemon
Golemon.description: Golemon is a Rock Digimon. Golemon was discovered when an ancient curse was digitally analyzed. An ancient forbidden spell is carved onto its back, the characters meaning "epidemic", "curse" and "evil". Apparently, this protects it from the gas it emits. About 90% of its body is rock data, with organic limbs attached to its body. It is an unfeeling Digimon that doesn't move unless ordered to.

attacks.name: Sulfur Plume (Curse Crimson)
attacks.description: Fires super-heated gases from the small stacks on its back or from its mouth.

attacks.name: Powerful Punch
attacks.description: Punches with a punch full of powerful energy.

GolemJijiTortomon.name: GolemJijiTortomon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Final Fusion - The Fight For Earth!" [54]
GolemJijiTortomon.description: GolemJijiTortomon is the DigiFuse of Golemon, Jijimon, and Kamemon. Final Fusion - The Fight For Earth!

attacks.name: Tail Thrust Booster
attacks.description: Perform propulsion with a combination of its tail and flatulence.

Gomamon.name: Gomamon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Junko Takeuchi(Adventure/02/tri./Kizuna),Yuki Kaida(Frontier),Yukie Muraoka(Frontier, Island),Yukiko Hanioka(Frontier, Island)
Gomamon.description: Gomamonis a Sea Animal Digimon. It has become able to move on land, and is covered in temperature-maintaining fur. The short, white fur that covers its body gets longer as it grows, and furthermore, it's said that it turns brown when it grows up. Its personality is a naughty-boy type that fiddles with everything it sees. The red fur growing along its back from the top of its head moves according to Gomamon's emotions, and when it gets angry, the fur bristles. Gomamon's claws are strong enough to easily break through solid ice, so you'll have a painful experience if you take it lightly.

attacks.name: Fish Power (Marching Fishes)
attacks.description: Commands its tiny fish followers.

attacks.name: Claw Attack (するどいツメ, Surudoi Tsume, lit. "Sharp Claw")
attacks.description: Attacks the foe with its claw.

attacks.name: Sharp Sider (Sharp Edge)
attacks.description: Jumps up and slices at the enemy repeatedly while in mid-air.

attacks.name:
Big Wave Attack (Sufer Dive) Jumps into the air to body slam the enemy.
Sufer Dive Combo
Tail Slap
attacks.description: Kicks the foe while flipping.

attacks.name: Bubble Deflector (Bubble Barrier)
attacks.description: Encases itself in bubble of water that can repel attacks and hurts foes.

attacks.name: Sliding Seal
attacks.description: Uses water to slide rapidly forward along the ground and into the opponent.

attacks.name: Water Shot
attacks.description: Attacks with a bursting stream of water.

attacks.name: Water Current Ball
attacks.description: Spits water from its mouth.

attacks.name: Water Current Throw
attacks.description: Throws the opponent upwards with its forelegs and then blast them of spray of water from its mouth.

attacks.name: Giant Water Current
attacks.description: Hits the enemy with a wave of water.

attacks.name: Aerial Clawing
attacks.description: Jumps up and slices at the enemy repeatedly while in mid-air.

attacks.name: Gomamon Head-Butt
attacks.description: Launches itself at the enemy head-first.

Gomamon X.name: Gomamon X
Gomamon X.description: Gomamon X is a Sea Animal Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Due to the fact that its lovable personality has grown even more, expressing its emotions more vividly with its distinctive red fur, it is getting many enthusiastic Gomamon fans. However, it is difficult to raise for enjoyment purposes, exhibits astonishing power despite its small body, has started moving quickly even on land, and as expected, it did not lose its abilities as a "Combat Species" Digimon. It very rarely acts alongside the enormous Daipenmon, and personally seems to think of Daipenmon as its follower.

attacks.name: Marching Fishes
attacks.description: Commands its tiny fish followers.

attacks.name: Goma Milk Death
attacks.description: A seldom seen technique that appears to be a technique Gomamon specializes in. It is actually a powerful Special Move that Daipenmon unleashes.

Gorillamon.name: Gorillamon
Gorillamon.description: Gorillamon is a Beast Digimon. It is a Power Digimon endowed with the arm strength to crush anything and the leg strength to crush things underfoot no matter how hard they are. However, it surprises the opponent with light movements that aren't expected from its physique, and seizes the opportunity to add to the attack with the Energy Cannon on its right hand. It found its aesthetic in "Hit and Away".

attacks.name: Power Lifting (Power Attack)
attacks.description: Attacks with a super-powerful technique.

Gotsumon.name: Gotsumon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Yuu Sugimoto(Adventure/New Century),Reiko Kiuchi(Adventure 02),Yasuhiro Takato(Frontier, Admirer of the Ten Warriors),Ryō Naitō,Yūsuke Oguri(Frontier),Ken Maeda(Savers),Yuta Kasuya(Ghost Game)
(En:)R. Martin Klein(Frontier),Michael Lindsay(Data Squad),Derek Stephen Prince(Fusion)
Gotsumon.description: Gotsumonis a Rock Digimon. It is an ore type Digimon with powerful defensive abilities. It acquired the data of ore, improving its defense. It is mischievous with a cheerful personality. It is a little selfish, and once it gets angry, it seems to have the raging temper of an erupting volcano. The ore that makes it up changes depending on environment and conceals the possibility of evolution.

attacks.name: Rock Fist (Angry Rock)
attacks.description: Summons then hurls a number of heavy rocks from his head.

attacks.name: Wild Strike (あばれんぼう, Abarenbou, lit. "Hooligan")
attacks.description: Swings its arms wildly while moving towards the enemy.

attacks.name: Hardest Punch
attacks.description: Throws a very powerful punch.

attacks.name: Earth Shaker
attacks.description: A pillar made of rock emerges from the ground.

Gotsumon X.name: Gotsumon X
Gotsumon X.description: Gotsumon X is an Ore Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its ability to clad itself in ore data in fields has been enhanced, and it has obtained a bulkier body and more defensive power. The heavy blows it unleashes from its body have naturally powered up as well.

attacks.name: Rock Fist (Angry Rock)
attacks.description: Shoots super-hard ore from the top of its head.

attacks.name: Rage Rock A reckless ramming attack while angered. It has formidable destructive power despite Gotsumon X being a Rookie.
Hardest Punch
attacks.description: Throws a very powerful punch.

GraceNovamon.name: GraceNovamon
GraceNovamon.description: GraceNovamon is a Galaxy Digimon. A mythical Galaxy Digimon, said to have once been born from the Fusion of Apollomon and Dianamon of the Olympos XII, when the Digital World: Iliad was visited by an unprecedented crisis. By colliding the opposing energies of the Sun and the Moon together, it formed Big Bang-class energy within its body. Because of this, it has been predicted that GraceNovamon itself has become a standalone Galaxy, and it is said that it is impossible to measure its total data size accurately.

attacks.name: Eclipse Finger
attacks.description: Focuses the amplified energy within its body into the palms of its hands, melting the enemy by touching them.

attacks.name: Calydon Arcus (Lat: Calydon Bow)
attacks.description: Fires the eight "Meleagros" blades mounted on its back to pursue the enemy until they are destroyed.

Grademon.name: Grademon
Grademon.description: Grademonis a Warrior Digimon and a carrier of theX Antibody. It wields a pair of swords, and is called the "Golden Meteor" due to the way it cuts into the vanguard with dauntless courage. When it uses its "Souken Gradalpha"(双剣グレイダルファー,Souken Gureidarufā, lit. "Twin Swords Gradalpha")along with its twin-sword style, it brings a godly speed to those techniques, but due to the cursed swords, it becomes impossible for it to control itself, and it can't fight and still retain its sanity. Although its overall power is, after all, inferior, its sword techniques surpass even the Holy KnightCrusadermon, of the "Royal Knights", and it is said that itsroyal bluemantle is proof of the honor that was bestowed for its achievements over many battles.

attacks.name: Cross Blade
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent apart crosswise with the godly speed of its sword.

attacks.name: Grade Slash
attacks.description: Smites the opponent over the head, from higher ground, with its twin swords.

title: Golden Meteor
(金色の流星
Konjiki no Ryūsei?)

Grand Generamon.name: Grand Generamon
Grand Generamon.description: Grand Generamonis a Unique Digimon. It is a form that wasforced digifusedfromDorbickmon,NeoMyotismon,Zamielmon,Splashmon Darkness Mode 2,Olegmon,Gravimon, andApollomon, as they were without being compressed. It has no self or will, and unleashes the Special Moves of the seven who were its basis against those who enter its field of vision.

Grand Generamon (Incomplete).name: Grand Generamon (Incomplete)
Grand Generamon (Incomplete).description: Grand Generamon (Incomplete) has the same form asGrand Generamon, except that it lacks theOlegmonarm, theApollomonarm, and the Apollomon crest.

GrandisKuwagamon.name: GrandisKuwagamon

otherNames.name: グランディスクワガーモンＸ抗体 GrandisKuwagamon X-Antibody

GrandisKuwagamon.description: GrandisKuwagamonis an Insect Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. Only the strongest few among the evilGranKuwagamon, called the "Demon of the Deep Forest", digivolved into it, and if you come across GrandisKuwagamon, you can call yourself lucky to some extent. Its presence is concealed like dense fog, and it is the rarest species among Insect Digimon. It has pride as a Virus-species, and according to one theory, it is even said to be a warrior that has formed an alliance withBlackWarGreymon, who preaches its own justice as a Virus-species. The "Gran Killers" on both of its arms are capable of causing wounds, no matter how hard the shell or metal is, so it will deepen those wounds and eventually bring down the enemy.

GrandisKuwagamon Honeybee Mode.name: GrandisKuwagamon Honeybee Mode
debut: Digimon Fusion, "The Power Drain: The Hunters of Honey Land" [35]
GrandisKuwagamon Honeybee Mode.description: GrandisKuwagamon Honeybee Mode is nearly identical toGrandisKuwagamon, except it is now wearingHoneybeemon's armor on its torso with its helmet as spaulders and thus bears theCrest of Knowledgeon them. Itspronotumis now striped as well.

GranDracmon.name: GranDracmon
GranDracmon.description: GranDracmon is a Demon Beast Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is considered the king of vampire Digimon. It has kept a castle in the Dark Area since ancient times, and it boasts of such power that even the Seven Great Demon Lords cannot interfere with it. It has a gentlemanly demeanor, and because of the "Charm" effect within the voice it exudes, it has tales that can lead any Angel Digimon who comes to subdue it into falling down. It is told that it possesses an undying body, and although it is said that it is connected to the details of how the Dark Area came to be within the Digital World, or that it knows the truth of the mysterious digivolution, "Death-X", because it's difficult just to struggle your way to the castle, you'd have to say that questioning it about these mysteries would be extremely arduous.

attacks.name: Crystal Revolution
attacks.description: Instantly transforms all of the opponents into ice crystals.

attacks.name: Gorgon Eye (Eye of the Gorgon)
attacks.description: Uses its evil eye to imprison within darkness the hearts of the opponents that gaze at it.

attacks.name: Death Scream
attacks.description: Unleashes the wails of the underworld.

title: Vampire King
(吸血鬼の王
Kyūketsuki no Ō?)
Ruler of the Night
(夜の支配者
Yoru no Shihaisha?)

GranKuwagamon.name: GranKuwagamon
GranKuwagamon.description: GranKuwagamon is an Insectoid Digimon. It is the ultimate form of Kuwagamon-species Digimon. It is an especially evil being among Insectoid Digimon, and if you happen to stumble across GranKuwagamon within the Digital World, you won't be able to do anything but curse yourself. Because it inhabits the depths of the Digital World's forests, and is only active at night, it is called the "Demon of the Deep Forest". Also, its greatest rival is HerculesKabuterimon, and the battle between these two continues without ever ending.

attacks.name: Dimension Scissor
attacks.description: Cuts through all of the surrounding space.

attacks.name: Grand Darkness (Grand Death Screw)
attacks.description: Charges at an opponent while spinning its body.

title: Demon of the Deep Forest

GranLocomon.name: GranLocomon
GranLocomon.description: GranLocomon is a Machine Digimon. It is a Vehicle-species Digimon that digivolved from Locomon. It broke through the limits on the speeds sought by Locomon, and so it rushes about within the Network at super-speeds. It has an extremely strong competitive spirit and the personality of reckless types, and since its power is also incomparable, those who suffer its assault are smashed to smithereens. Although Locomon was not able to run when there weren't any rails, when GranLocomon is in a place where there aren't any rails, it is able to just produce rails to run on itself.

attacks.name: Wrecking Ball (Destroyed Crash)
attacks.description: Crashes into the opponent with its spiked wheel at speed.

GrapLeomon.name: GrapLeomon
GrapLeomon.description: GrapLeomon is a Beast Man Digimon. It is a Grappling-species Digimon that took in the data of various fighting games, using their original secrets to crush the opponent. Although it rotates the turbines on both of its arms and feet to unleash ever-changing techniques, the turbines rotate by being blown into all at once by the fighting spirit emitted by its DigiCore, and can't run on mediocre emotional strength.
