GrapLeomon inherited the data of the "King of Beasts", Leomon, and so that strong will to justice drives the turbines to the highest limit of their rotation speed.

attacks.name: The King of Fist (獅子獣波斬, Shishi Jūhazan, lit. "Lion Beast Wave Slash")
attacks.description: Drives the turbines on its arms to the highest limit of their rotation speed, then drives forward a blow heavy enough to distort gravity.

attacks.name: Cyclone Turbine (旋風タービン蹴り, Senpū Tābin Geri, lit. "Whirlwind Turbine Kick")
attacks.description: Rotates its whole body for the ultimate barrage of roundhouse kicks.

attacks.name: Vortex Kick (獅子旋風脚, Shishi Senpū Kyaku, lit. "Lion Cyclone Leg")
attacks.description: Kicks enemies.

Gravimon.name: Gravimon
Gravimon.description: Gravimonis an Unidentified Digimon. It is the general of theEarth Spirit Armyof the "Big Death-Stars". It is a tactician that has the ability to freely manipulate gravity, and with that ability. it has the ingenuity to survey the entire situation and control the course of the battle at will. The beauty of its plots are even said to be "ingenuity, as if gushing forth", so it makes sport of the enemy army by weaving formulaic tactics together with creative schemes. God Beast Digimon account for the majority of its army, which has overwhelming strength in terms of military power. Because it enjoys stimulating tactics, it uses the battlefield as its testing ground. It is an investigative Digimon which continues to zealously research questions like, how many casualties can be produced easily, which tactic lets it listen to a multitude of screams, what creative scheme will surprise the enemy or ally as they die, which method will cause all of the opponents to die without shedding blood, and so on.

attacks.name: Octogravity (Octa Gravity)
attacks.description: Uses its eight tentacles to manipulate the gravity on the battlefield, controlling the opponent's gravity based on the flow of the battle and making them lighter or heavier.

attacks.name: High Gravity Grip (High Gravity Pressure)
attacks.description: Elastically extends both of its arms and burdens the opponent with intense gravity pressure, compressing them to their limit.

attacks.name: Gravity Bang
attacks.description: Places the Digital World's gravity pressure upon itself until it reaches its limit, then detonates the entirety of its energy all at once in a mythical bold move. This forbidden self-destruction technique has enough destructive power to partially destroy a star, but might obliterate Gravimon itself. Although it can regenerate if it waits for many long years, even Gravimon doesn't know how long it will suffer for until it regenerates.

Gravimon Darkness Mode.name: Gravimon Darkness Mode
Gravimon Darkness Mode.description: Gravimon Darkness Mode is the DigiFuse of Gravimon, Thunderbirdmon, Eaglemon, Hippogriffomon, Sagittarimon, Cerberumon, and Centarumon. Regeneration Frustration!

attacks.name: High Gravity Punch
attacks.description: Elastically extends its arm into a gravity-enhanced punch.

attacks.name: High Gravity Pressure
attacks.description: Elastically extends both of its arms and burdens the opponent with intense gravity pressure, compressing them to their limit.

Greatest Cutemon.name: Greatest Cutemon
Greatest Cutemon.description: Greatest Cutemon is the DigiFuse of Cutemon, Dondokomon, Knightmon, the PawnChessmon (White), Beastmon, Kamemon, and Jijimon. Regeneration Frustration!

attacks.name: Sonic Disruptor Wave (Greatest Sonic Wave)
attacks.description: Pounds on its drum-torso to unleash a maddening sonic wave.

GreyKnightsmon.name: GreyKnightsmon
GreyKnightsmon.description: GreyKnightsmon is a Dark Knight Digimon. It is the ""Dragon Knight Form" (龍騎士形態, Ryūkishi Keitai, lit. "Dragon Knight Mode") that appears when MetalGreymon's charging power further enhances AxeKnightmon's superior battle prowess. It also has two cannons on its back, and holds the gigantic Drill Lance as if it was a weapon wielded by a giant. However impenetrable one's defenses, if GreyKnightsmon appears on the battlefield, its Drill Lance will demolish them.

attacks.name: Gigas Spiral
attacks.description: Pierces its opponents with its Drill Lance.

attacks.name: Hell Incinerate
attacks.description: Creates a giant tornado of flames.

attacks.name: Death Destroyer
attacks.description: Uses the two cannons on its back to shoot orbs of darkness.

Greymon.name: Greymon

otherNames.name: 暴龍獸/暴龙兽 Bào lóng shòu

Greymon.description: Greymonis a Dinosaur Digimon. Greymon's cranial skin has hardened so that it is covered in arhinoceros beetle-like shell. It is an extremely aggressive Digimon, with a body like a lethal weapon covered in sharp claws and gigantic horns. However, it is highly intelligent, and if you're able to tame it then there probably isn't any monster as strong.

attacks.name: Nova Blast (Mega Flame)
attacks.description: Spews ultra-high-temperature flames or a flame shot from its mouth to reduce everything to ashes.

attacks.name: Great Horns Attack (Great Antler)
attacks.description: Impales the opponent on its horns.

attacks.name: Fire Wall
attacks.description: Spews out an encroaching wall of flames.

attacks.name: Great Horns Attack (Great Horn Attack) Jumps upwards, stabbing with its horns.
Great Horns Bash (Great Horn)
attacks.description: Shoots forward horns-first.

attacks.name: Horn Impulse
attacks.description: Charges an opponent, attacking with its horn multiple times.

attacks.name: Tail Whip
attacks.description: Hits the opponent with its tail.

attacks.name: Bit Fire
attacks.description: Breathes out a small ball of fire.

attacks.name: Fire Horn
attacks.description: Attacks with a burning horn of fire.

attacks.name: Tail Crash
attacks.description: Slams its tail into the opponent.

attacks.name: Horn Spiral
attacks.description: Spins an enemy into a cyclone with horns.

Greymon (Blue).name: Greymon (Blue)
Greymon (Blue).description: Greymon (Blue)is a Dinosaur Digimon. Its ferociousness has increased, to the point where it can be called a completely wildGreymon. Even so, it isn't a lone wolf, and is clever enough to engage in team tactics with its comrades.

attacks.name: Bit Fire
attacks.description: Breathes out a small ball of fire.

attacks.name: Great Antler
attacks.description: Attacks multiple times with the horns on its head.

attacks.name: Mega Flame
attacks.description: Breathes fire.

attacks.name: Fire Horn
attacks.description: Attacks with a burning horn of fire.

attacks.name: Great Antler Attack (Great Horn Attack)
attacks.description: Jumps, stabbing upwards with its horns.

attacks.name: Great Antler Bash/Great Antler Drop(Great Horn)
attacks.description: Shoots forward horns first.

attacks.name: Tail Whip
attacks.description: Hits the opponent with its tail.

Greymon (2010 anime).name: Greymon (2010 anime)
Greymon (2010 anime).description: Greymon (2010 anime)is a Dinosaur Digimon. It is aTyrannosaurus-type Digimon. As a Digimon specializing in offensive power, its combat instinct is extremely high, and it possesses a cruel, brutal nature to not stop battling until it annihilates the opponent, so ordinary Digimon are not even able to approach it, as they are pushed back by the strange fighting spirit it gives off to its surroundings. It displays its especially tremendous fighting strength along with its sturdy flesh in close combat. Each of its techniques possesses immense destructive power, and furthermore, it can probably be said that it is almost impossible to hit Greymon in close combat because of its quick movements. Because it has a merciless personality whether or not one is a member of the same family, there is nothing but difficulty in using Greymon.

attacks.name: Mega Flame
attacks.description: Attacks with a high-temperature jet of flames that burns its surroundings to cinders.

attacks.name: Atomic Tail (Blaster Tail)
attacks.description: Drives its tail into opponents for 360° around itself.

attacks.name: Horn Strike
attacks.description: Assaults the opponent with a technique effective for both approach and retreat.

Greymon O.name: Greymon O
debut: Super Xros Wars Blue and Red
Greymon O.description: Greymon Ois a Digimon. It is an orange version ofGreymon (2010 anime).

Greymon X.name: Greymon X
Greymon X.description: Greymon Xis a Dinosaur Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. The most outstanding among Dinosaur Digimon as aCombat Species, Greymon became even more aggressive. Although it has a relatively small build among Dinosaur-types, many of which are large Digimon, it has fully exhibited its carnivorous dinosaur-like ferocity, winning in battles and increasing its own strength. By enhancing "Nova Blast" to its utmost limit in its mouth, it acquired its "Mega Burst", which possesses explosive power.

attacks.name: Nova Blast (Mega Flame)
attacks.description: Spews extremely high-temperature flames from its mouth and reduces everything to ashes.

attacks.name: Mega Burst
attacks.description: Uses a technique possessing explosive power in which it enhances its "Mega Flame" within its mouth to its utmost limit.

Greymon (Blue) X.name: Greymon (Blue) X
Greymon (Blue) X.description: Greymon (Blue) Xis a Dinosaur Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. Both Greymon (Blue) X's attack power and intelligence are increased, making it more capable of taking advantage of its prey's weaknesses in battle. If victorious in its fight, it ferociously rips apart its prey, much like a carnivorous dinosaur.

attacks.name: Mega Flame
attacks.description: Breaths out an intense stream of flames from its mouth.

attacks.name: Mega Burst
attacks.description: Fires off a version of "Mega Flame" enhanced to its limit within its mouth.

attacks.name: Razor Tail (Blader Tail)
attacks.description: Slices its enemies with its Razor Tail.

Grimmon.name: Grimmon
Grimmon.description: Grimmon is a Demon Dragon Digimon. It is a Digimon with the ability to cause Digimon to degenerate.

attacks.name: Chrono DSR (Chrono Destruction)
attacks.description: Degrades and destroys any data in the Digital World.

attacks.name: Call Cat
attacks.description: Summons a cat to attack its target.

attacks.name: Call Bat
attacks.description: Summons bats to bite and poison its target.

attacks.name: Call Bird
attacks.description: Summons birds to attack its target.

attacks.name: Call Dragonfly (Call Yanma)
attacks.description: Summons dragonflies to drop lightning.

Grizzlymon.name: Grizzlymon
Grizzlymon.description: Grizzlymon is a Beast Digimon. Although its plainly massive body, fangs and claws which conceal lethal potential, and appearance are ferocious, it possesses the spirit of an honorable martial artist. It can nimbly dodge the opponent's attacks, turning them aside, as with its exceptional grappling sense, it doesn't need to rely on its own attacks. Though Grizzlymon never starts fights, once someone makes it angry, it will stand up on its back legs and knock them down with its heavyweight forelegs, "Bear Claws" (熊爪, Kuma Tsume). With just this blow, most Digimon suffer a mortal wound as strong as the power they possess. These "Bear Claws" appear to have been imitated in WaruMonzaemon's "Bear Claw" equipment.

attacks.name: Maul Attack (当身返し, Atemigaeshi, lit. "Bodystrike Reversal")
attacks.description: Knocks down the opponent by utilizing their attack power, and converts it into striking them in their vitals.

attacks.name: Heavy Attack
attacks.description: Attacks with a blow with the power of a beast.

Groundramon.name: Groundramon
Groundramon.description: Groundramon is an Earth Dragon Digimon. It has giant arms on its back that are said to have mutated from wings, allowing it to more efficiently dig through the ground. It usually lurks within the tunnels it carved deep underground, and seldom comes to the surface. Also, as Groundramon tends to prefer to inhabit veins of the rare Huanglong Ore, it has been discovered that it is very likely to find the elements of Huanglong Ore comprising the scales covering its body. Its personality is extremely ferocious, and as most people lose their life when they encounter one, it is one Digimon for which the details of its ecology are not well understood.

attacks.name: Scrap Claw (Scrapless Claw)
attacks.description: Holds the opponent between the arms on its back and crushes them.

attacks.name: Megaton Hammer Crush
attacks.description: Knocks the opponent out with the iron sphere on its tail.

attacks.name: Giga Crack
attacks.description: When it reaches the surface, it drops the opponent into fissures it generates by striking its whole body against the ground.

Growlmon.name: Growlmon
Growlmon.description: Growlmonis a Dark Dragon Digimon. It is called the "Deep-crimson Demon Dragon". The childishness it had when it wasGuilmonhas vanished, and it digivolved into a wilder, more brutal Digimon. Also, although it is a Virus Digimon, it may even battle for justice depending on how it was raised by itsTamer, because it will be faithfully obedient. Growlmon's roar has the power to shake the solid earth, and before battle, it raises its voice to an offensive roar to intimidate the opponent.

attacks.name: Pyro Blaster (Exhaust Flame)
attacks.description: Spews out a powerful blaze with a roar.

attacks.name: Dragon Slash (Plasma Blade)
attacks.description: Develops plasma along the blades on its elbows, then strikes the opponent.

attacks.name: Pyro Blaster (Fire Blaster)
attacks.description: Breathes fire continuously.

attacks.name: Dino Kick
attacks.description: Quickly jumps at the enemy and kicks them with both feet.

attacks.name: Dragon Spine
attacks.description: Whips an enemy with its tail

attacks.name: Howling
attacks.description: Makes the enemy cower with a fierce howl.

attacks.name: Growl Claw (Grow Claw)
attacks.description: Attacks using huge claws.

attacks.name: Raiden Blade
attacks.description: Unleashes intense energy from its plasma blade.

attacks.name: Fire Breath
attacks.description: Strikes with a fireball causing a pillar of fire.

title: Deep-crimson Demon Dragon
(深紅の魔竜
Shinku no Maryuu?)

Growlmon (Yellow).name: Growlmon (Yellow)
Growlmon (Yellow).description: Growlmon (Yellow)is a Demon Dragon Digimon. An orange Data typeGrowlmon. Normally calmer than the Virus-type, it will get crazy mad if something goes wrong.

attacks.name: Exhaust Flame
attacks.description: Breathes out a flaming inferno along with a roar.

attacks.name: Plasma Blade
attacks.description: Attacks with an electrified arm.

attacks.name: Howling
attacks.description: Makes the enemy cower with a fierce howl.

attacks.name: Growl Claw (Grow Claw)
attacks.description: Attack using its huge claws.

Growlmon X.name: Growlmon X
Growlmon X.description: Growlmon Xis a Demon Dragon Digimon and carrier of theX Antibody. Because it has accepted and contained the extraordinary power of the "Digital Hazard" within itself, and that its attack instinct as a Virus-species enhanced further, it will exhibit a ferocious nature where it is unable to control its overflowing power, changing its personality into one on a thin line with justice depending on how it grows up. However, Growlmon's power has clearly increased, and the blades on both of its elbows have enlarged even more, developing and causing plasma to appear when attacking the enemy.

attacks.name: Exhaust Flame
attacks.description: Spews out a powerful blaze with a roar.

attacks.name: Plasma Blade
attacks.description: Develops plasma along the blades on both of its elbows, then strikes the opponent.

attacks.name: Raiden Blade
attacks.description: Uses the destructive energy produced from the "Plasma Blades" on both of its elbows.

Grumblemon.name: Grumblemon
Grumblemon.description: Grumblemon is an Ogre Digimon. It possesses power over Earth which bears the might of AncientVolcanomon. Various weapons and armor are brought to life from its large hands and thick fingers, and its craftsmanship is practical yet artistic. The Grotte Armor that it wears and its main weapon, the Grotte Hammer, are both the handmade Grotte-brand. It prefers to act alone since it hates being ordered about, however, its artisan pride is such that, once it recognizes someone's true merit, it will obediently abide them, and immerse itself in its own work. Although it's not very intelligent, its pride towards its work is intensely high and it has a strong tendency to take the opponent lightly. It also has a technique which creates Golemon using the earth around it and orders them to attack.

attacks.name: Seismic Sledge (Snake Eye Break)
attacks.description: Smashes its "Grotte Hammer" into foe. The attack can be used to petrify and smash enemies.

attacks.name: Jack in the Box
attacks.description: Jumps out of the ground and attacks with its Grotte Hammer.

Gryphonmon.name: Gryphonmon
Gryphonmon.description: Gryphonmon is a Mythical Beast Digimon. It is a fusion Digimon which possesses the head, wings, and forelegs of a Bird Digimon, and the body of a Beast Digimon with a snake-like tail attached to it. Although it is able to fly about the skies with its wings, it is said that it usually inhabits desert regions and mountain caves. Also, Gryphonmon's offensive power is extremely great, and because it makes sport of enemies with its keen movements, it is difficult to analyze any way to defeat Gryphonmon. To make the best use of those abilities, it serves as a guard defending against illegal penetrations of the Internet, and is used for the security of confidential information. A Gryphonmon attends Murmukusmon, who uses it as its hands and feet.

attacks.name: Solo Roar (Supersonic Voice)
attacks.description: Produces an extremely high-frequency sound wave which completely disrupts the opponent's data structure.

attacks.name: Mobius Bite (Möbius Bite)
attacks.description: Uses the mouths on its head and tail to bite an opponent and tear it apart.

Guardromon.name: Guardromon
Guardromon.description: Guardromonis a Machine Digimon. It is a Machine Digimon that protects the computer network's defense wall. It originally worked with the "Net Keeper"Giromonto repulse those who would illegally enter through the defense wall. However, malicious hackers noticed its ironclad defensive ability and infected Guardromon with a computer virus, using it to protect themselves from the vaccine-type justice brigade known as the "Virus Busters." Because its program commands are basically purely defensive in nature, the change in allegiance to defending the intruders did not pose a huge problem for Guardromon.

attacks.name: Grenade Destroyer (Destruction Grenade)
attacks.description: Fires whistling missiles from the retractable missile launchers in its forearms.

attacks.name: Warning Laser
attacks.description: Fires lasers from its eyes.

Guardromon (Gold).name: Guardromon (Gold)
Guardromon (Gold).description: Guardromon (Gold) is a Machine Digimon. It is the guardian of the Chrome Digizoid mine, transformed to withstand the repeated, relentless raids from illegal miners. This is supposedly the result of Guardromon's armor taking in the Chrondigizoit dust data floating in the air, making it more durable than a normal Guardromon's armor. In exchange, however, the armor is heavier and its movements are consequently sluggish.

attacks.name: Destruction Grenade
attacks.description: Fires whistling missiles from the retractable missile launchers in its forearms. This attacks output has been raised due to taking in Chrondigizoit dust data.

Guidemon.name: Guidemon
debut: Digimon Next, "Welcome to the Digimon Net Game!" [01]
Guidemon.description: Name used inDigimon Next. No official romanization available.

Guilmon.name: Guilmon
Guilmon.description: Guilmon is a Reptile Digimon. It has an appearance like a dinosaur that still retains its youth. Although it is still a Rookie, its potential as a "Combat Species", something which all Digimon naturally possess, is very high, and it hides the ferocious personality of a carnivorous beast. The mark drawn on its abdomen is called the "Digital Hazard", which is inscribed on those that have the potential to cause massive damage to computer data. However, as long as this ability is used peacefully, it can probably become a being that protects the Digital World.

attacks.name: Rock Breaker
attacks.description: Destroys rocks with its sturdy foreclaws.

attacks.name: Pyro Sphere (Fireball)
attacks.description:
Spews out a powerful flame shot.
Kūchū Fireball (空中ファイアーボール, Kūchū Fireball lit. "Aerial Fireball")

attacks.name: Kūchū Fireball (空中ファイアーボール, Kūchū Fireball lit. "Aerial Fireball")
Kurogane Maru (クレナイマル, Kurenai-maru)
Quake-a-lator (Rock 'n' Roll Breaker)
attacks.description: Drills through its target with its claws.

attacks.name: Rock Breaker (Fire Rock Breaker)
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with a fiery claw.

attacks.name: Neck Stretcher
attacks.description: Launches from a handstand into an upward kick with both feet.

attacks.name: Sharp Claw (するどいツメ, Surudoi Tsume, lit. "Sharp Claws")
attacks.description: Attacks using its sharp claws.

attacks.name: Gill Shot (Guil Shot)
attacks.description: Emits a blast wave with the mouth.

attacks.name: Fire Mitt
attacks.description: Punches the opponent using fists wrapped in fireballs.

attacks.name: Wild Scratch
attacks.description: Descends on the adversary while frantically scratching with its claws.

attacks.name: Ki Charge (気合い溜め, Kiai Tame, lit. "Fighting Spirit Gather")
attacks.description: Concentrates and powers up the damage done by its next attack.

attacks.name:
Wild Upper
Kūchū Wild Upper (空中ワイルド・アッパー, Kūchū Wild Upper lit. "Aerial Wild Upper")
Kūchū Wild Upper (空中ワイルド・アッパー, Kūchū Wild Upper lit. "Aerial Wild Upper")
White Wings
attacks.description: Sprouts white wings and flies into the enemy.

attacks.name: Giant Throw
attacks.description: Throws the enemy with both hands.

attacks.name: Great Fire Rock Breaker 1 / Great Fire Rock Breaker 2
Aerial Tail Attack 1 / Aerial Tail Attack 2

Guilmon X.name: Guilmon X
Guilmon X.description: Guilmon X is a Demon Dragon Digimon and carrier of the X Antibody. Due to the X-Antibody, the engraved "Digital Hazard" mark has vanished. That is because it accepted and contained its power within its body. It still hasn't awakened to that power, but if it grows up the right way, it can be said that its qualities for maturing into a true guardian of the Digital World will have improved. Since its instincts as a Virus-species have also increased, its personality has become more aggressive.

attacks.name: Fire Ball (Fireball)
attacks.description: Spews out a powerful flame shot.

attacks.name: Fire Mitt
attacks.description: Punches the opponent using fists wrapped in fireballs.

attacks.name: Rock Breaker
attacks.description: Destroys rocks with its sturdy foreclaws.

Gulfmon.name: Gulfmon
Gulfmon.description: Gulfmon is a Dark Animal Digimon. It is a dark Digimon that emerged from the abyss of the Dark Area. Its large build is that of a demon beast, as immense as a mountain and possessing sturdy limbs, and attached to its lower half is a "Maw" large enough to swallow everything. What is more, it is said that the hole is connected to the abyss of the Dark Area, and it's said that those who are sucked in have their souls (DigiCores) smashed to pieces and are no longer able to escape. Its power is mighty, and it's also said that it could destroy the world in seven days.

attacks.name: Black Requiem
attacks.description: Causes a solemn voice to be heard singing out of nowhere, whose audience is said to soon die, with their data never able to be restored.

attacks.name: Dead Scream
attacks.description: Lets out the sorrowful cries of the dead from its Maw, which bring death to all who hear them.

GulusGammamon.name: GulusGammamon
GulusGammamon.description: GulusGammamon is a Dragon Man Digimon. It is a ferocious Digimon that digivolved when the evil heart hidden within Gammamon was released. It rejects interference from those around it and is only interested in fighting, and if it grabs an opponent that comes into sight, its attack will not end until it kills them. It puts up ferocious battles where it attacks regardless of whether its limbs are broken.

attacks.name: Dark Palace (Dark Pales)
attacks.description: Crushes the enemy with flames of darkness that it amasses in its hands.

attacks.name: Death Demona (Desdemona)
attacks.description: Hurls flames of darkness that it amasses in its hands while maintaining their power.

attacks.name: Dead-End Skewer
attacks.description: Kills the enemy by piercing their vitals with the tip of its tail with pinpoint accuracy.

Gumdramon.name: Gumdramon
Gumdramon.description: Gumdramon is a Mini Dragon Digimon. It possesses a flexible Shippodzuchi (尻尾槌, Shippodzuchi lit. "Tail Hammer") that can extend anywhere. Its body is also very soft and elastic, and it moves around dynamically using its whole body like a spring. It is also able to fly at its running speed with its tiny wings. Its personality is very mischievous, so it's a showoff. In order to attract attention, it dives right in the middle of any kind of dangerous situation and rages around, not stopping until it stands out from everyone. Its potential is concealing its considerable, unfathomable power, but is inhibited by the "Kinkoji" (緊箍児, "Kinkoji" lit. "Tight-bound Child") it wears on its tail.

attacks.name: Ran-gum Break
attacks.description: Freely wields its Shippodzuchi as a hammer.

attacks.name: Jacked Hammer
attacks.description: Swings down its super-sized Shippodzuchi while carrying out a forward handspring.

attacks.name: Fire Vortex
attacks.description: Strikes a single blow with its Shippodzuchi while performing continuous forward somersaults at high speed to generate flames.

attacks.name: Ran-gum Break: Jetscrew Version
attacks.description: Spins its tail like a screw-propeller to move underwater.

Gundramon.name: Gundramon
Gundramon.description: Gundramon is a Machine Digimon. It is a large Digimon with a massive quantity of firearms. Possessing outstanding firepower, Gundramon, MagnaKidmon, and BelleStarmon are collectively known as the "Three Musketeers" by many Digimon. Furthermore, Gundramon is part of the Crack Team, and is positioned for combat just like Machinedramon. Its speed is faster than that of Machinedramon, and has high manoeuvrability to move within range in an instant. The 100% full metal comprising its body is ingrained with the burning smell of cartridges, so it is a bitter, hard-boiled Digimon.

attacks.name: Gewalt Schwärmer (Deu: "Violent Zealot")
attacks.description: All-round volley firing.

attacks.name: Der Blitz (Deu: "The Lightning")
attacks.description: Picks off the enemy's vitals with the six-chambered revolvers on both of its hands.

attacks.name: Platzenkreuz (Deu: "Burst Cross")
attacks.description: Pins the enemy to the ground with its feet and shoots them at point-blank range.

Gummymon.name: Gummymon
Gummymon.description: Gummymon is a Lesser Digimon. It grew up from Zerimon. As it inherited an exceedingly energetic personality from Zerimon, it is both cheerful and lively. Although it is growing, it's squishy because its body tissue is as unstable as usual, but just like Zerimon, its horn portion has hardened, and it intimidates the opponent with headbutts. Its greatest change from Zerimon is that it has a body and ear-like objects coming out of its head.

attacks.name: Double Bubble (Double Bobble)
attacks.description: Spews out a lot of adhesive bubbles.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

Gurimon.name: Gurimon
Gurimon.description: Gurimon is a Lesser Digimon. It is an In-Training Digimon that grew up from Curimon and now has two horns on its brow. It bounces around energetically, and when it finds large, hard rocks, it strikes them with its horn-charging signature move "Prickle Attack (チクチクアタック, Chikuchiku Attack, lit. "Prickly Attack")". It enjoys coming across whole rocks, and runs around bursting with energy to become even stronger. Its frill has grown harder, and it seems that in addition to protecting its soft body, it also has the effect of making it look bigger.

attacks.name: Prickle Attack (チクチクアタック, Chikuchiku Attack, lit. "Prickly Attack")
attacks.description: Horn-charges.

Gururumon.name: Gururumon
Gururumon.description: Gururumon is a Beast Digimon. It is a Digimon that is very similar to Garurumon. As a fiendish Digimon that lives in the dark, it is a nuisance who causes trouble everywhere.

attacks.name: Chaos Blaster (Chaos Fire)
attacks.description: Breathes out an intense blue flame.

attacks.name: Karate Kilo Byte (Killer Bite)
attacks.description: Bites with sharp icy cold fangs.

attacks.name: Ice Cannon
attacks.description: Fires a ball of ice.

attacks.name: Gururu Thrust
attacks.description: Kick while doing a backflip.

attacks.name: Anti-Dote (Antidote)
attacks.description: Cures Poison.

Gusokumon.name: Gusokumon
Gusokumon.description: Gusokumonis a Crustacean Digimon. Gusokumon lurks at the bottom of the ocean, at a depth that light fails to reach. It is also known for being a long-lived Digimon, capable of long-term biological activity while consuming a minuscule amount of energy. Weak, injured Digimon that occasionally sink to the bottom of the ocean turn into its prey. It barely ever moves on its own accord. When facing a large number of enemies, it defends itself by firing countless Colony Torpedoes.

attacks.name: Brunt Claw
attacks.description: The sharp claws on its forelimbs that it uses to fight back against intruders as they draw near.

attacks.name: Colony Torpedo
attacks.description: Small fish-shaped biological weapons fired from its back. Despite having a slow underwater speed, their nature is similar to that of mines in that they trigger a huge explosion on contact.

Gwappamon.name: Gwappamon
Gwappamon.description: Gwappamon is a Cyborg Digimon. It was fused from the data of a music player and the legendary animal, "Kappa". It is always listening to its favorite music in bright and cheerful spirits, but it sheds tears if the disc-like portion on its head is damaged.

attacks.name: DJ Shooter
attacks.description: Rotates the disc on its head at high speed and then shoots it off.

attacks.name: Guappa Punch (Gawappa Punch)
attacks.description: A stretchy punch! Yay♪

attacks.name: Guappa Rapper (Gawappa Rapper)
attacks.description: Dance & Kick! Woo♪

Gyuukimon.name: Gyuukimon
Gyuukimon.description: Gyuukimon is a Dark Beast Digimon. It is a Digimon with an ox-like upper body and a spider lower body. With a brutal and insidious personality, it is a monster that chases after those who see it for days, and launches surprise attacks from behind every night. Despite its large build, it skilfully uses its spider legs to move quietly without making a sound. The bells hanging from the tips of its horns emit a sound only when it attacks, so those who have seen Gyuukimon will constantly be frightened by the sound of the bells. The dissonance produced by the bells deprives the opponent of their senses, making Gyuukimon's attacks advantageous.

attacks.name: Yatsuka Senbaku (八束染縛, Yatsuka Senbaku lit. "Eight Bundles of Dyed Restraints")
attacks.description: Restrains the enemy with a spider thread that it spits out from the mouth of its lower body and then spews a highly toxic liquid.

attacks.name: Majin Byoutan (魔塵瓢箪, Majin Byoutan lit. "Demon Dust Calabash")
attacks.description: Throws the cylinders equipped to its abdomen to spread a poisonous gas.

attacks.name: Senho Tsuchigumo (千砲土蜘蛛, Senho Tsuchigumo lit. "Thousand Cannon Tsuchigumo")
attacks.description: Attacks with the weapon on its left arm and ensures that it subdues its prey.

Hagurumon.name: Hagurumon
Hagurumon.description: Hagurumon is a Machine Digimon. It is a mutant Digimon shaped like a gear. There are countless gears built into its body, and the gears are constantly rotating. For that reason, if even a single gear is missing, all of the gears in its body stop rotating, and it becomes unable to maintain its vital functions. Hagurumon possesses the special ability to send a computer virus to its opponents in order to manipulate them at will, and that ability is exploited by fiendish Digimon. However, because Hagurumon itself doesn't have any sense of self, it doesn't even know it is being misused.

attacks.name: Cog Crusher (Darkness Gear)
attacks.description: Buries a black gear with a built-in computer virus within the body of the opponent, driving them mad.

attacks.name: Command Input
attacks.description: Curses the enemy with a special computer program.

attacks.name: Crash Device
attacks.description: Attacks with an electrifying tackle.

attacks.name: Haguru Attack
attacks.description: Tackles the enemy.

attacks.name: Machine Attack (Kikai Attack)
attacks.description: Inflicts a hard blow full of machine power.

Hagurumon X.name: Hagurumon X
Hagurumon X.description: Hagurumon X is a Machine Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. KoHagurumon containing a more powerful computer virus have appeared. However, neither Hagurumon X nor the KoHagurumon have any sense of self; the only connection they have is that they rotate with each other regularly, and once that rotation becomes irregular, the KoHagurumon will fall off and may suffer damage. There are also gears that have changed to being drill-shaped, so you will get injured if you get close to them carelessly.

attacks.name: Cog Crusher (Darkness Gear)
attacks.description: Burys a black gear with a built-in computer virus within the body of the opponent, driving them mad.

Halsemon.name: Halsemon
Halsemon.description: Halsemon is a Bird Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Love". The "Digi-Egg of Love" has the attribute of "Wind", and those that don this Digi-Egg soar through the skies and dance in the sky, flapping their wings like a gust of wind. In aerial dogfights, its speed, and all of its attacks are superior to enemy Digimon.

attacks.name: Mach Impulse
attacks.description: Releases blades of pressurized wind from the wings on his helmet to slash into enemies.

attacks.name: Tempest Wing
attacks.description: Spins around, creating a tornado with which to attack his enemy.

attacks.name: Eagle Eye (Red Sun)
attacks.description: Fires two glowing energy arrows from his eyes which can smite or paralyze his opponents.

attacks.name: Udjat Gaze
attacks.description: A cursed beam is fired from a sharp glance of its eyes, hypnotizing the enemy.

title: Wings of Love
(はばたく愛情
Habataku Aijou?
lit. "Flapping Love")

Harpymon.name: Harpymon
Harpymon.description: Harpymon is a Mythical Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Light". Possessing arms with wings and the upper body of a woman, it is a thief Digimon that is called the "Snatcher" due to it stealing valuable data (treasure) from databases (ruins). It shows up like a gale, seizing treasure and attacking with its large talons. Although its power is lacking, the continuous attacks unleashed using its speed are terrifying.

attacks.name: Wind Seeker
attacks.description: Flaps its wings to release gusts of wind so strong they cut like knives.

Hawkmon.name: Hawkmon
Hawkmon.description: Hawkmon is a Bird Digimon. It is very polite, and is always calm, cool, and collected. Just like Veemon, it's a descendant of a special species that flourished in ancient times, so it's able to borrow the power of the "Digi-Eggs" to pseudo-digivolve to an Armor.

attacks.name: Feather Strike (Feather Slash)
attacks.description: Uses the feather ornament on its head like a boomerang.

attacks.name: Pecking Beak (Beak Pecker)
attacks.description: Violently pecks with its beak like a woodpecker.

attacks.name: Beak Attack (Kuchibashi Attack)
attacks.description: Pokes with a hard beak.

HeavyLeomon.name: HeavyLeomon
HeavyLeomon.description: HeavyLeomonis a Machine Digimon. It is rare Machine Digimon with a large build that is the heaviest among severalLeomontribes. Its power is the greatest among Machine-types thanks to its charging power, so it is difficult to stop HeavyLeomon from charging head-on. The source of its charging power is its passionate fighting spirit, and HeavyLeomon's strength doubles the more its fighting spirit burns. In addition, unlike its weapons, which are only used for fighting, it has a kind heart in that it also carries out rescue operations, so if there is a Digimon seeking help, it will firstly rush over to them, and then remove any obstacles using its prided power. While it is brimming with passionate fighting spirit, in battle, it walks about calmly analyzing the opponent. In different situations it steadily achieves victory with its tactics, which leave no openings regardless of whether it is short, medium or long-range combat.It produces flames from the lion on its chest.

attacks.name: Barrage Sweeper
attacks.description: Shoots from long range by firing a barrage with its "Barrage Sweeper", the autocannon extending from its left shoulder.

attacks.name: Resting Burner
attacks.description: A medium-range attack where it expels ultra-high temperature flames from the lion armor on its chest.

attacks.name: Sonic Excavator
attacks.description: A very-short range technique where it impales the enemy by driving its Pile Bunker into them while charging with its fighting spirit at its maximum.

HerculesKabuterimon.name: HerculesKabuterimon
HerculesKabuterimon.description: HerculesKabuterimonis an Insectoid Digimon. It digivolved with the data ofKabuterimon- andKuwagamon-speciesDigimon. It has a gigantic horn and scissors, and it can be said that its form perfectly compensates for the weaknesses of those two types of Digimon, which had opposing natures. Its body shines gold, and it has regained and strengthened the flying ability whichMegaKabuterimonhad lost, so it rushes about the Digital World at supersonic speed. Having now accomplished this Mega digivolution, there are probably few beings who can rival HerculesKabuterimon, the greatest of them beingGranKuwagamonwhose battle with it continues without ever ending.

attacks.name: Mega Electro Shocker (Giga Blaster)
attacks.description: A lightwave explosion that is an enhanced version of "Electro Shocker" which will annihilate anyone it hits.

attacks.name: Giga Scissor Claw (巨大はさみ, Kyodai Hasami, lit. "Giant Pincers")
High Mega Blaster
attacks.description: Uses all four arms to unleash a powerful energy blast.

attacks.name: Horn Buster II (ホーンバスター改, Horn Buster Kai, lit. "Horn Buster Revision")

HerculesKabuterimon X.name: HerculesKabuterimon X
HerculesKabuterimon X.description: HerculesKabuterimon X is an Insect Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It has changed from an insect-like appearance into one that is more specialized in hand-to-hand combat, and both its hands and feet have transformed into sturdy limbs. However, it hasn't lost the speed characteristic of insects, and its nimble movements and the way in which it easily lifts objects that are many times larger than its body are proof that it is overwhelmingly strong. It is the Insect Kaiser who increased its aggressiveness and resistance through X-Evolution.

attacks.name: Giga Blaster
attacks.description: An enhanced version of "Electro Shocker". It is compressed into a spherical shape and is orders of magnitude more powerful. There isn't anyone who won't be annihilated by this technique.

attacks.name: Horn Buster Revision (ホーンバスター改, Horn Buster Kai)
attacks.description: Instantly leaps into the enemy's chest and thrusts them up intensely.

title: Insect
Kaiser
(昆虫帝王
Konchuu Teiou?)

Hermmon.name: Hermmon
Hermmon.description: Name used inDigimon Adventure V-Tamer 01. No official romanization available.

Herissmon.name: Herissmon
Herissmon.description: Herissmonis a Mammal Digimon. It is brimming with curiosity and will lose sight of its surroundings once it finds something to fixate on, although it is also highly cautious and will make its hard, needle-like quills stand on end when it is afraid, curling up into a ball until no sign of danger remains. However, it gets very attached to those it has warmed up to, and will show them its favourite treasures that it keeps stashed in its fur. It seems to have a habit of going on guard whenever it spots aGatomon, due to having been bullied several times in the past.

attacks.name: Lightning Quills (Lightning Fur)
attacks.description: Attacks the opponent by shooting lightning-coated quills.

attacks.name: Needle-Point Dive (Kenzan Dive)
attacks.description: Curls its body up into a ball and charges forth.

Hexeblaumon.name: Hexeblaumon
Hexeblaumon.description: Hexeblaumonis a Magic Knight Digimon. It is a Digimon that only those who have mastered ice sorcery (ahigh-level programming language) are able to digivolve into. It protected other Digimon until the very end during anice agethat came to theDigital Worldlong ago, and was later rumored to have moved to another dimension, "Witchelny". It excels in the art of manipulating the cold, and creates various things with ice. It starts with weapons such as swords and hammers, and then other tools such as restraints that restrict the enemy's movements, and is also capable of erecting a barrier to defend itself from attacks, so it is definitely an ice professional.

attacks.name: Summon Frost
attacks.description: Spreads cold air over a wide range, instantly transforming anyone that draws near into ice statues.

attacks.name: Hectoage Blizzard (Hectoedge Blizzard)
attacks.description: Causes countless ice swords to fall down like a blizzard.

attacks.name: Absolute Blast
attacks.description: Unleashes an absolute zero wave from the dragon jaws on its left shoulder, which shatters everything.

HiAndromon.name: HiAndromon
HiAndromon.description: HiAndromon is an Android Digimon. The percentage of Chrome Digizoid parts which compose its body has increased, and it is impossible to miss the extent of its gains in offensive and defensive power from this, compared to Andromon. Additionally, as Andromon, it was incomplete, and by adding Chrome Digizoid parts to the Bio-Synapse circuits which govern its thinking, it became self-aware, making it possible for it to execute its objectives. Because it is both a Vaccine-species and an Android, its attacks against Virus-types are not only fearfully accurate but also intense.

attacks.name: Atomic Ray
attacks.description: Takes the fission energy emanating from the blue neutron-control turbine on its right shoulder and the fusion energy emanating from the red atom-control turbine on its left shoulder, combines them at the top of its hands, and then fires off a beam which annihilates the opponent.

attacks.name: Copy Paste
attacks.description: Designates a target and attacks it.

attacks.name: Lightning Blade (Spiral Sword)
attacks.description: Attacks using an energy blade.

HiMachineDramon.name: HiMachineDramon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Showdown in the Sand Zone" [14]
HiMachineDramon.description: HiMachinedramon is made from synthesized body parts of many Cyborg Digimon—Megadramon's helmet and right claw,MetalTyrannomon's jaw and chest circuits,MetalGreymon (Virus)'s left claw and chest plates, andAndromon's shoulder pads. It is red in coloration and its tail is a hollow stub, which inDigimon Fusioncan project a serpentine tail made out of energy. It is equipped with two "Cosmic Cannons" (∞ Cannon).

Hinukamuy.name: Hinukamuy
Hinukamuy.description: Hinukamuy takes the form of a fiery, dragon Digimon aboveGankoomon. It appears to be without substance, almost like a flaming aura like its namesake. Its head is similar in shape toHackmon's.

Hi-VisionMonitamon.name: Hi-VisionMonitamon
Hi-VisionMonitamon.description: Hi-VisionMonitamon is an LCD Digimon. As the newest model of Monitamon, it outdoes Monitamon in fighting strength, analytic power, and intelligence-gathering ability, and is an Ace of Monitamon that displays unique abilities. Due to the fact that it always has a grasp on all of the latest information in the Digital World, as well as governing the legion of Monitamon to always lead them to triumph, it holds the alias of "Black Electromagnetic Wave", and the deep trust of the Monitamon. It performs detailed analysis of its collected information and transmits polished tactics to the Monitamon, but its sole flaw is that it sometimes gets too passionate and doesn't stop talking. The "Denji-maru" (電磁丸, "Denji-maru" lit. "Electromagnet") it holds in its hand is a weapon that generally excels in both offense and defense, as it is able take the power of its opponent's blocked attacks and turn them into particles. The techniques of Monitamon that are struck by particles from the Denji-maru, which it uses as both a weapon and as a conducting Gunbai, are able to rise to the utmost limits of their power. Also, it is a Digimon rich in technique variations, which are mostly enhancements of Monitamon's techniques.

attacks.name: Deneireppa (電影烈破, Deneireppa lit. "Film Buster")
attacks.description: Takes the power of its opponent's blocked attacks and turn them into particles, then fires off the Denji-maru while it is covered in those particles.

attacks.name: Koudensappou-no-Jin (光電殺法之陣, Koudensappou-no-Jin lit. "Formation of Photoelectric Execution")
attacks.description: Emits a signal from the antenna on its head that synchronizes the surrounding Monitamon with itself, so that it can operate the Monitamon as its own body. The movements of the perfectly synchronized Monitamon take the shape of a battle formation that makes sport of and brings down the opponent in perfect order.

attacks.name: Itenkou (癒天光, Itenkou lit. "Healing Sky Light")
attacks.description: Uses a healing technique.

attacks.name: Flame Blast (業火弾, Goukadan, lit. "Hellish Fire Shot")
attacks.description: Uses an enhanced version of Monitamon's "Kadan".

attacks.name: Water Spout Cannon (爆水竜, Bakusuiryū, lit. "Explosive Water Dragon")
attacks.description: Uses an enhanced version of Monitamon's "Suiryū".

attacks.name: Whirling Wind Tunnel (暴風車, Boufūsha, lit. "Storming Wind Wheel")
attacks.description: Uses an enhanced version of Monitamon's "Kazaguruma".

attacks.name: Thunderous Lightning Attack (雷電閃, Raidenjin, lit. "Thunderous Lightning Flash")
attacks.description: Uses an enhanced version of Monitamon's "Densen".

attacks.name: Shunsakuteki (瞬索敵, Shunsakuteki lit. "Instant Reconnaissance")
attacks.description: Uses an enhanced version of Monitamon's "Sakuteki".

title: Black Electromagnetic Wave
(黒い電磁波
Kuroi Denjiha?)

Hippogriffomon.name: Hippogriffomon
Hippogriffomon.description: Hippogriffomon is a Mythical Beast Digimon. It is a mythical beast Digimon which has the appearance of a chimera. It is said it will become a Gryphonmon if it digivolves, but the details are not clear. Its intelligence is not as high as Gryphonmon's, and since its being is closer to that of a beast, its personality is also ferocious.

attacks.name: Heat Wave
attacks.description: Spews out an extremely high-temperature wind.

Hisyaryumon.name: Hisyaryumon
Hisyaryumon.description: Hisyarumon is a Dragon Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. Hisyarumon is clad in thick, shimmering scale mail that soars through the sky. It took this form when the fearsome combat data of dragons and warlords from Japanese mythology in the depths of its DigiCore was released. The orbs in its hands are said to be the souls of its fallen comrades; the orb in its right hand is the soul of Kinryu, while the orb in its left hand is the soul of Kakuryu, and DigiCore information lies hidden within each of them.

attacks.name: Legendary Dragon Blade (成龍刃, Seiryūjin, lit. "Grown Dragon Blade")
attacks.description: Turns into a giant sword to strike the foe.

attacks.name: Jūouguruma (縦横車, Jūouguruma lit. "Every Direction Wheel")
attacks.description: Emits rays of light in every direction from the orbs in its claws.

Hiyarimon.name: Hiyarimon
Hiyarimon.description: Hiyarimonis a Lesser Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved fromYukimiBotamon. The once fluffyciliaare gone, and instead the surface of its body is always covered with snow. It lives mostly in snowy mountains, and its body melts when exposed to sunlight, so it is active after sunset. It seems that the bigger the icicle is that hangs from the tip of its beak, the more energized it is.

attacks.name: Diamond Dust
attacks.description: Spews cold breath.

Honeybeemon.name: Honeybeemon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Yūsuke Oguri,Norihisa Mori,Ryō Naitō(Frontier),Kenji Akabane,Tomohisa Hashizume(Xros Wars)
Honeybeemon.description: Honeybeemon is an Insectoid Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Knowledge". It moves very quickly due to its tiny body, and its speciality is making sport of the enemy. When it thinks someone is coming at it, it sneaks around behind them in the blink of an eye and they suffer a single blow from its stinger. Because of its small size, its offensive power is weak, but it possesses speed and techniques that are enough to compensate for this. However, it is extremely fond of sweets, and its weakness is that if they are placed in front of it, it can't see anything else but them. It is not very smart.

attacks.name: Sweet Spray (Poison Powder)
attacks.description: Fires pollen from his claws that emit a sweet smell that leaves the opponent in a woozy state.

attacks.name: Paralyze Sting
attacks.description: Jabs the opponent with its stinger leaving it motionless.

Hookmon.name: Hookmon
Hookmon.description: Hookmon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a pirate Digimon with one eye. It ventures the "Net Ocean" pursuing the phantom White Whamon, and is a courageous man of the ocean that faces up even to rough seas. Its right hand has become a hook-shaped claw, and once it has ensnared its prey, it won't let go at any cost. Its left hand has become a cannon.

attacks.name: Captain Cannon
attacks.description: Shoots its arm cannon.

attacks.name: Metal Shot
attacks.description: Fires with hard metal balls.

Hopmon.name: Hopmon
Hopmon.description: Hopmon is a Baby Dragon Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved from Ketomon. Its entire body is covered in scales small enough to be invisible to the naked eye, and its body is sturdier than it looks. It has overcome its timid personality, and has a budding sense of justice that despises the crooked even at its young age.

attacks.name: Hop Hip
attacks.description: Bounces like a Super Ball and strikes with its rear.

Hououmon.name: Hououmon
Hououmon.description: Hououmon is an Animal Digimon. It is a holy Digimon that possesses four wings that shine gold. It is the head of all Bird Digimon, and is said to be the one that presides over Holy-species Digimon. While Magnadramon is the ultimate form of Beast Digimon, Hououmon is the ultimate form of Bird Digimon. It wears Holy Rings around its ankles, and it is understood that the power possessed by Hououmon is unfathomable.

attacks.name: Starlight Explosion
attacks.description: Solemnly flaps its four wings, causing it to rain golden grains that are said to purify all of the wickedness of those who suffer this technique.

attacks.name: Crimson Flare
attacks.description: Destroys evil with a purifying flame.

attacks.name: Life Force
attacks.description: Absorbs the enemy's HP using a strange power.

attacks.name: Sky Strike (強襲, Kyoushū, lit. "Assault")
attacks.description: Attacks ferociously from the sky.

attacks.name: Mach Wing
attacks.description: Uses its fiery body to tackle the enemy.

attacks.name: Flaming Wing
attacks.description: Tackles the enemy from the sky.

attacks.name: Sharped Hooked Claws
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with its talons.

Hououmon X.name: Hououmon X
Hououmon X.description: Hououmon X is a Holy Beast Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It now has twelve "Holy Rings", and gives off power so sacred that not even ordinary Angel-species Digimon are a match for it. The divine aura covering its body is the largest defensive "Firewall", and so it is immune to all viruses. It is said that if a Digimon touches one of its falling feathers, they will be protected from the clutches of evil.

attacks.name: Starlight Explosion
attacks.description: Solemnly flaps its four wings, causing it to rain golden grains. It is said that those who suffer this technique have all of their wickedness purified. "Starlight Explosion" has become even more powerful due to the increase in its holy power.

Housemon.name: Housemon
Housemon.description: Housemon appears as a giant wooden puppet whose head, torso, and shoulders are parts of a mansion.

HoverEspimon.name: HoverEspimon
HoverEspimon.description: HoverEspimon is a Cyborg Digimon. Espimon, who succeeded in numerous investigations, has become highly mobilized so that it can obtain more accurate information. It can now navigate over long distances, fly, and dive, and its field of activity extends to the depths of the "Net Ocean" and altitudes of up to 20,000m, making it possible for it to investigate hidden Digimon. Its "Divanish" optical camouflage has also been updated. It masks the sounds it makes along with its appearance, and is capable of infiltrating or causing a disturbance without being noticed, even when manoeuvring at high speeds. Thanks to the VR Goggles on its brow, the target's movements after a few seconds are predictively displayed, allowing it to act with precision. It has prepared techniques suited for reconnaissance-in-force. Also, it is rumored to be used by the Crack Team for intelligence operations in various locations.

attacks.name: Stamper Missile
attacks.description: Fires missiles from its two rear launchers.

attacks.name: Chest Cannon (Breast Cannon)
attacks.description: Shoots the Vulcan Cannons on its breasts.

attacks.name: Dronger (Doronger)
attacks.description: Hides its allies by spreading a smokescreen from both its hands.

attacks.name: Divanish
attacks.description: Presses the switch on its stomach to enable camouflage completely blending into its surroundings so it can avoid detection and do reconnaissance.

Huanglongmon.name: Huanglongmon
Huanglongmon.description: Huanglongmon is a Holy Dragon Digimon. It is the "Digimon Sovereign" that is enshrined in the Center, as an emperor Digimon who rules the "world". Due to Lucemon, it was sealed underground in the deepest, darkest place. This being is good but also evil, and is called the "Taiji" of light and darkness. Its gigantic body is covered in scales of the special "Huanglong Ore" that boasts of absolute hardness, so inflicting even a single wound upon it is impossible.

attacks.name: Taiji (太極, Taikyoku)
attacks.description: Continuously disassembles everything in the Digital World, throughout eternity, into the two extremes of light and darkness, driving it into non-existence before long.

attacks.name: Yellow Circle (黄廻, Oukai, lit. "Yellow Rotation")
attacks.description: Generates a gigantic typhoon of an earthflow on the scale of a natural disaster. There is a theory that Ouryumon's "Golden Armor" technique has its roots in "Yellow Circle", although this isn't confirmed.

attacks.name: Fang of the Emperor (皇帝之牙, Koutei no Kiba)
attacks.description: Bites the enemy.

attacks.name: Emperor's Mace
attacks.description: Strikes the enemy using its tail as a mace.

Huankunmon.name: Huankunmon
Huankunmon.description: Huankunmon is an Aquatic Digimon. It is a giant Digimon with scales that can rival even Chrome Digizoid in toughness. Huankunmon has a warm nature and values clean water, so it protects lake areas from pollution. When it feeds, it jumps out of water and flies through the air as smoothly as it swims through water, satisfying its hunger by swallowing flying Digimon whole. However, its large body makes it an easy target, so it often mixes in with flocks of Xiquemon to travel around. When it moves, Huankunmon will surround the entire flock with a large bubble for protection. Since the bubble refracts light, the flock, including Huankunmon, will be invisible to the outside.

attacks.name: Lonely Bubble (孤籠泡 Korōhō, lit. "Solitary Confinement Bubble")
attacks.description: Produces a bubble from its fin that will seal its target inside, limiting its movement.

attacks.name: Ice Crash (冰乱結突 Hyōran Kettotsu, lit. "Ice Clutter Charge")
attacks.description: Spits out a slew of icicles from its mouth.

attacks.name: Tidal Vortex (潮流旋涡 Chōryū Senka)
attacks.description: Summons the spinning tides and turns them into a pillar of water that slams into its enemy..

Hackmon.name: Hackmon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Hiroko Emori(Cyber Sleuth),Shunsuke Takeuchi(Adventure tri./New Century),Yūichirō Umehara(ReArise)
Hackmon.description: Hackmon is a Mini Dragon Digimon. Its fur shines a cool white. Hackmon had encountered Gankoomon, who saw in it the makings of the thirteenth Royal Knight, and decided to temper the Rookie Digimon with frequent, rigorous trials, in order to pass on its own title as a Royal Knight to Hackmon. Its unfettered and restraint-hating, adventure-loving way of life is probably due to Gankoomon's DNA. It chases after Gankoomon and faces the rigorous trials it imposes with an air of composure. It has a masterful sense of combat due to its lineage, and because of its training with its chaperones, the Sistermon sisters, it can more than hold its own in battle against its opponents even if they're an Ultimate. It specializes in close combat that capitalizes on its keenness. It follows its dreams of becoming a Royal Knight like Gankoomon as it fights through continuous battles.

attacks.name: Fifth Rush (Fif Slash)
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with its sturdy claws.

attacks.name: Teen Ram
attacks.description: Rotates its tail like a drill and thrusts it into the opponent.

attacks.name: Pepper Breath (Baby Flame)
attacks.description: Spews flaming breath from its mouth which can be used as a diversion.

Hudiemon.name: Hudiemon
debut: Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory
Hudiemon.description: Hudiemon is an Insectoid Digimon. It is a humanoid Digimon with the wings of a butterfly. It is cautious at first, but once it gets to know someone, it will reveal its cheerful, innocent countenance. It travels all over the Digital World while dancing gracefully in well-lit places. It is said to be like a backup of the Digital World, accessing records throughout the world and storing vast amounts of recorded data within itself. Even if a strange phenomenon occurs in the Digital World and records and memories are lost, the lost data will be restored if Hudiemon is around. Its voice is considered an eternal treasure.

attacks.name: Infinity Dream
attacks.description: Flaps its wings to stir up a gust that spreads its scales. While it is capable of poisoning or paralyzing the enemy when using "Infinity Dream" on them, its main function is to ease the pain of its wounded allies and make them feel better.

attacks.name: Flying Kick
attacks.description: Soars into the air and dishes out a kick from above.

HustleNanimon.name: HustleNanimon
debut: Digimon Xros Wars (manga), "Xros Hustle!! The Great Digimon Athletic Meet!!" [S1]
HustleNanimon.description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars (manga). No official romanization available.

Hydramon.name: Hydramon
debut: Vital Bracelet Digital Monster:Hermit in the Jungle
Hydramon.description: Hydramon is a Vegetation Digimon. It is a gigantic Digimon that mostly takes root in swampland. It constantly secretes a deadly venom from its whole body, which it uses to mercilessly melt and prey upon those that touch it. Also, it has a habit of expelling large amounts of deadly venom from its abdomen, which melts the ground, and creates a swamp to expand its nest. The swamps disturb the surrounding ecosystem, so if you see ominous flowers that have grown abnormally, it is a sign to be cautious.

attacks.name: Biotoxin
attacks.description: Spews a poison gas from the mouth on its abdomen that has the same components as its deadly venom.

attacks.name: Scatterblaster (Intense Lamptḗr (Intense λαμπτήρ lit. "Intense Torch"))
attacks.description: Randomly fires beams from its three heads.

attacks.name: Fault Break (Division Break)
attacks.description: Completely destroys the enemy as well as the earth by causing ivy that spreads underground to move violently, creating fissures.

Hyogamon.name: Hyogamon
Hyogamon.description: Hyogamon is an Icy Digimon. It is a species of Ogremon that inhabits cold places. It is very territorial, and will attack in rage the moment anyone takes even a step into its territory (apparently, there are times when it gets into territorial disputes with Mojyamon).

attacks.name: Ice Mace (アイスこん棒, Ice Konbou, lit. "Ice Club")
attacks.description: Pummels enemies with its icy club.

attacks.name: Icy Cudgel (氷丸投げ, Hyougan Nage, lit. "Iceball Throw")
attacks.description: Hurls a giant ball of ice.

attacks.name: Snow Barrier
attacks.description: Raises a wall of ice from the ground.

attacks.name: Re-Initialize (Dope Cancel)
attacks.description: Lowers enemies stat increases.

attacks.name: Ice Punch
attacks.description: Attacks with a fist of powerful cold.

attacks.name: Snow Punch: Dishes out a cold-packed punch. In Digimon World
attacks.description: Next Order, it fires a beam of energy from its fist in the shape of its head, similar to Leomon's "Fist of the Beast King".

Hyokomon.name: Hyokomon
Hyokomon.description: Hyokomon is a Chick Digimon. It is a chick samurai that digivolved from Chicchimon and went wandering in order to master swordsmanship.

attacks.name: Karatakewari (からたけわり, Karatakewari lit. "Cleaving Cut")

IceDevimon.name: IceDevimon
IceDevimon.description: IceDevimon is a Fallen Angel Digimon. A fallen angel Digimon with a heart as cold as ice. This is the form that Devimon with the cruelest hearts take after Digivolution. It deceives enemies with its silver tongue, and uses wings of ice to freeze them where they stand.

attacks.name: Frozen Claw (Frost Claw)
attacks.description: Slashes enemies with his sharp claws.

attacks.name: Avalanche (Icy Shower)
attacks.description: Releases a barrage of icicles from his wings.

attacks.name: Tundra Freeze (Zero Freeze)
attacks.description: A stare that causes the enemy to become frozen.

attacks.name: Water Ray (Cold Blood)
attacks.description: Changes all moves used by this Digimon to cause Water damage.

attacks.name: Leather Wing (Razor Wing)
attacks.description: Flaps wings to produce a dark wind to slice the enemy.

attacks.name: Cold Breath
attacks.description: An attack that blows a freezing breath.

attacks.name: Ice Punch
attacks.description: Attacks with a fist of powerful cold.

IceLeomon.name: IceLeomon
IceLeomon.description: IceLeomon is an Animal Digimon. It is a Digimon of proud justice. For some Leomon, who go through repeated training day after day in order to defend justice, it is a form that acquired power over the cold in the freezing lands of the Digital World's Ice-Snow Area, and digivolved. By being in the cold, it tempered its mighty will and body, and they cannot be broken by any attack.

attacks.name: Frozen Fury (氷獣拳, Hyoujūken, lit. "Ice Beast Fist")
attacks.description: Fires a fist packed with cold air.

attacks.name: Blizzard Breath (冷気功, Reikikou, lit. "Cold Qigong")
attacks.description: Unleashes frozen qi from its breath.

attacks.name: Reikikou Hazan (冷気功破斬, Reikikou Hazan lit. "Cold Qigong Rip-slash")
Fist of the Beast King (獣王拳, Jūouken, lit. "Beast-King Fist")
attacks.description: Chokes the life out of the opponent with its ultimate mystery, by launching an aura in the shape of a lion's head from its fist.

attacks.name: Shadow Spin Kick (残影反転撃, Zan'ei Hantengeki, lit. "Shadow Rolling Attack")
Full Recovery (Full Heal)
attacks.description: Restores HP.

IceLeomon X.name: IceLeomon X
IceLeomon X.description: IceLeomon X is a Beast Man Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is a Digimon of proud justice. Due to the X-Antibody, it became known as the "Cool-headed White Lion", who exterminates those devoted to evil for the sake of justice, and it's starting to be said that those battles are unparalleled in their ruthlessness. Its "Yuki Hanabi" (雪花火, "Yuki Hanabi" lit. "Snow Fireworks"), an axe said to be cut from ore of the legendary rare metal, "Mithril", holds the power to easily pulverize the permanently frozen icebergs which hinder its path like a series of skyscrapers.

attacks.name: Fist of Ice (氷獣拳, Hyoujūken, lit. "Ice Beast Fist")
attacks.description: Fires a fist packed with cold air.

title: Cool-headed White Lion

Icemon.name: Icemon
Icemon.description: Icemon is an Ice-Snow Digimon. It is a Digimon whose body is composed of water. Its origins are currently being researched; perhaps it Digivolved from Gotsumon, or maybe it is some sort of mutation.

attacks.name: Iceball Bomb
attacks.description: Throws a bomb made of ice.

attacks.name: Ice Block (On the Rock)
attacks.description: Drop a block of ice on the enemy.

attacks.name: Ice Strike
attacks.description: Throws a very powerful punch.

attacks.name: Solid State
attacks.description: Lets anger take control and swings arms wildly. In Digimon World 2, this attack raises Defence.

attacks.name: Ice Punch
attacks.description: Attacks with a fist of powerful cold.

Ignitemon.name: Ignitemon
debut: "The Power Drain: The Hunters of Honey Land" [35]
Ignitemon.description: Ignitemon is a Reptile Man Digimon. It lives its daily life at its own pace. It often plays with its Monitamon friends, and during their free time, they will watch a comedy Digitalk show on Monitamon's screen and burst into laughter. However, it is incredibly lazy when it comes to serious matters. If a battle breaks out nearby, it will waste no time in escaping and finding a spot to hide. Despite its laziness, the weapons it wields called display great strength. The "Galápagos (Navy)" on its right hand and the "Galápagos (Army)" on its left hand can be thrown at opponents to slice them apart. Although Ignitemon prefers to avoid battle, it will cut down anyone who tries to interrupt it while it is having fun (especially while it is watching television).

attacks.name: Final Traveler
attacks.description: Detonates the McField-brand "Fernandina" hanging from its chest, blasting away both the enemy and itself without leaving a trace. However, it does not wish for its enjoyment of life to end there, so it prefers not to get caught up in battle.

attacks.name: Crushing Sound Waves (Galápagos Field)
attacks.description: Concentrates energy on the "Galápagos (Navy)" on its right hand and the "Galápagos (Army)" on its left and unleashes a slashing wave.

attacks.name: Timoniniser
attacks.description: Fires the bullets embedded in the "Gunsword" on its head, each containing different side-effects; it can unleash a great variety of effects depending on the combination of bullets used.

Ikkakumon.name: Ikkakumon
Ikkakumon.description: Ikkakumon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It is a sea animal Digimon that was discovered in the computer of an Arctic exploration base. Its thick fur and stout body are structured so that it can endure even freezing lands. Its sharp horn is made of "Mithril", one of the rare metals, and the skin under its fur is just as hard. The portions of its soles where its claws attach are heat tops that are able to give off high temperatures at will. As such, it's able to maintain a tight footing when on ice, but it isn't able to move very nimbly. When in battle, it will intimidate the opponent with an impressive roar similar to a lion's.

attacks.name: Harpoon Torpedo (Harpoon Vulcan)
attacks.description: Shoots its regrowable horn.

attacks.name: Heat Top
attacks.description: In Digimon Digital Card Battle, it stabs the opponent with its horn. In Digimon Rumble Arena 2, it belly flops the enemy.

attacks.name: Northern Light (Northern Lights)
attacks.description: Breathes out a blast of chilly air.

attacks.name: Horn Attack
attacks.description: An upward slash with its horn.

attacks.name: Icicle Coat
attacks.description: In Digimon Rumble Arena 2, it radiates cold and long, thin icicles to freeze enemies. In Digimon Adventure (PSP), it increases its defence.

Imperialdramon Dragon Mode.name: Imperialdramon Dragon Mode

otherNames.name: インペリアルドラモン：ドラモンモード Imperialdramon: Dramon Mode

Imperialdramon Dragon Mode.description: Imperialdramon Dragon Modeis an Ancient Dragon Digimon. It is an ultimate Digimon that existed in ancient times. There is a clear distinction between it and other Digimon in terms of existence or ability. Also, Imperialdramon is called the Dragon Mode, but there seems to exist a "Fighter Mode"(竜人形態,Ryuujin Keitai, lit. "Dragon Man Form")that is able to liberate all of its power. However, it is said that that form has never been seen. Due to its immense power, controlling it is next to impossible, and depending on how it is raised, it may become a savior or a god of destruction. It wields the "Positron Laser" on its back.

attacks.name: Mega Crusher (Mega Death)
attacks.description: Fires super-massive dark matter, swallowing everything within a dark space and completely annihilating everything within a radius of a few hundred meters around the impact-point of the dark matter.

attacks.name: Positron Laser
attacks.description: Fires a huge blast of positronic energy from the Positron Laser.

attacks.name: Shining Blade (Splendor Blade)
attacks.description: Slashes with its claw.

attacks.name: Eternal Zeal
attacks.description: Releases a maelstrom of fire.

title: Ruling Emperor Dragon
(君臨する皇帝竜
Kunrin-suru Kouteiryuu?)

Imperialdramon Fighter Mode.name: Imperialdramon Fighter Mode
voiceActors: (En:)Paul St. Peter(Adventure 02),Derek Stephen Prince(Adventure 02/All-Star Rumble),Paul St. Peter(All-Star Rumble)

otherNames.name: Imperialdramon Forma Guerreira Imperialdramon Warrior Form

Imperialdramon Fighter Mode.description: Imperialdramon Fighter Modeis an Ancient Dragon Man Digimon. It is a form ofImperialdramon Dragon Modethat liberated all of its power, changing form into the legendary Fighter Mode(竜戦士,Ryū Senshi, lit. "Dragon Warrior"). It is an ultimate Digimon that acquired a great intellect by changing from the difficult-to-control Dragon Mode to a human form. It is said that the power to destroy a planet dwells in its attacks. It wields the "Positron Laser", equipped to its right arm. Also, when it awakens to perfect justice, it is able to transform into an even further Mode.

attacks.name: Positron Laser
attacks.description: Fires a huge blast of positronic energy from the Positron Laser.

attacks.name: Giga Crusher (Giga Death)
attacks.description: Inserts the Positron Laser into the dragon-face on its chest, then emits all of its body's energy as a destructive energy wave with ten times the power of "Mega Crusher".

attacks.name: Splendor Blade
attacks.description: Manifests a sword of light from its gauntlet and slashes down at the opponent.

attacks.name: Dragon Kick
attacks.description: Flips, bringing its heel down on the enemy.

attacks.name: Dragon Knee
attacks.description: Shoots forward through the air with one knee outstretched

attacks.name: Supreme Positron Laser (Super Positron Laser)
attacks.description: A charged and more powerful version of Positron Laser.

attacks.name: Giga Crusher (Ion Blaster)
attacks.description: Deploys a cannon from the dragon-face on its chest, then fires a gigantic blast of energy.

attacks.name: Imperial Kick
attacks.description: A midair kick.

attacks.name: Imperial Claw
attacks.description: Slashes with the claws on its wrist.

attacks.name: Imperial Crusher
attacks.description: Dashes forward, stabbing with the electrified claws of one wrist. In Digimon All-Star Rumble, it follows this up with a kick.

attacks.name: Chōetsu Positron Laser (超越ポジトロンレーザー, Chōetsu Positron Laser lit. "Transcendental Positron Laser")
attacks.description: Firmly plants its feet on the ground, before charging energy on its cannon and then shooting a more powerful Positron Laser.

title: Ultimate Dragon Warrior
(究極竜戦士
Kyūkyoku Ryū Senshi?)

Imperialdramon Dragon Mode (Black).name: Imperialdramon Dragon Mode (Black)
Imperialdramon Dragon Mode (Black).description: Imperialdramon Dragon Mode (Black) is an Ancient Dragon Digimon. Imperialdramon Dragon Mode was incapable of controlling its excessive power and was turned into a Virus, resulting in this form. Once it starts going berserk, it runs the whole gamut of destruction with no way of stopping it. It is said that there exists an Imperialdramon Fighter Mode (Black) that controls its destructive power through its heart of darkness.

attacks.name: Mega Crusher (Megadeath)
attacks.description: Fires super-massive dark matter, swallowing everything within a dark space and completely annihilating everything within a radius of a few hundred meters around the impact-point of the dark matter.

attacks.name: Positron Laser
attacks.description: Fires a huge blast of positronic energy from the Positron Laser.

Imperialdramon Fighter Mode (Black).name: Imperialdramon Fighter Mode (Black)
Imperialdramon Fighter Mode (Black).description: Imperialdramon Fighter Mode (Black) is an Ancient Dragon Man Digimon. Imperialdramon Dragon Mode (Black) has gone on a rampage. Shadows have taken over Imperialdramon's heart, transforming it into a draconic warrior form with the Virus attribute. It abhors Digimon of the Vaccine attribute, and specifically pursues Digimon belonging to the Virus Busters to eliminate them. This terrifying dragon emperor will carry out even violent destruction for the sake of its own justice.

attacks.name: Gigadeath
attacks.description: Inserts the Positron Laser into the dragon-face on its chest, then emits all of its body's energy as a destructive energy wave with ten times the power of "Mega Crusher".

attacks.name: Positron Laser
attacks.description: Fires a huge blast of positronic energy from the Positron Laser.

attacks.name: Positron Laser Lance
attacks.description: Expands the heat sink, then delivers a powerful blow.

Imperialdramon Paladin Mode.name: Imperialdramon Paladin Mode
Imperialdramon Paladin Mode.description: Imperialdramon Paladin Mode is an Ancient Dragon Digimon. It is a form of Imperialdramon Fighter Mode that acquired the power of the holy knight Omnimon, powering up and changing form into a legendary holy knight. As the final, strongest form of Imperialdramon Dragon Mode that was told of since ancient times, it descended in a time of great disruption in the ancient Digital World, and rescued the world from complete collapse. However, all of the details of that era are a mystery, and if research into Digimon and the Digital World progresses, it is likely that they will eventually be clarified. It wields the ultimate "Omni Sword" (Omega Blade). It is the founder of the Royal Knights.

attacks.name: Omni Sword (Omega Blade)
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent in two with a single stroke of the Omni Sword, resetting and clearing their configuration data.

attacks.name: Giga Crusher (Giga Death)
attacks.description: Inserts the Positron Laser into the dragon-face on its chest, then emits all of its body's energy as a destructive energy wave with ten times the power of "Mega Crusher".

attacks.name: Positron Laser
attacks.description: Fires the Positron Laser.

attacks.name: Splendor Blade
attacks.description: Manifests a sword of light from its gauntlet and slashes down at the opponent.

title: Ancient Holy Knight
(古の聖騎士
Inishie no Seikishi?)

Impmon.name: Impmon
Impmon.description: Impmon is an Evil Digimon. It has an appearance like a demon's child. It loves pranks, so it enjoys seeing the embarrassed appearances of its opponents. Also, it is said that when Impmon appears, electrical appliances temporarily go crazy, so an electronic image going out of order or ceasing to function might be because Impmon was pulling a prank. Although it is a Digimon that loves mischief and malice, it never toadies to the strong, but stands up to them with a strong attitude. However, the truth is that it has a lonely side.

attacks.name:
Infernal Funnel (Summon): Summons elementals of flame and ice.
Infernal Funnel: Fire (Summon: Flame)
attacks.description: Summons an elemental of flame.

attacks.name: Infernal Funnel: Fire (Summon: Flame)
attacks.description: Summons an elemental of flame.

attacks.name: Bada Boom (Night of Fire)
attacks.description:
Attacks the opponent with flames of darkness.
Kūchū Night of Fire (空中ナイト・オブ・ファイアー, Kūchū Night of Fire lit. "Aerial Night of Fire")
Dash Night of Fire
Bada Boom Lift

attacks.name: Kūchū Night of Fire (空中ナイト・オブ・ファイアー, Kūchū Night of Fire lit. "Aerial Night of Fire")
Pillars of Fire (Pillar of Fire)
attacks.description: Summons a wall of fire.

attacks.name: Machine Gun Kick (ダダダダキック, Dadadada Kick)
attacks.description: Strikes with small continuous kicks.

attacks.name: Dark Song
attacks.description: Screams to lure the enemy to death. In Digimon All-Star Rumble, Impmon releases a cloud of darkness that stuns the enemy.

attacks.name: Night of Blizzards (Night of Blizzard)
attacks.description:
Attacks the opponent with a blizzard of darkness.
Bada Chill Slam

attacks.name: Dark Fire (Yami Fire)
attacks.description: Attacks with a small ball of fire from the abyss.

attacks.name: Punch
attacks.description: Punches the air, which creates a short-range fireball that hits the enemy.

attacks.name: Ice Punch
attacks.description: An icy uppercut.

attacks.name: Fire
attacks.description: Summons and throws a homing fireball with each hand.

attacks.name: Fire Shot
attacks.description: Lobs homing fireballs into the air.

attacks.name: Magic Circle
attacks.description: A spell that teleports the enemy to Impmon.

attacks.name: Reverse Round Kick
attacks.description: An upside-down roundhouse kick in midair.

Impmon X.name: Impmon X
Impmon X.description: Impmon X is a Mini Devil Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Impmon grew confident in its own strength after obtaining the X-Antibody, causing it to start acting aloof. It wears an eyepatch and a scarf, believing that they contribute to its aloof aura; removing its eyepatch will allow it to unleash its true power... which is what Impmon assumes, though that does not appear to have any actual effect on the strength of its techniques.

attacks.name: Summon
attacks.description: Summons elementals of flame and ice.

attacks.name: Night of Fire
attacks.description: Attacks the opponent with flames of darkness.

attacks.name: Summon Chaser
attacks.description: Summons flame and ice elementals to chase the opponent persistently. It can be used not just for attacking, but for pranks as well.

Indramon.name: Indramon
Indramon.description: Indramon is a Holy Beast Digimon. It is the "Horse" Deva, and serves the Digimon Sovereign Zhuqiaomon. As a follower of Zhuqiaomon, it has an intolerably arrogant personality. When it opens its mouth, only bragging comes out, and it is constantly fussing over the glossiness of its mane and tail. It indulges in its talents, and ridicules those who work hard. Among the Deva, it is on especially bad terms with Vajramon. Though it fusses over its appearance, in battle, it is comparatively unrefined; using the gigantic Bǎo Bèi (宝貝 lit. "Treasure Shell") trumpet shell tied to its arms, it beats the opponent down by wielding it like a cudgel.

attacks.name: Horn of Desolation (Adhomukha)
attacks.description: Uses its tremendous lung capacity to blow the Bǎo Bèi, generating ultrasonic waves.

Infermon.name: Infermon
