Infermon.description: Infermon is an Unidentified Digimon. It has an appearance like a long-legged spider, and while its form is usually in an outstretched state, with its head and limbs extended, it is also able to assume a cocoon form, with its limbs retracted into its body. When it goes into its cocoon form, its defensive power is raised such that every attack is deflected, but it can only go forward in a straight line, and the fact that it cannot modify its trajectory is a clear weakness. It is able to penetrate every Network, despite the strength of their security. If Infermon is released from the Network, the world will probably then collapse into chaos.

attacks.name: Spider Shooter (Hell's Grenade)
attacks.description: Fires off shells of a terrible, destructive energy from the gun muzzle inside of its mouth.

attacks.name: Cocoon Crash (Cocoon Attack)
attacks.description: Charges the opponent with its cocoon form.

JaegerDorulumon.name: JaegerDorulumon
JaegerDorulumon.description: JaegerDorulumon is a Beast Man Digimon. It is a digivolution of Dorulumon that became able to walk on two legs. It has taken the appearance of a knight equipped with the gigantic, drill-shaped spear "Sturm Stinger" (Deu: Storm Stinger) and its slash-and-defend dual-use "Zasshu Shield" (ザッシュシールド, Zasshu Shīrudo, lit. "Mongrel Shield"). Its ability for single-point penetration is the best, and because of this distinctive characteristic, it leads single-unit charges on its enemies to break open escape routes for those behind it to follow.

attacks.name: Weisse Spirale (Weiß Spirale) (Deu: White Spiral)
attacks.description: Fires a large beam of energy from the Zasshu Shield.

attacks.name: Schwarzer Nagel (Schwarz Nagel) (Deu: Black Nail)
attacks.description: Pierces through the opponent with the Sturm Stinger.

Jagamon.name: Jagamon
Jagamon.description: Jagamon is a Vegetation Digimon. It is a mimicking Digimon which is able to hide itself from opponents with its potato-like appearance. Although it has a timid personality and doesn't much like to fight, its hidden combat abilities are extremely great. In fact, with its peaceful personality it loves to eat and sleep. Since its rind is several orders harder than it looks, it can curl up its limbs and head to allow it to endure the opponent's attacks. The visible portion of its sprout serves as radar which can perceive the motion of enemies above and behind it, so even if its head is hidden it can take in the conditions of its surroundings, and understand them. Jagamon travel in herds.

attacks.name: Smashed Potatoes (Smash Potato)
attacks.description: Fires off pieces of its rind.

attacks.name: Tai Atari (たいあたり, Tai Atari lit. "Body Blow")

JagerLoweemon.name: JagerLoweemon
JagerLoweemon.description: JagerLoweemon is a Warrior Digimon. It truly inherited the "Beast Spirit of Darkness" of AncientSphinxmon. As with Duskmon, the "Beast Spirit of Darkness" was changed into its Velgemon form due to Cherubimon's spell, but JagerLoweemon is its true form released from this magical power. It is called the "Jet-black Lion", and its body is covered in a unique metal which shines jet-black and is called "Obsidian Digizoid", a kind of Chrome Digizoid. For that reason, not only is its defensive ability high, but its body armor has a keen sharpness. It is said that after JagerLoweemon runs through, everything will be cut to pieces by the first gust of that black wind.

attacks.name: Ebony Blast (Schwarz Donner, Deu: "Black Thunder")
attacks.description: Fires a black spirit shot.

attacks.name:
Dark Master (Schwarz König, Deu: "Black King"): Smashes into the opponent with its whole body clad in a black aura.
Luft Schwarz König (Deu: "Air Black King")
attacks.description: Smashes into the opponent with its whole body clad in a black aura while in the air.

attacks.name: Luft Schwarz König (Deu: "Air Black King")
attacks.description: Smashes into the opponent with its whole body clad in a black aura while in the air.

attacks.name: Schwarz Gewehr (Deu: "Black Rifle")
attacks.description: Performs a charging, downward swipe with its front paws.

title: Jet-black Lion
(漆黒の獅子
Shikkoku no Shishi?)

Jazamon.name: Jazamon
Jazamon.description: Jazamonis a Bird Dragon Digimon. It is a Machine Digimon shaped like a bird. Although it is capable of gliding from high places using its wings, it is unable to uplift itself by flapping them. As it is quite timid and very cautious, it is wary of objects that move in its surroundings regardless of whether it is day or night.

attacks.name: Tap-tapping Pick (Kokonpikku)
attacks.description: Pecks with its hard beak.

Jazardmon.name: Jazardmon
Jazardmon.description: Jazardmonis a Machine Dragon Digimon. It is a Digimon whose form mixes together the data of both a dragon and afighter jet. In addition to being able to fly at high speed, it is also capable ofvertical take-off and landing, as well as hovering thanks to its legs. It is a bit of an oddball in that its hobby is performing reconnaissance, so it will always have a good grasp of what is going on in its surroundings. It possesses night vision, thermal, ultrasound and other capabilities, and thus, it is impossible to approach it without being noticed.

attacks.name: Sonic Vulcan
attacks.description: Fires high-speed machine guns from its shoulders.

attacks.name: Laser Eye
attacks.description: Shoots lasers from its eyes.

Jazarichmon.name: Jazarichmon
Jazarichmon.description: Jazarichmonis a Machine Dragon Digimon. It is a Digimon that flies at thespeed of sound, and has been specialized for aerial battles.Dogfightsare its speciality, and the number of enemies it has fought and shot down is immeasurable. It is considered to be top class in theDigital Worldwhen it comes to aerial combat matches, and is said to compare favorably withWingdramon. Thanks to its legs, it can fly unhindered at sonic speeds, even when doing low passes or flying in areas with many obstacles.

attacks.name: Messer Spiral (Deu: Knife Spiral)
attacks.description: Charges while spinning at high speed.

attacks.name: N.S.B.M
attacks.description: Counterattacks with the laser on its tail, even if it is taken down from behind.

Jellymon.name: Jellymon
Jellymon.description: Jellymon is a Mollusk Digimon. It is a Digimon with a squishy head like a jellyfish. Its whole body is flexible, which allows it to retract its body into its head, and it usually lives with just its head showing. When it is just its head, it is light enough to fly just by being blown by the wind. It prefers beautiful environments and actions, and once it sees foul behavior, it frees its body in anger and turns into its Battle Mode. It has countless tentacles.

attacks.name: Startling Thunder (ビビサンダー, Bibi Thunder, lit. "Shock Thunder")
attacks.description: A paralysis attack in which it discharges static electricity from the tips of its tentacles.

attacks.name: Volt Knuckle
attacks.description: A punching technique in which it electrifies its fists.

attacks.name: Spiral Kick
attacks.description: Kicks the enemy into the air while performing a somersault.

Jesmon.name: Jesmon
Jesmon.description: Jesmon is a Holy Knight Digimon. It exceeded the perfection shining from the crystal in SaviorHuckmon's chest, assumed its ultimate form, and acquired the title of a "Royal Knight", the highest rank of Network Security. It is endowed with the ability to sense the unusual phenomena and signs of chaos that occur all over the Digital World, and is the first of any of the Royal Knights to come running. It is said that rather than acting independently, it makes a coordinated response with nearby Digimon and the Sistermons, and its operation as a team relies on the others, which is rare even for the Royal Knights, because it doesn't have overconfidence in itself. Jesmon is the thirteenth Digimon considered suitable as a Royal Knight, tempered well by the frequent, rigorous trials of Gankoomon, who noticed the makings of one in the Rookie Digimon "Hackmon" it encountered. Because its "Aus Generics" leaves its physical abilities unbound by the laws of the Digital World, Jesmon can overpower any enemy without taking a single scratch.

attacks.name: Judgement of the Blade (轍剣成敗, Tekken Seibai, lit. "Furrow-sword Judgment")
attacks.description: Carves the opponent to pieces with the blades on its arms while moving at high speed.

attacks.name: Weltgeist (Deu: World Spirit) (Schwertgeist, Deu: Sword Ghost)
attacks.description: Uses an omnidirectional counter technique alongside "At", "Rene", and "Pol" that meets every enemy attack with their nine blades.

attacks.name: Aus Generics (OS Generics)
attacks.description: Temporarily rewrites its own data to perform actions that transcend the laws of nature, such as breaking the speed of light to slash the opponent.

attacks.name: Un Pour Tous (Fra: One For All)
attacks.description: Fires a beam from a triangular shield formed by At, Rene, and Pol.

title: Warrior of Salvation
(救世の戦士
Guze no Senshi?)

Jesmon GX.name: Jesmon GX
debut: Digimon Chronicle X, "New X-Evolution / Final Battle" [26]
Jesmon GX.description: Jesmon GX is a Holy Knight Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It is the final form of Jesmon that awakened its true power by enduring strict training from Gankoomon and fully mastering it. Its appearance, overflowing with fighting spirit and a sense of justice throughout its body, is covered in the red color of burning flames. The "Unlimitive Gauntlet", which has become its main weapon, is a piece of equipment used for both offense and defense that switches between Sword, Knuckle, and Shield Modes depending on the situation. By digivolving further, the Tactical Arms has turned into a wing-shaped energy construct, and its flight capability has also increased drastically.

attacks.name: Seiken Meppa (聖拳滅破, Seiken Meppa lit. "Sacred Fist Destroyer")
attacks.description: In its Arms form, it unleashes a subluminal combo-attack that succeeds Gankoomon's secret technique.

attacks.name: Knights' Intruder
attacks.description: Jesmon GX itself turns into the "Knights' Intruder" spiritual vessel, the fourteenth Ultimate-Battle-Blade that should not exist, by concentrating the energy of the Royal Knights, and becomes an assault sword of judgment that instantly erases the opponent no matter how strong they are.

Jesmon X.name: Jesmon X
Jesmon X.description: Jesmon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The X-Antibody has transformed it into a form further specializing in offense, and turned the armor covering its body into blades. The multiple blades it has newly equipped are all capable of independent movement, giving Jesmon X the attack power to one-sidedly overwhelm the opponent in single combat. Not only that, its three programs "At", "Rene", and "Pol" have all awakened and unified as a single tactical arms, giving rise to a new battle style that is aimed at all directions, not leaving a single spot untouched.

attacks.name: Judgement of the Blade (轍剣成敗, Tekken Seibai, lit. "Furrow-sword Judgment")
attacks.description: Carves the opponent to pieces with the blades on its arms while moving at high speed.

attacks.name: Weltgeist (Deu: World Spirit) (Schwertgeist, Deu: Sword Ghost)
attacks.description: Uses an omnidirectional counter technique alongside "At", "Rene", and "Pol" that meets every enemy attack with their nine blades.

attacks.name: Aus Generics (OS Generics)
attacks.description: Temporarily rewrites its own data to perform actions that transcend the laws of nature.

attacks.name: Iron-Fist Judgement (鉄拳断罪, Tekken Danzai)
attacks.description: Shoots out its tactical arms, pummeling the opponent with an iron fist that would make Gankoomon proud.

attacks.name: Schwertflügel (Deu: Sword Wing)
attacks.description: Fires off the swords all over its body at the opponent, unleashing a combo-attack with the greatswords on both of its arms.

attacks.name: Kyūkyoku Senjin Seibaken (究極戦刃聖覇剣, Ultimate-Battle-Blade Seibaken, lit. "Holy Conqueror Sword")
attacks.description: Pulls the "Kyūkyoku Senjin Seibaken" out the from the Digicore in its chest as its non-lethal trump card, destroying only the fighting spirit of any opponent it cuts, leaving them unable to battle.

JetMervamon.name: JetMervamon
JetMervamon.description: JetMervamon is a God Man Digimon. Due to the DigiFuse of Sparrowmon, who soars soundlessly at Mach speed, and Mervamon, who excels in sword skill, it demonstrates authority in aerial battles. It is even able to deliver high speed attacks from the air, such as Mervamon's greatsword "Olympia Kai" (オリンピア改, Orinpia Kai, lit. "Olympia Revision"), and the "Medullia" on its left arm which extends anywhere and swallows the opponent whole. Its attacks are powered up due to its toxic mist and glamor.

attacks.name: Rolling Thunder (Sexy Dynamites)
attacks.description: Spins in the arm and slams its butt into an enemy, releasing a wave of hearts.

attacks.name: Heartbreak Shot
attacks.description: Fires pink beams from its breasts.

attacks.name: Ouroboros Gate
attacks.description: Uses the Medullia to swallow itself, generating a portal.

attacks.name: Spicy Hard Love
attacks.description: Electrifies all enemies around it.

attacks.name: Love Poison
attacks.description: Uses its glamor to exploit the vitality of the opponents that inhale the toxic mist sprayed from the Medullia's mouth.

JetSilphymon.name: JetSilphymon
JetSilphymon.description: JetSilphymon is a Cyborg Digimon. It possesses power over Wind that has transcended legend by inheriting all the might of AncientKazemon and acquiring unknown abilities. By taking in wind and using the wind's power, it is able to fly about the sky like a jet aircraft. Also, like the wind, its form cannot be seen as it moves through the sky.

attacks.name: Ultra Turbulence
attacks.description: Generates an unprecedented turbulence from its gigantic pinwheel and blows the opponent all the way away.

attacks.name: Jet Binter
attacks.description: Fires from both arms with the power of the wind.

JewelBeemon.name: JewelBeemon
JewelBeemon.description: JewelBeemon is an Insect Digimon. It is a jewel beetle-like Digimon which emits a rainbow-colored radiance. Its prism-like armor, which changes color with the viewing angle, is not only sturdy but also has the effect of dazzling the enemy's eyes. As a grappling expert, it prefers beautiful battles.

attacks.name: Spike Buster
attacks.description: Swings the spear it holds in its right hand at the speed of light, generating a shock wave.

Jijimon.name: Jijimon
Jijimon.description: Jijimon is an Ancient Digimon. An elder Digimon that is said to have existed since the era in which the Digital World was created and knows everything about the Digital World. It appears that it guided chosen humans when the world fell into crisis. Although it hides incomparable power, it rarely ever exhibits its true strength.

attacks.name: Hung On Death (Hang on Death)
attacks.description: Sends those who hold evil hearts to the land of the dead with its cherished staff.

attacks.name: Gentle Punch
attacks.description: Gathers energy in its fist and then punches the enemy.

attacks.name: Guard Stick
attacks.description: Casts a spell with its staff that sends rocks and a wave of earth at the enemy.

JijiShoutmon.name: JijiShoutmon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Laughing All The Way To The Code Crown" [23]
JijiShoutmon.description: Name used inDigimon Fusion. No official romanization available.

Jokermon.name: Jokermon
debut: "The Amusement Park of Dreams, Digimon Land!" [75]
Jokermon.description: Jokermon is a Demon Man Digimon. It is a mysterious and elusive Digimon. It suddenly appears on the battlefield, bringing down Digimon that are key to the tide of the battle with a blow from their blind spot, deciding the outcome of the battle. It is said that if Jokermon allies with you, then victory draws near, and it calls itself the "Trump of Passing". Although it is a Digimon wrapped in mystery, an investigation suspects that it is the same kind as Piedmon.

attacks.name: Lunatic Slash
attacks.description: Hunts the enemy with its sickle, filled with the hope whirling around the battlefield.

attacks.name: Gaia Magicar
attacks.description: Erases things without a trace. It invokes a magic circle directly beneath the enemy and fires beams upwards.

title: Trump of Passing
(通りすがりの切り札
Tōrisugari no Kirifuda?)

JumboGamemon.name: JumboGamemon
JumboGamemon.description: JumboGamemon is a Cyborg Digimon. It is a gigantic Digimon that added beam cannons to its entire body until the strength of its Metal Body's shell was compromised.

attacks.name: Megaton Hydro Laser
attacks.description: Channels extremely high-speed water currents through its mouth-cannons.

attacks.name: Jumbo Crater
attacks.description: Simultaneously strafes with all of its beam cannons so that it covers 360°, leaving behind a crater. This technique definitely embodies the saying, "The best defense is a good offense."

attacks.name: Jumbo Jetter
attacks.description: Retracts its legs and fires both of its arm-cannons behind it, accelerating it into a spinning charge at the opponent.

JungleMojyamon.name: JungleMojyamon
JungleMojyamon.description: JungleMojyamon is a Rare Animal Digimon. It is a Digimon that inhabits the depths of the jungle. It views its territory as a sacred land, and will not forgive anyone who intrudes upon its territory.

attacks.name: Jungle Punch
attacks.description: A wild power-punch.

attacks.name: Jungle Bone
attacks.description: Throw a big bone like a boomerang. Similar to Mojyamon's bone boomerang attack.

attacks.name: Parameter Patch (Neutralize)
attacks.description: Removes ailments.

attacks.name: Bone Strike
attacks.description: Attacks with a hard bone club.

Junkmon.name: Junkmon
Junkmon.description: Junkmonis a Puppet Digimon. It is a Digimon with a habit of tossing junk parts into the cannon on its back. It creates a comfortable environment by disassembling the surrounding structures. If a factory one is familiar with disappears before they know it, then a large number of Junkmon may be responsible. When it discovers invading enemies, it will drive them away with its "Parabolic Junk". Persistent opponents will suffer its "Scrap Teeth".

attacks.name: Parabolic Junk
attacks.description: Hits the sack at the bottom of its cannon with its tail, and shoots the junk parts it has amassed out of the cannon.

attacks.name: Scrap Teeth
attacks.description: Bites into the opponent with its prided foreteeth.

Junomon.name: Junomon
Junomon.description: Junomon is a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", it is Jupitermon's partner. It stands upon the battlefield as a lover and defender of Jupitermon, where it predicts, detects, and eliminates the insurgents who defy Jupitermon's will. Maybe it's because of its profound love for Jupitermon and personality overflowing with affection, but it has a grasp on all of Jupitermon's habits.

attacks.name: Needle Hive
attacks.description: Repeatedly stabs the enemy with the katars equipped to both its arms.

attacks.name: Graceful Lance (Grace Lance)
attacks.description: Auto-attacks surrounding enemies with its sentient lances.

attacks.name: Love Basket
attacks.description: Summons thunderclouds which enhance Jupitermon's power. This technique befits its position as Jupitermon's partner.

Junomon Hysteric Mode.name: Junomon Hysteric Mode
Junomon Hysteric Mode.description: Junomon Hysteric Mode is a Deity Digimon. Another form of Junomon, it was an evil personality sleeping within the innermost depths of its heart, but was awakened. The forces opposing its beloved Jupitermon are never-ending, and if their time together diminishes, it begins drowning in the darkness of its jealousy. Its vitality gradually drains from its countenance, and when it is entirely filled with darkness, a mask of another face manifests. The surrounding Digimon that it sees through this mask are all perceived as evil, so it runs the whole gamut of slaughter. However, this form is never noticed by Jupitermon, so it never suffers the judgment of good and evil.

attacks.name: Welcome Demise (Welcome Lost)
attacks.description: Continuously stabs the opponent with the lances on both its arms, destroying their life-force.

attacks.name: Chain Lash (Lingrudge)
attacks.description: Crushes the enemies it captures with the chains covering its whole body after they spit out words of confession

attacks.name: Liar's Banishment (Liar Banishment)
attacks.description: Causes a hologram of Jupitermon to appear, and enemies that lay their eyes upon it are vaporized in an instant.

title: Masked Queen of Judgement
(断罪の仮面女王
Danzai no Kamen Joō?)

Jupitermon.name: Jupitermon
Jupitermon.description: Jupitermon is a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", it is a Digimon that rules over thunder and weather as the god that presides over the skies, and is Junomon's partner. It is always judging good and evil on the battlefield, and metes out divine punishment to those who choose evil. It makes the decisions dispassionately, wholly excluding any emotion from its judgments. It is said that if someone who continues to disagree with Jupitermon's judgment challenges Jupitermon and wins, the judgment will be overruled, but it said that none yet exist who could overturn it. It is similar to Plutomon as far as punishing evil, but it will not admit Plutomon to the Olympos XII due to its cruelty, and it's said that there's always been a longstanding discord between the two.

attacks.name: Mabolt
attacks.description: Constructs an array of tiny thunder clouds, summoned by exchanging blows with the opponent using the hammers in both of its hands, which automatically looses thunderbolts at those it judges as evil or those who hinder its arbitration.

attacks.name: Punish Judge
attacks.description: Engraves a seal on the bodies of the opponents struck by its hammer, bestowing a reprieve to their punishments unless it decides to carry out the sentence, at which point they're smote with the thunder of an immense electric current.

attacks.name: Wide Plasment
attacks.description: Converts its body into extremely high-voltage plasma, inflicting divine punishment all around itself so that all those who are touched by it are completely disintegrated.

Jupitermon Wrath Mode.name: Jupitermon Wrath Mode
Jupitermon Wrath Mode.description: Jupitermon Wrath Mode is a Deity Digimon. Jupitermon, who usually makes judgments without any emotion, undergoes a complete about-face when confronting those who have committed sins that cause it to be unable to restrain its anger. It summons its divine blade "Keraunós (κεραυνός lit. "Lightning")" with an angry roar, and its body grows several tens of times larger, turning into a form clad in armor and lightning. The violent lightning surrounding it is the embodiment of its anger, and while it behaves calmly, each of its movements are brimming with awe, driving enemies into a corner from the pressure. One of the "Olympos XII", it is a Digimon that rules over thunder and weather as the god that presides over the skies. It is always judging good and evil on the battlefield, and metes out divine punishment to those who choose evil.

attacks.name: Keraunós Divide (κεραυνός Divide lit. "Lightning Divide")
attacks.description: Slashes even distant enemies with a single swing of the "Keraunós" it wields with both hands.

attacks.name: Lightning Beam (Lightning Be)
attacks.description: Summons lightning to strike where it points.

attacks.name: Dios Thunder (Esp: God Thunder)
attacks.description: Drops the "Keraunós" from high in the sky to cast its last judgment upon defeated sinners. If it hits them, then they are guilty, and if it misses them, it serves as proof of being falsely accused. When found guilty by this technique, sinners will already have been erased along with their data.

Justimon (Accel Arm).name: Justimon (Accel Arm)
Justimon (Accel Arm).description: Justimon (Accel Arm)is an Android Digimon. It is a "Hero of Justice"-type Digimon wearing a flapping red muffler. Its sense of justice burns hot, and as it is a Digimon that never overlooks unjust acts or evil deeds, it is an existence which Rookie Digimon aspire to. It comes along like the wind, swings down its hammer of Justice, and leaves like the wind. Also, it seems to like taking a decisive pose atop a cliff while facing the setting sun. By switching out the three plugs on its right shoulder, which are equipped to the "Extend Transmitter" on its back, it can make its arm transform into the power-type "Big Wave Arm" (Accel Arm), the blitz-type "Thunder Arm" (Blitz Arm), or the cutter-type "Cyclonic Arm" (Critical Arm).Suijinmonis equipped with two copies of the Big Wave Arm.

attacks.name:
Trinity Arm: Transforms its right arm into the "Big Wave Arm", "Thunder Arm", or "Cyclonic Arm".
Thunderclap (Accel Arm)
attacks.description: Slams the Big Wave Arm to the ground, generating shockwaves.

attacks.name: Thunderclap (Accel Arm)
attacks.description: Slams the Big Wave Arm to the ground, generating shockwaves.

attacks.name: Justice Kick
attacks.description: Delivers a kick with the force of 45 tons.

Justimon (Blitz Arm).name: Justimon (Blitz Arm)
Justimon (Blitz Arm).description: Justimon (Blitz Arm)is an Android Digimon. It is a "Hero of Justice"-type Digimon wearing a flapping red muffler. Its sense of justice burns hot, and as it is a Digimon that never overlooks unjust acts or evil deeds, it is an existence which Rookie Digimon aspire to. It comes along like the wind, swings down its hammer of Justice, and leaves like the wind. Also, it seems to like taking a decisive pose atop a cliff while facing the setting sun. By switching out the three plugs on its right shoulder, which are equipped to the "Extend Transmitter" on its back, it can make its arm transform into the power-type "Big Wave Arm" (Accel Arm), the blitz-type "Thunder Arm" (Blitz Arm), or the cutter-type "Cyclonic Arm" (Critical Arm).Raijinmonis equipped with two copies of the Thunder Arm.

attacks.name:
Trinity Arm: Transforms its right arm into the "Big Wave Arm", "Thunder Arm", or "Cyclonic Arm".
Justice Burst (Blitz Arm)
attacks.description: Fires orbs of lightning from the Thunder Arm.

attacks.name: Justice Burst (Blitz Arm)
attacks.description: Fires orbs of lightning from the Thunder Arm.

attacks.name: Justice Kick
attacks.description: Delivers a kick with the force of 45 tons.

Justimon (Critical Arm).name: Justimon (Critical Arm)
Justimon (Critical Arm).description: Justimon (Critical Arm)is an Android Digimon. It is a "Hero of Justice"-type Digimon wearing a flapping red muffler. Its sense of justice burns hot, and as it is a Digimon that never overlooks unjust acts or evil deeds, it is an existence which Rookie Digimon aspire to. It comes along like the wind, swings down its hammer of Justice, and leaves like the wind. Also, it seems to like taking a decisive pose atop a cliff while facing the setting sun. By switching out the three plugs on its right shoulder, which are equipped to the "Extend Transmitter" on its back, it can make its arm transform into the power-type "Big Wave Arm" (Accel Arm), the blitz-type "Thunder Arm" (Blitz Arm), or the cutter-type "Cyclonic Arm" (Critical Arm).Fujinmonis equipped with two copies of the Cyclonic Arm.

attacks.name:
Trinity Arm: Transforms its right arm into the "Big Wave Arm", "Thunder Arm", or "Cyclonic Arm".
Voltage Blade (Critical Arm)
attacks.description: Slashes at the opponent with the Cyclonic Arm.

attacks.name: Voltage Blade (Critical Arm)
attacks.description: Slashes at the opponent with the Cyclonic Arm.

attacks.name: Justice Kick
attacks.description: Delivers a kick with the force of 45 tons.

Justimon X.name: Justimon X
Justimon X.description: Justimon Xis a Cyborg Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. It no longer needs to switch between its three Arms; they have become the "Blitz Arm" on its right arm, the "Critical Arm" on its left arm, and the "Accel Leg" on its left leg. Each piece of equipment appears on and is activated by its belt buckle, and it invokes a Special Move once it presses it again during activation. Furthermore, the "ABC-sert" that activates all three of them is extremely powerful, but its activity time is limited.

attacks.name: Justice Kick
attacks.description: Delivers a kick with the force of 45 tons.

attacks.name: Justice X Blade
attacks.description: Cuts the enemy with its Critical Arm.

attacks.name: Justice X Kick
attacks.description: Performs a jump kick with its Accel Leg. The destructive force of Justice X Kick is said to reach 100 tons.

Jyarimon.name: Jyarimon
Jyarimon.description: Jyarimon is a Slime Digimon. It is an extremely scarce Digimon, whose population is small. The Fresh-levels of Dragon-species Digimon are small in absolute number, and it is said that most of them are captured or die before they grow up. You wouldn't know it to look at it, but there are tiny, closely packed fangs growing within its mouth, and it is foreseen that it will grow into a powerful Dragon-species Digimon. Although it is powerless, it has the disposition to face those with bodies larger than its own, and that becomes the reason for its low survival rate.

attacks.name: Nekki o Obita Awa (熱気を帯びた泡, Nekki o Obita Awa lit. "Heated Bubbles")
attacks.description: Attacks with bubbles heated by the constant high temperatures within its body.

attacks.name: Awa (泡, Awa lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

Kabukimon.name: Kabukimon
Kabukimon.description: Kabukimon is a Mutant Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Sincerity". It has large flowers blooming from its head and hands, and walks on two feet. It can usually absorb nutrients by planting both feet firmly in the ground while squatting and assuming a pose. Unusually for a Plant-species, it dislikes being under the sun, and instead normally prefers to lie hidden, and loves artificially illuminated spaces. It is characterized by movements and an appearance that make it more noticeable, and even its behavior is gaudy. When it is behaving excitedly in the middle of battle, its method of striking a pose and treating it as its highlight scene possesses enough beauty to make its adversaries momentarily falter.

attacks.name: Cherry Blossom Storm (桜吹雪, Sakura Fubuki, lit. "Cherry Blossom Blizzard")
attacks.description: Violently sweeps the back of its head, then emits a blinding, stinging light from the faces on its hands that knocks out the opponent while they're fascinated by the beauty of that storm of petals.

attacks.name: Wedge Attack (連獅子, Renjishi)
attacks.description: Makes a circle with its head, sharply tapering the petals on its head where the force accumulated due to the centrifugal force, then pierces them into the opponent like shuriken.

Kabuterimon.name: Kabuterimon
Kabuterimon.description: Kabuterimon is an Insectoid Digimon. Among newly discovered Digimon, it is a fairly unique Insectoid Digimon. The details of how it digivolved into an insect Type are unclear, but it has both ant-like power and the flawless defensive ability possessed by a beetle. Its personality is the epitome of an insect's, and because it only possesses the instincts for survival, it has no intelligence or anything similar. It swoops down on hostile Virus Digimon without mercy. Its head has been metallized, and boasts the defense of an iron wall. Before Kunemon's discovery, Kabuterimon was thought to be the only existing Insectoid Digimon. There is a perfect rivalry between it and the Virus-attribute Kuwagamon, and there is only "Conflict" between them.

attacks.name: Electro Shocker (Mega Blaster)
attacks.description: Fires an electrical ball at enemies.

attacks.name: Big Horn (Beetle Horn)
attacks.description: Attacks with its horn.

attacks.name: Quick Thrust (Blink Thrust)
attacks.description: Sends blades of air at the foe from its horn.

attacks.name: Electric Storm (Insect Plague)
attacks.description: Crouches and radiates electricity.

attacks.name: Shocking Touch (Danger Sting)
attacks.description: Grabs hold of an enemy to electrocute it.

Kakkinmon.name: Kakkinmon
Kakkinmon.description: Kakkinmon is an Armor Digimon. It is a Digimon whose hat has become a copper shield, with its personality turning rougher as well. It is less vigilant than before due to its equipment becoming sturdier, adopting a fearless, forward-charging personality. However, because its shield is still only made of copper, it will land itself in trouble if it gets too aggressive.

attacks.name: Kankan (カンカン, Clanging)
attacks.description: Strikes at the opponent with the sharp corners of its shield.

Kamemon.name: Kamemon
Kamemon.description: Kamemon is a Cyborg Digimon. It has a shell like a computer mouse. It doesn't talk much in front of other people.

attacks.name: Armored Arrow (Pointer Arrow)
attacks.description: Fires an arrow-shaped missile that it is able to guide until it hits the opponent. In Digimon World Data Squad, it opens the shell on its back and fires them from within, whilst in Digimon Masters — it pulls out a gun and fires them.

attacks.name: Torto-Tackle ('met Tackle)
attacks.description: Rolls the ball in its abdomen to charge the opponent, then assaults them with the helmet on its head.

attacks.name: Shell Guard (コーラガード, Kōra Gādo)
attacks.description: Stores its whole body in its shell and reflects the opponent's attacks back unchanged. By the way, its helmet cannot be stored away.

attacks.name: Shell Attack (コーラアタック, Kōra Atakku)
attacks.description: Uses its head to attack the enemy.

attacks.name: Water Shot
attacks.description: Attacks with a bursting stream of water.

Kangarumon.name: Kangarumon
Kangarumon.description: Kangarumon is a Mammal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Kindness". Its punching, kicking and jumping abilities are by far the best, and after it throws a diving uppercut at the opponent's chest using its nimble movements, it jumps up high in the air and unleashes an intense kick. It has a very cheerful personality, and for some reason, it has been seen making light steps as if it were dancing on beaches.

attacks.name: Jumping Jab (Jumping Blow)
attacks.description: An intense blow unleashed from its golden right arm.

Kapurimon.name: Kapurimon
Kapurimon.description: Kapurimon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a tiny Digimon wearing a metallic helmet. Within the two horns attached to its helmet, it has antennae that are able to receive any radio wave or sound. Kapurimon is in possession of bat-like traits, as it has weak eyesight, and produces ultrasonic waves from its mouth, recognizing the objects ahead of it from the rebounding sound wave. For that reason, Kapurimon is able to act irrespective of day or night. Among In-Training Digimon, it has superior durability.

attacks.name: Howling Blow (Howling Hertz)
attacks.description: Generates a resonance between its two horns, creating a sound wave that will paralyze even a large Digimon.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

Karatenmon.name: Karatenmon
Karatenmon.description: Karatenmon is a Wizard Digimon. It has an appearance like a Shugenja. It is a follower of the great Tengu Digimon, and its face is the epitome of a crow. It excels in Shugendo, and freely manipulates its Genriki. The two swords that Karatenmon possesses are called the "Irataka" (伊由太加の剣, Irataka no Ken, lit. "Irataka Swords"), and contain strong magical powers. As a wandering warrior, it has been taught by many masters and gained arcane abilities.

attacks.name: Harmony Swords (悟り, Satori, lit. "Enlightenment")
attacks.description: Reads the opponent's spirit to anticipate their attacks.

attacks.name: Feather Flare (衝撃羽, Shougekiha, lit. "Ballistic Feathers")
attacks.description: Flaps its jet black wings, driving its feathers in the opponent alongside a shock wave.

KaratsukiNumemon.name: KaratsukiNumemon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Tomoaki Ikeda,Satoshi Tsuruoka(Frontier),Ikuo Nishikawa(Frontier, Elder),Iho Matsukubo,Yukie Muraoka(Frontier, Daughter)
KaratsukiNumemon.description: KaratsukiNumemon is a Crustacean Digimon. It was a Numemon that made use of its intelligence and found a shell to cover itself in order to protect its body. As a result, while it is slightly more intelligent than Numemon, it in turn grew a cowardly personality, and will retreat into its shell in shock at even the slightest disturbance. Its defense is extremely high while it is holed up in its shell, remaining firm even when it is kicked or stepped on.

attacks.name: Shell's Attack
attacks.description: Hides its body within its shell and uses its shell to do a tackle.

attacks.name: Slamming Attack (たいあたり, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Blow")
Pouring Poop (ウンチレイン, Unchi Rain, lit. "Poop Rain")
Mighty Magic (マイマイオッド, Maimai Oddo, lit. "Always Odd")
Mature Poop (熟成ウンチ, Jukusei Unchi, lit. "Fermented Poop")
attacks.description: Tosses all the of the poop stored in its shell.

attacks.name: Nume Charge (ヌメたいあたり, Nume Tai Atari, lit. "Nume Body Blow")
attacks.description: Charges with a slippery body.

KausGammamon.name: KausGammamon
KausGammamon.description: KausGammamon is a Dragon Man Digimon. It is a form in which Gammamon grew up, and its body turned blue due to its clear and calm spirit. It soars like a glider by spreading the membranes under both of its arms, allowing it to fly far from high places, and it can only ascend once while gliding using the jet ports on its knees. It is always calm, cool, and collected, and fights by seeing through the opponent's movements.

attacks.name: Urda Impulse
attacks.description: Performs a ramming attack while gliding.

attacks.name: Lamberta Kick
attacks.description: A somersault kick that utilizes the thrust from its knees.

Kazemon.name: Kazemon
Kazemon.description: Kazemon is a Fairy Digimon. It possesses power over Wind which bears the might of AncientKazemon. It freely manipulates the atmosphere to display mirages to its opponents, and specializes in attacks that generate "Kamaitachi" made from vacuums. However, it is more proficient in information warfare than in actual combat ability. Although it has an innocent personality brimming with curiosity, and is a gossipy, talkative troublemaker, because it has no ill will for the person, it isn't really hated. It is thoroughly optimistic, and is the possessor of a strong heart that cuts its way through small difficulties with a smile.

attacks.name: Tempest Twist (Tornado Gamba, Ita: "Tornado Leg")
attacks.description: Performs a handstand and unleashes a whirlwind kick.

attacks.name: Roseo Temporale (Ita: "Rosy Thunderstorm")
attacks.description: Rushes toward the opponent, then dispatches a back-flip kick after a barrage of kicks.

attacks.name: Hurricane Wave (Brezza Petalo, Ita: "Breeze Petal")
attacks.description: Throws long, thin tornadoes erupting from its fingertips.

attacks.name: Love Tap (Carino Anca, Ita: "Pretty Hip")
attacks.description: Taps foes with buttocks to cause temporary feelings of attraction.

attacks.name: Fiorente Furiata (Ita: "Flowery Gust")
attacks.description: Performs a kick with its left and right leg.

attacks.name:
Astato Vespa (Ita: "Astatina Wasp"): Stomps on the opponent twice while in the air.
Luna Assalto (Ita: "Moon Assault")
attacks.description: Turns and unleashes a flying kick after Astato Vespa.

attacks.name: Luna Assalto (Ita: "Moon Assault")
attacks.description: Turns and unleashes a flying kick after Astato Vespa.

attacks.name: Vergine Bomba (Ita: "Virgin Bomb")
attacks.description: Hits the enemy with its bottom. After being hit, the opponent will fall into confusion.

attacks.name: Fata Danza (Ita: "Fairy Dance")
attacks.description: Kicks the enemy down before performing a rising, flip kick.

attacks.name: Nidan Jump (二段ジャンプ, Nidan Jump lit. "Two-Step Jump")
attacks.description: Shoots up into the air after jumping.

attacks.name: Kyūkouka (急降下, Kyūkouka lit. "Plunge")
attacks.description: Drops immediately to the earth.

Kazuchimon.name: Kazuchimon
Kazuchimon.description: Kazuchimon is a Deity Digimon. It is a Mega Digimon that digivolved by tempering its body and soul to the limit through unimaginable training. For Kazuchimon, fighting is a sacred rite that must never be tarnished because it has devoted everything to it. It is a natural-born warrior who is so immersed that it continues to refine its tactics and strategies regardless of its own comforts, and once in battle, it turns into a raging war god and exhibits the strength to take on a thousand warriors.

attacks.name: Nito Seirai (二刀勢雷, Nitou Seirai, lit. "Dual Sword Stance Lightning")
attacks.description: Cuts down the enemy with the lightning swords it holds by dual wielding them.

attacks.name: Shido Ittetsu (士道一徹, Shidou Ittetsu, lit. "Chivalry Tenacity")
attacks.description: Erects a barrier of lightning and forces the enemy into a one-on-one battle.

attacks.name: Shinden Shouraiko (神電召雷光, Shinden Shouraikou, lit. "Divine Electricity-summoned Lightning")
attacks.description: Finishes the enemy off by condensing the electrical energy in its surroundings and then firing an ultra-high density shot of lightning.

KendoGarurumon.name: KendoGarurumon
KendoGarurumon.description: KendoGarurumon is an Android Digimon. It possesses power over Light which bears the might of AncientGarurumon. It is capable of moving at extremely high speed, perhaps because it was discovered on an optical communication Net, so it slips through the bullets to get close to the enemy, and then its sharply-pointed Golden Claws and Clasher Fangs tear through those it considers evil without wasting breath on discussion. As the possessor of a righteous heart becoming the name of Garmr, who fights with the war god Týr at Ragnarok in Norse mythology, its feelings of hatred for evil are stronger than that of others. Although it will never obey those whose hearts are even slightly evil, once it has sworn its allegiance to someone, it will never betray them. It wields the Claymore Wing Wing-blades on its back.

attacks.name: Howling Star (Speed Star)
attacks.description: Charges at extremely high speed, cutting the opponent to pieces with the Claymore Wings.

attacks.name: Lupine Laser (Solar Laser)
attacks.description: Absorbs light energy through its mouth, then spews it out right at the critical point.

attacks.name: Klinge Windrad (Deu: Blade Windmill)
attacks.description: Leaps into the air while spinning with blades extended.

attacks.name: Militant Angriff (Deu: Militant Attack)
attacks.description: Performs a turning, ramming attack.

attacks.name: Licht Torpedo (Deu: Light Torpedo)
attacks.description: Charges through the air.

attacks.name: Klinge Wirbelwind (Deu: Blade Whirlwind)
attacks.description: Spins in the air with its blade extended.

Kenkimon.name: Kenkimon
Kenkimon.description: Kenkimon is a Machine Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Friendship". Because its right hand has become a forklift and its left has become a shovel, it is a heavy machinery Digimon able to complete any kind of construction work. It runs on electricity, and charges using the plug on its tail.

attacks.name: Crazy Crane
attacks.description: Swings the crane on its back.

Kentaurosmon.name: Kentaurosmon
Kentaurosmon.description: Kentaurosmonis a Holy Warrior Digimon. One of the "Royal Knights", it has a bestial silhouette which could be called bizarre, in contrast to the Human forms of most of the other members. Its whole body is clad in an armor of the "Red Digizoid" which boasts great defensive power, so even Mega Digimon are unlikely to be able to easily damage Kentaurosmon. Its six legs possess unsurpassed mobility, such that it is possible for it to instantaneously move at high speeds that its thick build would not suggest. Kentaurosmon acts as a guardian of the super-ancient ruins which sleep below the thick ice of theDigital World'snorth pole, since it is said that essential program data which concerns the creation ofDigimonis sealed within these ruins. It holds the sacred crossbow Muspelheimr (Múspellsheimr) in its left hand, and the sacred shieldNiflheimrin its right hand.

attacks.name: Inferno Frost (Bifröst)
attacks.description: Fires incandescent arrows of light from Múspellsheimr.

attacks.name: Icy Breath (Odin's Breath)
attacks.description: Uses Niflheimr to lower the temperature of its climate and generate a blizzard.

attacks.name: Tactical Stomp (Tactic Smear)
attacks.description: Jumps high and stomps on the enemy with both feet.

title: Swift Crimson Horse
(神速の紅馬
Shinsoku no Beniuma?)

Kentaurosmon Burst.name: Kentaurosmon Burst
Kentaurosmon Burst.description: Kentaurosmon Burst is an enhanced version ofKentaurosmonwith a flaming aura.

Kentaurosmon X.name: Kentaurosmon X
Kentaurosmon X.description: Kentaurosmon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. In addition to its six legs it had previously, it now possesses four arms after transformation, removing any delay between loading and firing and thus allowing it to shoot continuously while moving at instantaneous high-speed.

attacks.name: Surtr Brander
attacks.description: Fires light arrows enveloped in hellfire that burn everything to cinders from its "Great Battle Bow Einherjar (究極戦弩弓エインヘリアル, Ultimate-Battle-Crossbow Einherjar)", fused from the wings on its back.

attacks.name: Niflheimr Arrest
attacks.description: Absolute zero cold air generated by the sacred "Niflheimr" shields equipped on each pair of its arms, freezing the surface of the ground and brings all vital functions to a complete halt.

attacks.name: Tactics-Smear
attacks.description: Jumps high into the air and kicks the opponent with its hooves.

Keramon.name: Keramon
Keramon.description: Keramon is an Unidentified Digimon. It digivolved from Tsumemon. Its physique has gotten larger, and with its huge mouth, it can eat away at much more data than Tsumemon could. Because it eats away at more than 100 megabytes of data per second, the data is destroyed the instant it enters Keramon. Due to its extremely cheerful personality, it thinks of its destructive actions as just part of its play.

attacks.name: Bug Blaster (Crazy Giggle)
attacks.description: Spews out an exceptionally destructive bullet of light while laughing (?).

attacks.name: Fool Out
attacks.description: Emits an unbearable discord.

attacks.name: Crazy Turn
attacks.description: Attacks by extending its arms and spinning around.

attacks.name: Crazy Smoke
attacks.description: Blows out poisonous smoke.

Keramon X.name: Keramon X
debut: Digimon Chronicle X, "Two Lights / An Even Darker Scheme" [20]
Keramon X.description: Keramon X is an Unidentified Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. While it has retained a single body, only its face has divided so that it can chew through even huge amounts of data in one go. Even Digimon become its prey, and it will completely devour even Megas should they get caught. Its faces each have a will of their own, and each display delectable or unpleasant expressions as they are chewing through the same prey. Its Special Move, Crazy Giggle, has more than tripled in power.

attacks.name: Crazy Giggle
attacks.description: Spews out an exceptionally destructive bullet of light while laughing (?) which it unleashes while putting on various expressions.

Ketomon.name: Ketomon
Ketomon.description: Ketomon is a Slime Digimon. It is a Digimon whose large eyes are its defining characteristic. These eyes have the ability to discern the nature of Digimon, allowing it to detect violent Digimon in advance and warn its allies of the danger.

attacks.name: Poppin' Tears (Poppin' Tear)
attacks.description: When cornered, it discharges acidic bubbles from its eyes, rattling the enemy as it cries.

attacks.name: Awa (泡, Awa lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Fires bubbles from its eyes.

Keemon.name: Keemon
Keemon.description: Keemon is a Slime Digimon. It is an evil-eyed Digimon which is always scowling. Though it's very young, it hates being crowded by others, and lives in hiding. It likes poking its nose out of hiding and harassing with its "Pushū".

attacks.name: Pushū (プシュー, Pushū)
attacks.description: Spits a stream of water mixed with paint from its mouth.

Kimeramon.name: Kimeramon
Kimeramon.description: Kimeramon is a Composition Digimon. Every part that composes its whole was put together by synthesizing various Digimon. How this kind of synthesis was performed is shrouded in mystery. In contrast to Machinedramon, who was synthesized from the metal parts of several varieties of Digimon, it was combined from organic parts, and whether it is Machinedramon's prototype, or it was built to use against Machinedramon, is still uncertain. However, the one thing that is understood is that, because of Kimeramon's terrifying combat instinct, it is nothing but a powerful force for destruction.

attacks.name: Heat Viper
attacks.description: Emanates a deadly heat ray from its four arms, cruelly dispersing it in every direction like a curse. In Digimon Adventure 02, Heat Viper is fired from its mouth where its shockwave knocks away anyone who tries to avoid it.

attacks.name: Death Claw
attacks.description: Attacks with the Devimon arm.

title: Synthetic Evil Beast
(合成魔獣
Gōsei Majū?)

King Drasil_7D6.name: King Drasil_7D6
King Drasil_7D6.description: King Drasil_7D6is a 9000 lifeform. It is an avatar created by the mysterious host computerKing Drasilthat governs the entirety of theDigital Worldon theNetwork. Its body has many unidentified details.

attacks.name: Crystal Shards (クリスタルの破片, Kurisutaru no Hahen)
attacks.description: Fires crystal shards.

attacks.name: Huge Crystal (巨大なクリスタル, Kyodaina Kurisutaru)
attacks.description: Fires a gigantic crystal.

attacks.name: Self-Restore (自己修復, Jikoshūfuku, lit. "Self-Repair")
attacks.description: Uses a self-repair ability.

KingChessmon.name: KingChessmon

otherNames.name: キングチェスモン（白） KingChessmon (White)

KingChessmon.description: KingChessmon is a Puppet Digimon. It is a king Digimon maneuvering behind the scenes in order to build the great Chessmon empire. However, nobody knows what kind of thing a Chessmon empire is, and because of the environs, they aren't even interested. Since it is a coward, it almost never attacks by itself, and it's only fast when it comes to running away in an emergency. Its catchphrase is, "He that fights and runs away may live to fight another day!" However, it also has an intellect that is surprisingly on the same level as a supercomputer. It always carries the "King Stick".

attacks.name: Checkmate
attacks.description: Attacks by itself as a last resort. If its own life is at stake, this technique possesses superior offensive power.

attacks.name: King Stick
attacks.description: Produces a body double of itself using the King Stick.

attacks.name: King Dash
attacks.description: Quickly runs away.

KingEtemon.name: KingEtemon
KingEtemon.description: KingEtemon is a Puppet Digimon. It styles itself among other Etemon as the "King of Etemon", and after all, it is an ultimate form that is said to be a being set at the top. It gets even more carried away and calls itself the "King of Kings". It is snazzily dressed in its "Monkey Suit" (サルスーツ, Saru Sūtsu), engraved with the characters "Great King" (大王, Daiou) on its chest, but although it swaggers around with the affectation of a star, it only earns derision from other Digimon. Partnering with PrinceMamemon, it plays the part of a mock royal family of the Digital World. KingEtemon convinced PrinceMamemon it truly is a member of the royal family, and the embarrassing thing is that PrinceMamemon considers even the "Royal Knights" to be its subordinates.

attacks.name: Monkey Wrench (サルしばい, Saru Shibai, lit. "Monkey Play")
attacks.description: Puts up a false show that cripples the opponent's fighting spirit.

title: King of Etemon
(キング・オブ・エテモン
Kingu Obu Etemon?)
King of Kings
(キング・オブ・キングス
Kingu Obu Kingusu?)
Fake Royal Knight
(偽のロイヤルナイツ
Nise no Roiyaru Naitsu?)

KingSukamon.name: KingSukamon
KingSukamon.description: KingSukamon is a Mutant Digimon. It is the King of Sukamon who rules over a landfill called "Dust Kingdom", and its size is gargantuan. It wears something similar to a crown and is highly intelligent, and attacks with brute force in addition to throwing poop.

attacks.name: Poop Toss (ウンチ投げ, Unchi Nage, lit. "Poop Throw")
attacks.description: Throws poop. It is a familiar cowardly technique.

attacks.name: King Stamp
attacks.description: Falls swiftly after performing a high jump. The damage done both physically and mentally when suffering its "King Stamp" is said to be unfathomable.

King Whamon.name: King Whamon
King Whamon.description: King Whamon is a large, whitish grey sperm whale-like Digimon partially based on the mythicalaspidochelone. It has a brown shell on its head and back which is fused with a land mass that covers most of the shell as well as its lower jaw. Its eyes have degeneratedand it has cables in place of them. It has three pairs of fins with the pectoral fins being the largest.

Kinkakumon.name: Kinkakumon
Kinkakumon.description: Kinkakumon is an Ogre Digimon. It is a rampaging girl that, together with its little brother Ginkakumon, is feared as the "Gold and Silver Ogre Brothers". Since it's the type to rush headlong into a love affair, it's a romantic Digimon that will begin violently attacking if there's a Digimon it's interested in. In addition, because it is a thoughtless person prone to making silly mistakes and jumping to the wrong conclusion, if it falls in love with its opponent then the misunderstanding will cause a ruckus. Because it has a confident personality but is naive in the ways of love, it strikes the opponent and sends them soaring if it's bashful, and strikes them dolefully if it's snubbed, so no matter how many lives the opponent it likes has, they aren't enough. It wields the "Shichisei Kanabou" (七星金棒, "Shichisei Kanabou" lit. "Seven-Star Gold Rod").

attacks.name: Kibakusou (鬼爆葬 , Kibakusou lit. "Ogre's Explosive Burial")
attacks.description: Swings the Shichisei Kanabou from overhead and pulverizes the whole ground.

attacks.name: Dokidokidokyūn (怒気怒鬼怒灸, Dokidokidokyūn lit. "Thump, Thump, Thwomp")
attacks.description: Discharges a high-tension current from its whole body as an all-purpose technique that excels in offense and defense.

attacks.name: Raikou Kishū (雷光鬼蹴 , Raikou Kishū lit. "Lightning Ogre Kick")
attacks.description: Attacks with a lightning-speed, surprise kick while concealing an electric shock in its foot to paralyze the opponent.

title: Gold and Silver Ogre Brothers
(鬼の金銀ブラザーズ
Oni no Kingin Burazāzu?)

Kiwimon.name: Kiwimon
Kiwimon.description: Kiwimon is an Ancient Bird Digimon. A mythical, ancient Digimon that was said to have been overhunted to extinction due to the spread of the Internet. Although it is a Bird Digimon, its wings have completely degenerated so it is unable to fly in the air. Furthermore, it possesses the makeup of a Plant-type and is able to perform photosynthesis with the leaf-like things growing on its head, providing itself with nourishment. It has no other ways of defending itself aside from the hard shell that covers its head, and it is easily attacked by intruders due to its docile personality.

attacks.name: Pummel Peck (Little Pecker)
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy using the ChibiKiwimon it conceals within its body. Since the ChibiKiwimon's beaks are extremely hard just like Kiwimon, it is a terrifying technique in which they explode when hit. Despite being completely charred after exploding, the ChibiKiwimon return safely.

attacks.name: Blast Shot
attacks.description: Sends ballistic waves and attacks.

KnightChessmon (Black).name: KnightChessmon (Black)
KnightChessmon (Black).description: KnightChessmon (Black)is a Puppet Digimon. It is an expert at throwing its giganticdarts. Although it is unskilled in close combat, it jumps over the opponent with its powerful, thoroughbred-like leg strength to confound them. Its favorite saying is "Joust!".

attacks.name: Big Darts
attacks.description: Charges foe at a high-speed gallop.

attacks.name: Gallop Whole
attacks.description: Leaps high into the sky and lands with a blow that tramples the opponent.

attacks.name: Knight Lancer
attacks.description: Tilts the Darts and charges the opponent.

KnightChessmon (White).name: KnightChessmon (White)
KnightChessmon (White).description: KnightChessmon (White)is a Puppet Digimon. It is an expert at throwing its giganticDarts. Although it is unskilled in close combat, it capitalizes on its thoroughbred-like leg strength, jumping over the opponent and confounding them with its leaping power. Its catchphrase is, "Joust!".

attacks.name: Big Darts
attacks.description: Charges foe at a high-speed gallop.

attacks.name: Gallop Whole
attacks.description: Leaps high into the sky and lands with a blow that tramples the opponent.

attacks.name: Knight Lancer
attacks.description: Tilts the Darts and charges the opponent.

Knightmon.name: Knightmon
Knightmon.description: Knightmonis a Warrior Digimon. It is a largely-built Digimon whose body is clad in armor made from heavyweightChrome Digizoid. It possesses enough power to easily wield its cherished greatsword even while dressed in that armor. According to one theory, it wears the armor on its body in order to restrain its mighty, uncontrollable power. Also, Knightmon is a Digimon that exists to faithfully serve its master, and its personality is deeply loyal. For that reason, it is in distress over becoming either wicked or righteous, depending on its master's attribute, in order to follow through on those convictions.All Knightmon are presided over by their monarch,Crusadermon.

attacks.name: Berserk Sword
attacks.description: Swings its greatsword like a berserker, cutting everything in two with a single stroke. In Digimon Frontier, each swing launches a blast of energy.

attacks.name: Grand Smash
attacks.description: Uses its sword not to cut, but to blow an opponent away.

Knightmon Wise-Sword Mode.name: Knightmon Wise-Sword Mode
Knightmon Wise-Sword Mode.description: Knightmon Wise-Sword Mode is a DigiFuse with Knightmon and Wisemon. It bears the Crest of Hope on its cape. Final Fusion - The Fight For Earth!

attacks.name: Wise Sword
attacks.description: Elongates its Wise Sword into a giant blade and unleashes an enormous shockwave.

KoDokugumon.name: KoDokugumon
KoDokugumon.description: KoDokugumon is an Insect Digimon. It is a Rookie Digimon with the appearance of a spider that behaves in clusters with Dokugumon. It is usually docile and hangs from things such as tree branches with its body curled into a ball, but if an enemy approaches, it attacks en masse from overhead. It wears gloves with a strong poison on the claws because it is unable to produce a strong poison of its own yet.

attacks.name: Poison Nails (Poison Nail)
attacks.description: Scratches the enemy with its poison claw gloves.

KoDokugumon (In-Training).name: KoDokugumon (In-Training)
KoDokugumon (In-Training).description: Name used inDigimon Fusionand other media. Base name shares romanization withKoDokugumon.

KoHagurumon.name: KoHagurumon
KoHagurumon.description: KoHagurumon are tiny versions ofHagurumon Xwhich are attached to it in a manner reminiscent of hands.

KoKabuterimon.name: KoKabuterimon
KoKabuterimon.description: KoKabuterimon is an Insect Digimon. It is a small-built but very strong Insect Digimon. It has a large horn and forefeet, and it is feared in its surroundings, but really, it hates fighting and has a gentle personality. However, its strength is considerably strong, and it appears to have lifted a Tortomon in the experiment of a certain research institution.

attacks.name: Scoop Smash
attacks.description: Scoops up the opponent and jettisons them with its prided horn.

attacks.name: Beetle Lariat
attacks.description: Lunges from its large forefeet.

Kokatorimon.name: Kokatorimon
Kokatorimon.description: Kokatorimon is a Bird Digimon. It has two overdeveloped legs, and because it has continued to live on the ground for so long, it cannot fly through the air, and has digivolved a body that is suited for land. For that reason, its body became even larger, and its leg strength has developed tremendously, as well. Its wing portions have completely degenerated, and in battles, it spreads them wide along with its tail to intimidate the opponent. Its disposition is violently ferocious, but in order to preserve its large build, it avoids violent battles that consume its energy.

attacks.name: Petra Fire
attacks.description: Performs a terrifying technique that does not carbonize its victims, but completely petrifies their body.

attacks.name: Feather Shoot
attacks.description: Slices up by firing sharp-edged feathers.

Kokomon.name: Kokomon
Kokomon.description: Kokomon is a Lesser Digimon. It grew up from Conomon. The personalities of the robust-natured Gummymon and the docile Kokomon are opposites, but they get along very well, and always act in unison. It is an existence of unified mind and flesh, such that if you temporarily separate the two, it will weaken due to too much loneliness.

attacks.name: Double Bubble (Double Bobble)
attacks.description: Spits out a lot of adhesive bubbles.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

Kokuwamon.name: Kokuwamon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Yūsuke Oguri,Norihisa Mori,Kazunari Kojima(Frontier),Keiichi Sonobe(Frontier, Elder),Miwa Matsumoto(Frontier, Child)
(En:)Neil Kaplan(Frontier, Leader),Dave Wittenberg,Peggy O'Neal(Frontier),Johnny Yong Bosch(Fusion)
Kokuwamon.description: Kokuwamonis a Machine Digimon. It is a very unusual Insect Mecha-Digimon that was recently discovered. Insect Mecha-Digimon had not been discovered until now, and their existence itself was never even imagined. Because it will discharge 100 megavolts of electricity from both of its arms and thestun gun-shaped head it possesses if it senses danger, you mustn't carelessly approach. However, it has not an aggressive personality, but a docile personality which seeks tranquility. It uses electricity as its source of nutrients, and charges electric power using its middle two legs.

attacks.name: Power Surge (Scissor Arms Mini)
attacks.description: Discharges electricity from the pincers on both of its arms and cuts through solid objects.

attacks.name: Stun Shock
attacks.description: Attacks emitting electricity accumulated on the head.

attacks.name: Dis-Assembler (Assemble Work)
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy using the scissors on both hands.

attacks.name: Electro Strike (Elect-Elect)
attacks.description: Drops lightning on the enemy.

attacks.name: Lightning Arrow (イナズマぎり, Inazuma Giri, lit. "Lightning Slash")
attacks.description: Pierces with an electric shock.

Kokuwamon X.name: Kokuwamon X
Kokuwamon X.description: Kokuwamon X is a Machine Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. As a result of its electric charge capacity increasing, not only does it discharge electricity but it is now also capable of supplying the electricity used for its "Dendouhenkei (電動変形, Dendouhenkei lit. "Electric Transformation")". The increase in its offensive power in particular cannot be confirmed, but when it gets really angry, it will attack in its post-"Dendouhenkei" form.

attacks.name: Mini Scissor Claw (Scissor Arms Mini)
attacks.description: Discharges electricity from the pincers on both of its arms and cuts through solid objects.

attacks.name: Petit Thunder
attacks.description: Hurls static electricity that it amplified with its wings.

attacks.name: Dendouhenkei (電動変形, Dendouhenkei lit. "Electric Transformation")

Komondomon.name: Komondomon
Komondomon.description: Komondomon is a Beast Digimon. It is a Vehicle Digimon that loves to carry and transport Digimon. It feels like it is taking a walk wherever it goes and has a carefree personality that doesn't mind wherever it sets foot. It can dive and navigate underwater by spinning its tail. Although its long fur coat constantly gets dirty from being dragged along the ground, it actually likes to keep itself fairly clean. It hates fighting and will try to flee, prioritizing the safety of the Digimon aboard it, but as for those who attack it, it repels them with its “Wi-wiper (ワイワイパー, Wi-wiper lit. "Howling Wiper")".

attacks.name: Howling Wiper (ワイワイパー, Wi-wiper)
attacks.description: Leans over those who attack it with its large body and scrubs them with the shaggy hair on its feet.

attacks.name: Masshigurun (マッシグラン, Masshigurun lit. "Full-speed Run")
attacks.description: Blows the opponent away with its violent dashing.

Kongoumon.name: Kongoumon
Kongoumon.description: Kongoumon is an Insectoid Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Miracles". It is a heavyweight Power Fighter with a metal body that shines gold all over. It brings about miracles with its "Vajra", the sacred weapons it holds in its six hands, and is versed in all Shinto rituals. It is said that Kongoumon has been an agent of God on earth since ancient times, separate from Angel Digimon.

attacks.name: Popper (鉄砲, Teppou, lit. "Gun")
attacks.description: Slaps enemies with its 6 arms.

Korikakumon.name: Korikakumon
Korikakumon.description: Korikakumon is a Beast Digimon. It possesses power over Ice which bears the might of AncientMegatheriummon. It's closer to recklessness than dauntless courage, but in any case, it's a ruffian overflowing with desire and ambition. It's powerfully curious and a show-off, so it's pretty frivolous. On the brink of battle, it always pauses to offer a prayer to the god of ice and snow in which it believes, then shouts the names of its Special Moves and something humorous. However, in practice, it is being shrewd and is closely observing the opponent and terrain, heightening its advantage in combat. It wields two tomahawks, "Éji" (Igb: ""Black"") and "Ōji" (Igb: ""Black"").

attacks.name:
Avalanche Axes (Avalanche Step): Wields the Éji and Ōji to chop up the opponent like it was dancing.
Avalanche Throw
attacks.description: Throws the Éji and Ōji.

attacks.name: Avalanche Throw
attacks.description: Throws the Éji and Ōji.

attacks.name:
Frozen Arrowheads (Gletscher Torpedo, Deu: Glacier Torpedo): Restricts the opponent's movement with the extensible hair on its head then stabs them with the bladed edges until they stop.
Kūchū Gletscher Torpedo (空中グレッチャートルペイド, Kūchū Gletscher Torpedo lit. "Aerial Gletscher Torpedo")
attacks.description: Attacks with its hair while in the air.

attacks.name: Kūchū Gletscher Torpedo (空中グレッチャートルペイド, Kūchū Gletscher Torpedo lit. "Aerial Gletscher Torpedo")
attacks.description: Attacks with its hair while in the air.

Koromon.name: Koromon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Chika Sakamoto(Adventure/New Century),Reiko Kiuchi(Adventure, Village of Beginnings),Taiki Matsuno(Savers)

otherNames.name: 滾球獸/滚球兽 Gǔn qiú shòu

Koromon.description: Koromon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a tiny Digimon that shed the fuzz covering its surface, and whose body grew even bigger. Although it has become able to move around more actively, it is still unable to battle. It can produce bubbles from its mouth to intimidate opponents.

attacks.name: Bubble Blow (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

attacks.name: Poison Bubbles (毒の泡, Doku no Awa, lit. "Poison Bubbles")
attacks.description: Shoots out poison bubbles.

Kotemon.name: Kotemon
Kotemon.description: Kotemon is a Reptile Digimon. It is a Digimon that practices kendo with a bamboo sword. Although it doesn't say much, this Digimon works hard in the background. It never removes its armor, and no one has ever seen its true face.

attacks.name: Hothead (Fire Men)
attacks.description: Headbutts the enemy with a flaming mask, or a flaming bamboo sword.

attacks.name: Thunder Kote
attacks.description: Charges his fist with electrical current and punches the enemy.

attacks.name: Lightning Arrow (イナズマぎり, Inazuma Giri, lit. "Lightning Slash")
attacks.description: Pierces with an electric shock.

Kogamon.name: Kogamon
Kogamon.description: Kogamon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a shinobi Digimon who dons a purple mask and lives in the darkness. It is in the midst of travelling the Digital World in order to hone its Kouga-style ninjutsu. It is rarely encountered as it often moves from shadow to shadow in order to avoid being seen by others.

attacks.name: Kōga-style Shadow Clone (コウガ流影分身, Kōga-ryū Kage Bunshin)
attacks.description: Forms clones of itself, which attack the enemy simultaneously.

attacks.name: Shadow Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with lightning speed.

Kozenimon.name: Kozenimon
Kozenimon.description: Kozenimon is a Mutant Digimon. A small Digimon in the shape of a 1-yen coin that resides within Ganemon's trunk. It is always full of cheer, and its strength is its ability to stay optimistic even during periods of recession. It cheerfully carries out its task of collecting money as ordered to by Ganemon, toiling by its motto "Even 1 yen, when accumulated, can become 1 million yen". Kozenimon often act in groups.

attacks.name: Strength in Solidarity (イッチ・ダン・ケツ, Icchi Dan Ketsu)
attacks.description: All Kozenimon attack the enemy together.

attacks.name: ¥UE-N
attacks.description: All Kozenimon create a shock wave by crying out.

Kudamon.name: Kudamon
Kudamon.description: Kudamonis a Holy Beast Digimon. It is always wreathed around a holy cartridge and never separates from it. It is said that day after day, it accumulates holy power within the earring on its left ear, and that the stored power is great enough to have influence on its next digivolution. It has a calm, cool, and collected personality, conducting a precise assessment of the situation even in combat, and attaining the advantage in battle. Conversely, when it gets outnumbered, it possesses a defensive technique in which it goes into its cartridge and settles down.

attacks.name: Bullet Whirlwind (弾丸旋風, Dangan Senpū)
attacks.description: Strikes with the whole cartridge while spinning its body.

attacks.name: Blinding Ray (絶光衝, Zekkoushou)
attacks.description: Blinds the opponent with a great radiance emitted from its earring.

Kudamon (2006 anime).name: Kudamon (2006 anime)
Kudamon (2006 anime).description: Kudamon (2006 anime) is a Holy Beast Digimon. It is always wreathed around a holy cartridge and never separates from it. It is said that day after day, it accumulates holy power within the earring on its left ear, and that the stored power is great enough to have influence on its next digivolution. It has a calm, cool, and collected personality, conducting a precise assessment of the situation even in combat, and attaining the advantage in battle. Conversely, when it gets outnumbered, it possesses a defensive technique in which it goes into its cartridge and settles down.

attacks.name: Twirling Tackle (弾丸旋風, Dangan Senpū, lit. "Bullet Whirlwind")
attacks.description: Strikes with the whole cartridge while spinning its body.

attacks.name: Shining Piercings (絶光衝, Zekkoushou, lit. "Blinding Ray")
attacks.description: Blinds the opponent with a great radiance emitted from its earring.

attacks.name: Holy Shot
attacks.description: Fires a sacred beam when the patterns on its back glow.

attacks.name: Holy Shoot
attacks.description: Causes an explosion with a small ball of light.

Kumamon.name: Kumamon
Kumamon.description: Kumamon is a Beast Man Digimon. It possesses power over Ice which bears the might of AncientMegatheriummon. It styles itself as holding rank as a member of a polar army's polar region defense force. Since it replies that the matter's top secret if you ask anything about it, the truth is unknown. It's thought to be largely something it dreamed up. However, its operation of the Launcher it carries (nicknamed Romeo) and its precision conduct in battle are genuine, and its survivalist knowledge also has a strong, truly reliable existence. Since it rarely acts of its own volition, it primarily operates in response to someone's requests or orders. It will have nothing to do if nobody is relying on it, and is likely to worry about its purpose in life and get completely depressed. The shots fired from its Launcher are special snowballs, so there are several varieties according to purpose.

attacks.name:
Frozen Tundra (ツララララ～, Tsurararara~, lit. "Icicicicle~"): Takes the shape of an icicle and pounces at the opponent.
Tsurara Punch (ツララパンチ, Tsurara Punch lit. "Icicle Punch"): Turns its hand into an icicle and then punches.
Tsurara Fall (ツララフォール, Tsurara Fall lit. "Icicle Fall")
attacks.description: Turns its lower body into an icicle and then drops down.

attacks.name: Tsurara Punch (ツララパンチ, Tsurara Punch lit. "Icicle Punch")
attacks.description: Turns its hand into an icicle and then punches.

attacks.name: Tsurara Fall (ツララフォール, Tsurara Fall lit. "Icicle Fall")
attacks.description: Turns its lower body into an icicle and then drops down.

attacks.name: Blizzard Blaster (Snow Bomber)
attacks.description: Blindly fires supercooled snowballs from the Launcher.

attacks.name:
Crystal Breeze (カチカチコッチン, Kachikachi Kocchin, lit. "Frozen Tinkling"): Blows cold wind from its mouth to freeze its opponents.
Kachikachi Hammer (カチカチハンマー, Kachikachi Hammer lit. "Frozen Hammer")
attacks.description: Freezes its opponent with its breath and then uppercuts them.

attacks.name: Kachikachi Hammer (カチカチハンマー, Kachikachi Hammer lit. "Frozen Hammer")
attacks.description: Freezes its opponent with its breath and then uppercuts them.

attacks.name: V Jump Attack
attacks.description: Charges its enemy on its skis and attacks with them in a V shape.

Kumbhiramon.name: Kumbhiramon
Kumbhiramon.description: Kumbhiramon is a Holy Beast Digimon. It is the "Rat" Deva, and serves the Digimon Sovereign Ebonwumon. As a follower of Ebonwumon, who boasts of its great wisdom, it is a sage who plays the part of the "challenger" in Ebonwumon's Zen Kōans. It is mostly able to predict the mindset of anyone but Ebonwumon, and has a habit of bewildering the opponent by announcing their next move. Though it uses sarcasm with an acrimonious tone, it charmingly ends all of its sentences with "squeak" ("~chū"). As it's not very strong, it's not suited for flinging itself at the opponent, but by means of its powerful abilities of telekinesis, it freely operates a giant steel pestle as big as its own body, the Bǎo Chǔ (宝杵 lit. "Treasure Pestle"). Kumbhiramon is the only Deva able to counter Pajiramon's "Vahnijvala", through the power of its thoughts.

attacks.name: Krimisa (Krimíśa)
attacks.description: Splits itself into six bodies which it positions in a hexagram barrier, sealing the opponent inside, then smashes them with the Bǎo Chǔ, deleting them completely.

attacks.name: Deva Clone (Rokubunshin (六分身, Rokubunshin lit. "Six Clones"))
attacks.description: Splits itself into six bodies, then tackles the opponent.

Kunemon.name: Kunemon
Kunemon.description: Kunemon is a Larva Digimon. As Insect Digimon children are very unique beings among other Digimon, its digivolved form is still unclear, but it seems to be obvious from Kunemon's discovery that there exist Insect Digimon other than Kabuterimon. Kunemon has lightning-patterns all over its body, and although it is uncertain whether the lightning-patterns on the portion considered its face are organs equivalent to eyes, because they change shape in accordance with its emotions, it is said that they probably are eyes. Its personality is fairly malicious.

attacks.name: Electric Thread
attacks.description: Fires an electric thread from its mouth.

attacks.name: Poison Winder (いじわる, Ijiwaru, lit. "Malicious")
Super Shocker (Petit Thunder)
attacks.description: Electrocutes with a small ball of electricity.

Kuramon.name: Kuramon
Kuramon.description: Kuramon is an Unidentified Digimon. It suddenly appeared on the Computer Network. Aggression, generated by the malice of people who abuse the Computer Network or the conflicts which are unfolding on the Network, manifested and a single Digi-Egg was created. Humanity's destructive instincts are condensed within that Digi-Egg, and as such, the mysterious Digimon that was born from it is an extremely dangerous being. It multiplies like a virus within the Computer Network, causing a slight degree of network failure.

attacks.name: Glare Eyes (Glare Eye)
attacks.description: Produces a frothy substance from its gigantic eye.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its eye to intimidate the opponent.

Kuwagamon.name: Kuwagamon
Kuwagamon.description: Kuwagamonis an Insectoid Digimon. It is armed with gigantic pincers on its head. LikeKabuterimon, it has combat abilities that far exceed those of similar species that inhabitFile Island. It is protected by its tenacious power and sturdy shell, and in particular, as the power of its pincers is super-powerful, once it clamps an enemy, it will squeeze until the opponent's life is extinguished. There is a perfect rivalry between it and the Vaccine-attribute Kabuterimon, and there is only "Conflict" between them.

attacks.name: Scissor Hands (Scissor Arms)
attacks.description: Clamps the opponent with its pincers, easily cutting hard substances to pieces.

attacks.name: Shadow Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with lightning speed.

Kuwagamon X.name: Kuwagamon X
Kuwagamon X.description: Kuwagamon X is an Insect Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Although it instinctively regards Vaccine-species as its enemies, it has gone even as far as treating Data-species as its enemies and attacks them, so its nature as a Virus-species has become more intense. It now prefers ravenous fighting styles.

attacks.name: Scissor Claw (Scissor Arms)
attacks.description: Clamps the opponent with its pincers, easily cutting hard substances to pieces.

attacks.name: Crunch Arm
attacks.description: It minces and injures the enemy with its feet, which have sharply increased in power, and then aims at their wounds to deliver a fatal blow with the pincers on its head.

Kuzuhamon.name: Kuzuhamon

otherNames.name: 古祖哈獸/古祖哈兽 Gǔ zǔ hā shòu

Kuzuhamon.description: Kuzuhamon is a Deity Digimon. It is said to be a Fox-species Digimon that lived long, and transformed to take on a humanoid form. It is said that only those among them of a high level are able to digivolve to Sakuyamon, and they normally just digivolve to Kuzuhamon. It is versed in ancient magic like Shinto, Onmyoudou, and Shugendou. A single kuda-gitsune lurks within the pipe it carries on the belt around its waist, and it is able to employ this kuda-gitsune to use it for things like attacking and gathering information. It wields the "Shakujou" (錫杖, "Shakujou" lit. "Khakkhara").

attacks.name: Illuminator (裏飯綱, Ura Izuna, lit. "Reverse Izuna")
attacks.description: Attacks the opponent with the kuda-gitsune carried on its waist.

attacks.name: Taizoukai Mandala (胎蔵界曼荼羅, Taizoukai Mandala lit. "Womb Realm Mandala")
attacks.description: Spreads a purifying barrier with the Shakujou that exorcises evil spirits.

Kuzuhamon Maid Mode.name: Kuzuhamon Maid Mode
