Kuzuhamon Maid Mode.description: Kuzuhamon Maid Mode is a Deity Digimon. It is a form Kuzuhamon takes when it performs Shinto rituals and listens to God's will. It seldom fights in Maid Mode, but has strengthened its ability to exorcise evil spirits.

attacks.name: Illuminator (裏飯綱, Ura Izuna, lit. "Reverse Izuna")
attacks.description: Attacks the opponent with the kuda-gitsune carried on its waist.

attacks.name: Taizoukai Mandala (胎蔵界曼荼羅, Taizoukai Mandara, lit. "Womb Realm Mandala")
attacks.description: Spreads a purifying barrier with the Shakujou that exorcises evil spirits.

attacks.name: Unchi Paradise (ウンチパラダイス, Unchi Paradise lit. "Poop Paradise")
attacks.description: Showers all zones in poop, lowering Attack.

attacks.name: Hyper Giga Smell
attacks.description: Excretes an extremely bad odor in three zones, lowering Defense.

attacks.name: Nume Squall
attacks.description: Rains down on three zones, lowering Speed.

Kyaromon.name: Kyaromon
Kyaromon.description: Kyaromon is a Lesser Digimon. It is an elastic Digimon that bounces from one interest to another. It vigorously grew a tail. As it is brimming with curiosity, it takes an interest in anything, and has a habit of rushing for whatever caught its interest. The inside of its body has become mostly empty, and its tail is elastic like a rubber ball.

attacks.name: Shippo Swing (しっぽスイング, Shippo Swing lit. "Tail Swing")
attacks.description: Puts its strength into its tail and strikes with enough force to blow away even a Rookie Digimon.

Kyokyomon.name: Kyokyomon
Kyokyomon.description: Kyokyomon is a Lesser Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. Its body has grown long, and if it gets angry, it can stretch up to nearly nine times its normal length to attack the opponent. However, because it only extends forward, the opponent usually avoids this completely. It has a light body like Fufumon, and floats lightly through the air, but it is able to move relatively nimbly by paddling the air with its hands and feet.

attacks.name: Metal Straw
attacks.description: Stretches itself out and then fires an iron spike from its mouth.

Kyubimon.name: Kyubimon
Kyubimon.description: Kyubimon is a Mythical Animal Digimon. It is a Digimon in the shape of a giant fox with nine tails. It is feared as a harbinger of destruction and decay, but in ancient times, it was revered as an emissary of peace. Renamon with particularly high abilities and a lot of experience Digivolve into Kyubimon. It lacks attack power, but it possesses a powerful will force and is proficient in spellcraft. Its said to gallop across the heavens using limbs coated in blue flames.

attacks.name: Dragon Wheel (狐炎龍, Koenryū, lit. "Fox Flame Dragon") Creates a burning dragon out of blue flames from its tails and then incinerates the enemy.
Fox Tail Inferno (鬼火玉, Onibidama, lit. "Will-o'-the-wisp Ball")
attacks.description: Causing onibi to manifest, and manipulates them according to its will.

attacks.name: Headbutt (頭突き, Zutsuki)
attacks.description: Charges and attacks with the head.

attacks.name: Koshugeki (狐襲撃, Koshūgeki, lit. "Fox Attack")
attacks.description: Uses the power of a will o' wisp to quickly tackle its enemy.

attacks.name: Kodengeki (孤電撃, Kodengeki lit. "Fox Electric Attack")
attacks.description: Attacks with an electrifying headbutt.

attacks.name: Tengu (天狗, Amatsu-kitsune)
attacks.description: Emits a high pitched scream and summons a spirit on the enemy.

attacks.name: Touhakken
attacks.description: Shrouds its paws in ghostly flames, then delivers a powerful kick.

Kyubimon (Silver).name: Kyubimon (Silver)

otherNames.name: 九尾狐獸/九尾狐兽 Jiǔ wěi hú shòu

Kyubimon (Silver).description: Kyubimon (Silver) is a Bewitching Beast Digimon. It is a subspecies of Kyubimon with silver fur. Not as bright, but faster than Kyubimon. It is a witchcraft-using Virus Hunter clad in crimson flames.

attacks.name: Koenryū (狐炎龍, Koenryū lit. "Fox Flame Dragon")
attacks.description: She starts to spin very fast, which causes the flames on her body to erupt into a fiery inferno. This turns her body into a ball of swirling blue fire. When in this state, she summons a mystical dragon, which emerges from her body to destroy her enemies.

attacks.name: Fox Tail Inferno (鬼火玉, Onibidama, lit. "Will-o'-the-wisp Ball")
attacks.description: The blue flames on her tails become brighter, and ghostly faces appear on them. The faces then become small fireballs which she launches at her opponents to destroy them in an explosion of energy as well as trap them in a cage of blue flames which singes them.

Kyukimon.name: Kyukimon
Kyukimon.description: Kyukimon is a Mysterious Beast Digimon. It is a Digimon with an appearance resembling the "Kamaitachi", a legendary yōkai. The hairs that cover it from head to toe indiscriminately tear anything in their surroundings to pieces with their sharp edges, so it is definitely a deadly weapon-like bladed beast. Its speed is fast, and it tears the whole body to pieces while raising a whirlwind.

attacks.name: Blade Twister
attacks.description: Creates a tornado around the enemy, and minces them with a vacuum blade.

attacks.name: Sanrensei (三連星, Sanrensei)
attacks.description: Shoots diamond-shaped seals from its brow.

Kyupimon.name: Kyupimon
Kyupimon.description: Kyupimon is a Mini Angel Digimon. It digivolved from Puttimon. Unlike its time as Puttimon, it likes good deeds, and loves making everyone happy. Particularly, it is called the "Angel of Charity", and its specialty is bringing about feelings of "Love" in every person. It is always flying about in the air of the Digital World, sprinkling love on everyone while making them feel happy. It is said that if even a large Digimon with a mass of fighting spirit comes across Kyupimon, it will cease battling.

attacks.name: Angel Ring
attacks.description: Generates a ring of light from the protuberance on its calvaria and throws it at the opponent.

title: Angel of Charity
(博愛の天使
Hakuai no Tenshi?)

Labramon.name: Labramon
Labramon.description: Labramon is a Beast Digimon. It has an appearance like a real dog. It is said that the Rookie-level is the final form of artificial Digimon, and although the prevailing view says that it won't digivolve further than this, there exist unconfirmed reports of it having digivolved further than that, too. Perhaps, some sort of miracle might stimulate a Digivolution in Labramon. It is exceedingly faithful to its Tamer, and feels called to protect them.

attacks.name: Cure Liquor (Cure Liqueur)
attacks.description: Restores and optimizes the data of weakened Digimon.

attacks.name: Retrieving (Retriever-bark)
attacks.description: Generates a hyper-oscillation with a powerful bark.

LadyDevimon.name: LadyDevimon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Ai Nagano(Adventure/02/New Century),Kazue Ikara(Xros Wars, Commander),Miho Saiki(Xros Wars, LadyDevimon A),Yuka Saito(Xros Wars, LadyDevimon B)
LadyDevimon.description: LadyDevimon is an Evil Digimon. It is a feminine fallen angel Digimon of noble presence. Because of its strength, due to the incomparable purity of its Dark Side Power, it is said that the limits on its spread and growth on personal computers is "0".

attacks.name: Darkness Wave
attacks.description: Releases countless creatures of darkness similar to bats which burn the opponent to cinders.

attacks.name: Darkness Wave (Poison, Fra: "Poison")
attacks.description: Sprays poison smoke on the opponent, which uses Dark Energy to reverse the phase of their own powers and obliterate them from within. This technique is more complete the more powerful the opponent is.

attacks.name: Black Wing (Darkness Spear)
attacks.description: Transforms its left hand into a long sharp spike and impales the opponent.

attacks.name: Slap (ビンタ, Binta)
attacks.description: Hits the opponent with strong slaps while wearing a bizarre smile.

attacks.name: Stun Whip
attacks.description: Shocks the opponent with an electric shock.

LadyDevimon X.name: LadyDevimon X
LadyDevimon X.description: LadyDevimon X is a Fallen Angel Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It created the familiar "Volée" (Fra: Flying), who always acts cautiously around it from behind, causing those who it glares at to be instantly paralyzed, and the extended armament "Zerdrücken" (Deu: Crush), which traces the movements of its left arm, from its dark energy, which has been amplified because of the X-Antibody.

attacks.name: Ende Brechen (Deu: End Break)
attacks.description: Zerdrücken crushes the enemy's Digicore directly.

attacks.name: Gräme (Deu: Grieve)
attacks.description: Destroys the enemy's body from within using its chain.

Lalamon.name: Lalamon
Lalamon.description: Lalamon is a Plant Digimon. It has an appearance like a flower bud. It spins the leaf on its head to fly unsteadily, and is expressionless but charming.

attacks.name: Seed Blast (Nuts Shoot)
attacks.description: Fires solid nuts from its mouth with surprisingly accurate aim.

attacks.name: Lala Spiral (Lala Screw)
attacks.description: Spins its leaf with all its might to assault the opponent.

attacks.name: Sing a Song
attacks.description: Puts the opponent to sleep with a pleasant song.

attacks.name: Nuts Gun
attacks.description: Fires tree nuts forcefully from its mouth.

attacks.name: Nuts Bazooka
attacks.description: Fires tree nuts even more forcefully from its mouth.

attacks.name: Nuts Explosion
attacks.description: Fires exploding seeds from its head.

attacks.name: Petite Tackle (Petit Tackle)
attacks.description: Tackles with its small body.

Lamortmon.name: Lamortmon
Lamortmon.description: Lamortmon is a Beast Digimon. It is an Ultimate Digimon whose hidden feral instincts have been set free. Lamortmon will immediately throw itself upon any Digimon that reacts negatively towards it and smash it repeatedly until it stops breathing. It is a very intuitive Digimon that cannot control its impulses, but there are some Lamortmon who are ashamed of and despise their own nature. The more Lamortmon unleashes its wild nature, the stronger and sharper the vacuum blades of the two giant swords "Storm Beast" (獣嵐丸, Jūran-maru) worn on its waist become. Calming down a rampaging Lamortmon is impossible unless one has already built up a great deal of trust with them.

attacks.name: Calamity Claws (禍災爪, Kaisaisō)
attacks.description: Slices open the enemy's belly.

attacks.name: Strike and Destroy (叩破伐倒, Kōhabattō, lit. "Knock Down")
attacks.description: Brings down its two giant swords with their full might to crush the opposition.

attacks.name: Wind Fangs (風牙烈巻迅, Fūga Rekkanjin, lit. "Wind Fang Intense Whirling Swiftness")
attacks.description: Unleashes vacuum blades from its giant swords.

attacks.name: Great Grudge Killer (豪怨毀永斬, Gōon Kieizan, lit. "Great Grudge Destructive Eternal Beheading")
attacks.description: Replaces all of its reason with pure ferocity and uses its giant swords to render the enemy in two. This is its most destructive technique, as it both slices the enemy and smashes them into pieces at the same time.

Lampmon.name: Lampmon
Lampmon.description: Lampmon is a Wizard Digimon. It appears from a magic lamp when it is summoned by someone. As it is the possessor of powerful magical abilities, it is not only able to alter its size and shape into an ever-changing appearance, but it can also produce palaces and vast treasures of gold and silver. Basically, it is usually sealed within the lamp, and the person who releases it will have their wishes granted. However, while it is sealed, its personality is distorted, and it can become a dangerous being that will attack the one who releases it.

attacks.name: Phantom Turban
attacks.description: Manipulates the turban wound around its head into ever-changing shapes in order to attack the opponent.

Lavogaritamon.name: Lavogaritamon
Lavogaritamon.description: Lavogaritamon is a Rock Dragon Digimon. It has large wings that lift even its heavy body effortlessly into the air, and well-trained leg strength that allows it to stand imposingly. It dwells in the magma beds of active volcanoes around the Digital World, and it is theorized that it may live nearby Volcdramon. Its fighting style is scattering mineral dust, covering the enemy with it, and causing it to explode by freely manipulating its ignition point. If the enemy moves, it will result in ignition, so once they are covered in mineral dust, they will drown in terror when the dust explodes.

attacks.name: Melding Blaze (Merudainā)
attacks.description: Fires a laser-shaped heat ray from its mouth.

attacks.name: Wild Blast
attacks.description: Scatters mineral dust by flapping its wings and causes an explosion.

Lavorvomon.name: Lavorvomon
Lavorvomon.description: Lavorvomon is a Rock Dragon Digimon. It is a Digimon whose entire body is made out of lava, and spouts mineral dust as it goes about its activities. It is poor at flying despite having wings, so it mainly moves about by crawling on the ground. Contrary to its sluggish appearance, its crawling speed is extremely fast, and it closes in on the enemy in an instant. Although it has a friendly personality and will let those it trusts near it without any reservations, others tend to stay as far away as they can from it out of fear that the flammable mineral dust it spouts may cause an explosion.

attacks.name: Mighty Flame (Great Flame)
attacks.description: Takes a deep breath and spits out the largest fireball it can make.

attacks.name: Earth Stamp
attacks.description: Uses its forearms to lunge at and slam onto the opponent.

Laylamon Combined.name: Laylamon Combined

otherNames.name: 合体リリスモン Fused Lilithmon

Laylamon Combined.description: Laylamon Combined is the DigiFuse of Lilithmon, Blastmon and three Vilemon.

attacks.name: Spin Cycle
attacks.description: Rapidly spins its Blastmon flail into an impenetrable tornado of strikes.

attacks.name: Flame Spires
attacks.description: Manipulates and attacks with flames.

Leafmon.name: Leafmon
Leafmon.description: Leafmon is a Slime Digimon. It has a breath of fresh greens (a tiny leaf) for its tail portion. It has many of the elements of a plant and the composition of its body includes chlorophyll, so it photosynthesizes to grow. It possesses a leaf-shaped tail, and the leaf protects it from intense sunlight or when it is raining. Due to its pure nature, it doesn't distrust others even if they are frightening. However, it is just a little bit shy. As it was just born, it is unable to battle, but its innocent spirit, overflowing with vitality, can make the surrounding people remember pure feelings that were forgotten, wrapping them in a calm air. However, if one tries to mess with it too much, it will spit acidic bubbles to intimidate them.

attacks.name: Acid Bubbles (酸性の泡, Sansei no Awa, lit. "Acidic Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acidic bubbles from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

Lekismon.name: Lekismon
Lekismon.description: Lekismon is a Beast Man Digimon. It is a Digimon that has gained astounding jumping ability, and uses its swift movements to toy with its enemies. Although its personality is as wavering as the phases of the moon, its appearance exudes a somewhat mystical air. It also displays great strength with its "Moon Night Kick".

attacks.name: Moon Night Bomb
attacks.description: Creates hypnotic water bubbles from the "Moon Gloves" worn on its hands, and throws them to lull the enemy to sleep.

attacks.name: Tear Arrow
attacks.description: Pulls beautiful arrows of ice from the protrusions on its back and fires them.

attacks.name: Moon Night Kick
attacks.description: Leaps high into the air and performs a diving kick.

Leomon.name: Leomon
Leomon.description: Leomon is an Animal Digimon. It is called the "King of Beasts", as well as the "Noble Hero". While most Digimon are ferocious, it possesses a strong will and a heart of justice, and has defeated a great number of fiendish Digimon. Also, it is a rival to the "Digimon Hunter" Ogremon, who runs the whole gamut of destruction. Its tough flesh, tempered well by daily training, can endure any attack, and since it chokes the life out of the opponent with its quick attacks, Leomon can be said to be an outstanding Combat Species. It carries a sentient magical sword called "Beast Sword" (獅子王丸, Shishiou-maru, lit. "Lion King") on its waist. Also, it is matchless friends with Garudamon, who possesses the same will. Cyclonemon's right eye was crushed by Leomon.

attacks.name: Fist of the Beast King (獣王拳, Jūouken, lit. "Beast-King Fist")
attacks.description: Chokes the life out of the opponent with its ultimate mystery, by launching an aura in the shape of a lion's head from its fist.

attacks.name: Lion Sword (獅子王丸, Shishiou-maru, lit. "Lion King")
attacks.description: Multiple attack with the Lion Sword.

attacks.name: Smashing Kick (破砕蹴り, Hasaigeri, lit. "Crushing Kick")
attacks.description: A powerful heel attack.

attacks.name: Hyakujūken (百獣拳, Hyakujūken lit. "Hundred Beasts Fist")
attacks.description: Launches multiple "Fist of the Beast King".

attacks.name: Shockwave (獣王破, Jūouha, lit. "Beast King Destruction")
attacks.description: Attacks with a blast of energy from the hand.

attacks.name: The King of Fists (獅子獣波斬, Shishi Jūhazan, lit. "Lion Beast Wave Slash")
Shin Jūouken (真獣王拳, lit. "True Beast-King Fist")
attacks.description: Launches an aura in the shape of a lion's head from its other fist.

title: King of Beasts
(百獣の王
Hyakujuu no Ou?)
Noble Hero
(気高き勇者
Kedakaki Yuusha?)

Leomon X.name: Leomon X
Leomon X.description: Leomon X an Animal Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It wields the sword "Jūga-maru" (獣牙丸, "Jūga-maru" lit. "Beast Fang"). It is said that its red mantle comes from Gallantmon from before acquiring the X-Antibody. In order to defeat more fiendish Digimon to enforce its justice, it has mastered fencing through intense training in addition to physical training. It freely wields its longsword Jūga-maru and its magical sword Shishiou-maru (獅子王丸, Shishiou-maru lit. "Lion King") which are said to have increased in sharpness due to its countless battles, by dual wielding them, so it is definitely a "Beast Gladiator". Since its red mantle was obtained when it confronted a Gallantmon, it is said to be the proof of a hero.

attacks.name: Fist of the Beast King (獣王拳, Jūouken, lit. "Beast-King Fist")
attacks.description: Chokes the life out of the opponent with its ultimate mystery, by launching an aura in the shape of a lion's head from its fist.

title: Beast Gladiator

Leopardmon.name: Leopardmon
Leopardmon.description: Leopardmon is a Holy Knight Digimon. It is acknowledged even by the other Royal Knights as their foremost strategist. It has the invaluable ability to lead the Royal Knights, who each possess a dogma that they believe in. Its own motto is "Justice equals power". When it goes into personal combat, it changes into "Leopard Mode" and races across the battlefield. It wields the "Sword of Annihilation" (消滅の剣, Shoumetsu no Tsurugi) beam sword and "Sword of Destruction" (破壊の剣, Hakai no Tsurugi).

attacks.name: Extinction Wave (Aussterben, Deu: Extinction)
attacks.description: Swings the Sword of Annihilation downward in an overhead arc.

attacks.name: Black Aura Blast (Ernste Welle, Deu: Gravity Wave)
attacks.description: Fires explosive energy with the Sword of Destruction.

attacks.name: Leopard Mode
attacks.description: Slashes in the form of a beast.

Leopardmon Leopard Mode.name: Leopardmon Leopard Mode
Leopardmon Leopard Mode.description: Leopardmon Leopard Mode is a Holy Knight Digimon. When Leopardmon goes into personal combat, it changes into "Leopard Mode" and races across the battlefield.

attacks.name: Vulcan Crusher (Wolkenkratzer, Deu: Skyscraper)
attacks.description: Causes towering pillars of bedrock to appear from the ground, tossing the opponent.

attacks.name: Aerial Barrage (Blockade, Deu: Blockade)
attacks.description: Runs across the land and flies through the sky, tearing the opponent apart from every angle.

attacks.name: Eroberung (Deu: Conquest)
attacks.description: Generates globe-shaped energy mines from the spherical tip of its tail, which it uses to strategically encircle the opponent.

Leopardmon X.name: Leopardmon X
Leopardmon X.description: Leopardmon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The Chrome Digizoid armor covering its body has converted into the highly elastic "Brown Digizoid", enhancing Leopardmon's flexible movement tremendously. Even if it suffers attacks from all directions simultaneously, it will completely evade them by means of its excellent taijutsu.

attacks.name: Black Aura Blast (Ernste Welle, Deu: Gravity Wave)
attacks.description: Fires explosive energy with the Sword of Destruction.

attacks.name: Extinction Wave (Aussterben, Deu: Extinction)
attacks.description: Swings the Sword of Annihilation downward in an overhead arc.

attacks.name: Braun Nebel (Deu
attacks.description: Brown Fog)

attacks.name: Eine Billion (Deu: One Trillion)
attacks.description: A trillion stabs in 1 second to extinct the opponent.

title: Tactician of Power and Intelligence

Leviamon.name: Leviamon
Leviamon.description: Leviamon is an Evil King Digimon. It is one of the "Seven Great Demon Lords", representing Mercury and the sin of Envy. The strongest monster existing in the Digital World, it is called the "Devil Beast" out of terror of the exceedingly mighty power that this monster possesses. This extensive monster, said to possess gigantic jaws which could guzzle down even the Digital World, is reported to sleep in the depths of the Net Ocean nearest to the Dark Area, and if it is awakened, it will despise any Digimon at the top, and will flee even Angel Digimon, much less other Demon Lord Digimon. However, as the existence of the limits on Digimon are decoded, its own appears similar to nothingness, and it is said that it builds the foundation for the existence of wickedness in the Digital World.

attacks.name: Shell Shock (Rostrum, Lat: Snout)
attacks.description: Destroys everything with its gigantic jaws.

attacks.name: Tail Strike (Cauda, Lat: Tail)
attacks.description: Mows everything down with its long tails.

attacks.name: Thunder Breath (Anima, Lat: Breath)
attacks.description: Breathes fire along with a roaring sound.

attacks.name: Duo-Tail Strike (Duo Cauda, Lat: Two Tails)
attacks.description: Uses its forked tail to take down the opponent.

title: Abyss of Despair
(絶望の深淵
Zetsubō no Shinen?)
Devil Beast
(悪魔獣
Akuma-Jū?)

Leviamon X.name: Leviamon X
Leviamon X.description: Leviamon X is a Demon Lord Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Wing-arms grow from its back, and it gained the ability to fly by spurting out excess energy. Land, sea, and air have become feeding grounds for Leviamon where it will try to devour everything.

attacks.name: Biting Crush (Rostrum, Lat: Snout)
attacks.description: Destroys everything with its gigantic jaws.

attacks.name: Tail Strike (Cauda, Lat: Tail)
attacks.description: Mows everything down with its long tails.

attacks.name: Biting Crush Triadens (Deu: Biting Crush Triads) (Rostrum Tridens, Lat
attacks.description: Three-pronged Snout) Crunches the enemy with its three split jaws.

attacks.name: Tail Strike Mortifera (Lat: Deadly Tail Strike) (Cauda Mortifera, Lat: Deadly Tail)
attacks.description: Skewers the enemy with its tentacle-shaped tails all at once.

attacks.name: Seventh Lightning
attacks.description: When the envy energy contained within Leviamon reaches its peak and the Crown of Envy shines, it unleashes extremely intense lightning from its three horns, which is said to sink continents into the ocean.

Liamon.name: Liamon
Liamon.description: Liamon is a Holy Beast Digimon. It exudes the style of a "King", even though it is only a Champion. It is said to be a Digimon that digivolved from Liollmon, but there are even fewer surviving individuals than those of Liollmon, so its existence is becoming an "illusion". It tends to prefer capturing prey that is stronger than itself, and it has often been observed commencing an attack against an Ultimate Digimon without even flinching.

attacks.name: Thunder of King
attacks.description: Charges and then releases electricity generated in its mane.

attacks.name: Critical Strike
attacks.description: Reliably aims at the opponent's vitals with its fangs.

Lianpumon.name: Lianpumon
Lianpumon.description: Lianpumon is a Mutant Digimon. It wears a distinctive mask. It has a cheerful personality and loves the lively atmosphere of temple festivals, and will keep changing various masks to try to liven up the mood. The moment a mask is removed, another mask will immediately emerge from beneath, so no one has seen its true face behind the mask. In addition, Lianpumon hardly ever speaks, but will use posture, gestures and changing masks to express its emotions instead of words. It is rumored that all of the masks made by Lianpumon resemble the appearance of Digimon with whom it is close, and are concealed within its cape. In battle, it will change masks to use various abilities and display specialized tactics.

attacks.name: Tiě Bì Xiāng (铁壁相 lit. "Iron Wall Phase")
attacks.description: Changes the mask its wearing, with this expressionless mask drastically raising its defensive power.

attacks.name: Xiànshēn Xiāng (献身相 lit. "Devotion Phase")
attacks.description: When an ally is injured, it puts on this mask which has a loving expression and can share its own data with its companions to quickly heal the wounds it touches.

attacks.name: Jiǔ Zhǒng Jiǔ Miàn Jī (九种九面击 lit. "Nine kinds of nine-faced strikes")
attacks.description: Throws masks at the enemy.

Lilamon.name: Lilamon
Lilamon.description: Lilamon is a Fairy Digimon. It has an appearance like the lilac, a flower that is loved by everyone. It is pure and innocent, and despite its beautiful appearance, it is said to govern over death and rebirth. Its leaves are toxic, and are enough to bring death to the opponent.

attacks.name: Lila Shower
attacks.description: Fires countless slender beams from its leaf-like fingers.

attacks.name: Beauty Slap
attacks.description: Continuously slaps the opponent with its extensible hands, causing it to instantly fall in love with Lilamon.

attacks.name: Pollen Spray  (Un Deux Pollen, Fra: "One Two Pollen")
attacks.description: Dances gracefully, scattering lovely-smelling pollen to bewitch the opponent.

attacks.name: Marvel Shot
attacks.description: Discharges iridescent energy spheres from the flowers on both of its arms.

attacks.name: Lilac Dagger
attacks.description: Brings the opponent down using an energy-based blade generated in its hand.

attacks.name: Lila Needle
attacks.description: Fires a single beam from the tip of its hand.

attacks.name: Lovely Cologne
attacks.description: Charms the enemy with a sweet smell.

attacks.name: Beauty Shock
attacks.description: Emits an electric shock from its fingers.

Lilithmon.name: Lilithmon

otherNames.name: 莉莉絲獸 Lìlì sī shòu

Lilithmon.description: Lilithmonis an Evil King Digimon. With the appearance of a woman, it is one of the "Seven Great Demon Lords", representing theMoonand the sin ofLust. It is thought that it was originally anOphanimon, but it fell from heaven and eventually became known as the "Goddess of Darkness". It confounds its opponents with its bewitchingly lovely appearance, and it is said that those who are taken in by its temptations are invariably granted death. Its reputation as the "Goddess of Darkness" is appropriate, as it offers generosity towards vice, but only cruel outrages towards virtue. The demonic "Mystic Claw" (NazarNail) on its right arm corrodes everything it touches.

attacks.name: Phantom Pain
attacks.description: Rots the opponent's body with a sigh of darkness, causing their data to dissipate from the tips of their bodies, and to suffer pain even in death.

attacks.name: Razor Nails (Nazar Nail)
attacks.description: Corrodes anything it touches with the Mystic Claw.

attacks.name: Darkness Love
attacks.description: Disrupts the opponent's mind with a lustful aura.

attacks.name: Evil Sigh
attacks.description: Blows an evil sigh upon the opponent.

attacks.name: Empress Emblaze
attacks.description: Summons an eldritch, hand-shaped monstrosity which annihilates the opponent.

title: Goddess of Darkness
(暗黒の女神
Ankoku no Megami?)

Lilithmon X.name: Lilithmon X
debut: Digimon Chronicle X, "The Opened Gate of Darkness" [07]
Lilithmon X.description: Lilithmon X is a Demon Lord Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Having X-evolved because of its obsession for beauty, Lilithmon obtained a youthful, bewitching body. It is said that its appearance captivates everyone who sees it, instantly turning them into its puppets. Upon acquiring ultimate beauty, Lilithmon became a luscious, baleful goddess of death due to its tolerant broad-mindedness.

attacks.name: Nazar Nail
attacks.description: Corrodes everything it touches.

attacks.name: Phantom Pain
attacks.description: Rots the opponent's body with a sigh of darkness. It is said that if one is struck by this curse, their data dissipates from the tips of their body and they suffer pain even in death.

attacks.name: Seventh Fascination (Seventh Fascinate)
attacks.description: Draws out power from the Crown of Lust to control others over a vast range. Digimon that have turned into its puppets have power drawn out beyond their limits, leading to their death after being controlled. Lilithmon itself watches with pleasure as their lights shine and fade away in their last moments.

Lillymon.name: Lillymon
Lillymon.description: Lillymonis a Fairy Digimon. It was born from beautifully blooming flower petals, and as a Plant Digimon, it gets along withFanBeemon.Although it looks like it has an appearance like a human child, it is an Ultimate Digimon hiding unfathomable power within. Due to its whimsical, tomboyish personality, it is said that it will open its heart to ahumangirl with a similar temperament. Also, because it becomes unable to settle down if it starts crying like a crybaby, a great effort is necessary to win it over. However, it also has an aspect that kindly extends its hand to small or weak things. It can fly in the air with the four leaf-like wings growing from its back, and it is said that after Lillymon flies by, a fresh breeze will blow.

attacks.name: Flower Cannon (Flow' Cannon)
attacks.description: Thrusts both of its arms forward, makes a gun muzzle from the petals on its wrists, and fires an energy shell.

attacks.name: Flower Wreath (花の首飾り, Hana no Kubikazari)
attacks.description: Zips around an enemy and ties them up with a rope of vines and flowers. This attack can counteract digital viruses and make certain Digimon obey its command.

attacks.name: Temptation
attacks.description: Absorbs the enemy's energy with a red aura.

attacks.name: Vicious Vine (Fairy Vine)
attacks.description: Stabs an enemy with a vine from the hand, which then sprouts thorns.

attacks.name: Flower Cutter
attacks.description: Kicks up in the air, with sharp flowers trailing its foot.

attacks.name: Vicious Vine (Green Trap)
attacks.description: Spins around releasing flowers and pollen that can paralyze enemies.

attacks.name: Triple Jump
attacks.description: Jumps multiple times back to back in mid-air.

attacks.name: Sun-Crescent Kick (Sun Crescent Kick)
attacks.description: Charges its body with solar energy, then kicks outwards, leaving a trail of yellow light and flowers behind.

attacks.name: Sunburst Vine
attacks.description: Long-reaching thorns quickly protrude around Lilimon's body, stabbing enemies.

attacks.name: Dual Hand Flower Paddle Bomb
attacks.description: Transforms both its hands into flower guns and shoots the opponent with explosive powder.

Lillymon X.name: Lillymon X
Lillymon X.description: Lillymon X is a Fairy Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. During direct confrontation with Lillymon, the enemy Digimon will be greeted lightheartedly regardless of how horrible they are; even if they threaten it, they will be lightly dismissed. However, it occasionally ignores them, and it is said that those ignored Digimon are the ones surprised instead. Its whimsical, tomboyish personality has been accelerated, and although it does not look scary, it has in a sense become the strongest Digimon around. It beautifully adorns itself with a tiara and ribbons because it knows it can be the best of itself, but when it starts crying, it indiscriminately unleashes its "Sleepy Bud".

attacks.name: Flower Cannon (Flow' Cannon)
attacks.description: Thrusts both of its arms forward, making a gun muzzle from the petals on its wrists, and shoots an energy shell.

attacks.name: Sleepy Bud
attacks.description: Kicks frantically with both legs while throwing a tantrum, absolutely powering up its selfishness as well.

Liollmon.name: Liollmon
Liollmon.description: Liollmon is a Holy Beast Digimon. It has a golden coat. There seems to be very few surviving individuals, so its existence was not confirmed until recently. It is a Digimon with very intense territoriality, so it doesn't show mercy to those who enter its territory, even if they are the same species of Digimon. When it is on alert, the hair on its head becomes tinged with static electricity, and it is said that it produces a sound when threatened.

attacks.name: Lio Claw
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with its sharp claws.

attacks.name: Critical Bite
attacks.description: Aims at the opponent's vitals with its fangs. This attack has the power to take down a Champion Digimon with a single blow, but its success rate is low.

LoaderLiomon.name: LoaderLiomon
LoaderLiomon.description: LoaderLiomon is a Machine Digimon. It was produced when CAD data for construction machinery leaked onto its server, then fused with the configuration data of a Beast Digimon. Its mane has become a pneumatic drill, and it works primarily in tunnel construction and in the Chrome Digizoid mines. The Chrome Digizoid mines are often surrounded by a solid layer of bedrock, so it boasts both power and stamina, as well as top-class performance among Machine Digimon. There are many LoaderLiomon with a stubborn personality due to their pride in their work, but there are many people with the viewpoint that states, "LoaderLiomon is just quarrelsome." It seems that one mine, which had the best deposits in the world, was blown away by a fight between LoaderLiomon.

attacks.name: Boring Storm
attacks.description: Produces an attack through the extremely high-speed rotation of its mane.

attacks.name: Loader Morningstar
attacks.description: Strikes with the iron sphere on its tail.

Lobomon.name: Lobomon
Lobomon.description: Lobomon is a Warrior Digimon. It possesses power over Light which bears the might of AncientGarurumon. The lavender parts all over its body are Saint Amethyst, in which holy light is contained. Due to the holy light, the amethyst retains its extraordinary hardness as long as it keeps its righteous spirit, but the second a negative spirit arises in the possessor, it becomes brittle. It is the possessor of a chivalrous spirit that puts its life on the line for the things it believes in, and hates injustice. Because Lobomon is taciturn and doesn't really like to concern itself with others, it often has the impression of being cold and unfeeling, but it is actually a kind-hearted warrior. It wields the "Licht Schwert" (Deu: Light Sword) light swords.

attacks.name:
Lobo Kendo (Licht Sieger, Deu: Light Victor): Splits the opponent in two with the Licht Schwert.
Licht Sieger α (Deu: Light Victor α): Performs a slash with the Licht Schwert.
Licht Sieger β (Deu: Light Victor β): Performs a slash with the Licht Schwert.
Licht Sieger γ (Deu
attacks.description: Light Victor γ)

attacks.name: Licht Sieger α (Deu: Light Victor α)
attacks.description: Performs a slash with the Licht Schwert.

attacks.name: Licht Sieger β (Deu: Light Victor β)
attacks.description: Performs a slash with the Licht Schwert.

attacks.name: Licht Sieger γ (Deu
attacks.description: Light Victor γ)

attacks.name: Zwei Sieger (Deu: Two Victors)
attacks.description: Connects the two Licht Schwert and then cuts the opponent into many pieces.

attacks.name:
Howling Laser (Licht Kugel, Deu: Light Ball): Gathers energy to the weapon on its left wrist, and releases it in a burst of light energy.
Instensiv Licht Kugel (Deu: Intense Light Ball): Gathers energy to the weapon on its left wrist, and releases it in a large burst of light energy.
Luft Licht Kugel (Deu: Air Light Ball): Gathers energy to the weapon on its left wrist while in the air, and releases it in a burst of light energy.
Luft Instensiv Licht Kugel (Deu: Air Intense Light Ball)
attacks.description: Gathers energy to the weapon on its left wrist while in the air, and releases it in a large burst of light energy.

attacks.name: Instensiv Licht Kugel (Deu: Intense Light Ball)
attacks.description: Gathers energy to the weapon on its left wrist, and releases it in a large burst of light energy.

attacks.name: Luft Licht Kugel (Deu: Air Light Ball)
attacks.description: Gathers energy to the weapon on its left wrist while in the air, and releases it in a burst of light energy.

attacks.name: Luft Instensiv Licht Kugel (Deu: Air Intense Light Ball)
attacks.description: Gathers energy to the weapon on its left wrist while in the air, and releases it in a large burst of light energy.

attacks.name:
Strahl (Deu: Ray)
Drehung Strahl (Deu: Rotating Ray)
attacks.description: Connects the two Licht Schwert and rises while inside a tornado.

attacks.name: Drehung Strahl (Deu: Rotating Ray)
attacks.description: Connects the two Licht Schwert and rises while inside a tornado.

attacks.name: Luft Erschlagen (Deu: Aerial Slaying)
attacks.description: Performs a downward slash while in the air.

attacks.name: Licht Kleiden (Deu: Light Clothing)
attacks.description: Charges with wreathed in light energy before finishing with a slash.

attacks.name: Himmelfahrt (Deu: Ascension)
attacks.description: Connects the two Licht Schwert and then performs a rising slash.

attacks.name:
Laufen Meteor (Deu: Running Meteor): Performs a jump, followed by a diving kick, and then a crouching slash.
Luft Laufen Meteor (Deu: Air Running Meteor)
attacks.description: Performs a diving kick followed by a crouching slash.

attacks.name: Luft Laufen Meteor (Deu: Air Running Meteor)
attacks.description: Performs a diving kick followed by a crouching slash.

Locomon.name: Locomon
Locomon.description: Locomon is a Machine Digimon. It has the appearance of a steam locomotive, and its purpose in life is to keep running. It is a being which transports the data within the Network across the Digital World. Within the Digital World, where a large quantity of information comes and goes, the meaning of life for Locomon and other Vehicle-species Digimon is in how quickly they can convey that information. However, there are times when old models of Locomon have run completely wild as a result of seeking to go too quickly. Also, although its range of movement is confined because it can only run on rails, there are occasions when it has generated spacial distortions by continuously running in circles.

attacks.name: Steam Bomb
attacks.description: Uses bombs of the steam blowing from its smokestack.

attacks.name: Wheel Grinder
attacks.description: Spins and then throws its spiked wheels.

Loogamon.name: Loogamon
Loogamon.description: Loogamon is a Dark Beast Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It is presumed to be an experimental "Prototype Digimon" from before Digimon were discovered due to the old-fashioned interface on its forehead. It is said that the deepest part of its DigiCore contains data from the warg of real-world mythology, which can be seen in its capacity for rage beyond that of a typical Rookie. Those who are deceived by its puppylike appearance and approach it without proper caution may find themselves on the receiving end of a vicious attack. Loogamon recognizes those with the ability to control it as its master. Its loyalty is as hard to break as it is to obtain, making it a valuable companion.

attacks.name: Howling Fire
attacks.description: Shoots flame imbued with magical energy from its mouth.

attacks.name: Spiral Bite
attacks.description: Bites in a spinning formation using its sharp fangs.

Lopmon.name: Lopmon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Aoi Tada(Tamers/New Century),Rumi Shishido(Frontier),Chinami Nishimura(Xros Wars/Adventure:),Nanami Yamashita(ReArise),Naomi Ohzora(Survive)

otherNames.name: 黑大耳獸 hak daai ji sau
垂耳兔兽 chuí ěr tù shòu

Lopmon.description: Lopmon is an Animal Digimon. It is an extremely precious Rookie Digimon that is a twin to Terriermon. While Terriermon has only one horn growing from its head and has a calm but robust personality, Lopmon has three horns growing from its head and has the personality of a lonely crybaby. The way it grows is shrouded in mystery and though it can be classified as a Beast-species Digimon from its body structure, aside from that, it is still not understood. Neither of them seem like "Combat Species" Digimon, but when battling, they show that they are more powerful than they appear.

attacks.name: Tiny Twister (Petit Twister)
attacks.description: Generates a tiny tornado by spinning its ears like a propeller.

attacks.name:
Blazing Ice: Spits out shots of supercooled air.
Kūchū Blazing Ice (空中ブレイジングアイス, Kūchū Blazing Ice lit. "Aerial Blazing Ice")
attacks.description: Uses Blazing Ice in midair.

attacks.name: Kūchū Blazing Ice (空中ブレイジングアイス, Kūchū Blazing Ice lit. "Aerial Blazing Ice")
attacks.description: Uses Blazing Ice in midair.

attacks.name: Lop Punch
attacks.description: Slaps the enemy with one of its ears.

attacks.name: Lop Rush
attacks.description: Repeatedly slaps the enemy with its ears.

attacks.name: Dash Twister
attacks.description: Spins along the ground, slapping the foe.

attacks.name: Lop Balloon
attacks.description: Spreads its ears, enabling it to fall or glide slowly.

attacks.name: Spinning Slap (グルグルスラップ, Guruguru Slap, lit. "Spinning Slap")
attacks.description: Windmills its ears in midair to slap repeatedly.

attacks.name: Dark Twister
attacks.description: Attacks with a small typhoon of dark energy.

Lopmon X.name: Lopmon X
Lopmon X.description: Lopmon X is a Beast Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its ear hair and tail are lighter and more buoyant than air, so it can drift gently before the wind. Its "Chen Garnet" ear jewelry is linked to its twin, Terriermon X, which allows them to constantly know each other's status. It enjoys having aerial walks with the lovable Terriermon X most of all.

attacks.name: Terrier Tornado (Petit Twister)
attacks.description: Generates a tiny tornado by spinning its ears like a propeller.

attacks.name: Blazing Ice
attacks.description: Spits out shots of supercooled air.

Lotosmon.name: Lotosmon
Lotosmon.description: Lotosmon is a Fairy Digimon. It has an appearance like the lotus, which is said to be a flower that blooms in heaven. Its personality is lady-like in its calmness and grace, and it possesses the abilities of making people forget the suffering of this sad world and granting them good dreams. However, it will bring down its grand hammer on those that refuse that good will. In its left hand, it holds the Caduceus that administers restoration and devastation, and in its right hand, it holds a staff of rainbow-colored flowers.

attacks.name: Serpent Cure
attacks.description: Releases a white aura from the Caduceus.

attacks.name: Serpent Ruin
attacks.description: Releases a black aura from the Caduceus.

attacks.name: Seven's Fantasia
attacks.description: Releases a seven-colored aura from the staff of rainbow-colored flowers that tempts the opponent into a euphoric fantasy world and causes them to completely lose their fighting spirit.

LovelyAngemon.name: LovelyAngemon
debut: Digimon ReArise, "Illuminating Light: A Guide to the Rainbow" [2.12]
LovelyAngemon.description: LovelyAngemon is a Warrior Digimon. It is an angel that descended to Earth as well as a famous close combat specialist. It is always bright and cheerful, and adorns itself in a fashionable manner, and has a lovely personality that enjoys eating delicious things while walking about. However, LovelyAngemon contains the data of magical fighters who engage in hand-to-hand combat, and deals fiendish enemies that it can never forgive with a breath-taking combo of combat techniques. No matter what sort of crisis it is in, it will overcome any predicament with a heart that never gives up, and achieve victory at any cost.

attacks.name: Marble Impact
attacks.description: Puts all its strength into its fist and delivers a seven-colored punch.

attacks.name: Dream Hurricane
attacks.description: Jumps high into the sky and kicks while spinning.

attacks.name: Lovely Shower
attacks.description: Punches its fist and fires heart-shaped energy shots at the enemy that have the effect of purifying the enemy’s evil heart.

Loweemon.name: Loweemon
Loweemon.description: Loweemon is a Warrior Digimon. It truly inherited the "Human Spirit of Darkness" of AncientSphinxmon. The "Human Spirit of Darkness" was changed into its Duskmon form due to Cherubimon's spell, but Loweemon is its true form released from this magical power. This form is by no means a baleful one, and is called the battling "Valiant Jet-black Warrior" that becomes the shadow of the other Legendary Warriors. Even on its own, its power is comparable to "Fusion-species" like Aldamon, and it is said that it conceals its power that puts the others to shame within the "Neebelnge Ring" placed on its right index finger. As a master of spearmanship, it is an "Executor of Darkness" that pierces evil with the "Spear of Judgment" (断罪の槍, Danzai no Yari), and purifies it with the "Shield of Atonement" (贖罪の盾, Shokuzai no Tate).

attacks.name: Shadow Lance (Ewig Schlaf, Deu: "Eternal Sleep")
attacks.description: Blasts the opponent with an intense spear attack.

attacks.name:
Shadow Meteor (Endlich Meteor, Deu: "Finite Meteor"): Fires a golden energy wave from the lion on its chest.
Luft Endlich Meteor (Deu: "Air Finite Meteor"): Fires a golden energy wave from the lion on its chest in the air.
Intensiv Endlich Meteor (Deu: "Intense Finite Meteor"): Fires a more powerful golden energy wave from the lion on its chest.
Luft Intensiv Endlich Meteor (Deu: "Air Intense Finite Meteor")
attacks.description: Fires a more powerful golden energy wave from the lion on its chest in the air.

attacks.name: Luft Endlich Meteor (Deu: "Air Finite Meteor")
attacks.description: Fires a golden energy wave from the lion on its chest in the air.

attacks.name: Intensiv Endlich Meteor (Deu: "Intense Finite Meteor")
attacks.description: Fires a more powerful golden energy wave from the lion on its chest.

attacks.name: Luft Intensiv Endlich Meteor (Deu: "Air Intense Finite Meteor")
attacks.description: Fires a more powerful golden energy wave from the lion on its chest in the air.

attacks.name: Blitzen Speer (Deu: "Flash Spear")
attacks.description: Performs a quick lance attack.

attacks.name: Dunkel Schneiden (Deu: "Dark Slice")
attacks.description: Performs a triple thrust attack.

attacks.name: Dunkel Messer (Deu: "Dark Slice")
attacks.description: Performs a kick in the air.

attacks.name: Dunkel Rakete (Deu: "Dark Rocket")
attacks.description: Performs pole-vaulting kick.

attacks.name: Dunkel Sarg (Deu: "Dark Coffin")
attacks.description: Turns into dark energy and engulfs its opponent.

title: Valiant Jet-black Warrior
(勇敢なる漆黒の闘士
Yūkan'naru Shikkoku Toushi?)
Executor of Darkness
(闇の執行人
Yami no Shikkounin?)

Lucemon.name: Lucemon

otherNames.name: 光明兽 Guāngmíng shòu, Bright beast

Lucemon.description: Lucemonis an Angel Digimon. It has the appearance of a child, and is said to have descended to theancient Digital Worldlong ago. It manifested in an era in which the Digital World was still chaotic, and it is said that it brought about order and harmony. However, a long period of darkness was summoned due to Lucemon's later "Rebellion". Although it has the appearance of a child, the power and intelligence it possesses surpass even that of an Ultimate Digimon. It is said that Lucemon's abilities have now been inherited and split among theCelestial Digimon.

attacks.name: Grand Cross
attacks.description: Fires ten super-heated spheres of light arranged in a cruciform syzygy, a technique more powerful than Seraphimon's "Strike of the Seven Stars". Some media depict these spheres of lights as the Solar System.

attacks.name: Divine Feet (Divine Feat)
attacks.description: Creates a great sword or spear of light and with it pierces the enemy.

Lucemon Chaos Mode.name: Lucemon Chaos Mode
Lucemon Chaos Mode.description: Lucemon Chaos Mode is an Evil King Digimon. It is one of the "Seven Great Demon Lords", representing the Sun and the sin of Pride. It is the strongest of the group, and possesses both the divine and the diabolic. It instigated a rebellion in the far-flung past, and so it was sealed in the Dark Area along with many other Demon Lord Digimon. Its power exceeds that of Megas, and is said to rival that of the existence called "God" as well. It has a contradictory existence, in that one side of it loves all things, as God does, while the other is trying to destroy the whole world, as the Devil does. Hence, once it destroys this world, it intends to create a fresh new world. Daemon is plotting to secretly revive Lucemon Chaos Mode, who led the rebellion, and was the strongest among the Megas.

attacks.name: Paradise Lost Punch (Paradise Lost)
attacks.description: Launches the opponent high into the air with a wild dance of blows, then holds their limbs fixed as it drives them back into the ground.

attacks.name: Ultimate Sacrifice (Dead or Alive)
attacks.description: Produces a three-dimensional magic circle as a glowing orb of holiness and evilness and confines the opponent within, where it has a 50/50 chance of being either completely annihilated, or suffering great damage.

attacks.name: Terrible Dance
attacks.description: Attacks with a graceful roundhouse kick.

attacks.name: Deadly Roll
attacks.description: Attacks with a graceful roundhouse kick of magic.

attacks.name: Grand Cross
attacks.description: Fires ten super-heated spheres of light arranged in a cruciform syzygy, a technique more powerful than Seraphimon's "Strike of the Seven Stars".

title: Paradise of Loss
(消失の楽園
Shōshitsu no Rakuen?)
Ultra Digimon
(超究極体デジモン
Super-Ultimate Digimon?)

Lucemon Larva.name: Lucemon Larva
Lucemon Larva.description: Lucemon Larva is a Demon God Digimon. It is the true form of Lucemon and is said to be the epitome of its evil will. It possesses a will and is able to speak. It is minuscule, so it operates Lucemon Shadowlord Mode, who is no more than its shadow, while hiding within the orb of darkness that it carries, "Gehenna", which nullifies every attack and prevents it from reaching Lucemon Larva.

Lucemon Shadowlord Mode.name: Lucemon Shadowlord Mode

otherNames.name: 真・超魔王 True Super Demon Lord

Lucemon Shadowlord Mode.description: Lucemon Shadowlord Mode is a Demon God Digimon. Having the appearance of the dragon of Revelation, it is Lucemon's final form and the avatar of its evil. As was told in the Revelation, it carries the Crowns of the Seven Deadly Sins upon its head, and it holds the orb of darkness, "Gehenna", which absorbs all attacks. All attacks are nullified before the Gehenna, and it is said that the world will perish when Lucemon takes this form. However, it is no more than Lucemon's shadow, and its true form, Lucemon Larva, operates it while hiding within the Gehenna. Therefore, no matter how many times Shadowlord Mode is attacked, those attacks will not reach the true form, Lucemon Larva.

attacks.name: Tide of Despair (Purgatorial Flame)
attacks.description: Exhales a flame of destruction which purifies everything.

attacks.name: Nihilism Maelstrom (Divine Atonement)
attacks.description: Fires a light of annihilation from the seven Crowns.

attacks.name: Dimension Slasher
attacks.description: Attacks with sharp claws that can pierce dimensional walls.

attacks.name: Wrath of Darkness (Wrath of Satan)
attacks.description: Uses the orb, Gehenna, to emit a ray of destruction.

title: Dark Demon Dragon of the Apocalypse
(黙示録の暗黒魔竜
Mokushiroku no Ankoku Maryū?)
True Super Demon Lord
(真・超魔王
Ma Chō Maō?)

Lucemon X.name: Lucemon X
debut: Digimon Chronicle X, "The Opened Gate of Darkness" [07]
Lucemon X.description: Lucemon X is a Demon Lord Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Although it is a Demon Lord-type, the way in which its six pairs of golden wings shine is divine like that of an Angel-type. Not only does its appearance far surpass that of the old Lucemon, but also its power and intellect, and has sublimated into the perfect being that transcends even God. Having gained the ultimate wisdom and power to do absolutely anything at will, Lucemon reigns in the Digital World as an incarnation of destruction and creation.

attacks.name: Paradise Lost
attacks.description: A destructive technique where, after launching the opponent high into the sky with a wild dance of blows, it holds their limbs fixed as it drives them back into the ground.

attacks.name: Dead or Alive
attacks.description: Produces a three-dimensional magic circle as a glowing orb of holiness and evilness and confines the opponent within, where it has a 50/50 chance of being either completely annihilated, or suffering great damage.

attacks.name: Seventh Divine Cruz
attacks.description: Arranges ten super-heated spheres of light in a cruciform syzygy and fires its light of annihilation. Digimon that suffer and die from this technique are said to have their DigiCores absorbed into the Crown of Pride and transform into the flesh and blood of Lucemon.

attacks.name: Purgatorial Flame
attacks.description: Exhales a flame of destruction which purifies everything.

Ludomon.name: Ludomon
Ludomon.description: Ludomon is an Armor Digimon. It is one of the 'Legend-Arms', who are capable of transforming themselves into weapons. It is the only one among the 'Legend-Arms' capable of transforming itself into a shield. It wields sturdy, steel shields on its head and on both arms, protecting it from attacks coming from any direction. As a Digimon made with protection in mind, there have been records of it protecting areas being targeted by the D-Brigade. Ludomon is also able to exhibit its defensive abilities at their maximum strength while it is transformed into a shield.

attacks.name: Wall Rake
attacks.description: Uses the Wall Rake it wields on both arms to attack and defend.

Luminamon.name: Luminamon
debut: "Xros Songs!! To All Youths Who Chase their Dreams!!" [21]
Luminamon.description: Luminamonis a Fairy Digimon. It is a Digimon that shines the light of hope on humans and Digimon. It is said to possess a "Lightening Feel". However, Luminamon cannot be seen unless one has a pure heart, and because it has the ability to make itself vanish further from view, it is spoken of as aDigital Worldlegend. It does not possess attacks, so it escapes somewhere while they are dazzled by its "Lumina Flash".

attacks.name: Lightening Feel
attacks.description: Causes the immediate future of those who approach and touch it with a pure heart to shine brightly in any difficulty.

attacks.name: Lumina Flash
attacks.description: Flashes the lumens it has accumulated in the ring on its head.

Luminamon (Nene Version).name: Luminamon (Nene Version)
debut: "Xros Miracle!! Reel in a Sliver of Hope!!" [20]
Luminamon (Nene Version).description: InDigimon Xros Wars (manga), Luminamon (Nene Version)'s feathery shorts are replaced with two wingsvelabant pedes, and her wingvelabant faciemis removed.

Lunamon.name: Lunamon
Lunamon.description: Lunamon is a Mammal Digimon. It has an appearance like a rabbit, and was born from the fusion of moon-watching data. With its large ears, it is able to recognize sounds from any distance, and despite its timidity, it develops attachments easily and can't stand being alone.

attacks.name: Luna Claw
attacks.description: Scratches with claws that are lovely at first glance, but are filled with dark power.

attacks.name: Tear Shot
attacks.description: Concentrates power in its forehead antenna, then fires a beautiful water orb at the opponent.

attacks.name: Lop-ear Ripple
attacks.description: Twirls its ears, swallowing up the opponent in the vortex of bubbles generated.

attacks.name: Demi Dart (Pico Darts)
attacks.description: Attacks with syringes of darkness.

Luxmon.name: Luxmon
Luxmon.description: Official romanization given duringDigimon Con 2023and used in the franchise.

Lycamon.name: Lycamon
Lycamon.description: Name used inDigimon Adventure V-Tamer 01. No official romanization available.

Lynxmon.name: Lynxmon
Lynxmon.description: Lynxmon is an Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Courage". It has the appearance of a lynx shrouded in blazing fur, and inhabits tropical jungles. As it is the polar opposite of Garurumon, who lives in cold regions, it has a carefree personality. It hates being tied down and never swears its allegiance to its master, but is recognized as being a mutually good rival to Garurumon.

attacks.name: Thermal Mane
attacks.description: Causes an explosion with a big flame.

MachGaogamon.name: MachGaogamon
MachGaogamon.description: MachGaogamon is a Cyborg Digimon. It carries rocket engines with enormous propulsive power on its back. Although its flight duration is limited, it momentarily exploits its maximum thrust, and is most skilled in "Hit and Away".

attacks.name: Gaoga Tornade (Fra: Gaoga Tornado) (Gaoga Tornado)
attacks.description: Circles the opponent with maximum thrust and unleashes an extremely high-speed barrage.

attacks.name: Winning Knuckle
attacks.description: Attacks with a blow of its fist boasting supreme impact strength.

attacks.name: Howling Cannon
attacks.description: Releases ultrasonic waves with a single howl.

attacks.name: Winning Straight
attacks.description: A punch with the cyber arm.

attacks.name: Mach Spiral
attacks.description: A stronger version of Spiral Blow.

attacks.name: Winning Blow
attacks.description: A punch with the cyber arm.

Machinedramon.name: Machinedramon
Machinedramon.description: Machinedramon is a Machine Digimon. With its whole body in 100% full metal, it is the Digital World's strongest Digimon. It was built by synthesizing the parts of many Cyborg Digimon, and it is thought that all of the Cyborg Digimon produced so far were merely prototypes for the completion of Machinedramon. Its power is at a level that would overwhelm other Digimon, and it possesses an intellect which boasts incomparable throughput, but it is a purely mechanical Digimon which does not share their self-will. Instead, someone planted a program containing evil intentions within the DigiCore at the center of its body, and Machinedramon is supplied with infinite power from that malice-filled DigiCore.

attacks.name: Giga Cannon (∞ Cannon)
attacks.description: Fires superdreadnought-class energy waves from its two cannons.

attacks.name: Dragon Fire (Booster Claw)
attacks.description: Drills its right arm into the opponent.

attacks.name: Catastrophe Day (Catastrophe D)
attacks.description: Detonates itself in a large explosion.

attacks.name: Infinite Hand (∞ Hand)
attacks.description: Launches a blast of energy from its hand. In Digimon World Championship it crushes an opponent with its huge arm.

attacks.name: Giga Destroyer
attacks.description: Fires organic missiles from the hatch on part of its chest.

MachLeomon.name: MachLeomon
debut: Digimon Xros Wars (manga), "Xrosroad!! The Boys' Paths Cross" [01]
MachLeomon.description: MachLeomon is a Digimon. It is similar in appearance and ability to MadLeomon, except that it is armed with daggers.

attacks.name: Sonic Thrust
attacks.description: Dances quickly around foe while stabbing with daggers.

Machmon.name: Machmon
Machmon.description: Machmonis a Cyborg Digimon. It is a Digimon that yearns for speed. Dust clouds over barren plains are often caused by Machmon's rampaging. Although its appearance resembles that of a bike, it lacks a seat, and no one is willing to ride it. However, it thinks that it will find a Digimon destined to master it someday. It views anyone who travels at high speed as an enemy, so it is a natural-bornbōsōzoku.Occasionally, large gangs of Machmon have been witnessed roaring noisily around withRebellimon.

attacks.name: Max Edge (Full-throttle Edge)
attacks.description: Tears the enemy to pieces with the blades protruding from various parts.

attacks.name: Chaos Fire (Madness Fire)
attacks.description: Indiscriminately shoots with the four gun muzzles mounted to the sides of its front wheel.

MadLeomon.name: MadLeomon
MadLeomon.description: MadLeomonis a Zombie Zinger Digimon. It is aberserkerwho lost its intelligence and enhanced its combat instinct. Although it was originally a Lion Digimon, it heaped modification upon modification and arrived at its current appearance. In the process, its consciousness vanished, and it became nothing more than a puppet that defeats those standing before it, as it is commanded. Because it doesn't act or think according to its natural instincts, it exhibits headlong assaults, heedless even of any traps or gadgets. Although it is fundamentally high-powered, its patterns are meager, with nothing but primitive attacks such as hitting and kicking. Nevertheless, caution is necessary, because its sharp claws bear a deadly poison which can cause anything to rot away.

attacks.name: Beast Blaster (獣王堕拳, Jūoudaken, lit. "Beast-King Fallen Fist")
attacks.description: Fires its "Spirit" in the shape of a lion's face, which bites the flesh off of those standing in its way as it flies through them.

attacks.name: Poison Claw (腐毒爪, Fudokusou, lit. "Necrotoxin Claw")

MadLeomon (Orochimode).name: MadLeomon (Orochimode)

otherNames.name: マッドレオモン（オロチモン吸収対） MadLeomon (Orochimon Absorbent)

MadLeomon (Orochimode).description: MadLeomongrows in size and gainsOrochimon's heads for its limbs as well as its tail.

MadLeomon (Final Mode).name: MadLeomon (Final Mode)
MadLeomon (Final Mode).description: MadLeomongrows in size and gains many spikes, while its mane turns red and becomes styled likeApemon's.

Mademon.name: Mademon
Mademon.description: Mademon is based on madebymado1215's childhood dog, Madeleine.It is bipedal and resembles a white and brownKing Charles Spanielwith black eyes. It wears a red and gold crown with an "M" on it, a red cape with a fur collar and a skull-like ornament on it. It carries a blue elephant toy.

MagnaAngemon.name: MagnaAngemon
MagnaAngemon.description: MagnaAngemon is an Angel Digimon. It has eight shining, silver wings. MagnaAngemon's mission in the Digital World is as a law enforcement officer, and it has the duty of supervising and surveying the many Angel Digimon. Furthermore, although it is the speaker for the essence of "Light" trying to preserve the order of the Digital World, and is usually in the shape of a priest, when the Digital World is shrouded by the essence of "Darkness", it changes into its Battle Mode (戦闘形態, Sentou Keitai) and attacks the evil. In its Battle Mode, it consigns the opponent to oblivion with the Beam Shield on its left arm and the holy sword Excalibur equipped to its right arm. Also, although MagnaAngemon has a personality replete with gentleness and kindness when it is in Priest Mode, it takes on an austere personality when it is in Battle Mode.

attacks.name: Gate of Destiny (Heaven's Gate)
attacks.description: Manifests a door to subspace from which there is no return, and consigns the opponent to oblivion through it. The gate can also fire a blast of light, or transport the opponent to another location.

attacks.name: Excalibur
attacks.description: Slash the enemy using the holy sword, Excalibur.

attacks.name: Magna Antidote (Holy Disinfection)
attacks.description: Cures allies of their ailments.

attacks.name: HP Recovery (Heaven's Heal)
attacks.description: Heals HP.

attacks.name: Soul Vanisher (Soul Banish)
attacks.description: Hits its sword on the ground to create a shockwave.

attacks.name: Angel Rod
attacks.description: Attacks with its "Angel Rod".

attacks.name: Flying Sword of Justice (Flying Sword)
attacks.description: Rushes in front with great speed to strike its enemy.

attacks.name: Shield and Counter (Shield Counter)
attacks.description: Blocks an incoming attack and repels it if it is a projectile attack or slashes the attacker if it is a melee strike.

attacks.name: Magna Jump (Holy Jump) Uses holy power to launch straight up into the sky.
Excali-burst (Excaliburst)
attacks.description: Powers up the Excalibur and then slices the enemy.

attacks.name: Judgment Slash
attacks.description: Performs a single strike that destroys evil.

MagnaAngemon (Priest Mode).name: MagnaAngemon (Priest Mode)
MagnaAngemon (Priest Mode).description: MagnaAngemon (Priest Mode) is an Archangel Digimon. It is a MagnaAngemon with the duty to uphold the law of the Digital World. Assuming this form except during battle, it supervises Angel Digimon. It is an Angel Digimon warden, who opens the door to another dimension with its holy sword.

attacks.name: Heaven's Gate
attacks.description: Manifests a door leading to subspace from which there is no return, and consigning the opponent to oblivion through it.

attacks.name: Soul Banish
attacks.description: Hits its sword on the ground to create a shockwave.

Magnadramon.name: Magnadramon
Magnadramon.description: Magnadramon is a Holy Dragon Digimon. It is a member of the "Miracle 4" and the "Four Great Dragons". It is the ultimate form of god beast Digimon. Its heroic appearance is reminiscent of a ruler of the sky. There are few who have seen its appearance, and it has not even been entirely confirmed where it usually is. However, it is said that it suddenly appeared out of nowhere once when a gigantic evil energy was generated in the Digital World, and laid waste to the evil with its vast power.

attacks.name: Fire Tornado (Holy Flame)
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent with the light energy of all justice, instantaneously erasing their form.

attacks.name: Dragon Fire (Apocalypse)
attacks.description: Calls down energy bolts from the heavens to strike opponents.

attacks.name: Hermit Fog
attacks.description: Sprays forth a debilitating mist.

Magnadramon X.name: Magnadramon X
Magnadramon X.description: Magnadramon X is a Holy Dragon Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The fact that it was hardly affected by the X-Antibody meant that it had already manifested its latent abilities. Although there no longer appears to be any visible changes to Magnadramon, who has continued to digivolve throughout the history of the Digital World, its restrained, wild ferocious nature as a dragon has been completely drawn out. When facing evil Digimon, it smashes them to smithereens in brutal, tremendous battles. It is starting to become feared as a vengeful god.

attacks.name: Fire Tornado (Holy Flame)
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent with the light energy of all justice. Those who suffer this technique have their forms instantaneously erased.

attacks.name: Holy Blaze
attacks.description: Erases the enemy in the blink of an eye with its enormous light energy of justice

attacks.name: Apocalypse
attacks.description: Calls down energy bolts from the heavens to strike opponents.

MagnaGarurumon.name: MagnaGarurumon

otherNames.name: 鎧甲加魯魯獸 Magna Garurumon

MagnaGarurumon.description: MagnaGarurumon is an Android Digimon. It is a Transcendent-species Digimon that possesses power over Light which is said to have surpassed even the might of the Ten Legendary Warriors. It specializes in moving at light speed, and when its aviation unit is equipped, it is able to fly at subluminal speeds. Also, its "Charge Phantom" chest armor, its long-range firing "Sniper Phantom" on its right arm, and its mid-range firing "Strike Phantom" on its left arm are capable of being detached, although this decreases a portion of its firepower. By spinning at high altitudes, the "Laser Sights" on its chest are capable of locking onto all anti-air and anti-ground targets, so as soon as it spins at an extremely high altitude and confirms its targets, it commences a full-scale attack. It seems that it's already too late to escape from MagnaGarurumon.

attacks.name: Feral Fire (Machine Gun Destroy)
attacks.description: Conducts a simultaneous firing of all its guns at all the locked targets, then violently pulverizes the main target at high speed.

attacks.name: Starburst Hunter (Starlight Velocity)
attacks.description: Accelerates to speeds that exceed the subluminal and reach the superluminal level after detaching the Charge Phantom, then erases everything that comes in contact with any of the bands of light.

attacks.name: Magna Missiles
attacks.description: Consecutive missiles are launched at the opponent. Can be fired from either his flying unit, "Sniper Phantom", or "Strike Phantom".

attacks.name:
Magna Blade: Slashes four times with its light sword.
Aero Magna Blade
attacks.description: Slashes with its light sword while in the air.

attacks.name: Aero Magna Blade
attacks.description: Slashes with its light sword while in the air.

attacks.name: Magna Cannon
attacks.description: Fires from the Sniper Phantom.

title: Transcendental Hero of Blue Steel
(蒼鋼の超越烈士
Soukou no Chouetsu Resshi?)

MagnaGarurumon (SV).name: MagnaGarurumon (SV)
MagnaGarurumon (SV).description: MagnaGarurumon (SV) is a Mega-level Digimon. It is a transcendent Digimon with power over light, said to surpass even the might of the Ten Legendary Warriors.

attacks.name: Starburst Hunter (Starlight Velocity)
attacks.description: Accelerates to speeds that exceed the subluminal and reach the superluminal level after detaching the Charge Phantom, then erases everything that comes in contact with any of the bands of light.

MagnaKidmon.name: MagnaKidmon
MagnaKidmon.description: MagnaKidmon is a Dragon Man Digimon. MagnaKidmon has firearm mechanisms equipped throughout its body. As a wanderer travelling across the Digital World in search of the comrades it was separated from, it is a troublemaker who causes trouble and gets tangled up in scandal wherever it goes. Although it has a self-centered personality and is often indifferent of its surroundings, it's passionate about things like friendship or gratitude, misinterpreting the local Deputymon it comes across as members of its own species and becoming friends with them. As it loves single combat, it is so severely trigger happy that it fires off bullets indiscriminately once it wins or loses.

attacks.name: Bind Red Trigger
attacks.description: Stabs the opponent with the tiny machine guns connected to the magazines extending from its hips, immediately destroying the enemy's body from within.

attacks.name: Happy Bullet Showering
attacks.description: A high-altitude annihilation fire in which it soars high into the sky with its wing-like muffler, then aims at the opponent with its arms folded and weaves together live ammunition and plasma shots fired from the gun muzzles on its legs and the fingers of its hands, which pound away like falling rain.

attacks.name: Chaos Triangular
attacks.description: Invokes when special conditions are met.

Magnamon.name: Magnamon
Magnamon.description: Magnamonis a Warrior Digimon. Itarmor digivolvedthrough the power of theDigi-Egg of Miracles. It possesses tremendous defensive ability, its offensive power is equivalent to that of a Mega Digimon, or even greater, and it is one of the "Royal Knights".No matter what kind of predicament those who acquire the power of the Digi-Egg of Miracles fall into, they're able to overcome it through that miraculous power, and as such, it's definitely appropriate to call it a Miracle Item.

attacks.name: Magna Blast (Plasma Shoot): Fires a shot of ball-shaped plasma. In Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth, Digimon Story
attacks.description: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory, Digimon Links, and Digimon ReArise it shoots out multiple ball-shaped plasmas. In Digimon Adventure 02 and Digimon Data Squad, this attack is depicted as unleashing missiles from its armor.

attacks.name: Magna Blaster (Extreme Jihad)
attacks.description: Emits the utmost power of the Digi-Egg of Miracles in the form of an energy wave from its entire body. However, because it was proven that the size of Magna Blaster's power rapidly accelerates the damage to Magnamon's data, it is currently sealed.

attacks.name: Shining Gold Solar Storm
attacks.description: Rapidly compresses space, then immediately and explosively expands it, sweeping away surrounding enemies with a golden laser beam.

attacks.name: Magna Punch (Magnum Punch)
attacks.description: Puts all its strength into a powerful punch.

attacks.name: Magna Kick (Magnum Kick)
attacks.description: Kicks with all its might.

attacks.name: Aura Barrier (Light Aura Barrier)
attacks.description: Envelops self in a barrier of light to ward off enemies.

title: Radiance of Miracles
(奇跡の輝き
Kiseki no Kagayaki?)

Magnamon X.name: Magnamon X
Magnamon X.description: Magnamon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. The "Chrome Digizoid" grows stronger the more it is tempered, and there exists no other material quite like it. Magnamon's imaginary super-metal had become one with its limits, and was able to grow and regress as if it were made of muscles. The natural form of 'Chrome Digizoid' (in other words, the Digi-Egg of Miracles) was created using ancient technology, and its original characteristic was how it could be integrated into living organisms; a state similar to that, when combined with Magnamon's abilities, is thought to be the manifestation of a miraculous digivolution. When Magnamon's muscles, or 'Chrome Digizoid', are strained, they temporarily transform into "Gold Digizoid", which envelops its entire body in a golden glow; not only does it raise physical defense, it also bestows a state of absolute defense that is capable of resisting even data-disintegrating types of attacks. Furthermore, when in the "Gold Digizoid" state, its properties are similar to those of the Huanglong Ore, which boasts unparalleled, absolute hardness and is used as the base for 'Chrome Digizoid'; as such, in addition to absolute defense, it also adds a great amount of weight ill-suited for Digimon, though Magnamon has overcome that by tempering its own 'Chrome Digizoid'. One of the "Royal Knights", it digivolved through the power of the Digi-Egg of Miracles. During battle it will increase in hardness, and if it enters the "Gold Digizoid" state in which its entire body shines gold, it is completely invulnerable.

attacks.name: Plasma Shot (Plasma Shoot)
attacks.description: Fires a shot of ball-shaped plasma.

attacks.name: Magna Explosion (Extreme Jihad)
attacks.description: Emits the utmost power of the Digi-Egg of Miracles in the form of an energy wave from its entire body.

attacks.name: Shining Gold Solar Storm
attacks.description: Rapidly compresses space, then immediately and explosively expands it, sweeping away surrounding enemies with a golden laser beam.

title: Knight of Miracle Light

MailBirdramon.name: MailBirdramon
MailBirdramon.description: MailBirdramonis a Machine Digimon. It is aRaptor-type Flying Digimon. It performs reconnaissance on the status of the battle from the sky, and as its specialty, it performsair supportstrikes which inflict precise amounts of damage to the opponent usinghit-and-run tactics. Its movements are lightning-fast and its vision, eagle-eyed. In particular, its "Nighthawk" is a tactic which fully capitalizes on its characteristics, and its "Plasma Cannon" is also powerful enough to exterminate the opponent, so its comprehensive fighting strength is far greater than that of Digimon who only possess the ability for close combat. Because it is always analyzing the status of the battle from the sky, and acting accordingly, its personality is calm, calculating probabilities and excelling in its judgments.

attacks.name: Plasma Cannons (Plasma Cannon)
attacks.description: Shoots the opponent at point-blank range with an extremely high-energy plasma shell from its mouth.

attacks.name: Nightflare (Nighthawk)
attacks.description: Covertly approaches the opponent, then performs an aerial bombing.

\"MailBirdramon + Golemon\".name: "MailBirdramon + Golemon"
\"MailBirdramon + Golemon\".description: "MailBirdramon + Golemon" is an unnamed DigiFuse between MailBirdramon and Golemon.

attacks.name: Typhoon Tail (Trident Tail)
attacks.description: Swings its Golemon tail to blow the enemy away.

Maildramon.name: Maildramon
Maildramon.description: Maildramon is a Cyborg Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Miracles". This dragon, possessing armor made of Chrome Digizoid, is the attendant of Knightmon, and rushes about the battlefield carrying Knightmon on its back. As you would expect with the largely-built Knightmon riding it, Maildramon is also an exceptional size, so both its power and stamina are something worth mentioning. It is definitely a "Moving Fortress".

attacks.name: Iron Press
attacks.description: Crushes the opponent under its large build.

Majiramon.name: Majiramon
Majiramon.description: Majiramon is a Holy Dragon Digimon. It is the "Dragon" Deva, and serves the Digimon Sovereign Azulongmon. As a follower of Azulongmon, it is extremely calculating and hates to even lift a finger if it won't benefit itself. However, if it realizes that something will benefit itself, it will want to poke its head in no matter what the thing is. It has a habit of putting a price on everything, and expressing various matters by their cost in money. During battle, it shoots through the opponent with the "Bǎo Shǐ" (宝矢 lit. "Treasure Arrow"), which are the hairs of its tail and whiskers transformed (Incidentally, one Bǎo Shǐ is worth ¥5,000).

attacks.name: Flaming Arrowheads (Vedhaka)
attacks.description: Disappears into the center of a swirl of light summoned in the sky, then fires 108 shining Bǎo Shǐ, burying a horde of opponents in just an instant. This technique possesses ¥540,000 worth of destructive power.

Makuramon.name: Makuramon
Makuramon.description: Makuramon is an Animal Digimon. It is the "Monkey" Deva, and serves the Digimon Sovereign Baihumon. As a follower of Baihumon, it has a curious disposition of not speaking and not showing its emotions on its face. However, contrasted with its facial expressions, its body movements are overflowing and its emotions are expressed through its bodily poses. Those suggest that it is often in a more or less good mood, but that its overflowing curiosity doesn't last very long. It makes a hobby out of collecting and locking up the things that catch its eye in its "Primal Orb" (宝玉 Bǎo Yù, lit. "Treasure Ball"), and in battle, it is a pacifist that locks up the opponent to settle its issues.

attacks.name: Primal Orb (宝玉, Bǎo Yù, lit. "Treasure Ball")
attacks.description: Throws the Primal Orb as a controllable projectile.

attacks.name: Primal Orb (Raurava)
attacks.description: Crushes the Primal Orb imprisoning an opponent, completely erasing it along with the opponent.

MaloMyotismon.name: MaloMyotismon

otherNames.name: ヴェリアルヴァンデモン VelialVamdemon

MaloMyotismon.description: MaloMyotismon is an Evil Digimon.
