It is said to be Myotismon's final form, and by harmonizing its intelligence alongside all of its other aspects, it succeeded in surpassing VenomMyotismon, which lost its intelligence by seeking too much power and was like a beast. It possesses an inhumanly cruel personality, and is willing to do anything to achieve its own desires. The living, jaw-like artillery cannons on both its left and right shoulders, "Sodom" and "Gomorrah" respectively, leech off of it.

attacks.name: Pandemonium (Pandæmonium Flame)
attacks.description: Fires an extremely high-temperature beam from Sodom and Gomorrah.

attacks.name: Screaming Darkness(Howling Blood) Fires large spheres of black energy from Sodom and Gomorrah.
Crimson Mist (Melting Blood)
attacks.description: Opens up the Sodom and Gomorrah and spews out a thick red, acidic mist.

attacks.name: Mental Illusion (Mind Illusion)
attacks.description: Emits a ray of light that hypnotizes the opponent, trapping them in a dream world of their desires.

attacks.name: Black Rain
attacks.description: Emits a thick fog of gas in the environment which confuses the opponent.

attacks.name: Soul Shield
attacks.description: Uses a shield of darkness to absorb energy from projectiles.

attacks.name: Crimson Mist
attacks.description: Generates dark, reddish mist from its body and sends it forth as a large cloud.

Mamemon.name: Mamemon
Mamemon.description: Mamemon is a Mutant Digimon. It digivolved in a harsh environment. Contrary to its cute appearance, it conceals a terrifying destructive power. With the exception of one Digimon, it is perhaps the most powerful class. The large hands attached to its small body are capable of turning into powerful bombs and detaching themselves. Its nickname is the "Smiley Bomber".

attacks.name: Smirk Bomb (Smiley Bomb)
attacks.description: Its huge hands, which fly off towards the enemy, detonate the moment they hit them.

attacks.name: Diving Attack (Buster Dive)
attacks.description: Dives at an opponent from the sky.

title: Smiley Bomber
Smile Bomber

Mamemon X.name: Mamemon X
Mamemon X.description: Mamemon X is a Mutant Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It causes small explosions just by unleashing punches even without detaching its huge hands, except during its Special Move.

attacks.name: Bombxing
attacks.description: Completely shatters the enemy with its continuous, slightly explosive combo techniques such as jabs and straight punches.

attacks.name: Smiley Bomb
attacks.description: Its huge hands, which fly off towards the enemy, detonate the moment they hit them.

MameTyramon.name: MameTyramon
MameTyramon.description: MameTyramon is a Mutant Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It is a tiny Digimon feared as the "Small Tyranny" (Tiny Tyrant). It condensed Tyrannomon's data into its tiny body, pushing its ferocious nature and combat instinct to the surface, where they have strikingly manifested in its behavior. While its body may be tiny, rather than assaulting opponents en masse, it always acts by itself, swooping down on Digimon roaming its own territory without wasting breath on discussion, and always making a show of being the strongest in its domain. However, because its body is tiny, its territory is not very wide. With its physical strength condensed several hundred-fold into its tiny body, and its tenacious jaw that can crunch even super-hard armor, it possesses fighting strength that surpasses even that of gigantic Dinosaur Digimon.

attacks.name: Mame Bite 1000
attacks.description: Snaps at the opponent many times over at super-speed.

attacks.name: Met Lariat ('met Lariat)
attacks.description: Removes the Helmet on its head if it seems like it's losing, and strikes at the opponent in an attempt to reverse its fortunes.

title: Tiny Tyrant
Small Tyranny

Mammothmon.name: Mammothmon
Mammothmon.description: Mammothmon is an Ancient Animal Digimon. The fact that this ancient Digimon existed long ago was made clear from a multitude of evidence. Due to Digital World warming, its super-compressed data was expanded, and it made its way from the once-icebound Ice-Snow Area. Its whole body is covered in dense fur, and although it is an ancient Digimon that possesses immense power, it also has a weakness to extreme heat. The crest engraved into the mask covering its face is a super-ancient crystal of wisdom, so it possesses the power of clairvoyance so that it is able to see far into the distance, and its large ears can even identify sounds from faraway places.

attacks.name: Tusk Crushers (Tusk Strikes)
attacks.description: Fires its tusks at the opponent like missles.

attacks.name: Freezing Breath (Tundra Breath)
attacks.description: Spews cold breath from its long trunk all at once, instantly freezing any opponent.

attacks.name: Snowball
attacks.description: Fires a hard frozen snowball.

attacks.name: Nose Stomp
attacks.description: Strikes the enemy using its big nose.

attacks.name: Tusk Strike
attacks.description: Charges and pierces the enemy.

Mammothmon X.name: Mammothmon X
Mammothmon X.description: Mammothmon X is an Ancient Beast Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Mammothmon had several tens of percent corrupted data or higher when it expanded from its super-compressed data, but it restored up to 99% of it as a result of its self-repairing ability increasing due to the effects of the X-Antibody, and has become a near-perfect figure of a Mammothmon that lived in ancient times. The mask covering its face has reached as far as its back and abdomen. So, not only is its appearance exhibited in perfect condition, but also its abilities due to the crest engraved into its mask, and it has been proven that it has started instinctively tracking down Virus-species as it discovers them. Based on these facts, Mammothmon is thought to have been a Virus Hunter Digimon in the harsh Ice-Snow Area.

attacks.name: Tusk Strikes
attacks.description: Skewers the opponent with its two elongated tusks.

attacks.name: Tundra Breath
attacks.description: Spews cold breath out of its long trunk in one burst, instantly freezing any opponent.

attacks.name: Geometric Freezer
attacks.description: A barrier that freezes only Virus-species with the cold air released from its nasal cavity.

Manbomon.name: Manbomon
Manbomon.description: Manbomon is a Mutant Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Light". It is a rare Digimon that is seldom seen even in the Net Ocean. Usually, it moves about while going with the current near the surface, but when fighting with the enemy, it moves at astonishing speed with the propeller on its tail fin. It is said that although the patterns on the surface of its body have meaning, they also differ for each individual, but because there are a few cases of witness accounts, the truth of the matter is uncertain. Also, it is a precious species that produces antibodies against computer viruses within its body.

attacks.name: Balloon Mine
attacks.description: Attacks by firing bubbles shaped like little Manbomon.

attacks.name: Water Lily
attacks.description: Fires a high-powered water blast from its mouth.

attacks.name: Combo Gloves (Petty Globe)
attacks.description: A combination of high-speed punches.

attacks.name: Global Gloves (Global Glove)
attacks.description: Attacks with multiple, powerful punches.

title: Foreboding Light
(胸騒ぎの光
Munasawagi no Hikari?)

Mantaraymon.name: Mantaraymon
Mantaraymon.description: Mantaraymon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Reliability". Based on its appearance, it looks like an offensive speed-type Digimon, but actually it's the opposite; it is a Digimon with a calm disposition that elegantly swims in the vast Net Ocean. However, it is difficult to capture on radar because of its unique figure and is called the "Stealth of the Deep", and it is often used for reconnaissance or treated as an underwater bomber among those who abuse Mantaraymon. For that reason, it is said to be overfished and threatened with extinction. Also, Digimon that assault Mantaraymon are counterattacked with an intense blow from the "Stun Needle" on its tail.

attacks.name: Tail Booster (Paralyze Tail)
attacks.description: Stings the enemy with its tail leaving it fully paralyzed.

attacks.name: Torpedo Ray
attacks.description: Launches itself at the opponent at lightning speeds.

title: Stealth of the Deep
(深海のスティルス
Shinkai no Sutirusu?)

Mantaraymon X.name: Mantaraymon X
Mantaraymon X.description: Mantaraymon X is an Aquatic Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. All of its stealth features have been improved in order to avoid being discovered by enemy Digimon. It has a flat-structured build that is even more difficult to detect on enemy radar, and gained the ability to give off an emission that disrupts the enemy's sense of smell, barely making a sound as it moves. However, since its body is not invisible, the sharpness of its vision in detecting enemies ahead of it has improved, and it now takes action to avoid approaching enemies in advance. Due to these abilities, it is extremely difficult to capture Mantaraymon, even if it is nearby. However, only the light from both the "Stun Needle" and the electric bombs of its new Special Move "Paralyze Bomb" can be caught instantly.

attacks.name: Paralyze Tail
attacks.description: Uses the "Stun Needle" to pierce the enemy Digimon's body.

attacks.name: Paralyze Bomb
attacks.description: Uses electric bombs.

Manticoremon.name: Manticoremon
Manticoremon.description: Manticoremon is a Demon Beast Digimon. It is a ferocious Digimon that prefers the Digicores of Virus Digimon. It is employed by Angel Digimon, who noticed its obsession with devilish viruses. It lacks intelligence and reasoning, and its sole raison d'être is simply to consume the data of others. There are times when even the Angel Digimon that it is employed by are unable to control it due to the extreme brutality it displays during battle.

attacks.name: Trinity Gospel
attacks.description: Fires energy shots from the three mouths on its head and arms.

attacks.name: Acid Injection
attacks.description: Skewers the enemy with its three tails and injects a strong acid into their body.

MarinKimeramon.name: MarinKimeramon
MarinKimeramon.description: MarinKimeramonis a Composite Digimon. It was created by putting together the parts of various Aquatic Digimon. It is thought to have been produced using the same technology asKimeramon, but other than that, it is a complete mystery. It appears out of nowhere like a gust of wind, bringing devastation to ecosystems with its terrifying destructive impulses, and then disappears somewhere else.

attacks.name: Poseidon Vortex
attacks.description: Generates a large whirlpool by rapidly spinning its whole body.

attacks.name: Aqua Viper
attacks.description: Vaporizes its surroundings with a large amount of energy released from the tip of its horn.

MarineAngemon.name: MarineAngemon
MarineAngemon.description: MarineAngemon is a Pixie Digimon. Since it inhabits the Net Ocean, its figure can rarely be seen. Although it possesses the name of "Angemon", as far as the ecosystem is concerned, the Angemon-species is actually a different family. It wears a Holy Ring around its neck. Although it fundamentally dislikes combat, its Special Move "Kahuna Waves" results in it achieving victory.

attacks.name: Kahuna Waves (Ocean Love)
attacks.description: Makes all of its opponents lose their fighting spirit.

attacks.name: Smiley Face (にっこり笑顔, Nikkori Egao, lit. "Smiling Face")
attacks.description: Charms the enemy with a nice smile.

attacks.name: Smile Attack
attacks.description: Tackles with its cute tummy.

attacks.name: Pretty Heart
attacks.description: Startles the enemy with some cute gestures.

attacks.name: Funny Smile
attacks.description: Spins around and strikes a pose, then fires love hearts at the enemy—smiling the entire time. It can also empower allies while increasing their morale.

MarineDevimon.name: MarineDevimon
MarineDevimon.description: MarineDevimon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It is an aquatic dirty fighter that even Devimon hates to fight, due to its brutal reputation, and though it is a subspecies of Devimon, it completely lacks all emotions but hatred due to its lonely life in the profound ocean depths. For that reason, to ensure that it wins by any means, it won't let up with its attacks even if the opponent loses their fighting spirit. The two big tentacles growing from its back appear large and special, but they each possess their own will, so they will struggle for the catch and act without permission.

attacks.name: Dark Deluge (Guilty Black)
attacks.description: Discharges a venomous ink from its mouth which makes the opponent unable to stand for a while.

attacks.name: Evil Wing (しめつけ, Shimetsuke, lit. "Pressure")

Marsmon.name: Marsmon
Marsmon.description: Marsmon is a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", it is a Digimon god of war which has the appearance of a panther-man. Marsmon is familiar with all the ways in the world to fight dirty without weapons, and has absolute confidence in battles with others in the same weight class. It uses basic wrestling techniques, but is fixated on victory and glory, so when push comes to shove, it won't hesitate to use concealed weapons like its "Tria Knuckle" or "Metal Cothurnus". However, it exhibits its real power when it uses its bare hands and feet.

attacks.name: Corona Sanctions
attacks.description: Attacks with a magnificent aerial assault while clad in flames.

attacks.name: Mugenhadou (無限波動, Mugenhadou lit. "Endless Surge")
attacks.description: A long combo of attacks in which it gathers fire into its hands, then lands a combo of punches on the opponent before striking the ground, causing a pillar of fire to erupt from beneath.

title: God of War
(軍神
Gun-shin?)

Mastemon.name: Mastemon
Mastemon.description: Mastemon is an Angel Digimon. It is an Angel Digimon who manipulates light and darkness, and has the power to cross through space-time. Mastemon resulted from the DNA Digivolution of Angewomon and LadyDevimon when a great crisis visited the Digital World and controls the forces of the Angels and Dark angels that are called through the gate from another Digital World. Although it is a DNA Digivolution of two conflicting types and shares qualities of both, it has a one-track mind.

attacks.name: Holy Desire
attacks.description: Destroys evildoers with arrows of light fired from its right arm.

attacks.name: Dark Despair
attacks.description: Crushes and deletes captured opponents with its left hand, which includes their DigiCores.

attacks.name: Chaos Degradation (Chaos Degrade)
attacks.description: Merges dark and light energies to create a gate through which to send enemies to another dimension.

title: Tactician from Another World
(異世界の軍師
Isekai no Gunshi?)

attacks.name: Hoarfrost (霧氷, Muhyou)
attacks.description: Fires dark mist at the enemies.

attacks.name: Beam of Light (光芒, Koubou)
attacks.description: Fires a beam of light at the enemy.

MasterTyrannomon.name: MasterTyrannomon
MasterTyrannomon.description: MasterTyrannomon is a Dinosaur Digimon. MasterTyrannomon digivolved from a Tyrannomon that overcame many fierce battles. The scars covering its body act as proof of the numerous battles it has survived. It takes on a master-like role, coaching its Tyrannomon followers and raising them to become full-fledged warriors.

attacks.name: Master Fire
attacks.description: Releases a red aura, accumulates energy and breathes out a flame with sufficient strength from its mouth.

attacks.name: Master Claw
attacks.description: Pierces and crushes the enemy with its huge claws.

attacks.name: Hyper Heat Blast (超高熱闘気, Choukounetsu Touki, lit. "Super-Heated Fighting Spirit")
attacks.description: Showers super-hot embers from its whole body.

attacks.name: Zen Recovery (精神注入, Seishin Chūnyū, lit. "Spiritual Infusion")
attacks.description: Recovers all lowered parameters for itself and its allies.

MasterV-dramon.name: MasterV-dramon
MasterV-dramon.description: MasterV-dramon is a Mythical Dragon Digimon.

Matadormon.name: Matadormon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Hiroaki Hirata(Xros Wars),Satoshi Chiba(Hacker's Memory),Hideyuki Hori(Ghost Game)
Matadormon.description: Matadormon is an Undead Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is a bloodsucking martial artist Digimon that performs a magnificent dance. It is said that it was born from the folk-dance database of a certain museum, and that it has mastered the unique steps of "Burudoggu" (武舞独繰, "Burudoggu" lit. "Bulldog"). It uses its fluttering garment to deceive the opponent, and when the opponent drops its guard from a glance at the soft-colored cloth, it falls upon them with the countless rapiers stocked on its arms. Because it is a vampire, it can't survive unless it sucks a Digimon's blood, but as not just anyone will do, it seeks only the blood of strong Digimon and seems to constantly be moving from place to place.

attacks.name: Assault of Arrows (Thousand Arrow)
attacks.description: Unleashes an attack from the rapiers stocked on its arms.

attacks.name: Burudoggu (武舞独繰, Burudoggu lit. "War-dance of a Single Spin")
Earth-Shattering Stomp (蝶絶喇叭蹴, Chouzetsu Rappashū, lit. "Butterfly-breaking Trumpet-kick")
attacks.description: Attacks with a mighty kicking technique drawn from the Burudoggu martial arts.

MedievalGallantmon.name: MedievalGallantmon
MedievalGallantmon.description: MedievalGallantmon is a Warrior Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. In "Witchelny", it is praised as the "Legendary Hero", as it suddenly appeared and drove out the foreign invaders in ancient times, and although it's not certain, it is said that it transcends time and is still in existence. It battles using armor made by Sorcery, it holds the alias of "Whirlwind General" due to it governing the "Vortex Warriors", and it possesses the mightiest magical lance, "Dynas", which conceals the power of the wyvern. Although there are almost none who have seen its form in the "Digital World", it is called the "Warrior of Fantasy" there, as gaudy ornamentation is applied to the armor over its whole body, and a coat of arms is affixed to its solemn form.

attacks.name: Rage of Wyvern
attacks.description: Fires an energy blast in the shape of a wyvern at the enemy from the crystal tip of "Dynas".

attacks.name: Final Crest
attacks.description: Fires a sharp, knife-like gust of wind to attack the enemy.

attacks.name: Dynas
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy by swinging "Dynas", the strongest magical lance that contains the power of the wyvern.

title: Legendary Hero
(伝説の英雄
Densetsu no Eiyū?)
Whirlwind General
(旋風将
Senpū Shō?)
Warrior of Fantasy
(幻想の戦士
Gensō no Senshi?)

MegaBlackShoutmon X7.name: MegaBlackShoutmon X7
debut: Digimon Xros Wars: Super Digica Taisen
MegaBlackShoutmon X7.description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars: Super Digica Taisen. No official romanization available.

MegaDarkKnightmon.name: MegaDarkKnightmon
MegaDarkKnightmon.description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars: Super Digica Taisen. No official romanization available.

MegaDarknessBagramon.name: MegaDarknessBagramon
MegaDarknessBagramon.description: MegaDarknessBagramonis a Composition Digimon. It is thedigifusedform ofAxeKnightmonandBagramon. By uniting the dark knight and the fiendish demon lord it became the greatest emperor of evil. Its "Imperium Vicious", the evil power spilling out of its body, symbolizes that strength, and if a weak evil is bathed in it then it immediately becomes a grovelling subordinate. Even if you try to resist, it is considered difficult to maintain your sense of self if you are glared at by AxeKnightmon, who exists within its chest. According to one theory, it appears to be planning on destroying all good, in order to fill the world with evil and obtain a world that it can manipulate at will. Even though there are probably some Digimon whose strength is not outdone even by MegaDarknessBagramon itself, it is said that in order to designate its plan as something guaranteed, it expands its power by bringing useful Digimon under its control, and watches out for opportunities for the opposition. Even if the opponent seems to be keeping their distance, when it becomes aware of them it will attack them with its "God of Death Snatcher", one of its Digimon-manipulating techniques, and for opponents whose existence has no worth, it attacks them with its "Eternal Darkmare". The darkness held within the hearts ofhumansand Digimon is intensified and fused with MegaDarknessBagramon's own fathomless power.

attacks.name: God of Death Snatcher
attacks.description: Rips out the opponent's soul.

attacks.name: Bale-fire Eyes
attacks.description: Releases its fathomless power from the red eyes in its chest, transforming all of its surroundings into nothingness.

attacks.name: Eternal Darkmare
attacks.description: Instantly destroys the opponent's data by flapping its jet-black wings.

attacks.name: Terra Infusion
attacks.description: Absorbs the land around it to empower itself.

MegaDeckerGreymon.name: MegaDeckerGreymon
debut: Digimon Xros Wars: Super Digica Taisen
MegaDeckerGreymon.description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars: Super Digica Taisen. No official romanization available.

Megadramon.name: Megadramon
Megadramon.description: Megadramon is an Android Digimon. It is a member of the Crack Team and was remodeled for anti-air use at the same time as Gigadramon, incorporating technology appropriated from Andromon. It is a dark dragon Digimon that is said to boast the strongest and wickedest power among Dragon-type Cyborg Digimon of the Ultimate level. As a Digimon that was artificially remodeled by someone, it was programmed to destroy everything. It can definitely be said that its existence is the epitome of a computer virus. It can easily penetrate Computer Networks protected by strong security, and can very easily destroy and then completely reformat the host computer.

attacks.name: Dark Side Attack (Genocide Attack)
attacks.description: Fires countless organic missiles from both of its arms.

attacks.name: Ultimate Attack (Ultimate Slicer)
attacks.description: Performs an attack that is able to cut any material to pieces.

attacks.name: Big Mega Fire (Mega Death Scythe) Extends a scythe from its claws and slices enemy with it.
DG Dimension
attacks.description: Draws the surrounding area into a dimensional gap using massive energy that causes heavy damage.

MegaGargomon.name: MegaGargomon
MegaGargomon.description: MegaGargomon is a Machine Digimon. It is a colossal Digimon whose whole body has become a mass of weapons. The amount of weapons it has equipped rivals that of MetalGarurumon (incidentally, while MetalGarurumon is a low-temperature species, MegaGargomon is a high-temperature species). Each of its weapons, such as its lasers, missiles, bazookas, vulcans, and flamethrowers, are concealed. Although its speed is considerably slow, because it puts all of that energy into power, it possesses unbelievable destructive force. Because its lack of speed is compensated for by its weapons, it is able to cope with attacks from every direction without moving even a little.

attacks.name: Mega Barrage (Burst Shot)
attacks.description: Volley fires its firearms.

attacks.name: Gargo Missile (Giant Missile)
attacks.description: Fires a gigantic megaton-class missile from the gun turrets on its shoulders.

attacks.name: Gargo Missiles (Giant Bazooka)
attacks.description: Fires gigantic megaton-class missiles from the gun turrets on its shoulders.

attacks.name: Mega Twister
attacks.description: Charges the opponent, then lifts them up and spins rapidly before tossing them.

attacks.name: Power Pummel
attacks.description: Generates pulverizing shock waves from its fists.

attacks.name: GA Missile
attacks.description: Destroys with huge missiles.

attacks.name: Saint Punch
attacks.description: Punches, sending a wave of fiery explosions from its fist.

attacks.name: Saint Tackle
attacks.description: Rams with its shoulder while dashing with its thrusters.

attacks.name: Saint Foot
attacks.description: Butt-bounces the enemy while in midair.

attacks.name: Saint Upper
attacks.description: Activates its thrusters in midair to do an uppercut.

attacks.name: Saint Jet
attacks.description: Uses its thrusters to slow its descent.

MegaGranKuwagamon.name: MegaGranKuwagamon
debut: Digimon Xros Wars: Super Digica Taisen
MegaGranKuwagamon.description: AttacksAttacks inDigimon Xros Wars: Super Digica Taisen

MegaKabuterimon (Blue).name: MegaKabuterimon (Blue)
MegaKabuterimon (Blue).description: MegaKabuterimon (Blue)is an Insectoid Digimon. It is a Digivolution ofKabuterimonthat was discovered within the tropical region of theNet Area. It is almost 1.5-times the size of Kabuterimon, and is quite large among Insectoid Digimon. While its flight abilities have regressed to a certain extent, the strength of its horn, which is its main weapon, has soared. Also, muscular tissues have appeared on the bases of its forelimbs, so its grappling ability has also improved. With the exception of its survival instincts, its behavior has been observed to consist of protecting the weak, and there are even times when its behavior has appeared knight-like.

attacks.name: Horn Buster
attacks.description: Fires an electrical blast from his horn.

attacks.name: Electro Shocker (Mega Blaster)
attacks.description: Fires an orb of lightning from his hands.

MegaKabuterimon (Red).name: MegaKabuterimon (Red)
MegaKabuterimon (Red).description: MegaKabuterimon (Red)is an Insectoid Digimon. It is a Digivolution ofKabuterimonthat was discovered within the tropical region of theNet Area. It is almost 1.5-times the size of Kabuterimon, and is quite large among Insectoid Digimon. It is the same species asMegaKabuterimon (Blue), and similarly, the strength of its horn, which is its main weapon, has soared, but this type of MegaKabuterimon seems to have surpassed it in flight ability. Also, muscular tissues have appeared on the bases of its forelimbs, so its grappling ability has also improved. With the exception of its survival instincts, its behavior has been observed to consist of protecting the weak, and there are even times when its behavior has appeared knight-like.

attacks.name: Horn Buster: Stabs the opponent with its gigantic horn. This attack is also depicted as firing a blast of lightning from its gigantic horn in Digimon Adventure, Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth, Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory, Digimon World
attacks.description: Next Order, Digimon Links, and Digimon ReArise.

attacks.name: Electro Shocker (Mega Blaster)
attacks.description: Fires an electrical ball from its hands.

attacks.name: Wild Scratcher (Wild Scratch)
attacks.description: Scratches with all four arms.

attacks.name: Ground Circuit (Power Outage) Slams the ground with its electrified fists.
Rhino Charge
attacks.description: Lowers its horn, charges the enemy, electrocultes them, and flips them into the air.

attacks.name: Lightning Wave
attacks.description: Summons a series of lightning bolts that strike around it.

attacks.name: Rocket Butt
attacks.description: Maintains altitude by igniting the thrusters in its rear.

attacks.name: Body Blow
attacks.description: Tackles the enemy.

attacks.name: Super Charge
attacks.description: Discharges electricity from its entire body, shocking everyone around it.

attacks.name: Super Electric Strike
attacks.description: While in midair, it spins into a ball and slams itself into the ground, causing an explosion of electrical energy.

MegaMusoKnightmon.name: MegaMusoKnightmon
debut: Digimon Xros Wars: Super Digica Taisen
MegaMusoKnightmon.description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars: Super Digica Taisen. No official romanization available.

MegaSeadramon.name: MegaSeadramon
MegaSeadramon.description: MegaSeadramonis a Sea Animal Digimon. It was aSeadramon-speciesthat lived long in the harsh environment surroundingFolder Continent, but digivolved in order to survive in the Digital World where the weak are food for the strong. Its body became a size larger, the carapace covering its head got harder, and a lightning-shaped blade has grown on itscalvaria. Its intelligence has developed more than the Seadramon-species, so it chases its opponent persistently, like a seeking torpedo, and reliably brings them down. There is a generator device equipped in the carapace on its head, in order to enable its Special Moves.

attacks.name: Thunder Javelin
attacks.description: Fires a powerful lightning strike from the blade on its calvaria.

attacks.name: Mail Strome (Maelstrom)
attacks.description: Creates an electrified tornado. In Digimon Digital Card Battle, it generates a tsunami.

attacks.name: Doramon Attack (Dramon Attack)
attacks.description: Uses the blade on its calvaria to pierce through the enemy.

attacks.name: Ice Blast (Ice Arrow)
attacks.description: Shoots ice blades at all foes.

attacks.name: Tail Blade (Stinger Surprise)
attacks.description: Avoids attack while resting.

attacks.name: Ice Reflector (Ice Reflect)
attacks.description: Flails at the ice, generating an ice quake.

attacks.name: Thunder Blade
attacks.description: Stabs the enemy with the electrified blade on its calvaria.

attacks.name: Shimetsukeru (しめつける, Shimetsukeru lit. "Squeeze")
attacks.description: Squeezes an enemy with its body.

attacks.name: River of Power
attacks.description: Fires an energy cannon from its snout.

MegaSeadramon X.name: MegaSeadramon X
MegaSeadramon X.description: MegaSeadramon X is an Aquatic Digimon and a carrier of the X-Antibody. Having survived in the intensely competitive Net Ocean since ancient times, Mega Seadramon, who is called the king of the Seadramon-species, appears with that body color having outlived others in every region of the Net Ocean, from ice-bound seas to tropical waters. By repeatedly using its Special Move "Thunder Javelin" in countless battles, the blade on its calvaria has been well-tempered and honed, and its conductivity has also increased.

attacks.name: Lightning Javelin (Thunder Javelin)
attacks.description: A powerful lightning strike fired from the blade on its calvaria. There is a generator device equipped in the carapace on its head so that it can enable this Special Move.

attacks.name: King Javelin
attacks.description: Thrusts its blade into the enemy and tears them to pieces.

attacks.name: Maelstrom
attacks.description: Creates an electrified tornado.

Megidramon.name: Megidramon
Megidramon.description: Megidramon is an Evil Dragon Digimon. It is an extremely wicked Digimon that is the most evil among Dragon Digimon. It is a pillar of the Four Great Dragons alongside Azulongmon, Goldramon, and Magnadramon, but its personality is so fiendish that it doesn't bear the slightest resemblance to the other three. Although it is a rare species that isn't even known to be extant, and its very existence is a "Digital Hazard", its powers were sealed away by some sort of "force". However, it is said that a great amount of damage will be exerted on the Digital World when its powers are awakened. It has a body made from Chrome Digizoid. According to one theory, Megidramon and ChaosGallantmon are the same being, and it is said that whether that wave of terror is projected as a dark knight or as a dark dragon depends on the observer.

attacks.name: Dragon Howling (Hell Howling)
attacks.description: Releases a powerful shock wave called the "howl of hell".

attacks.name: Megido Flame (Megiddo Flame)
attacks.description: Attacks with flames that reduce everything to ash.

attacks.name: Megido Bite
attacks.description: Bites its opponents with its jaws ruthlessly.

title: Red Dragon of the End

Megidramon X.name: Megidramon X
Megidramon X.description: Megidramon X is an Evil Dragon Digimon and carrier of the X Antibody. The greatest sin of the X-Antibody, which is drawing out the latent abilities of a Digicore, raising a Digimon's potential, had influenced Megidramon's Digicore. Without a shred of goodness left, this Digimon, who is the epitome of evil, is unlike any other thus far. Its very existence destroys and burns all of the Digital World to cinders, and its appearance is literally the "incarnation of hell". If you give up on living, then you might be able to catch a glimpse of Megidramon's true form. Its "Hell Howling" and "Megiddo Flame" possess unfathomable amounts of evil energy, and are said to have reached levels that are no longer worthy of the power of a single Digimon alone.

attacks.name: Megido Flame (Megiddo Flame)
attacks.description: Attacks with flames that reduce everything to ash.

attacks.name: Hell Howling
attacks.description: Releases a powerful shock wave called the "howl of hell".

attacks.name: Megido Axe
attacks.description: Hits the opponent down with its tail.

Meicoomon.name: Meicoomon
Meicoomon.description: Meicoomon is an Unknown Digimon. Meicoomon is characterized by its large ears and tail. Despite being hard to imagine, based on its fluffy coat of fur and adorable appearance, it actually possesses extremely sharp claws underneath its paws. Other than hiding its shy face, the two feelers growing from Meicoomon's neck are also excellent to use as a scarf during cold times.

attacks.name: X Scratch
attacks.description: Scratches enemies with its long claws.

attacks.name: Trichobezoar
attacks.description: Spits out a hairball from its mouth that destroys data.

attacks.name: Shut Claw
attacks.description: Scratches the opponent with its sharp claws.

Meicoomon (Saltation).name: Meicoomon (Saltation)
Meicoomon (Saltation).description: This alternate form ofMeicoomonappears to be larger with much shaggier fur. It has shinier, glowing eyes, long sharp claws and its three tails have grown to allow it to fly.

Meicrackmon.name: Meicrackmon
Meicrackmon.description: Meicrackmonis a Beast Man Digimon. It is the digivolved form ofMeicoomon. It often acts alone due to the fact that it hates conflict, in addition to its shy temperament. It is usually seen with its body curled up in sunlit areas, napping leisurely. When it senses someone drawing near, it takes cover using its keen movements and observes the situation. Although it will soften up to those who come bringing food, it will continue to lay low if they are an enemy. However, if the enemy refuses to leave its territory, it will engage them by displaying power that is unimaginable from its usual calm demeanor in order to protect its home.

attacks.name: Modestly Stun
attacks.description: Restrains the enemy with its two appendages, paralyzing them with the stinger on its tail.

attacks.name: Felt Made
attacks.description: Creates copies of itself with the lures it sends flying.

Meicrackmon Vicious Mode.name: Meicrackmon Vicious Mode
Meicrackmon Vicious Mode.description: Meicrackmon Vicious Mode is an Unknown Digimon. As the normally gentle Meicrackmon's heart is tainted by evil, its entire body transforms into a cracked form. It views the whole world as an enemy whom it has been wronged by, and its desire is to see the world destroyed. Making use of its exceptional leg strength and perception, as well as its phenomenal feral instincts, it hounds the opponent and doesn't let up until they meet their end. The Cursed Claws that extend from the armor on its paws are made of Red Digizoid, further adding to their already great cutting ability brought out by its tough body, and allowing it to slice up even slabs of metal as if they were paper.

attacks.name: Berserk Sinking (Berserk Thinking)
attacks.description: Slashes the enemy with the Cursed Claws in the shape of an X.

attacks.name: Felt Made
attacks.description: Creates copies of itself with the lures it sends flying from its body.

attacks.name: Cursed Claw
attacks.description: Slashes the opponent with the sharp claws projecting out of its armor.

Mekanorimon.name: Mekanorimon
Mekanorimon.description: Mekanorimon is a Machine Digimon. It is a Powered Suit Digimon used exclusively by tiny Digimon, and is the first Vehicle Digimon in the Digital World. It is a unique Digimon that is unable to move on its own and is incapable of action unless it is being piloted by another Digimon. Considering its Virus attribute, the pilot Digimon can probably be considered a Virus attribute, too. It is a Digimon that is still in development, and if it is overworked then its computer kernel will totally overheat.

attacks.name: Twin Beam (Twinkle Beam)
attacks.description: Fires a laser beam from the red optic circle on its chest

attacks.name: 4-Disk Break (Gyro Break)
attacks.description: Launches disk bombs at opponent.

attacks.name: Power Laser (Warning Laser)
attacks.description: Attacks with a laser beam.

Mephistomon.name: Mephistomon
Mephistomon.description: Mephistomon is an Evil Digimon. It has the appearance of a giant male goat, and is a dark being born from the lingering thought-data of an Apocalymon that attempted to destroy all life. Like Apocalymon, its governing principle is the extermination of all life. It specializes in the black magic of the Dark-species, and its personality is endlessly cruel. However, it is extremely intelligent, and is also a tactician.

attacks.name: Black Sabbath
attacks.description: Recites a dark incantation in which it prays for a festival of death; those who hear the spell soon die.

attacks.name: Dark Cloud (Death Cloud)
attacks.description: Generates a cloud of darkness which causes everything to decay.

Mephistomon X.name: Mephistomon X
Mephistomon X.description: Mephistomon X is a Fallen Angel Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Since it changed its appearance from a ram to that of a ewe and dressed itself in a ladylike fashion, it skilfully uses advanced dark incantations, and its every move exudes elegance. Its raison d'être is casting death upon those crying and begging for their lives or those struggling hopelessly.

attacks.name: Black Sabbath
attacks.description: A dark incantation in which it prays for a festival of death. Those who hear this spell will soon die.

attacks.name: Death Cloud
attacks.description: Generates a cloud of darkness which causes everything to decay.

attacks.name: Hermannia
attacks.description: Casts death upon those crying and begging for their lives or those struggling hopelessly with shots from its dark incantation.

attacks.name: Merry Merry Destruction
attacks.description: Unleashes a vast amount of magical power from its umbrella.

Meramon.name: Meramon
voiceActors: (En:)Peter Spellos(Adventure/Tamers/Data Squad),Ben Diskin,Bob Klein,Christopher Smith,Kyle Hebert,Matthew Mercer,Neil Kaplan(Fusion)
Meramon.description: Meramon is a Flame Digimon. It is shrouded in crimson flames over its entire body. As a Digimon generated from the defensive "Firewall" which prevents illegal entries from the Internet and the like, it possesses a violent temperament like the flames that envelop its body, and tries to incinerate everything it touches. Its fire power is stronger than those of the same species on File Island, and because taming this Digimon is extremely difficult, even if it's tamed, there's no telling when it will bare its fangs.

attacks.name: Fireball (Burning Fist)
attacks.description: Flares up both of its arms, knocking away the opponent.

attacks.name: Blazing Flames (ぐれんの炎, Guren no Honoo, lit. "Crimson Flame")
attacks.description: Fires multiple small fireballs.

attacks.name: Fire Fist
attacks.description: Engulfs its hand in fire and punches the opponent.

attacks.name: Magma Blast (Magma Bomb)
attacks.description: Emits magma rocks which rain upon its opponents.

attacks.name: Heat Knuckle
attacks.description: Strikes the enemy with a flaming fist.

Meramon X.name: Meramon X
Meramon X.description: Meramon X is a Flame Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its violent temperament has grown even more, and if it discovers approaching Virus-species, it will strike them down and go on a fierce rampage despite being a Data-species. The reason it is unafraid of Virus-species is because it acquired a barrier known as the "X-Patch", which has collected in its right hand. Not only does it defend against attacks from Virus-species, but it can also unleash its Special Move "X Radicate".

attacks.name: Burning Fist
attacks.description: Flares up both of its arms, and knocks away the opponent.

attacks.name: X Radicate (X-Radicate)
attacks.description: Burns anything without leaving a trace.

Mercurymon.name: Mercurymon
Mercurymon.description: Mercurymon is a Mutant Digimon. It possesses power over Steel which bears the might of AncientWisemon. It acts as an advisor among the Warriors of Evil, to whom it imparts its wisdom. Due to its aristocratic tendencies, it often obsesses over making sure things are done to its liking; this obsession carries over into battle, where it explains its tactics and the splendor of the equipment it uses one by one. While its brilliant mind allows it to come up with various strategies, at the same time, it often ends up arguing with itself in a fast-paced soliloquy because of it. The powerful mirrors on both of its arms are referred to as the "Irony no Tate" (イロニーの盾, Ironī no Tate, lit. "Shield of Irony"), and they reflect any damage dealt to it by the opponent's attacks back at the opponent. It also utilises a peculiar trick where it reflects itself in its mirror, then proceeds to enter the mirror and vanish without a trace.

attacks.name: Dark Reflection (Generous Mirror)
attacks.description: Uses the reflection of an opponent in the "Irony no Tate" to reflect an attack.

attacks.name: Dark Reflection (Offset Reflector)
attacks.description: Absorbs projectiles in one "Irony no Tate" and releases them from the other mirror with their characteristics reversed.

Mermaimon.name: Mermaimon
Mermaimon.description: Mermaimon is an Aquatic Beast Man Digimon. This Digimon, which takes the form of the mythical Mermaid, is based in seas found in cold regions even in the Digital World. It is good at singing, which is unusual for a Digimon, and does so with a very beautiful timbre, charming those who listen to it. However, because it is greedy and extremely fond of treasure, it charms those with its singing when it feels attracted to the treasure, even if their data (treasure) belongs to other Digimon, and then takes the opportunity to loot from them. For that reason, it is rumored that it hides a vast amount of data somewhere in the Net Ocean, but it loses interest in the data it has looted once it falls into its possession, and discards it.

attacks.name: Northern Cross Bomber
attacks.description: Crushes the enemy by shooting its golden anchor.

attacks.name: Charm Plunder
attacks.description: Seduces its opponent with its appearance to loot its wealth.

Merukimon.name: Merukimon
Merukimon.description: Merukimon is a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", it is a Digimon god of genius who boasts of being the fastest in the Digital World. It is able to outstrip the fastest runner, becoming impossible to perceive with the naked eye, so it is said that all images of Merukimon in records and documents are just afterimages. It hates to stay in the same place, and as it is always wandering the Digital World, it is surely difficult to encounter. Merukimon excels in Shamanism, and its favorite knife "Aztec" is able to slice through space.

attacks.name: Thousand Fists (Thousand Fist)
attacks.description: Uses a short and speedy teleport to get close to the opponent, then pours on a hyper-barrage.

attacks.name: Spiritual Enchant
attacks.description: Uses its excellence in Shamanism and the knife Aztec to summon apparitions from another world.

attacks.name: Mirage Image
attacks.description: Moves in quickly and attacks with the Azteca.

attacks.name: Kerykeion
attacks.description: Absorbs enemy HP with the mystical Kerykeion staff.

Mervamon.name: Mervamon
debut: "The Power Drain: The Hunters of Honey Land" [35]
Mervamon.description: Mervamonis a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", it has the appearance of a woman. It is the matured form ofMinervamonthat has amassed experience and achievements over time, and its personality has calmed down considerably to become more mature as compared to its time as Minervamon. It became Mervamon to pursue elegance and sensuality, and as its behavior, speech, and conduct are wholly overflowing with elegance, it brings about the sensuality in its surroundings. It seeks sensuality in battle, and displays its refined, elegant dance to mesmerize observers. As such, there appear to be a great number of Digimon that became fans of Mervamon from being a witness. It wields the "Olympia Kai"(オリンピア改,Orinpia Kai, lit. "Olympia Revision")greatsword in its right arm, and the "Medullia" serpent on its left.

attacks.name: Night Stalker
attacks.description: Extends the Medullia, which pursues the opponent anywhere to swallow them whole.

attacks.name: Love Poison
attacks.description: Uses its glamour to exploit the vitality of the opponents that inhale the toxic mist sprayed from the Medullia's mouth.

attacks.name: Final Strike Roll
attacks.description: Performs a forward rolling slash with Olympia Kai drawn and filled with power.

attacks.name: Madness Merry-go-round DX
attacks.description: Performs a spinning slash, too quick to catch with the eyes, with the Olympia Kai and Medullia, creating a tornado that instantly tears the opponents it touches limb from limb.

attacks.name: Snake Punch (蛇パンチ, Hebi Panchi)
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent with the Medullia.

attacks.name: Medullia Punch
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent with the Medullia.

attacks.name: Olympia Kai
attacks.description: Slashes the opponent with the Olympia Kai.

Mervamon Wide-Hi-Vision Sword.name: Mervamon Wide-Hi-Vision Sword
Mervamon Wide-Hi-Vision Sword.description: Mervamon Wide-Hi-Vision Sword is a Digimon. It is the DigiFuse of Mervamon, Wisemon, and Hi-VisionMonitamon. Ewan and The Land of Illusion

attacks.name: Mervision Mind Scan
attacks.description: Uses its analysis powers to pinpoint its foe.

MetalEtemon.name: MetalEtemon
MetalEtemon.description: MetalEtemon is an Android Digimon. It calls itself the "King of Digimon", and was once called the strongest Digimon. It went out to fight harsh battles in order to search out a mighty person, and though it was able to acquire valuable combat data, it was also considerably injured due to the constant battles. It then studied its own weaknesses from the data acquired through battling, and has now been perfectly reborn as an ultimate combat machine by full metallizing itself. Its body surface has a full coating of the Chrome Digizoid metal used by Metal-species Digimon. Its combat abilities have been raised to their maximum, giving birth to an invincible fighter which has acquired Strong- and Dirty-style wrestling skills. MetalEtemon is on good terms with WaruMonzaemon, and it is said that the WaruMonzaemon plush toy it wears on its waist is something that WaruMonzaemon sent to it..

attacks.name: Banana Slip
attacks.description: Trips the opponent with a banana peel.

attacks.name: Nuclear Punch (Mega Punch)
attacks.description: Punches with metal its fists.

attacks.name: Hekoki Attack (へこきアタック, Hekoki Attack lit. "Fart Attack")
attacks.description: Emits flatulent gas.

attacks.name: Metal Punch (Number One Punch)
attacks.description: Unleashes a punch with all of its confidence.

attacks.name: Metal Punch (Full Metal Hip Attack)
attacks.description: Slams its hip into an enemy.

attacks.name: Dark Spirits Deluxe
attacks.description: Calls down dark lightning made from negative energy.

attacks.name: Dark Network and Concert Crush (Love Serenade)
attacks.description: Sings a song that causes an opponent to lose the will to fight.

title: King of Digimon

MetalGarurumon.name: MetalGarurumon
voiceActors: (En:)Kirk Thornton(Adventure/tri./Rumble Arena/2/Allstar Rumble),Jeff Nimoy(Revenge of Diaboromon)
MetalGarurumon.description: MetalGarurumonis an Android Digimon. It is the final form ofGarurumonand the ultimate form ofGarurumon-speciesDigimon,and powered itself up by metallizing almost its entire body. Not only has it retained its natural keenness when it underwent metallization, but it can also pulverize the opponent with the countless weapons concealed throughout its body, whose number is rivaled by those ofMegaGargomon, the high-temperature counterpart to the low-temperature MetalGarurumon.It radiates invisible lasers from the four Laser Sights on its snout, and because it is able to analyze the targets before it using all of its sensors, such asinfrared raysandX-rays, it is impossible to escape MetalGarurumon even when among the darkness outside of its field of vision. Also, it can release beam-shaped wings from the arms extending from its back, allowing it to fly about theNet Spaceat extremely high speed.

attacks.name: Metal Wolf Claw (Cocytus Breath)
attacks.description: Spews cold air at absolute zero that completely freezes everything, and instantly brings the victim's vital functions to a halt.

attacks.name: Grace Cross Freezer
attacks.description: Launches freezing missiles from all of the weapons hidden throughout its body.

attacks.name: Garuru Tomahawk
attacks.description: Fires a missile from its chest.

attacks.name: Metal Wolf Snout
attacks.description: Fires four energy beams from the four laser sites on its snout.

attacks.name: Metal Howling
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with a powerful howl.

attacks.name: Metal Wolf Throw (Metal Fang)
attacks.description: A stronger version of Freeze Fang.

attacks.name: Blizzard Bash (Blizzard Attack)
attacks.description: Charges forward through the air, trailing ice from its wings.

attacks.name: Giga Missile
attacks.description: Charges up with glowing red eyes and fires a heavy missile from its chest plate.

attacks.name: Burst Wolf Claw (Giga Destruction)
attacks.description: Launches a barrage of missiles from its back.

attacks.name: Metal Wolf Claw (Metal Scratch)
attacks.description: Slides forward, trailing ice behind it, and scratches the enemy with icy claws.

attacks.name: Metal Claw
attacks.description: Swipes with a forepaw.

MetalGarurumon X.name: MetalGarurumon X
MetalGarurumon X.description: MetalGarurumon Xis an Android Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. It has been found that it has gained additional armaments as well as upgraded sensors. In order to arm its entire body to adapt to both long- and short-distance combat, it has taken on a bipedal form, and is equipped with the gatling gun "Metal Storm", which has the ability to snipe over long distances, bombard a large area at mid-range, and rapid-fire extremely quickly even at short distances, boasting of overwhelming firepower. Its combined bombardment capability is more than 1.2 times that ofMagnaGarurumon's; it is basically a mass of firearms in the form of a swift beast.

attacks.name: Metal Wolf Claw (Cocytus Breath)
attacks.description: Spews cold air at absolute zero that completely freezes everything, and instantly brings the victim's vital functions to a halt.

attacks.name: Grace Cross Freezer
attacks.description: Launches freezing missiles from all of the weapons hidden throughout its body.

attacks.name: Garuru Burst
attacks.description: Fires all weapons armed through the body at once.

MetalGreymon (Vaccine).name: MetalGreymon (Vaccine)

otherNames.name: 真メタルグレイモン True MetalGreymon
メタルグレイモンＬ MetalGreymon L
機械暴龍獸/机械暴龙兽 JīxièBàolóngshòu

MetalGreymon (Vaccine).description: MetalGreymon (Vaccine)is a Cyborg Digimon. It has mechanized more than half of its body, incorporating technology appropriated fromAndromon.The MetalGreymon ofFolder Continentare Cyborg Digimon that succeed in perfectly digivolving fromGreymon,and draw out a stronger power which cannot be compared with those ofFile Island.In order to digivolve to MetalGreymon, it must fight its way through and defeat the formidable opponents who come against it. Also, MetalGreymon's offensive power is said to equal that of a single nuclear warhead, and if the likes of a low-level Digimon suffered that blow, it would be annihilated without leaving a trace. Its "Trident Arm" is made from enhancedChrome Digizoid.

attacks.name: Mega Claw (Trident Arm)
attacks.description: Launches its tethered Trident Arm to slash or wrap up enemies.

attacks.name: Giga Blaster (Giga Destroyer)
attacks.description: Fires organic missiles from the hatch on part of its chest.

attacks.name: Metal Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with its claw.

attacks.name: Terra Destroyer (Tera Destroyer)
attacks.description: Launches an enhanced version of its "Giga Blaster" attack.

attacks.name: Metal Slash II (メタルスラッシュ改, Metal Slash Kai, lit. "Metal Slash Revision")
attacks.description: Slashes with its claw.

attacks.name: Powerful Flame (Overflame)
attacks.description: Unleashes a wave of fire from its claw. In Digimon Adventure (PSP) and Digimon New Century it breaths fire from its mouth.

attacks.name: Giga Storm
attacks.description: Sends out a high-temperature energy wave from the firing ports on its chest.

MetalGreymon (Virus).name: MetalGreymon (Virus)

otherNames.name: メタルグレイモンＥＲ MetalGreymon ER
メタルグレイモンＬ MetalGreymon L

MetalGreymon (Virus).description: MetalGreymon (Virus)is a Cyborg Digimon. It is the strongest Cyborg Digimon, and after going through numerous battles, it was able to survive by mechanizing more than half its body, using technology appropriated fromAndromon.The MetalGreymon ofFile Islandwere able to drastically extend their vital functions through remodeling, but their flesh portions could not hold out and were discolored blue.In order to digivolve to MetalGreymon, it must fight its way through and defeat the formidable opponents who come against it. Also, its offensive power is said to equal that of a single nuclear warhead.

attacks.name: Giga Blaster (Giga Destroyer)
attacks.description: Fires missiles from the hatch on part of its chest.

attacks.name: Trident Arm
attacks.description: Launches its tethered metal claw off its arm to slash or wrap up enemies.

attacks.name: Metal Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with its claw.

attacks.name: Flame of Fury (Revenge Flame)
attacks.description: Unleashes a wave of fire from its claw.

MetalGreymon (2010 anime).name: MetalGreymon (2010 anime)

otherNames.name: メタルグレイモン（デジモンクロスウォーズ版） MetalGreymon (Digimon Xros Wars)
メタルグレイモン(XW) MetalGreymon (XW)

MetalGreymon (2010 anime).description: MetalGreymon (2010 anime)is a Cyborg Digimon. It is the "Tactical-enhancement Mode"(戦術強化形態,Senjutsukyouka Keitai), which possessesMailBirdramon's armor on top ofGreymon's power, a form which was strengthened without hindering the fighting strength of Greymon, who specialized in close-combat fighting. Due to its "Trident Arm" and "Giga Blaster" techniques, it has changed from a Greymon that excelled in one-to-one battles to an enhancement that could fight one-to-many.

attacks.name: Trident Arm
attacks.description: Smashes its claw into the opponent, a technique exceptionally enhanced in offensive power due to adding extremely high-temperature claws on top of Greymon's already mighty strength.

attacks.name: Giga Blaster (Giga Destroyer)
attacks.description: Annihilates all of the opponents surrounding it by emitting extremely high-energy, homing laser beams at them.

MetalGreymon Alterous Mode.name: MetalGreymon Alterous Mode
MetalGreymon Alterous Mode.description: MetalGreymon Alterous Mode is an Android Digimon. MetalGreymon, who acquired mighty power by mechanizing its upper body, has been updated with further mechanization to its right arm. With the accumulation of fierce battles that it has lived through, it transformed its right arm into a huge energy cannon called "Alterous" so that it can fight against tough enemies that draw near. It exhibits its full combat ability at both close and long range, and has been remodelled to defeat any tough enemy it encounters.

attacks.name: Positron Blaster
attacks.description: Concentrates energy into the "Alterous" and fires subluminal bombardments.

attacks.name: Alter Blade
attacks.description: Converts the energy it has accumulated into a positron blade.

attacks.name: Giga Destroyer
attacks.description: Fires organic missiles from the hatch on part of its chest.

attacks.name: Trident Arm
attacks.description: Launches its tethered Trident Arm to slash or wrap up enemies.

attacks.name: Giga Storm
attacks.description: Sends out a high-temperature energy wave from the firing ports on its chest.

MetalGreymon Cyberdramon.name: MetalGreymon Cyberdramon
MetalGreymon Cyberdramon.description: MetalGreymon Cyberdramonis an Enhancement Digimon.Cyberdramonturned into a weapon as the "Heavy-weapon Mode"(武装重火器形態,Jūkaki Keitai)which assistsMetalGreymon. As its "Cyber Gigantic Launcher" is its Special Move which boasts its maximum offensive power, it is demonstrated along with its "Coronal Mass Ejection" in order to annihilate the opponent.

attacks.name: Cyber Crusher (Cyber Gigantic Launcher)
attacks.description: Concentrates and shoots all of its energy.

attacks.name: Coronal Mass Ejection
attacks.description: Lowers its thermal power but opens all of its gunports, allowing it to attack countless enemies.

MetalGreymon X.name: MetalGreymon X
MetalGreymon X.description: MetalGreymon Xis a Cyborg Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. Both its flesh portions and remodelled portions are perfectly well-balanced, possibly because of how intense the power it had obtained was. The "Trident Arm VER 9.9" on its left arm has a control program set in itsDigiCorethat has been upgraded to its limit, and possesses the energy equivalent of a single shot of "Giga Destroyer" in just one swing, so it is an offensive force that must never be endured in close combat.

attacks.name: Trident Arm
attacks.description: Launches its tethered Trident Arm to slash or wrap up enemies.

attacks.name: Giga Destroyer
attacks.description: Fires organic missiles from the hatch on part of its chest.

attacks.name: Metal Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with its claw.

MetalGreymon (Virus) X.name: MetalGreymon (Virus) X

otherNames.name: メタルグレイモンX（ウィルス種） MetalGreymon X (Virus)

MetalGreymon (Virus) X.description: MetalGreymon (Virus) Xis a Cyborg Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. Each of its mechanized portions have been updated; in particular, its "Alterous" (Lat: The Others), the enhanced and remodeled "Trident Arm" on its left arm, is capable of switching between "Blitz Mode" and "Blast Mode". Also, it has been equipped with an energy booster that, at its maximum output, lets it exceed thespeed of sound.

attacks.name: Pandemic Destroyer
attacks.description: Fires viral energy in its "Blast Mode".

attacks.name: Energy Blitz
attacks.description: Flys at critical velocity, and pierces the enemy in its "Blitz Mode". The virus in this technique is infectious and toxic enough to be designated as a disaster, and is said to completely corrode the configuration data within a Digicore even if it is simply scratched.

MetalKabuterimon.name: MetalKabuterimon
MetalKabuterimon.description: MetalKabuterimon is an Android Digimon. It possesses power over Thunder which bears the might of AncientBeetlemon. It has a cautious and prudent personality because it was discovered in a defense system created in reference to the Scarab treasure chamber in the deepest part of a pyramid. During battle, it patiently serves as a shield for its comrades using its sturdy armor and endures the opponent's attacks, but if it reaches its critical point, it will go on an intense offensive with all of its gunports until even the opponent's form is reduced to nothing. Because its heavy weight lowers its mobility, it is basically the one in charge of logistical support. However, in close-range battles, it obliterates the opponent with its various armaments.

attacks.name:
Bolo Thunder (Ultimate Thunder): Collects and then fires all of its energy from both of its arms.
Anti-Ground Ultimate Thunder
attacks.description: Fires Bolo Thunder straight down from the air.

attacks.name: Anti-Ground Ultimate Thunder
attacks.description: Fires Bolo Thunder straight down from the air.

attacks.name: Electron Cannon (Field Destroyer)
attacks.description: Fires an extremely high-speed positron laser from the gun turret on its head.

attacks.name: Gigantic Impact
attacks.description: Rams the enemy while rushing at full speed.

MetalKoromon.name: MetalKoromon
MetalKoromon.description: MetalKoromon is a Machine Digimon. It is super-tiny and has red eyes that act as photosensors. The appearance of it moving around restlessly seems very cute, but because it is carrying nothing but a simple program that moves in reaction to bright lights, if its surroundings go dark, it becomes completely unable to move. The reason why is not understood, but when it is in a good mood, it discharges electricity from the tip of its tail.

attacks.name: Jamming Powder
attacks.description: Releases iron grains to cause temporary disorder in the opponent's AI, then flees while the opponent is confused.

Metallicdramon.name: Metallicdramon
Metallicdramon.description: Metallicdramonis a Sky Dragon Digimon. A Digimon that flies at the highest altitudes of theDigital Worldat thespeed of light, even other flying Digimon cannot catch sight of it. According to one theory, it is said that if Metallicdramon flaps its wings from high in the sky, mysterious particles will be scattered that preserve the harmony of the Digital World. It seems that when Metallicdramon reduces its altitude so that it is visible, it is a sign that something is about to happen.

attacks.name: Laser Cannon
attacks.description: Annihilates things in a straight line with a powerful beam that it accumulates in the laser gun on its tail. The light that is emitted the moment this technique is invoked can be seen from 10km away, and those who have witnessed it directly at close range are blinded by its overwhelming radiance.

attacks.name: Laser Saber
attacks.description: Fixes the laser on its tail to being a sword, then charges and slashes at high speed.

MetallifeKuwagamon.name: MetallifeKuwagamon

otherNames.name: 美他力古加獸 mei taa lik gu gaa sau

MetallifeKuwagamon.description: MetallifeKuwagamonis an Insect Digimon. It is a subspecies ofKuwagamonwhich rapidly boosted its offensive power by means of armification. It has also gained grappling ability due to the fact that its form has become humanoid, and as it has both a tough shell as well as nimble movements, it boasts top-class balance among Ultimate Digimon.

attacks.name: Homing Laser
attacks.description: Fires a beam from the gun points equipped to the fingertips of its hands. It is able to freely alter the trajectory of the beam at its own will, allowing it to avoid any kind of obstacle and hit the opponent dead on.

attacks.name: Emit Blade
attacks.description: Emits a beam in the shape of a blade and slashes with it.

MetalMamemon.name: MetalMamemon
MetalMamemon.description: MetalMamemon is an Android Digimon. It digivolved further in strength than Mamemon, who holds the alias of "Smiley Bomber". As usual, if one is deceived by its cute appearance, they will have a terrible experience. Nine-tenths of its body is mechanized, and it has the Psycho Blaster equipped to its left arm.

attacks.name: Metal Smirk Bomb (Energy Bomb)
attacks.description: Fires a blast from its Psycho Blaster that possesses tremendous destructive force which is able to reliably bring down the opponent.

title: Smiley Bomber
(スマイリーボマー
Sumairī Bonbā?)

MetalMamemon X.name: MetalMamemon X
MetalMamemon X.description: MetalMamemon X is a Cyborg Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its mechanization and shift to hi-tech has progressed, so 99% of its body has become cybernetic. When it comes to battle, it defeats the enemy by reliably performing commands such as attacking, defending and moving. The Psycho Blaster has also become hi-tech.

attacks.name: Energy Bomb
attacks.description: Fires a blast from its Psycho Blaster that possesses tremendous destructive force which is able to reliably bring down the opponent.

attacks.name: Energy Laser Bomb
attacks.description: A unique explosive laser, allowing it to instantly sweep away enemies.

MetalPhantomon.name: MetalPhantomon
MetalPhantomon.description: MetalPhantomon is a Cyborg Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It fully mechanized the body of the Reaper-like Phantomon. It operates using an energy supply from another dimension's Digital World, and it is even said that its strings are being pulled by someone.

attacks.name: Grave Scream
attacks.description: Gives off a strange, eerie sound with its energy emission-shaped sickle, then reaps souls directly, regardless of any kind of armor or shields.

attacks.name: Soul Predator
attacks.description: Releases enormous energy to enlarge its sickle, then falls upon the opponent as if it was starving for souls.

MetalPiranimon.name: MetalPiranimon
MetalPiranimon.description: MetalPiranimon is an Aquatic Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. A swarm of these dangerous Digimon were discovered within the Net Rivers of a particular region, and though it is said that the number of Digimon that have become Megas is extremely small, there are schools of these Digimon which will bite into any Digimon who passes into their territory, killing it immediately. There are razor-sharp teeth in its "Metal Head" cranium, and because its tenacious jaw functions like a vise, it bites and completely rends every armor. However, because the feature named "Metal Head" is extremely heavy, it keeps its balance with the weight attached to its tail fin. Also, if the red button on its calvaria is pressed, then it will simply come off, and be replaced with a new "Metal Head".

attacks.name: 3D Razor
attacks.description: Bites and rends the opponent from every direction.

attacks.name: Max-Power Vise
attacks.description: Uses the "Metal Head" at maximum power so that it doesn't release until it bites through.

MetalSeadramon.name: MetalSeadramon
MetalSeadramon.description: MetalSeadramon is an Android Digimon. It is the final form of the Seadramon-species whose whole body is covered in the strongest metal, Chrondigizoit alloy. Its Metal Body reflects every attack. Furthermore, it has the fastest speed of movement among aquatic Digimon. MetalSeadramon was remodeled by the Crack Team as an Underwater Interceptor Digimon, completing their full set of Land, Sea, and Air Interceptor Digimon.

attacks.name: River of Power (Ultimate Stream)
attacks.description: Fires an energy cannon from its snout.

attacks.name: Hot Squeeze (Hell Squeeze)
attacks.description: Powerfully constricts its enemy in its coils.

attacks.name: Poseidon's Divide (Poseidon Divide)
attacks.description: Summons up a tsunami and directs it at the foe.

attacks.name: Shimetsuke (しめつけ, Shimetsuke lit. "Pressure")
attacks.description: Squeezes an enemy with its body.

MetalTyrannomon.name: MetalTyrannomon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Kenji Akabane,Tomohisa Hashizume(Xros Wars, Death Generals),Daisuke Kishio(Xros Wars, Young Hunters)
MetalTyrannomon.description: MetalTyrannomon is an Android Digimon. It remodeled its body in order to acquire mightier powers. After Megadramon was remodeled for anti-air use, MetalTyrannomon was remodeled as an anti-ground interceptor Digimon. Its reinforced body deflects all attacks, and it possesses the terrifying offensive power to smash through armor with its mighty chin, no matter how hard it may be.

attacks.name: Fire Blast II (Giga Destroyer II)
attacks.description: Fires a missile from its right arm.

attacks.name: Nuclear Laser
attacks.description: Fires an energy shell from its left arm.

MetalTyrannomon X.name: MetalTyrannomon X
MetalTyrannomon X.description: MetalTyrannomon X is an Android Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Although its roughness is more noticeable than MetalGreymon's, who is recognized by everyone as having "ultra-high performance" among remodeled Digimon, it boasts the best performance in destructive activity on land. The original Tyrannomon's durability has endured excessive remodeling by the Crack Team, and its ferocity has transformed into tremendous offensive power, so those remodeled contents have been fully drawn out. While its enhanced claws are no match for MetalGreymon's "Trident Arm VER. 9.9", a control program similar to VER. 7.0 is set in its Digicore (incidentally, this is a specification that is more than necessary for hand-to-hand combat) and the excess energy is fired from its left arm as its "Nuclear Laser II".

attacks.name: Nuclear Laser
attacks.description: An energy shell fired from its left arm.

attacks.name: Giga Destroyer II
attacks.description: A missile fired from its right arm.

attacks.name: Nuclear Laser II
attacks.description: Excess energy is fired from its left arm.

Metamormon.name: Metamormon
Metamormon.description: Metamormon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a phantasmagoric replicating Digimon, and those who meet Metamormon never forget it.

attacks.name: Laser Translation
attacks.description: Analyzes and transforms into an enemy.

attacks.name: Trancey Rave
attacks.description: Pulverizes the enemy.

Meteormon.name: Meteormon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Yasuhiro Takato(Frontier, Gotsumon),Yūsuke Oguri,Ryō Naitō(Frontier, Moon Base),Ken Maeda(Savers)
(En:)R. Martin Klein(Frontier, Gotsumon),Dave Wittenberg,Joe Ochman,Steve Kramer(Frontier, Moon)
Meteormon.description: Meteormon is an Ore Digimon. It is a form of Gotsumon which, for some reason, had the meteorite data within the ore data it possesses appear on its surface. It is made from a hard material which only exists in space, and possesses powerful defensive ability.

attacks.name: Galactic Flare (Cosmo Flash)
attacks.description: Emits a mysterious, cosmic energy wave. Some media depict it as causing a meteor shower from a giant meteor.

attacks.name: Rock Tornado
attacks.description: Swings arms wildly while moving towards the enemy.

attacks.name: Falling Star
attacks.description: Drops a meteorite on the enemy.

attacks.name: Big Bang Blow
attacks.description: Throws a very powerful punch.

attacks.name: Invincibility (Guard Rock)
attacks.description: Prevents all damage from the next attack.

Mihiramon.name: Mihiramon
Mihiramon.description: Mihiramon is an Animal Digimon. It is the "Tiger" Deva, and serves the Digimon Sovereign Azulongmon. As a follower of Azulongmon, it is the biggest ruffian among the Deva, though it is also a brilliant tactician that specializes in reading the terrain. With its tremendous speed, faster than the wind when racing across the land and quicker than a sound when soaring through the sky on its two wings, it runs down the opponent. In combat, it cuts the opponent apart with its sharp fangs and claws, and it has mastered the "Samurai Tiger Tail" (宝棒 Bǎo Bàng, lit. "Treasure Stick"), which is its tail transformed into an octagonal three-section staff.

attacks.name: Tiger Wing Blades (Vimohana)
attacks.description: Strikes the ground with the Samurai Tiger Tail, generating a shock wave over the surrounding area.

attacks.name: Samurai Tiger Tail (宝棒 Bǎo Bàng, lit. "Treasure Stick")
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent with the Samurai Tiger Tail.

attacks.name: Armored Tiger Tail
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent with a spiked Samurai Tiger Tail.

Mikemon.name: Mikemon
Mikemon.description: Mikemon is a Demon Beast Digimon. It is a never-before-seen Digimon, and it is said that the data of Nyaromon slept within its body through the Rookie phase, but re-manifested as a Champion. However, because it is not a Holy Beast, it does not wear a Holy Ring. As it is a very intelligent Digimon, it is usually calm and docile, but when it comes to battle, it makes sport of the enemy with its nimble movements, and fights using its specialty martial arts.

attacks.name: Nikukyū Punch (肉球パンチ, Nikukyū Punch lit. "Paw Punch")
attacks.description: Strikes with its hardened paws.

attacks.name: Neko Claw (ネコクロー, Neko Claw lit. "Cat Claw")
attacks.description: Scratches with its sharpened claws.

Millenniummon.name: Millenniummon
Millenniummon.description: Millenniummon is a Composition Digimon. It fused the overwhelming power possessed by Machinedramon and the data of various powerful Digimon possessed by Kimeramon. It is said to be impossible to defeat, and at present, the unclear cause of its fusion is being ascertained, but it is unlikely that any clues will be found.

attacks.name: Time Unlimited
attacks.description: Creates a pocket dimension with compressed time, and traps an opponent there for an eternity.

attacks.name: Dimension Destroyer
attacks.description: Destroys the pocket dimension it created.

attacks.name: ∞ Cannon
attacks.description: Fires superdreadnought-class energy waves from its two cannons.

Mimicmon.name: Mimicmon
Mimicmon.description: Mimicmon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a Champion Digimon thought to have mutated from security software used for protecting computer terminals. At first, it appears to be little more than a rusted, abandoned old cage, but when it senses the presences of a Virus Digimon, a black haze materializes within the cell and a long, ghastly arm stretches out from between the bars. As a result of capturing and taking in Virus-types that invade its territory similar to a trap, its own Attribute has become Virus as well. There are numerous Digimon sealed within its body, and the arms and horn coming out of its cage all originate from other Digimon. The weapon on its left arm "Dead Shot", its main equipment, is also loaded from the Digimon it has sealed, but its power has dropped dramatically due to the data being compressed.

attacks.name: Hinder Miasma
attacks.description: Deprives the enemy of their freedom with the mist released from its cage. Many Digimon that are immobilized by this technique are taken into Mimicmon's body.

Minervamon.name: Minervamon
Minervamon.description: Minervamonis a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", it has the appearance of a maiden warrior wearing snake skin.Though it has an extremely short physique, it possesses superhuman strength it uses to freely wield a greatsword, "Olympia", as large as its own body. It possesses a cheerful personality due to its childlike innocence, but when its emotions become violently unstable, it gets into a bad mood which causes selfish and willful (problematic) behavior that no one can help it cope with.

attacks.name: Strike Roll
attacks.description: Unleashes a forward rolling slash from the Olympia, splitting the ground.

attacks.name: Madness Merry-go-round
attacks.description: Performs a horizontal spinning slash too quick to catch with the eyes, creating a large tornado.

attacks.name: Dominion Blade
attacks.description: Swings the long sword, Olympia, to cause a shockwave.

attacks.name: Olympia Slash
attacks.description: Uses the long sword, Olympia to slash the enemy.

Minervamon X.name: Minervamon X
Minervamon X.description: Minervamon X is a Deity Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The X-Antibody has caused a portion of its hair to not only become enlarged, but also gain their own sapience. Its hairs refer to themselves as a 'sage', and utilise their vast knowledge to support Minervamon in battle. Possibly due to its hair also requiring nourishment, Minervamon, who was originally already small in size, has now turned smaller than even its cherished sword, Olympia. However, Minervamon does not seem to mind at all; in fact, it seems to rejoice innocently at gaining new playmates, and has named its bundles of hair "Ulula" and "Serpens" respectively. Even though it has shrunk in size, its monstrous strength has not weakened at all; it has instead grown able to run about nimbly while wielding its Olympia, despite Olympia being larger than it in size, and thus is even more of a headache to keep in check.

attacks.name: Strike Roll
attacks.description: A forward rolling slash unleashed from its greatsword Olympia.

attacks.name: Madness Merry-go-round
attacks.description: Performs a horizontal spinning slash too quick to catch with the eyes, creating a large tornado.

attacks.name: Haunted Hair (Haunted Pilus, Lat: Haunted Hair)
attacks.description: Lets its hair braids Ulula and Serpens, which are able to stretch at will, run wild after the enemy.

attacks.name: Crazy-Go-Round
attacks.description: Does a powerful horizontal spinning slash, generating a large tornado of blue flames.

attacks.name: Sanctus Tormentum (Lat: Sacred Cannon)
attacks.description: The energy beam it fires from the crystal on its shield boasts power rivalling that of the main cannons found on giant battleships, and is said to be able to blow apart a mountain with ease.

Minidekachimon.name: Minidekachimon
Minidekachimon.description: Minidekachimon is a Mini Dragon Digimon. It is a Rookie Digimon so small that it's mistaken for an In-Training. Although it isn't good at fighting, it has a big attitude and gets bossy. It is Atamadekachimon's pre-digivolution and rides in its mouth however it is protected inside the mouth of Atamadekachimon, and is completely at ease no matter what hustle and bustle occurs.

attacks.name: Kocchon
attacks.description: Infuriates the opponent by exhausting them by capitalizing on its small size to dive into their bosom.

Minomon.name: Minomon
voiceActors: (En:)Wendee Lee(Adventure 02),Tifanie Christun(Frontier),Paul St. Peter(Last Evolution Kizuna)
Minomon.description: Minomon is a Larva Digimon. It is a digivolution of Leafmon, and went into a tough outer shell. On days with good weather, or when it's in a good mood, it sticks its face out of its shell and vegetates. It hangs onto high places with the ivy (hair?) growing from its head, and moves by hanging onto large Digimon, but if it's over a short distance, it is also able to move by floating through the air. Due to its vegetative personality, it has a fault of not easily showing its emotions on its face. Also, as solitude is its "specialty", it has the inner fortitude to not be discouraged even if it gets worried and anxious.

attacks.name: Pinecone
attacks.description: Throws a hard, pine cone-shaped substance.

attacks.name: Worm Barrier
attacks.description: Summons a barrier to protect itself.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

Minotarumon.name: Minotarumon

otherNames.name: ミノタルモン成熟期 Minotaurmon Adult

Minotarumon.description: Minotarumon is an Animal Digimon. It is a dark Digimon that possesses strong Dark Side Power. Although its movements are not swift, it has extremely firm skin, so it won't yield to ordinary attacks. The "Demon Arm" is equipped to its left hand.

attacks.name: Earthquake Drill (Darkside Quake)
attacks.description: Generates a massive earthquake with the Demon Arm that floors opponents over a considerably wide range, so that no matter how far away they are they won't be able to escape.

attacks.name: Heavy Attack
attacks.description: Attacks with a blow with the power of a beast.

MirageGaogamon.name: MirageGaogamon
MirageGaogamon.description: MirageGaogamon is a Beast Knight Digimon. Its whole body is clad in Chrome Digizoid armor, and as a result of it moving at incomparable speeds, it deceives the opponent by appearing to only be a mirage.

attacks.name: Double Crescent Mirage
attacks.description: Fires crescent moon-shaped shock-waves from its hands.

attacks.name: Full Moon Blaster
