attacks.description: Concentrates its body's energy, then fires it from the mouth on its chest as a superdreadnought-class strike.

attacks.name: Gale Claw
attacks.description: Runs through like a hurricane, instantly cutting the opponent to pieces.

attacks.name: Howling Cannon
attacks.description: A howling, supersonic wave attack.

attacks.name: Quick Move
attacks.description: A quick attack.

attacks.name: Sonic Move
attacks.description: An even quicker attack.

title: Swift Blue Wolf
(神速の蒼き狼
Shinsoku no Aoki Ōkami?)

MirageGaogamon Burst Mode.name: MirageGaogamon Burst Mode
MirageGaogamon Burst Mode.description: MirageGaogamon Burst Mode is a Beast Knight Digimon. It is a unique form of MirageGaogamon that has temporarily reached the limits of its abilities through Burst Digivolution, and wears a weapon and an aura of planetary-class high-energy.

attacks.name: Meteor Shackle (Full Moon Meteor Impact)
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent with a sphere of light containing planetary-class energy.

attacks.name: Final Mirage Burst
attacks.description: Puts its body and soul into releasing the energy hidden within its weapon.

attacks.name: Luna Hook Slasher
attacks.description: Carves the opponent to pieces with its crescent moon-shaped energy blade.

title: Double Moon Profusion
(双月繚乱
Sōtsuki Ryōran?)

Missimon.name: Missimon
Missimon.description: Missimon is a Machine Digimon. It is a Digimon with a missile for a body. The moment it digivolves into Missimon, its missile is ignited and sends it flying non-stop until it further digivolves into another Digimon. While it is able to adjust its flight speed to some extent, it is unable to stop moving as it will fall if it does not maintain a sufficient flight speed.

attacks.name: Missile Crash
attacks.description: Does a body tackle sporting great destructive power, but this attack almost never hits its target due to Missimon's sub-par control.

Mistymon.name: Mistymon
Mistymon.description: Mistymon is a Warrior Digimon. It is a Digimon who came from another dimension of the Digital World, "Witchelny". In addition to having mastered numerous magic (high-level programming language), it is a sword user who possesses skillful swordmanship. Well-versed in both knighthood and witchcraft, it can attack with the magical power packed within its sword.

attacks.name: Core Dart
attacks.description: Freely manipulates a crystal, this is a technique that manages both offense and defense skillfully.

attacks.name: Blast Fire
attacks.description: Raises the power which covered its sword with a single flame, then inflicts slashes.

Mitamamon.name: Mitamamon
debut: Digimon ReArise, "A God Beast Digimon?! A Path for Mayu to Follow" [2.05]
Mitamamon.description: Mitamamonis a God Beast Digimon. It is a holy Digimon that is said to send the souls of Digimon who have carried out good deeds in their previous lives to Heaven. A collection of the four energies of fire, earth, wind and water, it lacks actual substance except for its Digicore. Despite being visible, it cannot be touched; only those who have been recognized by Mitamamon itself or Digimon who are on the verge of death are allowed to touch it. However, those who have figured out where Mitamamon's Digicore is can also touch it, so there are occasions when it is challenged to battle by extremely rare yet rough-tempered Digimon. Because Mitamamon has a calm personality and despises conflict, it often ignores battles it has been challenged to. However, as for those who have incurred its wrath once, Mitamamon changes into a raging beast that deals a crushing blow to them without mercy.

attacks.name: Gouenrin (轟炎輪, Gouenrin lit. "Roaring Flame Wheels")
attacks.description: Fires its flame-clad wheels, accompanied by a gust of wind.

attacks.name: Kaijinraidou (灰迅雷瞳, Kaijinraidou lit. "Ash and Thunderclap Eyes")
attacks.description: Strikes down the enemy with lightning that never misses, unleashed from its eyes.

attacks.name: Kyouka Suigetsu (響香水月, Kyouka Suigetsu lit. "Resounding Scent Water Moon")
attacks.description: A healing technique where it heals injuries received in battle with the element of water.

ModokiBetamon.name: ModokiBetamon
ModokiBetamon.description: ModokiBetamon is an Amphibian Digimon. Although it looks identical to Betamon, it is a rare species with a very small population. With its calm personality, it inhabits quiet swampland, and skilfully controls water currents. This yellow-green soldier lies in wait to ambush the enemy with its water pillars.

attacks.name: Electric Shock (電光ビリリン, Denkou Biririn, lit. "Lightning Shock")
attacks.description: Generates more than 1 MV of electric current to strike the opponent.

attacks.name: Blade Fin
attacks.description: Generates a shock wave from the crest on its head.

attacks.name: Aqua Tower
attacks.description: Unleashes a tiny waterspout.

Mojyamon.name: Mojyamon
Mojyamon.description: Mojyamon is a Rare Animal Digimon. It is a hairy Digimon completely covered in white fur, and lives in the hinterland of snowy mountains, so it is very rare to come across one. There are many reported sightings of Mojyamon, but no evidence to prove its existence, so for a long period, it was considered to be a Digimon based on myths. With its carefree personality, it is never belligerent. However, it considers its den and territory to be sacred ground, and it will never permit this sacred ground to be invaded. Apparently, there are times when it gets into territorial disputes with Hyogamon.

attacks.name: Ice Cloud (Icicle Rod)
attacks.description: Uses a gigantic icicle made by causing the moisture in the air to instantly freeze.

attacks.name: Boomerang Bone (骨骨ブーメラン, Hone Hone Boomerang, lit. "Bone Bone Boomerang")
attacks.description: Throws the bone of an ancient Digimon which had become fixed in the ice.

attacks.name: Bone Strike
attacks.description: Attacks with a hard bone club.

Mokumon.name: Mokumon
Mokumon.description: Mokumon is a Smoke Digimon. It is a Digimon Baby which envelops its body with a smoke-like vapor. It is a unique Digimon whose DigiCore is bare, so it seems it covers its DigiCore with Smoke in order to protect it, and has an unusual way of life. Because the Smoke was generated when its DigiCore was burned, it seems it is harmful neither to Mokumon itself nor to others. Also, because it is still in the middle of digivolving, when it encounters an opponent, it immediately flees. Then, it scatters the Smoke issuing from its body all around, and seizes the opportunity to escape when the opponent loses sight of it. As stated earlier, because it isn't particularly harmful, if you happen to see one, it would be best to be quiet.

attacks.name: Smoky Blow (Smoke)
attacks.description: Scatters the smoke issuing from its body all around, then seizes the opportunity to escape when the opponent loses sight of it.

Monimon.name: Monimon
Monimon.description: Monimon is a Braun Digimon. It is a low-ranking ninja Digimon that always operates in a group. Even though they are said to be in a group, they each operate within a fixed range from the others while hidden under vegetation or in the shade of a rock, and it can be said that while it has the appearance of an underling, it seems to be a ninja after all. Its emotions tend to project on its face, so while it always pretends to be calm, its emotions show up on its face (monitor) in the shape of emoticons. Furthermore, because it even projects its dreams from its face when it is asleep, everyone can see them, and it gets very embarrassed.

attacks.name: Rappa (乱破, Rappa lit. "Ninja")
attacks.description: Leaps upon the opponent in a group.

attacks.name: Suppa (水破, Suppa lit. "Ninja")
attacks.description: Fires a water pistol from its mouth.

attacks.name: Toppa (突破, Toppa lit. "Ninja")
attacks.description: Instantly runs away at high speed.

Monitamon.name: Monitamon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Yūko Maruyama(Xros Wars),Masami Kikuchi(Xros Wars, Elder),Cocoro Kikuchi(Xros Wars, Monitamon D)
Monitamon.description: Monitamon is a Braun Digimon. A ninja Digimon with a hobby of Digimon-watching wherever it goes, it is always observing someone. While it insists that it is a ninja, what it is doing is the very act of stalking. If you happen to see one of them, you had better believe that there are thirty of them around you. Although it freely uses several ninjutsu, none of them have very great power. What should be noted is not its fighting strength but its ability of "Information Sharing". This lets it record acquired information and share it with fellow Monitamon, so Monitamon's observations of good as well as bad and shameful things are spread faster than light. It carries the "Monitamon Backpack" (モニタモンドセル, Monitamon Randoseru).

attacks.name: Fire Shot (火弾, Kadan)
attacks.description: Creates a fireball.

attacks.name: Water Dragon (水竜, Suiryū)
attacks.description: Attacks with a water pistol.

attacks.name: Wind Wheel (風車, Kazaguruma)
attacks.description: Raises a wind.

attacks.name: Densen (電閃, Densen lit. "Lightning Flash")
attacks.description: Discharges lightning.

attacks.name: Konohagakure (木の葉隠れ, Konohagakure lit. "Foliage Concealment")
attacks.description: Hides itself with a foliage.

attacks.name: Suiton no Jutsu (水遁の術, Suiton no Jutsu lit. "Water Concealment Technique")
attacks.description: Hides itself beneath the water.

Monmon.name: Monmon
Monmon.description: Monmon is a Beast Digimon. It is a Digimon that has the appearance of an infant monkey. It has enough strength to wield a slingshot the size of its body with ease, and confidence in its abilities to prevent its prey from escaping. It often falls from treetops due to its careless personality. Its stylish traits are its tiger-printed outfit and its white-tipped tail.

attacks.name: Swing Swing (Baby Sling)
attacks.description: A shooting attack that boasts of infallible accuracy.

attacks.name: Mischievous Hoop
attacks.description: Throws a hoop at the opponent's legs to ensnare them and cause them to fall over.

Monochromon.name: Monochromon
Monochromon.description: Monochromon is a Dinosaur Digimon. It has grown a rhinoceros-like horn on its snout. Its huge horn becomes large enough to account for half of its body length as it grows. The hard substance covering parts of its horn and half its body possesses hardness of the same quality as diamond, and it is said that there is nothing that cannot be penetrated by this horn. Monochromon can be said to be a Digimon that excels in both offense and defense. As it is herbivorous, it has a relatively docile personality, but once it is angered, it will continue to unleash terrifying counterattacks from its body like a heavy tank.

attacks.name: Volcanic Strike (Volcano Strike)
attacks.description: A powerful flame shot.

attacks.name: Slamming Attack (たいあたり, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Blow")
Fiery Breath (Mega Flame)
attacks.description: Sets off a blast of fire with a big fireball.

attacks.name: Tomahawk Slash
attacks.description: Uses a machete-like horn to slash the opponent.

Monochromon X.name: Monochromon X
Monochromon X.description: Monochromon X is a Dinosaur Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its surface shines black, and has turned into an even harder shell, so its survivability has risen further. In order to support its huge horn and swing it downwards, it secures itself by piercing the elongated claws on its forefeet into the ground.

attacks.name: Volcanic Strike (Volcano Strike)
attacks.description: A powerful flame shot.

attacks.name: Tomahawk Slash
attacks.description: Mows down and cuts through the enemy with its huge, powered up, hatchet-shaped horn.

Monodramon.name: Monodramon
Monodramon.description: Monodramon is a Mini Dragon Digimon. It has bat-like wings attached to its hands, but is unable to fly. Despite being a Vaccine, its personality is not so much considerably rough as it is near to brutality, giving the impression that it is a brawl-loving Digimon. Even in the Digital World, this Monodramon is in the heart of most brawls enough that it seems even Ogremon is fed up with Monodramon's tenacity. Also, the horn growing behind it is said to be its weak point, but how true this is is uncertain.

attacks.name: Cracking Bite (Crack Bite)
attacks.description: Bites the opponent, fragmenting their data and collapsing them into malfunction based on where they were bitten.

attacks.name: Beat Knuckle
attacks.description: Assaults with earth-shattering force and wallops the opponent with its powerful claws.

attacks.name: Headbutt (ずつきこうげき, Zutsuki Kougeki, lit. "Headbutt Attack")
attacks.description: Attacks with a very strong head butt.

Monzaemon.name: Monzaemon
Monzaemon.description: Monzaemon is a Puppet Digimon. It is completely shrouded in mystery, though it's rumored that Etemon, who carries a Monzaemon plush toy on its waist, pulls its strings. From its looks, it's an unmodified plush toy of a bear, so it's rumored that there is someone within, who got in through where the chuck is attached on its back section. It wraps the opponent up in the love overflowing from this cute body (with scary eyes), and makes them feel happy.

attacks.name: Hearts Attack (Lovely Attack)
attacks.description: Flings hearts. The hearts induce a feeling of euphoria in their target, while also trapping them.

attacks.name: Hug (愛の抱擁, Ai no Houkou, lit. "Embrace of Love")
Silent Bear Hug (Silence Hug)
attacks.description: A quiet hug filled with love.

attacks.name: Bang Bang Punch (Bunbun Punch)
attacks.description: Punches the enemy using both hands.

attacks.name: Love Song
attacks.description: Charms the enemy with a song filled with love.

Monzaemon X.name: Monzaemon X
Monzaemon X.description: Monzaemon X is a Puppet Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The love overflowing from within its body has manifested as a Lovely Gel that is filled with hearts, and its cuteness has gone up even more. It is happy to pluck its Lovely Gel and give it to Digimon drawn in by its cuteness. Since the Digimon that receive it feel happy, it seems that it likes watching them smile more than anything. Should an enemy appear that attacks the Digimon who have gathered together, it will repel them with its "Hearts Splash".

attacks.name: Hearts Attack (Lovely Attack)
attacks.description: Flings hearts.

attacks.name: Hearts Splash (Lovely Splash)
attacks.description: Pours large amounts of its Lovely Gel over the enemy. This technique becomes more powerful as the support for Monzaemon increases.

Moon=Millenniummon.name: Moon=Millenniummon
Moon=Millenniummon.description: Moon=Millenniummon is an Evil God Digimon. It is a soul Digimon that exists within Millenniummon's inner world. As a result of Millenniummon's dark spirit becoming a Digimon, it does not possess a fixed form, and although it often takes the shape of a crystal, it seems that the hatred and anger it feels against those who oppose it cause it to change shape. As it is a soul and does not have substance, it is immune to physical attacks. To defeat Moon=Millenniumon, one must first defeat Millenniummon, its true form, but it's likely there are virtually no Digimon who are up to that task; even if Millenniummon is somehow defeated, it is said that Moon=Millenniummon will separate from its now-dead physical form and be revived throughout time and space.

attacks.name: Death Crystal
attacks.description: Performs an incorporeal attack that is said to chop up the opposing Digimon's spirit.

attacks.name: Dimension Destroyer
attacks.description: Fires a powerful energy beam.

attacks.name: Crystal Drop
attacks.description: Uses its sharp body to charge at the enemy.

attacks.name: Killer Light
attacks.description: A powerful flash to blind the enemy.

Moonmon.name: Moonmon
Moonmon.description: Moonmon is a Digimon. It is a cute Digimon with a transparent body like a drop of water and slightly-flushed cheeks. It has a pure heart. It easily gets affected by the personality of the Tamer who raises it.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

attacks.name: Dark Burst (ヤミバースト, Yami Burst)
attacks.description: A ball of dark energy fired against the opponent.

Moosemon.name: Moosemon
Moosemon.description: Moosemon is an Ancient Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Hope". It inhabits mountainous areas, and has tough flesh that makes light of adverse conditions such as the rarefied air and extreme cold. Moosemon is respected as the "Guardian Deity of the Mountains", and if those who defile the mountain where it resides appear, it will try to protect it until the end, even if it shortens its life. Its mood swings are erratic; when it is calm, it is good, but when it is in a bad mood, it has an uncontrollable side. It seems that Moosemon's mood is linked with the climate of the mountains, and it is told that when unexplained thunder or avalanches occur from time to time, they are due to Moosemon's ill temper.

attacks.name: Horn Blade
attacks.description: A huge horn that can cut through space.

attacks.name: Hanging Twister
attacks.description: Creates a powerful tornado.

attacks.name: Punisher
attacks.description: A powerful kick with its hind legs.

attacks.name: Saint Roar
attacks.description: A roar that confuses the enemy.

title: Guardian Deity of the Mountains
(山の守り神
Yama no Mamorigami?)

MoriShellmon.name: MoriShellmon
MoriShellmon.description: MoriShellmon is a Mollusk Digimon. It is a companion of Shellmon that lives in swampland deep in the forest. The color of its body and its habitat are different to Shellmon's, and it is thought that the color of its body changes depending on where it lives. Although it usually stays inside its hard shell, it has an aggressive personality like the belligerent Shellmon, and because of its large body and strength, it is unwise to approach MoriShellmon's territory and make it angry. It looks like a hermit-crab. It protects itself by tucking its legs and arms inside the shell.

attacks.name: Shell Pile (Pile Shell)
attacks.description: Tuckis its limbs inside its hard shell, and then charges while spinning.

attacks.name: Mind Fog
attacks.description: Spews dense fog from its mouth that displays illusions.

attacks.name: Invisible Tackle (Camoufla Tackle)
attacks.description: Camouflages as part of the forest and tackles its enemy.

attacks.name: Nature Hit Ray (Return to Nature)
attacks.description: Changes all moves used by this Digimon to cause Nature type damage.

attacks.name: Drill Spin
attacks.description: Slashes with a drill slash.

Morphomon.name: Morphomon
debut: Digimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Dash X)andDigimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna (Mirai)
Morphomon.description: Morphomon is an Insect Digimon. It is a Digimon with butterfly wings as its ears and hands. It has feelings of enjoyment for nature and a carefree personality. It touches those who have seen it for the first time to determine whether or not they are safe, and will follow them once it is satisfied with them being safe. It appears to be in a very good mood whenever its ear-wings move a lot. Researchers created Eosmon (Champion) by basing it on Morphomon.

attacks.name: Intense Therapy (リンリンテラピー, Rinrin Therapy)
attacks.description: Fluttering scales are shaken off which either have medicinal properties, or, paralyze the body.

Mothmon.name: Mothmon
Mothmon.description: Mothmon is an Insectoid Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Knowledge". Like Flybeemon, Honeybeemon and Butterflymon, it is a mythical Digimon that appears during a large Kunemon outbreak. Above all, Mothmon has a rough temperament, so it possesses aggressive habits. The phosphorus powder stored in its wings contains the ingredients for gunpowder, and there are occasions when it showers this powder to intimidate the enemy.

attacks.name: Multiple Blaster (Morphon Gattling)
attacks.description: Shoots bullets of scales from the gattling gun attached to his abdomen.

attacks.name: Gauss Powder
attacks.description: Sprinkles burning powder all over multiple targets.

attacks.name: Energy Sucking
attacks.description: Absorbs the energy of enemy digimon.

attacks.name: Poison Dust
attacks.description: Flaps wings very fast and a lot of poison dust come out of his wings that can paralyze his enemies.

Motimon.name: Motimon

otherNames.name: 年糕獸/年糕兽 Niángāo shòu

Motimon.description: Motimon is a Lesser Digimon. It possesses elastic skin, and is a soft-bodied Digimon that uses the protuberances on the underside of its body to toddle about. It came to be called "Motimon" from inflating its body when it gets worked up, causing it to look like mochi. However, as a result of possessing a height of intelligence that couldn't even be imagined from its appearance, its origin is conjectured to derive from a computer's dictionary feature. It understands human languages, and it is sometimes seen freely deforming its body like it's trying to return communications.

attacks.name: Elastic Bubbles (伸縮性のある泡, Shinshukusei no Aru Awa)
attacks.description: Produces mochi-like elastic bubbles to restrict the opponent's movement.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits out bubbles.

Muchomon.name: Muchomon
Muchomon.description: Muchomon is a Bird Digimon. It is unable to fly, just like Penguinmon. As a Digimon brought up in tropical southern countries, it leads an always happy life. It possesses a bursting enthusiasm and dances with the rhythm of the samba, and its most favorite thing is its richly colored pelt.

attacks.name: Super Slap (無限ビンタ, Mugen Binta, lit. "Eternal Slapping")
attacks.description: Approaches an opponent without them noticing, then uses its hands to slap them in the cheeks with vehement force.

attacks.name: Tropical Beak
attacks.description: Repeatedly pecks with its colorful beak.

attacks.name: Counter Step (カウンタービンタ, Kauntā Binta, lit. "Counter Slapping")
Beak Attack (Kuchibashi Attack)
attacks.description: Pokes with a hard beak.

MudFrigimon.name: MudFrigimon
MudFrigimon.description: MudFrigimon is a Mutant Digimon. Its body is mostly made of earth data. It is said that it may be a mutant that was born from a mutation of Frigimon. As it possesses a gentle personality, it hates battle, but when push comes to shove, it exhibits the power that it usually doesn't show.

attacks.name: Heavy Punch (Great Weight)
attacks.description: Attacks with a heavyweight punch that is profoundly loaded with all of its weight. In Digimon Digital Card Battle, it body slams the opponent.

attacks.name: Armor Coating (Mud Coat)
attacks.description: Boosts attack.

attacks.name: Heavy Attack
attacks.description: Attacks with a blow with the power of a beast.

Mummymon.name: Mummymon
Mummymon.description: Mummymon is a Ghost Digimon. Its whole body is wrapped in bandages in the manner of an Egyptian mummy. It is also known as the "Necromancer" due to its summoning and manipulation of the reluctant souls (residual data) of annihilated Digimon. What it's thinking is difficult to understand because it is taciturn and its facial expressions are concealed, but it is a dangerous being that, if attacked, will brandish its weapon and completely beat down the opponent, and, if cornered, will start randomly firing its cherished gun, "Obelisk".

attacks.name: Snake Bandage
attacks.description: Coils the bandages on both of its arms around the opponent, like a snake.

attacks.name: Necrophobia
attacks.description: Summons ghosts to drive its opponent into maddened death.

title: Necromancer

Murmukusmon.name: Murmukusmon
Murmukusmon.description: Murmukusmon is a Demon Lord Digimon. Although it was originally a high-ranking Angel Digimon, it fell from grace and became a Demon Lord Digimon. It is in the ruling class of the Nightmare Soldiers, with the title of "Count", and it manages thirty legions of demons. Also, it is attended by the Mythical Animal Digimon Gryphonmon, which it uses as its own hands and feet.

attacks.name: Gehenna Flame
attacks.description: Spews hellfire which is said to inflict death and eternal suffering.

title: Count
(伯爵
Hakushaku?)

Mush-Upped MachLeomon.name: Mush-Upped MachLeomon
Mush-Upped MachLeomon.description: Mush-Upped MachLeomon is a Digimon. It is MachLeomon who has absorbed Drimogemon, the Forest Zone's Code Crown, as well as the Abyss Truffle, gaining the power of the Zone at the cost of its life. It has mushrooms covering its body and boasts immense defense and strength.

attacks.name: ScudMissimon Full Fire
attacks.description: Throws a swarm of ScudMissimon.

Mushroomon.name: Mushroomon
Mushroomon.description: Mushroomon is a Vegetation Digimon. It is a tiny Digimon in the shape of a poisonous mushroom. It grows tiny mushroom bombs, powerful with toxins that induce every affliction, out of its body. If one gets hit with these mushroom bombs, they become unable to stop laughing, their body becomes completely paralyzed, all of their memories until then vanish, and they start showing various symptoms. As its personality is extremely ill-tempered, it loves to bully the weak, but it has a shy side, and always conceals half of its face.

attacks.name: Fungus Cruncher (Poison S-mush)
attacks.description: Releases its tiny mushroom bombs all at once.

attacks.name: Mushroom Mash (破壊のキノコ爆弾, Hakai no Kinoko Bakudan, lit. "Destructive Mushroom Bomb")
attacks.description: Throws an explosive mushroom.

attacks.name: Super Shocker (Petit Thunder)
attacks.description: Electrocutes with a small ball of electricity.

MusoKnightmon.name: MusoKnightmon
MusoKnightmon.description: MusoKnightmon is an Enhancement Digimon. It is the "Darkness-rumbling Mode" (暗黒鳴動形態, Ankokumeidō Keitai) born from the DigiFuse of AxeKnightmon and Tuwarmon, in which the "Gouradarai Gun" (強羅打雷銃, "Gouradarai Gun" lit. "Strength of Silk and Strike of Thunder Gun") was added to AxeKnightmon, who boasts of overwhelming power, so that it became an even more destructive and fiendish Digimon. The shock wave when it fires is earth-shattering, and is enough that things sustain damage only by being in the surrounding area, even if they are not hit directly. After a bombardment at its maximum output, MusoKnightmon's power is set aside for forced cooling of the gun barrels, and it cannot fire rapidly. However, because it seems that there is no Digimon that can suffer this technique and remain safe, it can be said that there is no need for firing rapidly.

attacks.name: Gouradarai Gun (強羅打雷銃, Gouradarai Gun lit. "Strength of Silk and Strike of Thunder Gun")
Wave of Destruction (超力鳴動破, Chōriki Meidōha, lit. "Super Powered Rumbling Breaker")
attacks.description: Fires off a terrifyingly powerful bombardment that emits AxeKnightmon's and Tuwarmon's energy simultaneously from the Gōradarai Gun.

attacks.name: Demonic Gravity Curse (魔重力呪縛陣, Majūryoku Jubakujin, lit. "Demonic Gravity Curse Formation")
attacks.description: Before firing, casts a spell on its surroundings that restricts the opponent's movements, so that it can both keep from missing its target, and also be defended while firing.

Musyamon.name: Musyamon
Musyamon.description: Musyamon is a Wizard Digimon. It is a Digimon created from virus-infected foreign video game software. It looks like an armor-clad warrior, but the armor is worn out because of the endless battles. Its cherished sword absorbs the opponent's life.

attacks.name: Shogun Sword (斬り捨て御免, Kirisute Gomen)
attacks.description: Flames surround the blade of the sword and then take the shape of a ghost-like dragon made of flames to impact on enemies.

attacks.name: Ninja Blade (白鳥丸, Shiratori-maru, lit. "White Bird")
attacks.description: Blue flames gather all over the sword's blade and then Musyamon slashes the enemy with his now flaming sword.

attacks.name: Drain Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with a strike filled with darkness.

Myotismon.name: Myotismon
Myotismon.description: Myotismon is a Ghost Digimon. As the king of Undead Digimon, it was resurrected through the dark arts and obtained mighty powers. Originally a fiendish computer virus which destroyed the computer data it absorbed, it possessed the ability to revive the destroyed data as malignant computer viruses. As it possesses an extremely cruel and cunning personality, it is exceedingly difficult to destroy this Digimon. However, it cannot demonstrate its powers outside of the night, and its power is cut in half during the daytime.

attacks.name: Grisly Wing (Night Raid)
attacks.description: Manipulates a countless swarm of bats, and begins a surprise attack.

attacks.name: Crimson Lightning (Bloody Stream)
attacks.description: Uses a stream of blood like a whip.

attacks.name: Blood Punch
attacks.description: Continuous strikes using both hands.

attacks.name: Nightmare Claw (Dead Scream)
attacks.description: Sends out a black, ghost-like entity that turns the victim black and paralyzes them.

attacks.name: Nightmare Wave
attacks.description: Uses a special radio wave to lure the enemy to sleep.

attacks.name: Evil Squall
attacks.description: Conjures a torrential rain of darkness.

Myotismon X.name: Myotismon X
Myotismon X.description: Myotismon X is an Undead Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its face and body are artificial, and its true form lies within its cape. It appears as though it has arms, but these are dummies. The internal structure of its Digicore has been enhanced, allowing it to exhibit its full power even during the daytime.

attacks.name: Night Raid
attacks.description: Manipulates a countless swarm of bats, and begins a surprise attack.

attacks.name: Vampire Theory
attacks.description: Wraps the enemy in its cape and turning them into a bat.

attacks.name: Bloody Drain
attacks.description: Pierce the enemy with the claws on its cape and absorbs their data.

Namakemon.name: Namakemon
Namakemon.description: Namakemon is a Puppet Digimon. It is a Digimon that has ended up only finding joy in life from eating and sleeping. Its dislike of strenuous exercise has even erased its combat instincts as a Digimon, and it has come to live in elevated areas such as on treetops so that no one can approach it. Because both of its arms are often being used to grasp onto tree branches, it is also able to use its long, well-developed tongue skilfully as a third arm.

attacks.name: Poop Toss (ウンチ投げ, Unchi Nage, lit. "Poop Throw")
attacks.description: Should enemies draw near it will throw its own poop to drive them away.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Lick (Paralyze Lick)
attacks.description: A close-range skill where it uses its tongue, which secretes a numbing venom, to lick the enemy. It rarely ever gets the chance to use it.

Nanimon.name: Nanimon
Nanimon.description: Nanimon is an Invader Digimon. It is a Digimon whose true identity is unknown. It arrived in the Digital World from another dimension in order to invade it. It was known by the title "OYAJI" in the other dimension, where it was raised as a digital pet. While it loves alcohol and has an oppressive personality, ever since it invaded this Digital World (though the exact details regarding its invasion are unknown), it digivolved to become more active and turned into Nanimon. It trained and strengthened its body through battle, influenced by the Digital World's survival-of-the-fittest environment; however, no one knows the true extent of its abilities. Even so, it is said that a Nanimon that has fought and won countless battles will digivolve into its ultimate form.

attacks.name: Power Drive (ウンチ攻撃, Unchi Kougeki, lit. "Poop Attack")
Party Time (ウンチ, Unchi, lit. "Poop")
attacks.description: Throws its own poop in order to defend itself against intruders.

attacks.name: Poop Dunk (ウンチダンク, Unchi Danku)
Powerful Punch
attacks.description: Punches with a punch full of powerful energy.

Navimon.name: Navimon
Navimon.description: Navimonis a Navigation Digimon. It is a girl shrouded in many mysteries such as its age and birthplace. It is usually kind but also has a hysteric side...?

Neemon.name: Neemon
Neemon.description: Neemon is a Beast Digimon. It has a carefree personality and a bumbling character. Although it's always spaced out with its eyes looking half-asleep, its escape is swift when it's important. It often receives a "Rubber Snap", when Bokomon's irritated at it for being too much of a lazybones. It is a well-informed person despite its appearance, but it doesn't have very much useful knowledge. Its long johns are its favorite thing, so it's always wearing them.

attacks.name: Escape Dash (逃げ足ダッシュ, Nigeashi Dash)
Play Possum (たぬきねいり, Tanuki Neiri, lit. "Feign Sleep")
attacks.description: Dodges the situation when it gets in a pinch by fake sleeping.

attacks.name: Happy Accident (やったー, Yattā, lit. "Hurray")
attacks.description: Slips on a conjured banana, kicking the banana forward.

attacks.name: ABCDEFG (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7!)
attacks.description: Sends a gas bubble forward while counting.

attacks.name: I Like Beans (あれれ？, Arere?)
attacks.description: Releases a blast of noxious gas to surround it.

attacks.name: Gassed Off (ガスだ, Gas da)
attacks.description: Holds in a fart until it can use it to propel itself upward.

attacks.name: Uh Oh (あれ？, Are?)
attacks.description: Releases an explosion of noxious gas while teleporting itself out of the blast radius.

Nefertimon.name: Nefertimon
Nefertimon.description: Nefertimonis an Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Light". The "Digi-Egg of Light" has the attribute of "Light", and those that don this Digi-Egg will have the ability to purify darkness with the intense power of light. Even thoughGatomonis not a descendant of an ancient species, it became able to Armor digivolve by awakening the special abilities that slept within its composition data.

attacks.name: Rosetta Stone
attacks.description: Summons a megalith with ancient inscriptions engraved in DigiCode to attack the enemy.

attacks.name: Queen's Paw (Nile Jewelry)
attacks.description: Fires jewels from the bracers on paws.

attacks.name: Cat's Eye Beam (Curse of Queen)
attacks.description: Produces a red, high-temperature beam from the ornament on its brow.

attacks.name: Queen's Paw (Paw of Queen)
attacks.description: Fires jewels from its leg armor.

attacks.name: Hot Foot
attacks.description: Crouches and fires a short-range beam from its eyes at the enemy's feet.

title: Angel of Light
(微笑みの光
Hohoemi no Hikari?
lit. "Light of Smiles")

Nefertimon X.name: Nefertimon X
Nefertimon X.description: Nefertimon X is a Holy Beast Digimon and a carrier of the X-Antibody. Its animal-like agility and grappling abilities have improved. Although its defensive ability is weak, it has armor that allows it to act more swiftly, its low impact strength has been boosted several tens of times against evil Digimon due to the power of light purifying darkness, and by combining with the data of SaberLeomon's claws, it exhibits powerful kill potential. Nefertimon's agility and flight speed make it look as if it is a band of light.

attacks.name: Cartouche
attacks.description: Slaughters the enemy from all directions at a speed too quick for the eye to see.

attacks.name: Curse of the Queen (Curse of Queen)
attacks.description: Produces a red, high-temperature beam from the ornament on its brow.

attacks.name: Rosetta Stone
attacks.description: Summons a megalith with ancient inscriptions engraved in DigiCode to attack the enemy.

Negamon.name: Negamon
debut: Digimon Adventure:, "And to the Digital World" [03]
Negamon.description: Negamonis an Unknown Digimon. It is an In-Training Digimon that grew by being immersed in negative data that theNetworkis overflowing with. It constantly wishes for its own annihilation, and lives quietly in jet-black darkness.

attacks.name: Downer Eye
attacks.description: Appears before approaching Digimon, makes them target themselves with the curse of "Downer Eye", and then preys upon them. Digimon that have been preyed upon gradually lose their emotions, fall into darkness, and are corroded from the inside out, becoming a nursery for Negamon to regenerate.

NeoDevimon.name: NeoDevimon
NeoDevimon.description: NeoDevimon is a Fallen Angel Digimon. It is a digivolved form of Devimon that was enhanced by someone. It was artificially strengthened and completely restrained, even as far as its own will. The mask which covers its face suppresses NeoDevimon's own power, and it is said that it is worn in order to control its will.

attacks.name: Guilty Claw
attacks.description: Attacks with an enhanced version of "The Touch of Evil".

attacks.name: Deep Sorrow
attacks.description: Creates a storm of despair with its wings.

NeoMyotismon.name: NeoMyotismon
NeoMyotismon.description: NeoMyotismonis an Undead Digimon. It is the general of theMoonlight Armyof the "Big Death-Stars". Its goal is to erase hostile forces without leaving a trace, so it has its army of Undead Digimon lurk everywhere and erase the Digimon that move against it, one by one. It forgot its emotions as a consequence of always lurking in the dark, and even slaughter is becoming a part of its life that it neither likes nor dislikes. However, it feels fulfilled only when it watches the termination of a dying Digimon under the moon. NeoMyotismon can summon its familiar spirits, "Nightmare Leeches", which are brought forth in an inexhaustible supply, and naturally prefer the life energy of Digimon.

attacks.name: Nightmare Leeches (Nightmare Raid)
attacks.description: Fires the Nightmare Leeches at multiple enemies, transforming their targets into terrible sights to behold.

attacks.name: Blue Obliteration (Bloody Stream Glade)
attacks.description: Freely extends both of its arms to reliably capture its opponent, then wrenches them apart after forcing them to divulge all of their information.

attacks.name: Doom Cannon (Gardiac Raid)
attacks.description: Collects dark energy, then fires it off once the moon on its chest is full. Although the opponent sees the flash of a beam of light from ahead of everything in its surroundings being changed to darkness, that light is not hope but the light of demise.

NeoMyotismon Darkness Mode One.name: NeoMyotismon Darkness Mode One
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Vampire Land and the Moonlight General" [33]
NeoMyotismon Darkness Mode One.description: NeoMyotismon Darkness Mode One is the DigiFuse of NeoMyotismon, LadyDevimon, and Devimon.

attacks.name: Giga Guardiac Raid (Giga Gardiac Raid)
attacks.description: Collects dark energy, then fires it off once the moon on its chest is full.

NeoMyotismon Darkness Mode Two.name: NeoMyotismon Darkness Mode Two
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Vampire Land and the Moonlight General" [33]
NeoMyotismon Darkness Mode Two.description: NeoMyotismon Darkness Mode Two replaces NeoMyotismon's legs with a long, serpentine tail which has MetalGreymon's head at the tip. Its hands are replaced with MetalGreymon's claws, and its four bat wings have been replaced with two larger, miasmatic wings.

NeoMyotismon Darkness Mode (Shoutmon).name: NeoMyotismon Darkness Mode (Shoutmon)
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Hang on, Greymon! The Rise of Shoutmon DX" [34]
NeoMyotismon Darkness Mode (Shoutmon).description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars. No official romanization available.

Neptunemon.name: Neptunemon
Neptunemon.description: Neptunemon is a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", it is a Digimon god of the sea which governs all Aquatic Digimon. The Scale mail which covers Neptunemon's body is made of Chrome Digizoid that has been transformed into "Blue Digizoid", which excels in agility, so it is capable of moving at terrifying speeds at sea. It constructed a castle to reside within, the "Abyss Sanctuary", at the far depths of the sea, so that only those who can withstand the water pressure of the extreme depths may enter.

attacks.name: Vortex Infiltrate (Vortex Penetrate)
attacks.description: Fires off its sentient spear "King's Bite".

attacks.name: Waves of Depth (Wave of Depth)
attacks.description: Summons a gigantic tidal wave which swallows everything.

attacks.name: Gate of Atlantis
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with a huge pillar of water.

attacks.name: Terrible Bite
attacks.description: Attacks where the spear, King's Bite, will stab and bite.

Nidhoggmon.name: Nidhoggmon
Nidhoggmon.description: Nidhoggmonis a Dark Dragon Digimon. It is a colossal Digimon that takes vast amounts of energy into its body, and is constantly overheating. The color emitted by its wings represents the extent of its overheating; the more it approaches the danger level, the redder it becomes. It repeatedly destroys and absorbs things, leaving nothing behind in its wake.

Ninjamon.name: Ninjamon
Ninjamon.description: Ninjamon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a mysterious Digimon wearing a red mask. It is wandering the Digital World and building its training. It is a master of espionage, and if it is hiding within the trees of a forest, or hiding underwater, catching sight of its figure is considerably difficult. Also, although it differs in school and doctrine from Deputymon, who is also one of the "Virus Busters", they are comrades in arms since olden times, and are also good rivals.

attacks.name: Iga School Knife Throw (イガ流手裏剣投げ, Iga-ryū Shuriken Nage, lit. "Iga-style Shuriken Throw")
attacks.description: Uses a gigantic shuriken.. In Digimon World, it uses two.

attacks.name: Ninja Jujitsu (イガ流居合術, Iga-ryū Iaijutsu, lit. "Iga-style Iaijutsu")
Dancing Leaves (木の葉乱舞, Konoha Ranbu, lit. "Tree Leaf Dance")
Iga-ryū Ougi Bunshin no Jutsu (イガ流奥義分身の術, Iga-ryū Ougi Bunshin no Jutsu lit. "Iga-style Succession Technique Clone Technique")
Shadow Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with lightning speed.

NiseDrimogemon.name: NiseDrimogemon
NiseDrimogemon.description: NiseDrimogemon is an Animal Digimon. As a Digimon just like Drimogemon, it was given the name "Nise" (偽, "Nise" lit. "Imitation") due to its suspicious mustache. If this Digimon were to have been discovered earlier, Drimogemon could have ended up being called "Nise".

attacks.name: Bogus Iron Drill Spin (ニセドリルスピン, Nise Doriru Supin, lit. "Imitation Drill Spin")
attacks.description: Thrusts at the enemy with the gigantic drill on its nose.

attacks.name: Bogus Bone (ニセボーン, Nise Bone, lit. "Imitation Bone")
Fake Special Attack (ニセスペシャル, Nise Special, lit. "Imitation Special")
Drill Spin
attacks.description: Slashes with a drill slash.

attacks.name: Mech Ray (Implant)
attacks.description: Changes all moves used by this Digimon to cause Machine type damage.

NoblePumpkinmon.name: NoblePumpkinmon
NoblePumpkinmon.description: NoblePumpkinmonis a Puppet Digimon. It is the Mega ofPumpkinmon, which took on a gentlemanly attire. Neither good nor evil, it maintains a neutral stance, and aims to bring smiles to all Digimon. With its cheerful personality and mischievous behavior, which it shows from time to time, it can easily get along with any Digimon, so there are no Digimon that treat NoblePumpkinmon unkindly. It makes pumpkin dishes that everyone craves over using the "AssamRing Jack"(WassamuRing Jack) staff it holds in its hand, and serves them to the Digimon it befriends.

attacks.name: TRICKorTREAT Wallace
attacks.description: Manifests gigantic pumpkin-shaped bombs in the air and blows up everything around it.

attacks.name: Atlantic Dam
attacks.description: Pours a huge amount of pumpkin soup into the enemy's body and causes them to explode. The soup can also be used to extinguish such fires as Daemon's "Flame Inferno".

Nohemon.name: Nohemon
Nohemon.description: Nohemon is a Puppet Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Sincerity". It is a Digimon with the form of a scarecrow, but the crow on its right arm is its true body. The crow skillfully manipulates the scarecrow's body with psychic powers, bewildering opponents. Since the true body is a sneaky crow, it excels at telling lies and tall tales, but it is also an expert shot with a bow and arrow.

attacks.name: Delusion Crow
attacks.description: The raven on its shoulder robs the opponent of its fighting spirit with its cawing laughter.

attacks.name: William's Arrow (William Arrow)
attacks.description: With its bow, Nohemon shoots arrows at the opponent.

Numemon.name: Numemon
Numemon.description: Numemon is a Mollusk Digimon. It possesses a slug-like body, prefers dark, gloomy environments, and has neither offensive power nor intelligence. A Digimon becomes a Numemon if mistakes are made in raising it, but as a matter of fact, there appears to be some hidden secret...

attacks.name: Nume-Sludge (ウンチ, Unchi, lit. "Poop")
attacks.description: Throws its own poop in order to defend itself against intruders.

attacks.name: Junk Attack (ウンチ投げ, Unchi Nage, lit. "Poop Throw") Throws a single pile of junk.
Hyper Stink Shot (超悪臭噴射, Chou Akushū Funsha, lit. "Super Stinky Spray")
attacks.description: Emits a disgusting smell with a burp.

attacks.name: Filth Kick (エンガチョウキック, Enga Chou Kick, lit. "Face Down Super Kick") Kicks the enemy.
Multi-Junk Attack (連続ウンチ投げ, Renzoku Unchi Nage, lit. "Continuous Poop Throw")
attacks.description: Throws multiple piles of junk.

attacks.name: Nume Charge (ヌメたいあたり, Nume Tai Atari, lit. "Nume Body Blow")
attacks.description: Charges with a slippery body.

attacks.name: Yucky Tongue (イヤ～な舌, Iya~ na Shita, lit. "Unpleasant Togue") Licks the enemy in a disgusting way.
Choukyori Unchi Nage (長距離ウンチ投げ, Choukyori Unchi Nage lit. "Long-range Poop Throw")

Numemon X.name: Numemon X
Numemon X.description: Numemon X is a Mollusk Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The grime on its body turns into tiny Numemon, which then fall off and float around the main body. Although it goes around flaunting the X-Antibody it holds in its mouth, it is so covered in drool that not a single Digimon would even think of stealing it. Despite its appearance, however, it is actually a caring Digimon; it hides a courageous side and will stand against even formidable opponents for the sake of protecting its friends.

attacks.name: Poop Rush (ウンチラッシュ, Unchi Rush)
attacks.description: Throws a barrage of poop together with its tiny Numemon all at once.

Nyaromon.name: Nyaromon
Nyaromon.description: Nyaromon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a tiny Digimon which has cat-like characteristics. It is always capricious, and that behavior seems to have been attached to Nyaromon as a result of its being like a "cat". Although it is sometimes frivolous due to its overflowing curiosity, it also has a lonely side.

attacks.name: Tail Whip (Fox Tail)
attacks.description: Puffs up its tail to make the hairs like wires, then strikes the opponent. There has never yet been an opponent observed to flinch from this attack.

attacks.name: Galactica Magnum Tail
attacks.description: Slaps with its tail repeatedly.

attacks.name: Atomic Bomber Tail
attacks.description: Attacks with a powerful tail smash.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

Nyokimon.name: Nyokimon
Nyokimon.description: Nyokimon is a Seed Digimon. Its body surface is covered in transparent tissue, and it can be confirmed that within the transparent skin is its real body, which seems to be a variant of Botamon. It is thought that it is perhaps a species of Botamon whose appearance transformed into this herbaceous body. For that reason, it is not only a Plant-species Digimon, but it also has the potential to digivolve to Dragon-species Digimon and the like. Its personality is extremely gentle, so it has a timid face, and its offensive ability is nonexistent.

attacks.name: Seed Cracker
attacks.description: Flings popping seeds, then quickly flees while the opponent is surprised.

Oboromon.name: Oboromon
Oboromon.description: Oboromon is an Undead Digimon. It is a ghostlike Digimon that dwells in graveyards. It is a gleeful fighter that delights in battling even opponents far stronger than itself. Oboromon's strange fixation on winning is thought to be because it absorbs large amounts of grudge-filled data from the Digimon it defeats. However, Oboromon is not egotistical. When it is not in battle, it can usually be found aimlessly wandering around graveyards. It has been witnessed having odd conversations with the skull fused with its left arm. The katana growing from the skull is brittle and shatters easily, but no matter how many times the katana breaks a new one will grow.

attacks.name: Chiyorozu-no-Tachi (千万ノ太刀, Chiyorozu-no-Tachi lit. "Countless Tachi")
attacks.description: A slicing attack using its katana.

attacks.name: Rashomon (羅焼門, Rashōmon, lit. "Silk-burned Gate")
attacks.description: Emits ghostly flames that have the potential to burn a vast area.

attacks.name: Yugen (幽玄, Yūgen, lit. "Mysteriousness")
attacks.description: Transforms the scarf around its neck into an independently moving apparition. The scarf has many uses, such as binding and capturing enemies, and is even strong enough to strike opponents.

OchiMusyamon.name: OchiMusyamon
OchiMusyamon.description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars (manga). No official romanization available.

Octomon.name: Octomon
Octomon.description: Octomon is a Mollusk Digimon. It is a fiendish hacker, and was discovered from the virus it used to crash a rival's research computer. It has a nasty habit of collecting things; the tips of its tentacles are affixed with claws obtained from a Devidramon's data, and it is clad throughout with Digi-Treasure which it gathered from the bottom of the Net Ocean. Fujitsumon, a kind of tiny Shellfish-type Digimon, cling to the pot it wears on its head. These Fujitsumon develop their senses, and it is thought that they have formed a symbiotic relationship so that if they sense danger, they inform Octomon.

attacks.name: Spurting Ink (海鳴墨銃, Kaimei Bokujū, lit. "Ink Gun of the Rumbling Sea")
attacks.description: Shoots a bullet packed with potently toxic ink.

attacks.name: Deadly Shade
attacks.description: Attacks while inflicting paralysis.

Ogremon.name: Ogremon
Ogremon.description: Ogremon is an Evil Digimon. It is a Demon Digimon resembling an Oni in Japanese folklore. The attacks it carries out with its muscles have tremendous destructive power. It has a high intelligence, but a rough temper, the driving force behind its destructive anger. It is very belligerent, and is referred to as the "Digimon Hunter" due to seeking to fight bold Digimon with as much combat power as itself. It carries a bone club that is said to be a femur of a slain SkullGreymon. Also, it is a rival to Leomon.

attacks.name: Pummel Whack (覇王拳, Haouken, lit. "Tyrant Fist")
attacks.description: Fires dark energy from its fist. Some media depict the energy in the shape of Ogremon's head, similar to Leomon's "Fist of the Beast King".

attacks.name: Bone Mace (骨棍棒, Hone Konbou, lit. "Bone Club")
attacks.description: Whacks enemies with its club.

attacks.name: Bone Strike
attacks.description: Attacks with a hard bone club.

title: Digimon Hunter
(デジモンハンター
Dejimon Hantā?)

Ogremon X.name: Ogremon X
Ogremon X.description: Ogremon X is an Ogre Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its cruelty and wild temperament have intensified, turning it into a crazed warrior that attacks with glee. It wields an axe made by fusing an electric guitar and electric chainsaw together as a weapon, and uses it to play out its soul (Digicore)'s excitement in the form of a rock rhythm.

attacks.name: Pummel Whack (覇王拳, Haouken, lit. "Tyrant Fist")
attacks.description: Fires dark energy from its fist.

attacks.name: WEEK END
attacks.description: An especially fearsome technique when it strums its guitar, creating an electric shock which, together with its electric chainsaw, tears the opponent into pieces.

Ogudomon.name: Ogudomon
Ogudomon.description: Ogudomon is an Avatar Digimon. It is a grotesque "Super Demon Lord" that has seven legs, each with an eye beneath it and a sword pierced through the knee which bears one of the seals of the Seven Deadly Sins, as well as an eighth eye on its face. As it includes the whole of the Digital World's sins, and, moreover, is a mysterious incarnation with the ability to atone for them all, the power of a Digimon with even a small amount of malice is offset, making it impossible for it to defeat Ogudomon.

attacks.name: Oratio Grandiloqua (Lat: "Rhapsody", lit. "Grandiloquent Speech")
attacks.description: Runs wild after its own lusts.

attacks.name: Catedral (Esp: "Cathedral")
attacks.description: Attacks with a shock-wave played from its oral-area.

attacks.name: Gradus (Lat: "Step")
attacks.description: Pulverizes the opponent with its gigantic legs.

title: Super Demon Lord of Atonement
(贖罪の超魔王
Shokuzai no Chō Maō?)

Ogudomon X.name: Ogudomon X
Ogudomon X.description: Ogudomon X is an Incarnation Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Both the evil thoughts of the Seven Great Demon Lords and its destructive impulses have been amplified further by the X-Antibody, and the power oozing out of it is capable of causing the Digital World to collapse due to it merely existing. Its six arms and head have turned into tentacle blades that are endowed with the abilities of each of the Seven Great Demon Lords, and will try to eradicate anything that draws near them, regardless of whether they are friend or foe.

attacks.name: Oratio Grandiloqua (Lat: "Rhapsody", lit. "Grandiloquent Speech")
attacks.description: Runs wild after its own lusts.

attacks.name: Catedral (Esp: "Cathedral")
attacks.description: Attacks with a shock-wave played from its oral-area.

attacks.name: Gradus (Lat: "Step")
attacks.description: Pulverizes the opponent with its gigantic legs.

attacks.name: Destiny Death Destruction (Death 3)
attacks.description: Transforms its six arms into gigantic spears, and fires beams that erase everything they touch.

Ohakadamon.name: Ohakadamon
Ohakadamon.description: Ohakadamon takes the form of a computer in the American V-Pets but is either a cross or a tombstone in the Japanese.

Oinkmon.name: Oinkmon
Oinkmon.description: Oinkmon is based upon adomestic pig, with pink skin, folded ears, and a large snout.

Okuwamon.name: Okuwamon
Okuwamon.description: Okuwamonis an Insectoid Digimon. As a digivolution ofKuwagamon, it digivolved more balefully thanKabuterimon-speciesDigimon. It was enhanced with a particular focus on Kuwagamon's inferior defensive side. As for its offensive side, the reconnaissance ability of its antennae was improved, and the attack accuracy of its scissors was increased. In addition, it has been proven that it possesses not only its survival instinct but also its destructive impulses as its primary traits. It can be said that it is a more aggressive digivolved form.

attacks.name: Double Scissor Claw (Scissor Arms Ω)
attacks.description: Attacks with an enhanced version of "Scissor Arms" that can clip through even a diamond with a hardness of 10.

attacks.name: Destructive Impulse (破壊の衝動, Hakai no Shoudou, lit. "Destructive Impulse")
attacks.description: Lets instinct take over and goes on a rampage.

Okuwamon X.name: Okuwamon X
Okuwamon X.description: Okuwamon X is an Insect Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Like Kuwagamon, its instinctive, destructive impulses such as swooping down on non-Virus Digimon without wasting its breath, have increased. The gigantic pincers on its head have transformed into three, and its offensive ability has powered up not by three times that of the original Okuwamon, but rather by its cube.

attacks.name: Double Scissor Claw (Scissor Arms Ω)
attacks.description: Attacks with an enhanced version of "Scissor Arms" that can clip through even a diamond with a hardness of 10.

attacks.name: Double Scissor Claw (Scissor Arms Ω)
attacks.description: An enhanced version of "Scissor Arms Ω".

attacks.name: Hakai no Shoudou (破壊の衝動, Hakai no Shoudou lit. "Destructive Impulse")

Oleamon.name: Oleamon
Oleamon.description: Oleamon is a Carnivorous Vegetation Digimon. It is confirmed to inhabit the forested region of the Digital World. Its flower emits an aroma that lures in Insectoid Digimon. Just as its prey extends its tongue to taste that entrancing aroma, Oleamon's petals capture its target with Jameal. Oleamon are dispersed among other Vegetation Digimon, making it a quietly menacing presence to Insectoid Digimon that live in the same area. Its signature move Leaf Shredder is very versatile.

attacks.name: Jameal
attacks.description: Slowly digests its prey, with the Digimon it preys on being converted into nourishment.

attacks.name: Leaf Shredder (Leaf Red)
attacks.description: Sends its poisonous leaves flying; or bunches them up to act as blades.

Olegmon.name: Olegmon
Olegmon.description: Olegmon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It is the general of the Gold-thief Army of the "Big Death-Stars". It is a super-heavyweight Digimon whose whole body is clad in steel armor. With Aquatic and Sea Animal Digimon, its army runs the whole gamut of atrocities and looting, and plunders treasure wherever they travel across the ocean. It has a weakness for gold and silver treasures, so its collected treasures become Olegmon's entire diet, and it increases the strength of Olegmon's armor if it eats enough. Olegmon boasts the most superhuman strength among the other generals, easily wielding its super-heavyweight "Twin Broadswords" (Dual Tomahawk) pair of axes. Also, Olegmon keeps the gigantic shadow called "Jormungandr" in the chest on its right shoulder, and the one called "Surtr" in the chest on its left shoulder. Both become fiendish shadows if an opponent is recognized.

attacks.name: Twin Broadsword Boomerang (Dual Tomahawk Boomerang)
attacks.description: Effortlessly hurls its Twin Broadswords.

attacks.name: Two-Fister Scuttle-Buster (Viking Vuffet)
attacks.description: Swings the Twin Broadswords down vertically over and over, chopping the opponent to bits in the blink of an eye.

attacks.name: Age of Discovery
attacks.description: Jormungandr takes the opponent away to "Jötunheimr", which is said to be the end of the world.

attacks.name: Dream Comes True
attacks.description: Surtr asks for the opponent's wishes and pretends to grant them, but avoids actually granting them using a convenient interpretation from Olegmon. If the opponent stubbornly refuses the wish, it keeps on doling out attacks.

Omedamon.name: Omedamon
Omedamon.description: Omedamon is a Holy Mechanical Digimon. It is an Unidentified Digimon whose true form is unknown that wandered from the Digital World of another dimension. It was born from the data of a Medabots game, which became popular in another dimension at the end of the 20th Century, that mutated and became Omedamon. It has the courage to undauntedly face any difficulty. In battle, it will keep fighting without shutting down, unless it receives a certain amount of damage to its head. Its armor, referred to as "Cyplasium Digizoid", a super-metal with a self-repair feature through the use of nanomachines, allows it to fully recover from any damage sustained in combat before the next battle. Also, it is equipped with a beam-shaped cloak on its back reminiscent of worn pieces of cloth.

attacks.name: Scissors Sword
attacks.description: The sword on its right arm splits any enemy in two.

attacks.name: Beetle Cannon
attacks.description: The weapon on its left arm fires a volley at the enemy.

OmegaArmamon Burst Mode.name: OmegaArmamon Burst Mode
debut: Digimon Story: Super Xros Wars Blue and Red
OmegaArmamon Burst Mode.description: OmegaArmamon Burst Mode is a digivolved version of Armamon, digivolving after fusing with Barbamon and System Omega.

attacks.name: Hell & Thunder
attacks.description: Attacks with its sword of lightning and Barbamon-based sword of darkness.

attacks.name: Heaven & Break
attacks.description: Attacks with its holy lance and the spikes on its grappling hand.

attacks.name: Ice & Fire
attacks.description: Attacks with its swords of ice and fire.

attacks.name: Sword of Meteor
attacks.description: Slashes repeatedly with its swords.

attacks.name: Data to Data
attacks.description: Heals itself and increases its strength.

attacks.name: Ω Death Blade
attacks.description: A furious barrage of sword attacks that electrocutes the enemy and may cause their immediate death.

attacks.name: ∞ Sword Rain
attacks.description: Rains swords on all its enemies.

Omegamon Alter-B.name: Omegamon Alter-B
Omegamon Alter-B.description: Omegamon Alter-B is a Holy Knight Digimon. The "Black Digitron" secretion, deliberately mixed in by an unknown entity, caused Omegamon Alter-S to change into this black form. Although its power is heightened while it is in this form, it comes at the price of losing its sense of self, leaving it in a berserk state.

attacks.name: Supreme Sword (Garuru Sword)
attacks.description: Launches consecutive attacks from the Garuru Sword on its right arm.

attacks.name: Transcendent Cannon (Grey Cannon)
attacks.description: Launches consecutive attacks from the Grey Cannon on its left arm.

attacks.name: Grey Cannon - Rail Gun
attacks.description: Shoots in the shape of BlitzGreymon's plasma.

Omegamon Alter-S.name: Omegamon Alter-S
Omegamon Alter-S.description: Omegamon Alter-S is a Holy Knight Digimon. It is a new face of Omnimon that was born from the fusion of the WarGreymon subspecies, BlitzGreymon, and the MetalGarurumon subspecies, CresGarurumon. Although it is a different individual from the Omnimon belonging to the Royal Knights, its multitype performance, which combines the special qualities of the two, hasn't changed, and its strength is also on par with it. It is a mystery how the two Digimon came to fuse together, and whether this Omegamon is also due to someone's powerful will or a fusion that exists solely due to some sort of wish is unclear.

attacks.name: Garuruzoid (Garuru Sword)
attacks.description: A slash attack from its fully charged Garuru Sword. Its "Garuru Sword" varies in slashing power due to the amount of energy it accumulates at the center of its sword. There is nothing that cannot be cut by a slash attack from its fully charged Garuru Sword.

attacks.name: Transcendent Cannon (Grey Cannon)
attacks.description: Fires plasma from its BlitzGreymon-shaped turret.

Omegamon Zwart Defeat.name: Omegamon Zwart Defeat

otherNames.name: オメガモン ズワルト DEFEAT

Omegamon Zwart Defeat.description: Omegamon Zwart Defeat is a Holy Knight Digimon. It is a form of Omnimon Zwart that was injected with a virus program by someone and turned into a berserker. It views all Digimon that move into its field of vision as menacing enemies, and anyone who approaches it is attacked without mercy. The raging virus program and lingering vaccine program within its body clash with each other, causing it to become unstable, and so its wounded body continues to run wild and tire without ever recovering. Occasionally, it will restrict using both of its weapons in order to suppress any damage the instant the vaccine program pushes back and it regains its sense of self.

attacks.name: Supreme Cannon (Garuru Cannon)
attacks.description: Freezes the opponent with frigid, absolute zero shots that it fires from the "Garuru Cannon".

attacks.name: Transcendent Sword (Grey Sword)
attacks.description: Slashes with the "Grey Sword".

attacks.name: Grey Sword - Spiral
attacks.description: Charges the opponent with a fierce spin using the Grey Sword.

Omekamon.name: Omekamon
Omekamon.description: Omekamon is a Puppet Digimon. It was born from the data of a certain computer's design drawing. It doesn't know who it is, so for now, it dresses as Omnimon. It found the pen it carries on its back within a certain computer's art software.

attacks.name: Paint Rocket (ラクガキロケット, Rakugaki Rocket, lit. "Graffiti Rocket")
attacks.description: Fires off its pen like a rocket, annoying other Digimon by staining their body.

attacks.name: Omeka Kick
attacks.description: Unleashes an unexpectedly powerful kick.

Omnimon.name: Omnimon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Chika Sakamoto,Mayumi Yamaguchi(Tamers/Cyber Sleuth/Next Order/Hacker's Memory/Kizuna),Hideyuki Tanaka(X-Evolution),Hiroki Takahashi(Savers),Bin Shimada(Xros Wars)

(En:)Lex Lang(Adventure/02[12]/Tamers[13]/All-Star Rumble),Kirk Thornton(Adventure/tri./Tamers[13]/All-Star Rumble),Jeff Nimoy(Revenge of Diaboromon[12]),Matthew Mercer(Fusion),Kyle Hebert(tri.),Michael Sorich(tri.)
Omnimon.description: Omnimonis a Warrior Digimon. One of the "Royal Knights", it was fused from theVirus BustersWarGreymonandMetalGarurumondue to the powerful wills of everyone who wished for goodness. It is a Digimon who has combined the special qualities of two bodies, so it is a multitype warrior which can fully demonstrate those abilities, for any given situation. It is equipped with the invincible "Grey Sword" and "Brave Shield Omega" for its WarGreymon-shaped left arm, and the "Garuru Cannon" and missiles for its MetalGarurumon-shaped right arm. As for the mantle on its back, it is automatically deployed when it dodges an opponent's attack, or when it is flying.LikeOmniShoutmon, upon whom it had bestowed the legendary "Digivolution", it possesses the power of "Omega inForce".

attacks.name: Supreme Cannon (Garuru Cannon)
attacks.description:
Freezes the opponent with frigid, absolute zero shots that it fires from the Garuru Cannon.
Kūchū Garuru Cannon (空中ガルルキャノン, Kūchū Garuru Cannon lit. "Aerial Garuru Cannon")

attacks.name: Kūchū Garuru Cannon (空中ガルルキャノン, Kūchū Garuru Cannon lit. "Aerial Garuru Cannon")
Transcendent Sword (Grey Sword)
attacks.description:
Slashes with the Grey Sword.
Dash Grey Sword
Kūchū Grey Sword (空中グレイソード, Kūchū Grey Sword lit. "Aerial Grey Sword")

attacks.name: Kūchū Grey Sword (空中グレイソード, Kūchū Grey Sword lit. "Aerial Grey Sword")
Double Shot (Double Torrent)
attacks.description: Annihilates the opponent with successive shots of fire and ice from the WarGreymon and MetalGarurumon heads.

attacks.name: Ultimate Uppercut
attacks.description: Uses the Grey Sword to send the enemy in the air then repeatedly blasts them with the Garuru Cannon.

attacks.name: Transcendent Sword (Omega Sword)
attacks.description: Charges the Grey Sword and then cuts definitively.

attacks.name: Sword of Ruin
attacks.description: Rends the air with its Grey Sword to produce a large explosion.

attacks.name: Omni Howling (Omega Howling)
attacks.description: Attacks with a howl that can shake the world.

attacks.name: Omni Blast (Omega Blast)
attacks.description: Drops a bolt of lightning on the enemy.

attacks.name: Brave Shield
attacks.description: Uses its "Brave Shield" to defend.

title: Legendary Warrior
(伝説の戦士
Densetsu no Senshi?)

Omnimon X.name: Omnimon X
Omnimon X.description: Omnimon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It is one of the "Royal Knights". Due to the X-Antibody, theoretically, other Digimon are unable to defeat Omnimon. This is because it acquired the "Omega inForce", an ultimate force which, in battle, is able to instantaneously read ahead and respond accordingly. It is an ability that draws out and raises Omnimon's combat sense and potential, under any circumstances, to their utmost limits. Also, it never loses as far as Network Security is concerned.

attacks.name: Garuru Cannon.
attacks.description: Freezes the opponent with frigid, absolute zero shots that it fires from the Garuru Cannon.

attacks.name: Grey Sword
attacks.description: Slashes with the Grey Sword.

attacks.name: All Delete
attacks.description: Invokes an ability from the Grey Sword so that anything that comes in contact with its edge is not cut, but erased.

Omnimon Merciful Mode.name: Omnimon Merciful Mode
partners: Taichi "Tai" Kamiya,Yamato "Matt" Ishida,Sora Takenouchi,Mimi Tachikawa,Koushiro "Izzy" Izumi,Joe Kido,Takeru "T.K." Takaishi, andKari Kamiya
Omnimon Merciful Mode.description: Omnimon Merciful Mode is a Holy Knight Digimon. It is an Omnimon with white wings, resembling an angel. Having realized that there are some people who can only be saved by fighting, and defeating them, Omnimon transformed into this form through sorrow and determination, and "Photon Spreads", lines of bluish-white light that resemble tears rolling down one's cheeks, have emerged across its whole body. The "Photon Spreads" run across its whole body, temporarily increasing its power drastically. It is a being who relieves Digimon that have become corrupt and are unable to revert back by imposing judgment upon them, and it is said that the targets it attacks are those who always had a "good heart" to begin with. Omnimon's Grey Sword has also been transformed into the katana-like Fearsome Blade.

attacks.name: Fearsome Blade (虞玲刀, Gurei Tou, lit. "Fear-tingling Sword")
attacks.description: Mercifully brings down targets it slashes with a single stroke, swinging down its parting blade with feelings of farewell in its heart.

attacks.name: Graceful Cannon (雅琉々砲, Garuru Hou, lit. "Refined-Lapides Cannon")
attacks.description: Fires an absolute zero laser.

Omnimon Zwart.name: Omnimon Zwart

otherNames.name: ブラックオメガモン BlackOmegamon

Omnimon Zwart.description: Omnimon Zwart is a Holy Knight Digimon. A member of the Royal Knights that is fused from WarGreymon and MetalGarurumon with the will of those who wish for good. Combining the qualities of both, this Digimon is a flexible fighter. In recent years, it was discovered that if the secretion "Black Digitron" is mixed in with an Omnimon while it is in the process of fusion, it will be temporarily born as a black holy knight. It displays a further increase in power, beginning with the weapons on both of its arms.

attacks.name: Supreme Cannon (Garuru Cannon)
attacks.description: Freezes the opponent with frigid, absolute zero shots that it fires from the "Garuru Cannon".

attacks.name: Transcendent Sword (Grey Sword)
attacks.description: Slashes with the "Grey Sword".

OmniShoutmon.name: OmniShoutmon
OmniShoutmon.description: OmniShoutmon is a Dragon Man Digimon. It is a form obtained when Omnimon bestowed the legendary "Digivolution" upon a Shoutmon that released its boiling hot soul. In addition to its intense passion, it shines gold because its whole body is clad in the Omega inForce, a power received from Omnimon, and its build is becoming crisp and sharp. Because of the glittering and sharpness of its body, its enemies only see OmniShoutmon's figure as an afterimage that cannot be pursued.

attacks.name: Flame Cannon (Heavy Metal Vulcan)
attacks.description: Converts the passion of its overflowing friendship into firepower, as a hail of shots that it fires from its chest as both an attack and an impregnable wall that keeps its opponents away from its comrades.

attacks.name: Victorize Banking
attacks.description: Effuses its passion to justice from the "V" on its head and assaults the opponent while shining greater than the sun, eradicating them.

attacks.name: Twin Fireball Strike (ハードロックダマシー, Hādo Rokku Damashī, lit. "Hard Rock Soul")
attacks.description: Changes the passion of its courage into flames that surge in its fists, with which it strikes the opponent when at close range, and hurls when at a distance.

attacks.name: Doom Drillpress (Beat Slash)
attacks.description: Changes its feet into blades by filling them with the passion of its fighting spirit, then uses them to kick and cut apart the opponent.

attacks.name: Omni Core Fusion (Omega the Fusion)
attacks.description: Draws the power of the Omega inForce from its whole body, concentrates it into an Omnimon-shaped aura, then shoots it at the opponent, blowing away even the morale of those who witness it.

OmniShoutmon X.name: OmniShoutmon X
OmniShoutmon X.description: OmniShoutmon X is a Dragon Man Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The red lines spread throughout its body are something that emerged when OmniShoutmon's fiercely boiling passion and the X-Antibody synchronized with each other. Its "Flare Rock Soul", in which that passion is unleashed, takes on the form of crystal claws, drastically increases its power.

attacks.name: Flame Cannon (Heavy Metal Vulcan)
attacks.description: Fires from its chest a hail of shots converted from the passion of its overflowing friendship into firepower, it is not only an attack but also becomes an impregnable barrage that keeps opponents away, protecting its comrades.

attacks.name: Victorize Banking
attacks.description: Effuses its passion to justice from the "V" on its head and assaults the opponent while shining greater than the sun, eradicating them.

attacks.name: Hard Rock Soul (ハードロックダマシー, Hard Rock Damashī)
attacks.description: The passion of its courage turns into flames and surges in its fists. It is able to suit its attack to the situation, by striking the opponent when in close range, and hurling the flames when at long range.

attacks.name: Beat Slash
attacks.description: Its feet become blades by filling them with the passion of its fighting spirit, and it kicks and cuts apart the opponent.

attacks.name: Omega the Fusion
attacks.description: Draws the power of the Omega inForce from its whole body, concentrates it into an aura, and shoots it at the opponent, blowing away even the morale of those who witness it.

attacks.name: Flare Rock Soul  (フレアロックダマシー, Flare Rock Damashī)
Heavy Heat Vulcan
attacks.description: Rapid-fires tiny fireballs. Each shot is Mega Flame-class

attacks.name: Zeal Magnum
attacks.description: Charges its hands with scorching-hot energy shots that never cool down, and then fires them.

Ophanimon.name: Ophanimon
Ophanimon.description: Ophanimonis an Angel Digimon. As one of the "Celestial Digimon", it is aHoly Mother-like being who imparts the loving and merciful side ofGod. It is the final form of feminine Angel Digimon.It was responsible for banishing the former Angel-speciesCho-Hakkaimonfrom heaven for an unspecified crime,but it's also thought thatLilithmon, who fell from heaven and became known as the "Goddess of Darkness", was itself originally an Ophanimon.

attacks.name: Eden's Javelin
attacks.description: Radiates a beam of purifying light from its javelin.

attacks.name: Sefirot Crystal
attacks.description:
Manifest ten crystals between its hands, in a Sefirot formation, and fires them.
Air Sefirot Crystal

title: Holy Mother
(聖母
Seibo?)

Ophanimon C.name: Ophanimon C
Ophanimon C.description: Ophanimon Cis form ofOphanimonwho has merged with theChronoCore.

attacks.name: Holy Destroy
attacks.description: Destroys everything in three zones with holy light.

attacks.name: Call Dramon
attacks.description: Calls a dragon to unleash fire on three zones, lowering Defense.

Ophanimon X.name: Ophanimon X
debut: Digimon Chronicle X, "Two Lights, and the Plot of Further Dark Evil" [20]
Ophanimon X.description: Ophanimon Xis an Ophan Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. Its wings shine like crystals, and it is said that your heart will overflow with calm feelings just at first glance. The sight of it standing gently on top of a single wheel also highlights its elegance. The armor on its shoulders detaches and combines together to form a weapon called "EDEN's Lance".

attacks.name: EDEN's Javelin
attacks.description: Radiates a beam of purifying light from its javelin.

attacks.name: Sefirot Crystal
attacks.description: Manifests ten crystals between its hands, in a Sefirot formation, and fires them.

attacks.name: Holy Material
attacks.description: Spins the Eden's Lance, generates a large number of magic circles around it and fires holy light, reducing evil enemies to ashes.

Ophanimon Falldown Mode.name: Ophanimon Falldown Mode
Ophanimon Falldown Mode.description: Ophanimon Falldown Modeis a Fallen Angel Digimon. It is a form ofOphanimonthat was so angry that it suppressed its own emotions and fell into madness. It swelled with anger at the world, where atrocious sins keep mounting no matter how many times they are purged, and it closed off its heart. In order to nip evil in the bud, it hunts whichever opponents it has judged to have become a barrier to justice, and tries to establish a world of what it recognizes as justice. It wields the "Flame Hellscythe", which is shrouded in flames that serve as a weapon.

attacks.name: Flame Hellscythe
attacks.description: Hunts down the opponent with the Flame Hellscythe, then plunges the hunted soul with hellfire into hell.

attacks.name: Demon's Crystal
attacks.description: Performs a summoning technique that torments the opponent until they die.

Ophanimon Falldown Mode X.name: Ophanimon Falldown Mode X
Ophanimon Falldown Mode X.description: Ophanimon Falldown Mode Xis a Fallen Angel Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody.Ophanimon Falldown Modebetter equipped itself to take on multiple enemies at once, such as by turning its "Flame Hellscythe" into a giant scythe engulfed in flames on both ends. Of note are the three "Behead Slashers" floating around it that help defend it against enemy attacks, as well as pursue the enemy and slice them apart. Not only that, their attack power rises significantly when they are enveloped in flames. Having gained the power to take on an entire army, it continues its extermination of the never-ending threats to justice alone.

attacks.name: Flame Hellscythe
attacks.description: Hunts down the opponent with its "Flame Hellscythe", which is shrouded in flames that serve as a weapon, then plunges the hunted soul into hell with hellfire.

attacks.name: Demonic Crystal (Demon's Crystal)
attacks.description: Performs a summoning technique that torments the opponent until they die.

Opossummon.name: Opossummon
Opossummon.description: Opossummon is a Beast Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Kindness". Its cute looks and trademark colorful balloons make it seem like a Puppet Digimon from a fairy-tale village, but when angered, it attacks by spreading around balloons charged with powerful computer viruses, and then detonating them. It's fond of dry, sandy soil, and usually hides under the sand with only its balloons showing above. It hops and bounces through the air when flying, and still keeps a tight hold on its balloons when on the ground. It's an annoying fellow that isn't able to move very fast, but that doesn't mean it's easy to catch.

attacks.name: Mad Balloon Bombs (Mad Balloon Bomb)
attacks.description: A terrifying technique that breeds powerful computer viruses in the balloons it holds in its hand, bursting them as they lightly float over the enemy's head during battle.

Orcamon.name: Orcamon
Orcamon.description: Orcamon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Reliability". As it is equipped with a life jacket and lifebuoy and has a conscientious personality, it is an overly cautious type. Although some parts of it are dull‐witted in that it breaks things by hitting them too much, it is actually a savior of the ocean that has excellent agility. There are many Digimon that rely on it and come to it for advice. When a battle breaks out, the speed of its movement increases; on land, it runs as if it is cutting through the wind, and underwater, it swims elegantly without disturbing the current. If it gets into a pinch, it will call its comrades using high-frequency waves and attack as a group.

Ornismon.name: Ornismon
Ornismon.description: Ornismon is an Ancient Bird Digimon. It is an ancient Digimon that went extinct in the distant past. Boasting a size beyond imagination, it is called the "Ruler of the Skies". Its personality is ferocious, and it is said that it will frequently assault even larger Digimon.

attacks.name: Cosmic Ray
