attacks.description: Fires a dazzling laser beam.

title: Ruler of the Skies
(天空の覇者
Tenkū no hasha?)

Orochimon.name: Orochimon
Orochimon.description: Orochimon is a Dark Dragon Digimon. It is gigantic and possesses eight heads, though seven of them are dummies, and the black one in the middle is the only real one. The roots of Orochimon's creation are old, and although it was a being such that it raged in all its fury in the ancient Digital World, and drove some areas to devastation, it was sealed by the servant of a "being" which sought to preserve the harmony of the Digital World.

attacks.name: Sake Breath (酒ブレス, Sake Breath)
attacks.description: Gets the opponent completely drunk by intoxicating them with its alcohol-laden breath.

attacks.name: Spirytus Breath
attacks.description: An upgraded version of Sake Breath. It subjects high-concentration alcohol to high pressure, vaporizing and releasing it.

attacks.name: Inferno Blast
attacks.description: Spews out a powerful blaze.

attacks.name: Ame no Murakumo
attacks.description: Turns the tip of its tail into a sharp blade, then cuts the opponent to pieces.

Oryxmon.name: Oryxmon
Oryxmon.description: Oryxmon is a Mammal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Hope". This Digimon, which has the appearance of a large black goat, has had the duty of guarding treasures and ruins since ancient tmes. It is programmed to protect important data by capitalizing on its special characteristics and putting up a powerful barrier. However, because it is a goat, some of them seem to have an embarrassing issue of completely eating document data. The thief Digimon Harpymon is definitely its natural enemy.

attacks.name: Mystic Bell
attacks.description: Generates special ultrasonic waves from the bell hanging from its neck to confound the enemy.

Otamamon.name: Otamamon
Otamamon.description: Otamamonis an Amphibian Digimon. It is a larva Digimon whose skin has not yet fully hardened because it chose to live underwater. It swims in lakes and rivers upstream of theNet Oceanwith its large tail, and occasionally climbs up onto rocks with its developed forelimbs and doesvocal training. Its mostly undeveloped hind limbs act as rudders in place of its tail, which has gained propulsive power, contrary to typical organisms. It is valuable amongRookielevels in that it signals its upcoming digivolution clearly, but since its potential for mutation is extremely high, caution is necessary in its training.

attacks.name: Stun Bubble (Lullaby Bubble)
attacks.description: Spray bubbles that will cause the enemy to sleep.

attacks.name: Kid Claw (Child Claw)
attacks.description: Scratch using the claws on well-developed front legs.

attacks.name: Tackle (たいあたり, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Tackle")
attacks.description: Tackles the enemy forcefully.

attacks.name: Water Jet
attacks.description: Attacks by shooting a stream of water.

attacks.name: Water Shot
attacks.description: Attacks with a bursting stream of water.

Otamamon (Red).name: Otamamon (Red)
Otamamon (Red).description: Otamamon (Red) is an Amphibian Digimon. It is a variant of Otamamon that acquired the attribute of flame. For that reason, it prefers hot springs over cold rivers. As it loves to sing like Otamamon, it never misses out on its vocal training. Its forelimbs are powerful enough to climb up onto rocks and become reassuring weapons in battle.

attacks.name: Boiling Bubble (Boiled Bubble)
attacks.description: Sprays bubbles that are hot enough to cause a burn.

attacks.name: Rover Claw (Lava Claw)
attacks.description: Scratches using the claws its on well-developed front legs.

attacks.name: Tackle (たいあたり, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Blow")
attacks.description: Tackles the enemy forcefully.

attacks.name: Boiling Fire (Boiled Fire)
attacks.description: Shoots a ball of flame.

Otamamon X.name: Otamamon X
Otamamon X.description: Otamamon X is an Amphibian Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Since its body has become even larger, its vocals have become louder, and the effects of its Special Move "Lullaby Bubble" have strengthened. It is said that because of a certain Mutant-type Mega Digimon, it looked forward to a promising future with its round body and was gifted the gorgeous crown "Prince no Osagari" (プリンスのオサガリ, "Prince no Osagari" lit. "Prince's Hand-me-down") and it became difficult to be attacked by the enemy due to its majestic appearance. Furthermore, it also taught Otamamon its Signature Move "Smiley Headbutt".

attacks.name: Lullaby Bubble
attacks.description: Sends the opponent into an eternal slumber.

attacks.name: Smiley Headbutt
attacks.description: Headbutts the enemy without breaking its smile, but its face still cramps up and its power is weak.

Ouryumon.name: Ouryumon
Ouryumon.description: Ouryumon is a Dragon Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is an imaginary Digimon born from the "Daydream of a DigiCore". It is a form that had even the DigiCore's own creativity released through the Interface on its brow, and digivolved. Possibly because it naturally possessed the ferocious combat data of the "Dragons" and "Generals" of Japanese myth within its DigiCore, the form created by its DigiCore is a "Warrior Dragon", clad in frightening, majestic Japanese armor and holding swords in both of its hands. The left-hand sword is the "Gairyū Sadaijin" (鎧龍左大刃, "Gairyū Sadaijin" lit. "Armored Dragon Left Greatsword"), and the right-hand sword is the "Gairyū Udaijin" (鎧龍右大刃, "Gairyū Udaijin" lit. "Armored Dragon Right Greatsword"). The blades of the wings on its back are called the "Gaiba Daimeijin" (鎧馬大名刃, "Gaiba Daimeijin" lit. "Armored Horse Famous Blades"). The characters on its swords are their names. Together, its swords are called the "Gairyū Daijin" (鎧龍大刃, "Gairyū Daijin" lit. "Armored Dragon Greatswords").

attacks.name: Eiseiryuoujin (永世竜王刃, Eiseiryūoujin, lit. "Immortal Dragon King Blade")
attacks.description: Fires an attack from the Gairyū Sadaijin and Gairyū Udaijin.

attacks.name: Golden Armor (黄鎧, Ougai, lit. "Yellow Armor")
attacks.description: Rampages like the earthflow of a mighty river, cutting everything apart while charging the opponent. There is a theory that Ouryumon's "Golden Armor" technique has its roots in Huanglongmon's "Yellow Circle", although it is unconfirmed.

Pabumon.name: Pabumon
Pabumon.description: Pabumon is a Slime Digimon. Although it looks like it is just pale green bubbles at first glance, it is a Bubble Digimon that can move freely and express a plethora of facial expressions. Because its surface has not hardened yet, its defensive power is nonexistent and it is equally unsuited for combat. From the portion that looks like a pacifier held in its mouth, it generates tiny bubbles, and proliferates them infinitely. As for that proliferation, at one point, it started being used for computer virus development, but because its life force was too weak, that was fortunately never implemented. Although its life is fleeting, it is a lovable Digimon Baby that lives earnestly.

attacks.name: Adhesive Bubble Blow (粘着性の泡, Nenchakusei no Awa, lit. "Adhesive Bubbles")
attacks.description: Escapes while the intruder's movement is restricted by the adhesive bubbles it generates from within its body.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

Pafumon.name: Pafumon
Pafumon.description: Pafumon is a Spirit Digimon. It possesses a translucent body, and since its body is as light as down, it is constantly drifting through the air. It has the habit of moving upon the winds, and it is said that, if the wind's condition is suitable, it will migrate very far. It dislikes fights and has a gentle personality.

attacks.name: Puff Balloon
attacks.description: Surprises the opponent by opening its mouth wide, sucking in air, and swelling its body up to three times its usual size, then seizes the opportunity to expel the air and escape.

Pagumon.name: Pagumon
Pagumon.description: Pagumon is a Lesser Digimon. This small Digimon can fly at low altitudes with the ear-like protrusions growing out of its head. It can move these ears like a second pair of hands, using them to mock the enemy with all kinds of gestures. It has a malicious streak, often chasing after Digimon like Koromon or Tsunomon and teasing them.

attacks.name: Poison Bubbles (毒の泡, Doku no Awa, lit. "Poison Bubbles")
attacks.description: Shoots out poison bubbles.

attacks.name: Awa (泡, Awa lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Shoots out bubbles.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

attacks.name: Tackle
attacks.description: A powerful charge used against the opponent.

Paildramon.name: Paildramon
Paildramon.description: Paildramon is a Dragon Man Digimon. It is the DNA digivolved form of ExVeemon and Stingmon. It has the power of a dragon and the defense of an insect. However, it looks more like a dragon than an insect. It agilely finishes off its enemies and would die for its master.

attacks.name: Desperado Blaster
attacks.description: Fires energy bullets from the two cannons weapon on its hips, like a machine-gun.

attacks.name: Sting Strike (Esgrima, Esp: Fencing)
attacks.description: Extends the spikes on its wrists into lances, then strikes at the opponent.

attacks.name: Electric Bolt (Elemental Bolt)
attacks.description: Fires an bolt of electricity from its hands.

attacks.name: Cable Catcher
attacks.description: Fires off its claws on wires to bind or stab the opponent with them.

Pajiramon.name: Pajiramon
Pajiramon.description: Pajiramon is a Beast Digimon. It is the "Sheep" Deva, and serves the Digimon Sovereign Zhuqiaomon. As a follower of Zhuqiaomon, it is a powerful figure who rules the world of dreams. It doesn't befriend the other Deva and is always calm, never changing its mind. Among the Deva, it has surprisingly many secrets whose truth is not divulged, and it is also known as the Dark Deva. Its personality is cruel, and lacks feelings of consideration for others. The arrows of light fired off from its "Bǎo Gōng" (宝弓 lit. "Treasure Bow"), which it never parts with even for a moment, have the power to knock out the opponent.

attacks.name: Vahnijwala (Vahnijvala)
attacks.description: Confines the opponent within a nightmare world from which they cannot awaken, by means of its special arrows. Kumbhiramon is the only Deva able to counter it, through the power of its thoughts.

attacks.name: Thunder Stomp
attacks.description: Stomps hard enough for a localized quake.

title: Dark Deva

Palmon.name: Palmon
Palmon.description: Palmonis a Vegetation Digimon. It has a tropical flower blooming on its head. Although it digivolved like a reptile fromTanemon, it is an unusual Type which is classified as Vegetation based on its outward appearances and special qualities, similar to its rivalFloramon.As a Vegetation Digimon, it gets along withFanBeemon.During the day, it opens up the flower and spreads its leaf-like arms to performphotosynthesis. It usually buries its root-like feet under the ground, and although it is absorbing nutrients, it is also able to walk. As for the flower on its head, when it is joyful or happy, it will waft about a sweet fragrance, but when it is angered or senses danger, it releases a foul stench that will drive off even large Digimon.

attacks.name: Poison Ivy
attacks.description: Entangles the opponent in ivy laced with a powerful toxin, completely paralyzing them.

attacks.name: Plant Shock
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with ivy.

attacks.name: Root Breaker (Root Stretch)
attacks.description: Drains energy from foe.

attacks.name: Thorn Thrust
attacks.description: Stabs upwards with its extended fingers.

attacks.name: Sleep Spores (Sleep Spore)
attacks.description: Shakes its petals, which releases spores that can put Digimon to sleep.

attacks.name: Thorn Throw
attacks.description: Impales the opponent with its vines before throwing them.

attacks.name: Nioi Kougeki (におい攻撃, Nioi Kougeki lit. "Stench Attack")
attacks.description: Releases a foul stench.

attacks.name: Stinky Smell (くさいニオイ, Kusai Nioi, lit. "Stinking Stench")
attacks.description: Blows out poisonous smoke.

attacks.name: Very Stinky Smell (とてもくさいニオイ, Totemo Kusai Nioi, lit. "Very Stinky Stench")
attacks.description: Blows out powerful poisonous smoke.

attacks.name: Poison Powder
attacks.description: Shoots poison spores out of its head.

Palmon X.name: Palmon X
Palmon X.description: Palmon X is a Plant Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The glamorous, tropical flower on its head has fully bloomed, and its colors and fragrance now express Palmon's emotions clearly. It releases a poisonous scent from its red petals when angry, a cool scent that suppresses the enemy's fighting spirit from its blue-green petals when sad, and a scent that plunges nearby Digimon into a hallucination, causing them to escape from reality, from its yellow petals when happy. The essences of these scents are blended within its body to produce its "RGB Herb". Digimon scratched by the claws on its arms would be temporarily confused due to the poison it synthesizes.

attacks.name: Poison Ivy
attacks.description: Entangles the opponent in ivy laced with a powerful toxin. If you suffer this attack, your body will be completely paralyzed.

Paledramon.name: Paledramon
Paledramon.description: Paledramonis a Dragon Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved fromBulucomon. Its large wings of ice allow it to fly at high speed, even in foul weather. Changes in temperature due to the environment no longer have an effect on its body, but when facing hot Digimon such asMeramon, its body will melt just like its Rookie form, causing its power to decrease. It has a strong sense of camaraderie, so if a Digimon who it has teamed up with falls into a crisis, it will try to help them out without considering the risks.

attacks.name: Shuāngxuě màntiān (霜雪漫天 lit. "Frost and Snow")
Ice Age
attacks.description: Freezes the enemy with its breath.

attacks.name: Meteor Hail
attacks.description: Charges from the sky as if it were a giant block of ice.

Panbachimon.name: Panbachimon
Panbachimon.description: Panbachimon is a Digimon who carries a giant bamboo weapon called "Bamboo Lance G" (バンブーランスＧ, Banbū Ransu G).

attacks.name: Sasanoha Cutter (ササノハカッター, Sasanoha Cutter lit. "Bamboo-leaf Cutter")
Shokkaku Binta (ショッカクビンタ, Shokkaku Binta lit. "Antenna Slap")
Dokudokubari (ドクドクバリ, Dokudokubari lit. "Venomous Stinger")

Pandamon.name: Pandamon
Pandamon.description: Pandamon is a Puppet Digimon. It is expressionless, apathetic and brusque, displaying absolutely no charm. It considers itself a lone wolf, but is secretly envious of another popular Digimon with a similar look, Monzaemon. Still, it possesses considerable power, smacking down any foe that would take a swing at it. There are very few of these in the world, so they are rarely seen.

attacks.name: Animal Nail
attacks.description: Attacks with the hidden claws hidden inside its hands.

attacks.name: Leaf Punch (笹パンチ, Sasa Punch)
attacks.description: A powerful punch with the power of bamboo.

attacks.name: Hand Strike (掌打, Shoudan, lit. "Palm Strike")
attacks.description: A hand strike with all of its weight on it.

attacks.name: Firecracker (ウンナンショウ, Unnanshou, lit. "Yunnan Province")
attacks.description: Summons a huge firecracker and causes an explosion.

Panimon.name: Panimon
Panimon.description: Name used inDigimon Adventure V-Tamer 01. No official romanization available.

Paomon.name: Paomon
Paomon.description: Paomon is a Slime Digimon. Unlike other Digimon that developed naturally, it is an artificial Digimon that was created through human effort to be used for appreciation and rearing. Although there is no shortage of Digimon at the Rookie stage whose configuration program is remodeled through human effort, Digimon artificially created from the Fresh stage are rare. According to one theory, it was developed jointly by research groups in Shanghai, Taiwan, and Okinawa, but its birthplace is not certain.

attacks.name: San no Awa (酸の泡, San no Awa lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits resilient, acidic bubbles to intimidate the opponent.

attacks.name: Tsumo (Tummo)
attacks.description: Releases a high-frequency wave that is an effective charm against evil.

Parallelmon.name: Parallelmon
Parallelmon.description: Parallelmon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a cool-headed Digimon who hunts Tamers that wander through space-time.

attacks.name: Absorbent Bang
attacks.description: Fires a fanged tendril from its eye that can swallow nearly anything digital. It absorbs any Tamers it catches, and sends everything else to another dimension.

Parasimon.name: Parasimon
Parasimon.description: Parasimon is a Parasite Digimon. It is a special Digimon that can't survive without leeching off of other beings, even though it is a Mega. Parasimon is powerless when by itself, but when it gathers in numbers, it can easily defeat Champion Digimon. When Parasimon leeches off of another, it can draw out the host Digimon's abilities to their utmost limit, exhibiting a terrifying power. Also, it can amplify the host's desires, and it is capable of taking advantage of those weaknesses. The existence of Parasite Digimon types other than Parasimon has been confirmed, and the influence of Parasite Digimon, in addition to viralization, is considered the cause of berserk Digimon.

attacks.name: Electric Bind
attacks.description: Binds the opponent with its elongated tentacles and unleashes an intense electric shock.

Parasaurmon.name: Parasaurmon
Parasaurmon.description: Parasaurmonis a Dinosaur Digimon. It is a gentle Digimon that lives in a warm climate. The fruit-like organs around its long neck sprinkle a sweet scent into its surroundings. This scent has the role of informing the herd of their position, and it seems that the scent differs slightly depending on the individual. It is often attacked by other Digimon that are drawn in by its scent, but it deprives invading enemies of their freedom with the numbing gas "Palsy Sweet".

attacks.name: Immobilizing Sweetness (Palsy Sweet)
attacks.description: Spits numbing gas out of its mouth.

attacks.name: Wavy Oktavist
attacks.description: Emits a super-low-pitched cry that crushes even rocks, at a loud volume, and engulfs several tens of meters around it in a whirlpool of destruction.

Parrotmon.name: Parrotmon
Parrotmon.description: Parrotmon is a Bird Digimon. A strange, mysterious bird that wandered from another Digital World through a space-time rift, the talons on its feet possess mighty power. As it is very highly intelligent and calm, it prefers not to battle, but once it is angered, it gets out of control.

attacks.name: Sonic Destroyer
attacks.description: Uses shockwaves created at mach speeds to attack an opponent.

attacks.name: Mjollnir Lightning (Mjölnir Thunder)
attacks.description: Unleashes a powerful bolt of lightning from its forehead.

Patamon.name: Patamon
Patamon.description: Patamon is a Mammal Digimon. It is characterized by its large ears, and is able to fly through the air by using them as large wings, but because it only goes at a speed of 1 kph, it is said that it is definitely faster walking. However, it's very popular because its appearance is cute when it is desperately flying (though it seems that it doesn't feel the same). Due to its extremely obedient personality, its trainers are well-defended. Also, even though Patamon doesn't wear a Holy Ring, it is able to exhibit its hidden holy power, and it appears to have inherited the genes of ancient Digimon.

attacks.name: Boom Bubble (Air Shot)
attacks.description:
Sucks in air then spews an air shot out in one burst.
Kūchū Air Shot (空中エアショット, Kūchū Air Shot lit. "Aerial Air Shot")

attacks.name: Kūchū Air Shot (空中エアショット, Kūchū Air Shot lit. "Aerial Air Shot")
Breeze Blaster (Air Gust)
attacks.description: Inflates its body and spits out clouds.

attacks.name: Body Blow (たいあたり, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Blow")
attacks.description: Tackles the enemy.

attacks.name: Pretty Attack (Pretty Rush)
attacks.description: Runs forward and rams the enemy with its shoulder.

attacks.name: Intercepting Air Shot (Geigeki Air Shot)
attacks.description: A Boom Bubble that counters the enemy's attack.

attacks.name: Slamming Attack (はねビンタ, Hane Binta, lit. "Wing Slap")
attacks.description: Slaps the enemy with its wing-like ears.

attacks.name: Thousand Wings (Thousand Wing)
attacks.description: Spins in the air to attack the enemy with its ears.

attacks.name: Spin Kick
attacks.description: Spins once on the ground, hitting an enemy with one wing.

attacks.name: Air Slam
attacks.description: Shoots forward through the air, hitting an enemy.

attacks.name: Glide
attacks.description: Glides through the air.

attacks.name:
Tai Atari Bomb (たいあたりボム, Tai Atari Bomb lit. "Body Blow Bomb"): Flies forward while spinning.
Kūchū Tai Atari Bomb (空中たいあたりボム, Kūchū Tai Atari Bomb lit. "Aerial Body Blow Bomb")
attacks.description: Dive bombs the enemy while spinning.

attacks.name: Kūchū Tai Atari Bomb (空中たいあたりボム, Kūchū Tai Atari Bomb lit. "Aerial Body Blow Bomb")
attacks.description: Dive bombs the enemy while spinning.

attacks.name: Patapata Hover
attacks.description: Flies through the sky.

attacks.name: Sparking Boom Bubble (Sparking Air Shot)
attacks.description: An intensified Air Shot.

attacks.name: Aero Slash
attacks.description: Breathes in air and shoots it out as blades made out of wind.

PawnChessmon (Black).name: PawnChessmon (Black)
PawnChessmon (Black).description: PawnChessmon (Black)is a Puppet Digimon. It was born from data leaking out of achess gamesupercomputer. Its power is weak, but it is promoted when it strives for prominence, and it is an ordinary pawn that conceals the mystery that it is said to possess Mega-class power. Its catchphrase is, "I only advance!" It considers its fellows who are striving for prominence ahead of it to be its rivals,among themPawnChessmon (White).

attacks.name: Pawn Spear
attacks.description: Stabs with its spear.

attacks.name: Pawn Buckler
attacks.description: Charges with its buckler held up.

attacks.name: Pawn Lightning
attacks.description: Fires a shockwave with a lightning fast strike.

attacks.name: Pawn Charge
attacks.description: Holds a spear and charges the enemy.

attacks.name: Pawn Penetrate
attacks.description: Attacks with a furious charge that can penetrate anything.

PawnChessmon (White).name: PawnChessmon (White)
PawnChessmon (White).description: PawnChessmon (White)is a Puppet Digimon. It was born from data leaking out of achess gamesupercomputer. Its power is weak, but it is promoted when it strives for prominence, and it is an ordinary pawn that conceals the mystery that it is said to possess Mega-class power. Its catchphrase is, "I only advance!" It considers its fellows who are striving for prominence ahead of it to be its rivals,among themPawnChessmon (Black).

attacks.name: Pawn Spear
attacks.description: Stabs with its spear.

attacks.name: Pawn Buckler
attacks.description: Charges with its buckler held up.

attacks.name: Pawn Lightning
attacks.description: Fires a shockwave with a lightning fast strike.

attacks.name: Pawn Charge
attacks.description: Holds a spear and charges the enemy.

attacks.name: Pawn Penetrate
attacks.description: A furious charge that can penetrate anything.

PaunGaossmon.name: PaunGaossmon
PaunGaossmon.description: PaunGaossmon is aGaossmonwith aPawnChessmon (White)'s helmet on its head, and its spear and buckler on its back.

Pawnshoutmon.name: Pawnshoutmon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Laughing All The Way To The Code Crown" [23]
Pawnshoutmon.description: Name used inDigimon Fusion. No official romanization available.

Peacockmon.name: Peacockmon
Peacockmon.description: Peacockmon is a Machine Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Miracles". When certain Bird Digimon perform normal digivolution, they have the potential to become "Deramon", but there are cases where they will rarely digivolve into Peacockmon by using the Digi-Egg of Miracles. Its body is made of a blue metallic Chrome Digizoid alloy, and by producing laser-shaped wings from portions of both of its arms, it is able to fly at extremely high speeds.

Peckmon.name: Peckmon
Peckmon.description: Peckmon is a Bird Digimon. Peckmon has powerful legs that run faster than it can fly. It can fling the steel pinions hidden under its wings to inflict serious damage.

attacks.name: Spiral Claw
attacks.description: Charges at the enemy while spinning its feet like a drill.

attacks.name: Thousand Beaks (Thousand Beak)
attacks.description: Multiple attacks with its beak. In Digimon Data Squad, this attack is so fast, it appears Peckmon has created clones of itself.

attacks.name: Kunai Wing (苦無羽, Kunai Bane, lit. "Kunai Feathers")
attacks.description: Throws kunai-like sharp, bladed feathers that explode.

attacks.name: Burning Spiral
attacks.description: A spinning Spiral Claw that will burn from the friction.

attacks.name: Front Kick (前蹴り, Meakeri, lit. "Front Kick")
attacks.description: Uses its powerful legs to attack with a front kick.

attacks.name: Strong Front Kick (強前蹴り, Tsuyoi Maekeri, lit. "Strong Front Kick")
attacks.description: Attacks with an even stronger front kick.

attacks.name: Feather Shoot
attacks.description: Slices by firing sharp-edged feathers.

Pegasusmon.name: Pegasusmon
Pegasusmon.description: Pegasusmon is an Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Hope". The "Digi-Egg of Hope" has the attribute of "Holy", and those that don this Digi-Egg are able to obtain sacred power. Those that acquire this power are able to exhibit their absolute strength toward evildoers.

attacks.name: Star Shower (Shooting Star)
attacks.description: Shoots a cluster of stars from its wings.

attacks.name: Equus Beam (Silver Blaze)
attacks.description: Shoots a green beam from its forehead.

attacks.name: Mane Wind (Needle Rain)
attacks.description: Blasts a shower of needles from its mane.

attacks.name: Rodeo Kick (Rodeo Gallop)
attacks.description: Kick with its hind legs.

attacks.name: Pegas Drop
attacks.description: Attacks with a powerful headbutt.

title: Flying Hope
(天かける希望
Amakakeru Kibou?)

Pegasusmon X.name: Pegasusmon X
Pegasusmon X.description: Pegasusmon X is a Mammal Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The armor it wears has been powered up, and it is now clad in "Sacred Wall (Secret Wall)", a barrier that wards off evil in its surroundings. The space within this barrier operates under its own unique laws, and it flies while being enveloped in it, allowing Pegasusmon to super-accelerate enough for its maximum speed to reach the speed of light.

attacks.name: Rodeo Gallop
attacks.description: Unleashes a powerful blow with its hind legs.

attacks.name: Silver Blaze
attacks.description: Fires a holy beam from its brow.

attacks.name: Shooting Star
attacks.description: Creates the void of space inside both of its wings, and sends it out shooting stars.

attacks.name: Meteorizer
attacks.description: Exterminates evil enemies by charging from the skies at lightspeed.

attacks.name: Golden Square
attacks.description: Fires purifying beams from the crystals on its wings and forelegs.

attacks.name: Sacred Wall (Secret Wall)
attacks.description: A barrier that repels evil which it uses to protect itself and its surroundings.

Penguinmon.name: Penguinmon
Penguinmon.description: Penguinmon is a Bird Digimon. Discovered within an Antarctic base's computer, it is similar to a penguin. Because it lives in an ice-covered region, it has a fault of being weak in the heat, but as it has an affable personality, it will follow after you with a waddling walk. Also, its wings have degenerated, and although it is unable to fly and its walking speed is slow, it is able to move with a speed of more than 60 kph by sliding across the ice on its belly. Also, in the water, it is even able to swim using its small wings. Penguinmon is especially close to Bulucomon.

attacks.name: Super Slap (無限ビンタ, Mugen Binta, lit. "Eternal Slapping")
attacks.description: Approaches an opponent without them noticing, then uses its hands to slap them in the cheeks with vehement force.

attacks.name: Sliding Attack (Slide Attack)
attacks.description: Lays on its belly and slide tackles its enemies.

attacks.name: Ice Prism
attacks.description: Shoots ice shards from its beak at opponents.

attacks.name: Beak Attack (Kuchibashi Attack)
attacks.description: Pokes with a hard beak.

Petaldramon.name: Petaldramon
Petaldramon.description: Petaldramon is a Plant Digimon. It possesses power over Wood which bears the might of AncientTroiamon. Countless buds sprouted from Arbormon's surface and suddenly grew, and its surface changed into a form like a giant plant lizard. Although it's just like Arbormon, where you can't tell what it's thinking due to its lack of expression, it possesses a great appetite which is the exact opposite of Arbormon, who doesn't require food. When it opens its mouth, it sticks out its ivy-like tongue and swallows anything. When it swallows its prey, the branches on its back grow and it grins eerily just at that moment. Its physical attacks are its branches and tail-whip. It scatters sleep-inducing spores from its moss, which acts as its skin.

attacks.name: Thorn Jab (Thousand Spike)
attacks.description: Stabs its tail into the ground, causing vines to burst from the earth and entangle its foes.

attacks.name: Leaf Cyclone
attacks.description: Releases a cyclone of leaves from its nostrils.

Petermon.name: Petermon
Petermon.description: Petermon is a Fairy Digimon. It has the appearance of a boy that dances freely in the sky. It tempts young and childish Digimon that refuse to digivolve with, "Let's make a country just for children," calling them to the children's world of "Never-Ever Land" that it built. It's said to have a naive and innocent personality, but thanks to its purity there, a brutality lurks within. In particular, although it calls it a "Pretend Punishment", it mercilessly beats Digimon who break their promises. With Petermon's first-class handling of its sword, it delicately manipulates the knife on its hip to punish the opponent.

attacks.name: Snipe Sting
attacks.description: Smiles scornfully while it relentlessly chases its opponents with dazzling swordplay whose blows hit their vitals precisely.

attacks.name: Twinkle Shoot
attacks.description: Throws its knife so that it pursues the opponent until it hits.

attacks.name: Midnight Fantasia
attacks.description: Breezily whistles a melody that allows it to freely manipulate the young Digimon sleeping nearby while they are still asleep.

PetitMamon.name: PetitMamon
PetitMamon.description: PetitMamon is a Mini Devil Digimon.

Petitmon.name: Petitmon
Petitmon.description: Petitmon is a Slime Digimon. It possesses large horns and tiny wings. As its body is extremely light, it lives constantly floating through the air, and maintains its posture in the air by blowing air from its wings and mouth. Although it usually has a cheerful personality, if the three scales on its belly are touched, it goes into an extremely bad mood. It's not easy to catch because it uses its "Atsui Toiki" when bodily harm draws near.

attacks.name: Atsui Toiki (熱い吐息, Atsui Toiki lit. "Hot Sigh")
attacks.description: Spits its hot breath to surprise the opponent, while simultaneously using it as propulsive force to quickly flee.

Phantomon.name: Phantomon
Phantomon.description: Phantomon is a Ghost Digimon. A Reaper-like Digimon holding a gigantic sickle and chain. It is a higher class of Ghost Digimon compared to Bakemon, so when a person is possessed by Phantomon they are in their last moments, and it comes upon them when they die completely. There is a crystal shaped like an eyeball hanging from its neck, and similar to Mammothmon's crest, it is able to foresee everything with its power of clairvoyance, in order to perceive those that are close to death. It is said that the interior of the cloth which conceals its body leads to a separate dimension from the Digital World.

attacks.name: Shadow Scythe (Soul Chopper)
attacks.description: Cuts even the opponent's soul to pieces with its gigantic sickle and chain, completely annihilating the soul.

attacks.name: Words of Death (死の宣告, Shi no Senkoku, lit "Death Sentence")
attacks.description: Kills an opponent instantly with a word of death.

attacks.name: Diabolic Star
attacks.description: Calls dark energy into the weighted chain end of its sickle and chain and slams an opponent with it.

Pharaohmon.name: Pharaohmon
Pharaohmon.description: Pharaohmon is a Ghost Digimon. Its body shines gold enough to be baleful. It is said that it digivolved from Mummy Digimon, and it boasted absolute power in the ancient Digital World, ruling many areas. As for the mysterious ancient ruins that dot the Digital World, many Digimon were under Pharaohmon's control at the Genesis of the Digital World, and from these places which are said to have been raised in just a few days, that control can be perceived.

attacks.name: Necromist
attacks.description: Emits a fear-gas that steals the will of hostile Digimon, and slowly desiccates their flesh. This leaves the opponent with two options—whether to be lured completely to the world of death, or to serve Pharaohmon as an immortal, even in death.

attacks.name: Tut-ankh-lyl (トゥト・アンク・ラィル, Tut-ankh-lyl lit. "Living Image of the Night")

Phascomon.name: Phascomon
Phascomon.description: Phascomon is a Demon Beast Digimon. It inhabits the dark "Evil Forest" that is spread vast across the Dark Area. It always curls up in a treetop and sleeps often. At a glance, it seems like it's harmless, but it is a fully-fledged Demon Digimon, and there have been many injuries reported from it leaping from the treetop and attacking people as soon as they let their guard down.

attacks.name: Evil Snore
attacks.description: Emits a sleep wave from its sleepy-looking eyes.

attacks.name: Eucalyptus Claw
attacks.description: Attacks with sharp claws containing paralyzing venom.

Phelesmon.name: Phelesmon
Phelesmon.description: Phelesmon is a Fallen Angel Digimon. It is shaped like an aristocrat, and in exchange for granting someone their desires, it is said that it will snatch away their soul. It's said that it is a Boogiemon that advanced and digivolved, but the details are still uncertain.

attacks.name: Black Statue
attacks.description: Changes the opponent into a black stone statue.

attacks.name: Demon's Shout
attacks.description: Drives the enemy to insanity with a curse-filled shout.

Pichimon.name: Pichimon
Pichimon.description: Pichimon is a Slime Digimon. As a microorganism-like Digimon which was discovered in the "Net Ocean", it has the smallest size among a great number of Digimon. Since it seems to be living with nothing but emotions, its actions change very hectically. Due to its curiosity being extremely vigorous, it greatly wishes to communicate with the outside world, but as of yet, no means to do so have been found. However, it is a Digimon Baby that is loved by everyone, due to its big, bright red eyes which are charming enough to shake the opponent's feelings. It spits out soap-like bubbles from its mouth and blinds the opponent's eyes, then flees.

attacks.name: Bubble Blow (シャボンの泡, Sabão no Awa, lit. "Soap Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits out soap-like bubbles from its mouth and blinds the opponent's eyes, then flees.

Pickmon.name: Pickmon
Pickmon.description: Pickmon is a Minor Digimon. Pickmon are enrolled in the "Starmons" corps, where they make up most of the members. The "Starmons" are composed of a corps of several Pickmon with a Starmon at their heart. There is a strict hierarchy to the corps, and disobedience is not allowed because they must have absolute obedience to their superior. For that reason, there are more than a few Pickmon who have given up midway on becoming a Starmon, then left and gone back home, but nevertheless, Pickmon that work hard, aim at independence, and stand out from the crowd will succeed in being promoted to Major and becoming a Starmon.

attacks.name: Chinchikurin (チンチクリン, Chinchikurin lit. "Shorty")
Power Picks (Sugar Plum)
attacks.description: Swarms foes in a dizzying dance.

Piddomon.name: Piddomon
Piddomon.description: Piddomon is an Angel Digimon. It has two wings and its body is clad in shining white cloth. Although it is a being of perfected virtue like Angemon, its rank is below Angemon's. However, its power is on par with Angemon, and it is a being that destroys evil, wielding its "Holy Rod" which it holds in its right hand. As a being of perfected virtue like Angemon, its mission is to destroy evil. It is a warrior of justice which fights with its cherished "Holy Rod".

attacks.name: Fire Feather
attacks.description: Showers its feathers, which have burst into holy flames, like meteors.

attacks.name: Piddo Speed (Pid Speed)
attacks.description: Charges at tremendous speed, and then unleashes an intense blow with the Holy Rod.

attacks.name: Mega Heal
attacks.description: Recovers HP.

Piedmon.name: Piedmon
Piedmon.description: Piedmon is a Wizard Digimon. It is a strange-looking and elusive Digimon that is completely shrouded in mystery. Demon Man Digimon have many mysterious qualities, and since Demon- and Undead-species are basically beings from another dimension, their true identities are totally misunderstood. It is unclear why Piedmon appeared and what the purpose of its existence is, and there are currently no means of clarifying these questions. However, since its strength is without equal, if you happen to stumble across Piedmon, you probably won't be able to do anything but curse your fate. It has four swords pierced through the "Magic Box" on its back.

attacks.name: Trump Sword
attacks.description: Teleports its four swords, causing them to skewer the opponent in the following instant.

attacks.name: Clown Trick
attacks.description: Does various magical effects including transformations, disguises, or reflecting an opponent's attack back.

attacks.name: Masks Square
attacks.description: Creates a field in which all communications can be read by it and allows it to teleport itself and its attacks anywhere at will.

attacks.name: Trump Sword (Toy Wonderness)
attacks.description: Creates a gust of wind.

attacks.name: Ending Snipe
attacks.description: Unleashes electricity from both hands and electrocutes opponents.

title: Clown of Hell
(地獄の道化師
Jigoku no Doukeshi?)
Trifling Clown
(翻弄する道化師
Honrō Suru Dōkeshi?)

PileVolcamon.name: PileVolcamon
PileVolcamon.description: PileVolcamon is an Android Digimon. It is one of the digivolutions of Volcamon, of which there are said to be seven types. It possesses tremendous power and destructive force, and is well-versed in all sorts of combat techniques, starting with those from pro wrestling. As it digivolved, its original massive body was polished even more, transforming it into a smart form suited for hand-to-hand combat.

attacks.name: Volcanic Driver
attacks.description: Uses the eruptive power of the volcanoes on its shoulders to slam the enemy into the ground head-first.

attacks.name: Diamond Fist
attacks.description: The strongest fist that can pierce even Chrome Digizoid.

Pillomon.name: Pillomon
debut: "The Amusement Park of Dreams, Digimon Land!" [75]
Pillomon.description: Pillomon is a Mammal Digimon. It is a Digimon with the appearance of both a pillow and a sheep combined, it is always floating about while sleeping. Although one will fall into a pleasant sleep by snuggling up with Pillomon, the resulting dreams they see then will be fed on by Pillomon. There are two different types of bubbles that float alongside it as it sleeps; if it is sleeping well, anyone who touches the Lullaby Bubble that floats beside it will instantly be lulled into a pleasant slumber. If it is not sleeping well however, the Akumu no Awa (悪夢の泡, Akumu no Awa lit. "Nightmare Bubble") that floats beside it attacks the spirit by inflicting hallucinations and continuous nightmares.

attacks.name: Lullaby Bubble
attacks.description: Anyone who touches the Lullaby Bubble that floats beside it will instantly be lulled into a pleasant slumber.

attacks.name: Akumu no Awa (悪夢の泡, Akumu no Awa lit. "Nightmare Bubble")
attacks.description: Attacks the spirit by inflicting hallucinations and continuous nightmares.

Pinamon.name: Pinamon
Pinamon.description: Pinamon is a Chick Digimon. It always runs about restlessly. Because it expresses its emotions in how it runs, it doesn't stand still unless it is bored or sleeping. Because its emotions do not appear on its face, its emotions must be read from how it runs, so making a connection with it is very difficult. Although Pinamon hates its tails being touched, just like Puwamon, more caution is needed when touching them than with Puwamon, due to its "Piripiri Spark".

attacks.name: Piripiri Spark (ピリピリスパーク, Piripiri Spark lit. "Tingling Spark")
attacks.description: Generates a miniature electric shock from its tails.

Pipismon.name: Pipismon
Pipismon.description: Pipismon is a Mutant Digimon. It armor digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Love". It is said that this Digimon, which has the appearance of a bat, was born from the monitoring data of a certain electrical equipment manufacturer's ultrasonic sensor. Its large ears are able to capture sounds of any frequency. Also, the inside of its mouth has the structure of a speaker, allowing it to copy the sound it captures with its ears as it is and release it. It specializes in operating at night, and is able to accurately detect the enemy's position by using ultrasound, even in the dark. So if you hear strange sounds out of the dark, Pipismon might be close by.

attacks.name: Crazy Sonic
attacks.description: A sound wave attack that destroys the senses.

Pistmon.name: Pistmon
Pistmon.description: Pistmon is a Vegetation Digimon. It digivolved via a training program used by road racers. Its bicycle-like wheels and body are fully integrated with each other, and it has a remarkable sense of balance that allows it to stand still even when it is not running. Its thorny vines, which act as tires, are capable of changing shape, allowing it to run across even rough roads speedily without going flat. It is a good friend of BlackGatomon Uver., who is often seen riding on its back while performing deliveries.

attacks.name: Bramble Shot
attacks.description: Shoots thorns from its handle.

attacks.name: Crimson Spores
attacks.description: Expels highly toxic spores from the protrusions on its back.

attacks.name: Killer Cadence (Killing Cadence)
attacks.description: Mows down enemies in one go with its huge wheels.

Piranimon.name: Piranimon
Piranimon.description: Piranimonis a Sea Animal Digimon. Piranimon is ferocious Digimon that acts in largeschools. The exoskeleton covering its head amplifies the power of its jaws so that it can reliably bring down the enemy with its sharp fangs. That power is said to be equivalent to the force of aMammothmontrampling with its feet. Since it attacks a single Digimon in schools, not a scrap of data is left behind after being assaulted by Piranimon.

attacks.name: Cruel Invitation (Cruel Invite)
attacks.description: Drags its target underwater by impaling them with its caudal fin, which is sharpened like a fish hook.

attacks.name: Calamity Vice (Calamity Vise)
attacks.description: Rapidly oscillates as it gnaws through its prey, puncturing their body, killing them.

Piximon.name: Piximon
Piximon.description: Piximon is a Pixie Digimon. It is fluent in magic, and can recite the advanced programming language of another dimension, allowing it to generate miracles with the appearance of magic. This miraculous Digimon is able to pop up in every place, time, and space, and although its body is small, it can seal away the enemy's abilities with its own special ability, and then pulverize the opponent with a mighty blow. With its mischief-loving personality, it enjoys making computers run wild with its cherished spear, "Fairy Tale", that it always holds in its hands (although it has no ill intent). Despite its appearance, it uses terrifying attacks.

attacks.name: Pit Bomb (Bit Bomb)
attacks.description: Attacks with a super-powerful bomb packed with computer viruses.

attacks.name: Magical Tail (Fairy Tail)
attacks.description: Attacks with a spear.

PlatinumNumemon.name: PlatinumNumemon
PlatinumNumemon.description: PlatinumNumemon is a Mutant Digimon. It is an exceedingly rare Numemon that Digivolved by being among the first in the Digital World to discover the "Platina Mine", and absorbing the deposits found within. Since then, its personality has undergone a complete change, leading it to gather any and all jewelry it can find and using them to decorate itself, as if it had suddenly struck it rich. It is an extremely "gorgeous Digimon", regardless of its appearance. Its defense is fairly high thanks to its golden wings and the jewelry strengthening its body, but its offense is sub-par.

attacks.name: Platinum Junk (Platinum Excrement)
attacks.description: Throws multiple piles of junk.

attacks.name: Junk (Excrement)
attacks.description: Throws a pile of platinum-colored junk.

attacks.name: Platinum Burp
attacks.description: Emits a foul smell while burping.

attacks.name: Huge Yucky Tongue (Sugoku Iya de Dekkai Shita)
attacks.description: Licks the enemy in a disgusting way.

PlatinumSukamon.name: PlatinumSukamon
PlatinumSukamon.description: PlatinumSukamon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a poop-shaped Digimon that shines like platinum. It is a species of Sukamon that absorbed the data of minor metals, giving it a luxurious appearance, but its abilities are at the same level as Sukamon's.

attacks.name: Metal Bomber (Rare Metal Unchi, lit. "Rare Metal Poop")
Slippery Sludge (ウンチスライダー, Unchi Slider, lit. "Poop Slider")
Scar Nail
attacks.description: Slashes with dirty filthy claws.

attacks.name: Panic Wave (Trance Mesmer)
attacks.description: Gives itself the ability to confuse enemies with its attacks.

Plesiomon.name: Plesiomon
Plesiomon.description: Plesiomon is a Dragon Digimon. It is a previously imaginary Digimon discovered within the computer of a British cryptozoology research institute. It was a Digimon that had already been rumored among researchers. Although it rarely makes an appearance, it seems to show up when visibility is reduced due to being shrouded in fog. It is a mysterious being whose appearance gives the impression of being polished to shine white.

attacks.name: Sorrow Blue
attacks.description: Sings with a high-pitched, crystal-clear voice, wrapping the listener in sorrow and making them lose their fighting spirit.

attacks.name: Shaking Pulse
attacks.description: Attacks with a high frequency sound wave unleashed at maximum intensity.

attacks.name: Fin Attack
attacks.description: Slaps the enemy with its fins.

attacks.name: Plesiomon Tail
attacks.description: Spins and attacks the enemy with its tail.

attacks.name: Preciomon Attack
attacks.description: Leaps into the air and bodyslams the enemy.

title: Mysterious Mythical Dragon
(不思議な神話の竜
Fushigina Shinwa no Ryū?)

Plesiomon X.name: Plesiomon X
Plesiomon X.description: Plesiomon X is a Plesiosaur Digimon and carrier of the X Antibody. According to the latest research analyzed from its high-pitched, crystal-clear cry, it has become clear that most of Plesiomon's configuration data is surprisingly "poetry" data. It has taken on a beautiful figure that feels so noble and elegant that some researchers have said that it is related to the legend of a tragic bard who was unable to see themselves as a dragon and sang about their deepening sorrow, and it very rarely makes an appearance. Furthermore, it is said that Plesiomon has another form within this fantasy, but this is unclear.

attacks.name: Sorrow Blue
attacks.description: Sings with a high-pitched, crystal-clear voice, wrapping the listener in sorrow and making them lose their fighting spirit.

attacks.name: Fantasy Mist
attacks.description: Wraps the listener in a fantasy with the melodies it plays using its long barbels.

attacks.name: Shaking Pulse
attacks.description: Attacks with a high frequency sound wave unleashed at maximum intensity.

Plutomon.name: Plutomon
Plutomon.description: Plutomon is a Deity Digimon. It attacks evil with terror and violence, and governs the realm of the dead. It wanders the world pursuing criminals or villains who deserve to fall into the realm of the dead, and it is said that if it detects prey, Plutomon appears wrapped up in a deep darkness. Plutomon, who finds joy only in chewing the wicked, has mouths lined with sharp fangs throughout its body, and the mouths make a chattering sound when it's pursuing its prey. It is feared even by good Digimon for this oddity. It is similar to Jupitermon, who belongs to the Olympos XII, as far as punishing evil, but Jupitermon will not admit it due to Plutomon's cruelty, and it's said that there's always been a longstanding discord between the two. Plutomon's techniques have the ferocity to cast any villain down to the realm of the dead.

attacks.name: Haggard Cluster
attacks.description: Unleashes the fangs on its chest to release a darkness, absorbing all substances and vaporizing everything.

attacks.name: Hell's Gate
attacks.description: Causes a gigantic mouth to appear from the darkness and swallows villains whole, disassembling those who have been swallowed into scraps of fragmented data.

attacks.name: Chaos Lights (Chaos Rights)
attacks.description: Plutomon invokes this once it gets too engrossed in battle. It is the peak of its frenzy, and when it chews an enemy with the mouths all over its body, it devours data with each bite, making it seem like a terrifying predator.

attacks.name: Hell's Gate
attacks.description: Causes a gigantic mouth to appear from the darkness and swallows villains whole, disassembling those who have been swallowed into scraps of fragmented data.

Pol.name: Pol
Pol.description: Pol is a fiery, insubstantial Digimon similar in form toHinukamuy, having been derived from Jesmon's observations of it. The character on its forehead reads "P".

Pomumon.name: Pomumon
Pomumon.description: Pomumonis a Plant Digimon. Although it looks like a Bird-type, it is a Plant Digimon whose body is packed with juice of a high sugar content like that of a fruit. For that reason, it has many natural predators such as Bird-type and Insect-type Digimon. Despite having wings, it is mainly active on land because its flight speed is so slow that it becomes defenseless. When it senses danger, it protects itself with "Rapid Seed".

attacks.name: Rapid Seed
attacks.description: Spits out countless seed-like bullets from its mouth.

attacks.name: Fruits Rush
attacks.description: Curls up and speeds off. It is often used as a means of escape rather than an attack.

Ponchomon.name: Ponchomon
Ponchomon.description: Ponchomon is a Ghost Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Sincerity". Although it is classified as a Ghost-type, it is an unusual Digimon that appears to be a Plant-type, as far as you can tell from its appearance, and it is rumored that when a Togemon has died due to unforeseen circumstances, it will become a Ponchomon. It is said to be a Digimon that was generated from a "Latin music distribution program" that exists on the Network. It looks as though it has a cheerful personality, but its facial expression can't be read, and it is eerie to other Digimon. Because all of its actions are performed with a Latin rhythm, it views Digimon that can't keep up with the beat as its enemies. It seems to get along with Bakemon, who moves to its own music.

attacks.name: Tequila Knuckle
attacks.description: Driving punches that only hit the opponent's face with its leather-strapped fists, intoxicating them with its destructive power.

attacks.name: Blood Dance: Maracas Version
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent while getting into a rhythm with the maracas on its Mexican hat.

Popomon.name: Popomon
Popomon.description: Popomon is a Slime Digimon. It looks like a species of plant. It skillfully uses its tail, which looks like a leaf, and it moves by jumping little by little. Because it has a very timid personality, it will immediately flee if any strangers approach, but it is said that once it gives its trust to someone, it will be attached to them for life.

attacks.name: Hair Mist
attacks.description: Scatters the hairs of its coat while escaping the opponent to create a distraction.

Porcupamon.name: Porcupamon
Porcupamon.description: Porcupamon is a Puppet Digimon. Categorized as one of the Red Data Digimon species, it is a rare Digimon that fears its extinction. Although it was not originally a species that inhabited the Dark Area, it was driven off by various species of Digimon, and now it lives in the Dark Area. Its body is covered in a special razor material, and although its wickedly-dressed suit is an extreme adaptation, it is thought to be camouflage in order to stay alive in the violent Dark Area.

attacks.name: Madness Broach
attacks.description: Stabs the opponent with its sharpened body hair.

attacks.name: Slap and Rip
attacks.description: Slashes at the opponent with its edged claws.

Poromon.name: Poromon
Poromon.description: Poromon is a Mini Bird Digimon. It digivolved from Pururumon, and can now fly at low altitudes. It has small feathers growing closely packed on its body, and unusually for an In-Training Digimon, it has wings. Its most charming feature is the feather ornament attached to its head, so it maintains it intently. It has a fundamentally tidy personality, but because it cannot turn its neck(?) even if it wants to groom itself, it relies on its comrades.

attacks.name: Baby Breeze (Pororo Breeze)
attacks.description: Flaps its wings to raise a cloud of sand, then seizes the opportunity to flee when the opponent flinches.

Potamon.name: Potamon
Potamon.description: Potamonis a Food Digimon. It is agourmetDigimon that took in the data of all kinds of fries. As it walks about eating fries, it wants many Digimon to know how delicious they are, and goes around sharing fries that it recommends. It views those who criticize its fries as complainers. It lets those who have apologized to it enjoy the splendor of its fries. It is in a competitive relationship withBurgermonover who is better when it comes to fast food.

attacks.name: Shubashuba Potato
attacks.description: Bashes its "Shubashuba Potato", which sends razor-sharp fries at those who criticize its fries.

attacks.name: Bashed Potato
attacks.description: Bashes its big, flat, hot fries down from the sky to crush those who criticize its fries.

Poyomon.name: Poyomon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Miwa Matsumoto(Adventure/Adventure:),Kaoru Shiomi(Adventure, Village of Beginnings),Tailmon-betsu,Yukiko Hanioka(Frontier),Umeka Shoji(Xros Wars)
Poyomon.description: Poyomon is a Slime Digimon. With a translucent body, it is a Digimon Baby that drifts through the "Net Ocean" like a jellyfish. As it has the most primitive structure among the Digimon discovered to date, it has been showered in attention as the "Missing Link", the key to solving the mystery of the origin of Digimon, by the scholars and enthusiasts studying the roots of Digimon.

attacks.name: Super Bubble Blow (強力な酸の泡, Kyouryoku San no Awa, lit. "Powerful Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits powerfully acidic bubbles from its mouth to defend itself from intruders.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

Prairiemon.name: Prairiemon
Prairiemon.description: Prairiemon is an Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Kindness". It spends its time burrowing in dry land, and is able to dig underground at a speed of 100 km/h using the large claws on both of its arms. Its nature of behaving in colonies has been confirmed, and although it rarely ever appears on the surface due to its timid personality, it has a habit of sunbathing in groups on fine days with calm weather, so Prairiemon researchers will probably need to read a weather map.

attacks.name: Sonic Ears (Sonic Ear)
attacks.description: Slashes with the blades on both ears.

PrinceMamemon.name: PrinceMamemon
PrinceMamemon.description: PrinceMamemon is a Mutant Digimon. Having taken in data on the Net concerning a royal family, it is a prince of the Mamemon world. Partnering with KingEtemon, it plays the part of a mock royal family of the Digital World, and that's why it looks so gorgeous. Although its personality isn't awful, it was incited by KingEtemon and is convinced that it truly is a member of the royal family, and the embarrassing thing is that it considers even the "Royal Knights" to be its subordinates. Despite its appearance, the part that it boasts is its tremendous destructive power, since it is a Mega, after all. It is a monarch of purple roses. It is said that because of PrinceMamemon, Otamamon X looked forward to a promising future with its round body and was gifted the gorgeous crown by Prince Mamemon, "Prince no Osagari (プリンスのオサガリ, Prince no Osagari lit. "Prince's Hand-me-down")". Furthermore, it also taught Otamamon its Signature Move "Smiley Headbutt".

attacks.name: Smiley Warhead
attacks.description: Unleashes an intense headbutt without breaking its smile.

attacks.name: Purple Rain
attacks.description: Rains down purple roses. In Digimon World Dawn and Dusk, it attacks with heavy poisonous rain.

PrinceMamemon X.name: PrinceMamemon X
PrinceMamemon X.description: PrinceMamemon X is a Mutant Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Additional royal records were partially highlighted and recovered. Although there is rumor that its Secret Boots are responsible for its long legs, it is said that its very gorgeous and elegant "Delmo Walking" causes even enemy Digimon to make way for it.

attacks.name: Smile Warhead (Smiley Warhead)
attacks.description: Headbutts the enemy without breaking its smile.

Proximamon.name: Proximamon
Proximamon.description: Name used in theVital Bracelet BE. No official romanization available.

Psychemon.name: Psychemon
Psychemon.description: Psychemon is a Reptile Digimon. It is a Digimon characterized by its perturbing, flashy colors. It is said to be a variant of Gabumon. Although it has a personality that is as bright and showy as the colors on its body, it apparently turns cowardly when its fur pelt is removed, just like Gabumon.

attacks.name: Colored Sparkle (Colorful Spark)
attacks.description: Concentrates colorful electrical energy in primary colors, and causes it to explode in range of the enemy.

attacks.name: Glittering Horn (ハデハデボーン, Hade Hade Horn)
attacks.description: Accumulates colorful electrical energy in its horn and releases it.

attacks.name: Colorful Dance (原色の舞, Genshoku no Mai, lit. "Dance of Primary Colours")
attacks.description: Utilizes the primary colors on its body to perform a peculiar dance, bewildering the enemy. It is not something to be taken lightly.

attacks.name: Horn Attack (ツノ攻撃, Tsuno Kougeki, lit. "Horn Attack")
attacks.description: Attacks using its horns.

attacks.name: Psyche Shot
attacks.description: Emits a small blast from its mouth.

attacks.name: Psyche Horn
attacks.description: Attacks using a horn with the power of flames.

Pteramon.name: Pteramon
Pteramon.description: Pteramonis a Dinosaur Digimon.  It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Love". Holding the alias of "Blue Bomber", it can fly at the highest altitudes among aerial Digimon, and it is able topinpoint bombthe enemy without revealing itself. It has excellent eyesight, and is capable of capturing the enemy's figure even from an altitude of 10 km up in the sky.

attacks.name: Missile Storm (Side Winder)
attacks.description: Launches multiple missiles from its wings.

attacks.name: Beak Pierce
attacks.description: Drops from the sky vertically and pierces with its beak. The enemy's DigiCore is destroyed regardless of the thickness of its armor.

attacks.name: Kaikosen (怪光線, Kaikousen, lit. "Mysterious Light Ray")
attacks.description: Shoots a beam from its mouth.

attacks.name: Raining Bomb (Hell's Bomb)
attacks.description: Drops multiple bombs over a wide area.

title: Storm Calling Love (嵐を呼ぶ愛情
Arashi o Yobu Aijō

Pteramon X.name: Pteramon X
Pteramon X.description: Pteramon X is a Dinosaur Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Due to fact that there were no Digimon capable of reaching altitudes maintained by Pteramon up until now, Pteramon were forced to battle with each other, leading it to possessing air-to-air combat abilities and agility. This also meant an improvement in its ability to fly at low altitudes. Also, when it goes at maximum speed, it reduces drag by storing both of its feet within its body.

attacks.name: Beak Pierce
attacks.description: Nosedives from high in the sky and pierces the enemy with the sharp tip of its beak, it penetrates even armor, regardless of its thickness, and destroys their Digicore with unparalleled accuracy.

attacks.name: Nail Comb
attacks.description: Tears the enemy to pieces with its sharp feet without letting them escape while going at maximum speed at a very low altitude.

Publimon.name: Publimon
Publimon.description: Publimon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a Digimon wearing a seashell hood. It enjoys observing other Digimon, then compiling that information into data that it transmits throughout the Digital World. Publimon's stories vary wildly between trivial topics and more serious articles, even when the latter kind of reporting sometimes puts it in danger. For example, it has gotten in trouble with Angel Digimon for publishing stories about the Celestial Digimon. Though Publimon's reporting has a great number of supporters, it has many detractors, too. However, anyone that hurts Publimon's readers becomes prey to one of its special investigations.

attacks.name: Dual Presser
attacks.description: Smashes its opponent between two giant computer windows with great force.

attacks.name: Playful Crash (Juke-crack)
attacks.description: Turns one of its information windows into a paper airplane-like projectile and sends it flying to pierce through its target.

Pukumon.name: Pukumon
Pukumon.description: Pukumon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a British Punk Digimon that was born when Britain's strongest hacker caused a mutation in a computer virus in which they had poured all the knowledge they possessed. Although its size is small, it has a rebellious personality that contends for first place even in the Digital World. It can't help picking fights, no matter whether the opponents are stronger or weaker than itself, and settling disputes with fist fights is considered its normal style. Its Metal Head is made from Chrondigizoit.

attacks.name: Needle Squall
attacks.description: Launches its super-hard spines all at once from its Metal Head.

attacks.name: Britain Punch
attacks.description: Uses its fists to punch an opponent.

Pulsemon.name: Pulsemon
Pulsemon.description: Pulsemon is a Beast Humanoid Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved under the influence of heartbeat waveform data stored in hospitals and gyms. It has a lively personality in that it treats anyone without discrimination. Pulsemon's characteristic fringe is linked to its emotions, and droops when it feels down. It is a cunning fighter who battles by capitalizing on its natural agility, and moving around in the shape of a lightning bolt. In addition, many Digimon that are influenced by the vital data of others like Pulsemon, improving their physical abilities and digivolving, have been discovered.

attacks.name: Electric Rush (Elec Rush)
attacks.description: Rams into the enemy with all its might at lightning speed.

attacks.name: Minor Impulse (Petit Impulse)
attacks.description: Discharges electricity generated within its body from its fringe.

Pumpkinmon.name: Pumpkinmon
Pumpkinmon.description: Pumpkinmon is a Puppet Digimon. It is a plush toy Digimon with a surreal pumpkin head that has an axe stuck in it. According to legend, Pumpkinmon came to be when mutations developed in a computer virus created during the season of the Western holiday of "Halloween". Because it was never a malignant virus, it rarely inflicts any harm on purpose, but its external appearance belies its possession of powerful offensive ability. As is characteristic of Puppet Digimon, its blank face rarely expresses emotions, so what it's thinking is indecipherable and its personality is wrapped in mystery.

attacks.name: Pumpkinmon Power (Trick or Treat)
attacks.description: Manifests a gigantic pumpkin in the air and then squashes the opponent with it.

attacks.name: Surprise
attacks.description: Surprises the enemy with a strange pumpkin.

attacks.name: Jack O' Lantern
attacks.description: Breathes out a high temperature flame.

attacks.name: Tackle (おどかす, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Blow")
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with a tackle.

Pumpkinmon (Mega).name: Pumpkinmon (Mega)
Pumpkinmon (Mega).description: Pumpkinmon (Mega) is a giantPumpkinmonwith various halloween themed items including multiple candy, pumpkins (one wearingWizardmon's hat), and aMonzaemonplush toy.

Punimon.name: Punimon
Punimon.description: Punimon is a Slime Digimon. It is a new kind of newborn Digimon. Its gelatinous red body is squishy, and there are three feeler-like things growing on its head. It is unable to battle, but it can produce resilient, acidic bubbles to intimidate its opponents.

attacks.name: Bubble Blow (酸の泡, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces resilient, acidic bubbles to intimidate the opponent.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

Puppetmon.name: Puppetmon
Puppetmon.description: Puppetmon is a Puppet Digimon. It was built from the body of a cursed Cherrymon, and it is thought that it was probably constructed from Cherrymon's data by a single fiendish hacker. It has an appearance like a marionette, but it can move under its own volition. Its personality is detestable, as it tells fibs, and when a computer presents false information, it is the work of Puppetmon.

attacks.name: Puppet Pummel (Bullet Hammer)
attacks.description: Packs gunpowder into its revolver-style hammer, then strikes with its strongest technique. This attack will cause the opponent to vanish without a trace, not just from the hammer's blow but also from the explosion of the gunpowder.

attacks.name: Puppet Pummel (Flying Cross Cutter)
attacks.description: Throws the wooden cross on its back like a sharp boomerang.

attacks.name: Lie (うそ, Uso)
attacks.description: Tells multiple lies to make its nose grow and hit the opponent with it.

attacks.name: Drill Nose
attacks.description: Spins its metallic nose like a drill.

attacks.name: Big Cross
attacks.description: Attacks using an X-shaped tree like a boomerang.

Pupumon.name: Pupumon
Pupumon.description: Pupumon is a Slime Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It has grown a body as light as a bubble, as well as very thin wings and somewhat largish eyes which are very sensitive to movement. If something moves, Pupumon will notice it and immediately spring away, but this doesn't mean it's a coward, as, if the object continues to be unkind and approaches, Pupumon will counterattack.

attacks.name: Doku no Awa (毒のアワ, Doku no Awa lit. "Poison Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits poisonous bubbles from its mouth at the opponent.

Puroromon.name: Puroromon
Puroromon.description: Puroromon is a Larva Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It flies freely by individually operating its three pairs of wings. It is not yet powerful, but be that as it may, it is difficult to catch because of its random flying about, which surprisingly gets the opponent completely annoyed.

attacks.name: Chikkuritto
attacks.description: Injects a tiny quantity of venom with the tiny stinger on its rump.

Pururumon.name: Pururumon
Pururumon.description: Pururumon is a Slime Digimon. With a chubby body similar to silicon, it jiggles flabbily when it crawls forward. Both of its small fins are unexpectedly handy, but to be absolutely precise, it is not yet able to fly. As it loves the smell of the sun, on days with good weather, it lies sprawled on the lawn and smells the scent of grass with a sniff, immersing it in a good mood.

attacks.name: San no Awa (酸の泡, San no Awa lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Foams out acidic bubbles and covers the opponent in them, then seizes the opportunity to flee.

Pusumon.name: Pusumon
Pusumon.description: Pusumon is a Slime Digimon. It is a Digimon whose entire body is covered in soft, cotton-like fur; only the yellow hairs sticking out of its forehead are fairly hard. It grows restless without its pacifier, and will cry loudly and incessantly if its pacifier is lost. It is able to expand its body by taking in a deep breath.

attacks.name: Pacifier (おしゃぶり, Oshaburi)
attacks.description: Takes in a deep breath and shoots the inhaled air out together with its pacifier in order to intimidate the opponent.

Pusurimon.name: Pusurimon
Pusurimon.description: Pusurimon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a quadrupedal Digimon with yellow spines growing from its back. It is always running around energetically, though it will sometimes appear to stop in its tracks when in reality, it has just fallen asleep on the spot.

attacks.name: Prickly Roll (チクチクローリング, Chikuchiku Rolling, lit. "Prickly Rolling")
attacks.description: Causes the fur covering its body to stand and harden, then curls itself into a ball and does a jump-tackle while spinning.

Puttimon.name: Puttimon
Puttimon.description: Puttimon is a Mini Angel Digimon. It is a sacred Digimon Baby who is the template for all Angel-type Digimon. On the other hand, it has poor self-judgment between good and evil, and can be quite adorably mischievous. If anything, it's popular for bringing about things like euphoria and good fortune. Though as a newborn, it's rare for it to do so, it can fly skillfully about the sky with the two wings growing from its back.

attacks.name: Angel Dust
attacks.description: Calls forth a mysterious powder while flying about that places the opponent in a happy mood.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

Puwamon.name: Puwamon
Puwamon.description: Puwamon is a Baby Bird Digimon. It is covered in soft down. Its eyesight is extremely great, and because it is able to survey a vast range, it can react instantly to surrounding movements. Its personality is intensely curious, and it began gaining popularity because it lacks shyness and easily makes attachments. However, it extremely dislikes when its tail is touched, and so if its tail is touched carelessly, caution is necessary because it will shower you in blinding down.

attacks.name: Fuwā Feather (フワーフェザー, Fuwā Feather lit. "Fluffy Feather")
attacks.description: Showers the opponent in blinding down.

Puyomon.name: Puyomon
Puyomon.description: Puyomon is a Slime Digimon. It is a soft and sticky Digimon that is found in the "Net Ocean." Its singular lens lacks emotional expression so you can't really tell what it's thinking, and it floats in the sky and sea and tries to stick to objects and other Digimon with its tentacles.

attacks.name: Crackling Gas (パチパチガス, Pachipachi Gas) When it sticks to things, it emits a tingling static electricity which is not actually an attack, but seems to be a form of communication unique to Puyomon. When multiple Puyomon stick to each other, their Pachi Pachi Gas becomes more powerful, making it difficult to approach the surrounding area.

Puyoyomon.name: Puyoyomon
Puyoyomon.description: Puyoyomon is a Lesser Digimon. Puyomon digivolved by taking in jellyfish data. It grew several tentacles by copying the biological features of jellyfish. As you can tell from its round eyes that are brimming with curiosity, it has grown its own preferences, and once it sticks to something that it likes, it will not let go. Even if it likes sticking to something, it will lose interest after a while and detach from it, and has a moody personality where it floats lightly in search of exciting things that suit its taste.

attacks.name: Static Zone (ゾーンパチパチ, Zone Pachipachi, lit. "Zone Crackling")
attacks.description: Once it sticks to something that it dislikes, it sends out a bursting streak of electricity and never lets anything get near it.

Pyonmon.name: Pyonmon
Pyonmon.description: Pyonmon is a Slime Digimon. It is a Fresh Digimon covered in tufty body hair that has a single large ear. It was shy the moment it was born, so if someone stares at it, it will instantly lower its head. However, it is also friendly, and can be seen rubbing its body against Digimon that it is interested in, actively engaging in skin-to-skin contact. It hates opponents that mess with it.  Similarly, it hates things which make loud noises that ring in its ear, so it lowers its ear and leaves.

attacks.name: Earwhip (イヤンタ, Earnta, lit. "Ear-slap")
attacks.description: Slaps the opponent with its large ear. It has the power to blow even Rookie Digimon away.

Pyontomon.name: Pyontomon
Pyontomon.description: Name used by Bandai onDigimon Partners.Romanization provided by@moffmof.

Quartzmon.name: Quartzmon
debut: "A Golden Bug! The Mystery of MetallifeKuwagamon" [76]

otherNames.name: デジクォーツモン DigiQuartzmon

Quartzmon.description: Quartzmon is an Unidentified Digimon. It is a colossal Digimon that continues to absorb data and amplify its power. The large wicked globe that corresponds to the majority of its body is a fusion reactor that generates Quartzmon's power source, the "Gyuputo particles", from the data it absorbed. Quartzmon's true body is at the top, and can act away from the large wicked globe, and it's also possible for it to change its form. It has a greed for the data of the entire world, and completely swallows and absorbs Digimon and humans.

attacks.name: Gyuputo Ryūshi Hou (ギュプト粒子砲, Gyuputo Ryūshi Hou lit. "Gyuputo Particle Cannon")
attacks.description: Radiates the Gyuputo particles generated from its large wicked globe to the entire surroundings, and if anyone touches them even slightly, its body will be wiped out without leaving any spread data.

attacks.name: Ruin Blast
attacks.description: Pours Gyuputo particles inside a seized enemy's body through its tentacles, and causes an internal explosion.

QueenChessmon.name: QueenChessmon
QueenChessmon.description: QueenChessmon is a Puppet Digimon. It is the strongest Digimon of the Chessmon series, and possesses extreme range and offensive ability. It is a reliable being that defends the cowardly KingChessmon. That superior offensive ability is a power that sometimes seems rather inhuman. Its catchphrase is, "God of Chess, bestow pardon!" It wields the "Queen Stick".

attacks.name: Heart Breaker
attacks.description: Impales the opponent's vitals with the swords stocked on its armor.

attacks.name: Queen Stamp
attacks.description: Cheers up Digimon who have lost their fighting spirit.

attacks.name: Princess's Whim (ヒメノワガママ, Hime no Wagamama)
attacks.description: Gives the opponent a hard time.

attacks.name: Grand Cricket
attacks.description: Smashes the opponent with the Queen Stick.

Quetzalmon.name: Quetzalmon
Quetzalmon.description: Quetzalmon is a Mythical Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Light". It is the embodiment of the sun and wind which has the appearance of a winged white serpent. Although it is a very sacred being, it is said that if you attack it carelessly and enrage it, it will cast a deadly curse on you. However, it won't personally challenge you to a battle due to its calm disposition.

attacks.name: Freezing Wave (Freeze Wave)
attacks.description: Unleashes a freezing cold wave.

attacks.name: Toltec Wind (Toltecan Wind)
attacks.description: Invokes the ancient wind of the gods.

attacks.name: Cold and Clammy (Dead or Alive)
attacks.description: Attempts to kill foe with energy.

Rabbitmon.name: Rabbitmon
Rabbitmon.description: Rabbitmon is a Mammal Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Friendship". It possesses not only long ears, but also claws on its forelegs that are sharp enough to crush even diamonds, and which it uses to dig through the strata no matter how solid. It is rumored that from time to time, it will run into ancient fossils as it travels underground, which it keeps as part of its collection. Its body and head are covered by armor created from the gathering of minerals, which allows it to absorb the impact from attacks when it curls its body into a ball. It has a very gentle personality, and would usually let an enemy pass while keeping calm; it is a defensive Digimon through and through. However, it rarely ever goes on the offensive..

attacks.name: Carrot Bomber (キャロット爆弾, Carrot Bakudan, lit. "Carrot Bomb")
Ear Flapping (Ear Lancer)
attacks.description: Uses its ears to pierce the enemy.

Rafflesimon.name: Rafflesimon
Rafflesimon.description: Rafflesimon is a Pixie Digimon. It is a Mega level Digimon said to be the largest flower in the Digital World. While its appearance is so beautiful that it enraptures all who lay eyes upon it, the stench it emits is out of this world. There are a number of people who fell for Rafflesimon's beauty at first sight and sought to find it again after a single glance. However, Rafflesimon's lifespan is short, and its life processes will cease after just several days have passed. Because of the extremely low likelihood of being able to catch sight of a Rafflesimon, it is also known as the "Miraculous Flower". Despite its circumstances, Rafflesimon never expresses any pessimism about its looming death, constantly yearning to live a normal life and dancing elegantly till its very last. It utilizes the large flower petals that dance around it as reflectors, reflecting its shots so that no enemy can escape.

attacks.name: Ballet Gun
attacks.description: Fires its sleeve like a cannon.

attacks.name: Wisselen (Ned: Change)
attacks.description: Sheds scales from its body. These scales cause anyone whose body they have latched onto to lose consciousness and turn into Rafflesimon's servants.

attacks.name: Fascination
attacks.description: Enthralls an opponent and steals its life-force with a pink gas.

title: Miraculous Flower
(奇跡の花
Kiseki no Hana?)

RagnaLoardmon.name: RagnaLoardmon
RagnaLoardmon.description: RagnaLoardmon is a Unique Digimon. It is a Digimon born from the DNA Digivolution between Durandamon, the strongest sword among the Legend-Arms, and BryweLudramon, who is said to be the strongest shield. It is said to have been born when an evil being lurking in the depths of the Dark Area awakened, and the Digicores of the two Legend-Arms resonated with each other. Its main body, formed from the fusion of the Digicores at a higher plane, was made in the image of "the knight that would wield them" as imagined by Durandamon and Bryweludramon.
