While RagnaLoardmon is a DNA Digivolution form, it is unusual in that it still retains Durandamon and Bryweludramon's consciousnesses, while the main body itself has its own, separate consciousness. The sword and shield hover and move out of their own wills without coming into direct contact with RagnaLoardmon; they make sport of the enemy with the way they enact their offensive and defensive maneuvers like three separate beings in one body. Their level of coordination is stunning, giving rise to its absolute defense and sudden and unpredictable, yet powerful attacks, which are nigh impossible to overcome.

attacks.name: Direct Smasher
attacks.description: Bisects the enemy in a single stroke by cleaving its sword down from a high altitude.

attacks.name: Ignition Prominence
attacks.description: Spews extremely high temperature flames from its shield, turning its surroundings into a sea of fire.

attacks.name: Duel Edge-Flowsion
attacks.description: Impales the enemy with its sword wreathed in its shield's flames, completely incinerates the enemy's data right down to their Digicore and erases them without a trace.

Raguelmon.name: Raguelmon
Raguelmon.description: Raguelmon is a Fallen Angel Digimon. Raguelmon observes all Angel Digimon with eyes of distrust, in order to prevent the fall of other Angel Digimon. The moment it detects an Angel Digimon that has begun to fall, it will attack and destroy them before they would have fallen completely. However, because it was shunned for its role as an observer, it began to be filled with nihilistic thoughts until its sole line of thought was to reject everything. At that stage, it no longer discerns between friend and foe, turning into a fearsome Digimon that carries out destruction indiscriminately.

attacks.name: Form Taranis
attacks.description: Mutilates the enemy using the claws on its arms and the tip of its tail. Once it impales the enemy, it injects destructive data that eats at and corrodes the enemy from the inside.

attacks.name: Pahorus
attacks.description: Fire laser bullets from the gemstones situated on its arms and chest.

Raidenmon.name: Raidenmon
Raidenmon.description: Raidenmon is a Machine Digimon. It is heavyweight-class Digimon equipped with electromagnetic weapons. It was created as a shooting-type, unlike Raijinmon, who similarly uses lightning as its energy. Although it is not as adept in close combat, it defends itself using its thick armor, and counterattacks with its left arm. It is devoted to destroying its targets, and will go as far as using suicide attacks for that sake.

attacks.name: Gilead Plant (Kirlian Plant)
attacks.description: Causes a corona discharge brought upon by a 45000-volt electric attack. In Digimon World 3 it recovers a large portion of its health and boosts its physical strength by 50% for one attack.

attacks.name: Rising Sun
attacks.description: Fires ultra-high temperature spheres from the gun barrels on both of its shoulders.

attacks.name: Big Charge Bomb (Discharge Bomb)
attacks.description: Counters attacks by launching a bomb from its tail.

Raidramon.name: Raidramon
Raidramon.description: Raidramon is an Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Friendship". The "Digi-Egg of Friendship" has the attribute of "Thunder", and those that don this Digi-Egg fight against their enemies with nimble movements like lightning piercing the ground, and defeat them with electric-based techniques.

attacks.name: Thunder Blast (Lightning Blade)
attacks.description: Fires an electric blade from the lightning-bearing blade on its head.

attacks.name: Blue Thunder
attacks.description: Fires a powerful electric shock from the three protuberances on its back.

attacks.name: Thunder Blast (Thunderbolt)
attacks.description: Fires a bolt of lightning from its mouth.

attacks.name: Electric Byte (Electric Bite)
attacks.description: Snaps at the opponent with electrically-charged jaws.

title: Storm of Friendship
(轟く友情
Todoroku Yūjou?
lit. "Thundering Friendship")

RaijiLudomon.name: RaijiLudomon
RaijiLudomon.description: RaijiLudomon is an Armor Digimon. The digivolved form of TiaLudomon, it has been further mechanised and attained the ability to fly. By sacrificing its agility, it gained durability that allows it to withstand even an attack from a Mega level head-on. The shields attached to its shoulders and arms automatically put up an electric barrier which cannot be seen, causing enemies to be confused as to why their attacks are not working. Not only that, it is also able to increase the area covered by its barrier in exchange for being unable to move, allowing it to protect entire regions to a certain extent.

attacks.name: Lightning Buster
attacks.description: Generates electricity at high output from its head and uses it to strike the enemy.

attacks.name: Rocket Messer (Deu: "Rocket Launcher")
attacks.description: fires its Rocket Messer from both arms.

Raijinmon.name: Raijinmon
Raijinmon.description: Raijinmon is a Cyborg Digimon. It is bestowed with the name of the Raijin of Oriental folklore. It is a fighting-type that is strong in close combat. Cleaving clouds and wearing lightning, it is the ultimate commander of thunderclaps.

attacks.name: Electro Ball (Elekugel, Deu: Elec-ball)
attacks.description: Charges with the connector on its tail, and fires intense lightning from its shoulders into its surroundings.

attacks.name: Justice Burst (Blitz Arm)
attacks.description: Dishes out a barrage of punches with the same lightning-type arm as Justimon.

attacks.name: Back Storm
attacks.description: Strikes with lightning in the midst of rain.

title: Thunderclap Commander
(迅雷将
Thunderclap General?)

RampageGreymon.name: RampageGreymon
debut: Digimon Xros Wars (manga), "Xros Darkness!! The Dark Castle of the Conspiracy!!" [09]
RampageGreymon.description: RampageGreymon is the DigiFuse of MetalGreymon (2010 anime), Ballistamon, and Dorulumon.

attacks.name: Mega Tempest
attacks.description: Unleashes its ordinance in a swirling tempest of projectiles.

Ranamon.name: Ranamon
Ranamon.description: Ranamon is a Fairy Digimon. It possesses power over Water which bears the might of AncientMermaidmon. It has a sharp intuition and an unstable mood probably because it was formed in an area that was mostly active in a section of the ocean within a weather forecasting system. Its emotions are erratic; when it feels good, it shows off how graceful and lady-like it is, but when it gets upset, it cries hysterically like a baby. In battle, it rarely attacks directly, and mainly does so indirectly by manipulating rain. However, since its combat abilities are intense when it is emotionally overwrought, its attacks are especially uncontrollable while it is crying.

attacks.name: Draining Rain (Rain Stream)
attacks.description: Sends a rain cloud which unleashes a stream of water to sap its foes' strength.

attacks.name: Dark Vapor (Jealousy Rain)
attacks.description: Creates an acidic cloud.

attacks.name: Whipping Waves
attacks.description: Manipulates water to attack its foes.

Rapidmon.name: Rapidmon
Rapidmon.description: Rapidmonis an Android Digimon. It digivolved fromGargomon. It holds the alias of "Keen Hound", and it reliably brings down the opponent with movements near thespeed of light. Also, it freely uses its gigantic ears asradar, can act even in the dark, and is also able to detect the existence of distant enemies. The silhouette of its body makes you think of a shavedpoodle. During battle, its neck protector shuts.

attacks.name: Rapid Fire
attacks.description: Rapid-fires homing missiles from both of its arms and the revolver equipped to its back.

attacks.name: Tri-Beam (Golden Triangle)
attacks.description: Fires a beam from its whole body that completely disassembles the opponent's data.

attacks.name: Homing Blast (Homing Missile)
attacks.description: Fires homing missiles from the launcher on its back.

title: Keen Hound
Agile Hound

Rapidmon (Armor).name: Rapidmon (Armor)

otherNames.name: ラピッドモン(アーマー) Rapidmon (Armor)

Rapidmon (Armor).description: Rapidmon (Armor) is a Warrior Digimon. It armor-digivolved from Terriermon with the "Digi-Egg of Destiny". Rapidmon is normally an Ultimate which digivolved from Gargomon, but it is able to shine gold and sublimate power up to the Mega Level through the "Digi-Egg of Destiny".

attacks.name: Rapid Fire
attacks.description: Rapid-fires homing missiles from both of its arms and the revolver equipped to its back.

attacks.name: Miracle Missile (Golden Triangle)
attacks.description: Fires a beam from its whole body that completely disassembles the opponent's data, similar to "Magna Blaster".

Rapidmon X.name: Rapidmon X
Rapidmon X.description: Rapidmon Xis a Holy Knight Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. The power contained within theDigi-Egg of Destinyhas been drawn out even further by the X-Antibody, so it is now capable of constantly exhibiting power at the Mega level. The armaments on both of its arms and back form the "Armed Arms"; when it comes to long distances, it rapid-fires its "Rapid Blaster", which has a low attenuation rate, and when it comes to short and medium distances, it rapid-fires its "Laser Gatling Arm", where it switches from the Armed Arms on its back. In addition, a booster function has also been added, allowing it to dive into the enemy's chest at high speed, and perform slash attacks with its claws.

attacks.name: Rapid Fire
attacks.description: Rapid-fires homing missiles from both of its arms and the revolver equipped to its back.

attacks.name: Golden Triangle
attacks.description: Fires a beam from its whole body that completely disassembles the opponent's data, similar to "Magna Blaster".

attacks.name: Billion Bullet
attacks.description: Ejects all of the Armed Arms, cornering the enemy by operating them remotely, and shoots them up with a billion bullets.

RaptorSparrowmon.name: RaptorSparrowmon
RaptorSparrowmon.description: RaptorSparrowmon is a Cyborg Digimon. It is a digivolution of Sparrowmon whose whole body became armored in Chrome Digizoid metal. It has eliminated its disadvantageous weakness to strikes by means of the Chrome Digizoid armor, and with its flexible wings it has gained the ability to make sharp, high-speed turns. Although its fortes are hit-and-run, battlefield disruption, and the like, its moody personality hasn't changed, and it frequently makes blunders.

attacks.name: Raptor Grapple
attacks.description: Grabs the foe and lifts them high in the air, then dives down and flings them to the ground.

attacks.name: Crash Charge
attacks.description: Rams into foes with its new Chrome Digizoid armor.

Raremon.name: Raremon
Raremon.description: Raremon is a Ghost Digimon. It tried to extend its life by mechanizing its body, but it destabilized its body, and its configuration data has begun to break down to the point that all its muscles have rotted away. However, because it was given life by those machines, it will not die, and survives with this grotesque appearance. Because its body has broken down, its offensive power and mental capacity are nonexistent, and it acts on instinct. It gives off a foul stench from its entire body, so that Digimon up to the Rookie-level will simply run away, and will not be its opponent until they grow to Champion.

attacks.name: Breath of Decay (ヘドロ, Hedoro, lit. "Sludge")
attacks.description: Spits gas or acid from its mouth that corrodes anything it touches.

attacks.name: Stinking Gas (くさいガス, Kusai Gas)
attacks.description: Spits green gas from its mouth.

attacks.name: Rotten Tackle
attacks.description: Tackles the opponent.

attacks.name: Scar Nail
attacks.description: Slashes with dirty filthy claws.

RareRaremon.name: RareRaremon
RareRaremon.description: RareRaremon is an Undead Digimon. It is the Ultimate of Raremon who has survived the advanced decay of its body through further mechanization and has taken on a bizarre appearance. Its body repeatedly breaks down and takes form, and eyes and mouths have emerged which are rotting away. The foul stench it gives off from its entire body has increased so much that even Megas have difficulty approaching it. Because it consumes energy to maintain its body, it makes up for that energy by dissolving the enemy with its "Digestion" (Digest).

attacks.name: Digestion (Digest)
attacks.description: Dissolves the enemy after it swallows them whole via the mouth on its head.

attacks.name: Decayson
attacks.description: Toxic gas spewed out of its many mouths. Enemies that inhale it die instantly.

Rasielmon.name: Rasielmon
Rasielmon.description: Rasielmon is an Ophan Digimon. Rasielmon was once appointed to the same rank as Ophanimon. It possesses the mysterious power to foresee everything in the world from the "Kernel" (God's domain). It is said that it knows all about events throughout the Digital World, and has gained a divine amount of knowledge with that power.

attacks.name: Knowledge Stream
attacks.description: Freely combines the five elements from the magic circles on both of its arms and releases enormous energy.

attacks.name: Sefer Raziel
attacks.description: Brings about any kind of miracle to exterminate the adversary, even Rasielmon itself doesn't know what will happen.

Rasenmon.name: Rasenmon
debut: Digimon ReArise, "The Unforeseeable Future - Part Two" [1.22]
Rasenmon.description: Rasenmon is a Beast Man Digimon. It is Rasenmon Fury Mode's true form, which it attained after accepting its negative emotions without fearing them and regaining the courage it needed to believe in itself. Having broken free of the negative emotions that shackled it down, it is now reborn into this new form and is able to completely control the power that drove it berserk in the past; its violent temperament has also faded, and it now sports a kind and gentle personality. In battle, it is capable of amassing even more power by absorbing the energy derived from its allies' emotions; however, it is only able to use this ability to carry out actions it believes are right.

attacks.name: Gyro Smash
attacks.description: Dishes out a powerful punch whilst spinning the blades on its arm.

attacks.name: Quellrise Blast (Qualialise Blast)
attacks.description: Spins its blades at extremely high speed, creating tornadoes that strike the opponent.

attacks.name: Spiral Vanish
attacks.description: Shoots out and fuses all of the spiral-shaped spines covering its body to form a gigantic drill which it uses to impale the opponent. Spiral Vanish is its trump card where it unleashes all of the emotion energy it has stored together with its drill to deliver a crushingly powerful blow.

attacks.name: Spinning Quellrise Blast (Spinas Qualialise Blast, Lat: Spines Qualialise Blast)
attacks.description: A stronger version of Quellrise Blast with one arm using the power of Rasenmon Fury Mode.

Rasenmon Fury Mode.name: Rasenmon Fury Mode
debut: Digimon ReArise, "The Boundary Shaken by Fury" [1.21]
Rasenmon Fury Mode.description: Rasenmon Fury Mode is a Bewitching Beast Digimon. It is a ruthless, nine-tailed Mega level Digimon that became unable to control its dark power due to the large volume of negative emotion data that got mixed in while it was digivolving from Ultimate level. The moment its digivolution is complete, its body comes under the full control of its rampaging power of darkness; what results is an entity of destruction that devastates all in its surroundings solely on impulse. It suffers from inner conflict stemming from its fear of and attempts to reject the swirling negative emotions inside of itself, which gave rise to its destructive impulses and subsequently its vicious personality.

attacks.name: Desperate Vortex
attacks.description: Extends its large, spiral-shaped tails and skewers the opponent over and over again.

attacks.name: Predator's Bite
attacks.description: Pounces on the opponent, devouring their Digicore directly.

attacks.name: Spiral Hell
attacks.description: Rotates the blades on its wrists at high speed, creating tornadoes that indiscriminately tear apart everything in their surroundings.

Ravemon.name: Ravemon
voiceActors: (En:)Steven Jay Blum(Data Squad),Paul St. Peter(Digimon World Data Squad)
Ravemon.description: Ravemonis an Android Digimon. It possesses a wing made ofChrome Digizoid. At theGenesisof theDigital World, it served under a certain God Man Digimon and was titled the "Silver Crow", but it is said that it was touched by that god's anger and one of its wings was dyed black. The true terror of Ravemon is in its covert actions. It conceals its figure with its black wing, and slashes the opponent with its white wing. Suddenly appearing out of nowhere, it brings down the opponent in a single blow. Its sword "Chouou-maru"(烏王丸,"Chouou-maru"lit. "Raven King")is unleashed with nimble movements.Its left hand is equipped with the "Raven Claw".

attacks.name: Spiral Raven Claw
attacks.description: Raises the sharp nails on its left arm and then performs a rotating charge at the opponent.

attacks.name: Blast Wing
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with its left wing.

attacks.name: Celestial Blade (天之尾羽張, Ame-no-Ohabari, lit. "Tail-feathers of Heaven")
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent with the Chouou-maru, which releases a blade of dark lightning of tremendous destructive power.

attacks.name: Raven Claw
attacks.description: Tears apart the enemy with the Raven Claw on its left hand.

attacks.name: Shadow Pierce
attacks.description: Attacks with multiple sharp claws from the black wing on its right arm.

attacks.name: Moushugeki (猛襲撃, Moushūgeki, lit. "Fierce Charge")
attacks.description: Attacks from the sky with both claws.

attacks.name: Dark Tornado (闇竜巻, Yami Tatsumaki, lit. "Dark Tornado")
attacks.description: Uses its black wings to create a dark tornado.

title: Silver Crow
(白銀のカラス
Shirogane no Karasu?)

Ravemon Burst Mode.name: Ravemon Burst Mode
Ravemon Burst Mode.description: Ravemon Burst Mode is an Android Digimon. It is a unique form of Ravemon that has temporarily reached the limits of its abilities through Burst Digivolution, and wears all the energy within the atmosphere as an aura.

attacks.name: Crimson Formation (無双天翔翼之陣, Musou-Tenshou-Yoku-no-Jin, lit. "Formation of Peerless Soaring Wings")
attacks.description: Enlarges its wings to a gigantic size and releases a dark purple aura.

attacks.name: Mourning Dance (怒涛闇供喪之舞, Dotou-Yami-Kumo-no-Mai, lit. "Dance of Raging Waves of Dark Mourning")
attacks.description: Furiously performs a terrible and wild dance of violence.

attacks.name: Lightning Thrust (雷光一閃之突, Raikou-Issen-no-Tsuki, lit. "Thrust of a Lightning Flash")
attacks.description: Stabs the opponent in a flash of thunder with its dark purple aura.

title: Dark Purple Crow
(黒紫の鴉
Kokushi no Karasu?)

Reapermon.name: Reapermon
Reapermon.description: Reapermon is a Cyborg Digimon. It is a fugitive Digimon born from the data of wanted criminals. To tell the truth, there is actually a price on its head, but it isn't distrusted as it is believed to be a "Bounty Hunter", as it is a strange villain on a hunt for criminals. It wields the "Guilty Chain" on its left arm, and the "Judgment Sickle" on its right.

attacks.name: Grim Slasher (髑髏乱舞, Dokuro Ranbu, lit. "Skull Dance")
attacks.description: Grabs the opponent with the Guilty Chain and decapitates them with the Judgment Sickle.

attacks.name: Burning Cyclone (髑髏旋風, Dokuro Senpū, lit. "Skull Whirlwind")
attacks.description: Spins in the center of a fiery tornado amid which flaming skulls fly.

attacks.name: Bone Duster (蛇炎煉獄, Jaen Rengoku, lit. "Serpent Flame Purgatory")
attacks.description: Causes flames to erupt at the opponent's feet.

title: Bounty Hunter

Rebellimon.name: Rebellimon
Rebellimon.description: Rebellimonis a Cyborg Digimon. It is a Digimon equipped with a high-powered engine. It is said that a Digimon driven to the brink of death digivolved into it by taking in the junk data around it. It is an outlaw who loots parts from other Machine Digimon in order to further strengthen and remodel its body, which is made out of junk. Occasionally, it has been witnessed roaring noisily around with large gangs ofMachmon.

attacks.name: Vanquish Missile
attacks.description: Fires a large quantity of missiles from its left arm.

attacks.name: Maximum Demolisher
attacks.description: Pulverizes the enemy's body as it minces them with the heavy machinery on its right arm.

title: The Vagrant War Demon
(さすらいの戦鬼
Sasurai no Senki?)

RedVeedramon.name: RedVeedramon
RedVeedramon.description: RedVeedramon is a Mythical Dragon Digimon. A variant of Veedramon, with a deep red body. Veedramon will Digivolve at the peak of anger, they say.

attacks.name: V-Nova Blast (V-Breath Arrow)
attacks.description: Spews a high-temperature heat ray out of its mouth.

RedVegiemon.name: RedVegiemon
RedVegiemon.description: RedVegiemon is a Vegetation Digimon. A strengthened version of Vegiemon whose entire body has ripened and turned red. It has high intelligence and offensive ability, unlike Vegiemon, who is still unripe. This red, ripened form is Vegiemon's true form, and it is possible that the harsher environments found on the Folder Continent caused Vegiemon to take on this original form. Its personality has turned even more devious and cunning. Anyone who carelessly tries to take it on, mistaking it for an ordinary Vegiemon, will no doubt meet a terrible fate. Its red color serves as a warning of the poison it holds.

attacks.name: Chili Pepper Pummel (Red Hot Machine Gun)
Stink Jet (Hazard Breath)
attacks.description: Exhales a powerful poisonous breath.

attacks.name: Poison Ivy (毒のツタ, Doku no Tsuta)
Sunshine Beam
attacks.description: Attacks with a beam of solar energy.

Regalecusmon.name: Regalecusmon
Regalecusmon.description: Regalecusmonis an Aquatic Digimon. It is an aloof Digimon that hates crowds. As a pirate who repeatedly assaults and loots the feeding grounds and territories of other Digimon, it is also the ruler of the abyss that stands at the apex of the food chain due to its overwhelming power. Its sword, made after tearing off aZudomon's horn, and the giant pincer on its left arm, are symbols of awe which strike fear into those who see them.

attacks.name: Briona Strike
attacks.description: Pierces the enemy using the sword in its right hand, along with a flash of lightning.

attacks.name: Reactor Discharge
attacks.description: Blows away everything around it, including seawater, with plasma discharged from its pincer.

Regulumon.name: Regulumon
debut: Digimon Adventure V-Tamer 01, "The Courage of Bonds" [50]

attacks.name: Jūouha (獣王波, Jūouha lit. "Beast-King Wave")
attacks.description: Releases a blast of energy from its hand.

attacks.name: Regulus Cutter
attacks.description: Sends a cutting shockwave from its sword.

Regulusmon.name: Regulusmon
Regulusmon.description: Regulusmon is an Evil Dragon Digimon. It plots to rule through rage and fears. As an Ultimate-level Digimon, Regulusmon boats power reminiscent of Megidramon of the famed Four Great Dragons, and its advent alone spells disaster. It is the source of the "GRB contagion", and it is said that Digimon infected by the GRB factor undergo a twisted change in personality and run amok. However, Black Digitron, the secretion said to cause the blackening, has not been confirmed to cause infections in Digimon who have it in their systems.

attacks.name: Kalypso Bite (Kalyp Bite)
attacks.description: Seizes the opponents by the jaws of its left arm's shield.

attacks.name: Iphigenia Pierce (Genius)
attacks.description: Fires three penetrating lasers from its left arm's shield.

attacks.name: Dead End Spike
attacks.description: Stabs foes with its two-pronged tail.

attacks.name: Gran TrES
attacks.description: Spits out a ball of dark hellfire that swallows all things. Not only physical matter, but even light itself is consumed, leaving not a trace behind. It is Regulusmon's most threatening move.

Relemon.name: Relemon

otherNames.name: 狐裘獸/狐裘兽 Hú qiú shòu

Relemon.description: Relemon is a Slime Digimon. It is a mysterious Digimon that is said to only be born on moonlit nights. It is said that Relemon born specifically on the night of the full moon receive its magical power, and as they grow, are able to use greater and more wondrous abilities than other Digimon. Because it is nocturnal, it seldom appears before people and has a shy personality. It is not able to attack, but it can transform into anything to defend itself, if it is close to the size of its body. However, it can still be found because it can never conceal its tail.

attacks.name: Henshin (変身, Henshin lit. "Transformation")
attacks.description: Transforms into anything of a similar size, though it can't conceal its tail.

Renamon.name: Renamon

otherNames.name: 妖狐獸/妖狐兽 Yāohú shòu

Renamon.description: Renamonis an Animal Digimon. It has the appearance of a golden fox. Renamon is a Digimon whose relationship with humans is expressed bluntly, so depending on how it was raised during its time as an In-Training, it is said that it can digivolve to a Renamon of particularly high intelligence. As it is always calm, cool, and collected, it is practiced enough that it doesn't lose that composure in any situation. Its slender, tall appearance excels when compared with other Rookies, and rather than Power Battling, it makes sport of the enemy with various arts that use its speed.

attacks.name: Diamond Storm (狐葉楔, Koyousetsu, lit. "Fox Leaf Arrowheads")
attacks.description:
Throws sharpened leaves at the opponent.
Kūchū Koyousetsu (空中狐葉楔, Kūchū Koyousetsu lit. "Aerial Fox Leaf Arrowheads")

attacks.name: Kūchū Koyousetsu (空中狐葉楔, Kūchū Koyousetsu lit. "Aerial Fox Leaf Arrowheads")
Kohenkyo (狐変虚, Kohenkyo lit. "Fox Switch Deception")
attacks.description: Uses a transformation art in which it copies the opponent's appearance and re-covers itself in that texture. In Digimon Rumble Arena, it changes places with the opponent.

attacks.name: Power Paw (藤八拳, Touhakken, lit. "Tohachi Game")
attacks.description: Shrouds its paws in ghostly flames, then delivers a powerful kick. In Digimon World Data Squad, it attacks with an even stronger version of "Palm Strike". In Digimon Masters, it copies its body to attack the enemy.

attacks.name: Palm Strike (掌打, Shouda)
attacks.description: Attacks with a strong hand strike.

attacks.name: Swift Strike (爪斬, Souzan, lit. "Claw Slash")
attacks.description: Attacks with a swift hand chop.

attacks.name: Spin Kick (狐回蹴, Kokaishū, lit. "Fox Spin Kick")
attacks.description: Attacks with multiple roundhouse kicks.

attacks.name: Super Chop (狐閃撃, Kosengeki, lit. "Fox Flash Attack")
attacks.description: Attacks with an even swifter version of "Swift Strike".

attacks.name: Korenkyaku (狐連脚, Korenkyaku lit. "Fox Combo Leg")
attacks.description: Unleashes a series of high kicks in rapid succession.

Rene.name: Rene
Rene.description: Rene is a fiery, insubstantial Digimon similar in form toHinukamuy, having been derived from Jesmon's observations of it. The character on its forehead reads "R".

Reppamon.name: Reppamon
Reppamon.description: Reppamon is a Holy Beast Digimon. Its tail has become a blade with a will, making it possible for it to cope even with attacks that surprise it from behind. However, it isn't suited for mutual communication, and it has been seen quarreling with its tail in the middle of battle. It prefers to fight within forests, and it skillfully employs its claws and tail to easily climb trees, so close attention is necessary when fighting Reppamon in the forest. It is a Digimon that you can't drop your guard around.

attacks.name: Rolling Tackle (駆駆裂空斬, Kurukuru Rekkūzan, lit. "Spinning Sky-fissure Slash")
attacks.description: Strikes during a forward somersault.

attacks.name: Lion Claw (獣牙乱撃, Jūga Rangeki, lit. "Beast Fang Frenzy")
attacks.description: Wildly rips apart the opponent with its sharp claws.

attacks.name: Razor Wind (真空カマイタチ, Shinkū Kamaitachi, lit. "Vacuum Kamaitachi")
attacks.description: Shakes its tail, releasing a blade of wind that can't be seen by the eye.

Reptiledramon.name: Reptiledramon
Reptiledramon.description: Reptiledramon is an Android Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It transformed itself from a wild Digimon that possessed a predatory instinct into a basis for modifications in order to reliably bring down its targets. Because the ferocious nature it possesses is too strong for its organic body to bear, it remodeled them with their corresponding weight in pure Chrome Digizoid metal, restraining their capacity for movement. However, whether it has high power output and flying ability or not is due largely to the organic body of the wild Digimon, before it was modified. Although it's small, if it gradually releases those abilities, it has the capability to easily bring down even a massive Digimon in a single blow.

attacks.name: Crash Charge
attacks.description: Attacks with an assault that capitalizes on the sharpness of its Chrome Digizoid metal armor.

attacks.name: Ambush Crunch
attacks.description: Leaps upon the opponent and instantly bites and rends their vitals with its sharp teeth.

attacks.name: Dino Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with the power of a dragon.

Reverse Weddinmon.name: Reverse Weddinmon
debut: Digimon Xros Wars (manga), "Xros Sweets!! The Girls' Sweet Trap!!?" [06]

attacks.name: Crazy Cracker
attacks.description: Fires wedding crackers from its right hand.

attacks.name: Fork Dance
attacks.description: Stabs with the forks on its left hand.

attacks.name: Candle Service Infer—
attacks.description: An all-direction fire attack.

Rhihimon.name: Rhihimon
Rhihimon.description: Rhihimon is a Warrior Digimon. It possesses power over Darkness that has transcended legend by inheriting all the might of AncientSphinxmon and acquiring unknown abilities. There are none who have seen this hero, and due to the fact that it doesn't leave behind so much as evidence of the opponents it has confronted, it is called the "Guardian Emperor of Darkness".

attacks.name: Darkness Bluster (Schwarz Lehrsatz, Deu: "Black Theorem")
attacks.description: Disables all of the laws of physics in the surrounding region and brings down the opponent.

attacks.name: Rot Kreuz (Deu: "Red Cross")
attacks.description: Fires an attack from the eyes of the lion on its head.

title: Guardian Emperor of Darkness
(闇の守護帝
Yami no Shugotei?)

RhinoKabuterimon.name: RhinoKabuterimon
RhinoKabuterimon.description: RhinoKabuterimon is an Insectoid Digimon. It possesses power over Thunder that has transcended legend by inheriting all the might of AncientBeetlemon and acquiring unknown abilities. It has such a gigantic body and a heavy shell that it could be mistaken for a Dinosaur. It has the ability to generate a special magnetic field with an ultrahigh voltage electric current, and is able to freely manipulate it using its gigantic horn. Although rushing techniques are its specialty, it doesn't actually come into contact with the opponent, but instead tosses them away with that special magnetic field.

attacks.name: Condenser Storm
attacks.description: Dynamically wields its horn and liberates all of the electricity accumulated within its body all at once, swallowing up the opponent in a lightning storm.

attacks.name: Thunder Laser
attacks.description: Fires all the electricity accumulated in its horn like a laser.

Rhinomon.name: Rhinomon
Rhinomon.description: Rhinomonis a Mammal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Miracles". It is clad in armor made ofChrome Digizoid, and this armor cannot be destroyed even by laser-based attacks let alone physical attacks due to its surface becoming reflective while at the same time becoming bulky armor. Also, although it looks as if it is sluggish, it moves its body by using its excess power, so it is able to travel quickly to the point of being abnormal, contrary to its build.

attacks.name: Ain Soph Aur
attacks.description: Cloaks itself in a barrier made of light emitted from the "Ain Soph Aur" jewels embedded in its armor.

attacks.name: Atomic Burst
attacks.description: Cloaks itself in a barrier made of light emitted from the "Ain Soph Aur" jewels embedded in its armor and then charges into the enemy. Digimon on the receiving end of this technique are disintegrated into digital data composed of "0"s and "1"s, the smallest units of data, and never return to their original state.

Rhinomon X.name: Rhinomon X
Rhinomon X.description: Rhinomon X is a Mammal Digimon and carrier of the X Antibody. Its armor has been polished even further, not only raising its defense but also, more importantly, completely changing its attack pattern to become more aggressive. Most prominently, its horn has been transformed into a sword, which it uses for various attacks. Its personality has also changed to become more hostile, and it will boldly challenge any Digimon it deems powerful to a duel.

attacks.name: Ain Soph Aur
attacks.description: Cloaks itself in a barrier made of light emitted from the "Ain Soph Aur" jewels embedded in its armor.

attacks.name: Atomic Burst
attacks.description: Cloaks itself in a barrier made of light emitted from the "Ain Soph Aur" jewels embedded in its armor and then charges into the enemy. Digimon on the receiving end of this technique are disintegrated into digital data composed of "0"s and "1"s, the smallest units of data, and never return to their original state.

attacks.name: Atomic Blade
attacks.description: Impales enemies it charges towards and disintegrate their data.

attacks.name: Split Burst
attacks.description: Splits enemies into two with a large swing of its head.

Rhythm.name: Rhythm
Rhythm.description: Rhythm has four green fairy wings/insect under her hat.

Rinkmon.name: Rinkmon
Rinkmon.description: Rinkmon is an Android Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Friendship". It is an Android Digimon created from the sample data of an experiment that accelerated elementary particles to the speed of light with an accelerator. It is said that it was born from the fusion of that sample data, a Digimon raised for experimental use, and the Digi-Egg. As a very keen Digimon, it is able to accelerate to 98 percent of the speed of light, so there are no Digimon who can rival Rinkmon with their speed. However, because its power is weak in contrast to its outstanding speed, its fighting and hand-to-hand combat have a weak side to them.
title: Jetting Friendship
(ジェットな友情
Jettona Yūjō?)

RizeGreymon.name: RizeGreymon
RizeGreymon.description: RizeGreymon is a Cyborg Digimon. It has mechanized more than half of its body, and despite its large build, it flies to the sky to attack the enemy. The offensive power fired from the gigantic revolver on its left arm is said to rival that of a single nuclear warhead, and due to its tremendous power and recoil, it is normally impossible to rapid-fire. In addition, the gun barrel is made from Chrome Digizoid in order to withstand that power.

attacks.name: Trident Revolver
attacks.description: High-speed rapid-fires its revolver at the limit of the Chrome Digizoid's endurance (three bursts).

attacks.name: Rising Destroyer
attacks.description: Fires a beam barrage from its chest-cannon and the three beam cannons extending from its wings.

attacks.name: Solid Strike
attacks.description: Charges at the opponent and knocks them out with the extraordinary impact strength of its gigantic revolver.

attacks.name: Crack Bullet
attacks.description: Fires a barrier-piercing bullet.

attacks.name: Barrel Smash
attacks.description: Attacks with the chrome digizoid's gun barrel.

attacks.name: Barrel Blow
attacks.description: A stronger version of Barrel Smash.

attacks.name: Heavy Barrel
attacks.description: Uses the barrel to strike the enemy with all of its might.

RizeGreymon X.name: RizeGreymon X
RizeGreymon X.description: RizeGreymon X is a Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The Crest of the Sun shines and overflows with so much energy that it spurts out from all over its body. The claws on its hands and feet have become beam blades that utilize that energy, and it can quickly use them in close combat. Also, its Trident Revolver has transformed into a Gunsword.

attacks.name: Trident Revolver
attacks.description: High-speed rapid-fires its revolver at the limit of the Chrome Digizoid's endurance (three bursts).

attacks.name: Rising Destroyer
attacks.description: Fires a beam barrage from its chest-cannon and the three beam cannons extending from its wings.

attacks.name: Solid Strike
attacks.description: Charges at the opponent and knocks them out with the extraordinary impact strength of its gigantic revolver.

attacks.name: Sunrise Buster
attacks.description: Charges energy to its maximum, and then fires it from the Trident Revolver.

attacks.name: Slash Thrust (ザンスラスト, Zan Thrust)
attacks.description: A slash technique. It has extraordinary sharpness

Roachmon.name: Roachmon
Roachmon.description: Roachmon is an Insectoid Digimon. Its black-lustered body is the very cockroach that everyone hates. It moves around stealthily and nimbly, and runs away even faster. Although you can hardly expect it to have offensive or defensive ability, because of its immeasurable stamina, it shows itself at its best when it comes to a protracted war.

attacks.name: Garbage Dump (Dream Dust)
attacks.description: Scatters trash.

attacks.name: Yard Sale Bomb (Dream Dust)
attacks.description: Various objects fall from the sky to crush enemies.

attacks.name: Roachmon Exterminate (Gokimon Brothers Chop, Gokimon Brothers Crash)
Electro Shocker (Mega Blaster)
attacks.description: Fires an electrical ball at enemies.

Rockmon.name: Rockmon
Rockmon.description: Rockmon is a Digimon. It is a Digimon whose body is mostly made up of rock data. It lacks emotion, and acts as ordered.

attacks.name: Guardian Bomb
attacks.description: Gathers energy in its hands to form a huge energy ball which it fires at its opponent.

attacks.name: Anti-Digi Beam
attacks.description: Fires a beam of energy from its right hand to its opponent.

attacks.name: Gigantic Press (Gargant Press)
attacks.description: Jumps into the air and performs a moonsault.

RookChessmon (Black).name: RookChessmon (Black)
RookChessmon (Black).description: RookChessmon (Black) is a Puppet Digimon. It has an appearance like a fortress which boasts impregnable defense. Although it's a gigantic Digimon, it is very fast, and it defends against the opponent's strikes, then attacks. Its catchphrase is, "The opponent is nothing after me!"

attacks.name: Stronghold
attacks.description: Charges the opponent as it stands at attention, mowing them down and destroying them.

attacks.name: Rook Gatling
attacks.description: Fires from the gunports on its arms.

attacks.name: Castle Wall
attacks.description: Uses a stubborn, immovable, steadfast defense.

RookChessmon (White).name: RookChessmon (White)
RookChessmon (White).description: RookChessmon (White) has not been officially released, so its design is unknown. Its name appears onDα-454.

Rosemon.name: Rosemon
voiceActors: (En:)Michelle Ruff(Digimon World Data Squad),Dorothy Elias-Fahn(Data Squad, Adventure tri.)
Rosemon.description: Rosemonis a Pixie Digimon. It has an appearance like the rose, which is said to be the queen of flowers. It has the appearance of a beautiful woman, and desires to remain beautiful forever. Its personality is more or less that way, and though it is excessively self-conscious about such things, its true strength does not in fact compare unfavorably with other Megas. It wears on its breast a "Tifaret",a jewel which is engraved with the symbol of love and beauty, that is said to promise it eternal beauty and power.It is whispered that a Rosemon was placed under a spell and turned intoBabamon.

attacks.name: Thorn Whipping (Thorn Whip)
attacks.description: Tames a Digimon, no matter how frenzied, with a thorned whip charged with electricity. Those who suffer this technique become Rosemon's slave, body and soul.

attacks.name: Rose Spear (Roses Rapier)
attacks.description: Brings the opponent down using the whip as a rapier.

attacks.name: Forbidden Temptation
attacks.description: Beautifully destroys the opponent's data in a shower of innumerable rose petals.

attacks.name: Ivy Hug
attacks.description: Entangles the opponent in vines.

attacks.name: Rose Velvet
attacks.description: Covers the ground in thorns.

attacks.name: Rosy Cradle
attacks.description: Summons a storm of sleep-inducing rose petals.

attacks.name: Fascination
attacks.description: Enthralls an opponent and steals its life-force.

attacks.name: Beauty Shock
attacks.description: Shocks its opponent with lightning from its left whip.

attacks.name: Thorn Shoot (Thorn Shot)
attacks.description: Shoots a thorn.

attacks.name: Danger Thorn
attacks.description: Shoots thorns at all enemies.

title: Queen of Flowers
(草花の女王
Kusabana no Joou?)

Rosemon Burst Mode.name: Rosemon Burst Mode
Rosemon Burst Mode.description: Rosemon Burst Mode is a Fairy Digimon. It is a unique form of Rosemon that has temporarily reached the limits of its abilities through Burst Digivolution, and wears an aura of love and beauty. It wears a "Tifaret", a jewel engraved with the symbol of love and beauty.

attacks.name: Charité (Fra: Charity)
attacks.description: Amplifies the aura of its mantle, gently wraps it around the opponent, and then annihilates them.

attacks.name: Kiss of Breath (Aguichantes Lèvres, Fra: Sexy Lips)
attacks.description: Releases lasers of a blown kiss from its lips.

attacks.name: Jewel of Heart (Tifaret)
attacks.description: Shoots Tifarets at the opponent.

Rosemon X.name: Rosemon X
Rosemon X.description: Rosemon X is a Fairy Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Rosemon's vivid beauty has been drawn out, and its appearance, dyed a crimson so deep that all of its red parts cause it to look completely washed out, even gives an overwhelming sense of inferiority to those who see it. Its "Aphroditear", the drops on its petals that are seen when incurring the wrath of Rosemon, are said to be the tears of Rosemon's love.

attacks.name: Thorn Whip
attacks.description: Tames a Digimon, no matter how frenzied, with a thorned whip charged with electricity. Those who suffer this technique become Rosemon's slave, body and soul.

attacks.name: Rosen Blood
attacks.description: Digimon that lay their eyes on Rosemons' tears of love are eventually annihilated when they personally embrace Rosemon's thorned whips despite knowing that they will get injured, subsequently causing damage.

attacks.name: Roses Rapier
attacks.description: Brings the opponent down using the whip as a rapier.

Runnermon.name: Runnermon
Runnermon.description: Runnermon is a Beast Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved via the data from a treadmill. It is capable of running without any loss in speed even through areas with poor footing such as mountainous areas or swamplands. However, rather than its speed or ability to cover distances, its stamina deserves special mention; it is able to continue running for long periods while maintaining its top speed the entire time.

attacks.name: Lightning Rush
attacks.description: Charges at the enemy at super speed from their blind spot.

attacks.name: Heartbeat Impulse
attacks.description: Shoots energy blades from its tail that slice enemies apart.

Rurimon.name: Rurimon
Rurimon.description: Name used by Bandai onDigimon Partners.No official romanization available.

RustTyranomon.name: RustTyranomon
RustTyranomon.description: RustTyranomon is a Cyborg Digimon. It is the Mega of Tyrannomon, which has been living through the fierce, long-lasting battles since the Digital World's birth by digivolving alongside it. It has endured many years in harsh environments as MetalTyrannomon, and its whole cyborg body is rusting. Its tactics specialize in annihilation warfare, mowing down its enemies along with their base as one. RustTyrannomon predates on Digimon, gorging on hundreds of thousands of Digimon within a short period without leaving any trace. As a Cyborg Digimon, it forces the opponent to yield in close combat with its top-class power and destructive force.

attacks.name: Terrors Cluster (Terror's Cluster)
attacks.description: Extends the gun battery on its back forward and fires the large electromagnetic cannon.

attacks.name: Rust Breath
attacks.description: Spews deep scarlet flames, the same color as its body, which have a rusting effect on that which is touched by its front.

attacks.name: Rust Claw
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with its razor-sharp claws.

title: Tyrant Dragon
(暴君竜
Bōkun Ryū?)

Ruthless Tuwarmon.name: Ruthless Tuwarmon
Ruthless Tuwarmon.description: Ruthless Tuwarmonis theDigiFuseofTuwarmonandAxemon.Ewan and The Land of Illusion

Ruthless Tuwarmon Beast Mode.name: Ruthless Tuwarmon Beast Mode
Ruthless Tuwarmon Beast Mode.description: Ruthless Tuwarmon Beast Mode is the DigiFuse of Tuwarmon, Axemon, the army of the Digital Underworld consisting of Sethmon, Dobermon, Grizzlymon, Bullmon, Oryxmon, and Gorillamon, and energy from the Digital Underworld itself. The Battle of The Young Generals

attacks.name: Tuwarmon Missile Storm
attacks.description: Fires the spikes on its shoulders as missiles.

attacks.name: Ultimate Firestorm (Burning Boogie)
attacks.description: Shoots the Digital Underworld's fire and lava from the Punpun Armor at the opponent.

attacks.name: Mad Mantis Dance (Hell's Mantis Dance)
attacks.description: An advanced version of Mantis Dance.

Ryudamon.name: Ryudamon
Ryudamon.description: Ryudamon is a Dragon Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. Because it has an old-style Interface on its brow, it is presumed to be an experimental "Prototype Digimon" from before Digimon were discovered. Although its body is clad in Japanese-style armor high in defensive ability, its movements are nimble, so it fights by resolutely leaping into the opponent's chest. It studies the business of combat so that it is strong enough to fight, and possesses Bushikatagi, with bravery and a soul that doesn't fear more powerful Digimon. The data that is said to have been hidden within the deepest parts of its DigiCore during an experiment is the ferocious combat data of the "Dragons" and "Generals" of Japanese mythology, and it is said it has the potential to grow into a mighty Digimon.

attacks.name: Kabutogaeshi (兜返し, Kabutogaeshi lit. "Helmet Reversal")
attacks.description: Withstands the opponent's attacks with its armor and helmet, then counterattacks.

attacks.name: Katana Attack (居合刃, Iaijin, lit. "Iai Blade")
attacks.description: Leaps into the opponent's chest and fires a blade of iron from its mouth.

attacks.name: TERA BURST
attacks.description: Blasts the opponent with multiple explosions.

Saberdramon.name: Saberdramon
Saberdramon.description: Saberdramon is a Giant Bird Digimon. It is shrouded in black flames. Due to the roughness of its temperament, for which it continues counterattacks against enemies to a ferocious degree, it's difficult to even approach it.

attacks.name: Black Saber
attacks.description: Strikes from the air with the talons on its feet.

attacks.name: Nitro Arrow (Night Roar) Unleashes feathers that burn a purple color and stab opponents.
Meteor Wing
attacks.description: Flaps its wings and hurls its feathers like meteors.

attacks.name: Anti-Confusion (Anti Confusion)
attacks.description: Cures Confusion.

SaberLeomon.name: SaberLeomon
SaberLeomon.description: SaberLeomon is an Ancient Animal Digimon. It is said to possess the ability for Mach speed. However, the details are shrouded in mystery, though according to one theory, it is a Leomon who was changed into the shape of a beast. With its speed, it can easily dodge attacks, no matter how fast they are. Its two over-developed fangs and sharp claws possess tremendous destructive power, and it is called the ultimate Digimon.

attacks.name: Howling Crusher (Nail Crusher)
attacks.description: Uses its gigantic claws to tear the opponent to pieces.

attacks.name: Infinity Arrow
attacks.description: Hardens the countless envenomed "hairs" in its mane and tackles the opponent, leaving them completely paralyzed.

Sagittarimon.name: Sagittarimon
Sagittarimon.description: Sagittarimon is a Mythical Animal Digimon. It armor digivolved through the power of the Digi-Egg of Hope. It is a superior species of the Centarumon family, and it is told that it is a mythical being. Although it is an Armor that pseudo-digivolved from an ancient Digimon due to the power of the Digi-Egg, it will sometimes digivolve as a mutation among Centarumon (not an Armor Digivolution). Because it consumes a large quantity of energy while in this form, it reverts after a short period.

attacks.name: Judgement Arrow
attacks.description: Fires an arrow made of the super-metal Chrome Digizoid.

title: Greatest Hope on Earth
(地上最大の希望
Chijou Saidai no Kibou?)

Sagomon.name: Sagomon
Sagomon.description: Sagomon is a Demon Man Digimon. It was banished from the Digital World's heaven, and fell to the backwoods of North Bridge Island. Although it usually has a cheerful, joke-cracking personality, if it touches the skulls wrapped around its waist it goes into a fury like a raging fire. That is because if even one of the nine skulls wrapped around its waist is lost it will be transformed into a terrifying Digimon. It possesses the "Kouyouhoujou" staff (降妖宝杖, "Kouyouhoujou" staff lit. "Monster Subduing Treasure Staff") which demonstrates terrifying destructive power in the super-heavyweight class. It is troubled by worrying, "What am I?", so it went on a journey to discover the answer.

attacks.name: Kouyouhoujou: Hydro Tornado (降妖宝杖・渦紋の陣, Kouyouhoujou: Kamon no Jin, lit. "Kouyouhoujou: Whirlpool Formation")
attacks.description: Raises a waterspout by freely spinning the Kouyouhoujou.

attacks.name: Kouyouhoujou: Hydro Descent (降妖宝杖・滝の陣, Kouyouhoujou: Taki no Jin, lit. "Kouyouhoujou: Waterfall Formation")
attacks.description: Strikes the ground with the Kouyouhoujou to shatter it and release a raging current.

attacks.name: Moon Fang (月牙斬, Getsugazan, lit. "Crescent Moon Slash")
attacks.description: Stabs at the opponent with the Kouyouhoujou's crescent moon-shaped blade.

Sakkakumon.name: Sakkakumon
Sakkakumon.description: Sakkakumon is a Mutant Digimon. It possesses power over Steel which bears the might of AncientWisemon. It possesses thinking like that of a machine, which lacks emotions. By instantly analyzing the enemy, it accurately points out their weak points. However, it is very fragile when the enemy makes an action that falls outside of its calculations. Its ten spheres each have the same attribute as the other Legendary Warriors, and are able to perform attacks with, and conversely, absorb attacks with those attributes. When the enemy's attack misses or its own attack hits, it gives out a low-pitched, creepy laugh from its eerie mouth.

attacks.name:
Rumble Blend #1-10: Rearranges body to absorb and/or fire back elemental attacks. It can only perform this move on attacks of a single element; attacks of multiple elements are unable to be absorbed.
Thunder Fist (Mjöllnir Thunder): Beetlemon's attack; fires a shot of electricity.
Hurricane Wave (Brezza Petalo, Ita: Breeze Petal): Kazemon's attack; fires long, thin tornadoes.
Blizzard Blaster (Snow Bomber): Kumamon's Blizzard Blaster; fires frozen snowballs.
Thunder Fist Reflection (ミョルニルサンダー返し, Mjöllnir Thunder Gaeshi, lit. "Mjöllnir Thunder Reversal"): Absorbs Beetlemon's "Thunder Fist" and returns a strengthened version.
Hurricane Wave Reflection (ブレッザ・ペタロ返し, Brezza Petalo Gaeshi, lit. "Brezza Petalo Reversal"): Absorbs Kazemon's "Hurricane Wave" and returns a strengthened version.
Atomic Inferno (Brahmastra): Aldamon's attack; releases thousands of rocketing fireball missiles.
Avalanche Axes (Avalanche Step): Korikakumon's attack; tosses the "Eji" and "Oji" tomahawks.
Pyro Tornado (Salamander Break): Agunimon's attack; releases a fiery tornado.
Bolo Thunder (Ultimate Thunder): MetalKabuterimon's attack; releases lightning energy that resembles a two-weight bola.
Spin Caliber San-bai Gaeshi (スピンカリバー3倍返, Spin Caliber San-bai Gaeshi lit. "Spin Caliber Threefold Reversal"): Absorbs Arresterdramon's "Spin Caliber" and returns a version strengthened threefold.
Hard Rock Damashī San-bai Gaeshi (ハードロックダマシー3倍返し, Hard Rock Damashī San-bai Gaeshi lit. "Hard Rock Damashī Threefold Reversal"): Absorbs OmniShoutmon's "Hard Rock Damashī" and returns a version strengthened threefold.
Mantis Dance San-bai Gaeshi (マンティスダンス3倍返, Mantis Dance San-bai Gaeshi lit. "Mantis Dance Threefold Reversal")
attacks.description: Absorbs Tuwarmon's "Mantis Dance" and returns a version strengthened threefold.

attacks.name: Thunder Fist (Mjöllnir Thunder)
attacks.description: Beetlemon's attack; fires a shot of electricity.

attacks.name: Hurricane Wave (Brezza Petalo, Ita: Breeze Petal)
attacks.description: Kazemon's attack; fires long, thin tornadoes.

attacks.name: Blizzard Blaster (Snow Bomber)
attacks.description: Kumamon's Blizzard Blaster; fires frozen snowballs.

attacks.name: Thunder Fist Reflection (ミョルニルサンダー返し, Mjöllnir Thunder Gaeshi, lit. "Mjöllnir Thunder Reversal")
attacks.description: Absorbs Beetlemon's "Thunder Fist" and returns a strengthened version.

attacks.name: Hurricane Wave Reflection (ブレッザ・ペタロ返し, Brezza Petalo Gaeshi, lit. "Brezza Petalo Reversal")
attacks.description: Absorbs Kazemon's "Hurricane Wave" and returns a strengthened version.

attacks.name: Atomic Inferno (Brahmastra)
attacks.description: Aldamon's attack; releases thousands of rocketing fireball missiles.

attacks.name: Avalanche Axes (Avalanche Step)
attacks.description: Korikakumon's attack; tosses the "Eji" and "Oji" tomahawks.

attacks.name: Pyro Tornado (Salamander Break)
attacks.description: Agunimon's attack; releases a fiery tornado.

attacks.name: Bolo Thunder (Ultimate Thunder)
attacks.description: MetalKabuterimon's attack; releases lightning energy that resembles a two-weight bola.

attacks.name: Spin Caliber San-bai Gaeshi (スピンカリバー3倍返, Spin Caliber San-bai Gaeshi lit. "Spin Caliber Threefold Reversal")
attacks.description: Absorbs Arresterdramon's "Spin Caliber" and returns a version strengthened threefold.

attacks.name: Hard Rock Damashī San-bai Gaeshi (ハードロックダマシー3倍返し, Hard Rock Damashī San-bai Gaeshi lit. "Hard Rock Damashī Threefold Reversal")
attacks.description: Absorbs OmniShoutmon's "Hard Rock Damashī" and returns a version strengthened threefold.

attacks.name: Mantis Dance San-bai Gaeshi (マンティスダンス3倍返, Mantis Dance San-bai Gaeshi lit. "Mantis Dance Threefold Reversal")
attacks.description: Absorbs Tuwarmon's "Mantis Dance" and returns a version strengthened threefold.

Sakumon.name: Sakumon
Sakumon.description: Sakumon is a Weapon Digimon. It is a tiny Digimon which has a single blade coming out of its head. Its whole body is golden, and the blade on its head shines very brightly. Its personality is mischievous and it is constantly moving as long as it's awake, but due to the weight of its head, it is badly balanced, so surrounding Digimon can sometimes be seen running about trying to escape because it is waving the blade as it rolls around.

SakutekiMonitamon.name: SakutekiMonitamon
SakutekiMonitamon.description: SakutekiMonitamon looks like the baseMonitamonexcept with the addition of aparabolic antennaon its head.

Sakuttomon.name: Sakuttomon
Sakuttomon.description: Sakuttomon is a Weapon Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved from Sakumon, and now has two blades. Its balance has been stabilized by the blades now being positioned on its left and right sides, as well as with the addition of its small feet. While it has stopped rolling around and become more active, getting stuck in a ceiling or wall will cause it to be unable to move.

Sakuyamon.name: Sakuyamon

otherNames.name: 沙古牙獸/沙古牙兽 Shā gǔ yá shòu

Sakuyamon.description: Sakuyamonis a Deity Digimon. It holds the role of amiko, acting as an agent ofGod's will. LikeTaomon, it freely usesOnmyoudoutechniques in battle, and has the ability to employ God Beast-species Digimon. It always carries four pipes on the belt around its waist, within which lurk fourkuda-gitsunethat possess the attributes of "Fire", "Water", "Wind", and "Thunder", respectively. It is able to use these kuda-gitsune for everything from attacking to gathering information. Just likeMagnaAngemon (Priest Mode), it is able to change intoSakuyamon Maid Mode, which administers Shinto rituals. It wields the "Kongou Shakujou"(金剛錫杖,"Kongou Shakujou"lit. "Vajra-Khakkhara").Its gloves bear theZero Unit, and the characters on the foreheads of the red, blue, green, and yellow kuda-gitsune read "Fire"(火,Hi), "Water"(水,Mizu), "Wind"(風,Kaze), and "Thunder"(雷,Kaminari), respectively.

attacks.name: Spirit Strike (飯綱, Spirit Strike lit. "Izuna")
attacks.description: Attacks the opponent with the four kuda-gitsune carried on its waist.

attacks.name: Amethyst Mandala (金剛界曼荼羅, Kongoukai Mandara, lit. "Diamond Realm Mandala")
attacks.description: Strikes the ground with the Kongou Shakujou, spreading a purifying barrier that exorcises evil spirits.

attacks.name: Twin Blades of Beauty and of Truth
attacks.description: Uses the Kongou Shakujou to create two pink rings of energy around itself which form a barrier of cherry blossom petals.

attacks.name: Crystal Sphere
attacks.description: Creates a spherical barrier around itself.

attacks.name: Amethyst Wind
attacks.description: Unleashes a storm of purifying cherry blossoms.

attacks.name: Fox Drive (浄炎狐舞, Jouenkobu, lit. "Purifying Flame Fox Dance")
attacks.description: Destroy the enemy with a burning blue flame.

attacks.name: Thunder Kick (雷襲脚, Raishuukyaku, lit. "Thunder Attack Kick")
attacks.description: Drops down like lightning from the sky and attacks with a kick.

attacks.name: Fox Card (孤封札, Kofūsatsu)
attacks.description: Throws a card and seals the enemy's power.

attacks.name: Flaming Fox (孤炎脚, Koenkyaku, lit. "Fox Flame Kick")
attacks.description: Attacks with a flaming kick from the sky.

attacks.name: Yougetsushū (妖月蹴, Yougetsushū lit. "Bewitching Moon Kick")
Kassengeki (滑閃撃, Kassengeki lit. "Sliding Flash Attack")

Sakuyamon Maid Mode.name: Sakuyamon Maid Mode
Sakuyamon Maid Mode.description: Sakuyamon Maid Mode is a Deity Digimon. It is a form Sakuyamon takes when it performs Shinto rituals and listens to God's will. It seldom fights in Maid Mode (巫女形態, Miko Keitai, lit. "Miko Mode"), but has strengthened its ability to exorcise evil spirits.

attacks.name: Izuna (飯綱, Izuna)
attacks.description: Attacks the opponent with the four kuda-gitsune carried on its waist.

attacks.name: Amethyst Mandala (金剛界曼荼羅, Kongoukai Mandara, lit. "Diamond Realm Mandala")
attacks.description: Strikes the ground with the Kongou Shakujou, spreading a purifying barrier that exorcises evil spirits.

Sakuyamon X.name: Sakuyamon X
Sakuyamon X.description: Sakuyamon X is a Deity Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Beginning with necromancy and Onmyoudou, it has grown into a specialist who has mastered every secret art that has been passed down throughout the eastern Digital World. By attuning itself closely to the Digital World's nature, it is able to transform various object data such as flora and rocks into shikigami in the shape of flowers or foxes, and order them to do its bidding. It is skilled in using its kuda-gitsune and shikigami for reconnaissance and espionage; acting as a watchman of the darkness, it strikes at its foes from the dark using the information it has obtained.

attacks.name: Amethyst Mandala (金剛界曼荼羅, Kongoukai Mandara, lit. "Diamond Realm Mandala")
attacks.description: Strikes the ground with the Kongou Shakujou, spreading a purifying barrier that exorcises evil spirits.

attacks.name: Izuna
attacks.description: Attacks the opponent with the four kuda-gitsune carried on its waist.

attacks.name: Konohanasenki-Banshou (此ノ花戦姫万象, Konohanasenki-Banshou lit. "All Forms of the Plum Blossom Warrioress")
attacks.description: Turns all of the objects around it into countless shikigami, enveloping the enemy in a storm of flowers and annihilating them.

attacks.name: Uka no Mitama (Uka-no-Mitama)
attacks.description: Fuses its four kuda-gitsune, which possess power over each of the four elements respectively, into a single gigantic fox spirit, and summoning it.

Salamandamon.name: Salamandamon
Salamandamon.description: Salamandermon is an Amphibian Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Courage". With its flame-clad, salamander-like appearance, it appears to be carefree, but once it's angered, it flares up the flames of its body even more and attacks.

Salamon.name: Salamon
Salamon.description: Salamon is a Mammal Digimon. It is a Holy-species Digimon child characterized by its lop ears. Because it is still very young, it is unable to manifest its holy powers, and isn't even aware of its own mission. For that reason, it is naturally insecure, so it can become either good or evil. However, the time will come someday when Salamon, who was born as a Holy-species Digimon, will awaken to its mission as one of the "Virus Busters". Also, Salamon is an experimental Digimon that was created by Digimon researchers, and because it was made to imitate the pets that live with humans, it has an appearance close to that of a real animal.

attacks.name: Puppy Howling Completely paralyzes the opponent with a super-high pitched bark.
Petit Punch
attacks.description: Strikes the enemy with its front feet.

attacks.name: Sledge Crash (Sledge Dash)
attacks.description: Rams into foe at full speed.

attacks.name: Holy Shoot
attacks.description: Causes an explosion with a small ball of light.

attacks.name: Happy Paw
attacks.description: Fires a beam of holy energy.

Salamon X.name: Salamon X
Salamon X.description: Salamon X is a Mammal Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its cuteness as a pet that gives feelings of happiness to those who see it has increased. Not only that, but its holy power has also increased, and after Salamon walked, it acquired its "Puppy Paw" technique.

attacks.name: Puppy Howl (Puppy Howling)
attacks.description: A super-high pitched bark, it completely paralyzes the opponent.

attacks.name: Puppy Paw
attacks.description: Forms a barrier against Virus-species, however, it is not aware of it itself.

Sandiramon.name: Sandiramon
Sandiramon.description: Sandiramon is a Holy Beast Digimon. It is the "Snake" Deva, and serves the Digimon Sovereign Zhuqiaomon. As a follower of Zhuqiaomon, it is the most cunning and cruel among the Deva. It doesn't like to decide matches in an instant, and prefers to instead choke the life out of the opponent while tormenting them bit by bit. It usually lives deep beneath the ground, and subterranean maneuvers are its specialty. During battle, it can produce a spear made of light, the "Bǎo Kuí" (宝鉾 lit. "Treasure Lance"), from its mouth, and skillfully wield it with its tail wrapped around it like a hand. Although the Bǎo Kuí vanishes once it slashes the opponent, as long as Sandiramon's energy lasts, it can spit out any number of them, and they will not degrade in sharpness.

attacks.name: Venom Axe (Krishńa)
attacks.description: Impales the opponent by thrashing its body and then powerfully vomiting up a Bǎo Kuí.

Sandmon.name: Sandmon
Sandmon.description: Sandmonis a Slime Digimon. Its body is made of sand. It has an aggressive personality despite being a Fresh, and is strongly territorial. It has an amorphous body which can disperse like sand or conversely harden like clay, but its pacifier alone is unable to change shape in any way. When opponents approach it throws a lot of sand to intimidate them.

attacks.name: Sand Toss (砂かけ, Sunakake)
attacks.description: Throws a lot of sand to intimidate approaching opponents.

SandYanmamon.name: SandYanmamon
SandYanmamon.description: SandYanmamon is an Insectoid Digimon. It is a species of Yanmamon that lives in the desert. Unlike Yanmamon, it has a carefree personality, but is merciless against Digimon that enter its territory. It hides in sandstorms.

attacks.name: Desert Storm (Desert Wind)
attacks.description: Generates a small sandstorm by flapping its wings intensely.

attacks.name: Stun Ray (Polymer Touch) Stuns the opponent.
Electro Shocker (Mega Blaster)
attacks.description: Fires an electrical ball at enemies.

Sangloupmon.name: Sangloupmon
Sangloupmon.description: Sangloupmon is a Demon Beast Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is a noble, bloodsucking wolf Digimon. It is a considerably old species of Digimon, and is said to have survived since the Genesis of the Digital World. Digimon who have had their blood sucked by Sangloupmon have all the information drawn out of their DigiCores, cease vital functions, and die. Sangloupmon is able to instantly move to different places as it rushes about the Net by breaking down its data into packets at its own volition. For this reason, it is said to be very difficult to capture Sangloupmon.

attacks.name: Sticker Blade
attacks.description: Flings thousands of tiny blades and instantaneously skewers the opponent from within.

attacks.name: Black Mind
attacks.description: Disassembles its own data and melts into the opponent's shadow.

attacks.name: Drain Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with a strike filled with darkness.

Sangomon.name: Sangomon
Sangomon.description: Sangomonis a Mollusk Digimon. It lives in the shallows of theNet Ocean. It often mingles with other species due to its gentle disposition and cheerfulness. It uses the backs ofShellmonas a resting spot, andCrabmonhave been witnessed trimming the coral protruding from its head.

attacks.name: Evasive Mist (Refuge Mist)
attacks.description: Spreads a poisonous, lachrymatory mist from its coral when attacked by intruders.

attacks.name: Coral Pressure
attacks.description: Releases high-pressure water from the ends of its arms.

SantaAgumon.name: SantaAgumon
SantaAgumon.description: Agumon is a short and stoutTyrannosaurus rex-like Digimon standing about 3 feet tall, and has amber orange skin and light green eyes. It also has flattened forearms with broad, three-clawed hands. Its legs and arms are shown to be very vascular. Its tail is stubby, and its head and snout are almost as large as the rest of its body. It also wears a Santa hat. Some media also depict it holding a sack.

Sanzomon.name: Sanzomon
Sanzomon.description: Sanzomon is a Monk Digimon. It is journeying around the Digital World in order to achieve enlightenment. It overcomes many difficult ordeals, and as training it imposes asceticism on its own body, day and night. Although Sanzomon doesn't carry any weapons at all, it unleashes various techniques by reciting sutras. The purified energy necessary to achieve enlightenment is accumulated in its DigiCore, and it's rumored that if you steal this then you will be released from every injury or terminal disease and acquire immortality, which draws in Digimon that are impelled by greed, and those chasing after it are numerous. However, enemies are not the only ones who are drawn to Sanzomon, as there are also troubled Digimon with their own various issues. It is said that among those, there are also Digimon searching for answers and truth that adore Sanzomon and journey along with it. It placed the "Kinkoji" (緊箍児, "Kinkoji" lit. "Tight-bound Child") on Gokuwmon's head when it was born.

attacks.name: Dù Zichūn Sutra (杜子春経, To Shishun-kyou, lit. "Tu Tze-chun Sutra")
attacks.description: Brings the hearts of wild Digimon back to their senses by making them listen to endless words of gratitude.

attacks.name: Butterfly's Dream Sutra (胡蝶夢経, Kochou Mu-kyou)
attacks.description: Manifests the ordeals that it has suffered and showers them on the opponent.

attacks.name: Endless Barraging Heart Sutra (無限弾幕心経, Mugen Danmaku Shin-kyou, lit. "Endlessly Barraging Heart Sutra")
attacks.description: Displays an illusion that its scattered rosary beads are endlessly attacking the opponent from all directions in order to crush their spirit.

SaviorHuckmon.name: SaviorHuckmon
SaviorHuckmon.description: SaviorHuckmon is a Dragon Man Digimon. It is a form of BaoHuckmon which repeatedly met and parted with Digimon over its long journey, lived through many scenes of carnage, and digivolved. It militarily intervenes in the strife that occurs incessantly throughout the Digital World, seeking ceasefires, and has brought aid to the Digimon on-site who have suffered harm. The result is not always a success, but the tears it sheds before those tragic scenes make SaviorHuckmon strong, and it earnestly reaches out to the next Digimon to cry for help. Its legs are capable of walking bipedally despite being blades, crimson blades are produced from both of its arms and its tail, and its whole body has taken on the aggressive style of a blade. The crystal in its chest is a crystal of proof that it refined its power with no lack of effort.

attacks.name: Ledge Stride (Ledge Strayed)
attacks.description: Skewers through the enemy from a flying kick posture with the blades on its feet.

attacks.name: Meteor Flame
attacks.description: Rapid-firing shots of fire from its mouth like a machine gun, burning the enemy to cinders.

attacks.name: Trident Saber
attacks.description: Uses the three crimson blades on its arms and tail, cutting down even enemies clad in Chrome Digizoid.

Scorpiomon.name: Scorpiomon
Scorpiomon.description: Scorpiomonis an Ancient Crustacean Digimon. A computer virus infected the databanks of a laboratory where the investigations and excavations of ancient life forms is preformed, and took in the data of an ancient life form and evolved. It became like the life form which in ancient times was the apex of the food chain, which had a great appetite and supplied it with an ability capable of allowing it to see food that was of the finest quality. Skillfully using the tentacles that grow from its head it catches the enemy and kills them with the sharp blade that grows from its tail. When the progression of a fight becomes disadvantageous, it uses its sharp tentacles to hoist up the soil of the seabed to hide its body. The radar eye that projects from its head captures the enemy like a night vision scope, watching for the chance to create a turnabout.

attacks.name: Tail Blade (Stinger Surprise)
attacks.description: Fires a beam of energy from its front claws.

attacks.name: Tail Blade
attacks.description: Swipes at the enemy with the multiple blades along its stinger.

attacks.name: Scorpion Storm (砂シャワー, Suna Shawā, lit. "Sand Shower")
attacks.description: Hurls bullets or streams of sand from ventricles on its underside to blind, knock out, or bury enemies.

Scorpiomon X.name: Scorpiomon X
Scorpiomon X.description: Scorpiomon X is an Ancient Crustacean Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Having survived in the intensely competitive Net Ocean since ancient times, Scorpiomon took in all the elements within the ocean into its carapace and acquired its camouflage ability "Ghost Surprise", which is considered to be a form of active camouflage. Despite losing that ability on land, it is difficult to see Scorpiomon while underwater, leading to it possessing the terrifying ability to attack while also being invisible to other Digimon.

attacks.name: Stinger Surprise
attacks.description: Crosses its right and left forelimbs and shoots.

ScudMissimon.name: ScudMissimon
ScudMissimon.description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars (manga). No official romanization available.

Seadramon.name: Seadramon
Seadramon.description: Seadramonis a Sea Animal Digimon. It has a long, serpentine body, which it uses to wreathe itself around enemies that are coming to attack, and constrict until the enemy suffocates. Naturally, it doesn't have intelligence or speech, and it swims around theNet Oceanleisurely according to its instincts.

attacks.name: Ice Blast (Ice Arrow)
attacks.description: Spews absolute zero breath from its mouth, instantly freezing water that it fires at the opponent.

attacks.name: Water Shock (Water Breath)
attacks.description: Shoots a blast of water from its mouth.

attacks.name: Constriction (しめつける, Shimetsukeru, lit. "Bind")
attacks.description: Wraps around the opponent and squeezes it.

attacks.name: Water Wave
attacks.description: Attacks with a big tsunami.

Seadramon X.name: Seadramon X
Seadramon X.description: Seadramon X is an Aquatic Digimon and a carrier of the X-Antibody. Its body has been specialized solely for swimming quicker underwater, and its sense of smell underwater has developed further. Although it does not approach anyone bigger than itself, it sniffs out injured Digimon far off in the distance and attacks them. Rather than its intelligence, its instincts, which it acquired through its struggle to survive, appear strongly.

attacks.name: Ice Arrow
attacks.description: Spews absolute zero breath from its mouth, instantly freezing water that it fires at the opponent.

attacks.name: Ice Spear
attacks.description: An enhanced version of "Ice Arrow" in which it continuously fires it, piercing the opponent.

attacks.name: Water Breath
attacks.description: Shoots a blast of water from its mouth.

Seahomon.name: Seahomon
Seahomon.description: Seahomon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Light". Since it inhabits places of high water pressure in the deepest trenches of the Net Ocean, it attains a small build, but when it rises up to an area of the ocean with shallow water, it seems that it becomes even larger than Seadramon-species Digimon. Although it is still a hypothesis, Seahomon is a survivor of ancient Digimon said to have perished in the past, and there is a rumor that it might have some sort of connection with Seadramon-species Digimon.

attacks.name: Prizm Rainbow (Prism Rainbow)
attacks.description: Unleashes a rainbow beam.

Sealsdramon.name: Sealsdramon
Sealsdramon.description: Sealsdramon is a Cyborg Digimon. It is said that only the one that passes the "Selection-D", a special selection test that screens through 100 Commandramon, can digivolve to Sealsdramon. It is able to move over short distances at speeds that are impossible to perceive with the eyes, and without equipping things like camouflage features or a rifle, it has the ability to bring down its "Target" with just its taijutsu. Its primary function is assassination.

attacks.name: Death Behind
attacks.description: Attacks with a single blow from a knife sharpened to its limit.

attacks.name: Scouter Monoeye
attacks.description: Measures the opponent's vital points in an instant.

Searchmon.name: Searchmon
Searchmon.description: Searchmon is an Insectoid Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Knowledge". It has "inquisitive" habits due to the effects of the "Digi-Egg of Knowledge", and it performs information gathering and reconnaissance with the radome (radar) attached to its back. It detects the presence of enemies no matter how small their sounds or vibrations are if they are picked up by Searchmon, and also gathers information on them.

Seasarmon.name: Seasarmon
Seasarmon.description: Seasarmon is an Animal Digimon. It has the appearance of the legendary holy beast, the "Siisaa". It has the power to sweep away calamity, and exhibits tremendous power toward evildoers. It is an ally to those that are kind-hearted, and will try to protect its Tamer from every calamity, even if it has to sacrifice its own body. Contrary to its heroic appearance, it usually basks leisurely in the sunlight, due to its docile personality. However, the sunlight is an important factor for Seasarmon, because it charges its life energy.

attacks.name: Ancient Firewall (Sekkantou)
attacks.description: Temporarily prevents the intrusion of evil Viruses, as a kind of Firewall.

attacks.name: Tiida Iya (ティーダ・イヤ Tiida Ija, lit. "Sun's Courage")
attacks.description: Fires countless holy arrows of sunlight.

attacks.name: Energy Ray
attacks.description: Fires a solar ball of light.

Seasarmon X.name: Seasarmon X
Seasarmon X.description: Seasarmon X is a Holy Beast Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It is clad in golden armor that shines as it basks in the sunlight, and forms a barrier that repels attacks from Demon-species Digimon. It seems that you can tell how long it has been charging for based on how red its tail is. These days, Seasarmon sunbathes leisurely to prepare itself for battle against evil Digimon.

attacks.name: Ancient Firewall (Sekkantou)
attacks.description: Temporarily prevents the intrusion of evil Viruses, as a kind of Firewall.

attacks.name: Tiida Iya (ティーダ・イヤ Tiida Ija, lit. "Sun's Courage")
attacks.description: Fires countless holy arrows of sunlight.

attacks.name: Koryūkyū (胡劉球, Koryūkyū lit. "Barbarian-killing Ball")
attacks.description: Turning into a ball of light and attacks evil.

Sepikmon.name: Sepikmon
Sepikmon.description: Sepikmon is a Wizard Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Friendship". Due to the power of its strange mask, it is able to speak with the spirits of the dead. It usually lurks in the depths of the Digital World's jungles, so it rarely ever appears in public. According to one theory, it is said that Sepikmon does not emerge from the jungle because the spirits of the dead are its only friends and that it has no living ones. If you hear voices speaking as though they are conversing, despite no one being there, in the Digital World's jungles, you'd better leave without doing anything. Otherwise, you might end up being Sepikmon's friend. It often throws its "Spirit Boomerang" to itself.

attacks.name: Spirit Boomerang
attacks.description: With its boomerang imbued with the powers of nature, it rids the land of all impure beings.

attacks.name: Charming Dancing
attacks.description: A mystical dance that summons spirits of the dead to attack enemies.

Seraphimon.name: Seraphimon
Seraphimon.description: Seraphimon is an Angel Digimon. As one of the "Celestial Digimon", it is the executor of the enlightened God's laws. It is dressed in holy armor that shines silver, and possesses ten golden wings. As the highest-ranked being among Angel Digimon, it rules over them all. Although its true identity and personality are hidden behind a mask and cannot be glimpsed, it is the being closest to the Being of Goodness called "God". It is told that when it descends for the final battle against evil beings, it will purify everything. Also, it is said that Daemon, who fell to the Dark Area and became a Demon Lord Digimon, was originally a Seraphimon.

attacks.name: Strike of the Seven Stars (Seven Heavens)
attacks.description:
Fires seven super-heated spheres of light at the opponent.
Kūchū Seven Heavens (空中セブンヘブンズ, Kūchū Seven Heavens lit. "Aerial Seven Heavens")

attacks.name: Kūchū Seven Heavens (空中セブンヘブンズ, Kūchū Seven Heavens lit. "Aerial Seven Heavens")
Testament
attacks.description: Uses the deepest mystery to convert its mortal life into a Big Bang.

attacks.name: Hallowed Knuckle (Divine Breaker)
attacks.description: Launches an orb of light.

attacks.name: Excalibur
attacks.description: Attacks with the holy sword Excalibur generated from the armor on its right forearm.

attacks.name: Rising Halo (Ascension Hallow)
attacks.description: Calls down powerful bolts of divine lightning.

attacks.name: Full HP Cure (Final Heal)
attacks.description: Heals HP.

attacks.name:
Heaven's Kick
