Chokkagata Heaven's Kick (直下型ヘウンズキック, Chokkagata Heaven's Kick lit. "Falling Heaven's Kick")
Chokkagata Heaven's Kick (直下型ヘウンズキック, Chokkagata Heaven's Kick lit. "Falling Heaven's Kick")
Holy Sunshine
attacks.description: Submerges the battlefield in holy light.

Sethmon.name: Sethmon
Sethmon.description: Sethmonis a Dark Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Love". Because the power of the Digi-Egg of Love was too great, it could not be controlled, and it converted into the power of hatred. Its body is colored a baleful red, and it has the power to create storms that bring calamity. As it is the polar opposite ofHalsemon, it is thought that they are the embodiments of the two-sided nature of love and hatred possessed by the "Digi-Egg of Love".

Sethmon Wild Mode.name: Sethmon Wild Mode
Sethmon Wild Mode.description: Sethmon Wild Mode is the DigiFuse of Sethmon, several Grizzlymon, and several Dobermon. Dark Side Of The Sun

attacks.name: Atomic Heat Wave (Grand Heat Storm)
attacks.description: Unleashes a powerful blazing wind.

Shademon.name: Shademon
Shademon.description: Shademon is an Unidentified Digimon. It is a Digimon with no substance that haunts the shadows of humans and Digimon. It feeds on the despair of the haunted opponent and transforms it into its own nourishment, and it is said that which fiendish Digimon it digivolves to varies by the amount ingested.

attacks.name: Free Death Fall
attacks.description: Continuously displays illusions of being knocked to the ground 10000 times.

attacks.name: Kill Me
attacks.description: Manipulates the surrounding Digimon to assault the enemy who is being haunted.

Shademon (Nene Version).name: Shademon (Nene Version)
Shademon (Nene Version).description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars (manga). Shares an official romanization withShademon.

ShadowSeraphimon.name: ShadowSeraphimon
ShadowSeraphimon.description: ShadowSeraphimon is a Seraph Digimon. It is another evil form of Seraphimon whose concealed inner resentment tumefied and engulfed it in darkness. Its ten shining gold wings have been steeped a dark bat-like purple, and its silver armor has transformed ominously. It is said that it will fall to a Daemon if this condition persists for long. One version of ShadowSeraphimon was formed from Mercurymon and Seraphimon's seized data, and possessed Mercurymon's tactics.

attacks.name: Strike of the Seven Dark Stars (Seven Hells)
attacks.description: Fires seven super-heated spheres of darkness.

attacks.name: Shadow Starburst (Testament)
attacks.description: Performs its greatest special technique by sacrificing its mortal life to incinerate its enemy with hellfire. In Digimon Frontier it tackles the enemy, wraps its arms around them, and then electrifies them with its body.

attacks.name: Shadow Shockwave
attacks.description: Flicks its hand to release an invisible shockwave.

ShadowToyAgumon.name: ShadowToyAgumon

otherNames.name: トイアグモンＬ ToyAgumon L
トイアグモン クロ ToyAgumon Kuro

ShadowToyAgumon.description: ShadowToyAgumon is a Puppet Digimon. It is a ToyAgumon that has been dyed black. It was infected by a computer virus within the Network, and turned into a toy that would bully children instead.

attacks.name: Plastic Blaze (Toy Flame)
attacks.description: Fires a toy missile shaped like a flame.

attacks.name: Block Punch
attacks.description: Punches with arms made from blocks.

attacks.name: Marion Punch
attacks.description: A spinning flaming punch.

attacks.name: Fancy Star
attacks.description: Hits the enemy with a big star.

attacks.name: Machine Attack (Kikai Attack)
attacks.description: Inflicts a hard blow full of machine power.

ShadowWereGarurumon.name: ShadowWereGarurumon
ShadowWereGarurumon.description: ShadowWereGarurumonis an Animal Digimon. It is a Digimon digivolved from avirus-type Garurumon. Because this Digimon has two feet, it is slower, but it makes up for this by using its arms to deliver powerful attacks.

attacks.name: Shadow Claw (Kaiser Nail)
attacks.description: Cuts apart the opponent with the sharp talons on both of its hands.

attacks.name: Full Moon Kick (円月蹴り, Engetsugeri, lit. "Circle Moon Kick")
attacks.description: Kicks in a circle.

attacks.name: Garuru Kick
attacks.description: Strikes with two powerful kicks.

attacks.name: Fox Fire
attacks.description: Breathes out an intense blue flame.

Shadramon.name: Shadramon
Shadramon.description: Shadramon is an Insectoid Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Courage". To be precise, it took the form of an insect-humanoid, but its form had an unfortunate adverse reaction to the "Digi-Egg of Courage" and became fiendish. As with Flamedramon, it manipulates flames, and its hand-to-hand combat ability is almost on par, but it is a wicked being, exactly opposite like light and darkness.

attacks.name: Flare Buster
attacks.description: Emits a red hot blaze from both hands.

attacks.name: Psychic Wave
attacks.description: Unleashes a psychic wave of energy.

attacks.name: Serrated Screw (Indent Screw)
attacks.description: Twists body into a screw-like tornado and pierces through enemy.

Shakamon.name: Shakamon
Shakamon.description: Shakamon is a Tathāgata Digimon. Rumored to be the being closest to King Drasil in the Digital World, Shakamon is the one that has protected the eastern Digital World since ancient times. It is a being replete with love, but it will occasionally impose an ordeal upon the Digital World in order to have it leap forward even further. Those ordeals are also Shakamon's love, and it is said that Shakamon is still waiting for the arrival of the Digimon that will overcome the ordeals. It is something meaningless to challenge Shakamon, who understands the underlying principles of heaven and earth.

attacks.name: Satori Henro Shou (悟遍路掌, Satori Henro Shou lit. "Pilgrimage of Enlightenment Palm")
attacks.description: Enlightens those who challenge it to battle that conflict is meaningless by having them endlessly fight against an illusion on top of its palm, so in the end both their mind and body are exhausted.

attacks.name: Reikou Kumo-no-Ito (霊光蜘蛛之糸, Reikou Kumo-no-Ito lit. "Light of the Spider's Thread")
attacks.description: Purifies and remedies evil by illuminating the opponent with a halo that cannot be shut out even if they close their eyes.

attacks.name: Taijou Shingon (怠条真言, Taijou Shingon lit. "Mantra of Neglect")
attacks.description: Crushes hostility with a thundering voice, knocking the opponent away beyond the horizon.

Shakkoumon.name: Shakkoumon
Shakkoumon.description: Shakkoumon is a Mutant Digimon. It DNA digivolved from Ankylomon and Angemon. It possesses white wings on its body, which shines silver, and according to one theory, it is an Angel Digimon which descended to the ancient Digital World. It can rotate its neck and torso 360°, allowing it to attack in every direction. As its face is expressionless, it is difficult to determine what it's thinking, so some observers find it eerie, but its personality is exceedingly gentle.

attacks.name: Justice Beam (荒御魂, Aramitama, lit. "Rough Spirit")
attacks.description: Radiates red laser beams from its eyes that can reach 100,000°C at their focal point.

attacks.name: Kachina Bombs (和御魂, Nigimitama, lit. "Harmonious Spirit")
attacks.description: Fires clay disks from its waist.

attacks.name: Super Spirit (サキミタマ, Sakimitama, lit. "Beyond Spirit")

Shamanmon.name: Shamanmon
Shamanmon.description: Shamanmon is an Ogre Digimon. It is a Goblimon whose duty is to listen to the will of God, and convey that to its clan. It performs a mysterious dance during its rituals, and it is said that once it gets fired up to the maximum, it becomes able to hear the prophecies of God. It also makes use of this ritual to predict matters that are of importance to its clan.

attacks.name: Mad Twist
attacks.description: Shoots a series of purple rings from his bone club.

attacks.name: Dancing Bone
attacks.description: Throws a bone club at the enemy.

attacks.name: Sharma Hammer (Shama Hammer)
attacks.description: Strikes the enemy's head with the large club it uses for its rituals.

attacks.name: Shama Strike
attacks.description: Throws a ball of fire with amazing speed.

attacks.name: Boulder Throw (岩飛ばし, Iwa Tobashi, lit. "Skipping Boulder")
attacks.description: Summons a large boulders and throws it.

attacks.name: Shama Bomb
attacks.description: Throws a huge fireball that explodes on impact.

attacks.name: Goburi Strike
attacks.description: Throws a fireball at the opponent at Mach speed.

Shawjamon.name: Shawjamon
Shawjamon.description: Shawjamon is a Demon Man Digimon. It was banished from the Digital World's heaven. Although it is a calm and collected Digimon, it is said that a certain DigiCore was sealed among the nine beads of its necklace, and if even one bead is lost, it will be transformed once again into a terrifying Digimon. It wields the astonishing super-heavyweight class "Kouyoujou" staff (降妖杖, "Kouyoujou" staff lit. "Monster Subduing Staff").

attacks.name: Hydro Tornado (降妖杖・渦紋の陣, Kouyoujou: Kamon no Jin, lit. "Kouyoujou: Whirlpool Formation")
attacks.description: Raises a waterspout by freely spinning the Kouyoujou.

attacks.name: Hydro Descent (降妖杖・滝の陣, Kouyoujou: Taki no Jin, lit. "Kouyoujou: Waterfall Formation")
attacks.description: Strikes the ground with the Kouyoujou to shatter it and release a raging current.

attacks.name: Moon Fang (月牙斬, Getsugazan, lit. "Crescent Moon Slash")
attacks.description: Stabs at the opponent with the Kouyoujou's crescent moon-shaped blade.

attacks.name: Whirl Form (かもんのじん, Kamon no Jin, lit. "Whirlpool Formation")
attacks.description: Attacks with a twister of water.

Sheepmon.name: Sheepmon
Sheepmon.description: Sheepmon is a Mammal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Hope". The surface of its body is covered in wool of the finest quality. Also, Sheepmon moves very sluggishly, so just watching them travel in flocks will make you sleep. The equipment on its back is a booster/bazooka unit called the "Wool Ball Booster", and with this, it reproduces the low-speed movement characteristic of Sheepmon.

Shellmon.name: Shellmon
Shellmon.description: Shellmon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It is a hermit crab-like Digimon that lives in the margins of the "Net Ocean". Although it has a turtle-like appearance when its settled inside its shell, for all intents and purposes it has a soft body like a mollusk. Because its body rapidly gets bigger as it grows, it replaces its home each time until it reaches the size of a small mountain. Also, if its body can fit all the way in, it has a habit of settling in completely. Since it has low intelligence and a belligerent personality, you must be careful if you come across a Shellmon. Sangomon use the backs of Shellmon as a resting place. It is a companion of MoriShellmon.

attacks.name: Aqua Blaster (Hydro Pressure)
attacks.description: Shoots liquid at high pressure.

attacks.name: Slamming Attack (たいあたり, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Blow")
Water Wave
attacks.description: Attacks with a big tsunami.

ShimaUnimon.name: ShimaUnimon
ShimaUnimon.description: ShimaUnimon is a Mythical Animal Digimon. It is a subspecies of Unimon that has stripes all over its body. Because the data of the Unicorn is more highly expressed in its body, it lacks the wings of the Pegasus. For that reason, it is unable to fly in the air, but it races across the land with its powerful legs. Also, its Unicorn horn is sharper than Unimon's, and its lethal potential has increased.

attacks.name: Striped Blaster (Luster Shot)
attacks.description: Fires a blast from the mouth.

attacks.name: Wild Thunder
attacks.description: Drops lightning on top of the enemy.

attacks.name: Mirage Dance
attacks.description: Kicks with the hind legs.

attacks.name: Shima Cone Thrust (Shima Corn Thrust)
attacks.description: Stabs the enemy with the horns on the head.

attacks.name: Anti-Freeze (Anti Paralyze)
attacks.description: Cures Paralysis.

ShineGreymon.name: ShineGreymon
ShineGreymon.description: ShineGreymonis a Shining Dragon Digimon. It fights with the red-hot solar energy it accumulates, and its "GeoGrey Sword" contains the condensed power ofGaia.

attacks.name: Glorious Burst
attacks.description: Spreads its gigantic wings, concentrating its accumulated light energy to its utmost limit, then fires it.

attacks.name: Shining Blast
attacks.description: Mows down the opponent with wings of glimmering light.

attacks.name: GeoGrey Sword
attacks.description: Summons the GeoGrey Sword from the solid earth.

attacks.name: Shine Hammer
attacks.description: A punch attack of light energy.

attacks.name: Sparkle Shoot
attacks.description: Fires bullets of light energy.

attacks.name: Corona Splash
attacks.description: Spreads the light energy.

ShineGreymon Burst Mode.name: ShineGreymon Burst Mode
ShineGreymon Burst Mode.description: ShineGreymon Burst Mode is a Shining Dragon Digimon. It is a unique form of ShineGreymon that has temporarily reached the limits of its abilities through Burst Digivolution, and wears an aura of solar-class high-energy flames.

attacks.name: Corona Blaze Sword
attacks.description: Fuses its flaming shield and sword into a greatsword with explosively increased power.

attacks.name: Final Shining Burst
attacks.description: Puts its body and soul into inducing a massive eruption.

attacks.name: Torrid Weiss (Torrid Weiß, Deu: Torrid White)
attacks.description: Continuously fires incandescent flame shots.

attacks.name: Glorious Burst
attacks.description: Spreads its gigantic wings, concentrating its accumulated light energy to its utmost limit, then fires it.

attacks.name: Shining Blast
attacks.description: Mows down the opponent with wings of glimmering light.

ShineGreymon Ruin Mode.name: ShineGreymon Ruin Mode
ShineGreymon Ruin Mode.description: ShineGreymon Ruin Mode is a Shining Dragon Digimon. Its allies defeated and pride wounded, ShineGreymon unlocks a new power while mired in resentment. In its boundless hunger for more power, its positive energy from the sun is converted into a negative, dark energy. The power of all ShineGreymon Ruin Mode's special moves are immensely amplified by this dark energy. However, if ShineGreymon Ruin Mode surpasses its limits and draws out too much dark energy, it risks turning back into a Digi-Egg.

attacks.name: Glorious Burst
attacks.description: Spreads its gigantic wings, concentrating its accumulated light energy to its utmost limit, then fires it.

attacks.name: Shining Blast
attacks.description: Mows down the opponent with wings of glimmering light.

attacks.name: Torrid Weiss (Torrid Weiß, Deu: Torrid White)
attacks.description: Attacks with flames of darkness.

attacks.name: Final Shining Burst
attacks.description: Puts its body and soul into inducing a massive eruption.

attacks.name: Corona Blaze Sword
attacks.description: Fuses its flaming shield and sword into a greatsword with explosively increased power.

ShinMonzaemon.name: ShinMonzaemon
ShinMonzaemon.description: ShinMonzaemon is a Puppet Digimon. It is a Digimon that Digivolved as a result of nightmare-related data absorbed and analyzed by Monzaemon. At first glance, it looks like a teddy bear, but is actually made of a mysterious substance that is both squishy and amorphous, like some kind of cross between slime and clouds. ShinMonzaemon is a moody Digimon with a childish personality that does not make decisions based in logic. It likes simple and cute things, causing it to target immature Digimon Rookie level and below. On the other hand, ShinMonzaemon considers Digimon that have grown beyond Rookie to be repulsive existences imbued with impure data, and despises even being close to them. When ShinMonzaemon feeds, it extends its soft wings to envelope its prey. Since its entire body is made of extremely powerful energy, even the softest touch from it is said to be enough to cause very weak Digimon to lose consciousness.

attacks.name: Nightmare Rain
attacks.description: Sends countless parts of its body flying to steal its target's consciousness.

attacks.name: Fantastic Smash (Fancy Fantasista)
attacks.description: Changes its right arm into a hammer and then crushes its enemy

attacks.name: Sweetheart Attack (Sweet Lovely Attack)
attacks.description: Fires a laser from its left eye to pierce its target's DigiCore.

Shivamon.name: Shivamon
Shivamon.description: Shivamon is an Insectoid Digimon. It is a Mega Digimon that digivolved by achieving enlightenment through yoga. It is a rigorous seeker of peace who attempts to guide others with its calm spirit. It shows its violent disposition to those who lack decorum or disturb the peace, and annihilates them without mercy. The energy concealed within its body is as powerful as nuclear fuel, and it is a god of destruction that pulverizes everything when push comes to shove.

attacks.name: Kūṭastha Kiraṇa
attacks.description: Fires unparalleled, orb-shaped light energy from its palms.

attacks.name: Kamala Karma
attacks.description: Hurls the rings on its arms, which change shape at will, and blows the enemy away.

attacks.name: Samādhi Śānti
attacks.description: A rainbow-colored barrier it covers itself with in its yoga poses, that does not let most attacks pass through, and this barrier can only be penetrated by those who have acquired strength through the power of yoga, like Shivamon.

ShogunGekomon.name: ShogunGekomon
ShogunGekomon.description: ShogunGekomon is an Amphibian Digimon. It is an upgraded version of Gekomon with an antenna resembling the chonmage of a feudal lord. The upgrade is said to have first occurred in a karaoke grading system. It plays a melody from the two horns extending from its shoulders, and its singing voice, which is several octaves below that of Gekomon's, imparts a feeling of a lordly air of superiority (?).

attacks.name: Musical Fist (コブシトーン, Kobushi Tone, lit. "Samurai Tone")
attacks.description: Causes the enemy's configuration data to vibrate using the ultra-low frequency waves from its vocals and horns, destroying them. However, depending on the opponent, their physical condition may end up improving due to the low frequency waves.

attacks.name: Symphony Crusher (Crash Symphony)
attacks.description: Uses high frequency vibrations to destroy the opponent from the inside.

ShootingStarmon.name: ShootingStarmon
debut: Digimon Xros Wars (manga), "Xros Stars!! Like a Shooting Star!!" [18]
ShootingStarmon.description: ShootingStarmon is a Super Major Digimon. The DNA Digivolution of Starmon (2010 anime) and Pickmons. A horde of Pickmons surround Starmon and their thoughts become one, allowing Starmon to ascend to a Super Major type.

attacks.name: Astro Bomber
attacks.description: Turns into a flaming star that penetrates the atmosphere with such force that it creates a huge crater upon impact.

attacks.name: Dynamite Soul
attacks.description: Rekindles the weakened hearts of depressed, dispirited Digimon by shouting passionate phrases.

Shootmon.name: Shootmon
Shootmon.description: Shootmon is a Machine Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved via the data of various ball games from around the world. With a cannon in one hand capable of shooting all kinds of balls, it plans to popularize ball games throughout the Digital World. Shootmon is nicknamed the "Laughing Oni Coach" by Digimon that fear it because it approaches them with a smiling face that never changes whether it is angry or happy.

attacks.name: Cannonball Shooter
attacks.description: Shoots balls from its cannon at speeds exceeding 300 km/h.

attacks.name: Wild Pitch
attacks.description: Charges into the enemy by utilizing its elastic, spring-like legs.

attacks.name: Round Jail
attacks.description: Turns anything it touches into a ball without wasting its breath. Digimon who suffer it are mercilessly shot out of its cannon.

title: Laughing Oni Coach
(笑う鬼コーチ
Warau Oni Kōchi?)

Shortmon.name: Shortmon
debut: Digimon Xros Wars (manga), "Xros Sweets!! The Girls' Sweet Trap!!?" [06]
Shortmon.description: Shortmon is a Food Digimon. It is a Digimon shaped like a shortcake that aims to be a first-class pâtissier. It studies every day to polish its skills due to the cake data that flows into the Digital World. It has also learned how to treat customers politely, and dreams of opening its own cake shop someday and serving delicious cakes to customers. If a Digimon that ruins spaces to enjoy cakes appears, it will drive them away with its "Tastone" and "Sweet Berry". When Weddinmon sees Digimon who it is close to, it will organize a commemorative event without asking and deliver happiness with an extra-large cake made in collaboration with Shortmon. The Digimon that are involved are astonished, but since they can eat delicious cake, everything is instantly transformed into a happy space.

attacks.name: Tastone
attacks.description: Pierces the enemy with a large fork.

attacks.name: Sweet Berry
attacks.description: Shoots the strawberry on its head.

Shounitamon.name: Shounitamon
Shounitamon.description: Shounitamon is an Enhancement Digimon. It is the "Armed-reconnaissance Mode" (強行偵察形態, Kyoukouteisatsu Keitai) born from Shoutmon and Monitamon's overflowing curiosity. It specializes in methods of concealing its appearance, freely uses ninjutsu to penetrate enemy territory, and can transmit the enemy info it has accumulated to its allies with Monitamon's "Information Sharing" ability, and is able to withdraw whenever it likes without being noticed...however, although it has this potential, for some mysterious and specific reason, it is never seen exhibiting this ability. Because its curiosity easily gets the best of it, it frequently sneaks into areas differing from its objective, and performs the wrong armed reconnaissance against its better judgment. In particular, there are many eyewitness reports of it at hot springs or pools. It insists that it is a "scout", not a "voyeur".

Shoutmon.name: Shoutmon
Shoutmon.description: Shoutmonis a Small Dragon Digimon. It is a ferocious Digimon with extremely high aggressiveness due to its hot-blooded enthusiasm. However, it is friendly towards its comrades, and its friendship with other Digimon, surpassing species, can be deepened even further if they are recognized by Shoutmon. There is a unique feature to Shoutmon's singing that converts its passion to energy, and since Shoutmon won't give up fighting unless its passion disappears, this is the reason Shoutmon is said to be a ferocious Digimon with high aggressiveness. On one hand, it seems ferocious, but on the other, it is said to love music and songs, and it likes to hum songs with natural soundingbackground musiclike the sound of the wind, raindrops, the murmuring of a river, or the stirring of leaves on a tree. Because it can often become too enthusiastic in its song, accidentally letting off its "Bellow Blaster" (Soul Crusher) even though there aren't any enemies, it's probably safest to leave the spot at once if Shoutmon starts singing, so that it doesn't notice you. Shoutmon itself is said to have the mysterious trait of always having itsMcField-brand mic in its possession, and a Shoutmon without the mic is not really a Shoutmon. It is said that a Shoutmon that has completely lost its mic will rapidly lose power from the shock of not being a Shoutmon anymore, and before long, it will have wasted away. Therefore, you should never play a practical joke like hiding the mic. Incidentally, it can wield the mic as inbōjutsu, so it is excellent not only in scuffling matches but also in performances.

attacks.name: Fiery Fastball (ロックダマシー, Rokku Damashī, lit. "Rock Soul")
attacks.description:
Forms a ball of energy in the shape of an eighth note and throws it at the opponent.
Rapid Fiery Fastball
Fiery Fastball Burst

attacks.name: Bellow Blaster (Soul Crusher)
attacks.description: Uses its mic to amplify the energy of the heated emotions blazing within its chest, then bashes the opponent. Because passion is the very source of the attack, it will definitely inflict damage no matter the target.

attacks.name: Rock and Roller (Rowdy Rocker)
attacks.description: Wields its mic as in bōjutsu.

attacks.name: Microphone Thrust
attacks.description: Jabs the opponent with its mic.

attacks.name: Storm Hammer Knuckle
attacks.description: A flaming uppercut.

attacks.name: Spirit Dive
attacks.description: Jumps at the opponent, swinging its mic down on them.

attacks.name: Savage Microphone
attacks.description: Repeatedly jabs the enemy with its mic.

attacks.name: Final Tornado Uppercut
attacks.description: A flaming, rotating uppercut.

attacks.name: Passionate Heat Tackle
attacks.description: Charges at the enemy with its shoulder while aflame.

attacks.name: Homerun Smash
attacks.description: Knocks the enemy into the air with its mic, then swings it at them like its using a baseball bat.

attacks.name: Man of Fire Straight
attacks.description: A flaming straight punch.

attacks.name: True Man of Fire Straight
attacks.description: A more powerful version of Man of Fire Straight.

attacks.name: Super Shout
attacks.description: Damages nearby enemies with a loud shout.

attacks.name: Rolling Smash
attacks.description: Performs a forward flip in the air, hitting the enemy with its mic.

attacks.name: Great Spinning Microphone
attacks.description: Twirls in the air while swinging its mic.

Shoutmon (King Version).name: Shoutmon (King Version)
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Students have Vanished! The Flickering Shadow of Sagomon" [56]
Shoutmon (King Version).description: Shoutmon (King Version) is a Mini Dragon Digimon. It is a Shoutmon with a valiant air, and a yellow scarf that flutters in the wind. Its strength has increased drastically as a result of its training, and its performances, in which it uses its McField-brand mic, shine especially bright.

attacks.name: Rock Soul (ロックダマシー, Rock Damashī)
attacks.description: Forms a ball of energy in the shape of an eighth note and throws it at the opponent.

attacks.name: Soul Crusher
attacks.description: Uses its mic to amplify the energy of the heated emotions blazing within its chest, then bashes the opponent. Because passion is the very source of the attack, it will definitely inflict damage no matter the target.

attacks.name: Rowdy Rocker
attacks.description: Wields its mic as in bōjutsu

title: Digimon King
(デジモンキング
Dejimon Kingu?)

Shoutmon + Drill Cannon.name: Shoutmon + Drill Cannon
Shoutmon + Drill Cannon.description: Shoutmon + Drill Cannon is an Enhancement Digimon. It is Dorulumon's "Bombardment Mode" (砲撃形態, Hougeki Keitai) and greatest Special Move. Because Dorulumon must concentrate on charging the energy, the cooperation of Shoutmon to take charge of sighting is essential in order to hit the target. Furthermore, while charging the energy, Dorulumon's defensive power goes down to zero, leaving it completely defenseless. It becomes absolutely essential at this time to have Shoutmon's aid in guarding it, and it can be said that this bold move can only be used when it has absolute trust in its partner.

attacks.name: Dorulu Cannon
attacks.description: Condenses and fires all the energy that it possesses.

Shoutmon + Star Sword.name: Shoutmon + Star Sword
Shoutmon + Star Sword.description: Shoutmon + Star Sword is an Enhancement Digimon. It is Starmon and the Pickmons' "Sword-union Mode" (剣結合形態, Kenketsugou Keitai). The saw-shaped blade is strong and boasts peerless firmness, so that it shreds the opponent when it cuts through them, inflicting massive damage. Because the wounds are completely ragged, it takes time for the opponent to recover from the damage of an ordinary attack, and they incur even greater damage. Also, because the united Pickmon can shift freely, it possesses not only firmness, but also a flexibility that allows it to bend like a willow branch and absorb impacts that are too strong. It can be said that the Star Sword has an appearance which embodies the strong ties of Starmon and the Pickmons' emotional bond.

attacks.name: Sun Sword (Star Blade)
attacks.description: Charges the Star Sword with flaming energy and then releases a cutting shock-wave of fire.

Shoutmon + Supersonic Sparrow.name: Shoutmon + Supersonic Sparrow
Shoutmon + Supersonic Sparrow.description: Shoutmon + Supersonic Sparrow is an Enhancement Digimon. It is Sparrowmon's "Machspeed-cruiser Mode" (音速巡航形態, Onsokujunkou Keitai) that acquired even more speed. It possesses tremendous thrust and is able to carry Shoutmon on its back while flying, but if Shoutmon doesn't have a lot of will-power, it will be immediately blown off by the excess wind speed. There is an instrument called a DigiCompressor within its body, which produces thrust by taking in air, super-compressing it, then exhausting it out its aft. This instrument can be used not only for flight but also for offensive techniques.

attacks.name: Tempest Blast (Air Shooter)
attacks.description: Shoots compressed air alongside a roar. This technique has a significant spreading factor, so it has low efficacy against distant opponents, but instantaneously blows away nearby opponents.

attacks.name: Shock Rockets (Plasma Blaster)
attacks.description: Super-compresses air to the point that it becomes plasma, then shoots it out its gunports.

Shoutmon B.name: Shoutmon B
Shoutmon B.description: Shoutmon B is a black, bipedal dragon who draws influences from themusicianprofession. It has a metallic body and joints, and it has headphones on its ears. It wields its mike in its right hand, which is long enough to act as a staff.

Shoutmon DX.name: Shoutmon DX
Shoutmon DX.description: Shoutmon DX is a Composition Digimon. As the "Crusade Mode" (クルセイド形態, Kuruseido Keitai), born when OmniShoutmon, who boasts the swiftest speed, obtained the fighting strength of ZekeGreymon, who boasts unparalleled power, it incarnated its high defensive and offensive power without losing OmniShoutmon's speed by obtaining ZekeGreymon's "Gold Digizoid". There is never an opponent too formidable before Shoutmon DX, who boasts high mobility and offensive power. It possesses a disposition that contrasts clever divinity with ferocious bestiality, deriving from the instincts within OmniShoutmon and ZekeGreymon. Although it normally has a mild, kind, and friendly personality, once it gets into battle, it has a complete about-face to a warrior burning with fury. It becomes both cool and audacious enough for battles to get violent, and that appearance is fitting to the name of "Crusade Mode", as it seems to be one who acts as an agent of divine punishment. It has the "Electric Buster Xros" bayonets equipped to its right arm, and the gigantic "Trident JusFang" claws on its left.

attacks.name: DX Double Blade (Trident JusFang)
attacks.description: Releases a powerful blow with the Trident JusFang, or uses that sturdiness to function as a shield.

attacks.name: Magma Blast (Hyper Rock Magnum)
attacks.description: Fires a hail of shots.

attacks.name: Electric Buster Cross (Electric Buster Xros)
attacks.description: Demonstrates the power of the Electric Buster Xros in both gun and sword attacks.

attacks.name: Victorize Complete (Victorize Banking)
attacks.description: Effuses its passion to justice from the "V" on its head and assaults the opponent while shining greater than the sun, eradicating them.

attacks.name: Brave Beat Rock Double Fusion (Brave Beat Rock Double Xros)
attacks.description: Unifies OmniShoutmon's and ZekeGreymon's flames, clothing its body with the hellfire that purifies all corruption and becoming an incarnation of flame that looks like a meteor, and completely vaporizes all of the opponents when it assaults them.

Shoutmon EX6.name: Shoutmon EX6
partners: Mikey Kudo,Christopher Aonuma,Jeremy Tsurgi,Angie Hinomoto, andKotone Amano
Shoutmon EX6.description: Shoutmon EX6 is a Composition Digimon. It is the "Evolution Mode" (エヴォリューション形態, Evoryūshon Keitai) formed from the DigiFuse of OmniShoutmon, ZekeGreymon, AtlurBallistamon, JaegerDorulumon, and RaptorSparrowmon, and it is considered to surpass Shoutmon X7 in defensive and flying ability because its body and wings shine gold and silver. The "Demolition Horn" on its left arm destroys any armor in addition to super-oscillating the instant it pierces it. Also, its right arm is equipped with the "Sol Calibur" sword.

attacks.name: Sol Calibur
attacks.description: Slashes with the blade on its right wrist.

attacks.name: Demolition Horn
attacks.description: Unleashes a devastating punch with the drill on its left wrist.

Shoutmon Star Wheel.name: Shoutmon Star Wheel
Shoutmon Star Wheel.description: Shoutmon Star Wheel isShoutmonwielding the Star Wheel, achakram-like weapon whereStarmon (2010 anime)forms the center and handle while thePickmonsfor the blades at the edges.

Shoutmon X2.name: Shoutmon X2
Shoutmon X2.description: Shoutmon X2is an Enhancement Digimon. The "Enhanced-armor Mode"(強化装甲形態,Kyoukasoukou Keitai)ofBallistamon, who excels in defense, confers physical strength and defense several times over to itself by housingShoutmonwithin, and furthermore, as a result of fusing the latent abilities of these two Digimon, it brings out many powerful Special Moves. Its Special Moves are full of variety, with close-combat attacks, beam attacks, and live ammunition attacks, and have a well-roundedness which can cope with anything from one-on-one combat to group battles, so that might is drawing more than enough from Ballistamon's latent abilities.

attacks.name: Horn Breaker DX
attacks.description: Breaks into enemy lines by hovering and sends opponents flying, opening a breach. This vital technique is an enhancement on Ballistamon's "Ram Slammer".

attacks.name: Sonic Tsunami (Buddy Blaster)
attacks.description: Converts its emotional strength to energy and shoots it from its horn. It can only use this, its greatest Special Move, when it synchronizes the power of friendship between Shoutmon and Ballistamon.

attacks.name: Fusion Fist (Arm Bunker)
attacks.description: Charges energy into its arm.

attacks.name: Optic Laser
attacks.description: Fires a laser from its eyes.

attacks.name: Vulcanators (Miya Vulcan)
attacks.description: Fires the vulcans on its elbows.

Shoutmon X2 (Incomplete X4).name: Shoutmon X2 (Incomplete X4)
Shoutmon X2 (Incomplete X4).description: Shoutmon X2 (Incomplete X4) has the form ofShoutmon X3, with theDorulumoncomponents appearing merely as a white aura.

Shoutmon X2+.name: Shoutmon X2+
Shoutmon X2+.description: Shoutmon X2+ is the DigiFuse of Shoutmon X2 and Kamemon. Kamemon becomes a shell for Shoutmon X2's back. Like a turtle, Shoutmon X2 can retreat into the shell to avoid an attack, and can also breathe underwater. Island Zone in Chaos!

attacks.name: Sonic Tsunami (Buddy Blaster)
attacks.description: Converts its emotional strength to energy and fires it from its horn.

Shoutmon X3.name: Shoutmon X3
Shoutmon X3.description: Shoutmon X3is a Composition Digimon. It is a warrior called the "Physical Mode"(フィジカル形態,Fijikaru Keitai), born fromShoutmon,Ballistamon, andDorulumon's combat instinct and possessing the fundamental abilities of "Spirit, Skill, and Power" in great supply. Its motion is rich with maneuverability, and it makes sport of the enemy with its acrobatic movements. It appears slender and because its lithe body joints absorb and dissipate the force they receive, it possesses the ability to resist impacts. The "V" on its chest is an all-purpose weapon.

attacks.name: Varooma-Boomerang (Three Victorize)
attacks.description: Fires a beam from the "V" on its chest that sweeps away hordes of opponents in a single strike.

attacks.name: Three Impact
attacks.description: Uses a comeback punch that will find it a way out of any predicament.

attacks.name: Varooma-Boomerang (Victorize Boomerang)
attacks.description: Detaches the "V" on its chest and throws it, using it as a gigantic boomerang instead of a sword.

attacks.name: High Atmospheric Pressure
attacks.description: Launches a foe into orbit using an uppercut with a spinning first.

attacks.name: Buddy Blaster
attacks.description: Launches a beam from the V-Sword on its chest.

Shoutmon X3GM.name: Shoutmon X3GM
Shoutmon X3GM.description: Shoutmon X3GM is a Pterosaur Digimon. It is a Digimon born from Greymon and MailBirdramon joining with Shoutmon X3, itself formed from Shoutmon, Ballistamon, and Dorulumon. It specializes in super-speed aerial dogfights, and it is said that its figure, scorching hot and roiling with violent flames, can be felt even from several kilometers away.

Shoutmon X3SD.name: Shoutmon X3SD
Shoutmon X3SD.description: Shoutmon X3SD is a Digimon born from SkullKnightmon and Axemon joining with Shoutmon X3, itself formed from Shoutmon, Ballistamon, and Dorulumon. It heroically wields the gigantic "Victory Spear", and its figure, ruthlessly mowing down opponents, is feared as a fierce god of the halberd.

Shoutmon X4.name: Shoutmon X4
Shoutmon X4.description: Shoutmon X4is a Composition Digimon. It is a miraculous form called the "Victory Mode"(ヴィクトリー形態,Vikutorī Keitai), born fromShoutmon,Ballistamon,Dorulumon, and theStarmons' powerful desire to gain absolute victory. Its raison d'être is nothing but enforcing this conviction. That power is tremendous, and it isn't a mistake to count it as one of the strongest Digimon. Its main specialty is in battling on the ground, and it wields the "Star Sword DX".

attacks.name: Great Sword of Victory (Burning Star Crusher)
attacks.description: Cuts any opponent in two with a single stroke, even if they are moving about quickly.

attacks.name: Burning Star Slasher
attacks.description: Hurls a wave from the Star Sword DX.

attacks.name:
V for Victory (Three Victorize): Fires a beam from the "V" on its chest that sweeps away hordes of opponents in a single strike.
Maximum Turbo-Victory Charge (Three Victorize Max Power)
attacks.description: Fires an enhanced version of Three Victorize in dazzling colors.

attacks.name: Maximum Turbo-Victory Charge (Three Victorize Max Power)
attacks.description: Fires an enhanced version of Three Victorize in dazzling colors.

attacks.name: Three Impact
attacks.description: Uses a comeback punch that will find it a way out of any predicament.

attacks.name: High Atmospheric Pressure
attacks.description: Launches a foe into orbit using an uppercut with a spinning fist.

attacks.name: Varooma-Boomerang (Victorize Boomerang)
attacks.description: Detaches the "V" on its chest and throws it, using it as a gigantic boomerang instead of a sword.

attacks.name: Vulcan Cannon
attacks.description: Fires a stream of bullets from the guns on its head.

Shoutmon X4B.name: Shoutmon X4B
Shoutmon X4B.description: Shoutmon X4B is a Composition Digimon. It is the "Divine-horse Mode" (神馬形態, Shinba Keitai), formed when Beelzemon granted further power to Shoutmon X4, which incarnated from Shoutmon, Ballistamon, Dorulumon, and the Starmons. It is a speedy knight who, if it wonders whether it can run across the land like a swift horse, will gallop to the heavens as if it was sprinting. Because Beelzemon's power has added to the power of Shoutmon X4, each of its techniques has been boosted exponentially. The appearance of it releasing its "Star's Blade Celestrike" makes it appropriate to now call it a fierce god.

attacks.name: Star's Blade Celestrike
attacks.description: Destroys the opponent with a hail of bullets as it sprints at them, then cuts them right in half.

attacks.name: Chaos Flare Cannon (Chaos Flare)
attacks.description: Fires a powerful shot from the Berenjena SDX, in a version of Beelzemon's "Oblivion Cannon" that has been empowered to the point that it can pierce through mountain ranges.

attacks.name: Burning Star Crusher
attacks.description: Cuts any opponent in two with a single stroke, even if they are moving about quickly.

attacks.name: Three Victorize
attacks.description: Fires a beam from the "V" on its chest that sweeps away hordes of opponents in a single strike.

Shoutmon X4K.name: Shoutmon X4K
Shoutmon X4K.description: Shoutmon X4Kis a Composition Digimon. The "Knight Mode"(騎士形態,Kishi Keitai)in whichKnightmonand thePawnChessmonsgranted impregnable defensive power and offensive power to the "Victory Mode"(ヴィクトリー形態,Vikutorī Keitai)which incarnated fromShoutmon,Dorulumon,Ballistamon, and theStarmons. It wears a cape depicting theCrest of Hope, and is equipped with agreatswordwhich combines Knightmon's "Berserk Sword" with theStar Sword, and a shield designed after the "Fusion Fighters" army logo.

attacks.name: Great Sword of Victory (Burning Star Crusher)
attacks.description: Slashes many enemies in a single stroke even if they are moving about quickly. It has increased in temperature and sharpness.

attacks.name: Varooma-Boomerang (Victorize Boomerang)
attacks.description: Detaches the "V" on its chest and throws it, using it as a gigantic boomerang instead of a sword.

attacks.name: Three Victorize
attacks.description: Fires a beam from the "V" on its chest that sweeps away hordes of opponents in a single strike.

attacks.name: Three Impact
attacks.description: Uses a comeback punch that will find it a way out of any predicament.

Shoutmon X4S.name: Shoutmon X4S
Shoutmon X4S.description: Shoutmon X4S is a Digimon. It is the "Weapons-fighter Mode" (武双闘士形態, Busoutoushi Keitai), in which the Legend-Arm Spadamon became a powerful weapon and joined with Shoutmon X4, which incarnated from Shoutmon, Ballistamon, Dorulumon, and the Starmons. Spadamon trusts in the comrade that it accepted as its master and changed its shape. Shoutmon X4 has dramatically empowered its figure by equipping a weapon that, "if held by an angel will save the world, and if held by a demon will destroy the world," so it races across the battlefield using a dual-wielding combat style in which it freely manipulates its two weapons to mow down its enemies and seize victory. The source of its power is its single-minded, passionate desire that it "wants to defend someone," and it is a courageous fighter who demonstrates its maximum power when it fights to defend someone. Also, the firing of the vulcans on its head was sublimated into a Special Move due to Spadamon's power, so it has obtained an ability greater than being armed to compensate for the weakness of having both its hands occupied with weapons.

attacks.name: Victory Star (Victory Brave)
attacks.description: Extends an immense, dazzling-blue blade of light from the Spadamon-weapon in its left hand, cutting everything to "V"-shaped pieces. It is told that when this blade is swung at its maximum power, it is able to cut a single Zone to pieces.

attacks.name: Xros R&B
attacks.description: Flings a huge, red and blue "X"-shaped shock-wave generated by swinging down its two weapons cross-wise, destroying the enemy lines with a storm-wave of energy. The weapons must be crossed with exact timing, so you can definitely say that it can only be performed once it has reached understanding with Spadamon.

attacks.name: Blaze Fire
attacks.description: Fires the vulcans on its head, allowing it to inflict paralysis and neutralize the abilities of the opponent if it hits.

Shoutmon X5.name: Shoutmon X5
Shoutmon X5.description: Shoutmon X5is a Composition Digimon. It is the "Finalist Mode"(ファイナリスト形態,Fainarisuto Keitai), born when the hearts ofShoutmon,Ballistamon,Dorulumon, theStarmons, andSparrowmoncame together. It is a form ofShoutmon X4, who primarily specializes in ground battles, that obtained the power of flight as the ultimate power-up.

attacks.name: Earth Shaker (Meteor Buster Attack)
attacks.description: Runs up to the stratosphere, then becomes a meteorite and rams the opponent, carving out a giant crater in not just them but also the land around them for several hundred meters.

attacks.name: Atomic Uppercut (Meteor Impact)
attacks.description: Concentrates all of its energy into its right fist, then drives it into the opponent from close range, reliably bringing them down.

attacks.name: Burning Star Crusher
attacks.description: Cuts any opponent in two with a single stroke, even if they are moving about quickly.

attacks.name: Three Victorize
attacks.description: Fires a beam from the "V" on its chest that sweeps away hordes of opponents in a single strike.

attacks.name: Winding Wind (Impact Laser)
attacks.description: Fires a gigantic spiraling laser at the opponent from the shield on its left arm.

title: Ruler of the Skies
(大空の覇者
Ōzora no Hasha?)

Shoutmon X5B.name: Shoutmon X5B
Shoutmon X5B.description: Shoutmon X5B is a Composition Digimon. It is the "Pegasus-wargod Mode" (天馬武神形態, Tenbabushin Keitai) formed when Beelzemon granted further power to Shoutmon X5, which incarnated from Shoutmon, Ballistamon, Dorulumon, the Starmons, and Sparrowmon. Beelzemon's firepower has added to the full power of Shoutmon X5, who boasts of being unmatched either on land or in the air, boosting its fighting strength exponentially. This Pegasus becomes a galloping comet across the sky and makes sport of any kind of opponent with its godlike speed, and with its power, which should surely be praised as divine skill, it is like a wargod sent from heaven to destroy demons.

attacks.name: Victory Blast (Burst Dash Stream)
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with "Burning Star Crusher", launches them with "Meteor Impact", and finishes them off with "Chaos Flare Cannon", pouring raging waves of bold moves on the opponent in a flash with a three-step wave of attacks.

attacks.name: Meteor Buster Attack
attacks.description: Runs up to the stratosphere, then becomes a meteorite and rams the opponent, carving out a giant crater in not just them but also the land around them for several hundred meters.

attacks.name: Meteor Impact
attacks.description: Concentrates all of its energy into its right fist, then drives it into the opponent from close range, reliably bringing them down.

attacks.name: Chaos Flare Cannon (Chaos Flare)
attacks.description: Fires a powerful shot from the Berenjena SDX, in a version of Beelzemon's "Oblivion Cannon" that has been empowered to the point that it can pierce through mountain ranges.

attacks.name: Star's Blade Celestrike
attacks.description: Destroys the opponent with a hail of bullets as it sprints at them, then cuts them right in half.

attacks.name: Burning Star Crusher
attacks.description: Cuts any opponent in two with a single stroke, even if they are moving about quickly.

attacks.name: Three Victorize
attacks.description: Fires a beam from the "V" on its chest that sweeps away hordes of opponents in a single strike.

Shoutmon X5S.name: Shoutmon X5S
debut: Digimon Story: Super Xros Wars Blue and Red
Shoutmon X5S.description: Shoutmon X5S is a Digimon. It is the "Cosmic-fighter Mode" (宇宙闘士形態, Uchūtoushi Keitai) in which the Legend-Arm Spadamon joined with and granted further power to Shoutmon X5, which was born when the hearts of Shoutmon, Ballistamon, Dorulumon, the Starmons, and Sparrowmon came together. Spadamon trusts in the comrade that it accepted as its master and changed its shape. Shoutmon X5 has empowered itself to transcendence by means of a weapon which conceals power that, "if held by an angel will save the world, and if held by a demon will destroy the world." In particular, the flying ability possessed by Shoutmon X5 increased in power dramatically, obtaining tremendous propulsive power and endowing it with the supreme flying ability to fly out past the distant stratosphere and up to space. It also awakened to the ability to absorb cosmic energy directly into its body by advancing into space, and acquired the power to freely manipulate the absorbed energy as techniques of marvelous power. Here the cosmic-fighter filled with cosmic energy was born, soaring through space at hyper-speed.

attacks.name: Cosmo Victory
attacks.description: Exploits its supreme flying ability to its maximum, flying at hyper-speed from the ground to break through the stratosphere and reach the void of space, then concentrates the explosive power it acquired gathering cosmic energy within its entire body, and all of the frictional force and heat that it acquired plunging through the atmosphere to return to the ground, within the Spadamon-weapon, and puts it into a single blow that it fires at the opponent as destructive power, inflicting consequences to both the opponents that suffer this technique, and the area surrounding them.

attacks.name: Helio Slasher
attacks.description: Injects solar energy to enhance the power of the Star Sword DX's flames to their maximum, and clads itself in scorching heat equaling that of the sun, then soars towards the opponent with its supreme flying ability, and finally cuts them to pieces while burning them to cinders with a single brandish in which it placed tremendous energy. The radiance of the blazing Star Sword DX extends a tail at the speed of its flight, causing it to look like a burning comet soaring through space.

attacks.name: Space Chakram
attacks.description: Launches a ring-shaped vacuum blade to cut the opponent to pieces, which carries not only a sharpened cutting ability, but also the strength of the wave, possessed by Spadamon, that paralyzes the opponent and neutralizes their abilities. Because of this, it has acquired more utility and advantage by firing off the technique than as a mere projectile, and has expanded the breadth of its strategies.

Shoutmon X6.name: Shoutmon X6
debut: Digimon Xros Wars (manga), "Xros Alliance!! The Final Odaiba Showdown!!" [15]
Shoutmon X6.description: Shoutmon X6 is the DigiFuse of Shoutmon DX, Ballistamon, Dorulumon, and the Starmons.

attacks.name: Xros Shooting Rocker
attacks.description: Uses its passionate soul to light its mic in hellfire, then grandly swings it down.

Shoutmon X7.name: Shoutmon X7
partners: Mikey Kudo,Christopher Aonuma,Nene AmanoandEwan Amano/Kotone Amano[7]
Shoutmon X7.description: Shoutmon X7is a Composition Digimon. It is the "Ardor-burst Mode"(アルダーバースト形態,Arudābāsuto Keitai)whichdigifusedfromBallistamon,Dorulumon, theStarmons, andSparrowmonwithShoutmon DXand attained further power. Its four passionate hearts burn within the "Gold Digizoid" that forms its body, and emit a divine aura. When Shoutmon X7 stands upon the battlefield, it is in the realization of a peaceful world, which is the entire goal of the Digimon that digifused into Shoutmon X7. If it carries those wishes in its heart, it is able to keep going forward without even yielding to any kind of attack. Its passionate soul longs for peace in the middle of the battlefield, and it wields itsMcField-brand mic in its right hand and the "Zanahoria" (Esp: Carrot) in its left. It overcomes close-combat battles with its "Xros Burning Rocker" and dominates long-distance battles with its "Double Flare Buster". And when it clinches victory, or finds itself in a tight spot due to an opponent's fierce attacks, it seals the victory with its "Seven Victorize".

attacks.name: Fusion Flamethrower (Xros Burning Rocker)
attacks.description: Uses its passionate soul to light its mic in hellfire, then grandly swings it down.

attacks.name: Double Flare Blaster (Double Flare Buster)
attacks.description: Shoots all of its energy from the Zanahoria.

attacks.name:
Final Victory Blade (Seven Victorize): Concentrates its entire, golden-hot aura in its chest, then fires it from its "V".
Seven Victorize (Seven Victorize Maximum)
attacks.description: Expands its Seven Victorize into seven beams.

attacks.name: Seven Victorize (Seven Victorize Maximum)
attacks.description: Expands its Seven Victorize into seven beams.

attacks.name: All Omega The Fusion
attacks.description: Shoots an Omnimon-shaped aura more powerful than "Omega the Fusion".

Shoutmon X7F Superior Mode.name: Shoutmon X7F Superior Mode
partners: Mikey Kudo,Christopher Aonuma,Nene Amano, andEwan Amano/Kotone Amano
Shoutmon X7F Superior Mode.description: Shoutmon X7F Superior Mode is a Composition Digimon. The "Awaking Mode" (アウェイキング形態, Aueikingu keitai) that Shoutmon X7 powers up into by turning several desires for peace into strength. The radiance of the aura overflowing from its Gold Digizoid has increased further, and it possesses wings of holy light. While carrying all hopes on its shoulders, it fights evil in order to guide the Digital World to peace.

attacks.name: Final Xros Blade
attacks.description: Slashes its McField-brand mic, which has been transformed into a greatsword by concentrating energy, downward from overhead. A single stroke of its sword leaves Digimon that possess a heart of justice unharmed, but as for Digimon with an evil heart, it completely resets their data, and it is said that they forcibly degenerate into a Digi-Egg.

attacks.name: Double Flare Buster
attacks.description: Shoots all of its energy from the Zanahoria.

attacks.name: Seven Victorize
attacks.description: Concentrates its entire, golden-hot aura in its chest, then fires it from its "V".

attacks.name: Xros Burning Rocker
attacks.description: Uses its passionate soul to light its mic in hellfire, then grandly swings it down.

Shroudmon.name: Shroudmon
Shroudmon.description: Shroudmonis a Wizard Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved from a certain Digimon that tempered its body beyond its limit during unimaginable training. As a result of it just fighting repeatedly like anAsura, it came to be known as the "Fierce God". Its mind is already broken, and it has even forgotten the reason why it sought strength. It is a genuine combat enthusiast who loves fist fighting, and forces its defeated opponents to get back up.

attacks.name: Demon-Speed Punch (鬼瞬轟拳, Kishungouken, lit. "Oni Instantaneous Roaring Fist")
attacks.description: Uses its iron fists, shrouded in an ominous aura, to dish out a combo attack too quick for the eye to see.

attacks.name: Hellfire Kick (獄炎破回蹴, Gokuen Hakaishū, lit. "Hellfire Destructive Turning Kick")
attacks.description: Reduces its surroundings to ashes with a roundhouse kick covered in flames.

attacks.name: Thunderflame Crusher (喰雷炎砕破, Garaien Saiha, lit. "Devouring Thunder and Fire Breaker")
attacks.description: Fires black flaming energy shots from its held-out palms. This boasts the single greatest firepower generated by a Digimon.

title: Fierce God
(鬼神
Kishin?)

Shurimon.name: Shurimon
Shurimon.description: Shurimon is a Mutant Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Sincerity". The "Digi-Egg of Sincerity" has the attribute of "Plant", and those that don this Digi-Egg have the ability to blend in with nature, conceal themselves within the wind like leaves dancing, and drive accurate attacks by appearing from the enemy's blind spots. It can be said that its figure is definitely that of a ninja. The big shuriken on its back is named "Kusanagi", and the shuriken on the tip of its limbs are named "Momiji Oroshi".

attacks.name: Double Stars (草薙, Kusanagi)
attacks.description: Throws the Kusanagi at the opponent from high in the air.

attacks.name: Double Stars (紅葉おろし, Momiji Oroshi, lit. "Autumn Wind").
attacks.description: Extends its limbs and attacks the opponent with the spinning Momiji Oroshi.

attacks.name: Nouten Sakaotoshi (脳天坂落とし, Nouten Sakaotoshi lit. "Cranium Hill-drop")
attacks.description: Holds onto the opponent as they both plunge headfirst into the ground.

attacks.name: Ninja Wind (木の葉隠れ, Konoha Kakure, lit "Leaf Concealment")
attacks.description: Transforms his body into a hurricane of sharp leaves, disappearing and reappearing like a ninja.

title: Samurai of Sincerity
(はじける純真
Hajikeru Junshin?
lit. "Bursting Purity")

Silphymon.name: Silphymon
Silphymon.description: Silphymon is an Animal Digimon. It DNA digivolved from Aquilamon and Gatomon. It possesses tenacious leg strength, and its leaping power is said to reach great heights. Also, it is able to fly about by spreading both of its arms and soaring like a glider after leaping high into the sky. Because it processes the information detected by the radar on its ears as images, and transmits it to the head-mounted display equipped to its head, it is able to accurately find the opponent regardless of day and night.

attacks.name: Static Force (Top Gun)
attacks.description: Fires off energy shots while extending both of its arms ahead of itself.

attacks.name: Static Force (Dual Sonic)
attacks.description: Glides at super-speed from the sky above to crash a shock wave into the opponent.

Sinduramon.name: Sinduramon
Sinduramon.description: Sinduramon is a Holy Bird Digimon. It is the "Rooster" Deva, and serves the Digimon Sovereign Baihumon. As a follower of Baihumon, it likes to quarrel and gossip above all else. With its provocative attitude, it will pick a fight with its opponent one way or another, but when they move to attack, it immediately draws its head and wings within its spherical armor. Its armor is the hardest among all of the Deva's equipment, and once it gets inside of the armor, it is absolutely protected. During battle, it is occasionally possible to cut through the breach when it rolls around in that state. Just like Kumbhiramon, it carries the Bǎo Chǔ (宝杵 lit. "Treasure Pestle") on its back. It absorbs electricity from its surroundings and causes blackouts.

attacks.name: Positron Pulse (Púyaváha)
attacks.description: Unleashes an intense lightning strike from the Bǎo Chǔ.

Sirenmon.name: Sirenmon
Sirenmon.description: Sirenmon is a Deity Digimon. It has an outward appearance like a blending of bird and fish, its personality is cheerful, and it is always singing pleasant songs throughout the skies and seas as a member of the same musical troupe as Aegiomon. Its voice has a miraculously sweet sound and actually has an eight octave range from very high notes to very low notes, and it brings tranquility even to devastated battlefields with its singing voice. It is said that by healing its listeners and performing good deeds, it will continue on to a shining digivolution. Each of its techniques has the characteristic of increasing in power if there are others singing alongside Sirenmon, corresponding to their quantity. Even the weak gain great power by singing in chorus with Sirenmon.

attacks.name: Symphony No.1<Polyphony> (第一曲≪ポリフォニー≫, Dai'ikkyoku (Polyphony), Dai'ikkyoku (Porifonī)) lit. "No.1 (Polyphony)")
attacks.description: Sings a song in a high soprano, whose notes suffuse the listener's heart and numb their free will, leaving them at Sirenmon's mercy.

attacks.name: Symphony No.2 (第二曲≪アリア≫, Dainikyoku (Aria), lit. "No.2 (Aria)")
attacks.description: Sings a solemn song in a low bass, which becomes a deep bass frequency wave that flattens the enemy through their semicircular canals, so that they are unable to even stand.

attacks.name: Symphony No.3 (第三曲≪カノン≫, Daisankyoku (Canon), Daisankyoku (Kanon)) lit. "No.3 (Canon)"
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy using its singing voice as note-shaped shots, which are said to have the marvelous trait of ricocheting to always strike their targets, even separate enemies.

Siriusmon.name: Siriusmon
Siriusmon.description: Siriusmon is a Shining Dragon Digimon. It is a Digimon belonging to the righteous order called the Virus Busters. Wielding the Sylvia, twin cannons equipped on its arms, Siriusmon crashes in like a shooting star to defeat its enemies after hearing a voice calling for help from far, far, away or sensing evil. However, Siriusmon's kind heart is such that it is willing to put its weapons down and open its heart to an opponent in the middle of battle if it senses the possibility of reforming them. In the wake of Photon Blaster, Siriusmon can use Quasar Break. Even if the Sylvia are destroyed, Siriusmon can still attack with its trump card, Planet Punch.

attacks.name: Photon Blaster
attacks.description: Uses the Sylvia to shoot rays of light.

attacks.name: Cosmic Sword (Cosmo Blade)
attacks.description: Slices its enemies in half with its sword of order.

attacks.name: Quasar Break (Break-quasar)
attacks.description: Uses a blade of starlight to pursue enemies, fusing light and blade to make its enemy violently explode. The bright white light created by this attack resembles a shooting star from a distance.

attacks.name: Planet Punch (Planet Knuckle)
attacks.description: Lands a punch powered with life force energy.

Sistermon Blanc.name: Sistermon Blanc
Sistermon Blanc.description: Sistermon Blanc is a Puppet Digimon. It is a girl-shaped Digimon that looks like it's wearing a white rabbit, and is the younger sister of Sistermon Noir and Sistermon Ciel. In contrast to its elder sister Noir, it is slightly introverted, and it almost always hides behind its elder sister. It is caring for Hackmon just like its elder sister, and also acts as its escort while accompanying Gankoomon on its journey. Although it is trying to diligently carry out Gankoomon's request and assist in training with Hackmon, it frequently ends up reining in its elder sister's violent manner. A long time ago, in its previous life, it was out on the streets with its elder sister Noir, but they were saved by Gankoomon just as they were going to collapse from exhaustion. In order to repay Gankoomon for saving it and its elder sister, it puts all of its effort into being a chaperone for Hackmon. It coordinates with Jesmon, Noir, and nearby Digimon to respond to the unusual phenomena and signs of chaos that occur all over the Digital World. The triple-pronged "Cross Barbée" lance that it carries as a weapon has both an offensive side and a defensive side.

attacks.name: Divine Pierce: Pierces the opponent with the Cross Barbée. In Digimon Story
attacks.description: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory, this attack fires a yellow beam of energy from the tip of the Cross Barbée.

attacks.name: Protect Wave
attacks.description: Generates a protective wave by stabbing the butt end of the Cross Barbée into the ground.

Sistermon Blanc (Awakened).name: Sistermon Blanc (Awakened)
Sistermon Blanc (Awakened).description: Sistermon Blanc (Awakened) is a Puppet Digimon. It is another form of Sistermon Blanc. A holy stigma appears in the center of its wimple and it awakens. Its reserved personality changes when it enters this form, dashing around the battlefield with frenzied movements obeying battle instincts laid bare. When it recovers from this state, it falls into a gentle sleep and its previous form seems like a dream.

attacks.name: Divine Pierce (Awake): Pierces the opponent with the Cross Barbée. In Digimon Story
attacks.description: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory, this attack fires a yellow beam of energy from the tip of the Cross Barbée.

attacks.name: Protect Wave (Awake)
attacks.description: Generates a protective wave by stabbing the butt end of the Cross Barbée into the ground.

Sistermon Ciel.name: Sistermon Ciel
debut: Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory
Sistermon Ciel.description: Sistermon Ciel is a Puppet Digimon. It is a Digimon wearing a veil modelled after a mouse, it is Sistermon Blanc's elder sister as well as the twin sister of Sistermon Noir. Instead of travelling together with Noir and Blanc, it roams around the Digital World investigating unusual phenomena and reports its findings to Gankoomon. Despite its gentle personality, it is strong-willed and popular with the Digimon residing in the places it visits. While it is friendly and leads a peaceful life by day, by night it turns into an assassin who hunts down any troublemakers it receives word of. It has a cherished sword named Shirotsume-Ichimonji (白詰一文字, Shirotsume-Ichimonji lit. "White Clover Line").

attacks.name: Shirotsume Ichimonji-giri (白詰一文字切り, Shirotsume Ichimonji-giri lit. "White Clover Horizontal Slash")
attacks.description: Cuts down the enemy without making a sound.

attacks.name: Byakusai (白殺, Byakusai lit. "White Murder")
attacks.description: Rapid-throws the two knives it hides within its sleeves.

attacks.name: Tohhō (突蜂, Tohhō lit. "Piercing Wasp")
attacks.description: Lures the enemy in until they let their guard down, then stabs them in their vitals at close range using the knives planted on its feet.

attacks.name: Silent Bullet
attacks.description: Unleashes the T in a silent but deadly attack.

attacks.name: Fury Fire
attacks.description: Unleashes the T in a rapid fire straight line.

attacks.name: Tekken Seisai (鉄拳制裁, Tekken Seisai lit. "Striking With Fists")
attacks.description: Strikes with all its strength at anyone and everyone who talks back to it.

Sistermon Ciel (Awakened).name: Sistermon Ciel (Awakened)
debut: Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory
Sistermon Ciel (Awakened).description: Sistermon Ciel (Awakened) is a Puppet Digimon. It is another form of Sistermon Ciel. Donning the wimple causes a holy stigma to appear on Sistermon Ciel (Awakened)’s stomach. Each swing of its beloved sword Shirotsume-Ichimonji (白詰一文字, Shirotsume-Ichimonji lit. "White Clover Line") sharpens the blade, and imbues it with light. Sistermon Ciel (Awakened) demonstrates elegant swordsmanship in concert with the brilliance of its beloved sword, engaging in a sword dance that entrances those who see it the moment light overflows from its blade. The feral power drawn out with its awakening raises its quick wits and movement and it kills the enemy with a stooped-over stance.

attacks.name: Shirotsume Ichimonji-giri (Awake) (白詰一文字切り（覚）, Shirotsume Ichimonji-giri (Awake) lit. "White Clover Horizontal Slash (Awake)")
attacks.description: Cuts down the enemy without making a sound.

attacks.name: Byakusai (Awake) (白殺（覚）, Byakusai (Awake) lit. "White Murder (Awake)")
attacks.description: Rapid-throws the two knives it hides within its sleeves.

attacks.name: Tohhō (Awake) (突蜂（覚）, Tohhō (Awake) lit. "Piercing Wasp (Awake)")
attacks.description: Lures the enemy in until they let their guard down, then stabs them in their vitals at close range using the knives planted on its feet.

attacks.name: Silent Bullet (Awake)
attacks.description: Unleashes the "T" in a silent but deadly attack.

attacks.name: Fury Fire (Awake)
attacks.description: Unleashes the "T" in a rapid fire straight line.

Sistermon Noir.name: Sistermon Noir
Sistermon Noir.description: Sistermon Noir is a Puppet Digimon. It is a nun Digimon wearing a klobuk in the shape of a black cat's head, and is the elder sister of Sistermon Blanc and twin sister of Sistermon Ciel. It breaks the ice with its extremely cheerful personality and innocent behavior. It was charged with Hackmon's care by Gankoomon, and is training Hackmon while accompanying Gankoomon on its journey. However, Sistermon Noir is working half for training, half for fun, and will point its guns and laugh, even while admitting that Hackmon is sad. Its younger sister frequently ends up reining in its violent manner. A long time ago, in its previous life, it was out on the streets with its younger sister Blanc, but they were saved by Gankoomon just as they were going to collapse from exhaustion. It coordinates with Jesmon, Blanc, and nearby Digimon to respond to the unusual phenomena and signs of chaos that occur all over the Digital World. It carries guns called "Anthony" in its hands.

attacks.name: Mickey Bullet
attacks.description: Randomly fires the Antony.

attacks.name: Bless Fire
attacks.description: Rapidly fires bullets from both Anthony in a straight line.

attacks.name: Tekken Seisai (鉄拳制裁, Tekken Seisai lit. "Striking With Fists")
attacks.description: Strikes with all its strength at anyone and everyone who talks back to it.

Sistermon Noir (Awakened).name: Sistermon Noir (Awakened)
Sistermon Noir (Awakened).description: Sistermon Noir (Awakened) is a Puppet Digimon. It is another form of Sistermon Noir. It wears a wimple on its head and a Holy Stigma appears on its chest, awakening its power. The feral power drawn out with its awakening raises its quick wits and movement, and it kills the enemy with a stooped-over stance.

attacks.name: Mickey Bullet (Awake)
attacks.description: Randomly fires the Anthony.

attacks.name: Bless Fire (Awake)
attacks.description: Rapidly fires bullets from both Anthony in a straight line.

SkullBaluchimon.name: SkullBaluchimon
SkullBaluchimon.description: SkullBaluchimon is an Undead Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. A gigantic undead digimon: constructed from the data of fossils of the largest known land animal, which seems to have been corrupted with data from other fossils. It has no emotions or intelligence, and because its body operates by reflex with only the data of the nerves laid out within its body, it keeps mercilessly attacking until it can no longer move. It is said that it will plunge any Digimon into the terror of death, either from the curse which forcibly revived it from the data of its corpse, or the cold black vapors which flow unceasingly from its DigiCore.

attacks.name: Grave Bone
attacks.description: Tramples the opponent with its gigantic feet, burying them underground.

attacks.name: Deadly Fear
attacks.description: Imprisons the opponent in the space within its cold black vapors, then chases them eternally until they die.

SkullGreymon.name: SkullGreymon

otherNames.name: 喪屍暴龍獸/丧尸暴龙兽 Sàngshī Bàolóngshòu

SkullGreymon.description: SkullGreymon is a Skeleton Digimon. It was a Digimon that put too much importance on fighting, and as a result of its combat instinct, it clung to life despite its body rotting away, its whole body becoming nothing but bones. As it doesn't have even a scrap of intelligence to balance its combat instinct, its existence is a threat to other Digimon.

attacks.name: Dark Shot (Ground Zero)
attacks.description:
Launches an organic missile from its spinal cord.
Double Dark Shot (グラウンドゼロ改, Ground Zero Kai, lit. "Ground Zero Revision")

attacks.name: Double Dark Shot (グラウンドゼロ改, Ground Zero Kai, lit. "Ground Zero Revision")
Buffalo Breathe (Curse Breath)
attacks.description: A purple breath that paralyzes an opponent.

attacks.name: Skull Destroy
attacks.description: Fires missiles.

attacks.name: Oblivion Bird
attacks.description: A barrage of organic missiles from its spine. Recent research has achieved Digivolution of the Oblivion Bird which is an improvement of these missiles including a tracking system and a better power and scope.

SkullKnightmon.name: SkullKnightmon
SkullKnightmon.description: SkullKnightmonis an Undead Digimon. It is a big brother who exchanged cups of brotherhood withAxemon. As a knight which excels in cunning, its behavior is based on its policy, "Those who are knights must fight. Even more than fighting, they must win", and generally speaking, it puts importance on the outcomes in which it wins. Moreover, it will unabashedly perform any kind of unclean act to arrive at that result. It specializes in combat which capitalizes on the size of its body, and the manner in which it dives at the opponent's chest, swinging its "Spear Needle", shows off the unthinkable actions of a knight that has forgotten its pride.

SkullKnightmon BR.name: SkullKnightmon BR

otherNames.name: スカルナイトモン（レッド） SkullKnightmon (Red)

SkullKnightmon BR.description: SkullKnightmon BR is a palette-swapped version ofSkullKnightmonwhere its black coloring is replaced with red and vice versa.

SkullKnightmon Arrow Mode.name: SkullKnightmon Arrow Mode
SkullKnightmon Arrow Mode.description: SkullKnightmon Arrow Mode consists ofSkullKnightmonwielding a bow formed fromAxemon's back legs.

SkullKnightmon Naginata Mode.name: SkullKnightmon Naginata Mode
SkullKnightmon Naginata Mode.description: SkullKnightmon Naginata Mode consists ofSkullKnightmonwielding a dual-bladed naginata formed from the blades onAxemon's back.

SkullKnightmon Cavalier Mode.name: SkullKnightmon Cavalier Mode
SkullKnightmon Cavalier Mode.description: SkullKnightmon Cavalier Mode is an Enhancement Digimon. It is the "Assault Mode" (突撃形態, Tougeki Keitai) in which SkullKnightmon is mounted on Axemon. Its main purpose is for getting close to the opponent by speeding like a bullet, defying all obstacles. After charging at the opponent with its "Kiba Braver", Axemon transforms into SkullKnightmon Mighty Axe Mode to fight joined with SkullKnightmon. If the progress of a battle becomes unfavorable it changes back into "Assault Mode" and hastily retreats from the battlefield. Axemon, who possesses limitless stamina, does not tire, so it can repeat this process without accident, and for a short while Axemon's way of fighting is more feared on the battlefield than SkullKnightmon's.

attacks.name: Cavalier Braver (キバブレイバー, Kiba Braver)
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent apart as it charges at them.

SkullKnightmon Mighty Axe Mode.name: SkullKnightmon Mighty Axe Mode
SkullKnightmon Mighty Axe Mode.description: SkullKnightmon Mighty Axe Mode is an Enhancement Digimon. It is Axemon's "Pulverization-armament Mode" (粉砕戦集形態, Funsaisenshū Keitai), which exploits its sturdy body to be transformed into a weapon, the "Mighty axe". That battleaxe, larger than an ordinary Digimon's body, exhibits more than enough weight and stiffness to pulverize everything. It can not only be wielded by SkullKnightmon, but can also attack autonomously as a living weapon, displaying its well-coordinated combination.

attacks.name: Axe Rider
attacks.description: Charges with the Mighty axe held forward.

attacks.name: Storm Axe
attacks.description: Swings the Mighty axe too quickly to catch with the eyes.

SkullKnightmon (White).name: SkullKnightmon (White)
debut: Digimon Xros Wars (manga), "Xros Songs!! To All Youths Who Chase their Dreams!!" [21]

SkullMammothmon.name: SkullMammothmon
SkullMammothmon.description: SkullMammothmon is a Ghost Digimon. It was a Mammothmon, revived from an ancient glacier, that continued to battle with Virus-species Digimon. As a result, its whole body was eaten away by a virus, and became nothing but bones. Despite dying, its survival instinct as a Vaccine was strong, and so in order to continue battling, it exterminated the virus. However, it unexpectedly lost all of its emotions and intelligence beyond destroying Viruses. Even though its body has become nothing but bones, it continues to battle in safety because the DigiCore shining within its chest is undamaged. However, if that bare DigiCore, thought to be its weak point, was struck, it would immediately be unable to maintain its vital functions.

attacks.name: Spiral Bone Crusher (Spiral Bone)
attacks.description: Rapidly spins and then hurls one of its vertebra.

attacks.name: Grand Charge (Gran Charge)
attacks.description: Charges at an opponent with its huge body.

SkullMammothmon X.name: SkullMammothmon X
SkullMammothmon X.description: SkullMammothmon X is an Undead Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It continues to battle despite turning to bones, and all that remains is that it is truly dead, but only its skeleton started to grow due to the effects of the X-Antibody. It completely stands up on its two feet, and its forelimbs have changed to being claw-shaped and tear up the enemy. Its skull developed abnormally and turned into gigantic horns, becoming a powerful weapon that inflicts heavy damage to the enemy when it charges at them.

attacks.name: Spiral Bone
attacks.description: Rapidly spins and then hurls one of its vertebra.

attacks.name: Gran Charge
attacks.description: Charges at an opponent with its huge body.

attacks.name: Giant Crush Bone
attacks.description: Rapidly spins the gigantic horns on its skull and charges, smashing the enemy to pieces.

SkullMeramon.name: SkullMeramon
SkullMeramon.description: SkullMeramon is a Flame Digimon. A Digivolution of Meramon, its body is surrounded by intensely hot flames. Because the heat of its flames is more intense than Meramon's, the licking flames have taken a blue color. Both its attack and defense strength are improved and with the intense destructive force of its flames, it is a tough Digimon. Fire Digimon are weak to water and ice, but in the face of its flames, water and ice just evaporate.

attacks.name: Metal Fireball (Heavy Metal Fire)
attacks.description: Launches a destructive ball of melted metal from its mouth. Alternatively, it fires blue fire mixed with liquid metal so that it clings to an opponent.

attacks.name: Chain of Pain (Heat Chain)
attacks.description: Uses one of the chains on its body as a whip.

attacks.name: Blazing Iron Whip (ヒートチェーン乱れうち, Heat Chain Midareuchi, lit. "Heat Chain Flailing")
attacks.description: Uses many chains as whips.

SkullSatamon.name: SkullSatamon
SkullSatamon.description: SkullSatamon is an Undead Digimon. Pursuing strength and destruction, it fell to the Dark Area as a Fallen Angel Digimon with its appearance a ruin of what it once was. However, its wickedness was refined even more, so that its dark powers are unfathomable. Its DigiCore, concentrated with mighty powers of darkness, is the characteristic of Demon-species Digimon called the "Dark Core".

attacks.name: Nail Bone
attacks.description: Fires a powerful light from the jewel at the end of its staff, disrupting and obliterating the opponent's data.

SkullScorpionmon.name: SkullScorpionmon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Binbin Takaoka(Xros Wars, Commander),Kenji Akabane(Xros Wars, Scorpiomon 1)
SkullScorpionmon.description: SkullScorpionmonis an Insect Digimon. SkullScorpionmon is referred to as the "Assassin of the Desert". It sneaks up from behind the opponent while hiding its presence, and pierces the opponent with the venomous stinger at the tip of its tail. The venom that SkullScorpionmon carries acts faster than the transmission speed of nerve data, killing the opponent before they even realize that they have been stung. It is referred to as an assassin for this reason, since its opponent will not even know of its existence.

attacks.name: Pinch of Pain (Poison Pierce)
attacks.description: Attacks with the venomous stinger on its tail tip.

attacks.name: Black Out
attacks.description: Blinds the opponent by spraying a slightly poisonous mist. Through this technique, it ensures that the opponent will never lay eyes on it.

title: Assassin of the Desert
(砂漠の暗殺者
Assassin of the Desert?)

Slayerdramon.name: Slayerdramon
Slayerdramon.description: Slayerdramon is a Dragon Man Digimon. Its body is clad in Chrome Digizoid scale armour, and it is said that its form is one that can only be attained by those who complete the training that is called the "Trial of the Four Great Dragons", which can only be challenged by Dragon Digimon. It carries the extensible greatsword "Fragarach", and has mastered its original ultimate fencing technique, "Ryuzanken" (竜斬剣, Ryūzanken, lit. "Dragon Slashing Sword"). There are three forms within Ryuzanken, from the first to the third.

attacks.name: Tenryu Slash (天竜斬破, Tenryūzanha, lit. "Heavenly Dragon Slash Ripper")
attacks.description: Accelerates Fragarach with a spin of its body, and then drives it vertically through the opponent's skull, cutting them in half. This is the first form of Ryūzanken.

attacks.name: Shoryu Slash (昇竜斬波, Shouryūzanpa, lit. "Rising Dragon Slash Wave")
attacks.description: Refines a dragon wave with Fragarach, and then releases it pointing upward, slaying the opponent from the sword's pressure alone. This is the second form of Ryūzanken.

attacks.name: Koryu Slash (咬竜斬刃, Kouryūzanba, lit. "Biting Dragon Slash Blade")
attacks.description: Steps in close to the opponent, and then curls Fragarach around them, shaving off their whole body with the entwined sword. This is the third form of Ryūzanken.

title: Master of "Ryūzanken"
(「竜斬剣」の使い手
"Ryūzanken" no Tsukaite?)

SlashAngemon.name: SlashAngemon
