SlashAngemon.description: SlashAngemon is an Authority Digimon. It commands the Angel Army and cuts through the vanguard in battle. As it persists in justice, it does not fear death. Along with the blades of its metal wings and hands, its entire body has gained a razor-sharp appearance, and it is surely an Angel Warrior created in order to battle wicked beings.

attacks.name: Blade of the True (Holy Espada, Esp: Holy Sword)
attacks.description: Slashes with a cross-shaped energy blast.

attacks.name: Golden Ripper (Heaven's Ripper)
attacks.description: Charges at the opponent with staggering momentum, cutting them to pieces with the blades covering its body.

Snatchmon.name: Snatchmon
Snatchmon.description: Snatchmon is an Unknown Digimon. After multiple Vemmon have grown strong and started cannibalizing each other, the Vemmon left standing becomes Snatchmon. The master directive written into their code drives them, but it is said some Snatchmon become self-aware and come to desire greater strength for themselves, aiming to become the most powerful by preying upon their enemies.

attacks.name: Ruin Laser
attacks.description: An attack launched from the back of its arms.

attacks.name: Tooth Spear
attacks.description: A slashing technique using the tips of its tails.

attacks.name: Fusionize
attacks.description: Feeds upon defeated opponents.

Snimon.name: Snimon
Snimon.description: Snimon is an Insectoid Digimon. Snimon is an experimental Digimon that was created at a research facility as a Virus Hunter. It was created from the data of praying mantises, and it tracks its target down as if it were a precise machine. Due to its unfeeling personality, it is feared by both Vaccine and Data-attribute Digimon. The sickles on both of its arms are honed to their sharpest, becoming possible for it to cleanly slice through anything. Although Snimon is a Digimon that doesn't have any eyes, the red antennae growing from its head have become sensors, and are able to accurately pinpoint the target's location.

attacks.name: Twin Sickles (Shadow Sickle)
attacks.description: Launches two pink crescent beams from its sickles.

attacks.name: Ultimate Twin Sickles
attacks.description: A more powerful version of Twin Sickles with four pink crescent beams.

attacks.name: Slamming Attack (たいあたり, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Blow")
attacks.description: Rams his opponents with his whole body.

attacks.name: Green Sickle Cut
attacks.description: Cuts the enemy horizontally.

attacks.name: Shadow Slash
attacks.description: Slashes with lightning speed.

SnowAgumon.name: SnowAgumon
SnowAgumon.description: SnowAgumonis a Reptile Digimon. It is a separate species ofAgumonthat inhabits snowy fields. Due to the mischievousness it inherited from Agumon, it is always happily excited like a child when it snows. Because the color of its body is identical to that of snow, in battle, it is able to approach the enemy to attack without being exposed.

attacks.name: Little Blizzard
attacks.description: Spews a tiny snowstorm out of its mouth.

attacks.name: Freeze Beam (アイスカムカム, Ice Kamukamu, lit. "Ice Bite")
attacks.description: Bites enemies with freezing fangs.

attacks.name: Hail Storm (White Hail)
attacks.description: Summons hail to batter enemies.

attacks.name: Frozen Wind (凍てつく風, Iketsuku Kaze)
attacks.description: Blows a frozen wind.

attacks.name: Snow Claw
attacks.description: Slashes with lightning speed.

SnowAgumon (2006 anime).name: SnowAgumon (2006 anime)
SnowAgumon (2006 anime).description: SnowAgumon (2006 anime) is a Dinosaur Digimon. It is a type of Agumon that lives in cold climates. It blends with the snow to attack its enemies by surprise.

attacks.name: Sharp Claw (するどいツメ, Surudoi Tsume)
attacks.description: Scratches using sharp claws.

attacks.name: Ice Shot (アイスカムカム, Ice Kamukamu, lit. "Ice Bite")
attacks.description: Shoots a ball of ice from its mouth.

attacks.name: Baby Breath
attacks.description: Emits a small blast from its mouth.

attacks.name: Little Blizzard
attacks.description: Blows out a flurry of snow from its mouth.

SnowGoblimon.name: SnowGoblimon
SnowGoblimon.description: SnowGoblimon is an Evil Digimon. It is a Goblimon that was brought up in a cold country of snow. Its warm hat and vest protect it from the cold, such that it is not bothered by it in the least. The skin on the soles of its feet have thickened to allow it to walk barefooted on snow.

attacks.name: Bolt Strike (SnowGob Bolt)
attacks.description: It uses snowballs with stones embedded in them, and with its ogre-like strength strikes the enemy with 1000 knocks.

attacks.name: Freezing Gobu Breath (SnowGob Breath)
attacks.description: Breathes out freezing cold air to encase the foe in ice.

attacks.name: Snow Gobu Mace (スノーゴブこん棒, SnowGob Club)
attacks.description: Hits the foe with his club.

attacks.name: Snow Claw
attacks.description: Slashes with lightning speed.

Solarmon.name: Solarmon
Solarmon.description: Solarmon is a Machine Digimon. It is a Digimon that appears to be a rare species of Machine-species Digimon. Among researchers, it is said to possibly be a mutation of Hagurumon, but the truth is a mystery. Due to its "Computer Kernel" generating heat, its body has become hot enough to cause burns.

attacks.name: Solar Flare (Shiny Ring)
attacks.description: Fires a burning gear and scorches the enemy.

attacks.name: Soul Shocker (Sol Calor)
attacks.description: Unleashes the heat of the sun.

attacks.name: Little Burn
attacks.description: Explodes in a blaze of fire.

attacks.name: Shiny Attack
attacks.description: Tackles the enemy.

attacks.name: Shine Ball
attacks.description: Fires a small ball of flame.

attacks.name: Shiny Tackle
attacks.description: A flaming tackle.

attacks.name: Machine Attack (Kikai Attack)
attacks.description: Inflicts a hard blow full of machine power.

Sorcermon.name: Sorcermon
Sorcermon.description: Sorcermon is a Demon Man Digimon. It has a form very similar to Wizardmon. It is dressed in white clothes, and exudes a magical aura. Through offering prayer, it is able to harbor holy power in its body and heal wounds. It is a comrade of Wizardmon that came from the other-dimensional Digital World, Witchelny. It controls light and ice magic (high-level programing languages).

attacks.name: Crystal Barrage (Crystal Cloud)
attacks.description: Fires multiple ice creations from its staff.

attacks.name: Drowning Aquarius (Aquarius Fill)
attacks.description: Drowns foe in stream of water.

attacks.name: Ice Illusion
attacks.description: Entraps enemy in a freezing snowstorm.

attacks.name: Meteor Squall
attacks.description: Summons meteors of fire and attacks.

Soulmon.name: Soulmon
Soulmon.description: Soulmon is a Ghost Digimon. A Ghost Digimon constructed from a cursed virus program. As it was a Bakemon that took in data of mages that appear in fantasy stories, the black hat it wears raises its magical power. Because of that, its attacks that make use of curses or magic are tremendously powerful.

attacks.name: Dark Claw (Death Charm)
attacks.description: Pulls the captured enemy all the way to hell.

attacks.name: Necro Magic
attacks.description: Throw the souls of the dead at the enemy.

attacks.name: Finishing Trance (End Trance)
attacks.description: Drops a huge skull on the enemy.

attacks.name: Energy Drain
attacks.description: Uses strange powers to drain the enemy's energy.

attacks.name: Ghost Chop
attacks.description: Attacks using small chops.

Soundbirdmon.name: Soundbirdmon
Soundbirdmon.description: Soundbirdmon is an Avian Digimon. It is characterized by its speaker built-in wings. It is very cautious and usually keeps quiet, but when a suspicious Digimon draws near, it drives them away by crying at high volume.

attacks.name: Soundfinish
attacks.description: Emits ultrasonic waves to immobilize the enemy.

attacks.name: Giga Scream
attacks.description: Sings at full volume, sending out a shock wave.

Spadamon.name: Spadamon
Spadamon.description: Spadamon is a Weapon Digimon. One of the legendary "Legend-Arms" who, according to legend, "if held by an angel will save the world, and if held by a demon will destroy the world", it is a Weapon Digimon that transforms itself into a weapon. Although its personality is earnest and serious, it has a side that is weak to pressure. Its combat abilities are low, but it shows its true merit once it becomes a weapon. It is the last, and the strongest, of the Legend-Arms in the LS-tou Zone. Since the LS-tou Zone kept being exposed to aggression from invaders, Spadamon was used as a trump card to pull them back from the edge of defeat, and it was released in a different Zone once its abilities were sealed along with its memories by its Legend-Arms comrades... it seems. Because its memories surrounding the seal have also vanished, it does not remember the exact details of where its memories are hidden and how to recover its abilities. After Spadamon escaped, the Zone was occupied by the invading army, and all of the Legend-Arms but Spadamon were defeated and went into stasis. Spadamon, who returned to the LS-tou Zone secretly, cannot currently remember how to recover its own true strength, but will fight against the invading force. Although its personality is to be earnest and serious, it is weak to pressure and ad-libbing due to its obsessive type. It is extremely fond of sweets, and has an obsessive level of belief in "replenishing sugar for fatigue."

attacks.name: Blade Blender (Blue Brave)
attacks.description: Slices cleanly with its blade shining blue.

Sparrowmon.name: Sparrowmon
Sparrowmon.description: Sparrowmon is a Bird Digimon. It specializes in aerial battles and soars soundlessly at Mach speed. It is effective not only at speed but also at tight turns, and possesses the maneuverability to easily pull off a sudden turn. It is fundamentally someone that easily gets carried away due to its moodiness. Because the quality of its flying varies depending on how it feels at the moment, you can immediately tell whether its mood is good or bad, from whether it looks like it is flying well or badly. If it is performing highly difficult aerial acrobatics without even being asked, you can take it as being unmistakable proof that it is in high spirits. Sparrowmon's many extraordinary feats, too quick to catch with the eyes, are things that thoroughly capitalize on that maneuverability. The guns it holds in its hands are a set of twin pistols named "Zanahoria" (Esp: Carrot), made by Vulcanusmon, who produced their sister-gun, the "Berenjena" (Esp: Eggplant) possessed by Beelzemon.

attacks.name: Crash Boom
attacks.description: Slams into the foe with such speed that it appears to split into four.

attacks.name: Wingtip Laser (Wing Edge)
attacks.description: Slices the opponent with its wings as it passes through them, while continuously altering its trajectory at high speeds. This technique owes everything to high-altitude technical flying.

attacks.name: Lightning Lasers (Random Laser)
attacks.description: Fires the Zanahoria while flailing its arms wildly.

Sparrowmon After Burner.name: Sparrowmon After Burner
Sparrowmon After Burner.description: Sparrowmon After Burner looks similar to the baseSparrowmonexcept for the addition ofBallistamonas large jet engines.

Spinomon.name: Spinomon
Spinomon.description: Spinomon is a Dinosaur Digimon. It inhabits the green depths of the jungle. It boasts the greatest and strongest powers among the Dinosaur Digimon inhabiting the Digital World, and it is said that it possesses strength equal to that of Dinorexmon. Due to its extreme belligerence, it leads a highly brutal existence, but the latest research has made it clear that it possesses astonishing intelligence. The blades on its back have become its greatest feature, and since they possess excellent defensive and offensive power, if it suffers a direct attack, the attacker is forced to suffer nearly fatal wounds. It can also shoot off the blades on its back, and since they keep growing back in an inexhaustible supply, don't count on it running out.

attacks.name: Sonic Slash Rain
attacks.description: Shoots off the blades on its back all at once.

attacks.name: Blue Prominence
attacks.description: Converts the metal accumulated within its body into plasma by superheating it up to 15000°, then fires it off.

Splashmon.name: Splashmon
Splashmon.description: Splashmonis an Aquatic Beast Man Digimon. It is the general of the Water-tiger Army of the "Big Death-Stars". By changing itself into a liquid and moving from liquid to liquid, it is able to take the shape of a human or Digimon at will. For this reason, spying is its specialty, and it puts all the information it acquired together, then relays it to its Cyborg Digimon to implement its strategies. No matter the tactics, it always puts being beautiful as its top priority, and its personality is such that it will reject tactics that sully its own beauty. Although it leads an army, its faith is only in its own beauty, so it doesn't have even an iota of anything like mutual trust, even for the Digimon in its army. Furthermore, it possesses techniques that can cause abnormal conditions.

attacks.name: Poisonous Force
attacks.description: Fires an army of Splashers that paralyze the enemy force's chain of command and cause the battlefield to fall into chaos.

attacks.name: Hydro-Pressure
attacks.description: Shoots water of high pressure and speed from its fingertips.

attacks.name: Bubble Head (Bead-drown)
attacks.description: Instantly gathers trace elements and converts them to liquid around the opponent's head.

Splashmon Darkness Mode 1.name: Splashmon Darkness Mode 1
Splashmon Darkness Mode 1.description: Splashmon Darkness Mode 1 is a Digimon. It is an enlarged version of Splashmon after it digifuses its Splashers to itself. The Water Tiger General's Slippery Trap!

attacks.name: Hydro-Pressure
attacks.description: Shoots water of high pressure and speed from its fingertips.

Splashmon Darkness Mode 2.name: Splashmon Darkness Mode 2
Splashmon Darkness Mode 2.description: Splashmon Darkness Mode 2 is a Digimon. When Splashmon gets wounded and is driven into a corner, it unzips the chucks all over its body and reveals its true form lying within. Those who saw this form, let alone the one who wounded it, are driven to death with its "Tiger Typhoon". However, because its true form is, against its will, simply hideous, it absolutely hates exposing this form.

attacks.name: Tiger Typhoon
attacks.description: Smashes and drowns all of its opponents by generating a massive flood that consumes everything without leaving any refuge.

attacks.name: Bubble Head (Bead-drown)
attacks.description: Instantly gathers trace elements and converts them to liquid around the opponent's head.

Starmon.name: Starmon
Starmon.description: Starmonis a Mutant Digimon. Starmon was discovered in a planet analysis software at a space development center. This space warrior dons a star-shaped armor suit, and star-marked gloves and boots. It tattered yellow scarf tells of a Starmon's combat experience. Its eyes burn with a fighting spirit and can convey this to opponents without a word. It can even use this ability to hypnotize its foes. This hot-blooded Digimon idolizes the braveLeomon.

attacks.name: Meteor Shower (Meteor Squall)
attacks.description: Rains down small comets on top of the enemy.

attacks.name: Hypnosis (さいみんじゅつ, Saiminjutsu)
attacks.description: Puts the enemy to sleep using a strange radio wave.

attacks.name: Star Upper
attacks.description: Attacks with an uppercut.

attacks.name: Ring Laser
attacks.description: Fires a ring shaped laser.

attacks.name: Cat's Eye Hypnotism
attacks.description: Manipulates the opponent with a piercing glare, causing the opponent to attack themselves.

Starmon (2010 anime).name: Starmon (2010 anime)
Starmon (2010 anime).description: Starmon (2010 anime) is a Major Digimon. The "Starmons" are composed of a corps of several Pickmon with a Starmon at their heart. The will of the corps is at the discretion of Starmon, the Head of the corps, and the Head's decisions are briskly and unconditionally followed by the Pickmon, keeping them from falling out of line as they maneuver according to Starmon's directions. There is definitely a strict hierarchy, and the complex maneuvers that are demanded by Starmon are demonstrated by the Pickmon, such as the corps techniques named "Meteor Squall" and "Wish Upon A Star". As Starmon has a cheerful, showy personality, it is an extreme optimist. Basically, it never gets depressed, and if it even seems depressed it seems to only be thinking things like, "I may be down, but don't I look good?" Because of that, even though it is taken lightly by other Digimon, it certainly doesn't worry about itself at all.

attacks.name: Rock 'n' Rolling
attacks.description: Throws itself forward while spinning

attacks.name: Star Storm (Wish Upon a Star)
attacks.description: Demonstrates a complex maneuver in which it releases a multitude of miniature stars.

Starmon X.name: Starmon X
Starmon X.description: Starmon is a Mutant Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its passionate fighting spirit overflows even more, and its star-shaped armor suit has powered up. The translucent star at the center of its body is Starmon X's custom-made "tinted glasses", and it seems to be aware that it is a space warrior and a star, so it always wears them when making an entrance. Furthermore, it often removes them during battle.

attacks.name: Meteor Shower (Meteor Squall)
attacks.description: Causes small meteors to rain down on the enemy.

attacks.name: Meteor Champion
attacks.description: This attack has doubled Starmon X's power to manipulate the stars and causes the most destructive meteors to fall down on the enemy with pinpoint accuracy.

Stefilmon.name: Stefilmon
Stefilmon.description: Stefilmon is a Beast Man Digimon. Even among Filmon, only a small fraction of those who have tempered their quills to the extreme can achieve digivolution into this Ultimate level Digimon. The fur covering its entire body is said to possess hardness rivalling that of Red Digizoid, acting not only as a shield that protects its body from harm, but also as a weapon that boasts unparalleled offensive power. The "Hurricane Knuckles" it wields in both hands are its prided weapons, made from compressing its own shed fur to high density. It views WereGarurumon as a rival and dreams of the day that it can face WereGarurumon in battle, and so it trains diligently every day in preparation.

attacks.name: Giga Crimson Dive
attacks.description: Charges forth whilst doing a high-speed drillspin, cleaving the opponent to bits with its bristled fur and Hurricane Knuckles.

attacks.name: Vermilion Vortex
attacks.description: Causes red, drill-shaped spears to protrude from all over its body, annihilating multiple enemies in one go.

Stegomon.name: Stegomon
Stegomon.description: Stegomon is a Dinosaur Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Friendship". It has countless blades on its back. These blades are for performing counterattacks while at the same time for defending itself from the enemy's attacks, and are able to move in the desired direction at Stegomon's volition. Also, it sometimes performs attacks with the spikes on its tail, but it basically gets attacked by the enemy, and it is said that it mostly repels them with its blades.

attacks.name: Shell Needle Rain
attacks.description: Fires off the numerous spikes on his back.

attacks.name: Guillotine Wheel
attacks.description: Spins by turning into a living saw and slicing with his row of spikes.

Stingmon.name: Stingmon
Stingmon.description: Stingmon is an Insectoid Digimon. It is an extremely unusual Insectoid Digimon which possesses a humanoid shape. It possesses nimble movements and the tough exoskeleton characteristic to Insectoid Digimon. It excels in its abilities as an assassin, aiming at the opponent's vitals by accurately and keenly discerning the way they carry their body, and specializes in attacks that silence the opponent with a single blow. It is highly intelligent due to its extreme composure, and is the owner of a cool disposition. It wields the "Spikes" on both of its arms.

attacks.name: Spiking Strike (Spiking Finish)
attacks.description: Skewers the opponent with the Spikes on its arms.

attacks.name: Spinning Spiking Strike (Hell Squeeze)
attacks.description: Uses quick kicks to surround the enemy with blades made from wind.

attacks.name: Moon Shooter
attacks.description: Fires a huge needle.

attacks.name: Multi-Moon Shooter (Moon Moon Shooter)
attacks.description: Fires multiple huge needles.

attacks.name: Evil Antenna
attacks.description: Uses its antennae to absorb the enemy's energy.

attacks.name: Assassin's Dance
attacks.description: A combination of slashes with the needles on its arms.

attacks.name: Sharp Fang
attacks.description: Crushes the enemy between the claws of both hands

attacks.name: Sharp Kick
attacks.description: Hits the enemy with a powerful flying kick.

Stingmon (Data).name: Stingmon (Data)
Stingmon (Data).description: Stingmon (Data)is an Insect Digimon. This nimble sky assassin is protected by its super-hard body!

Strabimon.name: Strabimon
Strabimon.description: Strabimon is a Wizard Digimon. It was transformed into a half-beast, half-man form when Lobomon's power was halved. Because it has not lost its "Combat Instinct", unlike the similar half-beast, half-man Flamemon, it has a ferocious side. For that reason, although it has the appearance of a Rookie Digimon, it will sometimes rampage enough to be out of control even for the typical Champion. As with Flamemon, although its power was decreased, it seems that Champion-class Digimon aren't a match for it.

attacks.name: Darkness Hand (Licht Nagel, Deu: Light Nail)
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with the shining claws on its hands.

attacks.name: Licht Bein (Deu
attacks.description: Light Leg)

Strikedramon.name: Strikedramon
Strikedramon.description: Strikedramon is a Dragon Man Digimon. It is the "Commando Dragon" that aims to be a Virus Buster. Although there are many of its parts that are left-behind traces of Monodramon, like the horn extending behind it, because it transformed into the Commander Mode covered in Metal Plate, it can even be seen as a wholly different species. Although it is naturally a kindhearted Digimon since it is part of the Vaccine-species just like Angemon, once it discovers a Virus-species, it becomes possessed by the extermination instinct (destruction instinct?), and it won't try to stop fighting until it has reduced the opponent to trash data. It is also said that, at that time, its red hair will burst into scorching flames, and will become bluish-white hair of flames.

attacks.name: Strike Fang
attacks.description: Causes all of the portions of its Metal Plate to burn red hot so that its whole body becomes a mass of flames, then rams the opponent.

attacks.name: Strike Claw
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent with sharp claws.

title: Commando Dragon
(コマンドドラゴン
Komando Doragon?)

Submarimon.name: Submarimon
Submarimon.description: Submarimonis an Aquatic Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Reliability". It swims freely around the ocean, and the techniques unleashed in underwater battles are no match for it unless they're also from a considerably Aquatic Digimon.

attacks.name: Oxygen Torpedo (Oxygen Homing)
attacks.description: Discharges super-compressed oxygen.

attacks.name: Submarine Attack
attacks.description: Assumes a distance while underwater, then instantly accelerates and performs a ramming attack while spinning the drill on its snout. In Digimon ReArise this attack can be used on land.

attacks.name: Submarine Attack (Aqua Vulcan)
attacks.description: Fires water beams at the opponent from its drill.

title: Reliable Guardian of the Seas
(渦巻く誠実
Uzumaku Seijitsu?
lit. "Whirling Honesty")

Suijinmon.name: Suijinmon
Suijinmon.description: Suijinmon is a Machine Digimon. It is a Digimon that possesses parts from both Justimon and Machinedramon. While the reason why these parts are being used is unknown, there is no doubt that it has great combat strength. It can part oceans and smash cliffs. It is the ultimate commander of waterfalls.

attacks.name: Infinity Cannon (Mugen Cannon)
attacks.description: Releases an energy blast from the Psycho Blasters.

attacks.name: Accel Arm
attacks.description: Uses its twin power-type "Big Wave Arm" to smash its foes in its hands.

title: Waterfall Commander

Sukamon.name: Sukamon
Sukamon.description: Sukamon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a repulsive, poop-shaped Digimon that shines golden. It was born from the accumulation and mutation of scrap data thrown into the recycle bin of a computer desktop. It likes dark places, and being a pile of scrap data, it is similar to Numemon in that it is often hated by other Digimon. Its intelligence and offensive ability are nonexistent. Its partner, Chuumon, is a small rat-like Digimon who does not fight, but is unparalleled when it comes to cunning and is always coaxing Sukamon into performing bad deeds. It has forged a strong friendship with Chuumon (that said, it might be only Chuumon that thinks this?), after a past incident where Chuumon was caught in a Carnivore system trap placed on the Network, and was saved by Sukamon who just happened to be passing by.

attacks.name: Poop Punch (ウンチ投げ, Unchi Nage, lit. "Poop Throw")
attacks.description: Throws several sludge bombs at opponents.

attacks.name: Party Time (ウンチ, Unchi, lit. "Poop")
attacks.description: Throws its own poop in order to defend itself against intruders.

attacks.name: Dappun Pheromone (脱糞フェロモン, Dappun Feromon, lit. "Defecation Pheromone")
attacks.description: Releases a pheromone that affects the opponent's bowels.

attacks.name: Quick Poop Shot (高速ウンチ投げ, Kousoku Unchi Nage, lit. "High Speed Poop Throw")

Poop Blast (ウンチパラダイス, Unchi Paradise) lit. "Poop Paradise"
Kūchū Unchi Paradise (空中ウンチパラダイス, Kūchū Unchi Paradise lit. "Aerial Poop Paradise")
Kūchū Unchi Paradise (空中ウンチパラダイス, Kūchū Unchi Paradise lit. "Aerial Poop Paradise")

Unchi Slider (ウンチスライダー, Unchi Slider lit. "Poop Slider")
Kūchū Unchi Slider (空中ウンチスライダー, Kūchū Unchi Slider lit. "Aerial Poop Slider")
Dash Unchi Slider (ダッシュウンチスライダー, Dash Unchi Slider lit. "Dash Poop Slider")
Kūchū Unchi Slider (空中ウンチスライダー, Kūchū Unchi Slider lit. "Aerial Poop Slider")
Dash Unchi Slider (ダッシュウンチスライダー, Dash Unchi Slider lit. "Dash Poop Slider")
Scar Nail
attacks.description: Slashes with dirty filthy claws.

Sunarizamon.name: Sunarizamon

otherNames.name: 沙蜥蜴獸 saa sik jik sau

Sunarizamon.description: Sunarizamonis a Reptile Digimon. It mainly acts in groups while camouflaging itself in desert areas. By regulating the volume of sand that composes its body, it is able to expand, contract, and transform its limbs and tail. It is difficult to identify its figure once it has blended in with the desert, and it is not unusual to think that there might be quicksand, but it ends up being a large group of Sunarizamon instead.

attacks.name: Grit Claw (Grit Nail)
attacks.description: Defends itself from intruders by transforming its forelimbs to being claw-shaped and scratches with them.

attacks.name: Sand Blast
attacks.description: Shaves off the enemy's body with sand that it spits out aggressively.

Sunflowmon.name: Sunflowmon
Sunflowmon.description: Sunflowmon is a Plant Digimon. If it bathes in the sun's light, it becomes very energetic, and even its offensive power rises. On days when the weather is good, it will also flap the leaves on its back to fly around. Furthermore, its smile is feared for its eeriness.

attacks.name: Sunshine Beam
attacks.description: Fires rays of sunlight from all of its petals.

attacks.name: Smiley Slap
attacks.description: Slaps the opponent in their face with a smile on its face.

attacks.name: Cactus Tail
attacks.description: Waves its tail-like stalk, firing off its thorns.

attacks.name: Sunshine Gun
attacks.description: Fires seeds with force.

attacks.name: Sunshine Bazooka
attacks.description: Fires seeds with even greater force.

attacks.name: Sunshine Explosion
attacks.description: Fires countless rays of sunlight from its corolla.

Sunmon.name: Sunmon
Sunmon.description: Sunmon is a Digimon. Its body has taken on the form of the Sun, and its head is like a flame. It has a bright personality and floats around in the air.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

attacks.name: Starlight
attacks.description: Uses energy from the stars against the opponent.

SuperDarkKnightmon.name: SuperDarkKnightmon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Disaster in the Dust Zone!" [21]
SuperDarkKnightmon.description: AxeKnightmon's cape turns into demon wings, while its weapons are enhanced: its Shoulder Blade is enlarged, with SkullSatamon's ribs as accents, and the Twin Lance is turned into a jousting lance featuring the skull and bones of SkullGreymon.

SuperStarmon.name: SuperStarmon
SuperStarmon.description: SuperStarmon is a Mutant Digimon. It is the ultimate form of the space warrior, Starmon. It has dressed up in flashy clothes of its own choice and made its debut as a true star. Because of its super stardom, it wears sunglasses to hide its identity, but they don't really work... It is referred to as a legend in its own time.

attacks.name: Halley's Squall (Halley Squall)
attacks.description: Numerous meteorites fall onto the heads of its enemies.

attacks.name: Galactic Eyes (Galactica Eyes)
attacks.description: Hypnotizes the opponent.

attacks.name: Super Upper
attacks.description: Attacks with an uppercut.

attacks.name: Superstar Upper
attacks.description: A stronger uppercut attack.

Surfimon.name: Surfimon
Surfimon.description: Surfimon is a Cyborg Digimon. Although it is an aquatic Digimon, it has been enhanced to allow for quick movement even outside of water. It has the personality of a lone wolf, and dislikes schooling like fish due to its great pride.

attacks.name: Barrier Blade
attacks.description: Rotates the spikes growing over its body like that of a chainsaw while attacking and defending.

attacks.name: Lightning Cutter
attacks.description: Accelerates to lightspeed and charges with the "Dash Slider" hovering board that materializes from the third eye on its head.

Susanoomon.name: Susanoomon
partners: Takuya Kanbara,Koji Minamoto,Zoe Orimoto,J.P. Shibayama, andTommy Himi
Susanoomon.description: Susanoomon is a Deity Digimon. Told of in Oriental legends, it is the strongest destructive god and the god which governs over regeneration. It is told that when the Network System descends into chaos, it will erase the existing system, and create a new one. It wields the "ZERO-ARMS: Orochi", which emanates a gigantic sword of light.

attacks.name: Celestial Blade (天羽々斬, Ama-no-Habakiri, lit. "Slash of Heavenly Wings"): Slices and stabs everything in the world with the ZERO-ARMS
attacks.description: Orochi.

attacks.name: Heaven's Thunder (八雷神, Yakusa-no-Ikadzuchi, lit. "Eight Thunder Gods"): Points the ZERO-ARMS
attacks.description: Orochi at the heavens, which then rain incessant bolts of lightning upon the ground. Its power is rivaled by "Plasma Crack".

attacks.name: ZERO-ARMS
attacks.description: Orochi

title: Ultimate War God
(究極武神
Kyūkyoku bushin?)

Swanmon.name: Swanmon
Swanmon.description: Swanmon is a Bird Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Love". Its entire body is white, and its figure, in which it spreads its long wings from its neck, is divine. It has a habit of preferring to live in cold regions, and it is said that when Swanmon passes through the Network, computers "Freeze". It used to be a species that acted in groups, but these days, it often acts on its own. Although the cause is unknown, it is said that a rise in atmospheric temperature within the Digital World might be the reason.

attacks.name: Down Tornado
attacks.description: Unleashes a tornado made of its feathers.

Swimmon.name: Swimmon
Swimmon.description: Swimmon is a Tropical Fish Digimon. It has a brightly colored body, and inhabits and forms schools within the warm coral reefs right below the equator. Using its large fins, it is able to fly above the ocean's surface for short periods, and the sight of a school of Swimmon elegantly flying about the surface of the ocean is counted as one of the Digital World's three most scenic views. The scales that cover the surface of its body have the special characteristic of matching their coloring to the colors of their surroundings, and in case it is attacked by a gigantic aquatic Digimon, it is capable of camouflaging itself to escape difficulty.

attacks.name: Slash Fin
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with its fins.

attacks.name: Brine Pistol
attacks.description: Fires off from its mouth the water that it inhaled through its gills.

Syakomon.name: Syakomon
Syakomon.description: Syakomon is a Crustacean Digimon. Syakomon is concealed in a sturdy shell shaped like a clam. Its shell developed rapidly, so its insides look like an in-training slime. This cunning creature entices foes with its cute face and attacks when they get close. When the shell is closed, it has enough defensive strength to easily repel light attacks.

attacks.name: Black Pearls (Black Pearl)
attacks.description: Shoots jadeite formed inside its body at enemies.

attacks.name: Water Drill (Water Screw)
attacks.description: Drills an enemy with a twisting blast of water.

attacks.name: Water Shot
attacks.description: Attacks with a bursting stream of water.

Syakomon X.name: Syakomon X
Syakomon X.description: Syakomon X is a Crustacean Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It grew its bivalve shell even more, and is equipped with underwater jet spray ports for escaping immediately after attacking an enemy that has approached it, contrary to the beautiful cherry-pink pattern on its shell. Also, even if you avoid its Special Move "Black Pearl", it will take you by surprise and fire its hidden pistol "Black Derringer", so it has started doing things that are even more cunning. It appears to have been made by gathering up junk parts from the depths of the Net Ocean, and can fire two shots of tiny hardened spheres, but they are not very powerful.

attacks.name: Black Pearl Blast (Black Pearl)
attacks.description: Shoots jadeite formed inside its body at enemies.

attacks.name: Black Derringer
attacks.description: Shoots the enemy with its hidden pistol.

SymbareAngoramon.name: SymbareAngoramon
SymbareAngoramon.description: SymbareAngoramon is a Beast Man Digimon. It is the Champion form of Angoramon. It has shed its long, shaggy coat of fur to attain greater agility. Although SymbareAngoramon has lost the defensive protection its fur provided, it is now light-footed and nimble. Striving for beauty in every single movement of its body, SymbareAngoramon resembles a dancer in battle, parrying and attacking as if locked in step with its opponent. Even when executing its techniques, SymbareAngoramon maintains a devotion to graceful elegance.

attacks.name: Jive
attacks.description: Stands on one leg to deliver a flurry of quick kicks.

attacks.name: Landlizer (Rentoraizā)
attacks.description: Spins around and slices its opponent with the sharp tips of its ears.

attacks.name: Breakin' Stream
attacks.description: Unleashes a powerful tornado from both hands.

Tactimon.name: Tactimon
Tactimon.description: Tactimon is a Demon Man Digimon. It is a soldier Digimon that possesses a peerless sword called the "Sword of Storms" (蛇鉄封神丸, Jatetsufūjin-maru, lit. "Snake Sealed by God in Iron"). Within the Sword of Storms is sealed a sinister power strong enough to split a star in two, so drawing this sword marks the collapse of a star. Therefore, Tactimon battles without drawing the sword, but even so, it exhibits the destructive force of its menace. The Sword of Storms, which conceals such tremendous power, is not a sword that just anyone can handle. From that alone can you understand the depth of Tactimon's true might. Even more than its merit as a soldier, it excels in strategy with plans which are even said to be, "ingenuity itself, as if gushing forth like a spring," so Tactimon's true merit is not in physical strength but in ingenuity. When Tactimon leads an army, the outcome has already been decided, and it is said that, "The victory has been decided before it even fought." Due to the various plans it has laid out, when Tactimon stands upon the battlefield it has already guaranteed its absolute advantage.

attacks.name: Earth Shaker (壱の太刀, Ichi-no-Tachi, lit. "First Tachi")
attacks.description: Stabs the ground once with the Sword of Storms, generating an earthquake.

attacks.name: Tectonic Tremor (弐の太刀, Ni-no-Tachi, lit. "Second Tachi")
attacks.description: Stabs the ground twice with the Sword of Storms, awakening one hundred dead warriors.

attacks.name: Earth Hammer (参の太刀, San-no-Tachi, lit. "Third Tachi")
attacks.description: Stabs the ground thrice with the Sword of Storms, collapsing the surrounding land with a shock wave.

attacks.name: San-no-Tachi Kai: Chitsuikaku (三の太刀・改・地鎚閣, San-no-Tachi Kai: Chitsuikaku lit. "Third Tachi Revision: Earth-hammering Tower")
attacks.description: Stabs the ground thrice with the Sword of Storms, exploding the surrounding land.

attacks.name: Ultimate Tactic (死の太刀, Shi-no-Tachi, lit. "Death Tachi")
attacks.description: Coalesces all of its energy into the Sword of Storms and slashes downward.

attacks.name: Go-no-Tachi: Goryounaku (悟の太刀・五稜郭, Go-no-Tachi: Goryounaku lit. "Englightenment Tachi: Five-sided Fortification")
attacks.description: Slashes with the Sword of Storms five times, generating deadly shockwaves.

attacks.name: Mu-no-Tachi: Rikudourin'ne (無の太刀・六道輪廻, Mu-no-Tachi: Rikudourin'ne lit. "Nothingness Tachi: Six-realms Saṃsāra")
attacks.description: Slashes with the Sword of Storms six times, generating a massive vortex.

attacks.name: Primary Tactic (タネガシマ, Tanegashima)
attacks.description: Flips the gun-muzzles on its back at the opponent, then fires an immense destructive blast.

attacks.name: Penetrating Blast (鬼神突, Kishintotsu, lit. "Wild God's Thrust")
attacks.description: Thrusts the Sword of Storms at the opponent with incredible force.

attacks.name: Tenshukaku (天守閣, Tenshukaku lit. "Castle Keep")
attacks.description: Thrusts the Sword of Storms into the ground, creating a small mountain range.

Tanemon.name: Tanemon
Tanemon.description: Tanemon is a Bulb Digimon. It has something that looks like a plant sprout burgeoning from its head. It is a Yuramon that wandered in search of an optimal environment, then settled to the ground and digivolved. Due to its extremely timid personality, if it senses an intruder's presence, it will burrow with the four feet at the base of its body, and completely bury its body portion under the ground. Once it is completely hidden underground, the thing growing from its head assumes the camouflage of a plant, allowing it to defend its body from intruders. However, this is ineffective against herbivorous Digimon.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Fires harmless pink bubbles.

attacks.name: Adhesive Bubble Blow (粘着性の泡, Nenchakusei no Awa, lit. "Adhesive Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits out some bubbles.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

attacks.name: Tackle
attacks.description: A powerful charge used against the opponent.

attacks.name: Dash Attack (Rush)
attacks.description: Rams into the opponent at full force.

attacks.name: Bubble Blow (Bubble Attack)
attacks.description: Shoots bubbles at the opponent.

attacks.name: Sticky Bubble
attacks.description: Shoots bubbles at the opponent.

attacks.name: Great Bubble (Large Bubbles)
attacks.description: Spits enormous bubbles from its mouth to surprise the opponent.

attacks.name: Rolling Attack
attacks.description: Rolls up its body and rams into the opponent.

attacks.name: GIVE HELP (Support Request)
attacks.description: Summons Tanemon and orders them to rush the opponent.

attacks.name: Press Attack (Dempsey)
attacks.description: Jumps up and inflicts damages by falling on the opponent.

attacks.name: Ive Ground (Ivy Ground)
attacks.description: Makes a huge trunk grow from underground and strikes the opponent with it.

Tankdramon.name: Tankdramon
Tankdramon.description: Tankdramon is a Machine Digimon. It functions as the riot-suppression and assault-extermination for the mechanized "D-Brigade". It specializes in the extermination of hordes of "Targets", and it boasts overwhelming firepower. It is equipped with radar which is able to lock onto thirty "Targets" simultaneously, and if one Tankdramon supplements its "Targets" by data-linking to other Tankdramon, it is said to be impossible to escape. Also, its mission survival rate is very high, and it is said that, so far, only one has ever been shot down during a sortie in an operation to eliminate a "target" designated "Codename: BAN-TYO"; that Tankdramon is said to have been retrieved by the D-Brigade, and digivolved to Darkdramon at their research facility.

attacks.name: Striver Cannon
attacks.description: Fires a shell loaded with a mini-nuke from its Striver Cannon, reducing everything within a 30 km radius to scorched earth.

attacks.name: Blast Gatling
attacks.description: Uses the Blast Gatling beside the Striver Cannon in close-combat, letting it fire all 3600 bullets in a second.

Tankmon.name: Tankmon
Tankmon.description: Tankmon is an Android Digimon. It holds the alias of "Mercenary Digimon", since it will assist both Vaccine and Virus Digimon if it becomes profitable to do so. With its heavyweight-power and the heavy artillery installed all throughout its body, it can pulverize the enemy into scrap without even turning to face them. As it is extremely fond of strife, it follows after conflicts wherever they occur. When this loner Digimon goes somewhere, the fighting there will never cease.

attacks.name: Hyper Cannon
attacks.description: Fires a super-powerful missile from the gun barrel on its head.

attacks.name: Metal Shot
attacks.description: Fires with hard metal balls.

title: Mercenary Digimon

Taomon.name: Taomon

otherNames.name: 祭師獸/祭师兽 Jì shī shòu

Taomon.description: Taomon is a Wizard Digimon. Versed in Onmyōdō, it is an onmyōji Digimon that freely uses every technique in battle. Its faculty with magic is particularly high, and attacks with talismans and spells are its forte. Also, it is a master of concealed weapons, and hides various weapons up its sleeves. It doesn't talk very much due to its extreme reticence, and it is a being that lives and lurks within the darkness. Also, it is able to turn its talismans into shikigami and command them.

attacks.name: Talisman of Light (梵筆閃, Bonhitsusen, lit. "Buddhist Brush Brandish")
attacks.description: Chants the incantation "Bon-Hitsu-Sen" (梵・筆・閃, "Bon-Hitsu-Sen") while painting the Sanskrit character "𑖮𑗝𑖽" (Hūṃ) in the air with its gigantic brush, then hurls it at the opponent to catch them in a gigantic explosion and annihilate them.

attacks.name: Thousand Spells (狐封札, Kofūsatsu, lit. "Fox-seal Scrolls")
attacks.description: Wreathes its talismans around the opponent's body, then detonates them.

attacks.name: Talisman Star (塵染, Rajas)
attacks.description: Uses the Devanagari letter "र" (ra) as blades to cut through the darkness.

attacks.name: Talisman Spell (オン, On, lit. "Aum")
attacks.description: Creates and chants the sacred syllable "ॐ" (Auṃ) to form a hemispherical yin-yang shield capable of movement.

attacks.name: Brush Stroke (一筆, Ippitsu, lit. "One Stroke")
attacks.description: Uses a large brush to hit the enemy.

attacks.name: Brush Strike (一閃, Issen, lit. "One Flash")
attacks.description: Strikes the enemy with a huge brush.

Taomon (Silver).name: Taomon (Silver)

otherNames.name: 祭師獸/祭师兽 Jì shī shòu

Taomon (Silver).description: Taomon (Silver) is a Demon Man Digimon. It is a Vaccine attribute Taomon enrobed in silver.

attacks.name: Talisman of Light (梵筆閃, Bonhitsusen, lit. "Buddhist Brush Brandish")
attacks.description: Chants the incantation "Bon-Hitsu-Sen" (梵・筆・閃, "Bon-Hitsu-Sen") while painting the Sanskrit character "𑖮𑗝𑖽" (Hūṃ) in the air with its gigantic brush, then hurls it at the opponent to catch them in a gigantic explosion and annihilate them.

attacks.name: Kofūsatsu (狐封札, Kofūsatsu lit. "Fox-seal Scrolls")
attacks.description: Wreathes its talismans around the opponent's body, then detonates them.

Tapirmon.name: Tapirmon
Tapirmon.description: Tapirmon is an Animal Digimon. It is thought that it is a Digimon that was generated from a medical computer for detecting brain waves, and it seems that it uses the data from humans in REM sleep as nourishment. In recent studies, it has been proven that it has the power to purge particularly bad nightmares and malignant computer viruses. Also, since it has the ability to change the captured nightmares and viruses back to normal, it is considered a holy Digimon. It wears a Holy Ring on its foreleg. Its "Nightmare Syndrome" is the same technique as that of the Ultimate Digimon, Digitamamon, but its connection to Tapirmon is a mystery.

attacks.name: Nightmare Syndrome
attacks.description: Releases its captured nightmares all at once, drowning the opponent in terror.

attacks.name: Holy Shoot
attacks.description: Causes an explosion with a small ball of light.

Targetmon.name: Targetmon
Targetmon.description: Targetmon is a Puppet Digimon. It is an obstinate-species Digimon equipped with the extremely wide-angle, high resolution "Yarimasu Sunglasses" (ヤリマスグラサン, Yarimasu Gurasan) (with blur correction), which reliably lock onto the desired target without missing. It performs humiliating attacks on the opponent with the sneakers it seems to have mistakenly put on both its hands. Also, no matter how depressed it is when it loses, it is a tough Digimon that will revive itself over and over with the serenade in its heart.

attacks.name: Dengeki Haguhagu Sneaker (電撃ハグハグスニーカー, Dengeki Haguhagu Sneaker lit. "Shocking Hug-hug Sneaker")
attacks.description: Repeatedly strikes the opponent with the sneakers on both of its arms.

attacks.name: Pointy Head (トンガリヘッド, Tongari Head)
attacks.description: Loses control of itself and charges the opponent.

attacks.name: Anja Serenade
attacks.description: Revives itself over and over with the serenade in its heart.

Tekkamon.name: Tekkamon
Tekkamon.description: Tekkamon is a Machine Digimon. It is a Digimon said to have been created by an evil hacker to destroy programs in response to the "Net Keeper" Giromon. It wears a mask made of iron, and glares at its enemies with sharp eyes. Just like a Mamemon, it's a small, Machine type Digimon. If you underestimate its power, you'll be defeated in a second with its sword.

attacks.name: Electronic Blast Sword (斬電剣, Zandenken)
attacks.description: Cuts the enemy's configuration data in half with a sword that possesses terrifying sharpness.

attacks.name: Skull Stand
attacks.description: Flicks itself as if it were a pachinko ball.

attacks.name: MP Destroyer (Reverse Engineering)
attacks.description: Lowers enemy's Attack and converts it into MP.

Tempomon.name: Tempomon
Tempomon.description: Tempomon is a Bird Man Digimon. It digivolved via dance music data. It is a natural-born dancer who always performs to the rhythm and unleashes its taijutsu while dancing, even in battle. It is a performer who dances to things ranging from cheerful music to mellow, moody songs, and whenever its headphones come off or the music stops, it gets into a bad mood and starts acting violently.

attacks.name: Rhythmic Arts
attacks.description: Dance kenpō which incorporates capoeira and martial arts.

attacks.name: Howling Blast
attacks.description: Blows away the enemy away with a very loud beat emitted from the speaker in its abdomen.

attacks.name: Upbeat Twister
attacks.description: Causes roaring sounds and tornadoes with its skillful footwork.

Tentomon.name: Tentomon
Tentomon.description: Tentomon is an Insectoid Digimon. It is the original type of Insectoid Digimon who, although it has a hard shell, still has low aggression. It has one hard claw on each of its fore-legs, and four on each of its middle- and hind-legs, and in particular, the middle-legs are able to skillfully grasp objects just like a human hand. Although the other Insectoids at its Digivolution level only possess fighting spirit, it still retains its naturally friendly sentiments, and displays its carefree way of life by doing things like sniffing the scent of flowers and napping in the shade of a tree.

attacks.name: Super Shocker (Petit Thunder)
attacks.description:
Hurls static electricity that it amplified with its wings.
Super Shocker Slam

attacks.name: Talon Attack (かたいツメ, Katai Tsume, lit. "Hard Claw") Attacks the enemy with a hard claw.
Tai Atari (たいあたり, Tai Atari lit. "Body Blow") Tackles the enemy.
Double Punch (Twice Arm) Slices the enemy with both claws.
Rolling Guard
attacks.description:
Spins along the ground and slams into the foe.
Rolling Guard Combo

attacks.name: Shock Jaw
attacks.description: Spins upwards at an angle while covered in electricity.

attacks.name: Rhino Spin
attacks.description: Flips over and spins on its back while charged with electricity.

attacks.name: Dynamo Spin
attacks.description: While flying, spins forward and electrocutes foes.

attacks.name: Heave Ho!
attacks.description: Slices the enemy with both claws. Sometimes follows up with an uppercut.

attacks.name: Rolling Whip
attacks.description: Falls on its back and kicks with its hind legs.

attacks.name: Stumbling Attack
attacks.description: Hits the enemy repeatedly with its claws by first hopping sideways towards them and then falling on them frontwise.

attacks.name: Electrical Discharge
attacks.description: Discharges electricity from its whole body, shocking anyone near it.

attacks.name: Upper Spin Slam / Upper Spin Slam 2
Claw Rush
attacks.description: A flurry of claw swipes.

Terriermon.name: Terriermon
Terriermon.description: Terriermon is an Animal Digimon. It is an extremely precious Rookie Digimon that is a twin to Lopmon. While Terriermon has only one horn growing from its head and has a calm but robust personality, Lopmon has three horns growing from its head and has the personality of a lonely crybaby. It is a Digimon shrouded in mystery, and it can be classified as a Beast-species Digimon from its body structure, but it's still not understood what kind of digivolved form it will take on. Also, it is rumored that it is sometimes born with its twin. It's a very cute type of Digimon, and from its calm behavior, it doesn't seem like a "Combat Species", but when battling, it shows that it is more powerful than it appears.

attacks.name: Terrier Tornado (Petit Twister)
attacks.description:
Generates a tiny tornado by spinning its ears like a propeller.
Kūchū Petit Twister (空中プチツイスター, Kūchū Petit Twister lit. "Aerial Petit Twister") Uses Terrier Tornado in midair.
Kūchū Petit Twister Shot (空中プチツイスターショット, Kūchū Petit Twister Shot "Aerial Petit Twister Shot")

attacks.name: Kūchū Petit Twister (空中プチツイスター, Kūchū Petit Twister lit. "Aerial Petit Twister") Uses Terrier Tornado in midair.
Kūchū Petit Twister Shot (空中プチツイスターショット, Kūchū Petit Twister Shot "Aerial Petit Twister Shot")
Bunny Blast (Blazing Fire)
attacks.description: Spews out a shot of superheated air.

attacks.name: Terrier Punch
attacks.description: Slaps the enemy with one of its ears.

attacks.name: Terrier Balloon
attacks.description: Spreads its ears, enabling it to fall or glide slowly.

Terriermon X.name: Terriermon X
Terriermon X.description: Terriermon X is a Beast Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It can read the flow of the wind as well as fly in the sky due to the hair that grows in its ears, each of which possesses excellent sensory organs. Its "Gen Emerald" ear jewelry is linked to its twin, Lopmon X, allowing them to know of each other's location and status. Its synchronization with Lopmon X has become even deeper. It has aerial walks with Lopmon X.

attacks.name: Terrier Tornado (Petit Twister)
attacks.description: Generates a tiny tornado by spinning its ears like a propeller.

attacks.name: Blazing Fire
attacks.description: Spews out a shot of superheated air.

Terriermon Assistant.name: Terriermon Assistant
Terriermon Assistant.description: Terriermon Assistantis a Beast Digimon. It is a hardworkingTerriermonthat supportsAgumon Expert. It loves learning aboutDigimon speciesand ecology, and telling people what it has learned most of all.

attacks.name: Terrier Tornado (Petit Twister)
attacks.description: Generates a tiny tornado by spinning its ears like a propeller.

attacks.name: Dai Bacchi Gū
attacks.description: Enlarges the badge on its chest and hurls it.

TeslaJellymon.name: TeslaJellymon
TeslaJellymon.description: TeslaJellymon is a Mollusk Digimon. It is the the Champion form of Jellymon that has grown by absorbing data from combat sports like steel cage death matches while in search of fun and stimulation. TeslaJellymon's electric shock techniques have been further enhanced and it has learned even more abilities, adapting them from karate, professional wrestling, and other fighting styles. Its flexibility allows it to easily dodge opponents' attacks.

attacks.name: Fizzle Fist (Physali-wrist)
attacks.description: Sends an electric shock from its palms directly to an opponent's weak point.

attacks.name: Punishock (Punish-schöne, Deu: Punish Beauty)
attacks.description: A high-voltage belt is extended from its body to deliver a punishing shock to opponents.

attacks.name: Volt Sprite (Volsprite)
attacks.description: TeslaJellymon hurls its electrified, spinning body at its opponent.

Thetismon.name: Thetismon
Thetismon.description: Thetismon is an Aquatic Beast Man Digimon. It is a Digimon that has taken the form of a woman. It was discovered in the deepest trenches of the Net Ocean, the birthplace of Digimon. Thetismon brings peace and tranquility to its own vast territory and lays down the law on any Digimon that dare to disturb it. It has an ingrained need to help the weak and weaken the strong. As such, while it shows no mercy to Digimon who threaten its territory, it is kind to those in need of help, guiding them to safety. Thetismon eliminates invaders with its special moves.

attacks.name: Shock Smasher (ビリースマッシャー, Birī Smasher)
attacks.description: Utilizes electrical energy accumulated in its palms to send its fists flying.

attacks.name: Thunder Hammer (Hammer Thunder)
attacks.description: Kicks an enemy up and then brings it down with the force of two electrically-charged fists.

attacks.name: Goodbye World (Adieu World, Fra: Goodbye World)
attacks.description: Allows Thetismon to teleport by removing the space between it and its opponent.

attacks.name: Doctase (Dokutease)
attacks.description: Various medicines are generated and released from its tentacles. With this ability, Thetismon can heal allies' wounds and temporarily boost their powers. If used against an enemy, however, it will afflict them with a deadly poison that disintegrates them from the inside out.

Thunderbirdmon.name: Thunderbirdmon
Thunderbirdmon.description: Thunderbirdmon is a Giant Bird Digimon. It armor digivolved through the power of the Digi-Egg of Friendship. It has the ability to summon thunder clouds with an echoing cry like thunder, and control thunder with the horn on its brow. Although it has a rough temperament, it has a caring nature for its comrades.

attacks.name: Spark Wing
attacks.description: Fires out countless electrically-charged feathers like rain.

attacks.name: Thunder Storm
attacks.description: Flaps wings clad in electricity, generating a storm of lightning.

Thundermon.name: Thundermon
Thundermon.description: Thundermon is a Mutant Digimon. Also known as the "Digimon Dynamo", it is conjectured to be a member of the Mamemon-species. Its tiny body has the properties of a magnet, and is always clad in electricity and discharging lightning.

attacks.name: Thunder Ball
attacks.description: Fires spheres of discharged electricity as much as 10 million volts at opponents who are coming to attack it.

attacks.name: Thunder Volt (Thunderbolt)
attacks.description: Fires a bolt of electricity.

attacks.name: Thunder Bomber
attacks.description: Throws electric bombs at enemies.

attacks.name: Powerful Punch
attacks.description: Punches with a punch full of powerful energy.

title: Digimon Dynamo

Thundermon X.name: Thundermon X
Thundermon X.description: Thundermon X is a Mutant Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Its electric power has increased, demonstrating its intense shocking power even with just a punch or a kick, and has the strength to make even large Digimon lose their fighting spirit. It is a Mamemon-like Mutant Digimon. It emits electricity from its magnet-like body. Moving quickly, it battles using electricity.

attacks.name: Thunder Ball
attacks.description: Fires spheres of discharged electricity as much as 10 MV at opponents who are coming to attack it.

attacks.name: Thunder Bomber
attacks.description: A combo technique composed of an "Anode Punch" and a "Cathode Kick". It causes a gigantic explosion as if it were a bomb of electricity.

TiaLudomon.name: TiaLudomon
TiaLudomon.description: TiaLudomon is an Armor Digimon. The digivolved form of Ludomon, it has grown even more durable and attained outstanding speed. It dashes at high speed across battlefields, rescuing straggling Digimon who are no longer able to fight. It is capable of transforming itself into a shield to be wielded to aid in escaping the battlefield, protecting its wielder from any attack that comes their way. TiaLudomon's shields have magical properties that allow it to erect barriers of ice, which freeze and nullify opponent attacks.

attacks.name: Frisbicker
attacks.description: Throws the shields on its arms.

attacks.name: Assault Claw
attacks.description: Charges at high speed and attacks with its claws.

TigerVespamon.name: TigerVespamon
TigerVespamon.description: TigerVespamon is a Cyborg Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It defends the mysterious "aerial, covert honey base, Royal Base". Vespamon boasts an astounding degree of stamina that could not be imagined from its slight and thorny silhouette, and it never stops moving during combat. The best of the best, said to be the top 0.08%, are inducted into the "covert honey corps, Royal Commando", and awarded a codename. Its codename "Tiger" comes from the fact that it is by far the best in solo combat, and it wields twin blades shaped like tiger fangs, the "Honey Corp Royal Meisters" (Deu: Royal Master) (covert honey arms Royal Meister).

attacks.name: Mach Stinger Victory. (Mach Stinger V)
attacks.description: Stings the opponent with the "Royal Meister".

Tinkermon.name: Tinkermon
Tinkermon.description: Tinkermon is a Fairy Digimon. It is always snuggling up to Petermon, and it does its best to work with Petermon in building "Never-Ever Land", a world of children. It bounces around in the best of moods when it is with Petermon, but if it's ignored, then it will angrily strike Petermon and then fly off somewhere. After that, it is happy to come looking for Petermon and meekly receive pampering. Tinkermon's wings shine, and because there is a change in the strength of the radiance when it is tense, looking at the wings' radiance is considered a good way to suss out Tinkermon's mood. It applies a paralytic nail polish to its sharply pointed, poisoned lance and nails, and if one mocks its tiny appearance, they'll suffer a massive retaliation.

attacks.name: Speed Nightmare
attacks.description: Drags the opponent into a nightmare with a fast-acting hallucinogen from its poisoned lance.

attacks.name: Nightmare Pandemic
attacks.description: Controls its paralyzing effect from just a section to the whole body by increasing the number of nails it stings with.

attacks.name: Fairy Powder
attacks.description: Scatters a powder from its wings that has the ability to change about half of those it covers into babies.

attacks.name: Petermon Syndrome
attacks.description: Makes the infantilized opponents give into Petermon's temptations and leads them to Never-Ever Land.

attacks.name: Thunder Ray
attacks.description: Fires a thunder bolt.

attacks.name: Recovery Power (Anti-Magic)
attacks.description: Cures confusion, poison, and stun.

Titamon.name: Titamon
Titamon.description: Titamon is a Deity Digimon. The titan of revenge Titamon was born from the hatred of the Digimon defeated by the Olympos XII in battles over the sovereignty of the Digital World. It holds the alias of "One-man squad" ("One-Man Division") and is treated as if it was a legion despite being a single being because it is able to instantly summon a mighty host. Bearing the inexhaustible energy of its hatred within its gigantic body, it runs through the battlefield seeking the heads of the Olympos XII. Its large arms are covered in a multitude of skulls, and the skulls are all data of the power it has stolen from the enemies it has defeated so far. As its gigantic sword "Zanjinto" (斬神刀, Zanjintou, lit. "Beheading God Sword") is a bone sword carved from SkullGreymon's bones, the hatred filling the sword makes a low growl.

attacks.name: Soul Core Attack (魂魄芯撃, Konpaku Shingeki, lit. "Soul Core-attack")
attacks.description: Swings the Zanjinto so that it slides through the opponent's armor and body, reaching their DigiCore unhindered and chopping it up. If the opponent takes this technique head on, they'll never be able to recover.

attacks.name: Phantom Blade (幻刃無痕, Genba Mukon, lit. "Phantom-blade Unscarred")
attacks.description: Eviscerates the opponent with the Zanjinto, causing them to fall into a hallucination that they are being harrowed even after the blade is pulled out, so that they don't stop suffering until their spirit dies.

attacks.name: Underworld's Call (呼応冥神, Koou Meijin, lit. "Pact with Nether-god")
attacks.description: Summons shades based on the skulls on both of its arms, which overrun the enemy's forces as an undead legion.

title: One-man squad
(一人師団
Hitori Shidan?
lit. "One-Man Division")

Tobiumon.name: Tobiumon
Tobiumon.description: Tobiumonis a Sea Animal Digimon. Tobiumon corners its targeted prey at high speed. Its oddly developed fins allow it to fly, and its large arms enable it to move on the ground. It holds the alias of "Hunter Fish" due to bringing down its targets regardless of whether they are on land, in the sea, or in the air.

attacks.name: Suckerfish Darts
attacks.description: Fires organic missiles from its abdomen to slow down its prey.

attacks.name: Finishing Edge (Flying Finish)
attacks.description: Unleashes a high-speed slash attack with its sharp fins to finish off its prey.

title: Hunter Fish

TobuCatmon.name: TobuCatmon
TobuCatmon.description: TobuCatmon is a Puppet Digimon and carrier of the X Antibody. A Puppet Digimon which has the appearance of a cat that flies about the Net Ocean. Although it has a rough temperament, it loves the ocean, and as the "F⑭" engraved on its body is proof that it is a Digimon that fights despite its outer appearance, it is said that only 1% of the strongest among Tobucatmon are known and respected as "Cat Gun". It is able to fly at high speed by folding its wings, and it has a regular habit of flying where it flashes the claws on its right feet when turning right and flashes the claws on its left feet when turning left, but sometimes its movements are read by the enemy.

attacks.name: Guruguru Fight (グルグルファイト, Guruguru Fight lit. "Spinning Fight")
attacks.description: Repeatedly goes around behind the enemy and bites them.

attacks.name: Tobutobu Phoenix (トブトブフェニックス, Tobutobu Phoenix lit. "Flying Phoenix")
attacks.description: A strange glare in which it gazes at distant targets.

title: Cat Gun
(キャットガン
Kyatto Gan?)

Togemogumon.name: Togemogumon
Togemogumon.description: Togemogumon is an Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Friendship". It grows ultra-low temperature ice crystals on its back like a pincushion. If you touch even one of these crystals, it will be enough to freeze you in an instant, so even just defending itself becomes its greatest offense. Togemogumon is sluggish, but because its defending has also become offensive, it is a being that is balanced in both offense and defense.

attacks.name: Hail Machine Gun
attacks.description: Fires all the crystals on his back.

attacks.name: Crystal Guard
attacks.description: Spreads its crystals out to create an offensive shield.

Togemon.name: Togemon
Togemon.description: Togemonis a Vegetation Digimon. It has the appearance of a gigantic cactus. It can store nutrient data within its body, and can even survive for a long time in the empty desert areas. What it's thinking usually can't be understood at all by trying to discern it from its facial expression, as it spends most of the day staring off into space. However, once Togemon is angered, that expression changes completely, it starts getting violent, and it becomes unable to settle down.According to one theory, Togemon was originally a "Plant Weapon" used when aVademonthat was discovered and captured near a certain country's "Area 51" invaded the planet, and was said to have started advancing toward every strategic base. However, as usual, Togemon's mysterious behavior has turned the truth into a mystery. Also, its connection to the rumor that Vademon was born from the "seed of a plant" is currently being studied.

attacks.name: Needle Spray (チクチクバンバン, Chikuchiku Banban, lit. "Prickly Bang-bang")
attacks.description: Spins around and shoots thorns at the foe or further hardens the thorns on the end of its arms and bang-bang strikes the opponent.

attacks.name: Lightspeed Jabbing (Mach Jab)
attacks.description: Closes in at the speed of light to jab the enemy multiple times.

attacks.name: Coconut Punch (Coconuts Punch)
attacks.description: Rains hits on a foe like falling coconuts.

attacks.name: Coconut Upper
attacks.description: An Uppercut version of Coconut Punch.

attacks.name: Coconut Counter
attacks.description: Takes cover behind another Digimon and surprise attacks the enemy, jumping out and punching it as it approaches to attack.

Togemon X.name: Togemon X
Togemon X.description: Togemon X is a Plant Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Having realized something that it had kept deep within its heart up to now, Togemon started wandering from place to place on its own. Communicating with it results in failure, probably because there were few opportunities for it to come into contact with other Digimon in the desert and wastelands, so these days it is very hot-tempered. According to one theory, Togemon was originally a "Plant Weapon" used when a Vademon that was discovered and captured near a certain country's "Area 51" invaded the planet, and was said to have started advancing toward every strategic base. However, as usual, Togemon's mysterious behavior has turned the truth into a mystery. Also, its connection to the rumor that Vademon was born from the "seed of a plant" is currently being studied.

attacks.name: Needle Spray (チクチクバンバン, Chiku Chiku Ban Ban, lit. "Prickly Bang-bang")
attacks.description: Spins around and shoots thorns at the foe or further hardens the thorns on the end of its arms and bang-bang strikes the opponent.

attacks.name: Prickly Bam Bam (チクチクバムバム, Chiku Chiku Bam Bam)
attacks.description: Weak-to-medium punches.

attacks.name: Mach Jab
attacks.description: Closes in at the speed of light to jab the enemy multiple times.

Tokomon.name: Tokomon
Tokomon.description: Tokomon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a tiny Digimon which has limb-like objects growing under its body (head?). In-Training Digimon that have grown limbs are extremely rare, and their appearance is enormously cute. However, while it may be cute, you have to be careful, because if you carelessly stretch out your hand, it will suddenly open its mouth wide, and snap at you with the fangs growing closely packed within. Having said that, because its personality is very innocent, any malice is nonexistent.

attacks.name: Bite (噛み付き, Kamitsuki)
attacks.description: Suddenly opens its mouth wide, and snaps at the opponent with the fangs growing closely packed within.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

TonosamaMamemon.name: TonosamaMamemon
TonosamaMamemon.description: TonosamaMamemon is a Mutant Digimon. A Mamemon that read the image data of a jidaigeki and mutated. It is easygoing and always cheerful, and drags along in its hakama, which is hard to walk about in, constantly tripping over, rolling and getting tangled up in it, bringing laughter to those who see it and brightening their spirits. It is broad-minded in that it will accept any Digimon that comes to its castle, but once a Digimon that disturbs the area around the castle appears, it will... punish them without mercy... while rolling.

attacks.name: Appare Zakura (天晴れ桜, Appare Zakura lit. "Bravo Cherry Blossoms")
attacks.description: Appare Zakura, which it unleashes from its fan, judges the enemy's wrongdoing with cherry blossoms that scatter mysteriously, causing them to lose the will to fight. However, "Appare Zukara" is easily affected by the wind, and will fail to reach the enemy when the headwinds are blowing against it.

attacks.name: Sensugaeshi (扇子返し, Sensugaeshi lit. "Fan Reversal")
attacks.description: Capable of repelling any attack from the enemy.

TorikaraBallmon.name: TorikaraBallmon
voiceActors: (Ja:)Reiko Fujita,Yukie Muraoka,Kaori Uotani,Ken Nakamura,Yūya Yoshikawa,Harumi Ikoma(Frontier)
TorikaraBallmon.description: TorikaraBallmon is a Food Digimon. It is a Digimon born from deep-fried food recipe data. Because it flies while giving off a delicious, lingering smell, it seems that if TorikaraBallmon is nearby, other Digimon around it feel more hungry.

attacks.name: Vegetable Bubbles (植物性の泡, Shokubutsusei no Awa)
attacks.description: When chased by hungry Digimon, it brings them down by blowing "Shokubutsusei no Awa" out of its mouth and then files away, leaving only its scent behind while hindering their movement.

Toropiamon.name: Toropiamon
Toropiamon.description: Toropiamonis a Vegetation Digimon. Toropiamon inhabit jungles. It is thought to have digivolved into its gaudy appearance by taking in the data of various trees and fruits. The scent from its body, which is like a mixture of all kinds of fruits, is so intense that those who are not used to it will be knocked out by force. The drops secreted from its leaves, which act like wings, are so toxic that they can even dissolve iron.

attacks.name: Petal Carnage (Petally Carnage)
attacks.description: Disperses a large amount of explosive pollen from the petals around its neck.

attacks.name: Tropical Venom
attacks.description: Gas spewed out of its mouth. It is a potent poison that matures within its body, and causes those who inhale it to dissolve into a mushy state from the inside out.

Tortomon.name: Tortomon
Tortomon.description: Tortomon is a Reptile Digimon. It is a tortoise-type Digimon armed with a shell from which sharp blades grow. It is heavier than it looks, as both its shell and body have formed to be highly dense, such that it creates fierce tremors with every step it takes. Furthermore, it holds the alias "Noisy Digimon" ("Noise Digimon") due to its shrill, metallic-sounding cry. While its usual walking movements are extremely slow, it can retract its limbs so that its body is in the shape of a disc and spin itself, allowing it to move at ten times its usual speed.

attacks.name: Strong Carapace (Shell Phalanx)
attacks.description: Fires the blades on its shell as if they were multiple-warhead missiles.

attacks.name: Spinning Attack (回転たいあたり, Kaiten Tai Atari, lit. "Spinning Body Blow")

title: Noisy Digimon
(騒音デジモン
Sōon Dejimon?
lit. "Noise Digimon")

Toucanmon.name: Toucanmon
Toucanmon.description: Toucanmon is a Bird Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Kindness". A loud and gaudy Armor-level Bird Digimon, its wings have degenerated from living on the ground; having existed for so long that it has become flightless. It often wants to retreat into its shell and shrug off things when feeling insecure, but can barely do so with its huge beak in the way. However, when its anger exceeds a critical point, it opens its huge, colorful beak and raises its crest as an intimidation tactic. It wears a shell over its body since its feathers have degenerated, and it is rumored to be quite muscular underneath.

attacks.name: Beak Twister (Pinch Cutter)
attacks.description: Grabs the enemy and twist as hard as possible with its beak.

attacks.name: Marble Ball (Marvel Marvel)
attacks.description: Fires a colorful shining ball.

attacks.name: Crazy Crest (Fancy Cut)
attacks.description: Rapidly peck with its beak.

attacks.name: Crest Cutter
attacks.description: Fire numerous shining rings from its crest.

attacks.name: Egg Attack
attacks.description: Attacks with its beak while spinning.

ToyAgumon.name: ToyAgumon
ToyAgumon.description: ToyAgumon is a Puppet Digimon. It is a unique Digimon whose entire body is made up of unique plastic blocks. It is said that a child playing on the Internet created it by imitating Agumon's appearance, so it is very cute. Unlike the confident Agumon, it has a cowardly side and its blocks fall apart into pieces when it is surprised. However, it possesses a righteous heart that doesn't condone evil. Also, since it absolutely loves children, it enjoys communicating with them over the Net.

attacks.name: Toy Flame
attacks.description: Spews a flame-shaped missile.

attacks.name: Pepper Breath (Baby Flame)
attacks.description: Spits flame breath from its mouth to attack the opponent.

attacks.name: Million Punches (Mullion Punch)
attacks.description: A spinning flaming punch.

attacks.name: Fancy Star
attacks.description: Hits the enemy with a big star.

attacks.name: Block Punch
attacks.description: Punches with arms made from blocks.

attacks.name: Machine Attack (Kikai Attack)
attacks.description: Inflicts a hard blow full of machine power.

attacks.name: Kyuu Break Spark (急ブレーキスパーク, Kyuu Break Spark lit. "Emergency Break Spark")

Trailmon (Ball).name: Trailmon (Ball)
debut: Digimon Frontier: Island of Lost Digimon

attacks.name: Kyuu Break Spark (急ブレーキスパーク, Kyuu Break Spark lit. "Emergency Break Spark")
Kyuu Break Spark (急ブレーキスパーク, Kyuu Break Spark lit. "Emergency Break Spark")

Trailmon (C-89 Model).name: Trailmon (C-89 Model)
Trailmon (C-89 Model).description: The Trailmon (C-89 Model) is a Trailmon. It can adopt a battle form named Trailmon Battle Mode (トレイルモン戦闘形態, Trailmon Sentou Keitai) to protect its passengers.

attacks.name: Kyuu Break Spark (急ブレーキスパーク, Kyuu Break Spark lit. "Emergency Break Spark")
Kyuu Break Spark (急ブレーキスパーク, Kyuu Break Spark lit. "Emergency Break Spark")

Trailmon (Kettle).name: Trailmon (Kettle)
debut: "Better An Egg Than An Egg Shell" [13]

otherNames.name: トレイルモンのケトル Trailmon Kettle

attacks.name: Kyuu Break Spark (急ブレーキスパーク, Kyuu Break Spark lit. "Emergency Break Spark")
Kyuu Break Spark (急ブレーキスパーク, Kyuu Break Spark lit. "Emergency Break Spark")
Kyuu Break Spark (急ブレーキスパーク, Kyuu Break Spark lit. "Emergency Break Spark")

Trailmon (Worm).name: Trailmon (Worm)
Trailmon (Worm).description: Trailmon (Worm) is a Machine Digimon. It is a large Digimon that has become a means of transportation in the Digital World. Various types operate on each line, carrying Digimon and cargo from terminal to terminal across all parts of the Digital World.

attacks.name: Cool Running
attacks.description: Rushes at tremendous speed.

attacks.name: Kyuu Break Spark (急ブレーキスパーク, Kyuu Break Spark lit. "Emergency Break Spark")
attacks.description: Suddenly brakes right in front of the enemy, sending hot sparks flying.

Triceramon.name: Triceramon
Triceramon.description: Triceramon is a Dinosaur Digimon. Triceramon has the form of a triceratops and power competing with the strongest of herbivorous dinosaur types. The toughness of its skin is top class among organic type Digimon, and its two ultra-hard horns are more solid than Monochromon's. It is gentle by nature, but its charging attack belies its usual sluggish movements, full of power, capable of destroying even the sturdy bodies of mineral Digimon.

attacks.name: Tri-Horn Attack
attacks.description: Charges into enemies with the horns on its forehead and snout. In Digimon Adventure V-Tamer 01, it fires beams from each of its horns.

attacks.name: Mega Dash (たいあたり, Tai Atari, lit. "Body Blow")
Volcanic Strike
attacks.description: Shoots Fireballs.

attacks.name: Blaze Blast (Fire Breath)
attacks.description: Shoots a Breath of Fire.

attacks.name: Golden Tri-Horn Attack
attacks.description: A Tri-Horn Attack with its horns spinning at high speed.

Triceramon X.name: Triceramon X
Triceramon X.description: Triceramon X is a Ceratopsian Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The three horns growing from its head spin rapidly in order to pierce anything that comes to attack it, and their penetrating power has increased even more. Due to its gentle personality, it is often attacked by the enemy, but tries to drive them away using the sturdiness of its skin and its Spike Armor.

attacks.name: Tri-Horn Attack
attacks.description: Charges at the opponent with the two horns on its brow and the horn on its snout.

attacks.name: Golden Tri-Horn Attack
attacks.description: Adds the high-speed rotation of its horns to its Special Move "Tri Horn Attack" with enough power to pierce the enemy even without charging into them.

Troopmon.name: Troopmon
Troopmon.description: Troopmon is a Zombie Zinger Digimon. It is an artificial Digimon manufactured by stuffing energy stolen from other Digimon within a special rubber body. As it is a machine-like Digimon that can only perform as commanded, it is absolutely incapable of spontaneous behavior. It doesn't get fatigued, it doesn't feel pain, it doesn't fear death, and it doesn't need to sleep. It is definitely a fighting machine. Its collective behavior is pretty basic, and its individual fighting strength is not very great, but that probably isn't able to make a dent in the extent of its confidence in its ability for human wave tactics, just due to its strength of numbers. An injured Troopmon will just exhale its energy filling, transferring it to a new special rubber body which is reborn as a new Troopmon, so it is actually sent out to the battlefield many times over.

Tsubumon.name: Tsubumon
Tsubumon.description: Tsubumon is a Slime Digimon. It has an appearance like a seed, although it is not a Plant-species Digimon. It cannot fly, but it is able to move over land, water, or anywhere, while hopping and bouncing, and it is said that there is no place where Tsubumon cannot move through. However, because of its small body, it is sent flying on days with a strong wind, and as a result of that, it is often mistaken for a Plant-species.

attacks.name: San no Awa (酸の泡, San no Awa lit. "Acid Bubbles")
