attacks.description: Drives off the opponent with acidic bubbles.

Tsukaimon.name: Tsukaimon
Tsukaimon.description: Tsukaimon is a Mammal Digimon. It is characterized by its big ears. Although it is thought to be a subspecies of Patamon, it has quite the opposite personality of Patamon, and loves brawling. Usually, it acts as a familiar for Devimon and others.

attacks.name: Evil Spell (Bad Message)
attacks.description: Makes the opponent cry with insults packed with negative energy.

attacks.name: Fluffy Attack (ふわふわアタック, Fuwafuwa Atakku)
attacks.description: Tackles the opponent.

attacks.name: Friendly Fire
attacks.description: Fires a small fireball.

attacks.name: Purple Haze
attacks.description: Blows out poisonous smoke.

attacks.name: Dark Twister
attacks.description: Attacks with a small typhoon of dark energy.

Tsumemon.name: Tsumemon
Tsumemon.description: Tsumemon is an Unidentified Species Digimon. It digivolved further from Kuramon. The tips of its feelers have become claw-shaped, and it has grown even more ferocious. It corrodes data at a tremendous speed, and causes malfunctions in the Network. Also, because its speed of movement is so swift, once it digivolves to Tsumemon, it becomes even harder to capture.

attacks.name: Nail Scratch
attacks.description: Slashes with the claws on its feelers.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its eye to intimidate the opponent.

Tsunomon.name: Tsunomon

otherNames.name: 獨角獸/独角兽 Dú jiǎo shòu

Tsunomon.description: Tsunomon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a tiny Digimon that hardened one of the feelers on its head as Punimon. From Punimon, it has accomplished a more animal-like Digivolution, and is covered in tufty body hair. It is still at the peak of playfulness, and it has a prank-loving personality, but its combat instinct has not awakened.

attacks.name: Bubble Blow (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

attacks.name: Tackle
attacks.description: A powerful charge used against the opponent.

Tumblemon.name: Tumblemon
Tumblemon.description: Tumblemonis an Ore Digimon. It is an In-Training Digimon that grows by eating rocks. Because its digestive system is not fully developed yet, it stores an amount of ore in its body unimaginable given its small size, and gradually converts it into nourishment. The site in which its eye is located also serves as its mouth, and it seems to turn completely blind while eating.

attacks.name: Rock Breath
attacks.description: Spits out rocks from its large mouth.

Tuwarmon.name: Tuwarmon
debut: "Shoutmon - Bogus King Or The Real Thing?" [26]
Tuwarmon.description: Tuwarmon is a Mutant Digimon. It is a ninja Digimon that released the heavy Punpun Armor (噴噴アーマー, Punpun Āmā, lit. "Huffy Armor") which was restraining its abilities and transformed to its true form from its temporary disguise, Damemon. Disguising itself with the look of a fool to deceive the enemy's eyes, while surreptitiously drawing near its target and assassinating them, is Tuwarmon's special trait. The Punpun Armor drastically improves Tuwarmon's maneuverability by being split apart into boosters, so its movements have wind-like swiftness, too quick to catch with the eyes, and cannot be compared to their state before its abilities were released. Its two sickle-type "Mantis Arm" weapons are variously sickle-nunchaku tied with an electromagnetic chain, a long-handled polearm fused from the two, or a boomerang for throwing, and it switches between the variations freely as the situation demands.

attacks.name: Mantis Dance
attacks.description: Transforms the Mantis Arm while whirling violently like it was dancing, chopping up the opponent in a certain-kill sword performance until there's nothing left.

attacks.name: Smokescreen Ditch (Smokin' Boogie)
attacks.description: Shoots out rainbow-colored fumes and shells in all directions from the Punpun Armor, inflicting damage on the opponent while keeping itself hidden.

attacks.name: Scythe Spinner (Mantis Arm)
attacks.description: Throws the Mantis Arm at the opponent.

attacks.name: Digi Ninja Art: Hermit Restoration (デジ忍法・隠者復活, Digi Ninpou: Inja Fukkatsu)
attacks.description: Releases a seal containing a stored ally.

attacks.name: Digi Ninpou: Kawarimi no Jutsu (デジ忍法・変わり身の術, Digi Ninpou: Kawarimi no Jutsu lit. "Digi Ninja Art: Body Replacement Technique")
attacks.description: Instantly switches places with a Tuwarmon-shaped dummy in order to evade an enemy attack.

attacks.name: Ninpou: Fūjinha (忍法・風神波, Ninpou: Fūjinha lit. "Ninja Art: Fūjin's Waves")
attacks.description: Generates a powerful downwash of wind.

attacks.name: Digi Ninpou: Kumo Shibari (デジ忍法・クモ縛り, Digi Ninpou: Kumo Shibari lit. "Digi Ninja Art: Spider Bind")
attacks.description: Casts electrified threads from its hands which form into a spiderweb that captures the opponent.

attacks.name: Digi Ninpou: Furoshiki Dzutsumi (デジ忍法・風呂敷包み, Digi Ninpou: Furoshiki Dzutsumi lit. "Digi Ninja Art: Furoshiki Wrapping")
attacks.description: Instantly ties the opponent up in a cloth sack.

attacks.name: Digi Ninpou: Kawashimi no Jutsu (デジ忍法・かわし身の術, Digi Ninpou: Kawashimi no Jutsu lit. "Digi Ninja Art: Body Dodging Technique")
attacks.description: Dodges in the blink of an eye to evade an enemy attack.

Turuiemon.name: Turuiemon
Turuiemon.description: Turuiemon is an Animal Digimon. It is a martial artist Digimon that was discovered within the hinterlands of a Chinese mountain province. It pursued the viruses that exploit e-mails to do evil as their eternal enemy, and wandered the world. Although it is blessed with the makings of an unparalleled Ch'uan Fa, it is still developing it. It uses the original Togaken (兎牙拳, Togaken lit. "Rabbit's Fang Fist") that it has worked out, and wields the "Tokaku Tessou" (兎角鉄爪, "Tokaku Tessou" lit. "Rabbit-horned Iron-claws")" on both of its arms.

attacks.name: Gauntlet Claw (巌兎烈斗, Gantoretto, lit. "Pika Sparking")
attacks.description: Uses the Tokaku Tessou to strike the opponent with a combo-attack unleashed with a great leap and rabbit-like agility.

attacks.name: Ninja Fist (忍迅拳, Ninjinken, lit. "Ninja-speed Fist")
attacks.description: Attacks with a quick and stealthy Ch'uan Fa which capitalizes on its great leaping power.

Tuskmon.name: Tuskmon
Tuskmon.description: Tuskmon is a Dinosaur Digimon. It is a super-heavyweight class Digimon that grew gigantic horns from both of its shoulders. It holds the alias "Panzer Digimon", from how it will destroy all obstructions in sight as it charges forth due to its reckless personality. It specializes in performing charging tackles, and countless Digimon have been sunk by this attack. The star symbols on its two arms represent the number of Digimon it has defeated (100 represented by one star). Also, it is a fool's errand to attempt to break the horns on Tuskmon's shoulders, as the broken horns will fall out and get replaced with new ones, just like sharks' teeth.

attacks.name: Slamming Tusk (Panzer Knuckle)
attacks.description: A super-dreadnought punch.

title: Panzer Digimon

Tylomon.name: Tylomon
Tylomon.description: Tylomon is a Sea Animal Digimon. It armor-digivolved through the power of the "Digi-Egg of Reliability". Because of its unique form, it holds the alias of "Jet Plane of the Deep" and has a fast moving speed underwater, even contending for first place with MetalSeadramon. Due to its extremely ferocious personality, those that enter its territory are attacked even if the opponent is larger than itself. It is able to distinguish scents that are 1 km away from it while underwater.

attacks.name: Torpedo Attack
attacks.description: Fires a target seeking torpedo.

attacks.name: Terror Plankton
attacks.description: Unleashes poison-carrying plankton upon the enemy.

attacks.name: Hydro Wave
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy by quickly spinning and using the force of water.

attacks.name: Terror Spiral
attacks.description: Creates a water tornado.

title: Jet Plane of the Deep

Tylomon X.name: Tylomon X
Tylomon X.description: Tylomon X is a Sea Dragon Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. Tylomon, who holds the alias of "Jet Plane of the Deep", has changed into a form more suited to underwater battles, as if it developed into an aerial fighter. Its ability to freely and quickly turn around in the three-dimensional space of underwater, without dropping its linear speed, stems from the fact that the weaponized Tylomon's fins (blades) have developed in various parts with the role of wings.

attacks.name: Sickle Stream
attacks.description: Tears the enemy to pieces as it passes them by with its greatly developed fins.

attacks.name: Torpedo Attack
attacks.description: Chases and charges into the enemy like a homing torpedo. You can never escape from this technique.

title: Jet Plane of the Deep

Tyrannomon.name: Tyrannomon
Tyrannomon.description: Tyrannomonis a Dinosaur Digimon. It is a Digimon shaped like an ancient dinosaur from prehistoric times. Its two developed arms and massive tail mow down everything. It has intelligence and a docile personality, so it's easy to tame. This makes it handy for fledgling tamers, and many will raise one with care. It can be considered a fundamental Digimon representative.There is a rivalry between it and fellow Dinosaur Digimon,Allomon.

attacks.name: Fire Breath
attacks.description: Breathes out intense flames and burns the enemy.

attacks.name: Slash Claw (Slash Nail)
attacks.description: Tears the opponent to ribbons with its powerful claws.

attacks.name: Dino Kick
attacks.description: Adds strength from its back to its front and lets out a kick.

attacks.name: Wild Buster
attacks.description: Rams into the enemy with heavy damage.

attacks.name: Buster Dive
attacks.description: Dives head first into the enemy.

Tyrannomon X.name: Tyrannomon X
Tyrannomon X.description: Tyrannomon X is a Dinosaur Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. The primeval data engraved into Tyrannomon's Digicore has been drawn out, transforming it into a figure whose fierce, dinosaur-like traits are more pronounced. As both its power and speed have increased due to it gaining more muscle mass, it is harder to tame Tyrannomon X compared to before. The ridge along its back has grown to become beautifully transparent yet sturdy, just like gemstones, and can now even be used as a weapon.

attacks.name: Fire Breath
attacks.description: Spews out deep crimson flames the same color as its body.

attacks.name: Crash Rolling
attacks.description: Curls its entire body up, charges at tremendous speed, and minces any enemy that passes it by with the ridge on its back.

attacks.name: Crimson Breath
attacks.description: An enhancement of the original "Fire Breath".

TyrantKabuterimon.name: TyrantKabuterimon
TyrantKabuterimon.description: TyrantKabuterimon is an Insect Digimon. It is the "King of Insects" (King of Bugs) which governs all Insect Digimon. Its stronghold, the "Under Forest", exists deep underneath the darkest forest, and it is said that it only moves at night. It is able to manipulate every Insect Digimon at will, so it almost never fights in person. Due to the high density Chrome Digizoid which composes its shell, it is thought to be impossible for ordinary Digimon to even scratch it.

attacks.name: Shine of Bee
attacks.description: Emits a red-hot explosion from its entire body which is impossible to defend against, and instantly reduces all of its opponents to ash.

attacks.name: Bee Cyclone
attacks.description: Summons all of its insect followers to construct an impenetrable wall of bugs.

attacks.name: Insect Cannon
attacks.description: Fires flying insects that home in on the enemy and attacks them.

attacks.name: King Spiral
attacks.description: Releases subordinate insects that swarm the enemy.

attacks.name: Insect Nightmare
attacks.description: Circles the enemy and releases flying insects that divebomb the enemy one after another.

title: King of Bugs
(蟲の王
Chū no Ō?)
King of Insects

Tyutyumon.name: Tyutyumon
Tyutyumon.description: Tyutyumon is a Beast Digimon. It is a tactician Digimon that has a tiny body but also a shrewd mind. As its plans are absolutely precise, they are enough to admirably guide even the slow-footed dullard Damemon and earn great military gains through combat. Only victory is important to Tyutyumon, and it considers the advancement of everything according to its plans to be more important than anything else. Its battles are settled before they even begin. It must be so, and it will even become partners with someone to do so, but will still betray them at any time. Lukewarm words like "friendship" and "trust" can't even be found in Tyutyumon's vocabulary. As for those who disturb its plans, it manipulates them at will with its "Tyutyu Twitter".

attacks.name: Tyutyu Twitter
attacks.description: Puts the opponent in a state of hypnosis by whispering into their ears.

Ukkomon.name: Ukkomon
Ukkomon.description: Name used on the officialDigimon Adventure 02: The Beginningwebsite. No official romanization available.

UlforceVeedramon.name: UlforceVeedramon
UlforceVeedramon.description: UlforceVeedramonis a Warrior Digimon. It possesses the swiftest speed among the "Royal Knights", and there is no one that can follow its movements. Also, its body is wrapped in holy armor made of the lightest-weight rare metal "Blue Digizoid", which is rare even amongChrome Digizoid, so it can cleave the sky and split the earth. It can extend weapons and a shield from the "V Bracelets" equipped to both of its arms.

attacks.name: The Ray of Victory (Shining V Force)
attacks.description: Strafes with a beam from the "V"-shaped armor on its chest.

attacks.name: Victory Sword (Ulforce Saber)
attacks.description: Attacks using the saber that extends from its right V-Bracelet.

attacks.name: Tensegrity Shield (Tense-great Shield)
attacks.description: Releases holy aura from its left V-Bracelet which becomes a barrier.

attacks.name: Dragon Impulse X
attacks.description: Covers self in the aura of a dragon and slashes through the enemy.

UlforceVeedramon Future Mode.name: UlforceVeedramon Future Mode
UlforceVeedramon Future Mode.description: UlforceVeedramon Future Mode is a Holy Knight Digimon.

attacks.name: Ulforce V Saber
attacks.description: Extends a saber from its right V-Bracelet.

attacks.name: Tensegrity Shield
attacks.description: Releases holy aura from its left V-Bracelet which becomes a barrier.

UlforceVeedramon X.name: UlforceVeedramon X
UlforceVeedramon X.description: UlforceVeedramon X is a Holy Knight Digimon and a carrier of the X-Antibody. The "Ulforce", its own ultimate force, has been drawn out further, even more so than its swift speed. The "Ulforce" also has remarkable healing abilities, so it instantly self-recovers from any damage. Even if you catch sight of UlforceVeedramon briefly and attack it, you will immediately suffer a counterattack with 100% of its power. It possesses incredible speed even for a Royal Knight, and no opponent in the world can follow its movements.

attacks.name: Shining V Force
attacks.description: Strafes with a beam from the "V"-shaped armor on its chest.

attacks.name: Ulforce Saber
attacks.description: Slashes opponents with a holy-beam sword genereated from the "V-Braclet" equpipped on its right arm.

attacks.name: Dragon Impulse
attacks.description: Covers itself with a Dragon's Aura and strikes through the opponent.

UltimateBrachiomon.name: UltimateBrachiomon
UltimateBrachiomon.description: UltimateBrachiomon is a Cyborg Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. A Cyborg Digimon who boasts of being the largest on land, and the heaviest. The boosters equipped to its back spray downward, supporting the weight of its colossal body, and are used when moving. It has undergone very heavy-duty remodeling, and although its moving speed is by no means fast, its bulky armor makes it unnecessary for it to evade the enemy's attacks, and it is impossible to prevent the backlash of its superweapon, released from the huge gunport on its chest, unless you are UltimateBrachiomon's weight.

attacks.name: Ultimate Blast
attacks.description: Detonates the energy within its body, and spraying an explosive wind from the huge gunport on its chest.

attacks.name: Ultimate Quake
attacks.description: Strikes with its gigantic tail, shaking even the earth.

UltimateChaosmon.name: UltimateChaosmon
UltimateChaosmon.description: UltimateChaosmon is a Unique Digimon. It is a Digimon born from the fusion of the four bodies of BanchoLeomon, Darkdramon, Varodurumon, and Kentaurosmon. Due to the strain from fusing four mighty powers all at once, most of the strength which had retained a balance of power collected in its arms, which took on a gigantic size as a result. Also, it is unable to store its DigiCores within its body, so the two of them manifest bare on its shoulders. Its power, which it is unable to suppress, flows from its whole body as if it was leaking out, and it's said that Rookie Digimon and below aren't even able to approach it just due to that power.

attacks.name: Broken Destruction (Broken Destroy)
attacks.description: Attacks with the might to easily crush even larger Digimon.

attacks.name: Ultima Burst
attacks.description: Releases the energy of its DigiCores all at once, then fires it at the opponent.

Umon.name: Umon
Umon.description: Umon appears as a mass of black energy in the shape of a dragon.
title: Umon of the Blue Lightning
(蒼雷のウモン
Sourai no Umon?)

Unimon.name: Unimon
Unimon.description: Unimon is a Mythical Animal Digimon. It is a composite Digimon that has both the horn of the Unicorn, the legendary holy beast, and the wings of the Pegasus. With the gigantic wings growing from its back, it instantly runs about the world of the Computer Network, stabbing enemies with the sharp horn extending from its brow. A wild(?) Unimon has a rough temperament like a restive horse, but once tamed, it can be handled as if it was the tamer's own limbs.

attacks.name: Aerial Attack (Holy Shot)
attacks.description: Spews a Qigong shot from its gigantic mouth.

attacks.name: Aerial Gallop ('corn Thrust)
attacks.description: Stabs the enemy with the horn on its head.

attacks.name: Uni-Gallop
attacks.description: Kicks with its hind legs.

attacks.name: Spread Nails (Spread Neigh)
attacks.description: Confuses the enemy with a supersonic wave.

attacks.name: Aerial Attack
attacks.description: Fires a shot of holy energy at an enemy.

Upamon.name: Upamon
Upamon.description: Upamon is an Amphibian Digimon. It has ear-like branchia growing from both sides of its head. Although it is able to live whether on land or under water, it appears that it is rather suited for life on land. Because of its carefree personality, it is easily and frequently bullied by other Digimon. However, because of its personality, there are occasions when it mistakes it as being played with, rather than it being bullied.

attacks.name: Shock Shout
attacks.description: Releases an ultrasonic shout to make the opponent flinch.

Vademon.name: Vademon
Vademon.description: Vademonis a an Alien Digimon. It is shaped like something that came from the far reaches of the cosmos, but it's rumored that it was born from the seed of a plant. It could not be imagined from its overdeveloped head and octopus-like lower body, but it carries terrifying offensive power.

attacks.name: Evil Kiss (悪魔の投げキッス, Akuma no Nage Kiss, lit. "Demon's Blown Kiss")
attacks.description: Makes a complete fool out of the opponent by blowing them a kiss before hurling meteors and planets at them.

attacks.name: Abduction Beam (アブダション光線, Abduction Kousen, lit. "Abduction Ray")
attacks.description: Fires a beam from the ray gun in its hand.

Vademon X.name: Vademon X
Vademon X.description: Vademon X is an Alien Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It is shaped like something that came from the far reaches of the cosmos, but it's rumored that it was born from the seed of a plant. It could not be imagined from its overdeveloped head and octopus-like lower body, but it carries terrifying offensive power. Due to the X-Antibody, it became the "Defective Alien". Unlike the other Vademon which came in order to invade the Earth, it appears in a shape which has an adverse effect on Earth culture. It thinks that it is the stronger digivolution, but that is only looks, as it's hard for it to see the truth through its sunglasses. However, it is able to master skills which menace enemy Digimon, and is perhaps a step closer to invading the Earth.

attacks.name: Unidentified Flying Kiss (悪魔の投げキッス, Akuma no Nage Kiss, lit. "Demon's Blown Kiss")
attacks.description: Makes a complete fool out of the opponent by blowing them a kiss before hurling meteors and planets at them.

attacks.name: Abduction Beam (アブダション光線, Abduction Kousen, lit. "Abduction Ray")
attacks.description: Fires a beam from the ray gun in its hand.

attacks.name: Angel's Low Kick (天使のローキック, Tenshi no Low Kick)
attacks.description: Smiles while it kicks the opponent's feet, completely distracting them.

Vajramon.name: Vajramon
Vajramon.description: Vajramon is a Beast Digimon. It is the "Ox" Deva, and serves the Digimon Sovereign Ebonwumon. As a follower of Ebonwumon, it is a seeker of truth who is aiming for detachment from material and emotional concerns. Its warrior-like personality values honor, and loathes cowardice and effeminacy. With the most well-tempered physical strength among the Deva, it can easily wield its giant twin Deva Blades (宝劍 Bǎo Jiàn, lit. "Treasure Sword") that it carries on its waist. Among the Deva, it is on especially bad terms with Indramon.

attacks.name: Terra Blade (Rodha)
attacks.description: Uses its forefeet and upper body to strike the ground with its twin Deva Blades, generating fissures that extend up to 50 meters ahead of it and hurl out rocks as the shock waves erupt from underground, which inflicts damage on those nearby.

attacks.name: Deva Blade (宝劍 Bǎo Jiàn, lit. "Treasure Sword")
attacks.description: Crosses the Deva Blades and fires an energy beam at the opponent.

Valkyrimon.name: Valkyrimon
Valkyrimon.description: Valkyrimon is a Warrior Digimon. It is accompanied by the golden bird "Flare", which informs it if danger approaches. Also, it is said that it produces an aurora from the shining armor it wears, which resurrects the data of heroes that have fallen in battle, and returns them to a new Digi-Egg. It is the possessor of such speed that it shows up like a gale, then slashes at the opponent with a swiftness too quick to catch with the eyes. It wields the cursed, absolute zero "Feral Sword" (Fenrir Sword), and the unerring "Aurvandil's Arrow" (アウルヴァンディルの矢, Aurvandil no Ya).

attacks.name: Feral Sword (Fenrir Sword)
attacks.description: Slashes with the Feral Sword to freeze the opponent, bringing their vital functions to a halt.

attacks.name: Aurvandil's Arrow (アウルヴァンディルの矢, Aurvandil no Ya)
attacks.description: Attacks with Aurvandil's Arrow, which never misses.

attacks.name: Laser Javelin
attacks.description: Summons a javelin and launches an explosion from its tips.

attacks.name: Punishing Storm (Sanction Storm)
attacks.description: Raises a tornado to chastise its foes.

Varodurumon.name: Varodurumon
Varodurumon.description: Varodurumon is a Holy Bird Digimon. It is a mythical Digimon that inhabits the stratosphere 40,000 m up in the sky. It possesses six gigantic wings, and when it spreads them to their widest, its wingspan reaches as much as 30 m. According to legend, it is the guardian of the sky, and it is told that it is an ancient Digimon that has existed since the creation of the Digital World. Its feathers normally emit the holy light of its "Purge Shine".

attacks.name: Purge Shine
attacks.description: Clads its body in a barrier of holy light emitted from its feathers that completely invalidates any attacks with an evil will.

attacks.name: Aurora Undulation
attacks.description: Amplifies the purifying light of "Purge Shine" to its maximum and emits it with enough power to pulverize even a star. Because it is emitted at the speed of light, it is nearly impossible to evade.

attacks.name: Aurora Angel R
attacks.description: Unleashes celestial balls of light.

Veedramon.name: Veedramon
Veedramon.description: Veedramonis a Mythical Dragon Digimon. It is a mythical Digimon that, even with the vastness of theDigital World, is said to only exist on theFolder Continent. Its existence is extremely precious, and even on the Folder Continent, it is rarely encountered. Also, it is said that only one Digimon Tamer was able to tame Veedramon. With the exception of it becoming known as Veedramon due to the "V"-shaped pattern on its chest, its way of life is a mystery, but for some reason, it is always mistaken for a dog. It is the owner of offensive power that is uncommon even among Champions, but if it is put into a predicament, it exhibits power that surpasses even that of Ultimates.ExVeemonis a pure breed of Veedramon, and it is said that the variant species is Veedramon.

attacks.name: V-Nova Blast (V-Breath Arrow)
attacks.description: Spews a high-temperature heat ray out of its mouth.

attacks.name: V-Breath Arrow MAX
attacks.description: Concentrates its energy into a giant V-Nova Blast.

attacks.name: Hammer Punch
attacks.description: Powers up its fist and launches a punch at the enemy.

attacks.name: Magnum Punch
attacks.description: Punches an enemy.

attacks.name: Cutting Shoot (Cutter Shoot)
attacks.description: Uses its claws to create multiple flying blades of wind.

Veedramon (Virus).name: Veedramon (Virus)
Veedramon (Virus).description: Veedramon (Virus) is a Mythical Dragon Digimon.

attacks.name: V-Breath Arrow
attacks.description: Spits a high-temperature heat ray from its mouth.

Veemon.name: Veemon
Veemon.description: Veemon is a Dragon Digimon. It is a new species of Digimon that was discovered recently. As a survivor of a species that flourished in the Genesis of the Digital World, it is able to perform "Armor Digivolution", a "pseudo-digivolution" using the Digi-Eggs. Among others, Veemon is an excellent Combat Species, as it possesses hidden power, and demonstrates tremendous abilities by Armor Digivolving. Although it has a mischievous, prank-loving personality, it has another side with a strong sense of justice.

attacks.name: Vee Punch (V-mon Punch)
attacks.description: Swings both of its arms in circles, striking the opponent.

attacks.name: Vee Headbutt (V-mon Head)
attacks.description:
Knocks down the opponent with an intense headbutt.
Kūchū V-mon Head (空中ブイモンヘッド, Kūchū V-mon Head lit. "Aerial V-mon Head")

attacks.name: Kūchū V-mon Head (空中ブイモンヘッド, Kūchū V-mon Head lit. "Aerial V-mon Head")
Hopping Kick
attacks.description: Gains some momentum and jump kicks with both feet.

attacks.name: Boom Boom Punch (ブンブンパンチ, Bunbun Punch, lit. "Buzzing Punch")
attacks.description: Attacks the enemy with both arms swinging.

attacks.name: Volley Kick
attacks.description: Jumps and does an aerial kick.

attacks.name: Victory Rush
attacks.description: A series of punches with boxing gloves that ends in an uppercut.

attacks.name: VeeKnockout (V-mon Knockout)
attacks.description: Slides rapidly forward for a knockout punch.

attacks.name: VeeHeadDrop (V-mon Head Drop)
attacks.description: Jumps up and uses Vee Headbutt to land like a meteor.

attacks.name: Vee Shot (V-Shot)
attacks.description: Fires a small energy blast at the enemy.

attacks.name: Headbutt (ずつきこうげき, Zutsuki Kougeki, lit. "Headbutt Attack")
attacks.description: Attacks with a very strong head butt.

attacks.name: Jab
attacks.description: A quick jab.

attacks.name: Handstand Kick
attacks.description: Puts its hands on the ground and kicks the enemy with both feet.

attacks.name: Roundhouse Kick
attacks.description: A roundhouse kick.

attacks.name: Repeated Stomping Attack
attacks.description: Jumps atop the enemy and repeatedly stomps on their head.

attacks.name: Repeated Kick
attacks.description: Two midair kicks followed by a third, stronger kick when the enemy is on the ground.

attacks.name: Heel Kick
attacks.description: A kick that brings its heel down on the opponent's head.

Vegiemon.name: Vegiemon
Vegiemon.description: Vegiemon is a Carnivorous Vegetation Digimon. It has long, outstretched vines and a wide, open mouth. Although it is a fierce, brutal Digimon that uses the sweet scent it breathes from its mouth to attract small Digimon and its long, tentacle-like vines to pull them in, it is unable to stand against larger Digimon due to its lack of offensive power. As Vegiemon grows, it will start flowering and eventually bear fruit. RedVegiemon's red, ripened form is Vegiemon's true form and has high intelligence and offensive ability, unlike Vegiemon, who is still unripe.

attacks.name: Compost Bomber (ウンチ投げ, Unchi Nage, lit. "Poop Throw")
attacks.description: Shoots several compost poop at opponent.

attacks.name: Super Stinky Jet (超悪臭噴射, Chou Akushū Funsha, lit. "Super Stinky Spray")
attacks.description: Unleashes a stinky breath attack.

attacks.name: Sharp Leaf
attacks.description: Takes three leaves from its back and throws them at the enemy.

attacks.name: Sweet Breath (甘い吐息, Amai Toiki, lit. "Sweet Breath")
Branch Drain
attacks.description: Takes HP from an enemy.

attacks.name: Party Time (ウンチ, Unchi, lit. "Poop")
attacks.description: Throws its own poop in order to defend itself against intruders.

Velgemon.name: Velgemon
Velgemon.description: Velgemon is a Giant Bird Digimon. It possesses power over Darkness which bears the might of AncientSphinxmon. It has the appearance of a monstrous, colossal bird, and due to its baleful appearance and nature, it is called the "Corpse Swallower". It transforms from Duskmon into fine particles, then comes flying out of a sky shrouded by the massive black fog they became. The intensely proud Duskmon hates transforming into the ugly, irrational Velgemon, so it doesn't show its Velgemon appearance unless under extreme circumstances. In normal battles, its main tools of combat are its claws which have a tendency to blind the opponent, and its fangs which can crunch even metal.

attacks.name: Dark Obliteration (Zone Deleter)
attacks.description: Flaps its wings with all its power, blowing away the opponent and all of the space around them to another dimension.

attacks.name: Dark Vortex (Master of Darkness)
attacks.description: Changes the opponent's nature to darkness and manipulates them to its heart's content.

title: Corpse Swallower
(死者を飲み込むもの
Shisha o Nomikomu-mono?)

Vemmon.name: Vemmon
Vemmon.description: Vemmon is an Unknown Digimon. It is an artificial Digimon that someone created through the process of experimentation. It is programmed only to eat and get stronger.

attacks.name: Messer Claw (Deu: Knife Claw)
attacks.description: Slashes enemies with its razor claws.

attacks.name: Fusionize
attacks.description: After defeating an enemy, it consumes it.

VenomMyotismon.name: VenomMyotismon
VenomMyotismon.description: VenomMyotismonis an Evil Digimon. It is a demon beast that has the lower half of a beast and an upper half with a beetle-like shell, and is the true, digivolved form of the king of darkness,Myotismon. As VenomMyotismon, who has unleashed its hidden power, it has nothing but omnicidal and destructive impulses, and Myotismon, who originally maintained its gentlemanly conduct, reason, and intelligence, hates exposing its true, ugly form.

attacks.name: Venom Infusion (Venom Infuse)
attacks.description: Injects a destructive computer virus within the body of the enemy Digimon, destroying all of their configuration data and terminating their functions.

attacks.name: Chaos Flame
attacks.description: Fires purple flames from its abdomen.

attacks.name: Tyrant Savage
attacks.description: Swipes at the opponent with a flaming claw.

VenomMyotismon Undead.name: VenomMyotismon Undead
debut: Super Evolution Stage Digimon Adventure Tri. ~The Adventure of August 1st~
VenomMyotismon Undead.description: VenomMyotismon Undead resembles a more savage-lookingVenomMyotismonwith a black aura around it.

Venusmon.name: Venusmon
Venusmon.description: Venusmon is a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", it is a Digimon that is filled with compassion and rules over love. Wherever Venusmon is, beautiful flowers bloom profusely no matter how ruined the soil is, and the land's youthful vigor is revived. It is said that there are many Digimon who serve the pure and beautiful Venusmon. Venusmon can correctly perceive the world with its mind's eye by blindfolding itself, and it isn't taken in by any lie or deception. Furthermore, it restrains its overflowing glamour by concealing its pupils, so it's also a consideration to keep from adding more swooning Digimon. Venusmon is always accompanied by its bird "Olive" and its scallop "Hotan", small friends who can speak animatedly and unreservedly with Venusmon. Because it is a Digimon that rules over love, it uses a fighting style that pacifies the opponent's heart with each gesture.

attacks.name: Healing Therapy
attacks.description: Makes the opponent's fighting spirit vanish just by caressing their head. In Digimon New Century, Hotan heals Venusmon and its allies then increases their attack's powers.

attacks.name: LOVE YOU
attacks.description: Blows a kiss that makes the opponents who receive it fall over from the shock.

attacks.name: Peace Fantasia
attacks.description: Has Olive prick the opponent in the head, making it have peaceful intentions no matter what kind of ferocious personality it has. In Digimon New Century, Venusmon throws Olive at the enemy.

Vermilimon.name: Vermilimon
Vermilimon.description: Vermilimon is a Dinosaur Digimon. It is a Digimon with a huge horn. It is thought to be the digivolved form of Monochromon, which lives near volcanoes, and its armor-like skin, which is as hard as a diamond, is resistant to heat from volcanoes.

attacks.name: Volcanic Strike II (Volcano Strike S)
attacks.description: Shoots a fireball more powerful than Monochromon's at the enemy.

attacks.name: Hard Tackle
attacks.description: Charges fiercely and then violently rams the enemy with its horn.

attacks.name: Volcanic Strike (Volcano Strike)
attacks.description: A powerful flame shot.

attacks.name: Re-Format (Trick Void)
attacks.description: Removes enemy status changes.

VictoryGreymon.name: VictoryGreymon
VictoryGreymon.description: VictoryGreymon is a Dragon Man Digimon. A subspecies of WarGreymon, whose body is clad in armor of the super-metal "Chrome Digizoid", it easily wields its gigantic crushing sword "Dramon Breaker", and is the "Dragon Warrior of Heroes" that fights against its opponents with unique sword techniques. In addition, VictoryGreymon possesses an evolutionary code that differs from Digimon that were naturally born in the Digital World, and it is thought that it is a Digimon that digivolved from a Digi-Egg that was produced due to artificial data intervention.

attacks.name: Dramon Breaker
attacks.description: Performs a heroic sword technique with the Dramon Breaker in which it strikes the opponent, instead of slashing, pulverizing them.

attacks.name: Trident Gaia
attacks.description: Splits the Dramon Breaker and equips the pieces to its arm, takes all the energy within the atmosphere and concentrates it into the tips of its sword, then fires it.

attacks.name: Victory Charge
attacks.description: Performs a unique sword technique with the Dramon Breaker which reflects back an opponent's attack.

attacks.name: Victory Shield
attacks.description: Unites the shells equipped on its back into a shield, which it wields.

title: Dragon Warrior of Heroes
(豪傑の竜戦士
Gouketsu no Ryuu Senshi?)

Vikaralamon.name: Vikaralamon
Vikaralamon.description: Vikaralamon is an Animal Digimon. It is the "Pig" Deva, and serves the Digimon Sovereign Ebonwumon. As a follower of Ebonwumon, it is an observer-type that gazes on everything from the outside without ever losing its broad smile. Although it has a special skill of sleeping with its eyes open, it soon comes to light that it is sleeping due to its intense snoring and the grinding of its teeth. The wheel of light that it spews from its mouth is called the "Bao Ran" (宝輪 Bǎo Lún, lit. "Treasure Wheel"), and its effect differs depending on its color; a blue Bao Ran captures the opponent, a yellow Bao Ran is able to have things placed on it by taking the shape of a disk, if one passes through a green Bao Ran, their wounds are instantly healed, and so on, as there are several variations.

attacks.name: Bao Ran (宝輪 Bǎo Lún, lit. "Treasure Wheel")
Fusion Ball (Súkara)
attacks.description: Bores through the opponent with a red Bao Ran.

attacks.name: Boar Bog
attacks.description: Regurgitates black sticky goo from its mouth.

Vikemon.name: Vikemon
Vikemon.description: Vikemon is a Beast Man Digimon. It is a Mega Digimon which governs the freezing lands of the permafrost, where nothing ever thaws. Its fur has become like ice crystals, and is said to be as hard as Chrome Digizoid. With the morning star "Mjollnir" it carries on its back, it can annihilate a mountain in one swing, distorting space itself. It manages the Ikkakumon and Zudomon corps, and although in the midst of battle it appears as a heartless berserker, it shows a face of great compassion for its subordinates.

attacks.name: Arctic Blizzard
attacks.description: Momentarily brings the surrounding atmosphere to absolute zero, flash-freezing the opponent, who it then smashes with Mjöllnir. The attack is named after the fact that the opponent's smashed body becomes like a blizzard.

attacks.name: Viking Flare (Viking Flail)
attacks.description: Uses the morning star on its back to unleash powerful hits.

attacks.name: Bazooka Howl (Berserk Howl)
attacks.description: Howls with all of its berserker rage.

attacks.name: Mjollnir Hammer
attacks.description: Attack with the weapon "Mjollnir".

attacks.name: Mjollnir
attacks.description: Uses the morning star on its back to unleash powerful hits.

Vilemon.name: Vilemon
Vilemon.description: Vilemon is an Evil Digimon. It abhors losing, so it is a coward that torments the weak with pricks, without getting into direct combat. It seems it is credited as being the source of the Dark-species Digimon that inhabit the Dark Area, but there are still many mysteries.

attacks.name: Nightmare Shocker (Nightmare Shock)
attacks.description: Subjects the opponent to a nightmare that it can't wake up from using a supersonic wave it emits from its mouth.

attacks.name: Touch of Evil (Death Claw)
attacks.description: Slashes enemies with power of darkness.

Viximon.name: Viximon

otherNames.name: 小狐獸/小狐兽 Xiǎo hú shòu

Viximon.description: Viximon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a nocturnal Digimon that digivolved from Relemon. Due to it only acting in the evening and on moonlit nights, it is said that its existence is close to an illusion. For that reason, it confers a kind of status among Tamers to raise a Viximon. It will grow into an extremely heartening Digimon depending on how it was raised. It always acts to avoid public notice, and although it is difficult to capture Viximon, who is swift and speedy despite its appearance, it will show up without thinking if you set out its favorite food of fried tofu.

attacks.name: Killing Stone (殺生石, Sesshou-seki)
attacks.description: Changes into a stone that spouts a toxic gas.

Volcamon.name: Volcamon
Volcamon.description: Volcamon is an Android Digimon. It is a powerful Digimon with a large build. It is named Volcamon after how the volcano on its back will erupt when its anger reaches its peak, or when its excitement surpasses its maximum. Furthermore, it is not only a strong opponent but also a close rival of Etemon's. Its deafening voice shakes the atmosphere and causes the earth to tremble.

attacks.name: Magma Bass (Big Bang Voice)
attacks.description: Stuns the enemy with a heavy bass mike performance.

attacks.name: Tackle Time (Big Bang Tackle)
attacks.description: A mighty tackle with the power to destroy even mountains.

Volcanicdramon.name: Volcanicdramon
Volcanicdramon.description: Volcanicdramon is an Earth Dragon Digimon. It is a Digimon said to be a dragon that swims in magma; it is thought to live in a place so deep underground that not even Digimon that move about there can reach it. According to some researchers, there are a few who argue that it might have been Volcanicdramon that supported the World from deep beneath the ground ever since the Digital World was created. Should Volcanicdramon ever rise to the surface, it may be that some kind of crisis is occurring in the Digital World.

attacks.name: Volcanic Flare
attacks.description: Spews scorching hot flames from its mouth. The area incinerated by Volcanicdramon never returns to the way it was, and becomes an uninhabitable wasteland for all eternity.

attacks.name: Glide Blaze
attacks.description: Rams the enemy while sending out scorching flames hotter than even magma from its whole body.

Volcdramon.name: Volcdramon
Volcdramon.description: Volcdramon is a Dragon Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It is a volcanic dragon Digimon that inhabits the magma beds of the active volcanoes that dot the Digital World. It is said that volcanic eruptions occur due to the activity of Volcdramon, so the Digital World's volcanologists study not volcanic activity, but the activity of Volcdramon and the stirring of volcanoes. Although its appearance is that of a terrifying figure, its personality is gentle, and it is not the type to like conflict. However, if it's offended just once, you will surely suffer its scorching attacks like a "raging fire".

attacks.name: Volcanic Fount
attacks.description: Sprays super-heated magma.

attacks.name: Circle of Death
attacks.description: Attacks with a deadly sulfur that makes everyone in a 10km radius faint.

Vorvomon.name: Vorvomon
Vorvomon.description: Vorvomon is a Rock Dragon Digimon. It is a Digimon made of a hard, hot ore. There are wings on both of its arms so it is able to fly for up to a few seconds, but it gets tired easily. Due to it being very passionate, the more excited it gets, the more the temperature of its horns and claws will increase.

attacks.name: Petit Flame
attacks.description: Spews out a small, high-temperature flame from its mouth.

Vulcanusmon.name: Vulcanusmon
Vulcanusmon.description: Vulcanusmon is a Deity Digimon. One of the "Olympos XII", it is a Digimon god of smithery. Most well-known weapons are the work of Vulcanusmon, and the famous "Berenjena" (Esp: Eggplant) shotgun cherished by Beelzemon is also an article of Vulcanusmon's, as well as Astamon's prided machine gun, the "Oro Salmón" (Esp: Gold Salmon), and Sparrowmon's twin pistols, the "Zanahoria" (Esp: Carrot). It has an artisan's pride and a stubborn personality. It sees through the competence of its clients, and when it feels that they can not master or will not treasure the weapon, it will deny the request. When building, it performs with a standard of work corresponding to the other party. As such, the Berenjena that it put all of its effort into after being charmed by Beelzemon's power is considered to be an excellent article, even by Vulcanusmon. Although it's a Digimon that freely manipulates its eight arms and works in silence, it exhibits an artisan's style even in battle. However, Vulcanusmon's own fighting ability is not very great, so it prefers working behind the scenes to fighting in person.

attacks.name: Pinpoint Weapon Works
attacks.description: Uses its "Bomber Art" and manufactures then and there an appropriate weapon to fit the situation.

attacks.name: Appropriate Works
attacks.description: Manufactures weapons by performing "Pinpoint Weapon Works" one after another, then equips them to each of its arms in order to fully unleash all of its power.

attacks.name: Bomber Art
attacks.description: Radiates flames to use for welding.

Vulturemon.name: Vulturemon
Vulturemon.description: Vulturemonis a Bird Man Digimon. It is a Digimon whose cruelty is unrivalled, it prioritizes its own interests above all else. Feared as the "Reaper of Dust", it has excellent eyesight such that it can shoot its targets even in sandstorms. It wears its camouflage cloak in areas where it has a clear view, hides itself and waits for an opportunity to arise. Then, it quietly brings down the enemy using the outstandingsilencingperformance of its "CND-96" rifle, which shoots out compressed sand.

attacks.name: Reaper Strike
attacks.description: Shoots at the opponent's vitals with the "CND-96" on its right arm.

attacks.name: Desert Death Scythe (Desert Deathscythe)
attacks.description: Tears the enemy to pieces with the scythe attached to the "CND-96".

attacks.name: Witherwing (Wither Wing)
attacks.description: When cornered by masses of enemies, it turns the tables against them and shoots out hordes of condors made of sand.

title: Reaper of Dust
(砂塵の死神
Sajin no Shinigami?)

Wanyamon.name: Wanyamon
Wanyamon.description: Wanyamon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a Digimon fused from the data of small, pet animals like dogs and cats. Because its unexpected movements are also quick, caution is necessary so that it doesn't get away, but it becomes very emotionally attached if shown affection like a pet.

attacks.name: Smile Fang
attacks.description: Suddenly bites, after appearing amply charming.

attacks.name: Frothy Spit (さんのアワ, San no Awa, lit. "Acid Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits acid foam at an enemy.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Produces bubbles from its mouth to intimidate the opponent.

WarGreymon.name: WarGreymon

otherNames.name: 戰鬥暴龍獸/战斗暴龙兽 Zhàndòu bào lóng shòu

WarGreymon.description: WarGreymonis a Dragon Digimon. The strongest dragon warrior whose body is clad in armor of the super-metal "Chrome Digizoid", it is the ultimate form ofGreymon-speciesDigimon. Though it differs from the gigantic figure seen in Greymon-species Digimon, and has the form of a Man-type, it has rapidly improved its speed and power, and it is likely impossible to defeat it with the attacks of an Ultimate Digimon. The "Dramon Destroyers" (Dramon Killers) equipped to both of its arms exhibit immense power againstDramon-species Digimon, while simultaneously being double-edged swords that put its own life at great risk. Also, when the shells equipped on its back unite into one, they become the "Brave Shield", which is a shield of the strongest toughness. It is said that the moment that a true hero among veteran warriors awakens to its own mission, it digivolves into WarGreymon.

attacks.name: Terra Force (Gaia Force)
attacks.description:
Takes all of the energy within the atmosphere and concentrates it into one spot, then fires it as an extremely dense, high-temperature energy shot.
Kūchū Gaia Force (空中ガイアフォース, Kūchū Gaia Force lit. "Aerial Gaia Force")
Yūki no Gaia Force (勇気のガイアフォース, Yūki no Gaia Force lit. "Gaia Force of Courage")

attacks.name: Kūchū Gaia Force (空中ガイアフォース, Kūchū Gaia Force lit. "Aerial Gaia Force")
Yūki no Gaia Force (勇気のガイアフォース, Yūki no Gaia Force lit. "Gaia Force of Courage")
Great Tornado
attacks.description: Spins at tremendous speed like a tornado and launches itself at the enemy.

attacks.name: Brave Shield
attacks.description: Uses its "Brave Shield" to defend.

attacks.name: Mega Claw (Dramon Killer)
attacks.description:
Slashes its "Dramon Killer" gauntlets.
Kūchū Dramon Killer (空中ドラモンキラー, Kūchū Dramon Killer lit. "Aerial Dramon Killer")
Dramon Killer Combo

attacks.name: Kūchū Dramon Killer (空中ドラモンキラー, Kūchū Dramon Killer lit. "Aerial Dramon Killer")
Grey Fire
attacks.description: Shoots a small fireball.

attacks.name: War Driver
attacks.description: Builds up energy in its claws and strikes the enemy down with them.

attacks.name: Dramon Tackle
attacks.description: Runs forward, charging into the opponent.

attacks.name: Tate no Rocket (たてのロケット, Tate no Rocket lit. "Shield Rocket")
attacks.description: Fires a Dramon Destroyer at the enemy.

WarGreymon X.name: WarGreymon X
WarGreymon X.description: WarGreymon X is a Dragon Digimon and a carrier of the X-Antibody. Because of its mission as a true hero, it must have 100% success in battle. It has imparted the strongest toughness of the "Brave Shield" to the "Dramon Killers", leading to it possessing perfected equipment of unified offense and defense. Due to its fighting style, in which it instantly plunges into the heart of the enemy with the vernier it has equipped to its back, which boast explosive acceleration at the expense of it being able to fly for extended periods, it has certainly become the strongest form of land combat Digimon, a "Land War Hero".

attacks.name: Terra Force (Gaia Force)
attacks.description: Takes all of the energy within the atmosphere and concentrates it into one spot, then fires it as an extremely dense, high-temperature energy shot.

attacks.name: Gaia Force ZERO
attacks.description: Instantly fires "Gaia Force" at the heart of the enemy as a point-blank attack that seems impossible to evade.

attacks.name: Afterburst
attacks.description: Performs a one-hit knockout technique by accelerating its attacks with its vernier applied to the Dramon Killers.

attacks.name: Doramon Killer (Dramon Killer)
attacks.description: Uses both claws to do a Dramon Killer attack.

attacks.name: Grey Fire Zero (Grey Fire ZERO)
attacks.description: Shoots a small fireball.

attacks.name: Great Tornado
attacks.description: Creates a huge tornado.

attacks.name: Poseidon Force
attacks.description: Takes all of the energy within the hydrosphere and concentrates it into one spot, then fires it as an extremely dense, high-pressure energy shot.

title: Land War Hero
(陸戦の勇者
Rikusen no Yūsha?)

WarGrowlmon.name: WarGrowlmon
WarGrowlmon.description: WarGrowlmonis an Android Digimon. As its name suggests, its body has grown gigantic, and its upper body has been metallized with "Chrome Digizoid". It is able to take flight with the twovernierattached to its shoulders, so it is possible for it to perform bothanti-airandanti-groundattacks. In order to restrain it from running wild due to excess power, a restraining tool similar to abitis attached to its jaw section. Also, since the "Assault Balancer" extending like a cable from its back section is extensible, it can be used to impale the opponent. It has the "Pendulum Blades" equipped to its arms.

attacks.name: Radiation Blade (Double Edge)
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with the Pendulum Blades.

attacks.name: Atomic Blaster
attacks.description: Fires an attack from both of the gunports on its chest that destroys the opponent on the atomic level.

attacks.name: Megalo Spark
attacks.description: Emits an electric shock from its chest.

attacks.name: Hammer Edge
attacks.description: Stabs the enemy with its Chrome Digizoid claws.

attacks.name: Assault Balancer
attacks.description: Impales the enemy with its "Assault Balancer" and then throws them.

title: Great Growlmon
Giant Growlmon

WarGrowlmon (Yellow).name: WarGrowlmon (Yellow)

otherNames.name: メガログラウモン（黄） MegaloGrowmon (Yellow)

WarGrowlmon (Yellow).description: WarGrowlmon (Yellow)is a Cyborg Digimon. It digivolved from adata-type Growlmon. The restraint on its jaw keeps it under control.It can annihilate its enemies with the variety of weapons it has.

attacks.name: Double Edge
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with the Pendulum Blades.

attacks.name: Atomic Blaster
attacks.description: Fires an attack from both of the gunports on its chest that destroys the opponent on the atomic level.

attacks.name: Megalo Spark
attacks.description: Emits an electric shock from its chest.

attacks.name: Hammer Edge
attacks.description: Stabs the enemy with its Chrome Digizoid claws.

WarGrowlmon X.name: WarGrowlmon X
WarGrowlmon X.description: WarGrowlmon Xis a Cyborg Digimon and carrier of theX Antibody. It gained the ability to change the extraordinary power of the "Digital Hazard" contained within its body into a variety of energy shots and fire them from the attack units on each part of it, and is called the "Deep-crimson Heavy Tank". The giant cannon on its chest is used to fire its Atomic Megalo Blaster.

attacks.name: Atomic Blaster
attacks.description: Fires the twin guns on its chest to destroy enemies at the atomic level. It now also uses its arms as well as its chest, making it four times as powerful as before.

attacks.name: Double Edge
attacks.description: Slices through foes using the two Pendulum Blades on its arms.

attacks.name: Double Edge Σ
attacks.description: Slices through foes with its Pendulum Blades Σ.

title: Deep-crimson Heavy Tank

WaruMonzaemon.name: WaruMonzaemon
WaruMonzaemon.description: WaruMonzaemon is a Puppet Digimon. This fiendish-faced Puppet Digimon is a far cry from Monzaemon. It's on good terms with MetalEtemon, and it is said that the WaruMonzaemon plush toy it wears on its waist is something that WaruMonzaemon sent to it. Still, similar to Monzaemon, its true identity is unclear, but the peeking out of its strange, shining eyes from within is eerie. Its personality is the epitome of wickedness, and it is malicious and treacherous. Its left arm is equipped with the character "Evil" (惡, Waru) and the powerful "Bear Claw", which is based on Grizzlymon's "Kuma Tsume" (熊爪, "Kuma Tsume" lit. "Bear Claws").

attacks.name: Heart Break Attack Gives everything a dark mood and depresses them, making the opponent's feeling become dark and sorrowful so that they completely lose their fighting spirit.

WaruSeadramon.name: WaruSeadramon
WaruSeadramon.description: WaruSeadramon is an Aquatic Digimon. It is a Seadramon-species Digimon that evolved in wickedness. It is able to control the powers of darkness with the blade-like horn on its head. Its personality has become even more sly, and its tenacity in chasing its prey exceeds that of MegaSeadramon.

attacks.name: Dark Blast (Darkstrom)
attacks.description: Engulfs the enemy in a whirlpool produced with the powers of darkness.

attacks.name: Evil Icicle
attacks.description: Drops a giant icicle summoned from its horn. Some media depict it as firing a dark beam of energy.

attacks.name: Strange Mist
attacks.description: Breathes out a debilitating mist.

attacks.name: Thunder Blade
attacks.description: Stabs the enemy with the electrified blade on its head.

attacks.name: Thunder Javelin
attacks.description: Fires a high voltage charge from the blade on its head.

attacks.name: Doramon Attack (Dramon Attack)
attacks.description: Use the blade on its head to pierce through the enemy.

attacks.name: Maelstrom
attacks.description: Creates an electrified tornado.

attacks.name: Poison Wave (Variable Wave)
attacks.description: Gives its attacks the chance to Poison.

Waspmon.name: Waspmon
Waspmon.description: Waspmon is a Cyborg Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody. It defends the mysterious "aerial, covert honey base, Royal Base". The antenna-parts on its head have high reconnaissance ability, so it is always patrolling the vicinity on the lookout for Digimon approaching the base, and will come swooping down on them just for coming close. By using the propellers on its shoulders and the stabilizers on its back, it is able to rapidly move up, down, forward, back, left, right, or in any direction, which allows it to defend against approaching enemies and drive them off with its powerful laser cannon.

attacks.name: Turbo Stinger
attacks.description: Rapid-fires its wide-aperture laser cannon.

attacks.name: Bear Buster
attacks.description: A single blow fired after charging up energy. This technique can bring down even larger Digimon, but it is difficult to hit agile enemies with it, so it is mainly used against enemies on the ground.

Weddinmon.name: Weddinmon
Weddinmon.description: Weddinmon is a Fairy Digimon. It is a Digimon with an appearance resembling a lady wearing a large cake-shaped dress. It thinks that if everyone is happy, it will be happy, and when it sees Digimon who it is close to, it will organize a commemorative event without asking and deliver happiness with an extra-large cake made in collaboration with Shortmon. The Digimon that are involved are astonished, but since they can eat delicious cake, everything is instantly transformed into a happy space. For Digimon that try to destroy happiness, it restricts their movements with "Whip Decoration" and "Cake Cutting".

attacks.name: Whip Decoration
attacks.description: Flings fresh cream from the tip of its fan.

attacks.name: Cake Cutting
attacks.description: Splits the enemy in two with a razor-sharp knifehand strike.

attacks.name: Happiness Fall
attacks.description: An enormous cake is dropped from overhead and explodes. It is a super-surprise technique where the explosive power changes drastically depending on the size of the cake.

Weedmon.name: Weedmon
Weedmon.description: Weedmon is a Vegetation Digimon. A subspecies of the Vegiemon species whose body is completely green. Unlike Vegiemon, it does not ripen and turn red; in turn, it has obtained the vitality of a weed, allowing it to survive no matter how many times it is cut or beaten.

attacks.name: Deadly Ivy (Squeeze Vine)
attacks.description: Uses its vine arms to squeeze the enemy.

attacks.name: Branch Drain
attacks.description: Takes HP from an enemy.

Wendigomon.name: Wendigomon
Wendigomon.description: Wendigomon is an Animal Digimon. Lopmon underwent a "Dark Digivolution" due to anger and hatred, becoming a brutal Animal Digimon. It is not completely "evil" and deep within its heart, it possesses the gentle side it had while it was Lopmon. However, its "warmth" can be broken by the power of its anger, so that it runs the whole gamut of destruction. Also, it has the ability to manipulate time and space, and is able to warp by passing through other dimensions, as well as to create a special space.

attacks.name: Koko Crusher (Destroyed Voice)
attacks.description: Destroys even rocks with a shock wave.

attacks.name: Cable Crusher (Club Arm)
attacks.description: Swings both of its arms like clubs.

attacks.name: Heavy Attack
attacks.description: Attacks with a blow with the power of a beast.

WereGarurumon.name: WereGarurumon
WereGarurumon.description: WereGarurumonis an Animal Digimon. It digivolved fromGarurumonand became able to walk on two legs. It lost its speed due to becoming bipedal, but became a Commando Type Digimon with stronger offensive and defensive power, as well as developing a tactical nature. Its kicking techniques, which it unleashes using the leg strength it inherited from Garurumon, are quite strong, so its jumping ability contends for first or second place among other Digimon. Also, it is rich with loyalty, and has a reliable nature, faithfully executing its mission if its master gives it an order.

attacks.name: Wolf Claw (Kaiser Nail)
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with the sharp claws on both of its hands.

attacks.name: Garuru Kick
attacks.description: Strikes with a powerful kick.

attacks.name: Blow Hard (Baldy Blow)
attacks.description: Punches the enemy with its spiked brass knuckles.

attacks.name: Garuru Kick (円月蹴り, Engetsugeri, lit. "Circle Moon Kick")
attacks.description: Kicks the enemy while doing a backflip.

attacks.name: Fox Fire
attacks.description: Breathes out an intense blue flame.

WereGarurumon Sagittarius Mode.name: WereGarurumon Sagittarius Mode
WereGarurumon Sagittarius Mode.description: WereGarurumon Sagittarius Mode is a Beast Man Digimon. It is a form that acquired "Sagittarius", mobility equipment that makes up for the agility that it lost when it digivolved from Garurumon. It has gained firepower, in addition to high-speed movement and the ability to fly thanks to the Sagittarius' booster function. Its loyal personality hasn't changed, and it has developed into a more reliable battlefield professional that rescues its master in any predicament. It lures its target into battle situations that it specializes in.

attacks.name: Kaus-slugger
attacks.description: A sharp blade emitted from the Sagittarius that heads toward the enemy while forming an arc.

attacks.name: Alnas Shot
attacks.description: A double laser cannon that accurately picks off the enemies vitals.

attacks.name: Kaiser Nail
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with the sharp claws on both of its hands.

WereGarurumon X.name: WereGarurumon X
WereGarurumon X.description: WereGarurumon Xis an Animal Digimon and carrier of theX-Antibody. It is known for a fact that it has acquired a more powerful physique. With its physique, which has nearly doubled in strength, this stout-legged beast warrior dishes out energetic kicks powerful enough to send even heavyweight Digimon flying with a single strike. ItsChrome Digizoidequipment is made to be thin and lightweight, so as not to hinder its movements when it carries out its kicking techniques. This combat specialist is balanced in both offense and defense, and is a reliable Digimon who will fight and use its own body to shield its master when the situation calls for it.

attacks.name: Wolf Claw (Kaiser Nail)
attacks.description: Cuts the opponent to pieces with the sharp claws on both of its hands.

attacks.name: Garuru Kick
attacks.description: Thrusts a powerful kick at the opponent.

WezenGammamon.name: WezenGammamon
WezenGammamon.description: WezenGammamon is a Ceratopsian Digimon. It is the Champion of Gammamon that has taken on a quadrupedal appearance, it now has an imposing attitude and a generous heart. It is equipped with firearms on various parts of its body; the two horns on its calvaria have turned into long-range cannons, the horn on its snout has turned into a anti-aircraft gun, and the tips of its four feet have turned into small autocannons, and it is capable of firing them. The normal pace of its actions is slow.

attacks.name: Sedna
attacks.description: Shoots high-powered shells from its two cannons.

attacks.name: Albion
attacks.description: A positron cannon which is shot from its long gun barrel while it pierces its tail into the ground to replenish energy. It boasts the greatest offensive power of WezenGammamon. However, each time it shoots, the exhaust port opens and radiates heat, so it is unable to rapid-fire.

Whamon.name: Whamon
Whamon.description: Whamonis an Aquatic Mammal Digimon. It lives in the deepoceans of the Net, and has a large build. Its enormity is of the highest class in the Digital World, and due to that enormity, it carries a volume of data that couldn't be processed by a normal computer. Although it has been possible to confirm it as the same species as those inFile Island's coastal waters, this Whamon, which lives off ofFolder Continent's coast, and whose appearance is totally the same, has surpassed the previous in both offensive ability and vitality, and accomplished a digivolution to Ultimate.There is a phantom "White Whamon", which is being pursued byHookmon.

attacks.name: Jet Arrow Shoots a jet of water from his blowhole.
Tidal Wave
attacks.description: Generates a giant tidal wave that destroys everything.

attacks.name: Great Chomp (口ではさむこうげき, Kuchi de Hasamu Kougeki, Lit: Mouth-clamping Attack)
attacks.description: Grab the enemy using huge mouth.

attacks.name: Sweet Chomp (口であま～くこうげき, Kuchi de Ama~ku Kougeki, Lit: Sweet Mouth Attack)
attacks.description: Grab the enemy sweetly.

Whamon (Champion).name: Whamon (Champion)
Whamon (Champion).description: Whamonis a Sea Animal Digimon. Whamon inhabits the "Net Ocean" (the Network's ocean where Digimon are born). Since it lives in the deepest parts of the Net Ocean, it is rarely ever encountered (the organs in parts of it equivalent to its eyes have degenerated). Due to its ferocious personality, it will attack by generating an enormous tsunami.There is a phantom "White Whamon", which is being pursued byHookmon.

attacks.name: Tidal Wave
attacks.description: Generates a giant tidal wave that destroys everything.

attacks.name: Kuchi de Hasamu Kougeki (口ではさむこうげき, Kuchi de Hasamu Kougeki lit
attacks.description: Mouth-clamping Attack)

Wingdramon.name: Wingdramon
Wingdramon.description: Wingdramon is a Sky Dragon Digimon. It possesses greatly developed wings which allow it to fly freely through the air. Because the scales on its wings are capable of blocking gravity, it is able to fly without flapping its wings. It seldom lands on the ground, and spends most of its time living in the sky. It is said that its air speed exceeds Mach 20, and there are few Digimon who can survive a dog fight with Wingdramon.

attacks.name: Blaze Sonic Breath
attacks.description: Fires scorching breath from its mouth by exceeding the speed of sound.

attacks.name: Exploding Sonic Breath (Explode Sonic Lance)
attacks.description: Accelerates up to maximum speed in a nose dive at the opponent, then strikes them with the lance on its back.

attacks.name: Wing Blast
attacks.description: Generates a shock wave by moving at supersonic speed, which injures the opponent even if they parry its other attacks.

Wisemon.name: Wisemon
Wisemon.description: Wisemon is a Demon Man Digimon. A Digimon completely shrouded in mystery, Wisemon was born in a region of Witchelny without a Sorcerous affinity, and can appear anywhere in time and space via the Book. Treating the Book as a spiritual vessel, it frequently alters its shape to appear anywhere within the spaces and times which the Book has connected, and it is said that its true form remains within a separate dimension. Among researchers, it is rumored that it is in the same family as Piedmon, and of the same Demon Man type. The Space-time Stones it holds in its hands are able to playback a record of a space, preserving every event or object of the Digital World within space and time.

attacks.name: Pandora Dialogue
attacks.description: Repeatedly preserves the opponent's attacks within space and time, then plays them back at high speed.

attacks.name: Eternal Nirvana
attacks.description: Imprisons the opponent within the Space-time Stones for an eternity.

Witchmon.name: Witchmon
Witchmon.description: Witchmon is a Demon Man Digimon. It came along from "Witchelny", the Digital World of another dimension, in pursuit of its rival, Wizardmon. In its native Witchelny it mastered the sorcery (advanced programming language) of wind and water, and in order to gain an advantage on Wizardmon, who aims to become a great wizard, it followed and diligently trains in this Digital World. It's a little cruel, it has great pride, and it despises customs and rules.

attacks.name: Baluluna Gale
attacks.description: Attacks with a sharp wind carrying magical power.

attacks.name: Aquary Pressure
attacks.description: Attacks with water of such extremely high pressure that it is enough to penetrate steel.

Wizardmon.name: Wizardmon
Wizardmon.description: Wizardmon is a Wizard Digimon. It is an advanced Digimon that came from Witchelny, the Digital World of another dimension. In its native Digital World it mastered the sorcery (advanced programming language) of fire and earth, and although it aimed to become a great wizard, it appeared in the Digimon World in order to train. Although it has a personality that likes playing a few practical jokes, because it has another, shyer side, it tries to never show its uncovered face.

attacks.name: Electro Squall (Thunder Cloud)
attacks.description: Summons a thunder cloud which unleashes an intense lightning strike.

attacks.name: Magical Game (Magic Game)
attacks.description: Demonstrates the breadth of its magical knowledge, from offensive abilities to invisibility and illusions.

attacks.name: Thunder Bomb
attacks.description: Releases a ball of energy with varying effects, from explosive energy to memory erasure.

attacks.name: Vision of Terror (Terror Illusion)
attacks.description: Exploits the target's fears with terrifying visions.

attacks.name: Blink Breeze
attacks.description: Creates a blast of wind from its staff.

attacks.name: Magic Heal
attacks.description: Uses a green aura to heal an ally.

Wizardmon X.name: Wizardmon X
debut: Digimon Chronicle X, "Courage from Another World" [18]
Wizardmon X.description: Wizardmon X is a Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody. It is more strongly influenced by the Eneruge Clan from Witchelny, and the magical power within it has also increased due to X-evolving. Also, as an additional result of wandering across several worlds and training, it acquired lightning sorcery powerful enough to cause things to disintegrate at the quantum level using both of its hands.

attacks.name: Thunder Cloud
attacks.description: Summons a thunder cloud, which unleashes an intense lightning strike.

attacks.name: Bolt Break
attacks.description: Lightning sorcery powerful enough to cause things to disintegrate at the quantum level using both of its hands.

Woodmon.name: Woodmon
Woodmon.description: Woodmon is a Vegetation Digimon. Woodmon is shaped like a giant, withered tree. It's made of normal wood, and lives by grabbing passing Digimon and draining their energy. It can also move around on its root-like feet. Violent by nature, it will attack relentlessly when angered. Its strong tree trunk gives it high defense but weakness against fire. This makes it weak against fire Digimon like Meramon or Birdramon, which it regards as enemies.

attacks.name: Branch Bash (Branch Drain)
attacks.description: Stabs foes with its branches and drains their energy.

attacks.name: Woody Smash
attacks.description: Uses both hands to hit the enemy as hard as possible.

attacks.name: Leaf Slider
attacks.description: Attacks by throwing sharp leaves.

attacks.name: Drain Buster
attacks.description: Use its poisonous arms to hit the enemy.

Wormmon.name: Wormmon
Wormmon.description: Wormmon is a Larva Digimon. It has a timid, cowardly personality. Just like Veemon and the others, it's a descendant of an ancient species, so it is able to perform special Armor Digivolutions, but since Wormmon is powerless when by itself, it can't possibly match up to larger Digimon. However, by armor digivolving with the power of the Digi-Eggs, it is able to manifest unbelievable power. Also, it is said that in order for the fragile larva to grow into a powerful imago, Wormmon will one day digivolve into a Champion overflowing with power. It can definitely be said that it is a Digimon who has hidden potential for the future.

attacks.name:
Sticky Net (ネバネバネット, Nebaneba Net): Spits out the threads of a tough, adhesive net, completely restricting the opponent's movements.
Modified Sticky Net (ネバネバネット・改, Nebaneba Netto Kai)
attacks.description: A variation of Sticky Net modified with the smell of nattō.

attacks.name: Modified Sticky Net (ネバネバネット・改, Nebaneba Netto Kai)
attacks.description: A variation of Sticky Net modified with the smell of nattō.

attacks.name: Silk Thread
attacks.description:
Spits out stiff threads that are as thin as a silk thread but as pointed and sharp as a needle.
Silk Thread Attack
Silk Thread Gather

attacks.name: Random Roll
attacks.description: Flips into a ball and hops into the air to whip the opponent with its antennae.

attacks.name: Worm Tail
attacks.description: Spins around and scratches the foe with its spinnerets.

attacks.name: Worm Wheel
attacks.description: Spins into a ball and rams enemy.

attacks.name: Worm Scratch
attacks.description: Jumps in the air and spins into a ball to attack.

attacks.name: Worm Hang
attacks.description: Sticks to a surface, allowing it to scale it. In Digimon All-Star Rumble, it can also use this to attach itself to an enemy to headbutt it repeatedly.

attacks.name: Petite Tackle (Petit Tackle)
attacks.description: Tackles with its small body.

attacks.name: Thread Punch
attacks.description: Hits the enemy with a blob of silk extended from its mouth.

attacks.name: Rundown Roll
attacks.description: Flips into a ball and hops into the air to whip the opponent with its antennae.

attacks.name: Worm Jump
attacks.description: Spins into a ball and rams enemy.

attacks.name: Spin Sting
attacks.description: Drills the enemy with its spinnerets.

attacks.name: Thread Clump Drop
attacks.description: Encases a midair opponent in webbing, making them fall to the ground.

attacks.name: Spiked Smash
attacks.description: Sprays webbing along the ground and forms it into spikes that stab upward at the enemy.

attacks.name: Worm Drill Clash
attacks.description: Dives down at the enemy, drilling them with a spike of webbing protruded from its mouth

attacks.name: Dynamic Thread Uppercut
attacks.description: Uppercuts the opponent with a blob of silk extended from its mouth.

Xiaomon.name: Xiaomon
Xiaomon.description: Xiaomon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a four-legged Digimon that digivolved from Paomon. It is said that Digimon that were created artificially basically only digivolve up to Rookie, and the most often seen artificial Digimon is this Xiaomon. It forms attachments with people enormously easily, and among Digimon, it is the easiest to train.

attacks.name: Tummo
attacks.description: Releases a high-frequency wave that is an effective charm against evil.

Xiangpengmon.name: Xiangpengmon
Xiangpengmon.description: Xiangpengmon is a Holy Bird Digimon. It is a Digimon with a body so immense that it could cover several mountains. Xiangpengmon normally slumbers deep in the Net Ocean. While sleeping, Xiangpengmon's data keeps its environment at equilibrium. It will awaken if it senses a change for the worse in the waters, swiftly moving to fix the problem before returning to sleep. Because of its large size, any time it surfaces, wings flapping, it causes abnormal weather to occur. While it is in the sea, many other aquatic Digimon build nests in the crevices of its sleeping body. These Digimon give energy to Xiangpengmon so the latter can stay nourished while it sleeps, resulting a symbiotic relationship that helps all of them. None of Xiangpengmon's moves will harm singular targets. They are all large-scale attacks that cause widespread annihilation.

attacks.name: Lightning Scourge (雷煌鞭 Raikōben, lit. "Bright-Lightning Scourge")
attacks.description: Causes countless bolts of lightning to strike down over the area where its foe is.

attacks.name: Divine Lance (神碎牙 Shinsaiga, lit. "Spirit-Shattering Fang")
attacks.description: Fires the spears equipped on its wings to shatter the ground.

attacks.name: Sea of Destruction (天星壊海 Tensei Kaikai, lit. "Star-Breaking Sea")
attacks.description: Makes an enormous sphere of seawater and sends crashing into the ground.

Xingtianshou.name: Xingtianshou
Xingtianshou.description: Name used inDigimon New Century. No official romanization available.

Xiquemon.name: Xiquemon
Xiquemon.description: Xiquemon is a Bird Digimon. It is a different kind Digimon that moves freely through air and sea. Xiquemon’s DigiCore contains fish data, letting it dive underwater to swim and hunt as if flying in the sky. The goggles it wears protects its vision while it swims. This migratory bird inhabits cold lakes and rivers, traveling the Digital World in search of new habitats whenever currents are warm enough. Spotting Xiquemon flying around in search of a nest is considered a sign of fortune, and it is well known as a Digimon that brings good omens. Its dietary intake is low, so it has a habit of using a special move to freeze and save leftover food. Huankunmon's large body makes it an easy target, so it often mixes in with flocks of Xiquemon to travel around. When it moves, Huankunmon will surround the entire flock with a large bubble for protection. Since the bubble refracts light, the flock, including Huankunmon, will be invisible to the outside.

attacks.name: Splash Thrash (瀑閃 Bakusen, lit. "Waterfall Flash")
attacks.description: Travels underwater at high speeds then unleashes a surprise attack on the enemy. In Digimon New Century, it dive bombs the enemy, hitting it with a waterfall on impact.

attacks.name: Mortar Morsel (魚流炮 Gyoryūhō, lit. "Fish Stream Cannon")
attacks.description: Fires a small fish-shaped missile from its mouth. These missiles can’t be used rapid-fire, but the impact from a single missile is great, so this is Xiquemon’s main move for finishing off foes. In Digimon New Century it attacks the enemy with its claws before firing the missile.

attacks.name: Ice Vice (冰凍爪 Hyōtōsō, lit. "Frozen Claw")
attacks.description: Coats its talons in ice for close-quarters combat. This move will freeze and break any enemy it grabs, and is also used to preserve its food.

XrosUpArresterdramon (Astamon).name: XrosUpArresterdramon (Astamon)
debut: "Now Revealed! The Secret of the Digimon Hunt!" [77]
XrosUpArresterdramon (Astamon).description: XrosUpArresterdramon (Astamon) is the DigiFuse of Arresterdramon and Astamon. Now Revealed! The Secret of the Digimon Hunt!

XrosUpArresterdramon (Blossomon).name: XrosUpArresterdramon (Blossomon)
XrosUpArresterdramon (Blossomon).description: XrosUpArresterdramon (Blossomon) hasBlossomon'sface for the chest, four plant-like tendrils growing from its back, and a vine-like tail.

XrosUpArresterdramon (Dobermon).name: XrosUpArresterdramon (Dobermon)
debut: "The Digimon Hunt is Booming! The Virtuoso Hunter of the Shopping District!" [62]
XrosUpArresterdramon (Dobermon).description: Name used in the Japanese version ofDigimon Fusion. No official romanization available.

XrosUpArresterdramon (GigaBreakdramon).name: XrosUpArresterdramon (GigaBreakdramon)
debut: "The Great Undersea Adventure! Search for the Treasure Digimon of Dreams!" [73]
XrosUpArresterdramon (GigaBreakdramon).description: XrosUpArresterdramon (GigaBreakdramon) is the DigiFuse of Arresterdramon and GigaBreakdramon. The Great Undersea Adventure! Search for the Treasure Digimon of Dreams!

attacks.name: Infinity Prism Gallet
attacks.description: Fires all the drills operating throughout its body covered in countless revolutions of light, allowing it to smash through the opponent.

XrosUpArresterdramon (MetalTyrannomon).name: XrosUpArresterdramon (MetalTyrannomon)
debut: "Students have Vanished! The Flickering Shadow of Sagomon" [56]
XrosUpArresterdramon (MetalTyrannomon).description: XrosUpArresterdramon (MetalTyrannomon) is the DigiFuse of Arresterdramon and MetalTyrannomon. Students have Vanished! The Flickering Shadow of Sagomon

attacks.name: Spincalibur
attacks.description: Bisects the opponent with its super-sized Tail Anchor while performing a single revolution.

XrosUpArresterdramon (Ogremon).name: XrosUpArresterdramon (Ogremon)
debut: "Now Revealed! The Secret of the Digimon Hunt!" [77]
XrosUpArresterdramon (Ogremon).description: Name used in the Japanese version ofDigimon Fusion. No official romanization available.

XrosUpArresterdramon (Sagomon).name: XrosUpArresterdramon (Sagomon)
debut: "Honor Students are Being Targeted! Blossomon's Smile" [58]
XrosUpArresterdramon (Sagomon).description: XrosUpArresterdramon (Sagomon) is the DigiFuse of Arresterdramon and Sagomon. Honor Students are Being Targeted! Blossomon's Smile

attacks.name: Spincalibur
attacks.description: Bisects the opponent with its super-sized Tail Anchor while performing a single revolution.

XrosUpArresterdramon (Sparrowmon).name: XrosUpArresterdramon (Sparrowmon)
debut: "Hong Kong Landing! Protect the Super-Maiden Idol!!" [64]
