XrosUpArresterdramon (Sparrowmon).description: XrosUpArresterdramon (Sparrowmon) is the DigiFuse of Arresterdramon and Sparrowmon. Hong Kong Landing! Protect the Super-Maiden Idol!!

attacks.name: Wing Spiral Shredder
attacks.description: Rotates at high speed to shred the opponent to pieces.

XrosUpAstamon.name: XrosUpAstamon
debut: "Now Revealed! The Secret of the Digimon Hunt!" [77]
XrosUpAstamon.description: Name used in the Japanese version ofDigimon Fusion. No official romanization available.

\"XrosUpAstamon (Cerberumon)\".name: "XrosUpAstamon (Cerberumon)"
debut: "A Great Legendary Hero Gathering! The Digimon All-star Showdown!!" [78]
\"XrosUpAstamon (Cerberumon)\".description: No name available for this Digimon.

XrosUpBallistamon.name: XrosUpBallistamon
debut: "A Great Legendary Hero Gathering! The Digimon All-star Showdown!!" [78]
XrosUpBallistamon.description: XrosUpBallistamon is the DigiFuse of Ballistamon and Deputymon. A Great Legendary Hero Gathering! The Digimon All-star Showdown!!

attacks.name: Heavy the Shot
attacks.description: Fires an energy shot surrounded by sonic waves from the gun on its belly.

XrosUpDorulumon.name: XrosUpDorulumon
debut: "A Great Legendary Hero Gathering! The Digimon All-star Showdown!!" [78]
XrosUpDorulumon.description: XrosUpDorulumon is the DigiFuse of Dorulumon and PawnChessmon (White). A Great Legendary Hero Gathering! The Digimon All-star Showdown!!

attacks.name: Dorulu Checkmate
attacks.description: Spins the drill on its tail, creating a tornado with energy blades.

XrosUpGumdramon.name: XrosUpGumdramon
debut: "The Digimon Kendo Match! Kotemon's Blade Draws Near!!" [60]
XrosUpGumdramon.description: XrosUpGumdramon is the DigiFuse of Gumdramon and Kotemon. The Digimon Kendo Match! Kotemon's Blade Draws Near!!

attacks.name: Fire Vortex Men
attacks.description: Spins with its shinai while leaving a fire trail from it, then hits the opponent's head.

XrosUpMervamon.name: XrosUpMervamon
debut: "A Great Legendary Hero Gathering! The Digimon All-star Showdown!!" [78]
XrosUpMervamon.description: XrosUpMervamon is the DigiFuse of Mervamon and Beelzemon (2010 anime). A Great Legendary Hero Gathering! The Digimon All-star Showdown!!

attacks.name: Sexy the Cannon
attacks.description: Fires a shot from the cannon on its Medullia arm.

XrosUpOmegaShoutmon.name: XrosUpOmegaShoutmon
debut: "Students have Vanished! The Flickering Shadow of Sagomon" [56]
XrosUpOmegaShoutmon.description: Name used inDigimon Fusion. No official romanization available.

XrosUpOpossummon.name: XrosUpOpossummon
debut: "Warning, Cuteness! The Cute Hunter Airu's Traps!" [59]
XrosUpOpossummon.description: Candlemon becomes a gigantic, fiery version of Opossummon's balloons, which releases a massive explosion.

XrosUpSabmarimon.name: XrosUpSabmarimon
debut: "The Great Undersea Adventure! Search for the Treasure Digimon of Dreams!" [73]
XrosUpSabmarimon.description: XrosUpSabmarimon is the DigiFuse of Submarimon and Plesiomon. The Great Undersea Adventure! Search for the Treasure Digimon of Dreams!

attacks.name: Oxygen Sorrow Blue
attacks.description: Discharges super-compressed oxygen from its drill.

XrosUpShoutmon (Kamemon).name: XrosUpShoutmon (Kamemon)
debut: "The Great Undersea Adventure! Search for the Treasure Digimon of Dreams!" [73]
XrosUpShoutmon (Kamemon).description: XrosUpShoutmon (Kamemon) is the DigiFuse of Shoutmon (King Version) and Kamemon. The Great Undersea Adventure! Search for the Treasure Digimon of Dreams!

attacks.name: Rock Damashī Arrow (ロックダマシーアロー, Rokku Damashī Ārō, lit. "Rock Soul Arrow")
attacks.description: Fires an arrow-shaped fire missile.

XrosUpShoutmon (Puppetmon).name: XrosUpShoutmon (Puppetmon)
XrosUpShoutmon (Puppetmon).description: XrosUpShoutmon (Puppetmon) is the DigiFuse of Shoutmon (King Version) and Puppetmon. The Robot Club's Dream, Pinochimon's Lure

attacks.name: Burning Hammer
attacks.description: Emits fire from its revolver-style hammer, then rushes to the opponent in a flame wheel.

XrosUpTuwarmon.name: XrosUpTuwarmon
debut: "A Great Legendary Hero Gathering! The Digimon All-star Showdown!!" [78]
XrosUpTuwarmon.description: XrosUpTuwarmon is the DigiFuse of Tuwarmon and SuperStarmon. A Great Legendary Hero Gathering! The Digimon All-star Showdown!!

attacks.name: Digi Ninpou: Hoshi Arashi (デジ忍法・星嵐, Digi Ninpou: Hoshi Arashi lit. "Digi Ninja Art: Star Storm")
attacks.description: Unleashes a stream of stars from its hand.

Yaamon.name: Yaamon
Yaamon.description: Yaamon is a Lesser Digimon. It is a Digimon that digivolved from Keemon. Its personality becomes twisted, and when it finds a Digimon having fun, it covers them with ink using its "Paint Splash", which it spews out of its mouth. Yaamon enjoys seeing the stunned Digimon.

attacks.name: Rolling Black
attacks.description: Forms a ball of darkness and shoots it at the opponent.

attacks.name: Paint Splash
attacks.description: When it finds a Digimon having fun, it covers them with ink, which it spews out of its mouth.

Yakiimon.name: Yakiimon
debut: "The Amusement Park of Dreams, Digimon Land!" [75]
Yakiimon.description: Yakiimon is a Plant Digimon. It is a Plant Digimon in the shape of a roasted sweet potato. It undergoes intensive special training alone in order to achieve its goal of becoming a champion, improving its punching strength and footwork to the point that they cause its body to become piping hot. However, Yakiimon itself hasn't the slightest clue what kind of champion it wants to become, and simply continues to work hard.

attacks.name: Beniazuma Uppercut
attacks.description: Uses its left fist, packed with piping hot steam, to strike the enemy and send them flying sky-high together with the rising heat.

attacks.name: Beniazuma Straight
attacks.description: Uses its right fist to deliver a strike packed with all of its power.

Yanmamon.name: Yanmamon
Yanmamon.description: Yanmamon is an Insectoid Digimon. It took in the data of the gigantic insect, the "jumbo dragonfly". Its body is covered in a tough carapace, which is as hard as Greymon's head, and is extremely light, allowing it to fly about at high speed. It has sharp fangs. It is carnivorous and aggressive, flying around the Network and attacking its enemies with its fangs.

attacks.name: Thunder Ray
attacks.description: Strafes with an electrified laser.

attacks.name: Bug Swarm (Insect Ohm)
attacks.description: Generates an intense electromagnetic wave by flapping its wings. In Digimon World Data Squad, it attacks the opponent with a strange sound wave which it fires from its tail.

attacks.name: Sonic Bite
attacks.description: Uses its sharp jaws to bite swiftly.

attacks.name: Assassin Arrow
attacks.description: Fires an arrow of energy from its tail.

attacks.name: Electro Shocker (Mega Blaster)
attacks.description: Fires an electrical ball at enemies.

Yasyamon.name: Yasyamon
Yasyamon.description: Yasyamon is a Puppet Digimon. It armor-digivolved due to the "Digi-Egg of Sincerity". It exhibits power like a fierce god, and although its offensive power is tremendous, it has a side that is deeply devoted, righteous, and respectful to protecting the weak. Also, it excels in the secret arts, and is capable of mastering any supernatural ability. It possesses a calm, cool, and collected personality due to it being very taciturn.

attacks.name: Double Strike (一刀両断, Ittouryoudan, lit. "Single-stroke Bisection")
Puppet Master (クグツの術, Kugutsu no Jutsu, lit. "Puppet Technique")

Yokomon.name: Yokomon
Yokomon.description: Yokomon is a Bulb Digimon. It is a Lesser Digimon with a large flower blooming from its head. It is able to move by skillfully operating its root-like tentacles, and with its lightness, it can rise into the air, but only to a small height. As it is brimming with curiosity, it is restlessly stirring and its appearance seems very cute. It has a habit of living together in flocks, and it is said that due to grouping, the flocks will grow from a few to a few hundred.

attacks.name: Bubbles (泡, Awa, lit. "Bubbles")
attacks.description: Fires pink bubbles from its mouth.

attacks.name: Flower Bubbles (Sabão Flower, Por: Soap Flower)
attacks.description: A popping bubble that looks like a flower petal.

attacks.name: Adhesive Bubbles (粘着性の泡, Nenchakusei no Awa, lit. "Adhesive Bubbles")
attacks.description: Escapes while the intruder's movement is restricted by the adhesive bubbles it generates from within its body.

Youkomon.name: Youkomon

otherNames.name: 藍九尾狐獸/蓝九尾狐兽 Lán jiǔ wěi hú shòu

Youkomon.description: Youkomon is a Mythical Animal Digimon. It has the appearance of a gigantic blue fox that grew nine tails. Unlike Kyubimon, it is feared as a bewitching beast that brings about destruction and decay. Although its offensive ability itself is not strong, it possesses powerful spiritual ability and specializes in "Arts" techniques, and it is said that it races through the heavens with its red, blazing limbs.

attacks.name: Tail Flame (焔玉, Homuradama, lit. "Blazing Spheres")
attacks.description: Manifests scorching hot fireballs and manipulates them at will.

attacks.name: Jaenryū (邪炎龍, Jaenryū lit. "Evil Flame Dragon")
attacks.description: Manifests a dragon of blazing red flames from its tail and burns the opponent to cinders.

Yoxtu!Yoxtu!mon.name: Yoxtu!Yoxtu!mon
Yoxtu!Yoxtu!mon.description: Yoxtu!Yoxtu!mon is a Puppet Digimon. Its whole body is composed of unique plastic yo-yos. Although it is said to have been born from image data showcasing skilful techniques in yo-yo tournaments, it has a very quarrelsome personality, and always stares into its surroundings with a sharp look. It has a sharp-bladed yo-yo on its right hand for mincing things, and a bladeless yo-yo on its left hand for beating things to a pulp, and uses them for different purposes depending on the battle situation.

attacks.name: Rapper Coaster
attacks.description: Gets into a rhythm and minces things with its right hand.

attacks.name: One-Handed Swing (One-hand Swing)
attacks.description: Slaps the opponent with a long swing of its left hand.

attacks.name: Torpedo Crossing
attacks.description: Spins its whole body and strikes the opponent. It has the disadvantage of needing a partner who can wind up its string.

YukimiBotamon.name: YukimiBotamon
YukimiBotamon.description: YukimiBotamon is a Slime Digimon. It is a Baby Digimon whose whole body is covered in fluffy, white hair. It is considered a species of Botamon, and was named "YukimiBotamon" after its white body, but the details are not clearly known. It is weak to heat, and tends to prefer cold places, so its body feels cold to the touch. When YukimiBotamon exhales, the moisture in the air freezes, and falls while brilliantly glittering.

attacks.name: Diamond Dust
attacks.description: Breathes out freezing cold air.

Yuramon.name: Yuramon
Yuramon.description: Yuramon is a Seed Digimon. Its whole body is covered in a substance with the appearance of long, soft hair. When it hatches from its Digi-Egg, it seeks an environment suitable for its growth, and drifts lightly through the air, like a dandelion seed. If it finds a place where there will be no intruders and where the environment is good, it will settle to the ground and begin preparations for Digivolution. Its offensive ability is practically nil.

attacks.name: Bubble Blow (粘着性の泡, Nenchakusei no Awa, lit. "Adhesive Bubbles")
attacks.description: Spits out adhesive bubbles to hinder the opponent's movement, then seizes the opportunity to escape.

Zamielmon.name: Zamielmon
debut: "Back to the Digital World! Hot Time in Dragonland!" [31]
Zamielmon.description: Zamielmon is a Demon Man Digimon. It is the general of the Wood-spirit Army of the "Big Death-Stars". It has dominion over many Fairy and Plant Digimon which are able to blend in with the land of meadows and forests to camouflage themselves. It goes forward with things in a calm and collected manner, and in surprise attacks, pincer attacks, exterminations, feints, blitzes, guerrilla attacks, or any other tactic it pleases, it directs its army to make the extermination of its enemies successful. As enabling such a strategy definitely needs strict iron discipline, it possesses enough of a cool head that in situations where its subordinates throw its movements out of order, it snipes from anywhere to deal with it. No matter what strategy is, its own actions are considered to hold the key to success, so it shoots off attacks while rushing about the battlefield. Its body is trained in various techniques, and it freely draws them out. The gigantic "Indra" arrow is set on its abdomen.

attacks.name: Snipe Headshot
attacks.description: Shoots through the opponent's head.

attacks.name: Bow Cutter
attacks.description: Slashes with the bow on its side as if it was a blade.

attacks.name: Foot Shot
attacks.description: Fires a trick-shot that it prepared in its feet.

attacks.name: Arrow Lance
attacks.description: Fires arrows from its hands.

attacks.name: Arrow Blizzard (Turbulence Arrow)
attacks.description: Slashes at nearby opponents, then fires arrows into the distance and shoots the opponents dead with its random firing, without missing a single shot.

attacks.name: Ultimate Arrow (The World Shot)
attacks.description: Concentrates energy into the Indra, then pierces it into the opponent's core.

Zanbamon.name: Zanbamon
Zanbamon.description: Zanbamon is a Demon Man Digimon. It has the appearance of a horse-riding warrior. It is a courageous warrior who reigns as the general of the Musyamon corps. Although it is a general, it voluntarily stands at the head of its own army, and prefers fighting styles which cut into the enemy. Its lower half is fused with its horse in order to move more easily about the battlefield, so that even during a pitched battle, it is able to swing its sword without losing its balance. It wields the gigantic zanbato "Ryūzan-maru" (龍斬丸, "Ryūzan-maru" lit. "Dragon Beheader") in its right hand, and a slender youtou in its left.

attacks.name: Vorpal Blade (打首獄門, Uchikubi Gokumon, lit. "Prison Gate of Beheadings")
attacks.description: Unleashes an attack from the Ryūzan-maru which has the power to cut through the opponent's armor with its gigantic blade, regardless of whether they are defending themselves.

attacks.name: Mystic Flame (十文字斬り, Jūmonji Giri, lit. "Cross Slash")
attacks.description: Unleashes an attack from its youtou which releases a shock wave, generated by the nimble swings of the blade, that can cut the opponent apart crosswise.

Zanmetsumon.name: Zanmetsumon
Zanmetsumon.description: Zanmetsumon is a Beast Dragon Digimon. It is a master swordsman Digimon that wields five blades. Zanmetsumon wanders the Digital World, fighting day in, day out, and thinking exclusively about further honing its sword skills. It is able to swing its swords in all directions, as it holds one in each of its four hands, and tail too. Even its most skilled opponents have difficulty avoiding its onslaught.

attacks.name: Goren-Danreizan (伍連断霊斬, Goren-Danreizan lit. "Five Continuous Soul-rending Beheadings")
attacks.description: Attacks with all five blades successively.

attacks.name: Goju-Rasendachi (伍重螺旋断, Goju-Rasendachi lit. "Quintuple Spiral Slash")
attacks.description: Slices with all five blades simultaneously.

attacks.name: Gokumon-Shibari (獄門縛, Gokumon-Shibari lit. "Prison Gate Bind")
attacks.description: Lets out a huge roar from the giant mouth on its body to limit its opponents' movements. Zanmetsumon does not believe in slaughtering foes with anything but its blades, however, so it rarely displays this attack.

ZeedGarurumon.name: ZeedGarurumon
ZeedGarurumon.description: ZeedGarurumon is a Cyborg Digimon. A subspecies of MetalGarurumon, the final form of Garurumon, it is the ultimate beast tank Digimon equipped with the ultimate superdreadnought-class weapon, "Zeed Cannon" (ズィード砲, Z'd Hou, lit. "Z'd Cannon"). ZeedGarurumon's weapons and ammunition are equipped throughout its body, so its physical strength isn't consumed, and it can sustain a rain of bullets for a long duration. The four Laser Sights on its snout have been improved for its ammunition, and are now capable of locking onto hundreds of objects. In addition, ZeedGarurumon possesses an evolutionary code that differs from Digimon that were naturally born in the Digital World, and it is thought that it is a Digimon that digivolved from a Digi-Egg that was produced due to artificial data intervention.

attacks.name: Zeed Cannon (ズィード砲, Z'd Hou, lit. "Z'd Cannon")
attacks.description: The ultimate weapon for attack.

attacks.name: Full Metal Breath (Full Metal Blaze)
attacks.description: Mows down the opponent by simultaneously firing the Zeed Cannon alongside all of the other weapons throughout its body.

attacks.name: Blowback Breath
attacks.description: Sprays explosive energy from its mouth.

ZeedMillenniummon.name: ZeedMillenniummon

otherNames.name: 終末の千年魔獣 Shuumatsu no Sen'nen Majuu (lit. "Last Millennium Monster")

ZeedMillenniummon.description: ZeedMillenniummon is an Evil God Digimon. Flying freely between space and time, it is a king of evil that is still trying to destroy all eras and worlds. Although a Digimon will become a Digi-Egg if defeated in battle, there are very rare occasions when it has instead been reborn from within the corpse of its data. According to one theory, when Millenniummon died in a furious battle, the dark soul it possessed was reborn as ZeedMillenniummon. Also, as for the bands of DigiCode which wrap around ZeedMillenniummon, it is said that they are like chains which suppress its abilities, but it is unknown who could cast such a spell on ZeedMillenniummon. However, it is foretold that if it is released from this spell, it will rain unfathomable destruction upon the Digital World.

attacks.name: Time Destroyer
attacks.description: Consigns hostile opponents to oblivion across space and time. So far, no one who has been brushed off by this technique has returned alive from space and time.

attacks.name: Chrono Paradox
attacks.description: Fires two atomic rays from its mouth that destroys everything in their path.

attacks.name: Time Unlimited
attacks.description: Creates a pocket dimension with compressed time, and traps an opponent there for an eternity.

attacks.name: Dimension Destroyer
attacks.description: After trapping an opponent with Time Unlimited, it collapses the entire dimension it created to destroy them.

ZekeGreymon.name: ZekeGreymon
debut: "Take a Stand, Christopher! Fusion Fighters' Rescue Mission!" [32]
ZekeGreymon.description: ZekeGreymon is a Cyborg Digimon. It is a form obtained when the legendary Digimon bestowed the "Digivolution" upon a MetalGreymon that sought perfect victory. Its body armor, bestowed by the legendary Digimon, is solid, virtual super-metal called Chrome Digizoid, and the armor acquired even further heights and became a body of "Gold Digizoid", which emits high-class golden radiance simply due to its dazzle. As its defensive power is immense and lightweight, its movements are surprisingly more agile than it appears from its heavy armor. It possesses combat strength of a high, all-round potential.

attacks.name: Trident Fang
attacks.description: Chops up the opponent with a single blow to their trunk.

attacks.name: Tail Gun Fire (Destroy Smasher)
attacks.description: Unleashes its ordinance while spinning, ensuring complete annihilation of surroundings.

attacks.name: Zeke Flame
attacks.description: Spews the flames of hell from its mouth to burn a large army of opponents to nothing.

attacks.name: Plasma Railgun
attacks.description: Provides suppressive fire against the opponent with its Plasma Railgun.

attacks.name: Final Trident Strike (Final Strikes)
attacks.description: Maintains a lowered stance while becoming an arrow of shining light and assaulting the opponent, releasing the energy at point-blank range to atomize them.

attacks.name: Hyper Launcher
attacks.description: Shoots a high-power energy shell to deal with opponents at a great distance or high altitude.

title: Dragon of War
(戦竜
Sen Ryū?)

Zenimon.name: Zenimon
Zenimon.description: Zenimon is a Mutant Digimon. A mechanical-looking Digimon in the shape of a 5-yen coin that resides within Ganemon's trunk. It silently collects money for Ganemon; Zenimon is also able to emit a special wave that attracts money to great effect. It is also said that there are Digimon who seek out Zenimon in order to exploit those waves it emits.

attacks.name: Comet Launcher
attacks.description: Launches rice grains from the guns on both hands.

attacks.name: Zeninage
attacks.description: Tosses a fellow Zenimon towards the opponent, striking them.

Zephyrmon.name: Zephyrmon
Zephyrmon.description: Zephyrmon is a Bird Man Digimon. It possesses power over Wind which bears the might of AncientKazemon. At a glance, it looks like a composed adult woman, but although it perplexes its opponents with its languid behavior, it actually has an impish personality that loves to capriciously embarrass people. It does things like purposefully telling its opponent unhappy fortunes or startling them. In battle, it seldom takes the initiative and helps out, but although you don't see its efforts, it will sometimes risk the possibility of getting into trouble. Once it feels so inclined, it glides freely through the sky, manipulating the wind and knocking out the opponent with a secret Mesopotamian spell.

attacks.name: Hurricane Gale (Wind of Pain)
attacks.description: Flies up into the air and hurls the feathers of its hair and wings as pointed arrows.

attacks.name:
Plasma Paws (Gilgamesh Slicer): Cuts the opponent and the atmosphere around it to pieces with the claws on its hands and feet.
Gilgamesh Upper
attacks.description: Hits the foe with a powerful hook.

attacks.name: Gilgamesh Upper
attacks.description: Hits the foe with a powerful hook.

Zerimon.name: Zerimon
Zerimon.description: Zerimon is a Slime Digimon. Zerimon and Conomon are extremely rare Digimon, which are born in pairs from a single Digi-Egg. Why only Zerimon and Conomon are born as twins is not clearly known at the present stage. What is more, they are not restricted to always being born as twins, and either a Zerimon or Conomon may be born from a single Digi-Egg. Compared to the extremely energetic, one-horned Zerimon, the three-horned Conomon has a relatively docile personality. Also, unlike other Slime Digimon, Zerimon is perfectly firm other than just the horn on its head. Like other Fresh Digimon, it spits acid bubbles to intimidate opponents.

attacks.name: Acid Bubbles (酸の泡, San no Awa)
attacks.description: Spits acid bubbles to intimidate the opponent.

Zhuqiaomon.name: Zhuqiaomon
Zhuqiaomon.description: Zhuqiaomon is a Bird Digimon. It is the "Digimon Sovereign" that guards the South, and commands the Deva Sandiramon, Indramon, and Pajiramon. It manipulates incandescent flames, and as it has the roughest temperament among the Sovereigns, it burns anything insignificant which approaches it to cinders.

attacks.name: Crimson Blaze  (紅焔, Kouen)
attacks.description: Releases a swirl of flames comparable to the prominences which jet out during a solar eruption.

attacks.name: Phoenix Fire
attacks.description: Spews ultra-high-temperature flames from its mouth.

attacks.name: Desolation Blast
attacks.description: Launches dozens of fireballs from his wings, which can rain down on foes or destroy things above him.

attacks.name: Sonic Zephyr
attacks.description: Flaps its wings, creating a tremendous shock wave.

attacks.name: Blazing Helix
attacks.description: Flaps its wings, releasing a spiral of high-temperature flames.

ZubaEagermon.name: ZubaEagermon
ZubaEagermon.description: ZubaEagermon is a Weapon Digimon. "I, who am the Twentiest, will never halt! I'm going to keep on running forth!" With those words carved into Zubamon's heart, it digivolved into a form that embodies that forward-charging style. ZubaEagermon's policy is simply to continue charging forth without pause, no matter if smooth or rough terrain awaits it, or even if it has to crawl and struggle to continue forward. Not only that, by transforming itself into its prided sword form, it is able to slice through any enemy using 100% of its strength.

attacks.name: Road T(w)o Decade
attacks.description: Thrusts straight into the enemy's chest while shouting "Twentieeest!".

attacks.name: Vantheon (Vingtième, Fra: Twentieth)
attacks.description: Curles its body into a ball and spins towards the enemy, slicing them with its tail blade.

Zubamon.name: Zubamon
Zubamon.description: Zubamon is a Weapon Digimon. It is one of the "Legend-Arms", who are capable of transforming themselves into weapons. A legend about the Legend-Arms goes, "if held by an angel, it will save the world, and if held by a demon, it will destroy the world." Zubamon carries the "Twentiest" data, and often shouts out "I am the Twentiest!" despite not understanding what it means. It despises crookedness, and is constantly seeking sharpness. A day where its battles, jokes, and sharpness turn out well will leave it in high spirits. Zubamon's true power is exhibited while it is in its weapon form.

attacks.name: Twenty Dive
attacks.description: Charges head-first.

Zudomon.name: Zudomon
Zudomon.description: Zudomon is a Sea Animal Digimon. Ikkakumon digivolved further, and as a Power Digimon, it became able to walk on two legs. It further guards its well-tempered muscles with protectors, which it made from the pelt and shell that it stole from its opponents. The horn on its head has been replaced with one that became impossible to regrow, so it voluntarily processed it into a saw shape. However, after all is said and done, its strongest weapon, which it dug up from ancient ice, is its "Thor's Hammer" (Thor Hammer) made of Chrondigizoit.

attacks.name: Vulcan's Hammer (Hammer Spark)
attacks.description: Strikes the opponent with the shock wave and sparks produced when it swings down its Thor's Hammer. In Digimon Data Squad, instead of a shock wave and sparks it uses ice.

attacks.name: Horn & Tusk
attacks.description: Attacks with its horn and tusks.

attacks.name: Vulcan's Hammer (Hammer Boomerang)
attacks.description: Throws its hammer like a boomerang.

attacks.name: Glacial Spear (Glacier Spear)
attacks.description: Uses the horn on top of its head to pierce an opponent.

attacks.name: Cold Crusher (Ice Lord Bump)
attacks.description: Causes a wave of ice to rise up out of the ground and freeze the opponent.

attacks.name: Hammer Head
attacks.description: Throws its glowing hammer upwards.

attacks.name: Thor Fury
attacks.description: Spins around while swinging its sparking hammer.

attacks.name: Nail Pull
attacks.description: Sweeps low with the spike on the end of its hammer.

attacks.name: Shell Smash
attacks.description: Slams down on an opponent from the air.

attacks.name: Anvil Smash
attacks.description: Smashes the ground with its hammer, causing a shockwave

attacks.name: Vulcan Vengeance (Vulcan Revenge)
attacks.description: Charges up its hammer before smashing the opponent with it.

Zurumon.name: Zurumon
Zurumon.description: Zurumon is a Slime Digimon. It was produced from the fusion of an extra-malignant computer virus and a computer hacker's evil desires, an evolutionary origin which differs from other Digimon of the special Slime type. It operates its supple body skillfully in order to crawl across the ground. The substance that composes its body is powerfully toxic, and because it spews venom-tinged bubbles from its mouth, even larger Digimon won't approach.

attacks.name: Poison Bubbles (毒の泡, Doku no Awa)
attacks.description: Spews venom-tinged bubbles.

Chibick Sword.name: Chibick Sword
Chibick Sword.description: The Chibick Sword is a miniature version of theStar Swordwith a redPickmonforming the hilt whileChibickmonform the blade.

Digi-Slingshot.name: Digi-Slingshot
debut: Digimon Fusion, "He is Shoutmon, Hear Him Roar!" [02]
Digi-Slingshot.description: The Digi-Slingshot is a slingshot with a silver Pickmons forming the elastic band.

Star Axe.name: Star Axe
Star Axe.description: The Star Axe is a yellow axe with a white blade in whichStarmon (2010 anime)forms the crossguard and Shoutmon's mic forms the hilt.

Star Sword.name: Star Sword
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Mikey Goes To Another World!" [01]
Star Sword.description: TheStar Swordis a DigiFuse form of theStarmons. It isStarmonand thePickmons' "Sword-union Mode"(剣結合形態,Kenketsugou Keitai). The saw-shaped blade is strong and boasts peerless firmness, so that it shreds the opponent when it cuts through them, inflicting massive damage. Because the wounds are completely ragged, it takes time for the opponent to recover from the damage of an ordinary attack, and they incur even greater damage. Also, because the united Pickmon can shift freely, it possesses not only firmness, but also a flexibility that allows it to bend like a willow branch and absorb impacts that are too strong. It can be said that the Star Sword has an appearance which embodies the strong ties of Starmon and the Pickmons' emotional bond.Shoutmon X4,Shoutmon X5, and their variations wield the "Star Sword DX", a version of the Star Sword that incorporatesShoutmon's mic.

Star Sword (Rare).name: Star Sword (Rare)
Star Sword (Rare).description: The Star Sword (Rare) is a variation of the Star Sword in which a red Pickmon at the top. This causes the original Star Sword to be wrapped in an aura of flames.

attacks.name: Star Sword Strike (江東スラッシュ, Kōtō Slash)
attacks.description: Throws the Star Sword like an arrow.

attacks.name: Star Sword Strike (江東斬り, Kōtō Kiri, lit. "Kōtō Slice")
attacks.description: Performs a slice with the Star Sword.

attacks.name: Star Sword Strike (東雲一刀斬り, Shinonome Ittougiri, lit. "Shinonome Single-slice")
attacks.description: Performs a decisive strike with the Star Sword.

attacks.name: Kōtō Ryūseizan (江東流星斬, Kōtō Ryūseizan lit. "Kōtō Meteor Slash")
attacks.description: Performs a mighty horizontal slash that can cut through chains.

Star Wheel.name: Star Wheel
Star Wheel.description: Shoutmon Star Wheel isShoutmonwielding the Star Wheel, achakram-like weapon whereStarmon (2010 anime)forms the center and handle while thePickmonsfor the blades at the edges.

Angelamon.name: Angelamon
Angelamon.description: Angelamon is the imaginative persona thought of by Angela Anaconda during the brief special that played before Digimon The Movie.

attacks.name: Ultimate Anti Ninnymon Super Secret Power
attacks.description: Creates a destructive orb between its two hands and launches it at an enemy.

\"Bakomon + PawnChessmon\".name: "Bakomon + PawnChessmon"
debut: "The Amusement Park of Dreams, Digimon Land!" [75]

BalliDobermon.name: BalliDobermon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "The Digimon Hunt is Booming! The Virtuoso Hunter of the Shopping District!" [62]
BalliDobermon.description: Name used inDigimon Fusion. No official spelling or romanization available.

\"Betsumon + OmniShoutmon\".name: "Betsumon + OmniShoutmon"
\"Betsumon + OmniShoutmon\".description: It is essentially a Betsumon covered in gold paint.

CheerGirlmon.name: CheerGirlmon
debut: Digimon Adventure 02: Armor Evolution to the Unknown, "Sudden Armor Evolutions"
CheerGirlmon.description: Name used inDigimon Adventure 02: Armor Evolution to the Unknown. No official spelling or romanization available.

Chokimon.name: Chokimon
Chokimon.description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars (manga). No official romanization available.

Dondokossomon.name: Dondokossomon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Honor Students are Being Targeted! Blossomon's Smile" [58]
Dondokossomon.description: Name used inDigimon Fusion. No official spelling or romanization available.

\"Ekakimon + ShimaUnimon\".name: "Ekakimon + ShimaUnimon"
debut: "A Great UFO-Dragon Gathering! Ekakimon of Dreams" [72]
\"Ekakimon + ShimaUnimon\".description: Ekakimonbecomes all black and white with a red head, adoptingShimaUnimon's coloring.

\"FlameWizardmon + Wisemon\".name: "FlameWizardmon + Wisemon"
\"FlameWizardmon + Wisemon\".description: It looks like FlameWizardmon, but with a comic book aboutXros Heartbehind it.

GigaBreakDamemon.name: GigaBreakDamemon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "The Robot Club's Dream, Pinochimon's Lure" [57]
GigaBreakDamemon.description: Name used inDigimon Fusion. No official spelling or romanization available.

Ginamon.name: Ginamon
Ginamon.description: Her hat appears to take on the form ofTakeru "T.K." Takaishi's but pink in color.

GumClockmon.name: GumClockmon
GumClockmon.description: Name used inDigimon Fusion. No official spelling or romanization available.

Guumon.name: Guumon
Guumon.description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars (manga). No official romanization available.

Hannahmon.name: Hannahmon
Hannahmon.description: Hannahmon is essentially the head ofHannah Weber, a character in the anime and manga seriesElement Hunters. TheElement Huntersmanga is authored byYuuki Nakashima, who is also the author for theDigimon Xros Warsmanga.

\"Hannahmon + Mervamon\".name: "Hannahmon + Mervamon"
\"Hannahmon + Mervamon\".description: Hannahmon, already essentially just a giant head, is attached toMervamon's body

\"Harpymon + Jijimon\".name: "Harpymon + Jijimon"
debut: "Hong Kong Landing! Protect the Super-Maiden Idol!!" [64]
\"Harpymon + Jijimon\".description: Harpymon makes a nest in Jijimon's head.

Hogmon.name: Hogmon
Hogmon.description: Hogmon is an Imaginary Digimon. It has super hog smell.

attacks.name: Hippopota Vacuum
attacks.description: Snorts up the opponent in a single sniff.

Hubmon.name: Hubmon
Hubmon.description: Hubmon's design is derived from theProtobothrops flavoviridis. It is a snake-like Digimon wearing glassing. It has aUSB plugat the tip of its tongue and aUSB hubat its tail. It has the English word "Hub" written in capital letters on its head.

\"Infermon + Pillomon\".name: "Infermon + Pillomon"
debut: "Now Revealed! The Secret of the Digimon Hunt!" [77]
\"Infermon + Pillomon\".description: This unnamed Digimon looks likeInfermonafter it returns its limbs into a cocoon-like form, except now with a fluffy, pillow-like exterior similar toPillomon.

JikoChuumon.name: JikoChuumon
debut: Digimon Adventure 02: Armor Evolution to the Unknown, "Sudden Armor Evolutions"
JikoChuumon.description: Name used inDigimon Adventure 02: Armor Evolution to the Unknown. No official spelling or romanization available.

Johnnymon.name: Johnnymon
Johnnymon.description: His hairstyle appears to take on the form ofKoushiro "Izzy" Izumi's but blue in color.

Kaminarimon.name: Kaminarimon
debut: Digimon Frontier Original Story: Things That Want To Be Told, "Get Izumi's Heart! The Ultimate Strategy!!"
Kaminarimon.description: Kaminarimon is related to electricity, as befitting its name, with the Digimon World item associated with named the "Electo Ring" and its lightning-related abilities inDigimon Frontier Original Story: Things That Want To Be Told. It has made no visual appearance, but the original design submission for it was displayed in the January 1999 issue ofV-Jump.

KingHannahmon.name: KingHannahmon
KingHannahmon.description: Name used inDigimon Xros Wars (manga). No official romanization available.

KitaKitsunemon.name: KitaKitsunemon
debut: Digimon Adventure 02: Armor Evolution to the Unknown, "Sudden Armor Evolutions"
KitaKitsunemon.description: Name used inDigimon Adventure 02: Armor Evolution to the Unknown. No official spelling or romanization available.

Kotevolmon.name: Kotevolmon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "The Digimon Kendo Match! Kotemon's Blade Draws Near!!" [60]

Kyuukanchoumon.name: Kyuukanchoumon
debut: Armor Evolution to the Unknown, "Sudden Armor Evolutions"

\"Locomon + Dorulumon\".name: "Locomon + Dorulumon"
debut: "A World Tour just for Children! The Digimon Train of Dreams
\"Locomon + Dorulumon\".description: It is a spoof Digimon that isLocomonwhere every wheel has aDorulumonhead as theWheel hub.

MegaDancermon.name: MegaDancermon
MegaDancermon.description: The hat and blond hair draw influence fromMagnaAngemon.

attacks.name: Broom of Magic (Kenta Shower)
attacks.description: Sweeps its broom to spread dust.

\"MetallifeKuwagamon + Kamemon\".name: "MetallifeKuwagamon + Kamemon"
debut: "A Golden Bug! The Mystery of MetallifeKuwagamon" [76]
\"MetallifeKuwagamon + Kamemon\".description: It is a spoof Digimon that isMetallifeKuwagamonwithKamemonas a shell and a hat.

MetalShoutmon.name: MetalShoutmon
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Students have Vanished! The Flickering Shadow of Sagomon" [56]
MetalShoutmon.description: Name used inDigimon Fusion. No official spelling or romanization available.

\"Myotismon + Yakiimon\".name: "Myotismon + Yakiimon"
debut: "A Great Legendary Hero Gathering! The Digimon All-star Showdown!!" [78]

Arata (Eater).description: Arata (Eater) is a digital lifeform. It is the form Arata Sanada takes after assimilating an Eater for his own ends.

attacks.name: Inspect Handler (Incept Handler)
attacks.description: Extends the fingers of his arms as tentacles and pierces the opponent.

Behemoth.name: Behemoth
Behemoth.description: Behemoth is a blackmotorcyclewith a red windshield.

Black Sword Guardian.name: Black Sword Guardian
Black Sword Guardian.description: The Black Sword Guardian is the patron of the Black Swords Guard Team, which specializes in Virus-type Digimon.

attacks.name: Stun Punch (Knuckle Rush)
attacks.description: Throws a devastating punch at its opponent, which paralyzes them when in counter-attack.

attacks.name: Stun Punch (Knuckle Rush)

attacks.name: Armor Aid (Bounding Armor)
attacks.description: Increases its defense by one level.

attacks.name: Rail Cannon (Rail Cannon)
attacks.description: Shoots a red energy blast that hits its foe hard with an explosion.

ChronoCore.name: ChronoCore
ChronoCore.description: The YMIR Project was started byCITYlong ago in order to set a lifespan on Digimon in order to make them evolve like humans. Although the project was canceled, it produced the "Chrono Data" in the form of the Super-Ultimate Digimon,Chronomon Holy Mode. When Chronomon was forced into its destructiveDMform, the "ChronoCore" virus was produced. This virus had the end-goal of taking down Yggdrasill and rewriting the Digital World.

Dexmon.name: Dexmon
Dexmon.description: Dexmon is a Ghost lifeform and carrier of the X Antibody. Since it doesn't have its own DigiCore, this type of program cannot be classified as a Digimon, and although it appears solid, it has no actual substance. If it detects a DigiCore, it will absorb it into its body and disintegrate it, then reassemble it in a perpetually repeating set of processes named "Process '0'" through "Process 'F'". Although it is a simple program, it is conjectured that defeating it is within the realm of impossibility. Unless there are DigiCores nearby, it will go into stasis, but as long as there are DigiCores, it will not cease.

attacks.name: Process "0"
attacks.description: The first of a set of perpetually repeating processes which disassemble and reassemble the DigiCores of its opponents.

attacks.name: Process "F"
attacks.description: The last of a set of perpetually repeating processes which disassemble and reassemble the DigiCores of its opponents.

title: DigiCore Disposer
(電脳核処理者
Den'nō Kaku Shori-sha?)

DigiGnome.name: DigiGnome
DigiGnome.description: Name used inDigimon Tamers. No official romanization available.

Digi-Elf.name: Digi-Elf
Digi-Elf.description: Digi-Elves appear in two varieties. One is colored yellow and gray with an oval head. It has a striped tail and an elongated head or helmet.

D-Reaper.name: D-Reaper
D-Reaper.description: This Agent is created for the purpose of espionage, posing asJeri Katouwhile the real one is in the Kernel Sphere. The infection begins when a small portion of the D-Reaper infects Jeri not long afterSakuyamonfirst appears.Song of SakuyamonIt stays dormant while in the Digital World, though it leads to Jeri's thoughts becoming more depressedJanyu's Arkand fully manifests in her personality once back in the Human World.Homeward BoundTakato MatsukiandGuilmonfind this Agent masquerading as Jeri in the D-Reaper during one of their assaults on the program. It acts as the D-Reaper's mouthpiece.The D-Reaper's DisguiseIt wages a mental war against Takato by displaying the information it took from Jeri's memories, dealing emotional damage and keeping him off balance. When Takato is sufficiently weakened, the Agent reveals its true, monstrous form and begins to attack. It is only warded off byMarineAngemon's power.When Is A Mon Justimon?Eventually, when Jeri regains her will to live, it personally attacks Jeri to absorb her energy, but it itself is reabsorbed by the D-Reaper in the same manner.D-Reaper's Feast

attacks.description: The group of Eater Bits gather round the main body in a circle, then all parts fires Beams from their eyes.

attacks.name: Assault Rush

Eater EDEN.name: Eater EDEN
debut: Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth - Hacker's Memory
Eater EDEN.description: Eater EDEN is a digital lifeform. It is an Eater created when multiple Eater (Purebreed Mode) merge with Erika Mishima's Memory Bank.

attacks.name: Load Memory

attacks.name: Memory Fragment
attacks.description: Increases attack at the expense of defence.

attacks.name: Release Memory
attacks.description: Heals and removes all debuffs.

attacks.name: Lightweight

Eater Legion.description: Eater Legion is a digital lifeform. It is the form an Eater Bit takes after attacking Erika Mishima.

attacks.description: Drains energy from Erika to unleash beams from all of her eyes.

attacks.name: Mandate
attacks.description: Heals and revives her Eater Bits, as well as healing herself.

attacks.description: As a reaction to her Eater Bits being defeated, she loses all buffs.

debut: Vital Bracelet Digital Monster:Medatbots x Digital Monster
GreyWars.description: GreyWars is a Digital Lifeform. It is a mysterious Medabot with a dragon warrior as its motif. It is said to have been developed with reference to the data of a Digimon game". It is an aircraft which excels in both offense and defense that protects itself from any attack with its Head Part, and unleashes attacks where it charges its Arm Parts, which resemble enormous claws, with energy.

attacks.name: Kanzen Guard (かんぜんガード, Kanzen Guard)
Gyakkyō (二脚（ぎゃっきょう）, Gyakkyō)

Hina Kurihara.name: Hina Kurihara
Hina Kurihara.description: Hina's appearance is that of a teenage girl with fair skin, green eyes, and short pink hair. She wears a blue and white beret with apixel-like pattern on it, a white and blue ear microphone on her left ear, a white sleeveless dress with a dark blue collar, a yellow scarf and green brooch on the chest, and light pixel-like patterns on dress's hemline, and near the waits. She also wears white with a dark blue fold in the wrist, similar to the dress's collar, a beige belt, a redDigital Monster-like pouch on the right hip, black leggings with a blue hemline, and white dark blue sneakers, also with a fold similar to dress's collar. The sneakers also have a beige belt on the ankle.

Hotan.name: Hotan
Hotan.description: Hotan is a purpleYesso scallop(Patinopecten yessoensis). Its design is likely a reference toThe Birth of Venus, a painting bySandro Botticellithat depictsVenusstanding on a scallop.

Jormungandr.name: Jormungandr
Jormungandr.description: Jormungandr is a Digital Lifeform. It is a gigantic shadow who Olegmon keeps in the chest on its right shoulder. It becomes a fiendish shadow if an opponent is recognized.

attacks.name: Age of Discovery
attacks.description: Jormungandr takes the opponent away to "Jötunheimr", which is said to be the end of the world.

Lord Megadeath.name: Lord Megadeath
Lord Megadeath.description: Lord Megadeathis a robotic-like digital lifeform born from inside the network and is the true mastermind and leader ofA.o.A. He plans to replace humans to become the ruler of both worlds. To do this, he has his organization steal the matrix data of humans and turn them intoOinkmonso that the matrix data can empowerVemmon, causing it to digivolve intoSnatchmonand further use it to create the perfect digimon partner. While preparing the matrix data for four Vemmon, he has one Vemmon take control of the Juggernaut battleship, which digivolves intoDestromonand attacks a city.

Luche.name: Luche
Luche.description: Luche is a young girl with fair skin, long blonde hair, and light blue eyes. She wears a white backless dress with a green layer underneath, purple bike shorts, a white ring on her right arm, and white sandals. She also wears a light blue hair ornament.

Mecha Rogue 01.name: Mecha Rogue 01
Mecha Rogue 01.description: Mecha Rogue 01 look like robotic, flyingbatsthat sting using a sharp spike at their ends, almost like a small Manta Ray.

Mecha Rogue 02.name: Mecha Rogue 02
Mecha Rogue 02.description: Mecha Rogue 02 looks like a small scorpion that has a tail and two arms that has scorpion like claws. They attack using their claws at short range or fire a poisonous barb from their tail

Mecha Rogue 03.name: Mecha Rogue 03
Mecha Rogue 03.description: Mecha Rogue 03 looks like a robotic dog with spikes on its back. They attack with rockets and charges.

Mecha Rogue 04.name: Mecha Rogue 04
Mecha Rogue 04.description: Mecha Rogue 04 looks like a skeletal human robot. It can fly around its opponent while slashing its claws, fire a short burst cannon from point blank range, or shoot a twin laser.

Mecha Rogue 05.name: Mecha Rogue 05
Mecha Rogue 05.description: Mecha Rogue 05 looks is a centaur-like robot. It has a snake like head with horns, while its arm is left arm is a gun and its right arm is a large sword. It is also capable of generating a hexagonal patterned shield.

Mecha Rogue X.name: Mecha Rogue X
Mecha Rogue X.description: Mecha Rogue X has three forms. Its first form is a bipedal, purple knight. It has a skull-like mask and has skulls patterned on its shoulders and breechcloth. It has two red wings and a wields red blades on its arms. Its second form is a spiked, pod-like robot that is immobile. Its third form is an extremely large creature that stands on four, squat legs and has a large tail. Its upper torso is large and almost insectoid, with large arms and wings.

Medal.name: Medal
debut: Vital Bracelet Digital Monster:Medabots x Digital Monster

Metabee.name: Metabee
Metabee.description: Metabeeis a Rhinoceros Beetle Digital Lifeform. Formally named "Metal Beetle". It is an old-generation Beetle-typeMedabotthat was developed when Medabots were first released. It is a standard shooting-oriented type that does not have outstanding strength but the balance of its Parts shines.

attacks.name: Meta Machine Gun
attacks.description: Shoots the enemy with the machine guns on its arms.

attacks.name: Meta Missile
attacks.description: Fires missiles from the guns on its horn.

attacks.name: Isseishageki (一斉射撃, Isseishageki lit. "Volley Firing")
attacks.description: Concentrates the power of all its shooting Parts using the potential hidden within its Medal, and launches a powerful blow.

attacks.name: Charge Shot (二脚 (チャージショット), Charge Shot)

Mother Eater.name: Mother Eater
Mother Eater.description: Mother Eater is a digital lifeform. It is the main unit of the Eaters.

attacks.name: Operation
attacks.description: Unleashes a blast of energy.

attacks.name: Build Arm
attacks.description: Attacks with its right hand and drains health.

attacks.name: Clap Hand
attacks.description: Attacks with its left hand.

attacks.name: Vanquish Drive
attacks.description: Unleashes a large torrent of energy.

attacks.name: World Restart
attacks.description: Manipulates the world to heavily damage targets.

attacks.name: Reverse Field
attacks.description: Changes the enemies resistances into weaknesses and their weaknesses into resistances.

attacks.name: Repair (Repairing)
attacks.description: Heals a small amount of HP.

attacks.name: Restart
attacks.description: Heals a lot of HP.

attacks.name: Undo
attacks.description: Removes the enemies buffs and removes its own debuffs.

attacks.name: Upgrade (Version Up)
attacks.description: Increases its ATK, DEF, SPD, and INT.

NeoCrimson.name: NeoCrimson
NeoCrimson.description: NeoCrimson is an experimental lifeform that is a fusion of the human Tamer Crimson and the Chaos series Digimon.

attacks.name: Blind Attack (Double Edge)
attacks.description: Blindly attacks with its Dramon Destroyer.

attacks.name: Giga Scissor Claw (Giga Blaster)
attacks.description: HerculesKabuterimon's technique in which it uses its cannons to fire a huge bolt of electricity.

attacks.name: Fungus Cruncher (Poison S-mush)
attacks.description: Mushroomon's technique in which it releases tiny mushroom bombs that poisons any enemy who attacks it.

Nightmare Leech.name: Nightmare Leech
debut: Digimon Fusion, "Vampire Land and the Moonlight General" [33]
Nightmare Leech.description: Official name given byNeoMyotismon'sDigimon Reference Bookprofile and used in Japanese media. No official romanization available.

Olive.name: Olive
Olive.description: Olive's design is derived from thedove(Columbidae), a symbol ofAphroditeand also of peace. It is a white dove with black eyes, grey legs, and a yellow beak.

OmegaKnight.name: OmegaKnight
debut: Vital Hero Digital Monster:Medarot x Digital Monster
OmegaKnight.description: OmegaKnightis a Digital Lifeform. It is a mysteriousMedabotwith the appearance of a holy knight. It is said to have been developed with reference to the data of aDigimongame. During battle, it deploys the gun muzzle and greatsword that are built into both of its arms. It boasts of overwhelming abilities that wipe out countless enemies in an instant.

attacks.name: Auto Charge (二脚（オートチャージ）, Auto Charge)

OverLord GAIA.name: OverLord GAIA
OverLord GAIA.description: OverLord GAIA has two forms. In its first, its arms remain attached to its body. In its second, the arms detach and float alongside it.

attacks.name: GAIA Gear (God Punish)
attacks.description: OverLord GAIA strikes with its hand. A counter-attack that misses unless OverLord GAIA is hit by an attack.

attacks.name: Titan Laser (Glory Weapon)
attacks.description: A powerful laser beam that hits all enemies.

attacks.name: Fantasmic Bomb (Phantom Screen)
attacks.description: Unleashes a blue screen of energy that hits all opponents.

Review Flower.name: Review Flower
debut: "Dive into the Net Ocean! Follow Super Hacker Rei!" [11]
Review Flower.description: The Review Flower is a flower shaped likeReviewmon's mouth.

Rokusho.name: Rokusho
Rokusho.description: Rokusho is a Stag Beetle Digital Lifeform. Formally named "Head Scissors". It is an old-generation Stag Beetle-type Medabot that was developed when Medabots were first released. It is a standard fighting-oriented type that does not have outstanding strength but the balance of its Parts shines.

attacks.name: Karatakewari (カラタケワリ, Karatakewari lit. "Cleaving Cut")
attacks.description: Concentrates the power of all its fighting Parts using the potential hidden within its Medal, and unleashes a powerful blow.

attacks.name: Charge Fight (二脚 (チャージファイト), Charge Fight)

Star Armies.name: Star Armies
Star Armies.description: Star Armies look likeStarmon (2010 anime)without glasses.

Surtr.name: Surtr
Surtr.description: Surtr is a Digital Lifeform. It is a gigantic shadow who Olegmon keeps in the chest on its left shoulder. It becomes a fiendish shadow if an opponent is recognized.

attacks.name: Dream Comes True
attacks.description: Surtr asks for the opponent's wishes and pretends to grant them, but avoids actually granting them using a convenient interpretation from Olegmon. If the opponent stubbornly refuses the wish, it keeps on doling out attacks.

Tinpet.name: Tinpet
debut: Vital Hero Digital Monster:Medabots x Digital Monster
Tinpet.description: Tinpet is a Digital Lifeform. It is the basic frame of a Medabot. The characteristics of its Muscle Cables, which are its main components, enable flexible movements and allow support for parts with complex shapes. In addition, there are two types of models; "Male" and "Female", and parts are also prepared exclusively for each gender.

Vitium (Form 2).description: Vitium (Form 2) is a type of Vitium.

Vitium (Form 3).name: Vitium (Form 3)
Vitium (Form 3).description: Vitium (Form 3) is a type of Vitium.

Vol\u00e9e.name: Volée
Vol\u00e9e.description: Name given by theDigimon Reference Bookand used in the franchise. No official romanization available.

D-Reaper ADR-01: Jeri Type.name: D-Reaper ADR-01: Jeri Type
debut: Digimon Tamers, "When Is A Mon Justimon?" [46]
D-Reaper ADR-01: Jeri Type.description: The ADR-01: Jeri Type is a Spy Agent. It is the first D-Reaper "body", sampled from Jeri Katou when she was losing heart.

attacks.name: α Houkai Dan (α崩壊弾, α Houkai Dan lit. "α Decay Shot")

D-Reaper ADR-02: Searcher.name: D-Reaper ADR-02: Searcher
D-Reaper ADR-02: Searcher.description: The ADR-02: Searcher is an Intelligence Gathering Agent. It is small, and has no offensive capability, but usually appears in large swarms.

attacks.name: Gokumon Chou no Haoto (獄門蝶の羽音, Gokumon Chou no Haoto lit. "Buzz of the Prison Gate Butterfly")

D-Reaper ADR-03: Pendulum Feet.name: D-Reaper ADR-03: Pendulum Feet
D-Reaper ADR-03: Pendulum Feet.description: The ADR-03: Pendulum Feet is an Antiaircraft Attack Agent. It is the first offensive Agent created by the D-Reaper, and uses its floating extensions to perform remote strikes.

D-Reaper ADR-04: Bubbles.name: D-Reaper ADR-04: Bubbles
D-Reaper ADR-04: Bubbles.description: The ADR-04: Bubbles is a Ground Combat Agent. Like the Searcher, it is a small Agent which appears in swarms, but it is able to use the wave motion guns on its arms to attack.

attacks.name: 35mm α Houkai Sokushahou (35mm α崩壊速射砲, 35mm α Houkai Sokushahou lit. "35mm α Decay Rapid-fire Cannon")

D-Reaper ADR-05: Creep Hands.name: D-Reaper ADR-05: Creep Hands
D-Reaper ADR-05: Creep Hands.description: The ADR-05: Creep Hands is a Grappling Agent. It is a medium-sized offensive unit, which uses its spiral-shaped, stretchable arms for locomotion and hand-to-hand combat.

attacks.name: Rasen no Benwan (螺旋の鞭腕, Rasen no Benwan lit. "Helix Whipping Arm")

D-Reaper ADR-06: Horn Striker.name: D-Reaper ADR-06: Horn Striker
D-Reaper ADR-06: Horn Striker.description: The ADR-06: Horn Striker is a Military Commander Agent. It is a medium-sized combat unit of overwhelming power.

attacks.name: Engetsugeri (円月蹴り, Engetsugeri lit. "Circle Moon Kick")

D-Reaper ADR-07: Palates Head.name: D-Reaper ADR-07: Palates Head
D-Reaper ADR-07: Palates Head.description: The ADR-07: Palates Head is a Reconnaissance-in-force Agent. It is large, and somewhat like the mid-boss of a video game. It makes sinister, unpredictable attacks.

attacks.name: Kyougeki no Koudan (虚撃の口弾, Kyougeki no Koudan lit. "Empty Attack of Mouth Shots")

D-Reaper ADR-08: Optimizer.name: D-Reaper ADR-08: Optimizer
D-Reaper ADR-08: Optimizer.description: The ADR-08: Optimizer is a Mother Ship Agent. It is large, and somewhat like the mid-boss of a video game.

attacks.name: 46cm α Houkai Hou (46cm α崩壊砲, 46cm α Houkai Hou lit. "46cm α Decay Cannon")

D-Reaper ADR-09: Gatekeeper.name: D-Reaper ADR-09: Gatekeeper
D-Reaper ADR-09: Gatekeeper.description: The ADR-09: Gatekeeper is a Base Defense Agent. It is formed to protect the D-Reaper's core, the "Kernel Sphere".

attacks.name: 35mm α Houkai Sokushahou (35mm α崩壊速射砲, 35mm α Houkai Sokushahou lit. "35mm α Decay Rapid-fire Cannon")

Mother D-Reaper.name: Mother D-Reaper
Mother D-Reaper.description: The Mother D-Reaper is an Ability Synthesis Agent. It is the form created when the D-Reaper unifies itself with ADR-01, ADR-09, and the consciousness of the humans and Digimon it has swallowed. Its body is made up of countless cords, optic fibers, and electrical and telephone wires.

attacks.name: Shoumetsu no Hadou (錆滅の波動, Shoumetsu no Hadou lit. "Wave of Entropy")
175mm α Houkai Dan (175mm α崩壊弾, 175mm α Houkai Dan lit. "175mm α Decay Shot")

Reaper.name: Reaper
Reaper.description: The Reaper is an Ability Synthesis Agent. It is the final form of the D-Reaper, created when all of its remaining Agents fuse in order to use all of their offensive capability, exceeding the limits of the D-Reaper itself.

attacks.name: Shinigami no Kama (死神の鎌, Shinigami no Kama lit. "Reaper's Sickle")
α Houkai Dan (α崩壊弾, α Houkai Dan lit. "α Decay Shot")

attacks.name: Ochre Blackout (土の絶入 , Chi no Taei, lit. "Earth’s Expiration")

attacks.name: Lumen Seal (光の封緘, Hikari no Fuukan, lit. "Light’s Seal")

attacks.name: Emerald Block (風の封鎖, Kaze no Fuusa, lit. "Wind’s Blockade")

attacks.name: Emerald Seal (風の封緘, Kaze no Fuukan, lit. "Wind’s Seal")
attacks.description: Fires an energy beam made of wind at the enemy.

attacks.name: Azure Coagulation (水の凝固, Mizu no Gyouko, lit. "Water's Coagulation")
attacks.description: Has shadow hands attack the enemy from below. This attack causes Water type damage.

attacks.name: Azure Suspension (水の凍結, Mizu no Touketsu, lit. "Water's Freezing")
attacks.description: Has shadow hands attack the enemy from below. This attack causes Water type damage.

attacks.name: Emerald Coagulation (風の凝固, Kaze no Gyouko, lit. "Wind's Coagulation")
attacks.description: Has shadow hands attack the enemy from below. This attack causes Wind type damage.

attacks.name: Emerald Suspension (風の凍結, Kaze no Touketsu, lit. "Wind's Freezing")
attacks.description: Has shadow hands attack the enemy from below. This attack causes Wind type damage.

attacks.name: Sombre Coagulation (闇の凝固, Yami no Gyouko, lit. "Dark Coagulation")
attacks.description: Has shadow hands attack the enemy from below. This attack causes Dark type damage.

attacks.name: Sombre Suspension (闇の凍結, Yami no Touketsu, lit. "Dark Freezing")
attacks.description: Has shadow hands attack the enemy from below. This attack causes Dark type damage.

attacks.name: Pernicious Waltz (Palazzi Valzer, (Ita: "Palaces' Waltz"): Fires multiple "Spiedini" (Ita
attacks.description: "Skewers") swords at the enemy.

attacks.name: Hell's Gate
attacks.description: Causes a gigantic mouth to appear from the darkness and swallows villains whole, disassembling those who have been swallowed into scraps of fragmented data.

Miyuki (Kenzoku).name: Miyuki (Kenzoku)
Miyuki (Kenzoku).description: Miyuki (Kenzoku) is a Kenzoku. It is the form Miyuki Minase takes after Master forces a group of 3rd Class Kenzoku to fuse with her.

attacks.name: Puppeteer (傀儡子, Kugutsushi)
attacks.description: Fires white energy beams at the enemy.

attacks.name: Shade (人影, Hitokage, lit. "Shadow Figure")
attacks.description: Fires dark fog at the enemy.

IceDevimon-Daipenmon Enhancement.name: IceDevimon-DaipenmonEnhancement
IceDevimon-Daipenmon Enhancement.description: IceDevimon-Daipenmon Enhancement is a Digimon who is the fusion of IceDevimon and Daipenmon.

attacks.name: Ice Crusher Avalanche (絶対零度 地獄のアイスクラッシャー, Zettaireido Jigoku no Aisu Kurasshā, lit. "Absolute Zero Ice Crusher of Hell")
attacks.description: Releases a big blow of crushed ice from its mouth-dispenser by turning the crank on its head.

Starmons.name: Starmon (2010 anime)
Starmons.description: Starmon (2010 anime) is a Major Digimon. The "Starmons" are composed of a corps of several Pickmon with a Starmon at their heart. The will of the corps is at the discretion of Starmon, the Head of the corps, and the Head's decisions are briskly and unconditionally followed by the Pickmon, keeping them from falling out of line as they maneuver according to Starmon's directions. There is definitely a strict hierarchy, and the complex maneuvers that are demanded by Starmon are demonstrated by the Pickmon, such as the corps techniques named "Meteor Squall" and "Wish Upon A Star". As Starmon has a cheerful, showy personality, it is an extreme optimist. Basically, it never gets depressed, and if it even seems depressed it seems to only be thinking things like, "I may be down, but don't I look good?" Because of that, even though it is taken lightly by other Digimon, it certainly doesn't worry about itself at all.

attacks.name: Rock 'n' Rolling
attacks.description: Throws itself forward while spinning

attacks.name: Star Storm (Wish Upon a Star)
attacks.description: Demonstrates a complex maneuver in which it releases a multitude of miniature stars.

Pickmon (Silver).name: Pickmon
Pickmon (Silver).description: Pickmon is a Minor Digimon. Pickmon are enrolled in the "Starmons" corps, where they make up most of the members. The "Starmons" are composed of a corps of several Pickmon with a Starmon at their heart. There is a strict hierarchy to the corps, and disobedience is not allowed because they must have absolute obedience to their superior. For that reason, there are more than a few Pickmon who have given up midway on becoming a Starmon, then left and gone back home, but nevertheless, Pickmon that work hard, aim at independence, and stand out from the crowd will succeed in being promoted to Major and becoming a Starmon.

attacks.name: Chinchikurin (チンチクリン, Chinchikurin lit. "Shorty")
Power Picks (Sugar Plum)
attacks.description: Swarms foes in a dizzying dance.

Pickmon (White).name: Pickmon
Pickmon (White).description: Pickmon is a Minor Digimon. Pickmon are enrolled in the "Starmons" corps, where they make up most of the members. The "Starmons" are composed of a corps of several Pickmon with a Starmon at their heart. There is a strict hierarchy to the corps, and disobedience is not allowed because they must have absolute obedience to their superior. For that reason, there are more than a few Pickmon who have given up midway on becoming a Starmon, then left and gone back home, but nevertheless, Pickmon that work hard, aim at independence, and stand out from the crowd will succeed in being promoted to Major and becoming a Starmon.

attacks.name: Chinchikurin (チンチクリン, Chinchikurin lit. "Shorty")

Pickmon (Red).description: Pickmon is a Minor Digimon. Pickmon are enrolled in the "Starmons" corps, where they make up most of the members. The "Starmons" are composed of a corps of several Pickmon with a Starmon at their heart. There is a strict hierarchy to the corps, and disobedience is not allowed because they must have absolute obedience to their superior. For that reason, there are more than a few Pickmon who have given up midway on becoming a Starmon, then left and gone back home, but nevertheless, Pickmon that work hard, aim at independence, and stand out from the crowd will succeed in being promoted to Major and becoming a Starmon.

Power Picks (Sugar Plum)

Digi-Egg of Courage.name: Digi-Egg of Courage
Digi-Egg of Courage.description: The Digi-Egg of Courage (勇気のデジメンタル Yūki no Dejimentaru?, lit. "Digimental of Courage") has the attribute of Fire, and those who use it boost their melee capabilities.[1] It is engraved with the Crest of Courage. Most of the digivolutions which occur through this egg have something to do with fire or dinosaurs, and they may also have the Crest of Courage somewhere on their body.

Digi-Egg of Destiny.name: Digi-Egg of Destiny
Digi-Egg of Destiny.description: The Digi-Egg of Destiny (運命のデジメンタル Unmei no Dejimentaru?, lit. "Digimental of Destiny") has an unknown attribute. At present, only three Digivolutions are known to have utilized this Digi-Egg.[1] It's one of the two golden Digi-Eggs. It's engraved with the Crest of Destiny, which most of its users bear on their bodies. Most of the evolutions which occur through this egg are related to gold.

Digi-Egg of Friendship.name: Digi-Egg of Friendship
Digi-Egg of Friendship.description: The Digi-Egg of Friendship (友情のデジメンタル Yūjou no Dejimentaru?, lit. "Digimental of Friendship") has the attribute of Thunder, and those who use it move with speed. It is engraved with the Crest of Friendship. Most of the digivolutions which occur through this egg have something to do with ice, lightning, or mammals, and they may also have the Crest of Friendship somewhere on their body.

Digi-Egg of Hope.name: Digi-Egg of Hope
Digi-Egg of Hope.description: The Digi-Egg of Hope (希望のデジメンタル Kibou no Dejimentaru?, lit. "Digimental of Hope") has the attribute of Holy, and those that use it wield sacred power while exhibiting absolute strength over evil.[1] It's engraved with the Crest of Hope. Most of the digivolutions which occur through this egg have something to do with constellations or ungulates, and they may also have the Crest of Hope somewhere on their body.

Digi-Egg of Kindness.name: Digi-Egg of Kindness
Digi-Egg of Kindness.description: The Digi-Egg of Kindness (優しさのデジメンタル Yasashisa no Dejimentaru?, lit. "Digimental of Kindness") is shrouded in mystery, so its attribute is unknown. Many who Armor Digivolve with it take on cute animal forms.[1] It's engraved with the symbol of the Crest of Kindness and they may also have the Crest of Kindness somewhere on their body.

Digi-Egg of Knowledge.name: Digi-Egg of Knowledge
Digi-Egg of Knowledge.description: The Digi-Egg of Knowledge (知識のデジメンタル Chishiki no Dejimentaru?, lit. "Digimental of Knowledge") has the attribute of Earth, and those it control the ground with supremacy in underground battles.[1] It's engraved with the Crest of Knowledge. Most of the digivolutions which occur through this egg have something to do with insects, and they may also have the Crest of Knowledge somewhere on their body.

Digi-Egg of Light.name: Digi-Egg of Light
Digi-Egg of Light.description: The Digi-Egg of Light (光のデジメンタル Hikari no Dejimentaru?, lit. "Digimental of Light") has the attribute of Light, and those use it purify darkness with its luminescent power.[1] It is engraved with the Crest of Light. Most of the digivolutions which occur through this egg have something to do with mythological creatures or fish, and they may also have the Crest of Light somewhere on their body.

Digi-Egg of Love.name: Digi-Egg of Love
Digi-Egg of Love.description: The Digi-Egg of Love (愛情のデジメンタル Aijou no Dejimentaru?, lit. "Digimental of Love") has the attribute of Wind, and those who use it soar through the air and specialize in aerial combat.[1] It's engraved with the Crest of Love. Most of the digivolutions which occur through this egg have something to do with winged creatures or an Egyptian motif, and they may also have the Crest of Love somewhere on their body.

Digi-Egg of Miracles.name: Digi-Egg of Miracles
Digi-Egg of Miracles.description: The Digi-Egg of Miracles (奇跡のデジメンタル Kiseki no Dejimentaru?, lit. "Digimental of Miracles") is one of the two "Golden Digi-Eggs", possesses the attribute of "Metal", and is made of the super-metal "Chrome Digizoid". No matter what kind of predicament those who acquire the power of the Digi-Egg of Miracles fall into, they're able to overcome it through that miraculous power, and due to that, it's definitely appropriate to call it a Miracle object.[9] It is engraved with the Crest of Miracles, which most of its users bear on their bodies.

Digi-Egg of Reliability.name: Digi-Egg of Reliability
Digi-Egg of Reliability.description: The Digi-Egg of Reliability (誠実のデジメンタル Seijitsu no Dejimentaru?, lit. "Digimental of Sincerity"), also known as the Digi-Egg of Sincerity and the Digi-Egg of Honesty, possesses the attribute of "Water", and those that don this Digimental demonstrate their true power underwater

Digi-Egg of Sincerity.name: Digi-Egg of Sincerity
Digi-Egg of Sincerity.description: The Digi-Egg of Sincerity (純真のデジメンタル Junshin no Dejimentaru?, lit. "Digimental of Purity"), also known as the Digi-Egg of Purity,[2][3] has the attribute of Plant, and those who use it are able to blend in with nature.[1] It's engraved with the Crest of Sincerity. Most of the digivolutions which occur through this egg have a relation to plants and Japanese culture, such as leaf ninjas or flower Kabuki players, and they may also have the Crest of Sincerity somewhere on their body. The official subs of Digimon Adventure 02 renamed the Digi-Egg as the Digi-Egg of Purity.
